column2: Yeso Kirisito‑ka idi mai oni okanahanaboneni. Yeso‑ka idi i‑di Dafi tohe, ai‑ka hidi tohematane. I‑di Dafi‑ka idi i‑di Abaraho tohematane.
Abaraho bidi i‑di Isaki toha, Isaki bidi i‑di Yako toha, Yako bidi i‑di Yoda toha nematane. Yoda anidi mai toha, sohori mai toha nameteni.
Yoda bidi i‑di Feresi toha, owa i‑di Sera toha, mai‑ka ami i‑di Tama toha nameteni. Feresi bidi i‑di Esiro toha, Esiro bidi i‑di Araho toha,
Araho bidi i‑di Aminadabi toha, Aminadabi bidi i‑di Nasomi toha, Nasomi bidi i‑di Sarimo toha nematane.
Sarimo fadi i‑di Habi, mai‑ka ewe i‑di Bowasi toha, Bowasi fadi i‑di Hoti, mai‑ka ewe i‑di Obedi toha, Obedi bidi i‑di Yese tohematane.
Yese bidi i‑di Dafi, ai‑ka hidi webote tohematane. I‑di Oriya fadi‑ya Dafi famawahe, mai‑ka ewe i‑di Saromaho tohematane.
Saromaho bidi i‑di Hobowaho toha, Hobowaho bidi i‑di Abiyasi toha, Abiyasi bidi i‑di Asa toha,
Asa bidi i‑di Yosafa toha, Yosafa bidi i‑di Yoraho toha, Yoraho bidi i‑di Osiya toha,
Osiya bidi i‑di Yotaho toha, Yotaho bidi i‑di Akasi toha, Akasi bidi i‑di Esekiya toha,
Esekiya bidi i‑di Manasesi toha, Manasesi bidi i‑di Amo toha, Amo bidi i‑di Yosiya toha,
Yosiya bidi i‑di Yekoniya toha nematane. Yekoniya toha, sohori mai toha, ai‑ka idi mai toha na, mai‑ya mai towakamameteni, Babironi‑kaya.
Babironi‑kaya i‑di Yekoniya bidi wade, oni i‑di Saratieo toha, Saratieo bidi i‑di Sorobabeo toha,
Sorobabeo bidi i‑di Abiodi toha, Abiodi bidi i‑di Eriaki toha, Eriaki bidi i‑di Asohori toha,
Asohori bidi i‑di Sadoke toha, Sadoke bidi i‑di Akima toha, Akima bidi i‑di Eriodi toha,
Eriodi bidi i‑di Eriasa toha, Eriasa bidi i‑di Mataho toha, Mataho bidi i‑di Yako toha,
Yako bidi i‑di Yose tohe, Yose fadi‑bone i‑di Mariya tohameteni. Mariya bidi i‑di Yeso, Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika amane, mai ati nineni.

Abaraho‑ka nodi mai 14 tohawahi‑ke i‑di Dafi tohe, i‑di Dafi‑ka nodi mai 14 tohamakitasi‑ke Yodeo mai hiwakamematane, Babironi‑kaya. Ai‑ka idi mai kamatasa, mai‑ka nodi mai 14 tohamakitasi‑ke i‑di Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika kobonawahematane.
Fare i‑di Yeso Kirisito wademata tamine timitahi. Yeso madi‑bone i‑di Mariya‑ya i‑di Yose famebona, mai fami awisari‑ya Deoso‑ka Doni ati ene Mariya naba tohameteni.
Deoso ati‑ya Yose nofi nafi, Mariya naba tamine‑ya mite, atibodi yama‑ya kadike,
“Owa ene Mariya‑ya mai weeriyahi. Owati yanaraboneni. Hini owa honita wahaboneni.” I‑di Yose atibodi ati nematane.
I‑di Yose amone, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose wadarine‑ya awe, ati‑ya mite,
“Yose, i‑di Dafi‑ka nodi amatini. Owati timitahi. I‑di Mariya dai famiyahi. Sibaraboneni. Deoso‑ka Doni ati ene Mariya naba toha, maki ene tohi awirane.
Deoso Bidi hiyose, Mariya dori‑ya foye, wadeya, oni Yeso tohebonane. Mai ati kasira mai manakone‑ya nanahabebonane.” Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati wadarine ati nematane.
Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita‑mata ati‑nima yama nameteni.
“Fana atona maki‑ya famatera naba tohawahaboneni. Bidi wadeya, oni Emano·eo tohebonane.” Deoso‑ka yama hani ati neni.
Emano·eo ai ati‑ya Deoso ai‑ya sawine.
I‑di Yose dodafi, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati wadarine‑nima idi Yose ne, Mariya‑ya dodimaki, Mariya‑ya kakame, hini hika yobe‑ya Mariya winawahameteni.
Hifamarameteni. Dori wadi hawa tohiya, hifamawahameteni. I‑di Yose ati ene, Mariya bidi oni i‑di Yeso tohematane.
Bere Yodeya‑kaya Yeso wade‑ya wami bara‑ka mai wi‑wina mai kake, Yerosare‑ya mai kobonameteni. Bere‑kaya Yeso wade‑ya Yodeo ai‑ka hidi webote i‑di Erodi tohematane.
Yerosare‑ya mai kobona,
“Yodeo dai‑ka hidi webote wademona oda awabone, mahi ka‑kaki‑kaya hika amowa oda awe, oda kakeni, Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika oda awabonehe.” Mai ati nameteni.
Hidi webote‑mona tamine‑ya i‑di Erodi mite, atibodi yama‑ya kadike, Yerosare‑ya mai wi‑wina mai nafi mai atibodi yama‑ya kadikahari nameteni.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha na, i‑di Erodi ati ene mai yorotokana, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika wadebona, yama hani ati na, ebeni‑kaya wadabonati?” I‑di Erodi ati ne,
“Bere Yodeya‑kaya Kirisito wadebona, Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita ati nematamonane.
‘Bere Yodeya‑ka tabora bide towe tohi awirini. Bere amosateni, fara‑ya ai‑ka hidi wadebonane.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati teni.” Mai ati nameteni.
Mai nafi tokoma, mai nowati‑ya wami bara‑ka mai hinama mai‑ya i‑di Erodi haane, mai kamake, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Eme abariko ne‑ya amowa dai awimeteti?” I‑di Erodi ati nematane.
Mai ati‑ya i‑di Erodi mite, mai‑ya yose,
“Bere‑ya dai tokahi, ewe dai sibaniya, dai wasiya, owa‑kaya dai kamahi. Dai ati omitiya, makobote okomiya, okahiyarebonane.” I‑di Erodi ati nematane, keyehe‑ya hirineri.
I‑di Erodi ati‑ya mai mita, mai toka, hibati‑ya amowa mai hiawe‑ya mai awamatasameteni. Amowa yakane, mai hiwakatome, ewe sawi‑ke yobe neme‑ya amowa maatowitimatane.
Amowa‑ya mai awa, mai ya‑yaina, mai ya‑yaini nafemeteni.
Yobe‑ya mai tokiyoma, Yeso madi‑ya fame‑ya mai awa, Yeso‑ya mai kahiyara, Yeso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai daanameteni. Oro‑ya mai daa, yama mahi amosa‑ya mai daa, mira‑ya mai daa, mai nameteni.
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati wadarine‑ya mai awa,
“I‑di Erodi‑ya dai tokomariyahi.” Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati wadarine ati nematane.
Wada ihi hawi one‑kaya mai tokoma, hini mai tabori‑kaya mai tokoma, i‑di Erodi‑ya mai hiyari awirameteni.
Mai tokoma mai nowati‑ya Deoso‑ka yo‑yose i‑di Yose‑ya wadarine hiyare,

“Yose didafihi. Yeso madi‑ya fame tiwakahi. Eyito‑ya dai tokiya, Eyito‑ya dai nahoyahi. Tiwa haa·onamatasaboneni. Yeso‑ya i‑di Erodi sibanebonane, Yeso‑ya nanahabebonaha.” Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati wadarine ati nematane.
I‑di Yose dodafi, fadi bidi‑ya fama‑ya towakebona, yama soki‑ya mai yanana, Eyito‑ya mai towakameteni.
I‑di Erodi abi awisareya, Eyito‑ya mai winameteni. Makobote i‑di Erodi abawahematane.
“Oka Dao Eyito‑ya wineya, haa·onaboneni.” Deoso ati nematamonane.
Hibati‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita ati‑nima yama nawahameteni.
Wami bara‑ka mai tokoma, mai tamine‑ya i‑di Erodi mite, yawe,
“Owa‑ya mai hiyaramabone ona, owa‑ya mai hiyarami awireni.” I‑di Erodi atibodi ati ne,
yawi kite, sodado mai‑ya yose,

“Bere‑ya dai tokahi. Madehe makidi 2 ano toha dai nanahaba, madehe bi‑bidi na toha na, mai nafi dai nanahabahi. Bere‑ka madehe dai nanahaba, Bere yakari‑ya mai wi‑wina mai‑ka madehe dai nanahaba, dai nahi.” I‑di Erodi ati nematane.
“Ano one‑ya amowa‑ya mai awa, fara hidi‑mona‑ka ano fami yanatona awineni.” I‑di Erodi atibodi ati nematane.
Yeremiya Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita‑mata ati‑mata‑nima yama nawahameteni.
“Rama‑ka mai ohinaboneni. I‑di Hakeo‑ka nodi mai‑ka madehe tabiyo mai ohinaboneni.” I‑di Yeremiya‑ka yama hani ati neni.
Eyito‑ya i‑di Yose wine‑ya i‑di Erodi abe, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose i‑di Yose‑ya wadarine hiyare,
“Isara·eo‑kaya dai tokomahi. Yeso‑ya ati nanahabemari, abawahane.” Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati wadarine ati nematane.
Ati ene Yeso madi‑ya fame‑ya i‑di Yose towakamematane, Isara·eo‑kaya.
I‑di Erodi bidi oni i‑di Akerao tohe, Yodeya‑ya mai wi‑wina mai‑ka hidi tohawahe, tamine‑ya i‑di Yose mite, habo siitonematane. Yama soki‑ya i‑di Yose wada‑ya awamatase,
“Yodeya‑ya tikariyahi.” Ati wadarine ati nematane.
Wada ihi Karireya‑kaya mai tokabisameteni.
Karireya‑kaya mai toka, Nasare‑kaya mai winawahameteni.
“Deoso Bidi Nasare‑ke amane, mai ati naboneni.” Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita mai ati nametemoneni.
Fare Yeso Nasare‑ke amane.
Yowaho Batita Yodeya‑ka kabani‑ya tokawahe, Yodeya‑ya mai wi‑wina mai‑ya hiyare,
“Dai ene amosawamahi. Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebonane.” Yowaho Batita ati ne, ati damemarine.
Hibati‑ya Yowaho tamine‑bona‑ya i‑di Isa·iya kanahano,
“Bofe‑ke mai‑ka owa kabani‑kaya ati yananeya,
‘Ai‑ka Hidi webote hawine‑bona dai namosahi.’ Ati nebonane.” Deoso ati ne, ati‑ya i‑di Isa·iya kanahanomatamonane.
Kamero kone wamani‑ya Yowaho Batita weye, bani ataro wamani‑ya dosi‑ya sokinaki nemarine. Yowaho Batita yamata‑ya kihare, ti‑tiri mai‑ya kaba, mo‑mona mai fahi‑ya fawa nemarine.
Yerosare‑ya mai wi‑wina mai toha, Yodeya‑ya mai wi‑wina mai toha, Yodaho Faha yakari‑ya mai wi‑wina mai toha, mai na, i‑di Yowaho‑ya mai tokomakemaroni.
“Owa ene towe amani.” Mai ati na,
Yodaho Faha‑ya i‑di Yowaho Batita mai‑ya habanirisemarine.
Fariseo mai toha, sadoseo mai toha, mai na, mai‑ya i‑di Yowaho awe,
“Maka ihi‑nima dai ene na, ebeni‑ke ati ene Deoso‑ya dai nayofiniti?
Dai abarabone dai ati niya, dai ene amosawamiyahi.
‘Abaraho‑ka nodi oda amani. Deoso oda‑ya sarikiterebonane.’ Dai ati riyahi.
Owati dai mitahi. Abaraho‑ka nodi mai one‑bone‑ya Deoso ati wamane‑mana, yati‑ya mai‑ya wamane nane.

Awa bono bonora toha, awa bono kabi amosara toha na, ade ai kaana, ai sarikiteni. Fara‑nima Deoso bari‑ya maakani hawa tohane. Dai ene amosawami awiriya, awa kaana‑nima Deoso dai‑ya niwahebonane. Dai‑ya nanahabeya, dai‑ya sarikanebonane.

Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika ama·orani. Faha‑ya dai‑ya haba·onirisineni, dai ene amosawamabonehe. Kamaki‑bona kitabotebisa amane. Owa‑ta towebisa ama·oni. Amosabotebisa amane. Ati ene Deoso‑ka Doni dai one‑ya sawiwahebonane. Ai nafi‑ya kadikeya, ai one‑ya sarikanebonane.

Tiriko atori abi hawa toha, atori ai sarikana‑nima mai ihi amosara mai‑ya sarikanebona, yama hirini fawateraboneni. Tiriko noki ai kayafi‑nima mai ihi amosa mai‑ya kayafebonane.” I‑di Yowaho ati nemarine.
Karireya‑kaya Yeso yanane, Yodaho Faha‑ya tokematane, i‑di Yowaho habahinirisebonaha.
“Owa habatinirisabisahi.” Yowaho ati nematane.
“Sibaraboneni. Owa habatinirisiya, Deoso ati‑nima ai teni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Ati ene Yowaho habahinirisematane.
Yowaho habahinirise, tokomorosame, Deoso‑ka Doni neme‑ya kise, Yeso‑ya sawiwahe, wayomata awi‑nima awi ne‑ya Yowaho awematane.
Neme‑ya ati kaki,
“Oka Dao amane. Oka Dao onofi nafineni. Ene amose, ene ya‑yai·oneni.” Ati nematane.
Deoso‑ka Doni ati ene kabani‑ya Yeso tokematane, Diaboro ati‑ya mitebonaha.
“Owa ene Deoso ati‑ya Yeso tokadabamarebonane.” Diaboro atibodi ati nematane.
Yeso amoni 40 kane‑ya tafare, Deoso‑ya hiyari nokotonihi, fimi watihikanematane.
Makobote Diaboro kamaki,
“Deoso Bidi amatiniya, tiwati ihi yati baho tohahi, tikababonehe.” Diaboro ati ne,
“Deoso Bidi amatiniya, yoratinisahi. Yama sibaraboneni. Fara Deoso‑ka yama hani ati timitahi,
‘Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai hiyosebona, tiwa‑ya mai waratonaboneni, yati‑ya tiwa teme taratokarabonehe.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati nineni.” Diaboro ati nematane.
“‘Deoso hini ati‑nima ene nebona, ati‑ya dai siwakariyahi.’ Yama hani ati nineni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Adami webote‑ya Yeso‑ya Diaboro towakame, mai tabori dami‑ya yofikanematane.
“Mai tabori amosa dama tiawahi. Owa noko‑kaya tiwa yobati tati‑kaya tiwitiya, owa hidi tiniya, tiwa‑ya yama nafi daa·onaboneni.” Diaboro ati nematane.
“Tikamahi. Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑nima obisaboneni. Yama hani ati timitahi.
‘Deoso dai kahiyarahi. Mai one‑ya dai narifariyahi. Deoso dai narifabisahi.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati nineni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Diaboro tokome nowati‑ya Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai kake, Yeso‑ya mai kasomameteni.
Yowaho kadeya‑ya wai tamine‑ya Yeso mite, Karireya‑kaya tokomatasematane, Nasare‑ya.
Nasare‑ya wine, Kafanaho‑kaya toke, winemarine. Kafanaho wara webote widi‑ya toha, i‑di Seboro, i‑di Nafitari, mai fama, mai‑ka nodi mai wini‑kaya Yeso winemarine, Kafanaho‑ya.
Hibati‑ya Yeso tamine‑ya i‑di Isa·iya kanahanomatane.

“I‑di Seboro, i‑di Nafitari mai fama mai‑ka wami‑ya mai wi‑wina mai toha, wara webote widi‑ya mai wi‑wina mai toha, Yodaho Faha tati‑ya mai wi‑wina mai toha, Bara mai dama mai wini‑bone‑kaya mai wi‑wina mai toha na; Deoso tamine‑ya mai watora, Deoso tamine‑ya mai mitawahaboneni. Yama‑ya mai watora, yama soki‑ya mai wi‑wina mai‑nima mai na, yama tehe‑ya mai wi‑wina mai‑nima mai nawawahiya, Deoso tamine‑ya mai watowahaboneni.” Isa·iya‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Yeso ai‑ya hiyare,
“Dai ene towe‑ya dai nofamariyahi. Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebonane.” Yeso ati ne, ati yanani damemarine.
Karireya‑ka wara webote widi‑ya Yeso yakane, i‑di Simaho Bedoro, sohori i‑di Anidere‑ya fame faha‑ya hedi‑ya mai kerokana, mai‑ya Yeso awematane. Fara aba mai‑ya mai na‑nawasi mai tohamaroni.
“Hima, owa‑ya dai dabahi, owa tamine dai hiyarawahaboneni. Hibati‑ya aba mai‑ya dai nawasiteni. Hibayata owati‑ya mai nofabone, mai‑ya dai sibanaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, mai‑ka hedi towitakosa, Yeso‑ya mai dabawahameteni.
Mai toka, i‑di Tiyako, sohori i‑di Yowaho‑ya fame‑ya Yeso awematane. Kanawa dori‑ya mai mookanameteni, mai‑ka abi i‑di Sebedeo eyehe. Mai‑ka hedi‑ya mai awawama, mai‑ya Yeso himanematane.
Mai‑ka abi tofoyakose, Yeso‑ya mai dabameteni.

Karireya‑kaya tabora dami‑ya Yeso tokawahe, Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe dami‑ya mai‑ya kanawatomatane. Ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine‑ya hiyarematane. Mai kiyana mai‑ya nakitamematane.

Karireya‑kaya Yeso mai‑ya nakitame tamine‑ya mai mitameteni, Siriya‑ka tabora dama‑kaya. Madi towe mai foyi‑ka mai toha, mai ka‑kana na mai toha, mai yakara mai toha na, fara mai mai hiwakama, mai nafi‑ya Yeso nakitamematane.
Yeso nowati‑ya mai dama mai tokomakemaroni. Karireya‑ka mai toha, Dikabori‑ka mai toha, Yerosare‑ka mai toha, Yodeya‑ka mai toha, Yodaho Faha kowani‑ka mai toha na, Yeso nowati‑ya mai tokomakemaroni.
Mai dama mai‑ya awe, adami‑ya tokomorose, itari, hika mai da‑daba fai yowi‑ya mai nahoremaroni. Mai‑ya kanawatobona, ati yanane,
“‘Towe ama·oni.’ Dai ati niya,
Deoso dai‑ya kasomebona, Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya dai sawiwahaboneni.
Dai o‑ohi Deoso dai‑ya kasomebona, dai ya‑yainibisaboneni.
‘Yama owato nafira, Deoso‑ta yama nafi‑ya watotene.’ Dai atibodi ati na,
Deoso dai‑ya kasomebona, wami nafi‑ya dai kayafaboneni.
‘Owatibodi amosawamaboneni.’ Dai atibodi ati na,
Deoso dai‑ya kasomebona, dai atibodi‑ya namosi nafibonane.
Dai one ene amosara, dai ati hamara, Deoso dai‑ya kasomebona, dai ene kote towe toha, manakone‑ya Deoso haarebonane.
Deoso ati dai nokotoniyahi. Yama bara dai nokotoniriya, Deoso dai‑ya kasomebona, Deoso‑ya dai awawahaboneni.
Mai ibi weena mai dai kasomahi, mai yawi fawanabonehe. Haa‑nima dai ene niya, Deoso dai‑ya kasomebona, Deoso bidi dai tohawahaboneni.
Deoso ati‑ya dai nofa, Deoso‑ya mai nofara dai‑ya mai bisiniya, Deoso dai‑ya kasomebona, Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya dai sawiwahaboneni.
Owati‑ya dai nofa dai‑ya mai nofaraboneni. Dai‑ya mai wee, dai‑ya mai bisi, dai tamine‑ya keyehe‑ya mai hiri, mai naboneni.
Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑nima dai na, fara hibati‑ya mai‑ya mai bisinaharemeteni. Dai ya‑yainahi. Deoso dai‑ya kasomebona, neme‑ya dai ene manakone nafe dai kayafaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.

“Bofe‑ka mai‑ka sao dai tohateni. Sao ihi ai tefe kabi amosateni. Dai ene amosahi. Deoso ati‑ya mai nofara mai ihi‑nima dai ene riyahi. Dai ene amosa dai maakariyahi. Faha ihi sao abiya, amosawamaterani. Sao towe ai weretowititeni.
Bofe‑ka mai‑ka yama wahi‑nima na dai tohateni. Dai ene‑ya mai awiya, Deoso ati‑ya mai nofawahaboneni. Adami tati‑ya ai tabaro ita, ai tabaro‑ya mai nafi awateni.
Nabarina ai botokana, nabarina wahi ai barikiterani. Nabarina ai kanawaarikosa, nabarina wahi ihi yama ai awateni.
Yama wahi‑nima dai ene nahi. Dai ene amosa, dai ene‑ya mai awiya, dai‑ka Abi neme‑ke‑ya mai kahiyarawahaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Mose‑ka yama hani ati, Deoso ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina‑mete mai‑ka yama hani ati na, ati fawateraboneni. Mai ati‑nima onaboneni.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. Neme aba, bofe aba naboneni. I‑di Mose‑ka yama hani ati kote fawaterabone, ati‑nima yama nawahaboneni.
‘Deoso ati kote onofa, fara owa‑nima dai nahi. Deoso ati kote dai nofiya, dai sibaraboneni.’ Mai one ati na,
Mai ati‑ya Deoso nofarebonane. Mai ati‑nima dai riyahi. Deoso ati nafi‑ya mai tokadaba, ati mai hikamine, mai ati‑ya Deoso nofabisebonane.
Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, fariseo mai toha na, mai atibodi‑nima dai atibodi na Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya dai sawiraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Hibati‑ka mai ati dai mita,
‘Ai owa‑ya dai nanahabariyahi. Ai owa‑ya tinahabiya tiwa‑ya mai wataboneni.’ Mai ati nametemoneni.
Owati dai mitahi. Mai atibodi ati okadikaboneni. Mai one‑ya mai ka‑kako mai atibodi owataboneni. Mai atibodi amosara wara hirini‑ya mai‑ya onasawiteboneni.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya dai daanabone, dai ati niya,
‘Se! Oka naki owa ene yawewahane.’ Tiwatibodi ati niya,
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone tinawadakosiya, tikiya,
‘Naki, towebisa ama·oni. Owa‑ya tiwati somawamahi. Tiwa onofini.’ Tiniya.
Makobote Deoso‑ka yama‑bone daatibisahi.

Kofeno‑ya tiwa ene towe‑ya ai owa kaminebona, dai kobokani awisariya, tiwati somawama kanibote nahi. Tiwati somawama kanibote ni awiriya, sekorasa tiwa‑ya mai waratoniya, kadeya‑ya tiwa‑ya mai nafoyaba awineni.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. Yama manakone nafi abi awisariya, tiwa‑ya mai seekani awiraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Hibati‑ka mai ati dai mita,
‘Hini tika yibote dai famabisahi.’ Mai ati teni.
Owati dai mitahi. Fana‑ya dai atibodi kadika,
‘Se! Oahamata.’ Dai atibodi ati niya,
dai atibodi ati‑ya Deoso miteya, yawebonane.
Tiwa yehe sayo‑ka ene yama towe nokotinihe, tiwa yehe sayo‑ka wisitinakosahi. Tiwa yehe abahi, yama hirini‑kaya tisawirabonehe. Tiwa yehe ohari‑ya Deoso tabaro‑ya tiwinabisiya, yama amosabisaboneni.
‘Tiwa honita wahawamabone tiwatibodi ati niya, tika yibote‑ka yama hani‑ba daatiniya, tiwa honita wahawamahi.’ Hibati‑ka mai ati nametemoneni.
Owati dai mitahi. Tifana, hini tiwa ene tika yibote honita wahawamiya, maki bare‑ya tika yibote famawahaba awineni.
‘Tiwa ene toha, tika yibote ihi toha, maki owa ene toha nane.’ Deoso ati nebonane.
Dai nafi‑ya weenebonane. Tika yibote tikako awiriya, hini atibodi ihi maki bare‑ya famawahiya, tiwa‑ta tiwa‑ya Deoso kakorebonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Hibati‑ka mai ati dai mita,
‘—Keyehe hiri·otera, keyehe‑ya hiri·oniya, Deoso owa‑ya bisinebonane.— Dai ati niya, fara Deoso oni dai hirina, hini dai ati‑nima dai nahi. Deoso dai‑ya bisirayaho.’ Mai ati nametemoneni.
Owati dai mitahi. Dai ati‑nima dai nahi. Haa‑nima dai one ati teni.
‘Keyehe‑ya hiri·oniya, Deoso tabaro fawanebonane.’ Dai one ati na,
Mai ati‑nima dai ati riyahi. Deoso tabaro‑ya Deoso‑ka kadera amosa kawateni.
Wami oni dai hiririyahi, wami‑ya Deoso teme kawatene. Yerosare oni dai hiririyahi, Yerosare‑ya Deoso kayawatene.
Haa‑nima dai one ati teni.
‘Keyehe‑ya hiri·oniya, owa namidi‑ya mai tiinakosaboneni.’ Mai ati na,
Mai ati‑nima dai ati riyahi. Dai tati kone soki toha, hini dai ati ene dai tati kone sa‑sawanawamaterani. Dai wiyona, hini dai ati ene dai tati kone so‑sokinawamaterani.
Dai ati amosa hinama tohahi. Keyehe‑ya dai hiririyahi. Satanasi ati ene keyehe‑ya dai hiriteni. Satanasi ati‑nima dai ati riyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Hibati‑ka mai ati dai mita,
‘Tiwa noko‑ya bositokanihi, noko bositikanihariho. Tiwa ino‑ya bakatonihi, ino bakatinihariho.’ Mai ati nametemoneni.
Owati dai mitamatasahi. Dai ati somahi. Dai ebete‑ya batanariya, dai ebete beheri dai benawamakihi, batahirimakebonehe.
Dai‑ka owa kofeno‑ya hiyare, ati ene kofeno dai‑ya haaneya,
‘Hika bora isi‑ba daatinahi.’ Kofeno ati neya,
bora isi, bora nemehe na, fama dai daanibisahi.
Sodado dai‑ya yoseya,
‘Oka yama weyetiniya, tika yama weyeni‑ke ora ohariho.’ Sodado ati neya,
yama dai weyeniya, dai‑ka ora famabisaho.
hika yama‑ba dai daanahi.
‘Oka yama honita‑ba daatinahi.’ Ati neya,
hika yama‑ba dai daanaharihi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Hibati‑ka mai ati dai mita,
‘Tiwa‑ya mai no‑nofa mai tinofaharihi. Tiwa‑ya mai kaka mai tikakoharihi.’ Mai ati nametemoneni.
Owati dai mitahi. Dai‑ya mai nofara mai dai nofiyahi. Dai‑ya mai bisina mai tamine dai hiyarahi, Deoso mai‑ya kasomebonaha.

Deoso bidi ama·oni dai ati na, Deoso ene‑nima dai ene nahi. Mai ati kasira mai toha, mai ati soma mai toha na, Deoso mai‑ya kasomatene. Deoso ene mahi wehene‑ya mai nafi awateni. Deoso ene mai tabori dami‑nima faha kakiteni.
Dai‑ya mai no‑nofa mai‑ya dai nofa, mai one‑ya dai nofariya, Deoso ya‑yaiterene. Kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya mai ha‑haa hini mai one‑ya mai nofateni.
Hini tika mai tihiyariya, mai one‑ya tihiyari awiriya, Deoso ya‑yaiterene. Bara hini mai one‑ya mai hiyarateni.
Tiwa ene amosa hinama tohahi. Ai‑ka Abi neme‑ke ene amose hinama tohatene. Ai‑ka Abi ene‑nima dai ene nahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Dai one‑ya dai ati kasoma,
‘Mai okasomabone, owa dai awahi.’ Dai ati riyahi.
Haa‑nima dai ati niya, dai‑ka Abi neme‑ke ya‑yaini awirebonane. Dai‑ka yama kasomi manakone‑ya daani awirebonane.

Dai one Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya yama‑ya mai daanabone, ho‑hori‑ya mai afoteni. Yama‑ya mai kihara mai‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai daanabone, ho‑hori‑ya mai afoteni, mai one kikawama, mai hiawebonaha. Mai ihi‑nima dai ene riyahi. Owati amosa dai mitahi. Mai‑ka yama manakone hawa tohineni. Mai‑ka yama kasomi manakone Deoso daahini awiraboneni.
Mai‑ka yama‑bone dai daaniya, dai one‑ya dai hiyarariyahi.
Mai‑ka yama‑bone dai daana, tamine dai one hiwatora, Deoso‑ta hiwatobisa, dai ene manakone‑ya Deoso daanebonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“‘Owa‑ya mai awiya, owa‑ya mai kahiyaraboneni.’ Dai one atibodi ati teni.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. Haa‑nima mai atibodi ati na, hibati‑ya mai manakone hawa tohani. Mai one ihi‑nima dai ene riyahi. Deoso‑ya dai ati hiyariya, dai one noko beheri‑ya dai hiyarahi.

Mai one ihi‑nima dai ene riyahi. Deoso‑ya dai ati hiyariya, dai one mai noki‑ya dai hiyarariyahi. Nokobi wada, nokobi dai barikawamiya, dai‑ka Abi neme‑ke‑ya dai hiyarahi. Dai‑ya mai awara, Deoso dai‑ya awabise, dai manakone‑ya daanebonane.
Bara mai toha mai hiyari‑nima dai hiyaririyahi. Mai‑ka deoso‑ya mai hiyara, mai ati yanani dama teni.
‘Oda hiyari yaboya, oda ati‑ya deoso mitebonane.’ Mai atibodi ati teni.
Haa‑nima dai riyahi. Dai‑ka Abi neme‑ke dai hiyarabone, dai ati‑bone‑ya Deoso wato hawa tohene.
Deoso‑ya dai hiyarabone, eya dai atiyahi.
‘Abi, neme‑ya tiwina, amosabote amatini.
Tiwati ihi oda nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tihawahaboneni. Neme‑ya tiwati‑ya mai tokadabi‑nima bofe‑ya oda wi‑wina tiwati oda tokadabaharihi.
Mahi‑nima oda tefe‑ba daatiyahi.
Oda ene amosaramaro mai ihi manakone oda haanamara‑nima oda ene manakone haatinamariyahi.
Tiwa ene yama amosara oda nokotoniriyahi. Oda nafi‑ka hidi tihawahabone, kitabote amatini. Amosabote amatini. Yama maakani awirabone, fara amosineni.’ Dai atiyahi.
Mai ihi towe mai‑ya dai ati somiya, dai‑ya dai‑ka Abi neme‑ke ati somaharibonane.
Dai one‑ya dai kakoya, dai‑ka Abi neme‑ke dai‑ya kakoharibonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Owati amosa dai mitahi. Deoso‑ya mai kahiyarabone mai ati na, mai tafi maakana, mai noki ohina‑nima mai teni.
‘Owa noko ohina‑nima oniya, owa‑ya mai awiya, —Deoso‑ya nofi nafi ene tafi maakanane.— Mai ati niya, owa‑ya mai nofaboneni.’ Mai atibodi ati na,
Mai manakone hawa tohani. Mai‑nima dai riyahi.
Dai tafi maakaniya, Deoso‑ya dai hiyarabisahi. Dai noko ohina‑nima dai riyahi. Dai noko dai soko, dai tati kone dai siri, dai nahi.
Dai‑ya mai awiya, dai‑ya mai watoraboneni. Dai fime, dai‑ka Abi neme‑ke dai‑ya awabise, dai manakone‑ya daanebonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Bofe‑ya yama dama dai nokotoniriyahi. Dai‑ka yama one‑ya yama aboni kaba, one fehoso hikaba, one mai hiboti hiteboneni.
Neme‑ya dai‑ka yama dama‑bone dai nokotonihi. Neme‑ya yama aboni yama‑ya kabarihi, fehoso yama‑ya kabarihi, yama‑ya mai botirihi, teni.
Bofe‑ya dai yehe honene dama wadiya, bofe‑ka yama dai nokotoniheboneni. Neme‑ya dai‑ka yama dama tohabisiya, neme‑ka yama dai nokotonibisaboneni. Ai‑ka yama dama wadi tohi‑kaya yama ai nokotoniteni.
Ai nokobodi ene yama ai awateni. Dai nokobodi amosa, yama nafi‑ya dai awateni.
Ai nokobodi towe toha, yama‑ya ai awaterani. Yama bara‑ya dai nokotoniya, dai noko towe toha‑nima dai na, Deoso ati dai watoraboneni.

Dai‑ka hidi mai fama, hidi owa ati dai tokadababisa, hidi owa ati dai tokadabaraboneni. Hidi owa dai nokotoniya, hidi owa dai kakaboneni. Deoso ati dai nofabisiya, yinero dai nokotoniraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Yama kaba wadarihi, faha fa‑fawa wadarihi, dai‑ka bora one wadarihi niya, dai habo siitoriyahi. Mai tafe toha, mai‑ka bora toha na mai‑ya kasomi nafira, mai one ohi, mai one aba nineni.

Bani bidi mai dai awahi. Bani bidi mai‑ka yamata‑bone‑ya mai kamaterani. Fadara‑ya mai kiharihi, mai tafe yoberi wadarihi teni. Bani bidi mai tafe‑bone‑ya ai‑ka Abi neme‑ke daanibisatene. Bani bidi mai manakone bi‑bidi, dai manakone nafibisateni.
Dai habo siitoniya, dai‑ya dai kasomaterani.
Bora one‑ya dai kihariya, dai atibodi yama‑ya kadikariyahi. Awa mowe dai awahi. Awa mowe bora‑ya wamaterani.
I‑di Saromaho‑ka bora amosa damamete, awa mowe amosabisa, Saromaho‑ka bora amosi bi‑bidi nametemoneni.

Awa mowe aba kanibote na makobote ai sarikiteni. Awa mowe‑ya Deoso nokotoni nafire, ai‑ya nokotoni nafibisatene. Deoso ati ene awa mowe amosani. Awa mowe‑ya Deoso kasome, ai‑ka bora‑bone‑ya daanaharibonane. Deoso ati dai nofi nafira, ati dai nofi nafihi.
‘Hini yamata ai kaba, hini yamata ai fawa, hini yamata ai sako, ai nibati?’ Dai atibodi ati riyahi.
Bara haa‑nima mai atibodi ati teni. Mai‑nima dai riyahi. Ai‑ka Abi neme‑ke dai‑ya watotene.
‘Mahi owa‑ya hini yamata oda kabibati? Oda‑ka bora abiya, hini yamata oda sakonibati?’ Dai atibodi ati riyahi.
Dai habo siitoriyahi. Mahi owa‑ka yama dai kayawariyahi. Mahi owa‑ya yama kobonibisaboneni. Hibayata‑ka yama towe toha, mahi owa‑ka yama hini tohamatahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Dai ene‑nima mai ihi naboneni. Mai ihi dai nokotoni nafiya, dai ene‑ya mai nokotoni nafihareboneni. Mai ihi dai nokotoni nafira, dai ene‑ya mai nokotoni nafihariraboneni.

Dai owa ene dai kadiki nafimariyahi. Hini dai ene dai kadiki ba‑basi nibisahi. Awa hibakori dai owa noko‑ya boka, awa ibe dai noko‑ya foyana, awa hibakori‑ya dai bikanamaterani, awa ibe dai noko‑ya foyaro.
‘Awa hibakori tiwa noko‑ya boka, soba·onamaboneni.’ Titerani, tiwa noko‑ya awa ibe foyaro.
Mai ihi towe bide toha mai‑ya tikanawatoriyahi, tiwa ene towe ba‑basi naro.
Towe amatini. Tiwa noko‑ka awa ibe sobatinamahi. Tiwa noko amosawamiya, mai‑ka awa hibakori sobatinamaneni. Tiwa ene amosawami bahiya, mai one‑ya tikanawatohi.
“Deoso‑ya yama dai haanahi. Yama‑ya daanebonane. Deoso dai sibaniya, dai wasibonane. Deoso sawi‑kaya dai ati tokiya, nokobi‑ya dai haaniya, nokobi‑ya seekanebonane.
Yama‑ya mai haana, mai‑ka yama‑bone mai‑ya koboteni. Yama‑ya mai sibana, yama‑ya mai wasiteni. Nokobi‑ya mai haana, nokobi‑ya mai seekiteni.
Tika dao iyawa‑ya haane, atabo daatiterani.
Aba‑ya tika dao haaneya, bataromaka daatiterani.
Dai ene kote towe toha, dai‑ka ewe‑ka yama amosa‑bone dai daateni. Deoso ene amose hinama tohe, Deoso dai haaniya, yama amosa‑ya daanebonane, ai‑ka Abi neme‑ke toheri.

Hini tiwa‑ya tinofi‑nima mai one‑ya tinofahi. Hini tiwati koboni‑ka mai‑ya tikasomiyahi. Fara haa‑nima dai niya, Mose‑ka yama hani ati dai tokadaba, Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑ka yama hani ati dai tokadabahari teni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Nokobi bide‑ya dai tokiyomiyahi. Yama hirini‑ka hawi nafe, nokobi nafiteni. Hawi nafe‑ya mai dami tokiya, mai kome fawaraboneni.
“Dai noko wadahi.
‘Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita oda amani.’ Mai one ati naboneni.
Deoso ati‑mona mai ati na, keyehe‑ya mai hirina, Satanasi ati‑ya mai kaminabisateni.
Awa bono ai awa, ade ai watoteni. Fara‑nima mai ihi ai awa, mai‑ka hidi oni ai watotene. Bisina ade‑ya ofa yanarihi, atiwa ede‑ya fiko yanarihi teni.
Awa bono ade amosa, boni ai kabateni. Awa bono ade amosara, boni ai kabaterani.
Awa bono ade amosa‑ya awa bono towe yanarihi, awa bono kabara ade‑ya awa bono amosa yanarihi, teni.
Awa bono ade amosara ai tiiniya, ai sarikiteni.
Awa bono ai awa, awa bono ade oni ai watoteni. Fara‑nima mai ihi ai awa, mai‑ka hidi oni ai watotene.
‘Ayo, oka hidi amatini.’ Hiniya mai ati niya,
Okobi ati‑ya mai tokadabariya, Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya mai sawiraboneni. Okobi ati‑ya mai tokadabiya, mai sawibisaboneni.
Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya mai nafi okadikaboneni. Owa‑ya mai haanabone,
‘Ayo, oda‑ka hidi amatini. Oda ene kita, tiwa tamine oda hiyara, madi towe mai‑ya oda kananihi namaroni, tiwa oni oda weyenaro.’ Mai ati naboneni.
‘Dai oyoseramaroni. Dai tokahi, dai ene amosararo.’ Onaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Owati dai mitamatasahi. Owati dai tokadabiya, yama‑ya dai watoteni. Yobe‑ya ai owa wamani wato‑nima dai neni. Ai owa yama‑ya wato, yati webote mese‑ya yobe‑ya wamane,
Owati‑ya dai tokadabara, yama dai wato awirani. Haa‑nima dai nineni. Ai owa yama‑ya watore, siki‑ya yobe‑ya wamane,
yobe wamani hawa toheya, faha kaki nafe, faha fowe nafe‑ya yobe wafi, boni kita kobona, yobe sone, yobe nafi abane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso hiyari hawa toheya, mai atibodi yama‑ya dika,
“Se! Yeso yama hani ati‑ya wato nafine.
Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina, haa‑nima mai ati ni awirani. Yama hani hidi ati‑nima Yeso ati nibisane.” Mai atibodi ati namaroni.
Adami‑ya Yeso tokofawaha, nowati‑ya mai dama mai kamakemaroni.
Mese towe tohe kaki, Yeso noko‑ya yobati‑kaya waaki, moinise,
“Ayo, haa‑nima ai‑na ai kasomi tiwata, owa kasomi tinofakarini?” Ati nemarine.
Yeso maki‑ya boyone,
“Onofini, tiwa mese amosawamahi.” Ati ne, ati ene mese amosawamemarine.

“Owati timitahi. Owa ene tamine mai‑ya tihiyarariyahi. Hiniya Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ya tikahi. Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑nima yama daatiniya, tikitama, tiwa‑ya mai watowahaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Kafanaho‑ya Yeso kobone‑ya sodado mai‑ka hidi Yeso‑ya kame, Yeso‑ya hiyare,
“Yeso, oka hidi amatini. Oka yo‑yose kiyani nafi, ka‑kakone, owa tabaro‑ya kawinene.” Sodado mai‑ka hidi ati nemarine.
“Hehe, tiwa tabaro‑ya ai towakamahi. Tika yo‑yose onakitamaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Yeso, oka hidi webote amatini. Towe ama·oni. Amosabotebisa amatini. Owa tabaro‑ya tikamakiriyahi. Tiwati yananiya, tiwati ihi oka yo‑yose kitamebonane.
Oka hidi ati‑nima oteni. Oka sodado owati‑nima mai teni. Fara‑nima tiwati yananiya, oka yo‑yose kitamebonane.” Sodado mai‑ka hidi ati nemarine.
Ati‑ya Yeso mite, ya‑yaine, mai naha mai‑ya hiyare,
“Owati amosa dai mitahi. Sodado mai‑ka hidi owati‑ya nofi nafine, Yodeo ai toha, owati‑ya dai nofi bi‑bidi neni.

Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawaheya, i‑di Abaraho, i‑di Isaki, i‑di Yako, mai na, mai marinabone, mahi ka‑kaki‑ka mai one toha, mahi to‑toka‑ka mai one toha na, fara Bara mai‑ka tabora dami‑ka mai saweboneni.
Hibati‑ya Deoso dai‑ya himane, ati‑ya dai tokadabara, marina‑ya dai sawiraboneni. Dai‑ya mai weretowitebone, yama soki‑kaya dai ohinabone, dai komene kitaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Sodado mai‑ka hidi‑ya hiyaramatase,
“Sibaraboneni. Tiwa tabaro‑ya tikamahi. Tiwati‑nima yama naboneni. Tika yo‑yose onakitamani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Sodado mai‑ka hidi hini tabaro‑ya tokome, hika yo‑yose kitame‑ya awematane.
Bedoro‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso tokomakimatane. Bedoro‑ka koma kiyana, hiwe nafe, kawinameteni.
Yahi Yeso boyohina, kitama, hiwe fawana, mai tafe‑bone‑ya awawahameteni.
Yama soki yanatoni‑ya madi towe mai sawi‑ka mai mai hiwakama, Yeso ati ene madi towe mai kana, mai kiyana mai‑ya nakitama nemarine.
Yama hani i‑di Isa·iya hikanahanamete, fara yama hani ati‑nima Yeso ene nemarine.
“Ai kiyana, ai‑ya nakitamebonane.” Isa·iya‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Yeso nowati‑ya mai dama mai tokomakemaroni. Yeso mai‑ya awe, hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya himanemarine, kowani‑kaya mai eyehe tokebonaha.
Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai‑ka owa kamaki, Yeso‑ya hiyare,
“Yeso, oda‑ya ka‑kanawato amatini. Tikamiya, tiwa‑ya osaweboneni.” Ati nemarine.
“Bani mai one tabori hodi‑ya toha, bani mai afe wada mai bori tohateni. Owa‑ta owa tabaro wadarani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ya mai sawe mai‑ka owa ati yanane,
“Ayo, okobi abeya, hika yama kote okayafiya, tiwa‑ya osawiwahaboneni.” Ati nemarine.
“Abi‑ka yama hini tohiya, owa‑ya tisawibisahi. Abi abeya, owati‑ya mai nofara abi‑ka yama‑ya mai kayafabisiya, yama sibaraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba, kanawa‑ya Yeso eyehe mai foyawahamaroni.
Wara webote kowani‑kaya mai berekawahabone, faha bai‑ya mai yakakaniya, boni kita kake, faha rike nafe ihi, kanawa boki yanatonameteni. Yeso amone, forimatane.
Yeso‑ya mai mowakana,
“Ayo, ai tikasomahi. Ai abi bonehe.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Hini yamata ihi dai kakomehe? Owa ene hibati‑ya dai awateni. Owa dai wato awirini?” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso waamise, boni‑ya wee, faha‑ya wee ne, boni fawa, faha rike fawa nameteni.
“Ebeni‑ke tohati? Ai‑nima Yeso ni awire, kitabotebisa amane. Yeso ati‑ya boni mita, fawa, faha rike fai ati‑ya mita, fawa nineni.” Mai ati nameteni.
Wara webote kowani‑kaya mai kobonameteni, Kadara mai‑ka wami‑ya. Mai aba mai tame‑ya mai fama mai kasawe, mai kakemeteni. Madi towe mai sawi‑ka mai hama, mai ihi hawi‑ya mai one tokomarameteni.
“Yeso, Deoso Bidi amatini. Oda arabatinahi. Yama one‑ya oda‑ya saritikanabone tinamaro, hibayata mahi koboni awisare, oda bisitiriyahi.” Madi towe mai ati nameteni.
Yama yaki‑ya boroko mai dama mai tafameteni.
“Yeso, maki mai‑ya oda sawimaterabone tina, boroko mai‑ya oda‑ya tiyosebisahi.” Madi towe mai ati na,
“Sibarini, boroko mai‑ya dai foyahi.” Yeso ati ne,
boroko mai‑ya madi towe mai tokiyoma, boroko mai kanani tokofawaha, wami kote wadara‑ya mai nafi toka, mai boka, mai nafi abameteni.
Boroko mai‑ya mai na‑nawada, sidadi‑ya mai kanani tokoma, Yeso ene‑ya mai kamina, madi towe mai sawi‑ka mai tamine‑ya mai kaminahari, mai nameteni.
Sidadi‑ya mai wi‑wina, Yeso tamine‑ya mai mita, mai nafi tokomakemeteni, Yeso‑ya mai awabonehe. Yeso‑ya mai awa, Yeso‑ya mai yosemeteni, yama one‑kaya tokebonaha.
Kanawa‑ya mai foyama, mai berekawama, Yeso tabaro‑kaya mai tokomatasameteni.
Mai‑ka owa ka‑kakone fori‑ya mai kakamameteni, Yeso hinakitamebonaha. Mai ihi‑ya Yeso awe, ka‑kakone‑ya hiyare,
“Soho, ya‑yaitinahi. Tiwa ene towe manakone wadamarini.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina, Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, mai yawawaha,
“‘Deoso‑nima ona ama·oni.’ Ati ne awane.
Hini ati ene abaho.” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.
Mai atibodi ati‑ya Yeso wato, ati yanane,
“Hini yamata ihi dai atibodi yawiti?
Bofe‑ka mai ati ihi ai ene towe manakone fawarihi, bofe‑ka mai ati ihi ai owa kitamarihi tene.
Owati ihi ai owa ene towe manakone wadamare, dai awaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Maki kiyane‑ya hiyare,
“Tiwaamisahi. Tika fo‑fori‑ka yama diwatikaniya, tikamahi, tika yobe‑ya.” Yeso ati nematane.
Waamise, hini tabaro‑ya tokomematane.
Yeso ene‑ya mai awa, mai habi siitona,
“Deoso ene amose, ati ene ai owa yama‑ya wato nafine.” Mai ati nameteni.
Yeso yananamatase, owa‑ya awe, owa‑ya himanemarine. Mateo ama·oni. Kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya ha‑haa ohamaroni. Kofeno‑ka yobe bidi‑ya owitare, Yeso owa‑ya haane,
“Owa‑ya tisawihi.” Yeso ati ne,
ati omita, Yeso‑ya osawiwahamaroni.
Makobote owa tabaro‑ya oda marinamaroni. Kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya mai ha‑haa mai dama, mai ihi amosara mai dama, mai na, Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai eyehe mai marinamaroni.
Yeso ene‑ya fariseo mai awa, Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai‑ya mai hiyara,
“Hini yamata‑bone towe mai eyehe Yeso tafati? Kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya mai ha‑haa mai eyehe oda tafarihi, mai ihi amosara mai eyehe oda tafarihi, oda teni.” Fariseo mai ati namaroni.
Mai ati‑ya Yeso mite, ati yanane,
“Mai kiyara mediko mai‑ya kasomaterene. Mai kiyana‑ta mediko mai‑ya kasomatene.
Yama hani ati dai mitahi,
‘Oka bani‑bona mai daana mai ihi ya‑yai·oni nafira, mai ati soma mai ihi ya‑yai·obisaboneni.’ Yama hani ati neni.
Mai ihi amosamone mai ati na, mai hima·orani. Mai ihi amosara mai hima·onabone okemaroni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Makobote i‑di Yowaho Batita‑ya mai da‑daba mai kamake,
“Mahi owa‑ya oda tafarihi, fariseo mai‑ya mai da‑daba mahi owa‑ya mai tafarihi teni. Tiwa‑ya mai da‑daba mahi‑nima mai tafateni.” Yowaho‑ya mai da‑daba mai ati namaroni.
“Mai‑ka owa fanebona sawi ene mai ya‑yaina, mai ohiterani. Yama one‑kaya maki mai hiwakebona, tabora bara‑ya tokeya, mai tonokosa, yawa ihi mai tafi fawanaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.

Bani ataro wamani yama wiye toha, wamani yati‑ya fino yati ai soronisiya, wiye taokiterani. Yama wiye bote‑ya fino yati ai soronisa terani. Yama wiye bote‑ya fino yati ai soronisiya, taokana, yama wiye aba, fino aba teni. Fino yati wiye yati‑ya ai soronibisateni, abarabonehe.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Yeso, okoto hibayata abani. Oka yobe‑ya tikamakihi. Okoto tati‑ya tiwa yehe foriya, okoto kitamaboneni.” Mai‑ka hidi ati nemarine.
Yeso waamisame, hika mai da‑daba mai eyehe tokomakimarine.
Mai yakana, mai nowati‑ya fana tokomake, Yeso‑ka bora ifi‑ya boyonamaroni. Fana‑ka ama fawani watora, faha fowe 12 kana‑ya hika ama fawani awiramaroni.
“Yeso borone‑ya boyo·oniya, okitamaboneni.” Fana atibodi ati namaroni.
Yeso kiinawame, fana‑ya awe,
“Sima, ya‑yaitinahi.
‘Yeso‑ka bora boyo·oniya, oka ama fawanawahaboneni.’ Tiwatibodi ati na,
fara ihi tiwa onakitamineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Fana kitamawahamaroni.
Mai‑ka hidi tabora‑ya Yeso kobone, tokiyome, hidi‑ka yobe‑ya mai dama kaida‑ya mai one afo, mai ati kita na, mai‑ya Yeso awemarine.
“Dai tokahi. Atona abi awirini, hiniya amoneni.” Yeso ati ne,
ati‑ya mai hahakanamaroni.
“Yama tiwato awirini.” Mai ati namaroni.
Mai toka, mai nowati‑ya Yeso tokiyamaki, atona aboi yahi‑ya waratone, atona waamisamamaroni.
Yeso ene atona kitama, tamine‑ya mai dama mai mitamaroni.
Makobote Yeso toke, mai noki wadara mai fama, Yeso nowati‑ya mai towakamake,
“Yeso, oda‑ka hidi amatini. I‑di Dafi‑ka nodi amatini. Oda tikasomahi.” Maki mai ati namaroni.
Mai one‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso tokiyome, nowati‑ya mai towakamakitasa,
“‘Yeso kitabote, oda noko‑ya kasomebonane.’ Dai atibodi ati neni?” Yeso ati ne,
“Hehe, kitabote amatini. Oda noko tikasomabone oda ati neni.” Mai ati namaroni.
Mai noki‑ya boyone,
“Dai ati‑nima yama naboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai noki amosawama, yama‑ya mai awawahamaroni.
“Owa ene tamine dai hiyarariyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai towaka, Yeso ene tamine‑ya mai hiyaramaroni, mai nafi‑ya.
Tabora one‑kaya Yeso toke, madi towe ai owa‑ya foye, madi towe ene maki ati wadamaremarine.
Yeso ati ene madi towe kanane, maki ati yananawahemarine. Yeso ene‑ya mai dama mai awa, mai ya‑yaina, mai atibodi yama‑ya kadika,
“Haa‑nima ai ene na, ai awaterani.” Mai ati namaroni.
Fariseo mai‑ta mai yawabisa,
“Madi towe mai‑ka hidi ati ene mai kananineni.” Fariseo mai ati namaroni.

Mai‑ka sidadi dami‑ya Yeso toke, mai tabori bide dama‑ya toka ne, Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya tokiyome, mai‑ya kanawatomarine. Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine‑ya hiyara, mai kiyana mai‑ya nakitama nemarine.
“Kaneiro mai‑ya mai na‑nawada mai awiriya, kaneiro mai kakomehe, mai‑ya bani hame wakanebonane. Kaneiro mai‑ka hidi wadamare mai‑nima mai na, mai okasomaboneni.” Yeso atibodi ati nemarine.
Deoso dai hiyarahi, mai one tokomakibakaro, Deoso‑ka yamata‑ya mai kakamabonehe.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda 12 kana oda‑ya Yeso haane, ati yanane,
“Owati ihi dai ene kitawahiya, dai ati ene madi towe mai kanana, mai kiyana mai dai nakitama naboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ka yo‑yose oda 12 kana oda oni amani, haro, i‑di Simaho Bedoro, Simaho sohori i‑di Anidere, Sebedeo bidi i‑di Tiyako, Tiyako sohori i‑di Yowaho,
i‑di Firibi, i‑di Batoromeho, i‑di Tome, owa, (owa oni Mateo toha, kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya ha‑haa ohamaro,) Aofio bidi i‑di Tiyako, i‑di Tadeo,
i‑di Simaho Seroti, i‑di Yoda Isikari·oti, oda namaroni. Yoda Isikari·oti i‑di Yeso‑ya kahabanawahemarine.
Oda 12 kana Yeso oda‑ya yose,
“Dai tokahi. Bara mai tabori‑ya dai tokarihi, Samaritano mai tabori‑ya dai tokarihi nahi,
Yodeo mai tabori‑ya dai tokabisahi. Kaneiro mai fawatonakosa mai‑nima Yodeo mai nineni.
Dai tokiya, eya dai ati nahi.
‘Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona dai‑ya sawine.’ Dai ati nahi.

Mai kiyana mai dai kasoma, mai mese towe toha mai mese dai nataminawama, mai aba mai dai nakitama, madi towe mai dai kananihi, dai nahi. Owati ihi dai ene kitawaha, yama manakone dai‑ya haa·ora, mai one dai kasoma, yama manakone dai haariyahi.
Dai tokiya, yinero oro wamani dai ibirihi, yinero barata wamani dai ibirihi, yinero bidi dai ibirihi, dai nahi.

Yamasi dai weyerihi, bora fama‑ya dai nasawirihi, sanidariya owa dai nasawirihi, dai dabakiba‑ka awa one dai nasawirihi, dai nahi. Mai‑ya dai kasoma dai‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai daanaboneni. Mai‑ka yama ai anina ai‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai daateni.
Mai tabori‑ya dai koboniya, mai ati amosa mai‑ka yobe‑ya dai winiyahi. Aka‑ya dai toki awisari‑ya yobe owa‑ya dai winariyahi.
Mai‑ka yobe‑ya dai tokiyomiya, dai ati yananahi.
‘Ahi‑ya dai wi‑wina Deoso dai‑ya kasomebonane.’ Dai ati nahi.
Yobe hidi ati amoseya, Deoso mai‑ya kasomebonane. Yobe hidi ati amosareya, Deoso mai‑ya kasomarebonane.

“Owati amosabote dai mitamatasahi. Ai nafi ene‑ya Deoso kadikeya, mai‑ya weeni kitebonane. Hibati‑ya Sodoma‑ya mai wi‑wina, Komora‑ya mai wi‑wina, mai na, Deoso mai‑ya nanahabematane. Ai nafi ene‑ya Deoso kadikeya, mai‑ya weenamatasebonane. Dai ati‑ya mai nofara mai‑ya Deoso bisini kitabisebonane.

Owati dai mitahi. Kaneiro mai‑nima dai nahi. Dai hamariyahi. Yome hame‑nima mai teni. Mai‑ya dai‑ya oyose, dai noko wadiyahi. Maka mai noki wadi‑nima dai noko wadiyahi. Wayomata mai hamaterani. Wayomata mai‑nima dai nahi. Dai hamariyahi.
Dai noko wadahi, mai‑ka hidi bidi mai‑ya dai‑ya mai daanaboneni. Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya dai‑ya mai kosinaboneni.

Bara mai‑ka kofenado mai toha, mai‑ka hidi webote mai toha na, mai ati ihi dai‑ya mai wataboneni. Mai noki‑kaya dai nahoya, owa tamine‑ya mai‑ya dai hiyarawahaboneni. Dai‑ka hidi mai toha, Bara mai toha na, mai‑ya owa tamine‑ya dai hiyaraboneni.
Dai‑ya mai kahabaniya, dai ati‑ya mai mitabone, dai atibodi yama‑ya kadikariyahi. Deoso ene dai ati yananaboneni.
Fara dai ati yokana toharabone, ai‑ka Abi neme‑ke‑ka Doni ati nebonane.

Dai‑ka dai‑ya mai kahabanaboneni, dai‑ya mai nanahababonehe. Anidi sohori‑ya kahabana, badi bidi‑ya kahabana, mai‑ka madehe badi, madi mai na, mai‑ya mai kahabana, mai naboneni, mai mai hinahababonehe.
Owa dai nofa dai‑ya mai nafi kakaboneni. Owa oni dai saatonakosi awiriya, dai sibaraboneni.
Tabora ohare‑ya dai‑ya mai weena, tabora one‑ya dai tokahi. Owati amosa dai mitahi. Isara·eo mai tabori dami‑ya dai tokasa riya, dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kiti yananebonane.
Maki‑ya mai kako hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya mai kakohari naboneni. Mai‑ka hidi mai hikako‑nima mai‑ya mai kakohareboneni.
‘Dai‑ka hidi i‑di Beosibo amane.’ Mai ati niya,
‘Satanasi‑ka dai amani.’ Mai ati nihi naboneni.
Mai ati ihi dai kakomeheriyahi. Yama‑ya mai kema, mai dami yama‑ya watowahaboneni.
Hibayata dai ohiyara, dai damara, makobote mai nafi‑ya dai hiyarawahaboneni. Owati dai mita, owati dai kaminaboneni, mai nafi‑ya.

Dai‑ya mai ati naboha, mai‑ya dai nayofinariyahi. Dai atibodi‑ya mai nanahabaterani. Deoso dai nayofinabisahi. Deoso‑ya mai nofara, mai aboni, mai atibodi na‑ya yama hirini‑kaya Deoso weretowitibonane.
Bani bidi mai fama mai daana, yinero bidi ohari‑ya mai manakone tohateni. Ai‑ka Abi ati sibareya, bani bidi ai naboha, ati sibari awireya, bani bidi ai nabohaterani.
Deoso ai tati kone nafi‑ya wato, ai tati kone nafi‑ya kadikemarine.
Dai habo siitoriyahi. Bani bidi mai dama mai manakone bi‑bidi teni. Dai‑ta dai manakone nafibisateni.
Mai‑ya dai hiyariya,
‘Yeso‑ka ama·oni.’ Dai ati niya,
Okobi ohiyariya,
‘Oka mai amani.’ Onaboneni.
‘Yeso‑ka ohi awirini.’ Mai ati niya,
Okobi neme‑ke ohiyariya,
‘Oka mai tohi awirini.’ Onaboneni.
‘I‑di Yeso ati ene mai nafi ati hamamateraboneni.’ Dai atibodi ati riyahi.
Owati‑ya mai nofara, oka mai‑ya mai bisinaboneni.
Bidi badi‑ya nofarihi, bide madi‑ya nofarihi, fana hika koma‑ya nofarihi naboneni.
Hika mai hikakaboneni.
Owa dai nofi nafibisahi. Abi, ami, mai na, mai dai nofi bi‑bidi nahi. Dai‑ka madehe dai nofi bi‑bidi nahi. Owa‑ya mai nofi nafira, oka mai tohi awirani.
‘Owa‑ya mai ati nanahaba yama sibarini. Yeso ati okadababisaboneni.’ Dai atibodi ati ni awiriya,
oka dai tohi awirani.
“Oda abariyahi.” Dai ati niya,
owati‑ya dai tokadabara, dai ababoneni.
Oka dai toha dai ati‑ya mai nofa owati‑ya mai nofahari, owati‑ya mai nofa owa‑ya yose‑mari ati‑ya mai nofahari teni.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. Deoso ati‑ya ka‑kamina dai aweya,
‘Deoso ati‑ya ka‑kamina amane, okasomaho.’ Dai ati niya,
Deoso ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai ihi manakone‑nima dai manakone na‑ya Deoso dai‑ya daanebonane. Ai owa Deoso ati‑ya nofe dai awiya,
‘Deoso ati‑ya nofane, okasomaho.’ Dai ati niya,
Deoso ati‑ya mai nofa, mai ihi manakone‑nima dai manakone na‑ya Deoso dai‑ya daanebonane.
Oka mai baki hoka, mai‑ya faha dai daaniya,
‘Yeso Kirisito‑ka mai amani, mai okasomaboneni.’ Dai atibodi ati niya,
dai ene amosa manakone‑ya Deoso daanebonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Oda 12 kana, oda‑ya Yeso hiyari hawa tohe, mai tabori dami‑kaya oda eyehe tokemarine, mai one‑ya kanawatobonaha.
Kadeya‑ya Yowaho wai, Yeso Kirisito ene tamine‑ya mite, hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya yosematane.
Yeso‑ya mai haana,
“‘Deoso‑ka kakibona mai ati namete, fara amatiraniha? Fara tihi awiriya, Deoso‑ka yokana oda nimanaboneni.’ I‑di Yowaho ati nene.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,
“I‑di Yowaho‑ya dai towakamiya, owa ene dai kamina, owati dai kamina, dai nahi.

Yama mai awaramaro yama mai awawaha, mai ka‑kakona‑maro mai yakanamawaha, mai mese towe tohamaro mai mese amosawama, mai narabi hawiramaro ai ati‑ya mai mitawaha, mai abamaro mai kitamawaha, yama mai kihara Deoso ati amosabote‑ya mai mitawaha nineni.
Owa tamine‑ya mai mitiya, mai yawi awiriya, Deoso mai‑ya kasomebonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yowaho‑ka mai tokoma, mai nowati‑ya i‑di Yowaho tamine‑ya mai dama mai‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Hibati‑ya i‑di Yowaho‑ya dai toka, hini yamata dai awabone dai tokiti? Watikoro henerikane dai awabone, dai tokiraniha?
Bora amosabote‑ya sakone dai awabone, dai ati na awineni. Bora amosabote‑ya mai sakona, kabani‑kaya mai winatera, hidi webote‑ka yobe‑ya mai winateni.
Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita‑ya dai awabone, dai ati na, fare Yowaho Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita amane. Yowaho‑ya Deoso yosemarine.
Deoso‑ka yama hani ati dai mitahi,
‘Owati timitahi. Oka yo‑yose bofe‑ke oyoseboneni, tiwa hawine‑bone‑ya hawa tonihibonaha.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati na,
i‑di Yowaho Batita tamine amane.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. I‑di Yowaho Batita amosi nafi, hibati‑ka mai nafi amosi bi‑bidi nibisa, Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya mai sawiya, mai nafi amosi ba‑basi naboneni.
Hibati‑ya Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine‑ya i‑di Yowaho hiyaremarine. Tamine‑ya mai mita, mai hama, mai hami fawarani.
‘Oda kita, hini oda ene Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya oda saweboneni.’ Mai ati nani.
Yowaho koboni awisareya, Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai toha, i‑di Mose toha ne, Eriya kamebona tamine‑ya mai kanahanameteni.
I‑di Eriya i‑di Yowaho tamine amane.
Owati dai mita, owati dai tokadabahi.
Hini yamata‑nima dai niti? Haa‑nima dai nineni. Madehe nahore, mai ibi
hiyara, haa‑nima mai ati na,
‘Ka! Kaida oda afona, dai wayomi awirani. Mai tabiyo oda ohina, dai ohini awirani.’ Madehe one ati na,
mai one‑ya mai nofara mai‑nima dai nineni.
I‑di Yowaho tafi bi‑bidi ne, fino‑ya fawarihi ne,
‘Madi towe i‑di Yowaho‑ya foyane.’ Dai ati teni.
‘Yeso towe amane. Tafi nafi, fino‑ya fawa, kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya mai ha‑haa mai toha, mai ihi amosara mai toha, mai na, mai‑ya Yeso nofatene.’ Dai ati teni.
Yama‑ya mai wa‑wato mai ihi ai awa, mai ai watoteni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ene kitabote‑ya mai awamaro, Yeso ati‑ya mai nofara, mai‑ya Yeso weenemarine, mai ihi amosawami watoraro.

“Ka! Korasi‑ya dai wi‑wina, Besaida‑ya dai wi‑wina, dai na, dai ene manakone wadani. Owa ene kitabote‑ya dai awamaro, owati‑ya dai nofaramaroni. Tiro‑ya mai wi‑wina‑mete, Sidoho‑ya mai wi‑wina‑mete, mai na, Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadabara, tabora fami‑ya Deoso nanahabematamonane. Owa ene kitabote‑ya mai awi bahamete‑mani, mai atibodi amosawama nemeteni.
Kafanaho‑ya dai wi‑wina, neme‑ya dai winabone dai ati na, yama hirini‑kaya dai sawibisaboneni. Sodoma‑ya mai wi‑wina‑mete owa ene kitabote‑ya mai awi bahamete‑mani, mai abara nemeteni.

Ai nafi ene‑ya Deoso kadikeya, dai‑ya weeni kitebonane. Ai nafi ene‑ya Deoso kadikeya, hibati‑ya Sodoma‑ya mai wi‑wina‑mete mai‑ya weenamataseya, mai‑ya weeni bi‑bidi nebona, dai‑ya weeni kitabisebonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Dai maa toha owa‑kaya dai kamiyahi
Yeso Badi‑ya hiyare,

“Abi Deoso, bofe‑ka hidi tiha, neme‑ka hidi tiha, yama‑ya mai wa‑wato‑mone mai ati na tiwa ene‑ya mai watorani. Madehe‑nima mai na, yama‑ya mai watoramone mai ati na tiwa ene‑ya mai watobisineni. Tiwa ene ya‑yai·oneni.
Tiwati‑maro‑nima yama nineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Oda‑ya hiyaramatase,
“Okobi ene yama nafi okayafawahineni. Owa‑ya dai wato nafira, owa‑ya Okobi watobisane. Okobi owato oteni. Owati ihi Okobi‑ya dai one watomakineni. Dai‑ya okasomara‑mani, Okobi‑ya dai watora neni.
Dai maa tohiya, owa‑kaya dai kamiya, dai okasomaboneni.
Owa‑nima dai nahi. Hama·oterani. Owati somateni. Owa‑nima dai niya, dai atibodi maa tohamateraboneni.
Owa‑nima dai niya, dai‑ka yama anini kitara‑nima dai naboneni. Yama kanara dai weyena‑nima dai naboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Sabado‑ya Yeso tokemarine. Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda sawemaroni. Fadara‑ya oda kariwaha, oda fime, tiriko tati‑ya oda bakakasa, tiriko oda kabamaroni.
Oda ene‑ya fariseo mai awa, mai yawa, Yeso‑ya mai weena,
“Tika mai da‑daba mai ihi ati kasirani, sabado‑ya yama‑ya mai aninaro.” Mai ati namaroni.
“Dafi tamine dai kadikaterini? Dafi, hika mai eyehe toke, mai fimi nafemetemoneni.
Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Dafi tokiyome, Deoso‑ka baho‑ya idi, baho‑ya mai kabametemoneni. Deoso‑ka baho‑ya mai one kabaterani. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai hikababisateni.
Sabado‑ya yama ai aniteramone dai ati na, Deoso‑ka yama hani dai kadikatera awineni. Sabado‑ya Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa yama‑ya mai anina, mai ihi Deoso ati yawaterene.
Deoso ati dai watora,
‘Oka bani‑bona onofi nafira, mai ati soma, mai ihi ya‑yai·obisaboneni.’ Deoso ati nane.
Deoso ati‑ya dai wata‑mani, mai ihi amosa mai‑ya dai weeni awira neni.
Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke sabado hidi amane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso hiyari hawa tohe, yananamatase, Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya tokiyomemarine.
Maki yehe moikanamemata itari,
“Yeso hinakitameba awane.” Mai atibodi ati namaroni.
“Yeso, sabado‑ya ai owa ai nakitama, sibakarini?” Mai ati namaroni, Yeso‑ya mai weenabonehe.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,
“Sabado‑ya tika kaneiro hodi‑ya soniriseya, didire awane.
Bani mai manakone bi‑bidi na, ai manakone nafi bisineni. Sabado‑ya ai owa ai kasoma, ai sibarineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yehe moikaname‑ya hiyare,
“Tiwa yehe feotokanahi.” Yeso ati ne,
Yehe feotokaname, yehe owa‑nima yehe nawahemarine.
Yeso ene‑ya fariseo mai awa, mai toka, mai yorotokana, Yeso‑ya mai nanahababone, Yeso tamine‑ya mai ibi hiyarameteni.
Mai ihi‑bone‑ya Yeso wato, toke, nowati‑ya mai dama mai tokomake, mai kiyana mai‑ya Yeso nakitame,
Mai‑ya hiyare,
“Owa tamine dai kaminariyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Isa·iya i‑di Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑ka owa amane. Isa·iya‑ka yama hani ati‑nima yama nawahani.
“Oka yo‑yose dai awaho. Okadikemari, onofi nafine. Owati ihi Oka Doni fai‑ya sawibonane. Bara mai‑ya hiyareya,
‘Mai ihi‑nima mai manakone na kobonaboneni.’ Ati nebonane.
Mai‑ya weerihi, yawa ihi ati towe toharihi nebonane. Sidadi hawi‑ya ati towe mai himitarebonane.
Mai kiyana mai‑ya kasomebonane. Mai ohini kita mai‑ya weeterebonane. Mai kitara mai‑ya kasomeya, mai nafi ihi‑nima mai manakone na‑ya daanebonane.
Oka yo‑yose‑ya Bara mai watoya, mai habi siitonamaraboneni.” Deoso‑ka yama hani ati nineni. Fare ati‑nima yama nawahani.
Maki madi towe foya‑ke‑ya mai kakamamaroni, Yeso hinakitamebonaha. Maki noko wadamarihi, ati wadamarihi ne, Yeso ati ene kitame, yama‑ya awamatase, ati yananamatasa nemarine.
“Ka! Haa‑nima ai ene na, ai awaterani. Dafi‑ka nodi tohe awane.” Mai ati namaroni.
Mai ati‑ya fariseo mai mita, mai yawa,
“Deoso ene tohi awirane. Madi towe mai‑ka hidi i‑di Beosibo ati ene madi mai one‑ya Yeso kananine.” Mai atibodi ati namaroni.
Mai atibodi ati‑ya Yeso wato, mai‑ya hiyare,

“Hidi webote, hika mai dama mai ibi bisiniya, hidi webote kiti fawanebonane. Sidadi ohare‑ka mai ibi toka toweya, mai nafi wadamaraboneni. Tabora ohare‑ka mai ibi toka toweya, mai nafi wadamaraboneni.
Satanasi hini hika mai‑ya kananihi‑mana, kitamare nane.
Beosibo ene madi towe mai kana·onihemone, dai ati na, dai one madi towe mai‑ya mai kanana, ebeni‑ke ene tohati? Satanasi ene amane, dai ati niya, dai one dai‑ya mai weenaboneni.
Deoso‑ka Doni ati ene madi towe mai kana·onihe, dai ati na, Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona dai‑ya sawine.
Owa‑ya mai nofara, owa‑ya mai kakoteni. Owa‑ya mai ati sawira,
‘Yeso‑ya dai sawiriyahi.’ Mai ati teni.
Owati dai mitahi. Dai ene towe toha, dai ati towe toha na, makobote Deoso ati dai nofawahiya, dai ene manakone Deoso haanamaterebonane. Deoso‑ka Doni‑ya dai weeniya, dai ene manakone fawateraboneni.
Owa‑ya mai weeniya, makobote owati‑ya mai nofawaha, mai ihi manakone Deoso haanamarebonane. Deoso‑ka Doni‑ya mai weeniya, mai ihi manakone wada, mai manakone fawateraboneni.
Awa ade amosa boni amosateni. Awa ade towe boni towe tohateni. Awa bono hini ade‑nima boniteni. Ai atibodi amosa, ai ene amosateni. Ai ene‑ya mai awiya, ai atibodi tamine‑ya mai wataboneni.
Maka yokana‑nima dai nineni. Dai atibodi amosara, dai ene amosateraboneni. Ai atibodi ati‑nima ai ati yanateni.
Mai atibodi ati towe tohiya, mai ati towe tohaboneni. Mai atibodi ati amosiya, mai ati amosaboneni.
Ai nafi ene‑ya Deoso kadikeya, ai ati towe manakone‑ya daanebonane.
Dai ati‑nima dai ati manakone wada, dai ati amosa hinama tohiya, dai sibaraboneni. Dai ati towe toha, wara hirini‑ya dai saweboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, fariseo mai toha na, mai ati yanana,
“Naki, Deoso‑ka tihamone tina, neme‑ya tiwa ene kitabote oda awaboneni.” Mai ati namaroni.
Mai‑ya hiyare,
“Towe dai amani. Deoso ati dai tokadabara, hiniya owa ene kitabote dai awabone dai ati na, dai ati‑nima oteraboneni. Yama dai awabone dai ati na, i‑di Yona ene‑mata‑nima yama na dai awabisahi.

Hibati‑ya aba doro‑ya i‑di Yona foye, mahi, yama soki na 3 kane‑ya aba doro‑ya foye, aba saahinamematane. Fare‑nima onabone, hodi‑ya ofoyabone, mahi 3 kane‑ya okitamaboneni. Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke ama·oni.” Yeso ati nemarine.

“Ai nafi ene‑ya Deoso kadikeya, Ninifa‑ya mai wi‑wina‑mete dai‑ya mai weenaboneni, owati‑ya dai nofararo. Ninifa‑ya mai wi‑wina i‑di Yona ati‑ya mai mita, mai ihi‑maro‑nima mai ihi namarameteni. Yona kiti bi‑bidi nemata, dai‑ya da‑daba kiti nafibisane. Owa ene dai nofara dai ene towe manakone nafeboneni.

Ai nafi ene‑ya Deoso kadikeya, bato‑kaya mai wi‑wina‑mete mai‑ka hidi fana dai‑ya weenaboneni. Hibati‑ya Saromaho hasineya, yama yaki‑ya kakemeteni, Saromaho ati‑ya mitabonehe. Saromaho yama‑ya wato bi‑bidi nematane. Dai‑ya da‑daba yama‑ya watobisane.
Madi towe ai owa‑ya sawimari, tokawahe, tabora one‑ya sibane, tabora one‑ya wasi awire,
hini‑ya hiyare,
‘Hibati‑ya osawimaro‑kaya wini·onamaboneni.’ Madi towe ati ne,
fa‑fai‑ya kamatase, hibati‑ya sawimari‑ke doro honita tohe, madi towe sawire‑ya awe, doro amosawame‑ya awa ne,

tokomatase, hika mai one 7 kana mai‑ya himanane, mai towe ba‑basi naro. Hini sa‑sawi‑kaya mai nafi sawiwahaboneni. Ai owa kiyani nafiwahebonane. Fara‑nima dai komene nafiwahaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyareya, sohori mai eyehe madi kobonamaroni, Yeso‑ya mai hiyarabonehe.
“Yeso, tika ami, tika soho mai eyehe kobonani, tiwa‑ya mai hiyarabonehe. Yobe fowari‑ya mai nahani.” Mai‑ka owa ati nemarine.
“Ebeni‑ka oka soho mai toha, ebeni‑ka okomi tohaniti? Oka soho mai dama, okomi mai damateni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba, oda‑ya yofikane,
“Okomi, oka soho dai nineni.
Okobi neme‑ke ati‑nima mai niya, okomi mai toha, oka soho mai toha, oka asima mai toha, mai nineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mahi itamise‑ya Yeso toke, Karireya‑ka Wara Webote widi‑ya itabasemarine.
Mai dama mai yorotokanamaroni, Yeso ati‑ya mai mitabonehe. Mai dama mai ihi kanawa‑ya Yeso foye, itari, faha widi‑ya mai dama mai nahobasamaroni.
“Ai owa yamata noki‑ya werene,
hawi fowari‑ya noki one sona, bani bidi mai hikabani.
Yamata noki one yati dama iti‑kaya sona, yati mese‑ya wami si‑sifina fore ihi noki yana kanibote na,
yati ihi habi tokara, mahi hewene ene wayatokana, fahi wadamara, abani.
Atiwa mete‑ya yamata noki one sona, atiwa ene yamata yani amosarani.
Bodo‑ya yamata noki one sona, yana, ade ohare‑ya boni 100 toha, ade one‑ya boni 60 toha, ade one‑ya boni 30 toha nani.
Owati dai mita, owati dai tokadabahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Mai‑ya tihiyara, hini yamata‑bone hiyara bara‑ya mai‑ya tihiyariti?” Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda ati namaroni.
“Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine dai watobisaboneni. Mai hiwatorebonane.
Deoso ati‑ya mai mita, ati mai hinofeya, Deoso ati‑ya mai wato ba‑basi naboneni. Yama nafi‑ya mai watowahaboneni. Deoso ati‑ya mai mita, ati mai hinofareya, yama‑ya mai watoteraboneni.
Hiyara bara ohiyarateni, yama‑ya mai watorabonehe. Owa ene‑ya mai awa, owa‑ya mai watora, owati‑ya mai mita, mai narabi hawira, owati‑ya mai watorani.
Hibati‑ya mai tamine‑ya Deoso hiyare, ati‑ya i‑di Isa·iya kanahanomatane.
‘Owati‑ya mai mita, owa ene‑ya mai awa na, mai narabi hawira, yama‑ya mai watoraboneni.

Owati miti‑ya mai nofara, mai narabi‑ya mai barikana‑nima mai na mai toha, mai noki barikana‑nima mai na mai toha, mai naboneni, oka yama‑ya mai watorabonehe. Mai narabi hawe‑mani, owa ene‑ya mai awa, yama‑ya mai watoya, mai ihi‑maro‑nima mai ihi namariya, mai okasoma neni.’ Deoso ati nemata, ati‑ya i‑di Isa·iya kanahanomatane.
Dai ya‑yainahi, dai noko wada, dai narabo hawi, dai nibisateni.

Owati amosa dai mitahi. Hibati‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai toha, Deoso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa‑mete mai toha, mai na, owa‑ya mai awabone mai ati namete, owa‑ya mai awi awirameteni. Owati‑ya mai mitabone mai ati namete, owati‑ya mai miti awirameteni.
Yamata noki‑ya werene tamine yokana dai mitahi.

Fadara‑ka wami ai atibodi tamine amani. Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine‑ya mai mita, ati mai hiwato awireya, mai ati kadamowama kanibote na. Hawi fowari‑ya yamata noki sona‑nima mai na, Satanasi ati ene Deoso ati‑ya mai ati kadamowamani.
Wami si‑sifina‑ya yamata noki one sona, yana kanibote na, aba kanibote na, fara Deoso ati‑ya mai mita, mai ya‑yai kanibote na, mai tamine amani.
Deoso ati‑ya mai nofara mai mai weehiniya, mai atibodi kitara, mai maakana kanibote na, Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadabamarani.

Atiwa mete‑ya yamata noki sona, fara Deoso ati‑ya mai mita, makobote yamataha, bora, yinero na‑ya mai nokotonihe, Deoso ati‑ya mai nokotonimara, yamata atiwa‑ya daba, bonora‑nima mai na, mai ihi amosa‑ba wadarani.

Bodo‑ya yamata noki sona‑nima mai na, Deoso ati‑ya mai mita, Deoso ati‑ya mai atibodi nofa, mai tamine amani. Mai ihi amosani. Mai one ihi amosi bi‑bidi, mai one ihi amosi ba‑basi teni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Hiyara one dai mitahi. Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona, haa‑nima tebonane. Ai owa yamata noki amosa‑ya werenane.
Yamata hidi‑ya kako yama soki‑ya kaki, yama towe kabara noki‑ya werenamakitase, tokomane.
Yamata noki amosa yana, yama kabara noki yanahari neni.
‘Yamata noki amosa weretina‑ya yama kabara dabawahani.’ Mai ati neni.
‘Owa‑ya kako ene amane.’ Hidi ati nane.
‘Yama kabara oda boreniba?’ Hika yo‑yose mai ati na,
‘Dai boreriyahi. Yama kabara dai boreniya, yamata amosa‑ya dai boreriyahi.’ Hidi ati nane.
Yamata marafakaniya, dai oyosebone,
‘Yama kabara dai boreni bahiya, dai yadiniyahi, sarikanabonehe. Yamata amosa‑ta oka yobe‑ya dai nawadahi.’ Onaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona haa‑nima tene. Mositada noki‑ya maki hika fadara‑ya korotoni‑nima tene.
Mositada noki i‑isi na yana, ade tonafe, awa webote tohawaha, bani mai kake, awa ini‑ya mai bori‑bone‑ya mai wamateni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai‑ya kanawatomakibona, mai‑ya hiyaramatase,

“Femeto‑ya fana kemabone, farina tiriko 7 kiro toha bodi‑ya femeto bide‑ya fana ibe, femeto dodama ihi farina tiriko nafi‑ya femeto sawineni. Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona haa‑nima nebonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Deoso ati tamine‑ya Yeso hiyare, yama bara tamine‑ya hiyaremarine. Mai dama mai‑ya hiyare, yama tamine yokana‑ya kamini awiremarine.
Hibati‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita‑mata i‑di Yeso tamine‑ya kanahanomata,
“Hiyara bara‑ya mai‑ya hiyarebona, hibati‑ya yama‑ya mai watora yama tamine‑ya mai‑ya kanawatobonane.” Deoso‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Yeso hiyari hawa tohe, oda toka, yobe doro‑ya oda eyehe tokiyomemarine. Yeso‑ya oda hiyara,
“Yama kabara tamine‑ya tihiyara, yama kabara tamine oda mitaboneni.” Oda ati namaroni.
“Yamata noki amosa‑ya we‑were owa tamine amani.
Maki‑ka wami ai nafi wi‑wina‑ka tamine amani. Deoso‑ka dai toha, yamata noki amosa‑nima dai nineni. I‑di Satanasi ati‑ya mai no‑nofa yama kabara noki‑nima mai nineni.
Yama kabara noki‑ya werene i‑di Diaboro tamine amane. Yobe‑ya yamata‑ya mai nawada, yama towe mai sarikana na, yama faina‑bone tamine amani. Yamata‑ya mai a‑ani Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai tamine amani.
Oka yo‑yose mai oyosebone, owati ihi oka wami nafi‑ya mai tokabone, mai ihi amosara mai‑ya mai sokinaboneni.
Yama sa‑sarikana‑ka yama wiye‑ya mai‑ya mai weretowitebone, fara‑kaya mai ohinabone, mai kome kitaboneni.
Mai ihi amosa mai‑ka Abi neme‑ke‑ya mai saweboneni. Mai wahi wadabone, mahi wehene‑nima mai wahi nawahaboneni. Owati dai mita, owati dai tokadabahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.

“Hiyara one dai mitamakitasahi. Fadara‑ya yama manakone nafe‑ya ai owa wasi, ya‑yaine, yama‑ya barikaname, hika yama nafi‑ya daane, fadara‑ya kanike, yama manakone nafe‑ya kayafebonaha. Fara‑nima Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona‑ya dai nokotoni kitahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine dai mitamakihi. Yama‑ya ka‑kanika daro‑ka kasaro amosa‑ya sibatene.
Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine dai mitamakihi.
“Mayadera‑ya mai yadina, aba mai dama mai wasineni.
Mayadera‑ka aba mai kiba, mai‑ya mai horokana, hisiri‑ya aba mai amosa mai‑ya mai teena, aba towe mai‑ya mai weretowitineni.
Yama faina‑ya Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai kamakeboneni, mai ihi amosara mai‑ya mai kadika,
Owati nafi dai watokarini?” Yeso ati ne,
“Hehe, tiwati nafi oda watoneni.” Oda ati namaroni.

“Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine‑ya mai watomakiniya, yama nafi‑ya mai wataboneni. Mai one‑ya mai kanawataboneni. Yama hani‑ya kanahanomata tamine toha, hibayata ati tamine toha ne‑ya mai‑ya mai kanawataboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Hiyari hawa tohe, tokomemarine.
Yeso hini yana‑mata‑kaya toke, Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya tokiyomemarine, mai‑ya kanawatobonaha. Yeso ati‑ya mai mita,
“Ka! Ebeni‑ke ene Yeso yama‑ya watoti? Ebeni‑ke ene Yeso ene kitati?
Yama‑ya wa‑wama bidi tohatekare? I‑di Mariya bidi tohatekare? I‑di Tiyako, i‑di Yose, i‑di Simaho, i‑di Yoda, mai na, mai‑ka ayo tohatekare?
Hika asima ai‑ya mai sawe, ebeni‑ke Yeso‑ya kanawatoti?” Mai ati namaroni.
Yeso‑ya mai nofaramaroni. Mai‑ya Yeso ati yanane,

“Tabora bara‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita mai one nafi‑ya mai nofateni. Hini mai tabori‑ka mai toha, mai one toha, mai na, mai‑ya mai nofaterani. Fara‑nima oka dai toha owa‑ya dai nofi awirani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya mai nofara, Yeso mai nafi‑ya nakitami awiremarine.
Nasare‑kaya Yeso wine, tamine‑ya mai‑ka hidi i‑di Erodi mite,
hika yo‑yose mai‑ya hiyare,
“Yowaho tohe awane. Yowaho Batita abe, kitame ene kite toha ne awane.” Erodi ati nematane.

Yowaho Batita namidi‑ya i‑di Erodi ati ene mai tiinakosamaro tamine okaminebonane. I‑di Erodi anidi i‑di Firibi tohe, i‑di Firibi fadi i‑di Erodiasi toha, Erodi anidi fadi‑ya famawahe, fare ene i‑di Yowaho Batita ati yanane,
“Erodi, ayo fadi arabatinahi.” Ati ne, ati damemarine.
I‑di Erodiasi ati ihi Yowaho mano‑ya Erodi sokikase, kadeya‑ya Yowaho‑ya nafoyemarine.
Yowaho‑ya nanahabebona,
“‘Yowaho Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita amane.’ Mai ati teni.
Yowaho onahabiya, owa‑ya mai bisinaba awineni.” Erodi atibodi ati nematane.
Makobote i‑di Erodi‑ka ano kobona, mai yorotokana, i‑di Erodiasi bide atona mai noki‑ya siwana ihi Erodi ya‑yainematane.
Atona‑ya hiyare,
“Hini yamata‑ya tiwati koboniti? Yama tinofa daa·onaboneni. Keyehe hiri·oterani.” Erodi ati nematane.
Atona madi‑ya hiyara, madi ati ihi Yowaho Batita tati‑ya atona haana,
“Barato‑ya Yowaho Batita tati foye, owa‑ya daatinahi.” Atona ati nameteni.
Atona ati‑ya i‑di Erodi mite, yawe, atibodi yama‑ya dike,
“Yowaho Batita nanahabi onofarini. Hini owati tohani.
‘Yama tinofa daa·onabone’ ona,
owati‑ya mai nafi mita, owati‑nima oriya, owa‑ya mai hahakariyahi.” Hidi webote atibodi ati ne,
Sodado mai‑ya yosematane, Yowaho namidi‑ya mai tiinakosabonehe.
Kadeya‑ya mai toka, Yowaho namidi‑ya mai tiinakosa,
Yowaho tati barato‑ya foye‑ya sodado kakame, atona‑ya daahine, atona madi‑ya tokoma, Yowaho tati‑ya daatonamameteni.
Yowaho‑ya mai da‑daba Yowaho abo‑ya mai towakama, abo mai hikamematane. Makobote Yeso‑ya mai toka, Yowaho tamine‑ya mai kaminamaroni.
Erodi ati tamine‑ya Yeso mite, mai one awiri‑kaya tokebona, kanawa dori‑ya oda foya, oda towakamamaroni. Yeso toke tamine‑ya mai one dama mita, mai tokobasamakemaroni.
Oda kobona, oda tokomorosa, mai dama mai‑ya Yeso awe, mai‑ya nofe, mai kiyana mai‑ya nakitamemarine.
Mahi toke‑ya Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba Yeso‑ya oda hiyara,
“Yeso, mahi toke, yobe wadare‑ya ai naha, mai tiyosehi, mai tabori‑ya mai tokiya, mai tafe‑bone‑ya mai kanikabonehe.” Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda ati namaroni.
“Mai toki awiraboneni. Mai dai natafabisahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Oda‑ka baho 5 kana, oda‑ka aba mai fama na, ai tefe one wadarani.” Oda ati namaroni.
“Owa‑ya mai dai kakawahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.

Yeso ati ene kabihi mese‑ya mai dama mai nahorisamaroni. Baho 5 kana, aba mai fama na, mai‑ya Yeso damakane, neme‑ya tonokomise, Deoso‑ya hiyaremarine. Baho‑ya kebi, oda‑ya baho‑ya daanemarine, mai dami‑ya oda daanabonehe.
Mai nafi tafa, mai korimanama, baho kote oda teena, hisiri 12 kana kibamaroni.
Maki 5.000 mai kana, mai fanawi dama, madehe dama na, mai tafamaroni.
Hisiri‑ya baho kote oda teeni hawa toha, Yeso ati ene kanawa‑ya oda foyamamaroni, faha kowani‑kaya oda beretokawami dai tohabonehe. Makobote mai dama hini mai tabori‑kaya mai‑ya yosemarine.
Mai‑ya hiyari hawa toheya, adami webote‑ya Yeso tokomorosematane, Deoso‑ya hiyarebonaha. Yama soki‑ya Yeso ohari towitakosematane.
Kanawa‑ya faha bai‑ya oda yakakana, boni ihi faha rike oda‑ya werekanamaroni.
4 ora‑ke, yama wahi yananiya, Yeso kamaki, faha baki‑ya yakanemarine.
Yeso faha baki‑ya yakane‑ya oda awa, oda kakomehe, oda e‑erina,
“Ai korimari toha awini.” Oda ati namaroni.
Oda kakomehe, oda‑ya Yeso haane,
“Dai habo kitahi. Fara ama·oni. Dai kakomeheriyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Bedoro ati yanane,
“Ayo, fara tiwa amani? Owa haatinahi, faha baki‑ya tiwa kobo·onabonehe.” Bedoro ati nemarine.
“Hehe, tikihi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Bedoro waamise, faha baki‑ya yakanemarine, Yeso‑ya kobonebonaha.
Faha rike nemehe‑ya Bedoro awe, kakomehe, habanisi yanane,
“Ayo, owa tikasomahi. Haba·onisariyahi.” Bedoro ati nemarine.
Yeso yehe‑ya daatowiti, Bedoro‑ya waratone,
“Owati tinofara, hini yamata ihi tiwa kakomeheti?” Yeso ati nemarine.
Kanawa dori‑ya mai teenama, boni fawanamaroni.
Yeso ene oda awa, Yeso‑ya oda kahiyara,
“Deoso Bidi yokana amatini.” Oda ati namaroni.
Kenesare‑kaya oda kobonamaroni.
Yeso‑ya mai watowamiya, mai tabori dami‑ya mai one kanani toka, Yeso koboni tamine‑ya mai kaminamaroni, mai kiyana mai‑ya mai kakamabonehe.
Yeso‑ya mai mai hiwakama,
“Yeso, tika bora ifi oda boyonaboneni.” Mai ati na,
Yeso borone‑ya mai boyoniya, mai kitamamaroni.
Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, fariseo mai toha na, Yerosare‑ya mai wi‑wina mai kakemaroni. Yeso‑ya mai weena,
“Hini yamata‑bone tiwa‑ya mai da‑daba ai‑ka idi mai ati‑ya mai nofariti?
‘Ai tafabone, ai yehe‑ya ai sorokariteni.’ Ai‑ka idi mai ati teni.
Tiwa‑ya mai da‑daba mai yahi towe tafateni.” Fariseo mai ati namaroni.
“Ai‑ka idi mai ati dai nofabisa, Deoso ati‑ya dai tokadabarani.
‘Abi, ami, mai na, mai tinofahi. Mai‑ka abi, mai‑ka ami, mai na, mai one‑ya mai weena, —Towe amatini.— Mai ati na, mai abahi.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati nineni. Haa‑nima dai ati nibisa,
‘Abi, ami, oka yama dai kayafabone dai ati na, oka yama dai‑ya daa·orabone, Deoso‑ya yama daa·oni hawa ohani.’ Ati ne,
‘Sibarini, hika yama‑ya Deoso‑ya daanebona, badi, madi, mai na mai hinofare, yama sibarini.’ Dai ati teni.
Deoso ati‑ya dai nofara, ai‑ka idi mai ati dai nofabisineni.
Towe dai amani. Deoso ati‑ya i‑di Isa·iya kamine, fare dai tamine‑ya kanahanone,
‘Owa‑ya mai nofamone mai ati na, hiniya keyehe‑ya mai hirina, owati‑ya mai tokadabarani.
Mai ati omita, ya‑yai·oni awirini. Owati‑ya mai kaminamone mai ati na, mai one ati‑ya mai kaminabisineni.’ Deoso ati ne, ati‑ya i‑di Isa·iya kanahanomatane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai dama mai‑ya Yeso haane,
“Owati dai mitahi. Owati dai watohi.
Ai tefe ene ai towe tohaterani. Ai ati towe ene ai towe tohabisateni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Tiwati ihi fariseo mai yawa, mai tiwini?” Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda ati namaroni.
“Fadara‑ya yama towe yana, Okobi yama hikamara‑ya mai borenaboneni.
“Tiwati oda watora, oda yofitikana, oda tikanawato tinahi.” Bedoro ati nemarine.
“Ka! Hibati‑ya owa‑ya dai daba, owati‑ya dai wato awisarani.
Yama dai watohi. Ai tefe ene ai towe tohaterani. Yamata ai kaba, ai nabadi‑ya toka, ai miiniya, wadamaterani.
Ai atibodi towe toha, ai ati towe tohateni. Ai atibodi‑ya yama towe yanana ihi ai towe tohateni.

Yama towe‑ya mai nokotonihe mai toha, mai one‑ya mai nanahaba mai toha, fana one‑ya mai ide mai toha, fana mai dama mai‑ya mai nokotonihe mai toha, yama‑ya mai bote mai toha, keyehe‑ya mai hirina mai toha, mai one‑ya mai weena mai toha na, mai atibodi ihi mai ihi towe toha teni.
Ai yehe ai sorokari awiri‑ya ai tafiya, ai towe toharani. Ai atibodi towe tohiya, ai towe tohateni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Hiyari hawa tohe, tokawahe, Tiro toha, Sidoho toha na, fara yakari‑ya tokemarine.
Kanaha mai‑ka fana kamake, Yeso‑ya hiyara,
“Ayo, oka hidi amatini. Dafi‑ka nodi amatini. Owa tikasomahi. Madi towe ene okoto kiyani nafeni.” Fana ati namaroni.
Yeso ati yanare, Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda ati yananibisa,
“Yeso, yara fana tokahi, ati fawararo.” Oda ati na, oda ati damamaroni.
“Yara mai‑ya Deoso owa‑ya yosere, Yodeo, Deoso ati‑ya mai watora mai‑ya Deoso owa‑ya yosebisemarine.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso yowi‑ya fana yobati tati‑kaya ita, Yeso‑ya hiyara,
“Ayo, owa tikasomahi.” Fana ati namaroni.
“Ai‑ka madehe tafe‑ya yomahi‑ya ai daaterani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ayo, fara amani. Owati timitaharihi. Yome hidi tafa, tafe ibe bofe‑ya sona‑ya yome mai kabateni.” Fana ati namaroni.
“Hehe, owati tinofi nafini, tiwati‑nima yama naboneni.” Yeso ati ne, ati ene fana bide kitamawahamaroni.
Karireya‑ka wara webote widi‑kaya Yeso tokomatase, adami webote‑ya tokomorose, itarimarine.

Mai dama mai tokomake, mai kiyana mai‑ya mai kakamamaroni. Mai ka‑kakona mai toha, mai noki wadara mai toha, mai ati fawana mai toha, mai kiyana mai toha na, mai‑ya mai kakama, Yeso noko‑kaya mai mai hinafore, mai nafi‑ya Yeso nakitamemarine.
Mai ati wadara mai ati yananawaha, mai mani yanara mai mani yananawaha, mai ka‑kakona mai yakanawawaha, mai noki wadara yama‑ya mai awawaha, mai namaroni. Yeso ene‑ya mai awa,
“Ka! Isara·eo‑ya ai wi‑wina ai‑ka Deoso ene kitane.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda‑ya hiyare,
“Ai‑ya mai sa‑sawi mai okasomaboneni. Ai amoni 3 kani‑ya ai‑ya mai sawe, mai tafe wadarani. Mai oyoseya, fimi ihi mai abariyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ebeni‑kaya mai dama mai tafe‑ba ai kanikibati? Yobe awire‑kaya ai nahoneni.” Oda ati namaroni.
“Dai‑ka baho emeniti?” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Oda‑ka baho 7 kana toha, aba bidi mai fa‑famaraba nihi nani.” Oda ati namaroni.
Yeso ati ene mai nafi nahokosamaroni.
Baho toha, aba mai toha na‑ya Yeso damakane, tefe tamine‑ya Deoso‑ya Yeso hiyare, baho‑ya kebi, Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda‑ya baho kote‑ya daa, aba bidi mai‑ya daane, mai nafi‑ya oda daanamaroni.
Mai dama mai tafa, mai korimana, tefe kote hasina oda teena, hisiri 7 kana oda nakibamaroni.
Maki mai 4.000 kana, mai fanawi dama, madehe dama na, mai tafamaroni.
Mai korimana, mai tabori‑ya mai‑ya Yeso yosemarine. Yeso oda eyehe kanawa‑ya foye, wami oni Makada toha‑ya oda tokamaroni.
Fariseo mai toha, sadoseo mai toha na, mai kamake,
“Yeso, Deoso‑ka tihamone tina, neme‑ya tiwa ene kitabote oda awaboneni.” Mai ati namaroni, Yeso‑ya mai weenabonehe.
“Mahi toke‑ya neme‑ya dai kiina, neme mawa tona,
‘Yama amosaminaboneni.’ Dai ati teni.
Yama wahabisari‑ya neme‑ya dai kiina, neme mawa, neme sabi soki na,
‘Faha kakeboneni.’ Dai ati teni.
Neme‑ka yama kiini dai wata, Deoso ene‑ya dai awa, yama‑ya dai watorani.

Towe dai amani. Deoso ati dai tokadabara, hiniya owa ene kitabote dai awabone dai ati na, dai ati‑nima oteraboneni. Yama dai awabone dai ati na, i‑di Yona ene‑mata‑nima yama na dai awabisaboneni.” Yeso ati ne, tokomemarine.
Oda‑ka baho‑ya oda ati kadamowamamaroni. Faha kowani‑kaya oda kobona, Yeso ati yanane,
“Dai noko wadahi. Fariseo mai toha, sadoseo mai toha na, mai‑ka femeto‑ya dai arabanahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ai‑ka baho awira tamine‑ya Yeso hiyarane.” Oda ibi hiyara, oda ati namaroni.
Oda ati‑ya Yeso wato, oda‑ya hiyare,
“Ka! Owa ene kitaramone dai atibodi ati na awineni. Baho yokana tamine‑ya ohiyari awirani.
Yama dai wato kanibote rani. Owa ene dai awa, 5.000 mai kana baho 5 kana‑ya mai onatafa, mai korimana, hisiri kiba dama hasina, tamine‑ya dai ati kadamowama awineni.
4.000 mai kana, baho 7 kana‑ya mai onatafa, mai korimana, hisiri kiba dama hasina, tamine‑ya dai ati kadamowama awineni.
Yama dai watora, baho yokana tamine‑ya ohiyari awirani. Fariseo mai toha, sadoseo mai toha na, mai‑ka femeto‑ya dai arabanahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Sesareya Firibo‑ya oda kobona, oda‑ya hiyare,
“Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke tamine‑ya mai hiyara, eme mai ati niti?” Yeso ati ne,
“‘Yowaho Batita amane.’ Mai one ati nihi,
‘I‑di Eriya amane.’ Mai one ati nihi,
‘Yeremiya amane.’ Mai one ati nihi,
‘Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑ka owa amane.’ Mai one ati nihi teni.” Oda ati namaroni.
“Dai‑ta eme dai ati niti?” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika amatini. Deoso yokana Bidi amatini.” Simaho Bedoro ati nemarine.
“Simaho, Yona bidi amatini. Ya‑yaitinahi. Owa tiwatobisineni. Bofe‑ka mai ihi tohi awira, Okobi neme‑ke ene yama tiwatowahani.
Owati timitahi. Tiwa oni Bedoro toha, yati oni‑ya weyetineni. Okobi yati webote‑nima ne, Okobi ene oka mai damawahabone, mai tosiyoteraboneni.
Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika ama·oni. Hiniya owa tamine dai hiyarariyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso abebona, hini tamine‑ya hiyare,

“Yerosare‑ya ai tokaboneni. Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, mai na, dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke ati‑ya mai nofarabone, mai weeni hikitebona, mai hinahabeya, mahi 3 tohe‑ya okitamaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Ahiyata‑ya Yeso‑ya Bedoro towake, fai‑ya weene,
“Ayo, haa‑nima tiwati riyahi. Tiwati‑nima yama ni awiteraboneni.” Bedoro ati nemarine.
Bedoro‑ya Yeso hiyarebona, tonokowame, ati yanane,
“Satanasi ati‑nima tiwati nineni. Owa‑ya tiwati baririyahi. Deoso‑ka yama nokotini awira, hini tiwatibodi ati‑ya nokotinibisineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda‑ya Yeso hiyaramaki,
“Owa‑ya dai ati daba, dai‑ka yama dai nokotoniriyahi. Owa‑ya dai dabiya, owa‑ya mai nanahababone‑nima dai‑ya mai nanahabahareba awineni.
Yama dama‑ya mai kihamaro mai abiya, mai‑ka yama mai‑ya kasomateraboneni. Owati‑ya mai nofara yama hirini‑kaya mai sawiwahaboneni. Yinero‑ya ai atibodi manakone abaterani.
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai eyehe okomatasabone, Okobi wehene owa‑ya sawibonane. Bofe‑ka dai ene‑nima dai ene manakone na daa·onaboneni.
Owati amosabote dai mitahi. Dai one abi awisari‑ya dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kiti yananebona dai one awaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Oda amoni 6 kani‑ya i‑di Bedoro, i‑di Tiyako, Tiyako sohori i‑di Yowaho, mai na, mai‑ya Yeso himane, adami nemehe tati‑ya mai tokomorosa, oda sawi awiramaroni.
Adami tati‑ya mai kobona, mai noki‑ya Yeso hini wehene‑ya yananihi, mahi wehene‑nima Yeso noko wehene nawahe, hika bora sa‑sawani kita, wahi wadameteni.
I‑di Mose, i‑di Eriya, mai fama, mai kobona, Yeso‑ya mai hiyarameteni.
Mai‑ya Bedoro awe, ati yanane,
“Ayo, tiwa‑ya oda sawe, yama sibarini. Dai‑ka wa‑wasa‑ba wama·onaboneni. Tika ohari, Mose‑ka ohari, Eriya‑ka ohari nebonane.” Ati nematane.
Bedoro hiyaranasa neya, neme sabi wahi wada mai‑ya barikanameteni. Neme sabi‑ya ati kaki,
“Oka Dao amane. Oka Dao onofi nafi, ati dai tokadabahi.” Ati nematane.
Ati‑ya mai mita, mai wiyarisameteni, mai kakomehero.
Mai‑ya Yeso boyone,
“Dai nahomisamahi. Dai habo siitoriyahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai kiikimisama, Yeso ohari‑ya mai awameteni.
Makobote mai yananamatasa, mai tokofawamiya, mai‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Adami tati‑ya yama dai awa tamine‑ya dai kaminariyahi. O·abiya, okitamiya, owa kitami hawa tohiya, yama dai awa tamine dai kaminabisaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Makobote Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina eya mai ati na,
‘I‑di Eriya koboni dai toheya, Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika koboni yotobonane.’” Mai ati teni.
Mai ati‑ya Yeso mite, ati yanane,
“Fara amani. Eriya koboni dai tohebona, yama nafi‑ya nataminawamebonane.
Owati dai mitahi. Eriya koboni hawa tohe, Eriya‑ya mai watora, mai weeni hikitemarine. I‑di Eriya‑nima dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke‑ya mai weeni kitaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yowaho Batita tamine‑ya Yeso hiyareya, yama‑ya mai watowahamaroni.
Mai dama mai yorotokani‑kaya Yeso kobone, ai owa Yeso‑ya awe, Yeso noko‑kaya yobati tati‑kaya itemarine.
“Ayo, oka dao tikasomahi. Oka dao ka‑kana ne. Hini‑ya werekaneya, yifo hirini‑ya sonari, faha‑ya boka, kayatona nofene.
Tiwa‑ya mai da‑daba mai haa·ona, oka dao‑ya mai kasomabone, mai ihi kitarani.” Maki ati nemarine.
Yeso ati yanane,
“Ka! Owati dai nofara, dai narabo hawirani. Owati dai wato kanibote nahi. Dai‑ya owa sawi nafimaraboneni. Yetene dai kakamahi!” Yeso ati nemarine.
Madi towe‑ya Yeso weene, madi towe toke, yetene kitamawahemarine.
Mai noki beheri‑kaya Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba Yeso‑ya oda hiyara,
“Madi towe oda weena, hini yamata ihi oda ene kitariti?” Oda ati namaroni.
“Owati dai nofi nafira ihi madi towe kanarene. Owati amosa dai mitahi. Deoso ati‑ya dai nofi i‑isi niya, dai ene kitaboneni. Adami webote‑ya dai hiyariya, dai ati‑nima adami nawahaboneni.
Deoso‑ya dai hiyari baha, dai tafi fawaniya, madi towe haa‑nima ne kanatene. Deoso‑ya dai hiyari awiriya, dai tafi fawariya, madi towe haa‑nima ne kanaterene.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Karireya‑ya oda wina, oda‑ya hiyare,
“Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke‑ya ai owa daanebona,
owa‑ya mai nanahababone, o·abiya, mahi 3 toheya, okitamaboneni.” Yeso ati ne, ati ene oda yawawahamaroni.
Kafanaho‑ya oda kobona, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ke yinero‑bona‑ya mai ha‑haa Bedoro‑ya mai hiyara,
“Dai‑ya ka‑kanawato Deoso‑ka yobe‑ke yinero‑bona‑ya daanaraniha? Yama anini mahi fame‑ka manakone‑nima yama manakone nineni.” Mai ati namaroni.
“Yinero‑ya daatene.” Bedoro ati nemarine.
Yobe‑ya Bedoro tokomakiya, Yeso haane,
“Simaho, tiwati omitaboneni. Ebeni‑ke‑ka yinero‑ya hidi webote mai haatiti? Bidi‑ka yinero‑ya haaterene. Mai one mai‑ka yinero‑ya haanibisatene.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Fara amani. Mai one mai‑ya yinero‑ya mai haateni.” Bedoro ati nemarine.
“Bidi mai‑ya yinero‑ya mai haaterani.” Yeso ati nemarine.

“Mai yawariyahi. Faha widi‑ya tikamiya, ka‑kabi korotifiya, aba ohari tikanawasiya, aba ebene‑ya yinero tiwaseboneni. Yama anini mahi 4 kane‑ka manakone‑nima yinero nebonane. Yinero damatiniya, mai‑ya daatiyaho, ai fama ai manakone boneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Bedoro‑ya hiyari hawa tohe, Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda one kamake, Yeso‑ya oda hiyara,
“Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona koboneya, ebeni‑ke kiti ba‑basi nabati?” Oda ati namaroni.
Ewe‑ya Yeso haane, oda teberi‑ya waimarine.
“Owati amosa dai mitahi. Dai ene amosawahi awiriya, Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya dai sawiraboneni. Madehe‑nima dai nawawahiya, dai sawibisaboneni.
‘Mai‑ka hidi ama·ora, mai‑ka yo‑yose ama·obisineni.’ Madehe ati teni.
Fara madehe‑nima dai niya,
‘Mai‑ka yo‑yose ama·oni.’ Dai ati nibisa,
Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona‑ya dai sawebone, hidi kiti ba‑basi ne dai tohawahaboneni.
‘Owa ene Yeso ya‑yainebonane.’ Dai atibodi ati na,
ewe dai kasomiya, owa‑ya dai kasomaharineni.
