Dai one ati ene owati‑ya ewe nofamareya, hini ene towe manakone wadebonane. Hini ene towe tohi awisareya, yati webote‑ya namidi mai yadihineya, faha webote‑ya bokeya, abeya, yama sibarabone, komene bi‑bidi nibisebonane. Ene towe tohe, hini ene manakone komene nafibisebonane.
Ka! Bofe‑ya mai wi‑wina mai one ati ihi owati‑ya mai one tokadabara, mai ihi manakone wadani.

Tiwa nokobodi one ene yama towe nokotiniya, tiwa noko one sobatinakihi, yama towe‑ya nokotinimarabonehe. Tiwa nokobodi ohari‑ya ti·abiya, tikitamiya, ti·abarabone‑kaya kobotina, yama sibabisaraboneni. Tiwa noko fami‑ya ti·abiya, tikitamiya, wara hirini‑kaya tikiya, yama towe tohaboneni.
“Owati dai mitahi.
‘Madehe towe hini tohiya.’ Dai atibodi ati riyahi.
Okobi tabaro‑ya Deoso‑ka yo‑yose madehe‑ya mai kayawateni.
Bofe‑ya dai wi‑wina Deoso hawine dai watora, dai‑ya okemaroni, dai‑ya okasomabonehe.
Ai owa‑ka kaneiro mai 100 kana mai toha, ohari fawaneya, mai 99 kana mai naha, owa fawane hidi sibahitine.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. Kaneiro fawane‑ya wasi, ya‑yaitene. Kaneiro mai one ihi ya‑yaini awire, hiwasi ene ya‑yainibisatene.
Ai‑ka Abi neme‑ke tabaro‑ya ai nafi winabone Deoso atibodi ati ne, tabaro‑ya madehe one tokara, Deoso yawebonane.
Dai owa ene amosare, ohari tihiyaraho. Ene amosare tihiyare, tiwati‑ya nofeya, yama amosaboneni. Dai ya‑yainaboneni.
Tiwati‑ya nofareya, dai fama dai towakeya, dai fama dai ati‑ya nofeba awane.
‘Mai fama mai ati fara kafama, mai ati ai nofateni.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Dai ati‑ya nofare, Deoso‑ka dai toha dai yorotokaniya, mai‑ya dai hiyarahi. Makobote, dai dama dai ati yananahi. Dai nafi ati‑ya nofareya, dai owa tohamare‑nima nebonane.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. Neme‑ya Deoso mai‑ya barikaneya, bofe‑ya mai baritikanahareboneni. Neme‑ya Deoso mai‑ya seekaneya, bofe‑ya mai seetikanahareboneni.
Deoso‑ya dai hiyara, dai fama dai ati fara kafamiya, yama dai ati kobohina‑ya Deoso daanebonane.
Owa dai nofa dai fa‑famaraba na, dai yorotokaniya, dai‑ya osaweboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Bedoro kamaki, Yeso‑ya hiyare,
“Ayo, owa‑ya mai weenadiya, mai‑ya owati somawami 7 kana, sibakarini?” Bedoro ati nemarine.
“Tiwati somawami 7 toharaboneni. Tiwati somawami 490 kana tohabisahi.
Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine dai mitahi. Mai‑ka hidi webote mai‑ya haane, mai‑ka yama manakone‑ya mai daa kanibote nabonehe.
Hidi‑ka yo‑yose maki owa‑ya kakame, hika yama manakone nafe, yama anini faha fowe dama manakone‑nima maki‑ka yama manakone nineni.
Yinero nafire ene hidi yawe, maki‑ka yobe, maki‑ka yama toha, maki abano, fadi, bidi mai toha, mai na, mai one mai‑ya mai‑ya daanebonane, yinero‑ya kayafebonaha.
Maki kakomehe, yobati‑kaya ite,
‘Oka hidi amatini. Owa daatiriyahi. Hibareya, yama manakone nafi daa·onaboneni.’ Maki ati nane.
Hidi ati somawame,
‘Hehe, sibaraboneni. Tiwa manakone haa·onamaraboneni.’ Hidi ati nane.
Maki toke, hika owa‑ya hiyare, hika yama manakone‑ya haane, fara yama anini abariko 4 kane‑ka manakone‑nima hika owa‑ka yama manakone nineni. Hika owa namidi‑ya waratone,
‘Oka yinero‑ba daanama kanibote tinahi.’ Maki ati nane.
Ai owa yobati‑kaya ite,
‘Hibareya, yama manakone onahababoneni.’ Ati nane.
Fai ati‑ya nofare, kadeya‑ya hinawaane,
‘Tiwa manakone abiya, tiwa‑ya mai seekanaboneni.’ Maki ati nane.
Ati ene mai one yawa, mai‑ka hidi narabo‑ya mai kaminani.
Maki hidi haahine, kame,
‘Towe amatini. Owa haatina, tiwa manakone haa·onamarabone onani.
Owa ene‑nima tiwa ene na‑mani, sibara neni.’ Hidi ati nane.
Hidi yawe, kadeya‑ya maki‑ya nawaane. Maki manakone abeya, maki‑ya mai seekanebonane.
Fara‑nima dai owa‑ya dai ati somawamara, Okobi neme‑ke dai‑ya weenebonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Makobote oda yananamatasa, Karireya‑ya oda sawimara, Yodeya‑ya oda tokoma, Yodaho Faha kowani‑kaya oda tokawahamaroni.
Yeso nowati‑ya mai dama mai kamake, mai dami‑ya Yeso nakitamemarine.
Fariseo mai one kamake, mai atibodi yama‑ya dika,
“Yeso ati amosareya, ati oda miteya, oda weenebonane.” Mai atibodi ati na, mai ati yanana,
“Yeso, maki fadi‑ya nofamare, honita wahawamebona ati ne, sibakare?” Fariseo mai ati namaroni.
“Deoso‑ka yama hani dai kadikara‑mani? Yama yanakani‑ya maki toha, fana toha na‑ya i‑di Deoso wamanematane.
‘Maki fana‑ya famebona, badi, madi mai na, mai‑ya dabamaterene. Maki fadi‑bone‑ya fame, mai aboni ohariteboneni.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Mai fama mai aboni ohariwamani. Deoso ati ene mai aboni ohariwama, Deoso ene dai arabanahi. Mai honita wahawamariyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Fariseo mai ati yanana,
“Hini yamata‑bone Mose yama‑ya kanahanomatati?
‘Dai honita wahawamabone, dai‑ka yibote‑ka yama hani‑ba dai daaniya, dai honita wahawamiya, yama sibaraboneni.’ Mose‑ka yama hani ati nineni.” Fariseo mai ati namaroni.
“Ai‑ka idi mai habi kita ihi mai honita wahawami‑bone‑ka yama hani tamine‑ya i‑di Mose kanahanomatane. Yama yanakani‑ya haa‑nima yama rametemoneni.

Owati timitahi. Tiwa honita wahawamariyahi. Fadi hini ati ihi maki bare‑ya famawaha, maki daidi ene tohi awire, maki daidi‑ta sibarane. Maki hini ene honita wahawameya, fana one‑ya famawaheya, ene ati kasiro, hiniya siwanane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Haa‑nima yama na, ai fanara, ai sibabisarineni.” Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda ati namaroni.
“Deoso ati ene mai one fana, ai one fanarihi naboneni.

Ai owa wade dene noko wadare fanarihi, ai owa dene noko mai hinahabe fanarihi, ai owa hini‑ya kayawe fanarihi ne, Deoso‑ya nokotoni oharibisebona hini‑ya kayawane. Hini dai‑ya dai kayawa, dai‑ya dai kayawahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ya madehe‑ya mai kakama, mai tati‑ya Yeso yehe foribona, Deoso‑ya mai tamine‑ya hiyarebona, mai ati na, madehe‑ya mai kakama, mai‑ya oda ati barinamaroni.
“Madehe dai ati baririyahi. Madehe owati‑ya nofa, madehe‑nima mai na, Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya mai saweboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai tati‑ya Yeso yehe fori, tokawahemarine.
“Ayo, hini yamata‑nima obati, ai abaterabone‑kaya osawebonehe?” Ati ne,
“Tiwa ene amosabone tina, Deoso ohari‑ta amosabotebisa amane. Ai abarabone‑kaya tisawebone tina, Deoso ati‑ya tikadabiya, tisaweboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Deoso ati dame, ati kiti ba‑basi ne yofitikanahi, ati‑ya osawebonehe.” Maki ati nemarine.
“Ai owa tinahabarihi, mai fanawi one ti·aharihi, yama tibotirihi, mai one tamine‑ya keyehe‑ya hiritirihi,
Abi, ami mai na, mai tinofa, hini tiwa tinofi‑nima dai yakari‑ya mai sawe mai tinofa tiyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Fara haa‑nima oteni. Hini yamata‑nima onamakitasibati?” Maki ati nemarine.

“Tiwa ene amosa hinama tohabone tina, tiwa yehe honene nafi daatinahi, manakone waratiniya, mai yahi hone wadara mai‑ya daatinahi. Deoso tabaro‑ya tika yama dama tohaboneni. Eya tiwa ene niya, makobote owa‑ya tisawiyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya mite, yawe, tokome, hika yama dama toha, hika yama‑ya kayawemarine.
“Owati amosa dai mitahi. Mai yahi hone dama toha, Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya mai dami sawiraboneni.
Owati dai mitahi. Akoye hodone‑ya kamero tokiyomaterene. Fara‑nima mai naboneni. Mai yahi hone dama Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona‑ya mai dami sawiraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya oda mita, oda atibodi yama‑ya kadika,
“Ka! Ebeni‑ke sawibati?” Oda ati namaroni.
Yeso oda‑ya nokotonihi, ati yanane,
“Hini ai ene ai sawiteraboneni. Deoso ene ai one sawibisaboneni. Deoso ene kitabotebisa amane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ayo, oda‑ka yama nafi towadakosa, tiwa‑ya oda honita daba, hini yamata‑nima ai manakone nibati?” Bedoro ati nemarine.

“Owati amosa dai mitahi. Mai abamete mai kitamiya, hidi‑ka kadera amosabote‑ya dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke itaribona, owa‑ya dai da‑daba hidi‑ka kadera amosa‑ya dai nahorihareboneni. Isara·eo‑ka nodi mai ihi‑ya dai kadikiya, mai ihi‑nima mai ihi manakone na dai daanaboneni.

Owati dai mitahi. Owati‑ya mai tokadaba ihi mai‑ka yama nafi‑ya mai tonawadakosa, mai ihi manakone wadaboneni. Mai‑ka yobe, mai‑ka fadara, mai‑ka ayo, mai‑ka asima, mai‑ka abi, mai‑ka ami, mai‑ka madehe, mai na, mai tonokosa, mai manakone amosa‑ya mai kayafaboneni. Mai manakone fiyakanaboneni. Makobote mai abateraboneni.
Bofe‑ya hidi webote mai toha, Deoso tabaro‑ya mai bi‑bidi na mai tohabisaba awineni. Bofe‑ya mai bi‑bidi na mai toha Deoso tabaro‑ya hidi mai ba‑basi na mai tohawahaba awineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso oda‑ya kanawatobona, oda‑ya hiyare,
“Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona haa‑nima nebonane. Ai owa‑ka ofa dama toha,
bosane, mai one‑ya yose,
‘Oka ofa dai bataniya, dai‑ka yinero‑ba daa·onaboneni. Barata wamani ohari daa·onaboneni.’ Ati nane.
9 ora‑ya tokomatase, mai one‑ya awe, yama‑ya mai anira,
mai‑ya yose,
‘Oka ofa dai batanamatahi. Dai‑ka yinero‑ba daa·onaboneni.’ Ati ne,
mai tokomake, awa bono‑ya mai batanamakitasineni.
Mahi nokorise‑ya mai one‑ya yose, 3 ora‑ya mai one‑ya yosemakitase, mai tokomakineni.
5 ora‑ya mai one‑ya awe, yama‑ya mai anira, mai‑ya hiyare,
‘Hini yamata‑bone yama dai anirihi?’ Ati ne,
‘Oda‑ya mai yose awirani.’ Mai ati na,
mai‑ya yose,
‘Oka ofa dai batanahi.’ Ati nane.
6 ora‑ya ofa hidi, hika yo‑yose‑ya hiyare,
‘Yama‑ya mai anina mai haatinahi. 5 ora‑ya mai kamake, mai‑ka yama manakone daatini bahiya, mai bosana mai‑ka yama manakone daatini yotohi.’ Ofa hidi ati nane.
5 ora‑ya mai‑ka yama anini yanana mai kamake, mai‑ka barata wamani ohari‑ya hidi‑ka yo‑yose daanane.
Mai bosana mai one‑ka yinero‑ya mai awa,
‘Oda‑ka yinero damabiseba awane.’ Mai atibodi ati na,
barata wamani ohari‑ya mai kayafaharineni.
Mai yawa, ofa hidi‑ya mai hiyara,
‘Mai one ora ohari‑ya yama‑ya mai anina, oda‑ta mahi hewene‑ya yama oda anina, oda‑ka yama anini nafibisa, oda‑ka yinero‑nima mai‑ka yinero daatine nane.’ Mai ati nineni.
Ofa hidi ati yanane,
‘Owati dai mitamatahi. Dai‑ka yama anini manakone‑ya keyehe hiri·ora, barata wamani ohari daa·onaboneni.’ Onani.
‘Dai‑ka yinero‑bona daa·ona, dai tokomahi. Mai‑ka yinero‑bona hiniya daa·onaboneni.’ Owatibodi ati nineni.
‘Hini oka yinero tohe, owatibodi daahine, mai okasoma, hini yamata‑bone dai yawiti?’ Hidi ati nane.
Bofe‑ya mai yota Deoso tabaro‑ya mai dai tohaba awineni. Bofe‑ka mai dai toha Deoso tabaro‑ya mai yotaba awineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yerosare‑ka adami‑ya oda tokomorosa, Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda‑ya Yeso haane, oda‑ya hiyaremarine, ati mai dama mai himitarebonaha.
“Yerosare‑ya ai tokabone, ai koboniya, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha na, dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke‑ya mai watiya, mai ati hinahabeya,
kofeno mai‑ya owa‑ya mai daanabone, owa‑ya mai hahakana, owa‑ya mai bisi, awa‑ya owa‑ya mai baakana naboneni. Mahi 3 kani‑ya dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kitamebonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Sebedeo fadi, bidi mai eyehe kama, yobati‑kaya itarisamaroni, Yeso‑ya hiyarabonehe.
“Hini yamata tiwati koboniti?” Yeso ati ne,
“Ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tihawahiya, oka dao tika yo‑yose mai kiti na‑nafi nabone, tiwa mano kanika‑kaya owa itari, tiwa mano sayo‑kaya owa itari nebona, onani.” Sebedeo fadi ati namaroni.
“Hehe, haa‑nima oda naboneni, sibarini.” Mai ati namaroni.

“Yama ofebone‑nima dai fawamakeboneni. Okobi ati ene owa mano kanika‑kaya owa itari, owa mano sayo‑kaya owa itari nebona, mai oni hawa tohineni. Fara mai i‑itari‑bone‑ka dai‑ya daa·oteraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Sebedeo bidi mai ati‑ya oda one 10 kana mita, oda ati yawamaroni.
Yeso oda‑ya haane, oda‑ya hiyare,
“Bara mai‑ka hidi mai one‑ya mai kasomaterani. Mai ati ihi mai mai hinarifateni.
Mai‑nima dai riyahi. Hidi tihabone tina, dai one tikasomabisahi.
Mai‑ka webote tihabone tina, mai nafi tikasomabisahi.
Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke‑nima dai nahi. Owa dai narifara, dai‑ya onarifabisateni. Mai dama mai ihi manakone‑ya onahababone, o·ababoneni.” Ati nemarine.
Oda toka, Yeriko‑ya oda fiyakani yanatoniya, mai dama mai kamakemaroni.
Mai noki wadara hawi fowari‑ya mai demenare, Yeso tamine‑ya mai mita, mai haana,
“Ayo, oda‑ka hidi amatini. I‑di Dafi‑ka nodi amatini. Oda tikasomahi.” Mai ati namaroni.
“Dai ati fawanahi.” Mai dama mai ati na,
Mai haani kitawaha,
“Ayo, oda‑ka hidi amatini. I‑di Dafi‑ka nodi amatini. Oda tikasomahi.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yeso maatowiti, mai‑ya haane, mai kakama,
“Hini yamata‑ya dai ati koboniti?” Yeso ati ne,
“Ayo, oda noko tikasomahi, yama oda awabonehe.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yeso mai‑ya nofe, mai noki‑ya boyone, mai noki amosawama, yama‑ya mai awawaha, Yeso‑ya mai sawiwahamaroni.
Yerosare hawi‑ya oda yakana, Orifera adami toha, Befaki toha na, yakari‑ya oda kobona, Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba mai fama mai‑ya yose,
“A‑ahi‑ya mai tabori‑ya dai towakahi. Mai tabori‑ya dai towakiya, mai tabori‑ke boho bidi yetene madi eyehe yaditone dai awiya, dai disawaheya, dai kakamayaho.
‘Hini yamata‑bone boho mai dai disawahiti?’ Mai ati niya,
‘Ai‑ka Hidi mai haahinani.’ Dai ati niya,
Boho mai‑ya mai daanaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Hibati‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑ka owa ati‑mata dai mitahi,
“Yerosare‑ya mai wi‑wina mai‑ya dai hiyarahi. Dai‑ka hidi webote dai‑ya kakibona, ati hamarebona, boho mese‑ya itaribonane. Boho bidi yetene mese‑ya itaribonane.” Ati nemata,
ati‑nima yama nawahamaroni.
Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba mai fama, Yeso ati‑nima mai towaka, Yeso ati‑nima boho mai‑ya mai wasemaroni.
Boho bidi yetene madi eyehe‑ya mai kakama, boho mai mese‑ya oda‑ka bora oda sookanire‑ya Yeso itari, Yerosare‑ya oda tokawahamaroni.
Yeso‑ya mai dama mai sawe, Yeso hawine‑ya mai‑ka bora‑ya mai nawiya, mai one awa afe‑ya nawiya namaroni.
Mai one dai toha, mai one yoto na, mai hiyara, mai ati kita,
“Oda‑ka hidi i‑di Dafi‑ka nodi oda kahiyarineni. Deoso tiwa‑ya yose, tiwa‑ya kasomayaho, oda ati nineni. Deoso neme‑ya wine, Deoso oda kahiyarineni.” Mai dama mai ati namaroni.
Yerosare‑ya oda kobona, mai dama mai ati yanana,
“Ebeni‑ke tohati?” Mai ati namaroni.
“Yeso Nasare‑ke amane. Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita amane.” Mai ati namaroni.

Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso toke, yama‑ya mai one daa, mai one yama‑ya kanika na, mai‑ya Yeso kananiwahemarine. Yinero‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka mesa‑ya Yeso fatatokawiti, wayomata mai‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka kadera‑ya Yeso fatatokawiti nemarine.
Mai‑ya hiyare,
“‘Oka yobe‑ya owa‑ya mai hiyaraboneni.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati na,
dai ene yama‑ya mai bo‑boti mai‑ka yobe‑nima yobe nawawahane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai noki awihinara mai toha, mai one ka‑kakona mai toha na, mai‑ya Yeso nakitamemarine.
Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso tamine‑ya madehe hiyara,
“Dafi‑ka nodi ai kahiyarineni.” Madehe ati namaroni.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha na, Yeso ene amose‑ya mai awa, madehe ati‑ya mai mita na, mai yawawahamaroni.
“Yeso, madehe ati timitineni?” Mai ati na,
“Mai ati omitani. Deoso‑ka yama hani dai kadikaterini?
‘Madehe, madehe borehe, mai na, Deoso ene Deoso‑ya mai kahiyaraboneni.’” Yeso ati nemarine.
Makobote Betaniya‑kaya Yeso oda eyehe tokomemarine, oda amonabonehe.
Yerosare‑ka hawi‑ya oda tokomaminatasa, Yeso fimimarine.
Hawi fowari bodi‑ya fiko ohare waa‑ya Yeso awe, toke, fiko bonora, afe hinama tohamaroni.
“Tibonomateraboneni.” Yeso ati ne,
Ati ene fiko wayatonamaroni.
Fiko wayatona‑ya oda awa,
“Ka! Hini yamata ihi fiko wayatona kanibote nihi?” Oda ati namaroni.
Yeso oda‑ya hiyare,
“Owati amosa dai mitahi.
‘Deoso kitatene.’ Dai atibodi ati nahi,
‘Deoso kiteba awane.’ Dai atibodi ati riyahi,
Deoso ati dai nofabisiya, owa ene kitabote‑nima dai ene naboneni.
‘Adami webote, tibokahi.’ Dai ati niya,
dai ati ene adami webote bokaboneni.
Deoso ati dai nofiya, Deoso dai haaniya, dai ati‑nima yama naboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.

Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso tokiyome, mai‑ya kanawatomarine. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai toha na, mai kamake, Yeso‑ya mai weenabone, Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Ebeni‑ke ati ene mai‑ya kanatiniti? Ebeni‑ke ati ene mesa‑ya fatatikawiti tiniti?” Mai ati namaroni.
“Dai ati omiti bahi, owati dai mitahareboneni.
Ebeni‑ke ati ene Yowaho Batita mai‑ya habanirisati? Deoso ene toha, ai owa ene toha nane, hini yamata‑nima dai ati niti?” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai ibi hiyara,
“‘Deoso ati ene amane.’ Ai ati niya,
‘Hini yamata ihi Yowaho Batita ati dai nofariti?’ Yeso ati nebonane.
‘Ai owa ati ene amane.’ Ai ati niya,
ai‑ya mai bisinaboneni. Mai dama Yowaho Batita ati‑ya mai nofa,
‘Yowaho Batita Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita mai‑ka owa amane.’ Mai dama mai ati teni.” Mai ibi hiyara mai ati namaroni.
Yeso‑ya mai hiyaramatasa,
“Yowaho Batita tamine oda wato awirini.” Mai ati na,
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,
“Yowaho tamine dai kaminara, owa tamine okaminahariraboneni.
Owati dai miti bahiya, dai ati omitaboneni. Ai owa bidi mai fama, bidi daidi‑ya hiyare,
‘Ai‑ka ofa bodone‑ya yama anitinahi.’ Badi ati ne,
‘Ofa bodone‑ya yama anini onofarini.’ Bidi daidi ati ne,
makobote, atibodi ene toke, ofa bodone‑ya yama‑ya aninibisane.
Makobote bidi yoto‑ke‑ya hiyare,
‘Ai‑ka ofa bodone‑ya yama anitinahi.’ Badi ati ne,
‘Ofa bodone‑ya yama ani·onaboneni.’ Bidi yoto‑ke ati ne, makobote yama‑ya anirene.
Ebeni‑ke badi ati‑ya tokadababisati?” Yeso ati ne,
“Bidi daidi badi ati‑ya tokadababisane.” Mai ati namaroni.
“Owati amosa dai mitahi. Kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya mai ha‑haa mai toha, fana towe mai toha na, Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya mai sawebone, dai‑ta dai sawiraboneni.

Dai atibodi amosawahabone tamine‑ya Yowaho Batita hiyare, ati dai nofaramaroni. Kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya mai ha‑haa, fana towe mai toha na, Yowaho Batita ati‑ya mai nofabisamaroni. Mai ihi amosawaha mai dai awa, Yowaho ati dai nofasa rani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso mai‑ya kanawatobona mai‑ya hiyare,

“Ofa tabori‑bone‑ya hidi hawa tonihi, ofa noki‑ya kamane, yama ba‑barikana‑ya wamane, ofa ta‑tai‑ka hodi‑ya wamane, ofa‑ya mai na‑nawada‑bone mai tabori nemehe‑bone‑ya wamanamaki, yama yaki‑ya tokebona mai‑ya hiyare,
‘Oka awa bono dai nawadahi, hadiya, one okayafa, one dai kayafa naboneni.’ Ofa hidi ati ne,
‘Hehe, sibarini.’ Mai ati nani.
Fara yama yaki‑ya ofa hidi tokawahemarine.
Ofa hadiya, ofa hidi‑ya mai na‑narifa mai‑ya yoseme,
‘Owa tabaro one‑ya dai tokomahi. Ofa one‑ya dai‑ya mai daaniya, ofa dai kakamiyahi.’ Hidi ati nene.
Hidi‑ka ofa‑ya hika yo‑yose mai haana, ofa‑ya mai na‑nawada ofa‑ya mai daara, hidi‑ka yo‑yose owa‑ya mai bisi, owa mai hinaboha, owa yati‑ya mai hikinari hinane.
Hidi yawe, hika yo‑yose mai one dama mai‑ya yosemakitasane, ofa‑ya kayafebonaha. Ofa‑ya mai daara, hika yo‑yose mai mai bisihinamakitasineni.
Makobote bidi‑ya yosemakitase,
‘Oka dao ati‑ya mai nofabisaboneni.’ Hidi ati nene.
‘Bidi ai nanahabaho. Ai nanahabeya, badi abamakiya, mai‑ka yama nafi ai kayafaboneni.’ Mai ati na,
bidi mai hinahabe, awa beheri‑kaya abo mai korohiwitine.
Ofa hidi kameya, hini yamata‑nima nabati?” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, mai ati yanana,
“Hidi kameya, mai nafi‑ya nanahabebonane. Mai one mai‑ya yosemakiya, hika awa mai hinawada, ofa one‑ya mai daanaboneni.” Mai ati nemarine.
“Fara amani. Deoso‑ka yama hani ati dai mitahi,
‘Yobe‑ya mai wa‑wama awa mai werehiwite, yobe tati mese ewene tohawahene.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Deoso ene ai awemari, ai ya‑yainineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.

“Owati dai mitahi. Deoso dai‑ya haanemarine, hika yama dai nawadabonehe. Hibayata bara mai‑ya haanebonane, hika yama mai hinawadabisabonehe. Deoso ati‑nima mai nawahaboneni. Deoso‑ka yama dai nawadami awiraboneni.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, fariseo mai toha na, Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, mai yawa,
“Oda tamine‑ya Yeso hiyarane.” Mai atibodi ati namaroni.
Yeso‑ya mai watabone mai atibodi ati na, mai hiwati awiremarine. Mai dama mai sawe mai ihi yama yofina, Yeso Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita amane, mai dama mai ati teni.
Yeso mai‑ya kanawatobona mai‑ya hiyare,
“Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine dai watohi. Ai one mai‑ka hidi webote bidi fanebona, mai dami‑ya haanane, mai tafabonehe.
Hika yo‑yose mai‑ya yose,
‘Mai oni tiawahi. Mai dai haanahi, marina‑ya mai kamabonehe.’ Hidi webote ati ne,
mai‑ya mai haana, mai ati a‑arira, mai kamaki awirani.
Hika yo‑yose mai one‑ya yosemaki,
‘Mai dai haatonamatasahi. Oka bani mai wataka mai onahaba, ai tefe‑bone hawa tohini, mai kama kanibote niyahi.’ Hidi webote ati nane.
Mai mai haahina yama tokomaki‑ya mai nofara, fadara‑ya mai one toka, yama‑ya da‑daa‑kaya mai one toka na, hidi webote bidi marine‑ya mai ati toki nofarani.
Mai mai haahina, mai one hama, hidi webote‑ka yo‑yose mai one‑ya mai bisi, mai one‑ya mai nanahaba, mai nineni.
Mai tamine‑ya hidi webote mite, yawawahe, sodado mai‑ya yose, mai‑ya mai nanahaba, mai tabori‑ya mai sarikanamakeni.
Hika yo‑yose mai one‑ya yosemakitase,
‘Hibati‑ya mai haa·ona mai ati kasirani.
Bara mai‑ya dai haanahi, mai nafi. Tabora nafi‑ya dai tokiya, mai dai haanahi.’ Hidi webote ati nane.
Mai toka, mai nafi‑ya mai haana, mai ati kasira mai‑ya mai haa, mai ati amosa mai‑ya mai haa na, hidi webote tabaro kibawahane.
Mai‑ka hidi webote mai‑ya kiine, maki ohari bora amosara‑ya sakone‑ya awane.
maki ati yanarene.
Hidi webote hika yo‑yose mai‑ya yose,
‘Yehe, teme ne, dai sokikaseya, dai korotowitiho, yama soki‑kaya mai ohinabone, mai kome kitaboneni.’ Hidi webote ati nane.
Mai nafi‑ya Deoso haane, mai fa‑famaraba na mai‑ya Deoso kadikebonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Fariseo mai toka, mai ibi hiyara,
“Ai ati ene Yeso ati tosawariba awane.” Mai ati namaroni.
Mai‑ka mai da‑daba mai‑ya mai yose, i‑di Erodi‑ka mai one mai‑ya mai yose, Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Ayo, keyehe hirititerani. Deoso ati tikamine amosatene. Webote mai‑ya tinayofinara, fara yokana tikaminateni.
Tiwati oda mitabone, ai‑ka yinero‑ya Sesa haaneya, yinero ai daanibaraniha?” Mai ati namaroni.
Mai atibodi ati amosara‑ya Yeso wato,
“Towe dai amani. Owa‑ya dai watabone dai ati amani.
Sesa‑ka yinero‑bona oaweba, dai namoho.” Ati ne,
barata wamani‑ya mai daanamamaroni.
“Yinero bako dai awahi. Ebeni‑ke korimari amanati, oni tohaneri?” Yeso ati ne,
“I‑di Sesa korimari, oni ne, yinero bako‑ya waane.” Mai ati namaroni.
“Sesa‑ka yama‑ya Sesa‑ya dai daatonama, Deoso‑ka yama‑ya Deoso‑ya dai daatonamahari, dai nahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita,
“Ka! Yeso yama‑ya watone.” Mai atibodi ati na, mai yamatonamaroni.
Sadoseo mai one kamakemaroni, Yeso ati‑ya mai mitabonehe.
“Ai aba ai kitamaterani.” Sadoseo mai ati teni.
Mai kobona, Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Yeso, tiwati oda mitaboneni. Hibati‑ya i‑di Mose ati‑mata timitahi,
‘Ayo abeya, fadi hasina, bidi, bide mai na, mai wadara, anidi fadi‑ya famawahayaho. Bidi toheya, anidi abemari oni‑ya bidi weyenayaho.’ Mose‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Ai owa‑ka soho mai 6 kana, fane, kahiware, abe, fadi‑ya sohori famawahemarine.
Sohori kahiware, abamakitasemarine. Anidi fadi‑ya mai nafi kayafa, mai nafi abamaroni.
Mai nafi aba, mai‑ka yibote abamakemaroni.
Yeso, oda ati timitahi. Mai nafi‑ka yibote tohamaro, mai kitamiya, ebeni‑ke fadi tohawahibati?” Sadoseo mai ati namaroni.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,
“Deoso‑ka yama hani dai watorihi, Deoso ene dai watorihi, dai na, dai tosawarineni.
Mai aba Deoso ati ene mai kitamiya, neme‑ya mai winiya, mai fanamateraboneni. Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai‑nima mai naboneni.
‘Ai aba, ai kitamateraboneni.’ Dai ati na,
Deoso‑ka yama hani ati dai mitahi.
‘I‑di Abaraho, i‑di Isaki, i‑di Yako mai na, mai‑ka Deoso ama·oni.’ Deoso ati nematamonane.
Hibati‑ya mai abametemoneni. Mai wadamara mai‑ka Deoso tohaterene. Mai hasinibisa mai‑ka Deoso amane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai dama Yeso ati‑ya mai mita,
“Ka! Yeso yama‑ya watone.” Mai atibodi ati namaroni.
Yeso ati ene sadoseo mai ati fawana, mai tamine‑ya fariseo mai mita, mai yorotokanamaroni.
Mai‑ka owa Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya ka‑kanawato sawi,
“Owati ihi Yeso ati tosawaribonane.” Atibodi ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ya haane,
“Naki, yama hani ati kote amosabote tikaminahi.” Fariseo owa ati nemarine.
“‘Ai‑ka hidi webote i‑di Deoso dai nofi nafiyahi. Yama one dai nofi nafiriyahi. Deoso‑ta dai nokotonibisahi.’ Yama hani ati na,
ati amosabote amani.
‘Hini tiwa‑ya tinofi‑nima dai yakari‑ya mai sawe mai tinofiyahi.’ Yama hani ati na, ati amosabotehari amani.
Ati amosabote fama, ati‑ya mai tokadabiya, Mose‑ka yama hani ati nafi‑ya mai tokadaba, Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑ka yama hani ati nafi‑ya mai tokadabahari, mai teni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Fariseo mai yorotokana, mai‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Dafi‑ka nodi amane.” Mai ati namaroni.
“Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika tamine‑ya i‑di Dafi kanahano, ati dai mitahi.
‘Oka hidi webote‑ya Deoso hiyare,
—Owa mano kanika‑ya tiwitarihi. Owati ihi tiwa‑ya mai ka‑kako mai‑ka hidi tihawahaboneni.—’
Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika tamine‑ya Dafi atibodi‑ya Deoso‑ka Doni kamine, yama hani‑ya Dafi kanahanomatamonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati yananamatase,
“Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika i‑di Dafi‑ka hidi webote tohemona i‑di Dafi ati nematamonane. Fare Dafi‑ka nodi tohe, i‑di Dafi‑ka hidi webote tohahari ne.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, mai ati yanani awira, Yeso‑ya mai nafi nayofina, mai ati fawanamaroni.
Mai dama mai toha, Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda toha na, oda‑ya hiyare,
“Fariseo mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha na, Mose‑nima mai na, dai‑ka hidi mai amani.
Mai ati dai tokadabiyahi. Mai ati‑ta dai tokadababisa, mai ihi‑nima dai ene riyahi. Hini mai ati‑nima mai ihi ni awirani.
Yamasi kiba kanaha‑ya mai yaditona, mai one weyehinabonehe. Hini mai aboni yama‑ya mai weyeterani. Fara‑nima mai ati dami‑ya mai one tokadababone mai ati na, hini mai ati‑ya mai tokadabi awirani.
‘Oda ene‑ya mai awa, oda‑ka bora‑ya mai awa niya, oda‑ya mai nofaboneni.’ Mai atibodi ati teni.
Dai yorotokana, dai tafabone‑ya mai sawe, kadera amosabisa‑ya mai nahore, Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya mai sawe, kadera amosa‑ya mai nahoriteni, mai dai kahiyarabonehe.
Oda‑ya ka‑kanawato webote amatini dai ati na, dai ati ene mai ya‑yaiteni. Dai‑ya mai nokotoniteni, mai dai kahiyarabonehe.
Dai‑ya mai haana, ‘ka‑kanawato webote’ mai ati niya,
‘Haa‑nima dai ati riyahi.’ Dai ati nahi.
Fara hinama dai amani. Dai‑ya ka‑kanawato webote yokana oharine. Dai ibi haaniya, ‘ayo’, ‘soho’ dai ati nibisahi.
Ai owa dai hiyariya,
‘Abi amosabote amatini.’ Dai ati riyahi.
Ai‑ka Abi amosabote yokana neme‑ya winane.
‘Oka hidi amatini.’ Dai ati riyahi,
dai‑ka hidi yokana ohari, i‑di Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika amane.
Dai‑ka hidi webote haa‑nima naho, mai nafi‑ya kasomaho.
Hini mai‑ya mai kahiyara Deoso ene mai mai hinofaraboneni. Ai‑ya ai nokotonira, Deoso ai‑ya kahiyarabisebonane.

Ka! Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya dai ka‑kamina dai toha, fariseo dai toha na, dai ati kasiroteni. Dai ene manakone wadani. Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona‑ya dai sawirabone, mai one sawebone mai ati na mai‑ya dai ati barinineni.

Ka! Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya dai ka‑kamina dai toha, fariseo dai toha na, dai ati kasiroteni. Dai ene manakone wadani. Fana maki abe mai‑ka yobe‑ya dai kayafateni. Deoso‑ya dai hiyari yaboteni, dai‑ya mai awabonehe. Deoso dai‑ya weeni kitabisebonane.

Ka! Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya dai ka‑kamina dai toha, fariseo dai toha na, dai ati kasiroteni. Dai ene manakone wadani. Tabora dami‑ya dai toka, hawi‑ya dai toka, faha kowani‑kaya dai toka, dai teni, dai‑nima mai one nawahabonehe. Satanasi ati dai nofa, dai ati ene Satanasi ati‑ya mai nofi ba‑basi neni.
Ka! Yama‑ya dai watora mai dai kanawatoteni. Dai ene manakone wadani. Deoso‑ka yobe oni‑ya mai hirina,
‘Mai‑ka keyehe hini tohiya.’ Dai ati teni.
Deoso‑ka yobe‑ka oro oni‑ya mai hirina,
‘Dai ati‑nima dai nahi.’ Dai ati teni.
Yama‑ya dai watoterani. Deoso‑ka yobe amosi ba‑basi, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ka oro amosi bi‑bidi teni. Deoso hini hika yobe‑ya kayawe, oro‑ya Deoso kayawi awirane.
Deoso‑ka bani ai da‑daa‑ka mesa oni‑ya mai hirina,
‘Mai‑ka keyehe hini tohiya.’ Dai ati teni.
Deoso‑ka bani‑bona mesa‑ya sookari, bani oni‑ya mai hirina,
‘Dai ati‑nima dai nahi.’ Dai ati teni.

Yama dai watoterani. Deoso‑ka mesa‑ya yama sookare‑ya Deoso kayawatene, mesa ihi. Bani‑ya Deoso kayawatere, hini hika mesa‑ya bani sookari‑ya kayawatene. Mesa amosi ba‑basi nibisa, mesa‑ya sookari amosi bi‑bidi nane.
Deoso‑ka mesa oni‑ya mai hiri, Deoso‑ka bani oni‑ya mai hirina mai‑nima mai teni.
Deoso‑ka yobe oni‑ya mai hiri, Deoso oni‑ya mai hirina mai‑nima mai teni.
Deoso tabaro oni‑ya mai hiri, hidi‑ka kadera oni‑ya mai hiri, Deoso oni‑ya mai hiri na mai‑nima mai teni.

Ka! Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya dai ka‑kamina dai toha, fariseo dai toha na, dai ati kasiroteni. Dai ene manakone wadani. Dai‑ka yamata ke‑ketehe kote‑ya Deoso‑ya dai daateni. Deoso ati owa dai tokadabara,
‘Mai ihi‑nima mai manakone daatinahi. Mai kitara mai tikasomahi. Tiwati‑nima tinahi.’ Deoso ati nematane.
Ati amosabote amane. Ati dai tokadabaterene. Deoso ati amosabote dai tokadabe, makobote Deoso‑ka yama‑bone dai daaniya, dai sibarineni.
Yama dai watoterani. Yama hani ati i‑isi na dai nokotoni kita, tamine yokana‑ya dai mitaterani.

Ka! Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya dai ka‑kamina dai toha, fariseo dai toha na, dai ati kasiroteni. Dai ene manakone wadani. Keneko mese dai sorona, keneko doro dai awara‑nima dai ene na, mai noki‑ya dai ene amosabisa, dai atibodi towe tohabisineni. Yama‑ya mai bo‑boti mai toha, hini mai‑ya mai no‑nokotoni mai toha na, mai atibodi ati‑nima dai atibodi ati neni.
Fariseo dai toha, yama‑ya dai watora, keneko doro dai namosi baha, keneko mese dai namosahi. Ai atibodi amosi baha, ai ene amosahariteni.

Ka! Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya dai ka‑kamina dai toha, fariseo dai toha na, dai ati kasiroteni. Dai ene manakone wadani. Ai temene mese‑ya mai tihitakana‑nima dai neni. Ai temene mese amosa, bodi‑kaya ai tone tohabisineni.
Dai‑ya mai awa, dai atibodi amosamone mai ati na awineni. Dai atibodi towe hinama toha, mai ati‑nima dai atibodi terani.

Ka! Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya dai ka‑kamina dai toha, fariseo dai toha na, dai ati kasironeni. Dai ene manakone wadani. Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai tame yoberi‑ya dai wa‑wama, Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadabamaro mai tame‑ya yama amosa dai nawadateni.
‘Hibati‑ya oda sawemete‑mani, oda‑ka idi ene‑nima oda ene ra nemeteni. Hibati‑ya oda sawemete‑mani, Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai oda nanahabara nemeteni.’ Dai ati na, fara haa‑nima dai ati niya,
‘Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑ya oda‑ka idi nanahabematane.’ Dai ati nineni.
Fara dai‑ka idi ene‑nima dai ene naboneni.
Maka ihi‑nima dai ene na, maka yokana‑nima dai na, dai ene Deoso dai‑ya sarikanebonane.

Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita mai toha, yama‑ya mai wa‑wato mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha na, mai oyoseboneni. Oka yo‑yose mai one dai nanahaba, mai one awa‑ya dai nawaana naboneni. Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya oka mai one dai kosi, mai one dai kananihi naboneni.

Dai‑ka idi mai ihi‑nima dai ene na, mai ihi nafi yorotokawama‑nima dai ene manakone naboneni. Oka mai ihi amosa mai‑ya dai‑ka idi mai nanahabameteni. Abeo‑ya nanahabi bahe, mai dami‑ya mai nanahabamaki, Barakiya bidi i‑di Sakariya‑ya Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya dai‑ka idi mai nanahaba nameteni.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. Dai‑ka idi mai ihi yorotokana manakone‑nima dai ene manakone naboneni.

Yerosare, tika mai ihi ohi·oneni. Tiwa‑kaya mai wi‑wina Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita mai‑ya mai nanahabateni. Tika mai okasomabone ona, owati‑ya mai nofarani. Arakawa afe bodi‑ya bidi mai mookana, madi mai hikayawateni. Fara‑nima tika mai okayawabone ona, owa‑ya mai nofarani.
Tika mai fawaniya, tika yobe honita tohawamebonane.
Owati timitahi. Owa‑ya tika mai hiyara, eya mai ati naboneni.
‘Deoso tiwa‑ya yose, tiwa‑ya kasomayaho, oda ati nineni.’ Mai ati nabone,
mai ati ni awisari‑ya osawimatasaraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya oda naha, Yeso yanane, Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda ati yanana,
“Deoso‑ka yobe amosabote tiawaho.” Oda ati namaroni.
“Owati amosa dai mitahi. Hibayata yobe amose‑ya dai awineni. Yama one‑ya yobe wadamarebona, yati fama demenarimaraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Orifera adami‑ya oda kobona, oda nahokosa, Yeso‑ya oda daba, Yeso‑ya oda hiyara,
“Eme ai amoni niya, yobe ababonati? Tikamatasabone tina, yama faina‑bone kobonabone tina, yama koboni yanatoniya, hini yamata oda awibati, yama oda watowahi‑bone‑karo?” Oda ati namaroni.
Yeso oda‑ya hiyare,
“Dai noko wadahi. Dai‑ya mai keyeheriyahi.
‘Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika ama·oni.’ Mai dama mai ati naboneni.
Mai‑ka keyehe‑ya mai dama mai nofawahaboneni.

Owati dai mitamatasahi. Wami one‑kaya mai wi‑wina mai‑ka sodado ahini‑kaya mai kakeboneni, mai dami‑ya mai nanahababonehe. Ahini‑kaya mai wi‑wina mai‑ka sodado maa kowani‑kaya mai toka naboneni, mai‑ya mai nanahababonehe. Mai dami tafe tosiyabone, fimi ihi mai aba naboneni. Wami wawawakana naboneni. Haa‑nima yama na dai awiya, yama faina‑bone koboni yanatoneni.
Fana dori wadabone, dori kome yanani kita, dori wada kanibote na‑nima yama na tiwiya, yama faina‑bone yana kanibote naboneni.
Oka dai toha dai‑ya mai bisina, dai one‑ya mai nanahababoneni. Mai dama owa‑ya mai nofarabone, oka dai toha dai‑ya mai kakaboneni.
Owati‑ya mai tokadabamaro, owati‑ya mai nofami awiraboneni, mai damaro. Mai‑ka owa mai kaka, mai‑ka owa mai daanaboneni, mai hinahabebonaha.
‘Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita ama·oni.’ Mai one ati naboneni, keyehe‑ya mai hirinaro.
Mai ati‑ya mai dami nofaboneni.
Mai dama mai ati kasira, mai ihi owa‑ya dai one nofamaraboneni.
Owa oni dai saatonakosi awiriya, dai sibaraboneni.
(Yama towe waa, dai awiya, dai atibodi yama‑ya kadikahi, dai watowahabonehe.)
Deoso‑ka yobe doro‑ya yama towe wai, dai awiya, dai kananiyahi. Yodeya‑ya dai wi‑wina adami webote‑kaya dai tokiyahi.
Yama siri‑kaya dai naha, dai yehe honene yobe doro‑ya towadakosa, dai tonakamariyahi. Hiniya dai kananahi.
Fadara‑ya yama dai anina, dai‑ka bora one yobe‑ya toha, yobe‑ya dai tokomariyahi. Hiniya dai kananahi.
Ka! Mai fanawi naba toha, mai‑ka madehe i‑isi na toha na, mai kananiya yama ati kasiraboneni.
Deoso dai hiyarahi. Yama towe yananabone, yama siri kiti awirihi, sabado awirihi ni‑ya yama towe yanana, yama amosabisaboneni.

Yama towe koboniya, dai‑ya mai kako nafeboneni. Dai‑ya mai bisi, dai‑ya mai nanahaba naboneni. Adaho nowati‑ya haa‑nima yama ni awisarani, yama nabone kitabisaboneni. Deoso‑ka dai toha dai‑ya mai kako bi‑bidi namaro, dai‑ya mai kako kiti nafibisaboneni. Haa‑nima yamana, kobonamatasateraboneni.
Haa‑nima yama niya, yama nahoraboneni. Deoso yama‑ya maakare‑mana, dai nafi aba neni. Yama towe‑ya Deoso maakanebonane, hika mai one hasinabonehe.
Dai‑ya mai keyehebone,
‘Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika kobone. Ahiyata sawine.’ Mai one ati nihi,
‘Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika tabora one‑ya sawine.’ Mai one ati nihi naboneni.”
Haa‑nima mai ati na, mai ati dai nofariyahi.
‘Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika ama·oni.’ Mai one ati naboneni, keyehe‑ya mai hirinaro.
‘Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita ama·oni.’ Mai one ati nihi naboneni.
Mai ihi kiti nafeboneni, Deoso‑ka dai toha, mai‑ka keyehe‑ya dai nofabonehe.
Yama tamine okamina, fara koboniya, yama‑ya dai watowahaboneni.
‘Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika kabani‑ya waine.’ Mai ati niya,
mai ati dai nofariyahi. Dai tokariyahi.
‘Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika yobe doro‑ya sawine.’ Mai ati niya, mai ati dai nofariyahi.
Bahi yebekane ai nafi awateni. Bahi yebekane‑nima dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kakine, dai nafi awaboneni.
Bani bate home‑ya boko mai toka, bani bate dai watoteni. Fara‑nima dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kamataseya, dai nafi watowahaboneni.
Dai‑ya mai bisina mai amoni tosiyoya, mahi wehene fawa, abariko wehene fawa, amowa mai dama bofe‑ya mai fororo, neme‑kaya yama nafi wawawakana naboneni.
Haa‑nima yamana yananiya, neme‑ya dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke fodomakibona, mai nafi ohinawahaboneni. Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke‑ya mai awabone, neme sabi‑ya kisameya, wehene nafibonane. Ene kitebonane.
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai one‑ya yosebonane, hika mai‑ya mai yababonehe. Ho‑hori ati yananiya, wami nafi‑kaya mai wi‑wina Deoso‑ka mai toha mai‑ya mai yorotokanaboneni.
Owati‑nima yama niya, dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke koboni yanatone, kobo kanibote nebonane.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. Owati‑nima yama yanana‑ya mai awiya, mai one hasinasa niya, dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kobonebonane.
Owati‑nima yama naboneni. Neme, bofe na, ababisabone, owati‑ta abateraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke amoni, hika ora ne dai watorihi, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose neme‑ya mai sawe, mai hiwatorihi, Deoso Bidi hini amoni‑ya watorihi nane. Okobi ohari hiwatobisineni.
Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kamataseya, Nowe sawimata‑ka yama‑nima yama na yananamatasaboneni.
Faha kimisi awisari‑ya Nowe ati‑ya mai tokadabara, hiniya mai tafa, kawi‑ya mai fawa, mai fana mai na, mai ihi towe tohanasa niya, kanawa dori‑ya Nowe tokiyomematamonane.
Yama‑ya mai wato awisari‑ya faha kakiwaha, mai abawahametemoneni. Fara‑nima, yama‑ya mai wato awisari‑ya dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kobonamatasebonane.
Awa‑ya mai fama mai anina, okomiya, ohari owakame, owa‑ta towakosebonane.
Kimi‑ya mai fanawi fama tooniya, okomiya, ohare owakama, ohare towitakosa naboneni.
Dai noko wadahi. Dai‑ka hidi amoni dai watorani.
Ai‑ka yama‑ya botibona‑ka ora tamine‑ya ai mita, ai noko wadaboneni, ai‑ka yama‑ya botirebonaha.
Dai noko wadahi. Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kobonebona, dai one nimahinamareya, kobonebonane.
Owati dai mitahi. Hidi‑ka yo‑yose mai dama, hika yo‑yose ohari yama‑ya watone, hidi ati‑ya tokadabi amose, hidi ati ene mai one‑ka hidi tohawahebonane, mai‑ya natafebonaha.
Hidi koboneya, hidi ati‑nima ene ne, ya‑yainebonane.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. Yama dama‑ya hidi daanebonane, hinawadabonehe.
Hidi‑ka yo‑yose towe toheya, hidi‑ya nimani nafi,
‘Oka hidi kama kanibote re, kama kanibote ni awirebonane.’ Hika yo‑yose atibodi ati ne,
mai one‑ya bisi, kawi‑ya mai fawa mai‑ya daba neya,
hidi kama kanibote nebonane. Hika mahi, hika ora ne‑ya hika yo‑yose wato awirebonane.
Hidi kobonameya, hika yo‑yose towe‑ya bisini kitebonane. Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadabara mai sawi‑kaya hinawaibonane. Mai ohi, mai kome kita naboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine ohiyaramatasaboneni. Atona mai 10 kana nabarina‑ya mai akineni, mai‑ka naki fanabone maki‑ya mai nimanabonehe.
Atona mai 5 kana yama‑ya mai wato, atona mai one 5 kana yama‑ya mai watorani.
Yama‑ya mai watora nabarina‑ya mai aka, nabarina fahi one‑ya mai damakarani.
Yama‑ya mai watobisa nabarina fahi one‑ya mai damakaneni.
Maki mai nimahine, kama kanibote re, nokobisa ihi mai amoneni.
Yama soki bai‑ya ati yanane,
‘Maki fanebona kaki, dai awaho.’ Ati nene.
Mai nafi dodafe, mai‑ka nabarina bafiri‑ya mai sobanimisa,
yama‑ya mai wa‑wato nabarina fahi‑ya mai soroneni. Yama‑ya mai watora mai‑ka nabarina fahi wadara, mai one‑ka nabarina fahi kote‑ya mai haana,
‘Oda‑ka nabarina fahi‑ba dai daanahi. Oda‑ka nabarina owi yanatoneni.’ Mai ati nani.
‘Nabarina fahi oda daani awiraboneni. Oda‑ka nabarina fahi tosiyoriyahi. Nabarina fahi‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ya dai tokahi. Nabarina fahi dai kanikiyahi.’ Yama‑ya mai wa‑wato mai ati nani.
Nabarina fahi‑ya mai kanikabone mai toka, mai nowati‑ya maki kobone, mai hawa toha‑ta yobe‑ya mai tokiyoma, nokobi‑ya barikawame, mai tafineni.
Makobote nabarina fahi‑ya mai kanika mai kamake,
‘Anihi, anihi, nokobi seetikanahi.’ Mai ati neni.
‘Owati amosa dai mitahi. Dai owato awirini.’ Maki ati nebonane.
Dai noko wadahi. Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kobonebona, hika amoni, ora ne dai wato awirane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso oda‑ya kanawatobona, oda‑ya hiyare,
“Neme‑ke ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine dai mitamatasahi. Ai owa ati ene hika yo‑yose mai yorotokana, mai‑ya hiyare,
‘Okabone, oka yama dai nawadahi.’ Maki ati nane.
Hika yo‑yose owa yama‑ya wato nafi‑ya yinero webote 5 kane‑ya daanane. Hika yo‑yose owa‑ka yinero webote fame‑ya daanane. Hika yo‑yose owa yama‑ya wato nafire, yinero webote ohari‑ya daane,
‘Oka yinero dai nawadahi, yinero dodamebonaha.’ Yinero hidi ati ne, tokawahane.
Yinero webote 5 kane‑ya kayafe yama‑ya kanike, yama‑ya daanamaki, haa‑nima ne hika yinero webote 5 kanamaki‑ya kayafane.
Yinero webote fame‑ya kayafe yama‑ya kanike, yama‑ya daanamaki, haa‑nima ne hika yinero webote famamaki‑ya kayafane.
Yinero webote ohari‑ya kayafe toke, hodi‑ya wiine, hidi‑ka yinero‑ya kemone.
Amoni dame‑ya mai‑ka hidi kamatasane, hika yinero tamine‑ya mitebonaha.
Hibati‑ya yinero webote 5 kane‑ya kayafe kame, yinero webote 10 kane‑ya damane,
‘Ayo, tika yinero 5 kane daatinemari, yinero webote 10 kane tohawahane.’ Ati nane.
‘Tiwa ene amosa, owati‑nima tiwa ene na, hibati‑ya tika yama bide daa·onamaro, owati‑nima tina, tika yama dama‑ba daa·onaboneni. Ya‑yai·ona, ya‑yaitinaharihi.’ Yinero hidi ati nane.
Hibati‑ya yinero webote fame‑ya kayafe kame,
‘Ayo, oka yinero webote fame‑bona daatinamaro, yinero webote 4 kane tohawahane.’ Ati nane.
‘Tiwa ene amosa, owati‑nima tiwa ene na, hibati‑ya tika yama bide daa·onamaro, owati‑nima tina, tika yama dama‑ba daa·onaboneni. Ya‑yai·ona, ya‑yaitinaharihi.’ Yinero hidi ati nane.
Hibati‑ya yinero webote ohari‑ya kayafe kame,
‘Ayo, tiwa ene amosi awira, awa‑ya anitira, yamata marafakaniya, yamata tikayafateni.
Tika yinero ani·one, dodameya, yinero nafi tikayafaba awineni, owatibodi ati na, tika yinero okahemamaro, wami hodi‑ya. Hibayata wii·oni. Hibaha, tikayahamatasahi.’ Ati nane.
‘Towe amatini, refo tiharo. Oka yo‑yose‑ka yinero okayafamone tina,
bahako‑ya oka yinero daatina‑mani, okomiya, mai‑ka yinero kote okayafabisa neni.’ Yinero hidi ati nane.
‘Yinero webote ohari dai kayafe, yinero webote 10 kani‑ya kihe‑ya dai daanahi.
Hika yama toha, hika yama one daa·ona, yama nafi tohaboneni. Hika yama awira, oka yama‑ya damanamaterebonane.
Yama‑ya anire dai korotowitiho, yama soki nafe‑kaya mai ohinabone, mai kome kitaboneni.’ Hidi ati nane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai eyehe kamataseya, wehene nafi, hidi webote tohawahebonane.
Bofe‑ke dai toha dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke noko‑ya dai nafi yorotokanaboneni. Dai atibodi‑ya kadikeya, dai ene‑nima dai ene na‑ya haanebonane.
Ati dai one hikadabemari hika kanika‑ya mai nahaboneni. Ati dai one hikadabaremari hika sayo‑kaya mai naho naboneni.
Hidi webote‑ka kanika‑ya mai naha mai‑ya hiyarebona,
‘Okobi dai‑ya nofi nafine, dai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote ohawaha, owa‑ya dai sawiwahaboneni. Hibati‑ya yama nafi‑ya wamani awisareya, dai‑ya okayawamaroni.
Hibati‑ya ofime, owa tefe‑bone‑ya dai daa, owa bako hoka, oka faha‑bone‑ya dai daana, owa‑ya dai watora, dai‑ka yobe‑ya owa‑ya dai amonihi,
oka bora wadara, oka bora‑bone‑ya dai daa, kiya·ona, owa‑ya dai yobikana, kadeya‑ya ofoya, owa‑ya dai yobikana namaroni.’ Ati nebonane.
Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadabamaro mai ati yananaboneni.
‘Oda‑ka hidi amatini. Tifime, tiwa oda awara, tiwa tefe‑bone oda daani awirihi, tiwa bako hoka, tiwa oda awara, tika faha‑bone oda daani awirihi,
oda‑ka yobe‑ya amotirihi. Tika bora aba, tiwa oda awara, tika bora‑ba oda daarihi,
Tiwa kiyani tamine oda mitara, kadeya‑ya tifoya tiwa tamine oda mitara, tiwa oda yobikani awirihi namaroni.’ Mai ati naboneni.
Hidi webote mai‑ya hiyarebona,
‘Owati amosa dai mitahi. Oka mai one dai kasoma, owa‑ya dai kasomaharemaroni.’ Ati nebonane.
Sayo‑kaya mai naha mai‑ya hiyaramakine,
‘Towe dai amani. Owa‑ya dai sawirabone, yama hirini fawaterabone‑kaya dai tokabisahi. Yama hirini fawaterabone‑ya Deoso wamane, Diaboro hika yo‑yose mai eyehe‑ya sarikanebonaha.
Hibati‑ya ofime, owa tefe‑bone‑ya dai daarihi, owa bako hoka, oka faha‑bone‑ya dai daarihi,
dai tabaro‑ya oka, dai‑ka yobe‑ya owa‑ya dai nawinarihi, oka bora awira, oka bora‑bone‑ya dai daarihi, kiya·ona, kadeya‑ya ofoya ona, owa‑ya dai yobikarihi namaroni.’ Ati nebonane.
Sayo‑kaya mai naha mai ati yananabone,

‘Oda‑ka hidi amatini. Tifime tiwa oda awarihi, tiwa bako hoka, tiwa tamine oda mitarihi, tika bora awira tamine oda mitarihi, kiya tina, tiwa tamine oda mitarihi, kadeya‑ya tifoya, tiwa tamine oda mitarihi namaroni.’ Mai ati naboneni.
‘Owati amosa dai mitahi. Oka mai one dai kasomara, owa‑ya dai kasomahariramaroni.’ Ati nebonane.
Mai ihi amosara mai toka, mai kome fawateraboneni. Mai atibodi amosa mai abaterabone‑kaya mai tokaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yama nabone tamine‑ya hiyari hawa tohe, Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda‑ya hiyaramatase,
“Ai amoni fami‑ya ka‑kariwa‑ya ai marinabone, dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke‑ya mai daanaboneni, mai baahikanebonaha.” Ati nemarine.

Kaifo Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote amane. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai toha na, Kaifo‑ka yobe fowari barikane doro‑ya mai yorotokanamaroni.
Yeso‑ya mai kaka, mai awiri‑kaya Yeso‑ya mai wataboneni, Yeso‑ya mai nanahababonehe.
“Ai marinasa niya Yeso‑ya ai watiya, mai dama mai yawaba awineni. Ai marini hawa tohiya, Yeso ai wataboneni.” Mai ati namaroni.
Simaho hibati‑ya mese towe tohemari, kitamemarine. Betaniya‑kaya Simaho‑ka yobe‑ya mai tafiya,
yama mahi amosa‑ya fana damakana, kamakemaroni. Yama mahi amosa manakone nafe, yati amosa wamani‑ya wiye toha, Yeso tati‑ya sorohikanaremaroni.
Yama mahi amosa sorokari‑ya oda awa, oda yawa,
“Hini yamata‑bone yama mahi amosa‑ya Yeso tati‑ya fana sorokariti? Yama mahi amosa manakone fotateni.” Oda ati namaroni.

“Yama mahi amosa manakone fota, Yeso tati‑ya sorotikanarira‑mani, oda‑ya daatibisiya, mai one‑ya oda daaniya, manakone oda waratokaniya, yinero‑ya mai kihara mai‑ya yinero oda daaniya, yama sibabisara neni.” Oda ati namaroni.
Oda ati‑ya Yeso mite,
“Dai ati fawanahi. Fana ihi amosineni.
Yamata mai kihara dai‑ya mai sawiteni. Dai‑ya mai sawe, mai sawi fawateraboneni. Owa‑ta owa sawi yaboraboneni.
Ai abiya, ai abo‑ya yama mahi amosa‑ya dai sorokariteni. O·ababone, owa‑ya fana sorokari dai tohineni.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. Yama nafi‑kaya Deoso ati amosabote tamine‑ya mai hiyariya, fana ihi amosa tamine‑ya mai hiyarahareboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ka oda 12 kana oda‑ka owa i‑di Yoda Isikari·oti amane. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai‑ya i‑di Yoda Isikari·oti tokematane.
“Yeso dai‑ya daa·onibone, hini yamata‑ya owa‑ya dai daanibati?” Yoda ati nematane.
Barata wamani 30 kane‑ya mai kadika, Yoda‑ya mai daahinematane.
Yoda toke,
“Mai dama mai awiri‑kaya Yeso daa·onaboneni.” Yoda atibodi ati nematane.
Ka‑kariwa‑ka semana‑ya baho femeto‑ya ketehera‑ya Yodeo mai kabateni. Ka‑kariwa‑ka mahi daidi‑ya Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda one ati yanana,
“Ebeni‑kaya ai marinibati? Ai tefe‑ba oda aninabonehe.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yeso ati yanane,
“Maki dai awiya, hika yobe‑ya dai tokiya,
‘Ai‑ya ka‑kanawato‑ka mahi kobonemona ati nene. Tika yobe‑ya ai‑ya ka‑kanawato oda eyehe tafebona, kaneiro bidi oda tabasinaboneni.’ Dai ati nahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑nima mai na, ka‑kariwa‑ka yamata‑bone‑ya mai aninamaroni.
Mahi bidi‑ya oda 12 kana oda eyehe Yeso tafemarine.
Oda tafiya, Yeso ati yanane,
“Owati amosa dai mitahi. Owa‑ya dai‑ka owa daanebonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya oda mita, oda atibodi a‑arira, oda ati yanana,
“Ayo, owa tohi awiraba awineni.” Oda nafi ati namaroni.
“Dai‑ka owa ohari owa‑ya daanebona, yama wiye ohare‑ya owa eyehe tafane.
Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke abebona yama hani ati na, fara yama hani ati‑nima abebonane. Owa‑ya kahabane‑ka ene towe manakone nafi bonane. Ka! Wadare‑mana, yama amosabisa neni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yoda Isikari·oti Yeso‑ya kahabanebona, ati yanane,
“Ai‑ka Ka‑kanawato webote amatini. Owa tamine tohi awiraba awineni.” Ati ne,
“Fara tiwa amani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai tafa, baho‑ya Yeso damane, Deoso‑ya hiyare, baho‑ya bakanakose, Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda‑ya baho‑ya daane, ati yanane,
“Dai kabahi, owa abano tamine‑bone amani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Dai nafi hifihi.
Owa emene tamine‑bone amani. Owa emene tokabone, o·ababone, mai dama mai ihi manakone onahababoneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati yananamatase,
“Owati dai mitahi. Okobi ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona, yanani awisareya, awa bono fahi ofimaterabone, yananeya, awa bono fahi wamani yati dai eyehe ofimatasaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Deoso‑ka wayoma ohare‑ya oda hirina, makobote Orifera adami‑kaya oda tokawahamaroni.
“Owa‑ya kobonabone dai awiya, dai kananaboneni. Owa‑ya dai dabamaraboneni. Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑nima yama nabone,
‘Kaneiro mai‑ya na‑nawada onahabiya, kaneiro mai kananaboneni.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Okitamiya, Karireya‑kaya okabone, owa‑kaya dai tokomakiyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ayo, mai kananibisaba awineni. Owa‑ta kana·oteraboneni.” Bedoro ati nemarine.
“Ai fama, ai ababa awineni. O·abi‑ya yama sibaraboneni.
‘Yeso owatorini.’ Oteraboneni.” Bedoro ati nemarine.
Haa‑nima oda nafi ati namaroni.
Kesemani‑kaya oda toka, Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda‑ya hiyare,
“A‑ahi‑ya dai nahohi. Ahiyata‑ya okaboneni, Deoso‑ya ohiyarabonehe.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Bedoro, Sebedeo bidi mai fama, mai na, mai‑ya Yeso himane, ahiyata‑ya mai tokamaroni. Yeso atibodi a‑arire, atibodi ohini kitawahemarine.
Mai‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Owatibodi yawi kitini, fara yawa ihi o·abi yanatoneni. A‑ahi‑ya dai naha, dai noko wadahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Ahiyata‑ya Yeso toke, hini home‑ya hini tamine‑ya Deoso‑ya hiyare,
“Abi, yama towe yananabone, yama kobonabone onofarini. Owati‑nima yama riyahi. Hini tiwati‑nima yama nibisiyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso waamisame, kame, hika mai amona, Bedoro‑ya hiyare,
“‘Dai noko wadahi.’ Ona,
hiniya dai amoneni. Ora ohari awisareya, hiniya dai amoneni.
Dai noko wadahi. Deoso‑ya dai hiyarahi, Satanasi ati‑ya dai tokadabarabonehe. Dai atibodi amosa, dai abano kitarani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Ahiyata‑ya Yeso tokomatase, Deoso‑ya hiyare,
“Abi, mai ihi manakone owa nanahabi awiriya, mai ihi manakone fawaterabone tiniya, Tiwati‑nima onaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso kamatase, nokobisa ihi mai amonamatasamaroni.
Yeso tokomatase, yama abiya nofare, hini tamine‑ya Deoso‑ya hiyaramatasemarine.
Yeso kamatase, mai amonasa na,
“Dai nahomisamahi. Ai tokomahi. Yama one‑ya dai amonaboneni. Hibayata Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadabara mai‑ya owa‑ya daanebona kamane, ahiyata‑ya.” Yeso ati nemarine.

Yeso hiyaranasa neya, oda 12 kana oda‑ka owa i‑di Yoda‑ya mai dama mai eyehe kamemarine. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai toha na, mai ati ihi Yoda‑ya mai dami sawemaroni. Yima‑ya mai one aka, awa‑ya mai one aka namaroni.
Hibati‑ya Yoda mai‑ya hiyare,
“Yeso‑ya dai‑ya yofi·okanabone, Yeso toma·onabone, fare dai waratonayaho.” Yoda ati nematane.
Yeso‑ya Yoda kame,
“Ayo, kobo·onamini.” Ati ne, fai‑ya tomanemarine.
“Naki, tiwa ene‑bone tina kanibote tinahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ya mai waratonamaroni, fai‑ya mai towakamabonehe.
Yeso‑ya oda daba, oda‑ka ohari yima‑ya nawaane, yima‑ya sobanaki, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote‑ya na‑narifa narabo‑ya tarinabasemarine.
“Tika yima foyamahi, hini bori‑ya. Mai one‑ya yima‑ya mai nanahabiya, yima ihi mai abahariteni.
Tiwa habo siitoriyahi. Okobi haa·ona‑mani, hika yo‑yose 6.000 mai yorotokana, mai one 6.000 mai yorotokana, mai one 6.000 mai yorotokana, mai yorotokana 12 mai kana owa‑ya mai kasoma neni.
Owa‑ya mai watabone, Deoso‑ka yama hani ati na, fara ihi owa‑ya mai watineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai dama, mai sawe, mai‑ya Yeso hiyare,

“Yima‑ya dai aka, awa‑ya dai aka nineni, owa‑ya dai watabonehe. Yama‑ya mai bo‑boti mai wati‑nima owa‑ya dai watineni. Hibati‑ya mahi‑nima Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya owitare, mai okanawata, owa‑ya dai wataramaroni.
Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑nima yama nawahabone, owa‑ya dai watineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda habo siitona, oda kananamaroni.

Yeso‑ya mai waratona, Yeso‑ya mai towakamameteni, Kaifo‑ya. Kaifo Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote amane. Kaifo tabaro‑ya Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai toha na, mai‑ka hidi webote tabaro‑ya mai yorotokanameteni.
Yama yaki‑ya Bedoro yoto, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote‑ka yobe fowari barikane doro‑ya tokomaki, sekorasa eyehe itabase, Yeso tamine‑ya mitebona,
“Hini yamata‑nima mai naba, Yeso‑ya mai wata?” Bedoro atibodi ati nematane.

Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai one nafi toha na, mai yorotokanameteni. Yeso tamine‑mona‑ya keyehe‑ya mai hirinabone, hidi hini mai one‑ya mai keyehebone, mai one‑ya mai sibanameteni, Yeso‑ya mai nanahababonehe.
Yeso tamine‑mona‑ya mai dama keyehe‑ya mai hirina, owa ati bare toha, owa ati bare toha, owa ati bare toha, mai nameteni, keyehe‑ya mai hirinaro. Makobote mai one fama keyehe‑ya mai hirinamake,
“‘Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya onahabiya, mahi 3 kane‑ya yobe wama·onamatasaboneni.’ Yeso ati nene.” Mai ati nameteni.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote waamise,
“Yeso, mai ati timitineni? Hini yamata‑nima tiwati nibati?” Ati ne,
Yeso ati yanare,
“Yeso, Deoso yokana tiwa‑ya watone, tiwati yananahi. Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika amatiraniha? Deoso Bidi amatini?” Mai‑ka hidi webote ati nematane.
“Hehe, tiwati‑nima, fara ama·oni. Deoso mano kanika‑ya owitariya, kitabote ohawahiya, owa‑ya dai awa kanibote naboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ati‑ya mai‑ka hidi webote mite, yawe, hika bora namidi‑ya sibikari, ati yanane,
“Yeso hini ati ene abaho. Mai one ati hini tohiya, Deoso Bidi‑mona ati ne, keyehe‑ya hirinane. Haa‑nima mai ati na, mai‑ya ai nanahabateni.
Hini yamata‑nima dai ati niti?” Mai‑ka hidi webote ati ne,
“Yeso towe amane. Abaho!” Mai ati nameteni.
Yeso noko‑ya mai firo, noko mai bata, mai one koohinisa hinematane.
“Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika amatini. Yama nafi tiwata, ebeni‑ke tiwa‑ya koonisa?” Mai ati nameteni.
Yobe fowari barikane doro‑ya mai one dama mai naha mai‑ya Bedoro waiya, hidi webote‑ya atona na‑narifa one kamake,
“Yeso Karireya‑ke‑ya sa‑sawi amatiraniha?” Atona ati nameteni.
Mai nafi narabi‑ya Bedoro ati yanane,
“Maki‑ya osawiterani. Tiwati owatorini.” Bedoro ati nematane.
Yobe fowari barikane‑ka nokobi‑kaya toke, wai‑ya hidi webote‑ya na‑narifa one atona Bedoro‑ya awa, mai one‑ya hiyara,
“Nokobi‑kaya wai Yeso Nasare‑ke‑ya sa‑sawi amane.” Atona ati nameteni.
“Keyehe‑ya hiri·oterani. Keyehe‑ya hiri·oniya, Deoso owa‑ya nanahabe awane. Yeso owatoterani.” Bedoro ati nematane.
Mai naho bide tohiya, yobe fowari barikane doro‑ya mai naha Bedoro‑ya mai hiyara,
“Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai‑ka owa amatini? Yeso ati yanani‑nima tiwati yananineni.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Keyehe‑ya hiri·oterani. Keyehe‑ya hiri·oniya, Deoso owa‑ya nanahabeba awane. Maki owato awirini.” Bedoro ati nematane.
Bedoro ati fawaneya, arakawa maki haanawahematane.
Arakawa haani‑ya mite, Yeso ati‑ya Bedoro atibodi watinawame,
“Arakawa haani awisareya,
‘Yeso owatorini.’ Tinaboneni.
Tiwati yanani 3 kana boneni.” Yeso ati ne,
ati‑ya Bedoro atibodi watinawame, toke, ohini kitawahematane.
Yama wahabisari‑ya Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai toha na, mai ibi hiyara,
“Ai ati ene Yeso‑ya mai nanahabahi.” Mai ati nameteni.
Yeso mano‑ya mai sokikasa, Birato‑ya mai hiwakame, mai daahinematane. Birato kofenado amane.

Yoda Yeso‑ya hibati‑ya daane, Yeso abebona‑ya awe, atibodi a‑arinamare, barata wamani 30 kane mai daahine‑ya daatonamatasebona, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai toha na, mai‑ya Yoda hiyare,
“Towe ama·oni. Ene towe tohare‑ya daa·obisani.” Yoda ati ne,
“Tiwa ene amani. Oda ene tohi awirani.” Mai ati nameteni.
Deoso‑ka yobe doro‑ya yinero‑ya Yoda korotokawiti, toke, hini namidi‑ya yaditone, abawahematane.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi, yinero‑ya mai yaba, mai ati yanana,
“Ai owa abebona manakone amane. Ai manakone‑ya Deoso kayafaterene.” Mai ati nameteni.
Yoda‑ka yinero‑ya yiwaha wa‑wama‑ka fadara‑ya mai kanikameteni, bara mai aba mai tame bonehe.
Fara ihi “Fadara Ama Kiha” oni tohawaha, oni tohanasa neni.
I‑di Yeremiya Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑ka owa amane. I‑di Yeremiya yama‑ya kanahanomata‑nima yama nawaha,
“‘Ai owa manakone barata wamani 30 kanebonane.’ Yodeo mai ati na,
fare‑ya mai daanaboneni.
Yiwaha‑ya wa‑wama‑ka fadara‑ya mai kanikaboneni. Deoso owa‑ya yose‑nima mai naboneni.” Yeremiya ati nematane.
Birato noko‑ya Yeso wai, Yeso‑ya Birato hiyare,
“Yodeo mai‑ka hidi webote amatiraniha?” Ati ne,
“Tiwati‑nima, fara ama·oni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai toha na, Yeso ene towemona tamine‑ya keyehe‑ya mai hirina, Yeso ati yanarematane.
“Yeso, mai ati timitineni? Tiwa ene yokana tamine tikaminabisahi.” Birato ati nematane.
Yeso ati yanare,
“Ka! Hini yamata‑bone Yeso ati yanarihi?” Birato atibodi ati nematane.
Ka‑kariwa‑ya oda mariniya, ai owa ohari‑ya Birato seekitine, mai yofihikane‑ya Birato seehikatene.
Hibati‑ya Barabasi ene towe dame, kadeya‑ya waimatane.
Birato‑ka yobe‑ya mai dama mai yorotokana, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Ebeni‑ke see·okabati? Barabasi toha, Yeso, Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika‑mona toha nabana?” Birato ati nematane.
Mai‑ka hidi mai atibodi ati‑ya i‑di Birato wato, Yeso‑ya mai dama mai nofa, mai ihi Yeso‑ya hidi mai kakoteni.
Hidi‑ka kadera‑ya Birato itariya, Birato fadi ati‑ya mai kamina,
“Yeso ene towe tohi awire, weetirayaho. Amo·ona, Yeso wadari oawani, wada ihi owa habo siitoneni.” Birato fadi ati nameteni.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai toha na, mai dama mai‑ya hiyare, mai ati ihi Yeso‑ya mai nofara, i‑di Barabasi‑ya mai nofabisameteni.
Mai dami‑ya Birato hiyare,
“Ebeni‑ke see·okabati?” Ati ne,
“Barabasi‑ta.” Mai dami ati nameteni.
“Yeso i‑di Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika‑mona ati ne, hini yamata‑nima obati?” Birato ati nematane.
“Awa‑ya baakanaho.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Hini yamata ihi baa·okabati? Ene towe wadarene.” Birato ati nematane.
Hiniya mai ati kitawaha,
“Awa‑ya baakanaho, baakanaho.” Mai ati nameteni.
Birato ati‑ya mai tokadabara, mai ati hamawahameteni. Faha‑ya Birato haane, hini yehe‑ya sokone,
“Owa ene tohi awirini. Dai ene amani.” Birato ati nematane.
“Oda ene amani. Oda ati ene tinahabaho. Yeso abe manakone oda‑ya toha, oda‑ka nodi mai‑ya tohahari nebonane.” Mai ati nameteni.
Birato ati ene Barabasi‑ya mai seekana, Yeso‑ya mai kosina, sodado mai‑ya Birato yosematane, Yeso‑ya mai baakanabonehe.
Birato‑ka sodado Birato‑ka yobe doro‑ya Yeso‑ya mai towakama, Yeso waiya sodado mai dama mai yorotokanameteni.
Yeso borone‑ya mai taninisa, hidi‑ka bora a‑asabina‑ya Yeso weyenawahematane.
Hidi‑ka sabewa‑nima yama na‑bone mado atona‑ya sodado mai kemonama, Yeso tati‑ya mai hiwatare, Yeso yehe kanika‑ya awa bide‑ya mai daana, mai yobati‑kaya mai naha, Yeso‑ya mai yasina,
“Yodeo mai‑ka hidi webote amatini.” Hiniya mai yasina, mai ati nameteni.
Yeso‑ya mai firona, awa bide damahina‑ya mai waratona, Yeso tati‑ya mai kosinameteni.
Mai yasini hawa toha, hidi‑ka bora‑ya mai taninisama, Yeso hini hika bora‑ya weyenamatase, mai towakamameteni, mai baahikanebonaha.
Mai tokiya, Simaho Sireni‑ke‑ya mai awa, Sodado mai ati ihi Yeso ewene‑bona‑ya Simaho diwanematane.
Kokota‑kaya mai kobona, yara ati‑ya adami oni ‘Ai Tati Tone Wai’ tohani.
Yeso‑ya mai baakana, baakani hawa tohe, Yeso borone‑ya mai kayafabone, yati bide‑ya mai werena, mai kiihinameteni, borone hikayafebonaha.
Bora kayafi hawa tohiya, mai naha, Yeso‑ya mai kakatomameteni.
Yama ihi ababone tamine‑ya mai kanahana, Yeso tati neme‑kaya yama hani‑ya mai kanawaanameteni.
“Yeso, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi webote amane.” Yeso tati neme‑kaya yama hani kawana ati namaroni.
Yama‑ya mai bo‑boti mai fama mai‑ya mai baakanaharimaroni. Yeso mano kanika‑ya owa mai baahikana, Yeso mano sayo‑kaya owa mai baahikana hinemarine.
Hawi‑ya mai yakana Yeso baakane awa‑ya waane‑ya mai awa, Yeso‑ya mai weena, mai tati weona, mai ati yanana,
“Ka! Deoso‑ka yobe tinahabiya, mahi 3 kane‑ya wamatinamatasebona tina, tiwa‑ya tikasomahi. Deoso Bidi amatini, tikisamahi.” Mai ati namaroni.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai toha na, Yeso‑ya mai weena,
“Mai one‑ya kasomemari, hini kasomi‑ya wato awire, ai‑ka wami hidi webote tohemona ati ne, awa‑ya kisameya, ai awiya, ati ai nofamakibonane.
Deoso ati‑ya nofemona ati ne, Deoso hinakisameba awane. Deoso Bidi‑mona Deoso hikayaweba awane.” Mai ati nameteni.
Yama‑ya mai bo‑boti Yeso eyehe awa‑ya mai mai baahikana, Yeso‑ya mai weenahare, mai one ati‑nima mai ati nameteni.
Mahi nokorise‑ya mahi wehene fawane, 3 ora‑ya wehene yananamatasemarine.
Fara 3 ora‑ya Yeso ati yanane, ati kite,
“Eri, Eri, rama sabakani.” Yeso ati ne,
Ai ati‑ya
“Oka Deoso amatini. Oka Deoso amatini. Hini yamata ihi owa‑ya tikahabaniti?” Ati nematane.
Mai sawe Yeso ati‑ya mai mita,
“Eriya‑ya haane awane.” Mai ati nameteni.
Yeso ati‑ya maki mite, fino‑kaya kanani tokome, yama kitara‑ya fino kofate‑ya sorokari, awa bide‑ya dasihinakosa, yorihikamisamakemeteni, Yeso hifebonehe.
“Ai nimanaho, Eriya kameba awane, Yeso‑ya kasomebonaha.” Mai one ati nameteni.
Yeso eekane, abawahematane.
Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya bora kita winamaro, Yeso abeya, bora tati‑ya kebi yanana, nafi kebemeteni. Wami wawawakana, yati webote one wakakanamaroni.
Deoso ati‑ya mai nofamete mai tame‑ya seekane, mai one dama mai kitamamaroni.
Yeso abeya wami wawawakana, mahi wehene fawa ne‑ya sodado mai awa, mai habi siitonameteni.
“Deoso Bidi amane. Keyehe tohi awirini.” Mai ati nawahameteni.
Ahiyata to‑toha ni‑ya mai fanawi dama nahameteni. Fara hibati‑ya Karireya‑ya Yeso yakaneya mai kasomamaro, Yeso tokeya, mai fanawi tokomakemaroni.
I‑di Mariya Madarena toha, i‑di Yako, i‑di Yose mai‑ka ami i‑di Mariya toha, Sebedeo fadi toha na, mai fanawi one‑ya mai sawemeteni.
Yama soki bide‑ya Yose Arimateya‑ke kamemarine. Yeso ati‑ya Yose nofe, hika yinero damemarine.
Birato‑ya Yose toke, Yeso abo‑ya haanematane, hinafoyebonaha. Birato ati ene Yeso abo‑ya sodado mai daanameteni, Yose‑ya.
Yeso abo‑ya towakame, bora yati‑ya kinihikanematane.
Yose ati ene ai temene‑ka yati hodi‑bone mai wamahinamete, fara‑ya Yeso abo hinafoye, yati webote‑ya horonawame, hodi‑ya barikane, tokomematane.
Mariya Madarena, i‑di Mariya, mai fama, Yeso foye‑ya mai kakatomameteni.
Mahi owa‑ya feriado hawa tohiya, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, fariseo mai toha na, Birato‑ya mai tokameteni.
“Naki, Yeso hasinasa neya,
‘O·abiya, mahi 3 tohe‑ya okitamaboneni.’ Yeso ati ne, keyehe‑ya hirinane.

Tiwati ihi Yeso temene‑ya sekorasa mai nahohi. Mahi 3 kaniya, hika mai da‑daba abo mai hibotirayaho. Abo mai hibotiya, Yeso kitamane mai ati naba awineni. Yeso kitamane mai ati niya, yama a‑ariraboneni.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Sibarini, sekorasa mai dai yosehi. Dai ati ene Yeso temene‑ya mai nahohi, Yeso abo‑ya mai botirabonehe.” Birato ati nematane.
Mai toka, nokobi‑ya hidi oni korimari mai nawaanameteni. Nokobi‑kaya sekorasa mai nahameteni.
Sabado‑ya mai fanawi tokara, Domiko yama wahabisari‑ya Mariya Madarena, Mariya mai fama, Yeso temene‑ya mai towakamameteni.
Mai yakakaniya, wami wawawakanamaroni. Deoso‑ka yo‑yose neme‑ya kise, yati webote‑ya karotowiti, yati mese‑ya itarimatane.
Bahi yebekane wehene‑nima Deoso‑ka yo‑yose wehene ne, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose borone sa‑sawani kitematane.
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose‑ya sekorasa mai awa, mai habi siitona, mai wawawakana, mai abakosameteni.
Yeso temene‑ya mai fanawi kobokana, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai‑ya hiyare,
“Dai habo siitoriyahi. Yeso mai baahikane dai awebona dai ati na,
haa‑ya awimare, kitame, abo fori‑ke yama dai awahi. Kitamebona ati ne, kitamawahane.
Dai towakama kanibote nahi. Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai‑ya dai hiyariyahi.
‘Yeso kitame, Karireya‑kaya tokebona, dai tokomakihi, Yeso dai awabonehe.’ Dai ati niyahi.
Fara owati‑nima yama naboneni.” Ati nematane.
Mai fanawi towaka kanibote na, mai habi siitona, mai ya‑yainaharemeteni. Mai kanani kamameteni, oda‑ya mai hiyarabonehe.
Mai kanani kakama, Yeso mai‑ya kobone, mai‑ya hiyarematane. Yeso‑ya mai awa, Yeso teme‑ya mai damana, Yeso‑ya mai kahiyarameteni.
Hawi‑ya mai fanawi yakana, Yerosare‑ya sekorasa mai one kobona, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai‑ya yama tamine‑ya mai kaminameteni.
Sekorasa mai ati‑ya mai mita, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai‑ya mai daba, mai yorotokana, mai ibi hiyarameteni. Sekorasa‑ka yinero webote‑bona‑ya mai daanameteni, keyehe‑ya mai hirinabonehe.
“‘Yama soki‑ya oda amoniya, Yeso abo‑ya hika mai da‑daba mai botenini.’ Dai ati nahi.
Dai tamine Birato miteya, oda ati ene dai‑ya bisini awirebonane.” Mai ati nameteni.
Yinero‑ya sekorasa mai kayafa, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai ati‑nima mai ati nawahamaroni. Mai ati‑ya Yodeo mai dami mita,
“Yeso abo‑ya hika mai da‑daba mai botenini.” Yodeo mai ati nasa nani.
Karireya‑ya oda 11 kana oda tokamaroni. Hibati‑ya adami webote Yeso yofihikana, fara‑ya oda tokamaroni.
Yeso oda awa, oda ya‑yaina, oda kahiyaremarine.
“Yeso tohi awire.” Oda one atibodi ati namaroni.
Makobote Yeso oda‑ya kobone, oda‑ya hiyare,
“Neme, Bofe na‑ka hidi ohawahineni.
Mai tabori dami‑ya dai tokahi. Owa tamine dai hiyarahi. Mai‑ya dai habanirisahi. Okobi, Deoso Bidi, Deoso‑ka Doni ne oni‑ya mai weyenaboneni.
Owati nafi‑ya dai kanawatohi, owati‑ya mai tokadababonehe. Dai tokiya, dai‑ya osawebone, dai honita tohateraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso Kirisito tamine amosabote amane. Yeso Kirisito, i‑di Deoso Bidi tamine okanahanaboneni.
Hibati‑ya yama kobonabone tamine‑ya i‑di Isa·iya kanahanomatane.
“Owati timitahi. Oka yo‑yose bofe‑ke oyoseboneni, tiwa hawine‑bone‑ya hawa tonihibonaha.
Fare bofe‑ke mai‑ka owa kabani‑kaya ati yananeya,
‘Ai‑ka Hidi webote hawine‑bona dai namosahi.’ Ati nebonane.” Deoso ati ne, ati‑ya i‑di Isa·iya kanahanomatane.
Isa·iya ati‑mata‑nima Yowaho Batita koboni dai tohe, kabani‑kaya mai‑ya hiyare,
“Dai atibodi yama‑ya kadikiya, eya dai atibodi ati nahi.
‘Deoso, oda ene amosaramaro, oda tikasomahi, oda ene amosawamabonehe.’ Dai ati nahi.
Eya dai atibodi ati niya, Deoso dai ene manakone‑ya haanamarebona, dai‑ya haba·onirisaboneni.” Yowaho Batita ati ne, ati damemarine.
Yodeya‑ya mai wi‑wina mai tokomaki, Yerosare‑ya mai wi‑wina mai tokomaki na, i‑di Yowaho Batita‑ya mai tokomakemaroni.
“Owa ene towe amani.” Mai ati na,
Yodaho Faha‑ya i‑di Yowaho Batita mai‑ya habanirisemarine.
Kamero kone wamani‑ya Yowaho Batita weye, bani ataro wamani‑ya dosi‑ya sokinaki nemarine. Yowaho Batita yamata‑ya kihare, ti‑tiri mai‑ya kaba, mo‑mona mai fahi‑ya fawa nemarine.
Yowaho Batita eya ati ne,
“Ai owa kamakibona, kitabotebisa amane. Owa‑ta towebisa ama·oni. Amosabotebisa amane.
Faha‑ya dai‑ya haba·onirisa, ai owa koboneya, ati ene Deoso‑ka Doni dai one‑ya sawiwahebonane.” Yowaho Batita ati ne, ati damemarine.
Yowaho Batita mai‑ya hiyareya, Yeso kamakimarine. Nasare Karireya‑kaya yanane, kamaki, Yodaho Faha‑ya Yeso‑ya i‑di Yowaho Batita habanirisemarine.
Faha‑ya Yeso habanise, waamisame, neme seekana, Deoso‑ka Doni kisemarine, Yeso‑ya. Wayomata awi‑nima Deoso‑ka Doni awinemarine.
Neme‑ya ati kaki,
“Oka Dao amatini. Tiwa onofi nafineni. Tiwa ene amosa ene ya‑yai·oneni.” Ati nemarine.
Deoso‑ka Doni ati ene kabani‑ya Yeso tokawahemarine.
Kabani‑ya Yeso winawahe, amoni 40 kane bani kabani‑ka mai‑ya dabematane. Satanasi Yeso‑ya hiyarematane, Deoso ati‑ya tokadabamarebonaha. Deoso‑ka yo‑yose Yeso‑ya mai kasomameteni.
Yowaho Batita‑ya sodado mai wata, kadeya‑ya mai hinafoyemarine. Fare nowati‑ya Karireya‑kaya Yeso tokomatasemarine. Deoso ati amosabote‑ya Yeso kaminemarine.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,
“Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebonane. Dai ene towe‑ya dai nofamariyahi. Deoso ati amosabote ati dai nofahi.” Yeso ati ne, ati damemarine.
Karireya‑ka wara webote widi‑ya Yeso tokobase, Simaho, sohori i‑di Anidere‑ya fame, hedi‑ya mai kerokana, mai‑ya Yeso awematane. Fara aba mai‑ya mai na‑nawasi mai tohamaroni.
Yeso mai‑ya himane,
“Hima, owa‑ya dai dabahi. Owa tamine dai hiyarawahaboneni. Hibati‑ya aba mai‑ya dai nawasiteni. Hibayata owati‑ya mai nofabone mai‑ya dai sibanaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, mai‑ka hedi towitakosa, Yeso‑ya mai dabawahameteni.
Mai toka, i‑di Tiyako, sohori i‑di Yowaho‑ya fame‑ya Yeso awematane. Mai‑ka abi i‑di Sebedeo‑ya mai daba, kanawa dori‑ya mai mookana, mai‑ka hedi‑ya mai awawamameteni.
Yeso mai‑ya awe, mai‑ya himanamakitase, mai‑ka abi‑ka yama‑ya mai a‑ani mai eyehe tofoyakose, bidi‑ta Yeso‑ya mai dabameteni.
Kafanaho‑ya mai toka, sabado‑ya Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya Yeso tokiyome, mai‑ya kanawatomarine.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita,
“Se! Yeso yama hani ati‑ya wato nafine. Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina haa‑nima mai ati ni awirani. Yama hani hidi ati‑nima Yeso ati nibisane.” Mai atibodi ati namaroni.
Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya maki madi towe foye‑ke sawi, Yeso‑ya haane,
“Yeso Nasare‑ke hini yamata‑nima tinaba? Oda‑ya bisitiriyahi. Tiwa owatoni. Deoso‑ka amosabote amatini.” Madi towe ati nemarine.
“Tiwati fawanahi. Maki‑ya tifoyamariyahi.” Yeso madi towe‑ya weene, ati nemarine.
Madi towe ene maki yehe, teme ne, weokanemarine. Madi towe ati kite, toke, maki amosawamemarine.
Yeso ene‑ya mai awa, mai atibodi yama‑ya kadika, mai ibi hiyara,
“Se! Hibati‑ya haa‑nima ai ene na ai awaterani. Hini yamata ihi Yeso ati kite, ati‑ya madi towe mai tokadabateni.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yeso tamine‑ya mai kaminamaroni. Karireya‑ka tabora dami‑ya Yeso ene tamine‑ya mai mitamaroni.
I‑di Yeso, i‑di Simaho, i‑di Anidere, i‑di Tiyako, i‑di Yowaho mai na, Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe doro‑ya mai yanana, i‑di Simaho, i‑di Anidere mai‑ka yobe doro‑ya mai tokiyamameteni.
Simaho‑ka koma kiyana, hiwe nafe, kawina tamine‑ya mai kaminameteni.
Simaho‑ka koma yahi‑ya Yeso waratokane, hiidimisameteni. Simaho‑ka koma kitama, hiwe fawana, mai tafe‑bone‑ya awawahameteni.
Yama soki yanatoni‑ya mai kiyana mai toha, madi towe mai sawi‑ka mai toha na, Yeso‑ya mai mai hiwakamamaroni.
Tabora‑ka Yeso‑ya mai nafi kamake, yobe‑ka nokobi‑ya mai nahamaroni.
Yeso mai‑ya awe, mai kiyana mai dami‑ya nakitamemarine. Madi towe Yeso‑ya mai wata, Yeso tamine‑ya mai kaminabone, Yeso ati ene madi towe mai ati yanara, mai kananineni.
Yama wahi yanatoni‑ya kabani‑ya Yeso tokematane, Deoso‑ya hiyarebonaha.
I‑di Simaho hika mai eyehe Yeso‑ya sibanematane.
Yeso‑ya mai wasiwama, Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Tiwa oda sibana, mai nafi tiwa‑ya sibanani.” Mai ati nameteni.
Yeso ati yanane,
“Hima, tabora one‑ya ai tokahi, Deoso ati‑ya mai one‑ya okaminamakitasaboneni. Mai tabori dami‑ya Deoso ati ohiyarabone okamaroni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Karireya‑kaya tabora dami‑ya Yeso tokawahe, Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe dami‑ya Deoso ati‑ya Yeso hiyare, madi towe mai‑ya kananiwahemarine.
Mese towe tohe kaki, Yeso noko‑ya yobati‑kaya waaki, Yeso‑ya hiyare,
“Haa‑nima ai‑na ai kasomi tiwata, owa kasomi tinofakarini?” Ati nemarine.
Yeso maki‑ya nofe, fai‑ya boyone, ati yanane,
“Onofini, tiwa mese amosawamahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Hika yama kome fawanawaha, mese amosawamemarine.
Maki‑ya Yeso yose kanibote ne,
“Owati timitahi.
Owa ene mai‑ya tihiyarariyahi. Hiniya Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ya tikahi. Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑nima yama daatiniya, tikitama, tiwa‑ya mai watowahaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.

Yeso ati‑ya maki tokadabare, mai nafi‑ya Yeso ene tamine‑ya hiyaremarine. Mai dama mai ihi yama tehe‑ya tabora webote‑ya Yeso tokomaremarine. Kabani‑kaya Yeso waabisemarine. Tabora dami‑ka Yeso‑ya mai towamakemaroni, kabani‑kaya.
Mahi fa‑famaraba ne‑ya Kafanaho‑ya Yeso kamatase, koboname tamine‑ya mai mita,
“Yeso, hini tabaro‑ya sawimatasematane.” Mai ati nameteni.
Mai dama mai yorotokana, mai ihi yobe kibe, nokobi‑ya mai one dama naha, Deoso ati‑ya Yeso mai‑ya kaminemarine.
Maki ka‑kakone mai hiwakame, awa‑ya bora dasikana‑ya maki foriya, mai 4 kana mai diwakanamaroni.
Mai kamake, yobe doro kibe ene nokobi‑ya mai tokiyomara, yobe tati mese‑kaya mai hiwakimise, yobe tati mese‑ya mai seekana, yobe tati mese hodone‑ya maki‑ya mai kanakisamaroni.
Mai ihi‑ya Yeso awe, “Owati‑ya mai nofineni.” Yeso atibodi ati ne, ka‑kakone‑ya hiyare,
“Soho, tiwa ene towe manakone wadamarini.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina Yeso ati‑ya mai mita mai yawawahamaroni.
“Ai ati ene ai owa ene manakone fawatere, Deoso hini ati ene ai ene manakone fawateni. Maki ene towe manakone wadamaremona Yeso ati ne,
‘Deoso‑nima ona ama·oni.’ Yeso ati ne awane.
Hini ati ene abaho.” Mai atibodi ati namaroni.
Mai atibodi ati‑ya Yeso wato, ati yanane,
“Hini yamata‑bone owa‑ya dai atibodi weeniti?
Bofe‑ka mai ati ihi ai ene towe manakone fawarihi, bofe‑ka mai ati ihi ai owa kitamarihi tene.
Owati ihi ai owa ene towe manakone wadamare, dai awaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Maki kiyane‑ya hiyare,
“Owati timitahi. Tiwaamisahi. Tika fo‑fori‑ka yama diwatikaniya, tikamahi, tika yobe‑ya.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Waamise, hika fo‑fori‑ka yama‑ya damane, mai dama mai noki‑ya tokome, mai hiwakatomemarine. Mai nafi atibodi yama‑ya kadika, Deoso‑ya mai kahiyara,
“Deoso ene amosane. Hibati‑ya haa‑nima ai ene na ai awaterani.” Mai ati namaroni.
Faha widi‑ya Yeso tokomatase, mai nafi tokomake, mai‑ya Yeso kanawatomarine.
I‑di Refi i‑di Aofio bidi amane. Yeso yakane, kiinawame, kofeno‑ka yobe bidi‑ya i‑di Refi itariya, Yeso awe, Refi‑ya himane,
“Owa‑ya tisawihi.” Yeso ati ne,
Refi waamise, Yeso‑ya sawiwahemarine.

Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai eyehe i‑di Refi‑ka yobe‑ya mai tokamaroni. Kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya mai ha‑haa mai dama, mai ihi amosara mai dama, mai na, Yeso‑ya mai tokomake, Refi‑ka yobe‑ya mai nafi marinamaroni.
Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai one fariseo mai toha, Yeso marine‑ya mai awa, Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai‑ya mai hiyaramaroni.
“Hini yamata‑bone towe mai eyehe Yeso tafati? Kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya mai ha‑haa mai eyehe oda tafarihi, mai ihi amosara mai eyehe oda tafarihi, oda teni.” Mai ati namaroni.
Mai ati‑ya Yeso mite, ati yanane,
“Mai kiyara mediko mai‑ya kasomaterene. Mai kiyana‑ta mediko mai‑ya kasomatene. Mai ihi amosamone mai ati na mai hima·orani. Mai ihi amosara mai hima·onabone ihi okemaroni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yowaho‑ya mai da‑daba Deoso‑ya mai kahiyarabone, mai tafarihi, fariseo mai‑ya mai da‑daba mai tafaharirihi namaroni. Fara ihi Yeso‑ya mai one hiyara,
“Yowaho‑ya mai da‑daba mahi owa‑ya mai tafara, fariseo mai‑ya mai da‑daba mahi owa‑ya mai tafaharirani. Haa‑nima mai ihi na damateni. Tiwa‑ya mai da‑daba mai tafi fawaterani.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,
“Mai‑ka owa fanebona sawi ene mai ya‑yaina, mai tafi fawarani. Maki fanebona sawi ene mai tafi fawarani.
Yama one‑kaya maki mai hiwakebona, tabora bara‑ya tokeya, mai tonokosa, yawa ihi mai tafi fawanaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.

Bani ataro wamani yama wiye toha, wamani yatiya, fino yati ai soronisiya, wiye taokiterani. Yama wiye bote‑ya fino yati ai soronisaterani. Yama wiye bote‑ya fino yati ai soronisiya, taokana, yama wiye aba, fino abateni. Fino yati wiye yati‑ya ai soronibisateni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Sabado one‑ya mai yakana, fadara bai‑ya mai tokofaramiya, Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba tiriko tati‑ya mai bakakasamaroni, tiriko‑ya mai kababonehe.
Mai ihi‑ya fariseo mai awa, Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Hini yamata‑bone tiwa‑ya mai da‑daba tiriko tati‑ya mai bakakasiti? Sabado‑ya yama‑ya mai anina.” Fariseo mai ati namaroni.

“Dafi tamine dai kadikaterini? Abiata, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote tohemataya; Dafi, hika mai eyehe toke, mai fimi nafemetemoneni. Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Dafi tokiyome, Deoso‑ka baho‑ya idi, baho‑ya mai kabametemoneni. Deoso‑ka yama hani ati ihi Deoso‑ka baho‑ya mai one kabaterani. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai hikababisateni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Deoso ai‑ya wamani dai tohe, makobote ati ene sabado feriado tohawahametemoneni. Feriado‑ya Deoso wamanematamonane, ai‑ya kasomebonaha.
Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya Yeso tokiyome, maki yehe moikaname itari‑ya Yeso awemarine.
Yeso‑ya mai ka‑kako Yeso‑ya mai kakatomamaroni.
“Maki‑ya nakitameba awane. Sabado‑ya hinakitameya, ai weenebonane.” Mai atibodi ati namaroni.
Maki‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Tiwaamisiya, oda teberi‑ya tiwaahi.” Yeso ati ne,
maki kamemarine.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,

“Eme Mose‑ka yama hani ati titi? Sabado‑ya ai owa ai nakitama, ai ati kasiramone dai ati na awini. Sabado‑ya ai owa ai nanahababisa, ai sibabisaramone dai ati na awini. Dai ati yananahi.” Yeso ati ne,
ati‑ya mai mita, mai ati yananami awiramaroni.
Fariseo mai atibodi ati amosara, mai atibodi ati‑ya Yeso mite, yawe, mai nafi hiwakatome, maki‑ya hiyare,
“Tiwa yehe feotokanahi.” Yeso ati ne,
Yehe feotokaname, yehe amosawamemarine.
Yeso ene‑ya fariseo mai awa, mai yawi kita, i‑di Erodi‑ka mai one‑ya mai hiyarabone mai tokamaroni, Yeso‑ya mai nanahababonehe.
Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai eyehe Karireya‑ka faha widi‑ya mai tokamaroni. Karireya‑ka mai toha, Yodeya‑ka mai toha,
Yerosare‑ka mai toha, Idomeya‑ka mai toha, Yodaho Faha kowani‑ka mai toha, Tiro‑ka mai toha, Sidoho‑ka mai toha, mai na, Yeso ene kite tamine‑ya mai mita, mai dama mai tokomakemaroni.
Yeso hika mai‑ya yose,
“Kanawa dai kakamahi. Mai dama mai ihi yama howatokani awirini. Kanawa dori‑ya ofoyiya, mai ohiyaraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai kiyana mai dama Yeso‑ya mai boyona, mai kitamamaroni. Mai kiyana mai dama mai kamakitasa, mai one‑ya mai keweni kita, Yeso‑ya mai boyonabonehe.
Madi towe ai one‑ya mai foya, Yeso‑ya mai awa, madi mai ihi mai baki‑kaya mai wiya, mai ati yanana,
“Deoso Bidi amatini.” Mai ati na, mai ati damamaroni.
Madi towe mai ati‑ya Yeso mite, ati yanane, ati kite,
“Owa tamine dai kaminariyahi.” Yeso ati ne,
ati damaharimarine, madi mai‑ya hiyareri.
Adami webote‑ya Yeso tokomorose, hika mai‑bone mai‑ya haane, mai tokomakemaroni.
Mai 12 kana mai‑ya Yeso kadike, fai‑ya mai dababone, Deoso ati‑ya mai kaminabonehe.
“Oka yo‑yose mai amani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati ene madi towe mai‑ya mai kananiheboneni.
Mai‑ya kadike, mai oni‑ya haanawahemarine. I‑di Simaho tohe, Yeso ati ene Simaho oni Bedoro tohawahemarine.
Sebedeo bidi i‑di Tiyako, sohori i‑di Yowaho‑ya fama ne mai‑ya kadike, mai oni yati‑bone‑ya Yeso haanemarine. Mai oni yati Boanerekesi toha, ai ati‑ya Bahi ati‑nima dai nineni.
I‑di Anidere, i‑di Firibi, i‑di Batoromeho, i‑di Mateo, i‑di Tome, Aofio bidi i‑di Tiyako, i‑di Tadeo, i‑di Simaho Seroti,
i‑di Yoda Isikari·oti, mai na, mai‑ya Yeso kadikemarine. Yoda Isikari·oti i‑di Yeso‑ya kahabanawahemarine.
Mai wini‑ke yobe‑ya Yeso tokomatase, mai dama mai kobonamake, mai tafabone, yobe kibe ene mai tafi awiramaroni.
Yeso madi, Yeso sohori mai toha na, fai tamine‑ya mai mita, mai kamakemaroni, Yeso‑ya mai towakamabonehe.
“Mai dama mai ihi Yeso tafare, yama‑ya watomare awane.” Mai ati namaroni.
Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina Yerosare‑ya mai wi‑wina mai one kamake, Yeso tamine‑ya mai hiyara, mai ati yanana,
“Madi towe mai‑ka hidi, i‑di Beosibo Yeso‑ya foyane, madi mai‑ka hidi ati ene mai one‑ya Yeso kananihi, awane.” Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai ati namaroni.
Yeso mai‑ya kanawatobona mai‑ya himane, mai‑ya hiyare,
“‘Satanasi ene madi towe kananane.’ Dai ati na,
Satanasi hini hika‑ya kananiterene.
Hidi webote hika mai dama mai ibi bisiniya, hidi webote kiti fawanebonane.
Tabora ohare‑ka mai ibi toka toweya, mai nafi awimaraboneni.
Satanasi‑ka mai ibi bisina‑mani, kiti fawane nane. Satanasi hini hika‑ya kananiterene.
Owati dai mitahi. Dai ene towe dama toha, dai ati towe dama toha na, makobote Deoso ati dai nofawahiya, dai ene manakone Deoso haanamaterebonane.
Deoso‑ka Doni‑ya mai weena, mai ihi manakone wadabisateni. Mai ihi manakone fawateraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Hibati‑ya mai one haa‑nima ati na,
“Madi towe Yeso‑ya foye awane.” Mai one ati na,
mai ati‑ya Yeso mite, mai ihi manakone fawaterabone tamine‑ya hiyaremarine.
Yeso madi, Yeso sohori mai na, mai kamake, yobe‑kaya mai tokiyomara, nokobi‑ya mai naha, mai‑ya mai hiyara,
“Yeso dai haanahi, oda tokomabonehe.” Mai ati namaroni.
Mai dama Yeso yowi‑ya mai naha, mai ati yanana,
“Yeso, tika ami, tika soho mai eyehe kobona, tiwa‑ya mai haana, yobe fowari‑ya mai nahani.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yeso ati yanane,
“Ebeni‑ka oka soho mai toha, ebeni‑ka oka ami tohaniti? Fara oka soho mai dama, oka ami mai damateni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso yowi‑ya mai naha, mai‑ya Yeso kiikawame, mai‑ya hiyaramatase,
“Okomi, oka soho dai nineni.
Deoso ati‑nima mai niya, okomi mai toha, oka soho mai toha, oka asima mai toha, mai nineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Karireya‑ka wara webote widi‑ya Yeso tokomatase, mai‑ya kanawatomatasemarine. Mai dama mai yorotokana, mai dama mai ihi kanawa‑ya Yeso foye, itari, mai dama faha widi‑ya mai nahobasamaroni.
Yeso mai‑ya kanawatobona Deoso tamine‑ya mai‑ya hiyare,
hawi fowari‑ya noki one sona, bani bidi mai hikabani.
Yamata noki one yati dama iti‑kaya sona, yati mese‑ya wami si‑sifina fore ihi noki yana kanibote na,
yati ihi habi tokara, mahi hewene ene wayatokana, fahi wadamara, abani.
