Atiwa mete‑ya yamata noki one sona, atiwa ene yamata yani amosara, bonorani.
Bodo‑ya yamata noki one sona, yana, dodama, ade ohare‑ya boni 30 toha, ade one‑ya boni 60 toha, ade one‑ya boni 100 toha nani.
Owati dai mita, owati dai tokadabahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai dama mai toka, mai nowati‑ya Yeso‑ka mai 12 kana, Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai one toha na, mai ati yanana,
“Tiwati oda watorini.” Mai ati namaroni.
“Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine dai watowahaboneni. Mai one‑ya ohiyara, owati okahemobisateni.
Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑maro‑nima mai nawahani.

‘Owati‑ya mai mita, owa ene‑ya mai awa na, mai narabi hawira, yama‑ya mai wato awiraboneni. Mai narabi hawe‑mani, mai ihi‑maro‑nima mai ihi namariya, mai ihi manakone‑ya Deoso haanamare nane.’ Yama hani ati namaroni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati yananamatase,
“Ka! Yamata noki tamine‑ya dai wato awirini. Oka hiyara nafi dai wato awiraba awineni.
Fadara‑ka wami ai atibodi tamine amani. Yamata noki Deoso ati tamine amane.
Hawi fowari‑ya yamata noki sona ai owa tamine amane. Deoso ati‑ya mai mita, Satanasi ene Deoso ati‑ya mai ati kadamowama kanibote na, mai tamine amani.
Wami si‑sifina‑ya yamata noki one sona, yana kanibote na, aba kanibote na, fara Deoso ati‑ya mai mita, mai ya‑yai kanibote na, mai tamine amani.
Deoso ati‑ya mai nofara mai mai weehiniya, mai atibodi kitara, mai maakana kanibote na, Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadabamarani.
Atiwa mete‑ya yamata noki sona, fara Deoso ati‑ya mai mita,
makobote yamataha, bora, yinero, yama dama toha na‑ya mai nokotonihe, Deoso ati‑ya mai nokotonimara, yamata atiwa‑ya daba, bonora‑nima mai na, mai ihi amosa‑ba wadarani.
Bodo‑ya yamata noki sona‑nima mai na, Deoso ati‑ya mai mita, Deoso ati‑ya mai nofa, mai ihi amosani. Mai one ihi amosi bi‑bidi, mai one ihi amosi ba‑basi teni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Fara nabarina ihi yama ai watowama‑nima owati dai watora, owati dai watowahaboneni.
Owati dai mita, owati dai tokadabahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Owati timita, owati tinofahi. Owati tinofiya, ati tiwato ba‑basi tinabone, ati owa okaminamakitasaboneni.
Deoso ati‑ya mai mita, ati mai hinofeya, Deoso ati‑ya mai wato ba‑basi naboneni. Deoso ati‑ya mai mita, ati mai hinofareya, yama‑ya mai watoteraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati yananamatase,
“Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine okaminaboneni. Fadara‑ya yamata noki‑ya ai owa werene,
amoni dameya, hika fadara‑ya tokomatase, hika yamata moona, ai owa ene tohi awirene.
Wami honita ihi yamata noki moona, makobote bonowaha, marafakiteni.
Marafakanaya, hidi tiihiteni.
Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine ohiyaramatasaboneni.
Fara mositada noki‑nima tene. Mositada noki i‑isi teni.
Mositada noki i‑isi na‑ya fadara‑ya ai owa korotona, noki yana, nafiwaha, ini webote tohawaha, ini‑ka yama sire‑ya bani bidi mai bori‑ya mai wamateni.” Yeso ati nemarine.

Hiyara haa‑nima na‑ya Yeso hiyare, ati damemarine. Deoso ati‑ya Yeso hiyare, yama bara tamine‑ya hiyarabisemarine. Yama nafi‑ya Yeso kamina kanibote ni awire, yama‑ya mai wato‑ya yama one tamine‑ya kaminamakitasematane.
Mai dama mai‑ya Yeso hiyare, yama tamine yokana‑ya kaminare, makobote hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya yama tamine yokana‑ya kaminawahematane.
Mahi toke‑ya Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya hiyare,
“Hima, faha kowani‑kaya ai tokahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai yanana, kanawa‑ya mai foyama, kanawa one‑ya mai one foyama na, mai one dama tonokosamaroni.
Faha bai‑ya boni kita yanana, faha rike nafe ihi kanawa boki yanatonameteni.
Kanawa yodi‑kaya kama bide homa‑ya Yeso amone, home‑ya mai mowakana,
“Ayo, ai abi bonehe, ai tikasomara, oda‑ya tinofara awineni.” Mai ati nameteni.
Yeso dodafi, boni‑ya weene, faha‑ya hiyare,
“Faha rikatiriyahi.” Ati ne,
ati ene boni fawa, faha rike fawa nameteni.
Mai‑ya hiyare,
“Hini yamata ihi dai kakomeheti? Owa ene kitabote‑ya dai awaterini?” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ene‑ya mai awa, mai habi siitona, mai ibi hiyara,
“Ebeni‑ke tohati? Ai‑nima Yeso ni awire, kitabotebisa amane. Yeso ati‑ya boni mita, fawa, faha rike fai ati‑ya mita, fawa nineni.” Mai ati nameteni.
Wara webote kowani‑ka Kerasa mai‑ka wami‑ya mai kobona,
Yeso yoratomaroseya, maki kobonematane. Madi towe maki‑ya foye, mai tame‑kaya winematane.
Maki kiti nafi ene koheti‑ya mai sokihinamarematane.
Hibati‑ya koheti‑ya maki mai sokihini dame, koheti‑ya betekasarimane, mai nafi kiti bi‑bidi na, maki‑ya mai watamarameteni.
Maki ai temene‑ya kaikana, adami tati‑kaya kaikana, yama tehe‑ya kaikana, yama soki‑ya kaikana nematane. Kaikane, yati‑ya hini‑ya wisinematane.
Yama yaki‑ya maki Yeso‑ya awe, kanani kaki, Yeso noko‑kaya home,
Madi towe‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Maki‑ya tisawimariyahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Yeso, Deoso kitabote Bidi amatini. Owa arabatinahi. Owa bisitiriyahi.” Madi towe ati ne, ati kitematane.
“Tiwa oni eme titi?” Yeso ati ne,
“Ibowa ama·oni, oda damaro.” Ati nematane.
“Aka‑ya oda‑ya tiyoseriyahi.” Madi towe mai ati nameteni.
Adami‑ya boroko mai dama mai tafameteni.
“Boroko mai‑ya oda‑ya tiyosebisahi.” Madi towe mai ati na,
“Sibarini, boroko mai‑ya dai foyahi.” Yeso ati ne,
boroko mai‑ya madi towe mai tokiyoma, boroko mai kanani tokofawaha, mai 2.000 kana wami kote wadara‑ya mai nafi toka, mai boka, mai nafi abameteni.
Boroko mai‑ya mai na‑nawada mai kanana, sidadi toha, tabora bide toha na‑ya Yeso ene‑ya mai kamina, mai ati‑ya mai dama mai mita, faha widi‑ya mai kamakemeteni, Yeso ene‑ya mai awabonehe.

Yeso‑ya mai kobona, maki‑ya mai awameteni. Hibati‑ya maki madi towe mai dama mai foyimaro‑ke, maki hibayata bora‑ya weyenawahe, hibati‑ya ka‑kana nemari, amosawame, itari‑ya mai awa, Yeso‑ya mai nayofinameteni.
Yeso ene‑ya mai awa Yeso tamine‑ya mai hiyara, maki tamine toha, boroko mai tamine toha na, mai tamine‑ya mai hiyarameteni.
Yeso ene tamine‑ya mai mita, mai kakomehe, Yeso‑ya mai yosemeteni, yama one‑kaya tokebonaha.
Kanawa‑ya Yeso mai eyehe foyamematane, mai berekawahabonehe. Hibati‑ya maki‑ya madi towe mai sawimaro‑ke Yeso‑ya haane,
“Tiwa‑ya osaweboneni.” Maki ati nematane.
“Owa‑ya tisawiriyahi. Tiwa tabaro‑ya tikamabisahi. Deoso tiwa‑ya kasome tamine tihiyarahi, tika mai‑ya. Deoso tiwa‑ya nakitame tamine tihiyariyahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ati‑ya mite, Dikabori‑kaya tokome, Yeso ene tamine‑ya kaminematane. Ati mai himite, mai atibodi yama‑ya kadika,
“Ka! Yeso kitatene.” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.
Faha kowani‑kaya Yeso koboname, faha widi‑ya Yeso waasa ne‑ya mai dama mai yorotokanamaroni.
I‑di Yairo Yeso‑ya hiyare,
“Yeso, okoto atona abi yanatonani. Ai towakamahi, oka yobe‑ya. Tiwa yehe‑ya okoto boyotiniya, okoto kitamabone onani, okoto abarabonehe.” I‑di Yairo ohini yanatone ati nemarine.
Yeso i‑di Yairo eyehe mai dama mai bai‑ya tokomemarine.
Mai dama mai‑ya fana sawe, hika ama fawani watora, faha fowe 12 kana‑ya hika ama fawani awiramaroni.

Fana‑ka ama tahi‑bone mediko mai dama mai daahina, mai hikasomi hiwatorameteni. Mediko mai‑ka hemedi manakone fota‑ya fana nika, hika ama fawara, hiniya hika ama tonafe, hika yinero nafi tosiyomatane.
Yeso tamine‑ya fana mita, mai dama mai teberi‑ya tokomake, Yeso bari‑kaya kamake, Yeso‑ka bora‑ya boyonamaroni.
“Yeso borone‑ya boyo·oniya, okitamaboneni.” Fana atibodi ati na,
Yeso‑ka bora‑ya boyona, kitamawaha, kome fawa, hika ama fawanawaha namaroni.
Yeso hini ene kite‑ya wato, kiinawame,
“Ebeni‑ka tohiti, oka bora‑ya boyonaro?” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai ati yanana,
“Ai dama, ai‑ya tiawara?
‘Ebeni‑ka tohiti, owa‑ya boyonaro?’ Tina,
fara oda dama tiwa oda boyona awini.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yeso mai‑ya kiinemarine, fana‑ya awebonaha.
Fana habi siitona, wawawakana, Yeso noko‑ya homa, hini ihi tamine‑ya kaminamaroni.
Fana‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Sima, sibarini.
‘Yeso‑ka bora boyo·oniya, oka ama fawanawahaboneni.’ Tiwatibodi ati na,
fara ihi tiwa onakitamineni. Tikamahi. Tiwa kitami hawa tohini.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso hiyareya, Yairo‑ka mai one kamake,
“Yairo, tikoto abani. Yeso hini tohaya.” Mai ati namaroni.
Mai ati‑ya Yeso mite, Yairo‑ya hiyare,
“Tiwa habo siitoriyahi.
‘Deoso kitatene.’ Tiwatibodi ati nibisahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai dama Yeso ati ene mai one nahomake, i‑di Bedoro, i‑di Tiyako, sohori i‑di Yowaho, mai na, Yeso‑ya mai dababisamaroni.
Yairo‑ka yobe‑ya mai kobona, Yairo‑ka yobe‑ya mai naha, mai ohini kitameteni.
“Hini yamata ihi dai ohini kita? Atona abi awirini, hiniya amoneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, mai hahanameteni. Makobote Yeso mai‑ya yose,
“Dai nafi tokomahi.” Yeso ati ne,
atona badi, madi, Yeso‑ka mai toha na, Yeso mai‑ya himane, atona fori‑kaya mai tokiyamakemeteni.
Atona aboi yahi‑ya waratone,
“Tarita komi” Yeso ati ne, ai ati‑ya,
“Atona, tiwaamisamahi.” Ati nematane.
Atona kitama, waamisama, yakana‑ya mai awa, mai atibodi yama‑ya kadika,
“Ka! Yeso kitatene.” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.
Atona‑ka ano 12 kanameteni.
Yeso ati yananamatase,
“Tikoto aba, kitama tamine dai kaminariyahi. Tikoto tinatafiyahi.” Ati nematane.
Yeso hini yana‑mata‑kaya hika mai da‑daba mai eyehe tokomemarine.
Sabado‑ya Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya Yeso tokiyome, mai dama mai sawe mai‑ya kanawatomarine. Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, mai ibi hiyara,
“Ka! Yeso yama‑ya wato, ene kite, ebeni‑ke ene Yeso yama‑ya wato, ebeni‑ke ene Yeso ene kitanati?

Fare ai‑ka owa amane. Hibati‑ya awa‑ya wa‑wama tohemari, hika ami i‑di Mariya toha, sohori i‑di Tiyako, i‑di Yose, i‑di Yoda, i‑di Simaho, mai na, mai ai wata, hika asima ai‑ya mai sawinineni.” Mai ibi hiyara mai ati na,
Yeso‑ya mai nofaramaroni.
Yeso ati yanane,

“Tabora bara‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita mai one nafi‑ya mai nofateni. Hini mai tabori‑ka mai toha, mai one toha, mai na, mai‑ya mai nofaterani. Fara‑nima oka dai toha owa‑ya dai nofi awirani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Tabora‑ka mai kiyana, mai dama Yeso‑ya mai haaramaroni. Mai one‑ta fa‑famaraba na Yeso‑ya mai haana, mai‑ya Yeso nakitamemarine.
Mai ihi‑ya Yeso awe, atibodi yama‑ya kadike,
“Ka! Owati‑ya mai nofi awirini.” Yeso atibodi ati nemarine.
Tabora bide dama‑ya Yeso tokemarine, mai‑ya kanawatobonaha.
Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai 12 kana mai‑ya haane, ati ene mai ihi kitawahamaroni, madi towe mai‑ya mai kananihebonehe. Mai‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Hawi dami‑ya dai fa‑fama dai tokaboneni.
Dai tokiya, dai dabakiba‑ka awa dai aka, sibarini, dai‑ka yama one dai weyekarihi. Iyawa, yamasi, yinero ne dai towakariyahi.
Sanidariya‑ta dai sakonahi. Bora fama dai weyeriyahi.
Mai tabori‑ya dai koboniya, yobe ohari‑ya dai winiyahi. Aka‑ya dai toki awisari‑ya yobe owa‑ya dai winariyahi.
Mai tabori‑ya dai koboni‑ka dai ati‑ya mai nofara, dai yananamiya, mai noki‑ya dai teme hibakori dai nanahabiyahi, mai atibodi yama‑ya kadikabonehe.
‘Mai ati oda nofara mai tokineni. Oda ene amani.’ Mai atibodi ati naboneni.”
Yeso ati nematane.
Mai 12 kana mai tokamaroni, mai dami‑ya mai hiyarabonehe.
“Dai ene towe‑ya dai nofamariyahi.” Mai ati namaroni.
Mai ati ihi madi towe mai kananamaroni. Mai kiyana mai tati‑ya oyo‑ya mai sorokare, mai‑ya mai nakitamamaroni.
Yeso‑ka mai ihi tamine‑ya mai nafi hiyara, mai ati‑ya i‑di Erodi mite,
“Yowaho tohe awane. Yowaho Batita abe, kitame ene kite toha ne awane.” Mai one ati nihi,
“I‑di Eriya kamatase awane.” Mai one ati nihi,
“Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑nima ne awane.” Mai one ati nihi namaroni.
Mai ati‑ya i‑di Erodi mite,
“Owati ihi Yowaho Batita namidi mai tiihinakosemari, kitame awane.” Ati nemarine.

Yowaho Batita namidi‑ya i‑di Erodi ati ene mai tiinakosamaro, tamine okaminebonane. I‑di Erodi anidi i‑di Firibi tohe, i‑di Firibi fadi i‑di Erodiasi toha, i‑di Erodi anidi fadi‑ya famawahe, fare ene i‑di Yowaho Batita ati yanane,
“Erodi, ayo fadi arabatinahi.” Ati ne, ati damemarine.
I‑di Erodiasi ati ihi Yowaho mano‑ya Erodi sokikase, kadeya‑ya Yowaho‑ya nafoyemarine.
Yowaho Batita‑ya i‑di Erodiasi kako kita, i‑di Yowaho Batita‑ya ati naboha, i‑di Erodi ati barihinamaroni.
I‑di Erodi habo siitone,
“Yowaho Batita ene amose, Deoso‑ya na‑narifa amane.” I‑di Erodi atibodi ati ne,
fai‑ya nayofine, fai‑ya kasomematane. I‑di Yowaho ati miti‑ya i‑di Erodi nofe, fai ati‑ya tokadabare, ati hiwatoremarine.

I‑di Erodiasi yawi fawara, i‑di Erodi‑ka ano kobona, mai yorotokana, i‑di Erodi‑ka yo‑yose hidi mai toha, sodado mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Karireya‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai toha, mai na, mai yorotokanamaroni, mai marinabonehe.
Makobote mai ya‑yainabone i‑di Erodiasi bide atona kama, mai noki‑ya siwana, atona ihi i‑di Erodi mai one eyehe ya‑yaine, atona‑ya hiyare,
“Hini yamata‑ya tiwati koboniti? Tiwa‑ya yama daa·onaboneni.
Yama tinofa daa·onaboneni. Keyehe hiri·oterani. Oka yama beheri‑ya tiwati koboniya, daa·onaboneni. Hini tiwati kobohina daa·onaboneni.” I‑di Erodi ati nematane.
Atona tokoma, madi‑ya hiyara,
“Ami, hini yamata haa·obati?” Ati na,
“I‑di Yowaho Batita tati haatiyahi.” Madi ati nameteni.
Atona hidi webote‑ya tokoma kanibote na, ati yanana,
“Barato‑ya Yowaho Batita tati foye, hibayata owa‑ya daatinahi.” Ati nameteni.
Atona ati‑ya i‑di Erodi mite, atibodi a‑arire,
“Yowaho Batita nanahabi onofarini. Hini owati tohani.
‘Yama tinofa daa·onabone’ ona,
owati‑ya mai nafi mita, owati‑nima oriya, owa‑ya mai hahakariyahi.” Hidi webote atibodi ati nematane.
Sodado‑ya i‑di Erodi yose, Sodado toke, kadeya dori‑ya Yowaho Batita namidi‑ya tiinakosematane.
Yowaho Batita tati barato‑ya foye‑ya sodado kakame, atona‑ya daahine, madi‑ya daahinamematane.
Yowaho Batita tamine‑ya hika mai da‑daba mai mita, mai kamake, abo mai hiwakame, yati hodi‑ya mai barihikanemarine.
Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai kobonama, mai ihi tamine‑ya mai kaminamaroni, Yeso‑ya.
Mai dama mai sawe, mai ihi mai tafaramaroni.
“Hima, mai awiri‑kaya ai tokomahi, ai hasinabonehe.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Kanawa dori‑ya mai foyamamaroni, mai awiri‑kaya mai tokomabonehe.
Yeso mai eyehe toke‑ya mai dama mai awa, tabora dami‑ka mai tokomake, faha widi‑ya mai kanani tokobasamake, mai koboni dai tohamaroni.
Yeso mai eyehe kobone, tokomorose, mai dama mai‑ya awe, atibodi yama‑ya kadike,
“Kaneiro mai‑ka hidi wadamare mai‑nima mai na, mai okasomaboneni.” Yeso atibodi ati ne,
mai dama mai‑ya hiyare, Deoso tamine‑ya kamine, hiyari damemarine.
Mahi toke‑ya Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai ati yanana,
“Yeso, mahi toke, yobe wadare‑ya ai nahoneni.
Mai tiyosehi, mai tabori‑ya mai tokiya, mai tafe‑bone‑ya mai kanikabonehe.” Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai ati namaroni.
“Mai dai natafabisahi.” Yeso ati ne,

“Mai dama mai‑ka baho‑ba ai kanikiya, manakone nafeba awini. Yama‑ya ai a‑ani ai‑ka yama anini manakone 200 kana manakone‑nima mai dama mai tafe manakone na‑ba awini.” Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai ati namaroni.
Yeso mai‑ya yose,
“Ai‑ka baho dai kadikahi.” Ati ne,
Baho‑ya mai kadiki hawa toha, mai ati yanana,
“Ai‑ka baho 5 kana, ai‑ka aba mai fama mai nani.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yeso ati ene kabihi mese‑ya mai dama mai nahowamamaroni.
Haa‑kaya mai one 50 kana naho, haa‑kaya mai one 100 kana naho, ahini‑kaya mai one 50 kana naho na, fara hinama mai yorotokana, mai nahamaroni.
Baho 5 kana, aba mai fama na, mai‑ya Yeso damakane, neme‑ya tonokomise, Deoso‑ya hiyaremarine. Baho‑ya kebi, aba mai‑ya dobikana ne, mai 12 kana mai‑ya daanemarine, mai dami‑ya mai daahinabonehe.
Mai nafi tafa, mai korimanama,
baho kote hasi, aba mai kote hasina, kote mai teehina, hisiri 12 kana kibamaroni.
Maki 5.000 mai kanamaroni.
Hisiri‑ya mai teeni hawa toha, Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai‑ya Yeso yose, kanawa‑ya mai foyamamaroni, Besaida‑ya mai beretokawami dai tohabonehe. Mai dama hini mai tabori‑kaya mai‑ya yosemarine.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyari hawa toheya, adami webote‑ya tokomorosematane, Deoso‑ya hiyarebonaha.
Yama soki yanatoni‑ya kanawa‑ya mai foya, faha bai‑ya mai tohiya, Yeso ohari towaakosematane.

Faha bai‑ya Yeso noko toke, hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya awe, yama hakikini kita ihi kanawa‑ya mai orini kita, 4 ora‑ke, yama wahi yanatoniya, Yeso tokomaki, faha baki‑ya yakanematane, mai‑ya fiyakanebonaha.
Yeso‑ya mai awa,
“Ai korimari toha awini.” Mai atibodi ati na,
Mai e‑erinameteni.
Yeso‑ka fara hinama, fai‑ya mai awa, mai kakomehe, mai‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Dai habo kitahi. Fara ama·oni. Dai kakomeheriyahi.” Ati nematane.
Kanawa dori‑ya Yeso foyamakiya, yama hakikini fawanawahameteni. Yeso ene kitabote‑ya mai awa, mai atibodi yama‑ya kadikameteni.
Yeso ene kite‑ya mai awi baha, baho dodama‑ya mai awa, Yeso‑ya mai watomi awirameteni, mai habi kitaro.
Kenesare‑kaya mai kobona, kanawa‑ya mai yaditona,
mai tokomorosa, mai‑ya mai awa,
“Yeso tohene.” Mai ati nameteni.

Tabora nafi‑ya mai one kanani tokomameteni, Yeso tamine‑ya mai kaminabonehe. Mai ati‑ya mai mita, mai kiyana mai‑ya mai kakamameteni. Awa‑ya bora dasikana‑ya mai kiyana mai fo‑fore mai‑ya mai diwarikana, Yeso sawi‑kaya mai‑ya mai towakameteni.
Tabora bide dama, sidadi dama na‑ya Yeso toke, koboneya, mai kiyana mai‑ya mai kakamamaroni. Tabora bai‑ya mai‑ya mai kakamamaroni. Yeso‑ya mai haana,
“Yeso, tika bora ifi oda boyonaboneni.” Mai ati na,
Yeso borone‑ya mai boyoniya, mai kitamamaroni.
Yerosare‑ya mai yanana, fariseo mai one toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai one toha, mai na, mai kamake, Yeso‑kaya mai yorotokanamaroni.
Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai tafabone, mai yahi‑ya mai sorokarira, mai‑ya mai awa, mai ati yanana,
“Mai yahi towe tafineni.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yodeo ai‑ka idi mai ati ihi mai tafabone, mai yahi‑ya mai sorokariteni. Ai‑ka idi mai ati‑ya fariseo mai tokadabi nafiteni.

Yama ka‑kanika‑ya mai tokiya, mai wininamiya, mai yahi faha‑ya bokiya, hini mai‑ya mai wisakari mai teni. Mai‑ka keneko, mai‑ka faha wiye, mai‑ka yiwaha na faha‑ya mai korotofiteni. Mai‑ka idi mai ati dama mai ati‑ya mai tokadabateni.
Fariseo mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, mai na, Yeso‑ya mai hiyaramaroni.
“Hini yamata ihi tiwa‑ya mai da‑daba ai‑ka idi mai ati‑ya mai tokadabarani? Mai yahi towe tafateni.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,
“Towe dai amani. Deoso ati‑ya i‑di Isa·iya kamine, dai tamine‑ya hiyare,
‘Owa‑ya mai nofamone mai ati na, owa‑ya mai kahiyara na, hiniya keyehe‑ya mai hirina, owati‑ya mai tokadabarani.
Mai ati omita, ya‑yai·oni awirini. Owati‑ya mai kaminamone mai ati na, mai one ati‑ya mai kaminabisineni.’ Deoso ati ne, ati‑ya Isa·iya kanahanomatane.
Deoso ati yokana dai nokotonira, dai‑ka idi mai ati‑ya dai nokotonibisateni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati yananamatase,
“Ai‑ka idi mai ati dai nofabisa, Deoso ati‑ya dai tokadabarani.
Deoso ati‑ya i‑di Mose kanahanomatane.
‘Abi, ami, mai na, mai tinofahi. Mai‑ka abi, mai‑ka ami, mai na, mai one‑ya mai weena, —Towe amatini.— Mai ati na, mai abahi.’ Mose‑ka yama hani ati neni.
Deoso ati‑nima dai ati ni awirineni. Haa‑nima yama na dai kanawatoteni.
‘Deoso‑ya oka yama daa·onaboneni.’ Dai ati niya,
‘Mai one‑ya dai daariyahi. Dai‑ka abi, dai‑ka ami, mai na, mai dai kasomariyahi.’ Dai ati teni.
Deoso ati‑ya dai tokadabara, dai‑ka idi mai ati‑ya dai kanawatobisineni. Haa‑nima dai ene na damateni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Fariseo mai‑ya Yeso hiyari hawa toheya, mai dama mai‑ya Yeso haane,
“Owati dai nafi mitahi. Owati dai watohi.
Ai tefe ene ai towe tohaterani. Ai atibodi towe ene ai towe tohabisateni.
Owati dai mita, owati dai tokadabahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yobe doro‑ya Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai eyehe tokiyome, mai dama mai nahokosamaroni. Yeso‑ka fai‑ya mai haanameteni, ai tefe tamine‑ya mai mitabonehe.
Yeso ati yanane,
“Ka! Hini dai one‑nima dai na, yama‑ya dai watoteraba awineni. Ai tefe ene ai towe tohaterani.” Ati nemarine.
Ai tefe nafi sibara tamine‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Ai atibodi‑ya ai tefe tokaterani. Ai tafiya, ai nabadi‑ya tokabisa, makobote ai miiniya, abateni.
Mai atibodi towe ihi mai towe tohateni.
Mai atibodi ati towe ihi yama towe‑ya mai nokotonihe, fana mai dama mai‑ya mai nokotonihi, yama‑ya mai boti, mai one‑ya mai nanahaba, fana one‑ya mai idiwaha, mai teni,
mai one‑ka yama‑ya mai nokotonihi, yama towe‑ya mai nofa, keyehe‑ya mai hiri, mai siwa, Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadabara,
‘Towe dai amani, amosabotebisa ama·oni.’ Mai ati na,
haa‑nima mai ihi na,
yama towe‑ya mai atibodi‑ya yanana, mai atibodi ihi mai towe tohateni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso yananame, Tiro, Sidoho na, yakari‑ya toke, yobe doro‑ya tokiyomematane.
“Owa‑ya mai dami awariyahi.” Atibodi ati ne,
Yeso‑ya mai one awameteni.
Fana bide‑ya madi towe foye, Yeso tamine‑ya fana mita, kamake, Yeso yowi‑ya yobati‑kaya itarisa, moinisa, itameteni.
Fana Yodeo tohara, Sirofenisiya‑ka tohabisa, ati yanana,
“Okoto tikasomahi. Madi towe kanatinihi.” Ati nameteni.
Yeso ati yanane,
“Yodeo oka mai toha, mai‑ka yama nafi hawa tohiya, Bara mai okasomaboneni. Ai‑ka madehe tafe‑ya yomahi‑ya ai daaterani.” Ati nematane.
Fana ati yananamatasa,
“Ayo, fara amani. Owati timitaharihi. Madehe tafiya, bofe‑ya yama mekori fororona‑ya yomahi mai kabateni.” Ati nameteni.
“Tiwati amosa ihi okasomini. Tikamahi. Madi towe tikoto‑ya foyamarane.” Yeso ati nematane.
Fana hika yobe‑ya tokoma, kobotonama, bide kama‑ya homa, madi towe foyamarematane.
Tiro‑ya Yeso sawimari, yananame, Sidoho‑ya kariwahe, Dikabori‑kaya kobone, Karireya‑ka faha widi‑ya maatowitimarine.
Maki narabo hawirihi, ati amosarihi ne, Yeso‑ya mai hiwakame, Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Tiwa yehe‑ya maki boyotinahi.” Mai ati namaroni.
Mai awiri‑kaya maki‑ya i‑di Yeso towakame, maki narabo hodone‑ya yehe‑ya yorinise, makobote hini yehe‑ya firokase, yehe afe‑ya maki ebene‑ya boyonemarine.
Yeso neme‑ya tonokomise, hasitone, Yodeo mai ati‑ya ati yanane,
“Efata!” Ati ne, ai ati‑ya,
“Hawi wamahi.” Ati nemarine.
Hibati‑ya narabo hawirihi, ati amosarihi nemari, amosawame, mai ati‑ya mitawaha, ati amosawaha nemarine.
“Owa ene dai kaminariyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Ati mai hikadabare, mai‑ya Yeso ati barini dame, hiniya ati kamini mai na‑nafi hinemarine. Tamine mai nafi himitawahemarine.
Yeso ene‑ya mai awa, mai atibodi yama‑ya kadika, Yeso tamine‑ya mai hiyara,
“Ka! Yeso ene amose hinama, hibati‑ya mai narabi hawiramaro mai narabi hawiwaha, mai ati wadaramaro mai ati wadawahateni.” Mai ati namaroni.
Mahi owa‑ya mai dama mai sawe, mai tafe wadara, Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya haane, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Ai‑ya mai sa‑sawi mai okasomaboneni. Ai amoni 3 kani‑ya ai‑ya mai sawe mai tafe wadarani.
Mai one wini yaka, mai tabori‑ya mai oyoseya, fimi ihi hawi bai‑ya mai abariyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai ati yanana,
“Hini yamata‑nima ai nibati? Yobe wadare‑ya ai naha, haa‑ya yamata ai kanikaterani.” Mai ati namaroni.
“Dai‑ka baho emeniti?” Yeso ati ne,
“Oda‑ka baho 7 kana tohani.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yeso ati ene mai nafi nahokosamaroni. Baho tamine‑ya Deoso‑ya hiyare, baho‑ya kebi, hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya baho‑ya daane, mai dami‑ya mai daahinamaroni.
Mai‑ka aba bidi mai fa‑famaraba na mai tamine‑ya Deoso‑ya hiyare, ati ene mai dami‑ya mai daahinamaroni.
Mai dama mai tafa, mai korimana, tefe kote hasina mai teehina, hisiri kiba 7 tohamaroni.
Mai dama, 4.000 mai toha, mai tabori‑ya mai‑ya yosemarine.
Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya dabe, kanawa dori‑ya mai foyama, Damanota‑kaya mai tokamaroni.
Fariseo mai kamake, Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Deoso‑ka tihamone tina, neme‑ya tiwa ene kitabote oda awaboneni.” Mai ati namaroni, fai‑ya mai weenabonehe.
Mai ati‑ya Yeso mite, atibodi yawe, ati yanane,
“Hini yamata ihi owa ene kitabote dai awabone, dai ati niti? Deoso ene dai awateraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Makobote kanawa‑ya Yeso mai eyehe foyame, kowani‑kaya mai beretokawamamaroni.
Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba baho‑ya mai ati kadamowama, kanawa dori‑ya baho ohare sawemeteni.
“Dai noko wadahi. Fariseo mai toha, Erodi toha ne, mai‑ka femeto‑ya dai arabanahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, mai ibi hiyara,
“Ai‑ka baho wadara tamine‑ya Yeso hiyarane.” Mai ati nameteni.
Mai ati‑ya Yeso wato, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Ka! Baho yokana tamine‑ya ohiyari awirani. Yama dai wato kanibote rani, dai habo kitaro.
Dai noko toha, owa ene dai awa, dai narabo toha, owati‑ya dai mitabisa na, owati‑ya dai watora awineni. Owa ene dai awa, dai ati kadamowamarimana awineni.
Mai dama 5.000 mai toha baho 5 kana‑ya mai onatafa, mai korimanama, yama kaba kote hasina dai teena, hisiri emeniti?” Yeso ati ne,
“Hisiri kiba 12 tohani.” Mai ati nameteni.
“4.000 mai kana baho 7 kana‑ya mai onatafa, mai korimana, yama kaba kote dama hasina, hisiri‑ya dai teena, hisiri emeniti?” Yeso ati ne,
“Hisiri kiba 7 tohani.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Owati‑ya dai watoraba awineni.” Ati nematane.
Besaida‑ya mai kobona, Yeso‑ya mai awa, maki noko wadare‑ya mai kakama, Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Maki boyotinebona oda kakamani.” Mai ati namaroni.
Maki yehe‑ya Yeso damane, yobe awire‑kaya maki‑ya towake, maki noko bodi‑ya Yeso iridi fene‑ya hiditokane, maki tati‑ya boyone, ati yanane,
“Tiwa noko amosawamini?” Yeso ati nematane.
Maki yama‑ya awe, ati yanane,
“Ai one oawini, awa‑nima mai‑nima ne mai yakanaro.” Maki ati nematane.
Maki noko bodi‑ya Yeso boyonamatase, noko amosawami nafiwahe, yama nafi‑ya awi amosawahematane.
Yeso ati yanane,
“Tika yobe‑ya tikamahi. Mai tabori‑ya tikariyahi.” Ati nematane.
Sesareya Firibo‑ya tabora bide dama toha, fara‑ya Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai eyehe toke, hawi‑ya mai yakana, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Owa tamine‑ya mai hiyara, eme mai ati niti?” Yeso ati ne,
“‘Yowaho Batita amane.’ Mai one ati nihi,
‘I‑di Eriya amane.’ Mai one ati nihi,
‘Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑ka owa amane.’ Mai one ati nihi teni.” Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai ati nameteni.
“Dai‑ta eme dai ati niti?” Yeso ati ne,
“Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika amatini.” Bedoro ati ne,
“Hehe, fara ama·oni. Hiniya owa tamine dai hiyarariyahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso hini tamine‑bona‑ya kamine,

“Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, mai na, dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke ati‑ya mai nofarabone, mai weeni hikitebona, mai hinahabeya, mahi 3 tohe‑ya kitamebonane.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso hini tamine‑ya hiyare, mai hinahabebona hini‑ya kemo awirematane. Ati‑ya i‑di Bedoro mite, ahiyata‑ya Yeso‑ya towake, fai‑ya weenematane.
Bedoro‑ya Yeso hiyarebona, kiinawame, hika mai da‑daba mai one‑ya noko tokome, ati yanane,
“Satanasi ati‑nima tiwati nineni. Owa‑ya tiwati baririyahi. Deoso‑ka yama nokotini awira, hini tiwatibodi ati‑ya nokotinibisineni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai toha, mai one dama toha na, mai‑ya Yeso haane, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Owa‑ya dai ati daba, dai‑ka yama dai nokotoniriyahi. Owa‑ya dai dabiya, owa‑ya mai nanahababone‑nima dai‑ya mai nanahabahareba awineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yama dama‑ya mai kihamaro mai abiya, mai‑ka yama mai‑ya kasomateraboneni. Owati‑ya mai nofara yama hirini‑kaya mai sawiwahaboneni.
Yinero‑ya ai atibodi manakone abaterani.

Bofe‑ya mai wi‑wina yama dama‑ya mai nokotonihe, Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadabara dai‑ya mai weeni awirabone dai ati na, owa‑ya dai nofarihi, owati‑ya dai nofarihi dai niya, okomatasiya, dai‑ya onofahariraboneni. Okomatasiya, Okobi wehene owa‑ya sawi, Okobi‑ka yo‑yose mai amosabote owa‑ya mai sawi naboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,
“Owati dai mitahi. Dai abi awisari‑ya Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona dai one awawahaboneni.” Ati nematane.

Mai amoni 6 kaniya, Bedoro, Tiyako, Yowaho, mai na, mai‑ya Yeso himane, adami nemehe tati‑ya mai tokomorosa, mai one sawi awiramaroni. Adami tati‑ya mai kobona, mai noki‑ya Yeso hini wehene‑ya yananihimatane.
Bora sa‑sawani kita, bofe‑ka bora haa‑nima na wadatera, bora wahi wadameteni.
I‑di Mose i‑di Eriya mai fama mai kobona, Yeso‑ya mai hiyarameteni.
Mai‑ya Bedoro awe, Yeso‑ya hiyare,
“Ayo, tiwa‑ya oda sawe, yama sibarini. Dai‑ka wa‑wasa‑ba oda wamanaboneni. Tika ohari, Mose‑ka ohari, Eriya‑ka ohari nebonane.” Ati nematane.
Mai habi siitona ihi i‑di Bedoro ati yanane, atibodi yama‑ya watomarematane.
Makobote neme sabi mai‑ya barikanameteni. Neme sabi‑ya ati kaki,
“Oka Dao amane. Onofi nafi, ati dai tokadabahi.” Ati nematane.
Mai kiinawama, Yeso ohari‑ta waimatane.
Makobote mai yanana, mai tokofawamiya, mai‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Adami tati‑ya yama dai awa tamine‑ya dai kaminariyahi. O·abiya, okitamiya, owa kitami hawa tohiya, yama dai awa tamine dai kaminabisaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ati‑ya mai watora, Yeso kitamebona tamine‑ya mai ibi hiyarameteni.
Makobote Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina eya mai ati na,
‘I‑di Eriya koboni dai toheya, Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika koboni yotobonane.’ Mai ati teni.” Mai ati nameteni.
Mai ati‑ya Yeso mite, ati yanane,
“Fara amani. Eriya koboni dai tohebona, yama‑ya namosebonane. Deoso‑ka yama hani ati one dai mitahi.
‘Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke‑ya mai nofi awirabone, mai weehinebonane.’ Yama hani ati nani.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Owati dai mitahi. Eriya koboni hawa tohe, mai weeni hikitemarine. Yama hani ati‑nima mai ihi namaroni.” Yeso ati nematane.

Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai one sawi‑kaya mai kobonamatasa, mai one dama mai yorotokana mai‑ya mai awamaroni. Mai dama mai bai‑ya Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai toha, mai na, mai ibi weenamaroni.
Mai dama Yeso‑ya mai awa, mai atibodi yama‑ya kadika, Yeso‑ya mai kanani tokamaroni.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,
“Kobo·onama, hini yamata tamine dai hiyariti?” Ati nemarine.
Maki owa sawi, ati yanane,
“Ayo, oka dao owakamani, tikasomebonaha. Oka dao‑ya madi towe foye, madi towe ene oka dao ati wadamarene.

Madi towe oka dao‑ya fatatowiti, oka dao wami‑ya sone, iridi sabone toka, ino‑ya wasakana, abano kitane, fare haa‑nima nofene. Tiwa‑ya mai da‑daba mai haa·ona, madi towe‑ya mai kananihebone, mai ati‑ya madi towe nofare, tokarene.” Maki ati nemarine.
Yeso ati yanane,
“Ka! Owati dai nofara, dai narabo hawirani. Owati dai wato kanibote nahi. Dai‑ya owa sawi nafimaraboneni. Yetene dai kakamahi!” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yetene‑ya mai kakama, Yeso‑ya madi towe awe, yetene‑ya fatatowiti, wami‑ya yetene sone, hini‑ya werene, iridi sabone toka nemarine.
Yetene badi‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Tika dao yanakana‑ke hika abariko emenihi?” Yeso ati ne,
“Oka dao madehe tohe‑ya yanakanemarine.
Yifo, faha na‑ya oka dao‑ya madi towe fatatowiti damatene, fai‑ya nanahabebonaha. Tiwa kiti tohiya, oda tikasomahi!” Yetene badi ati nemarine.
Yeso ati yanane,
“Owa kiti nafiramone tiwatibodi ati riyahi. Owati tinofiya, yama tinofa‑nima yama naboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yetene badi ati yananamatase, ati kite,
“Tiwati onofani! Owatibodi tikasomahi. Tiwati onofi ba‑basi onabonehe!” Ati nemarine.
Mai dama mai kobonamake, mai‑ya Yeso awe, madi towe‑ya hiyare,
“Madi towe, tiwa ene yetene narabo hawirihi, ati wadarihi ne, tikahi! Yetene‑ya tifoyamariyahi!” Ati nemarine.
Madi towe e‑erine, yetene‑ya wereni kite, tokemarine. Yetene home‑ya mai kakatoma,
“Yetene abi oharine!” Mai one dama mai ati namaroni.
Yetene yehe‑ya Yeso waratokane, yetene‑ya nawaamisame, yetene waimarine.
Makobote yobe doro‑ya Yeso tokiyome, hika mai da‑daba mai ati yanana,
“Madi towe oda weena, hini yamata ihi oda ene kitariti?” Mai ati namaroni.
“Deoso‑ya dai hiyari awiriya, madi towe haa‑nima ne kanaterene.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai yananama, Karireya‑ya mai yakana, Yeso ati ene mai one noki‑ya mai toki awirameteni.
Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya kanawato, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke‑ya ai owa daanebona, owa‑ya mai nanahababoneni. O·abiya, mahi 3 tohe‑ya okitamaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ati‑ya mai watora, Yeso‑ya mai nayofina, mai ati yanarameteni.
Kafanaho‑ya mai kobona, yobe‑ya mai tokiyoma, Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,
“Hawi bai‑ya dai ibi hiyara, hini yamata tamine‑ya dai ibi hiyariti?” Ati nematane.
Mai ati yanani awira, fara hawi bai‑ya mai ibi hiyara eya mai ati na,
“Ebeni‑ke kiti ba‑basi nabati?” Mai ati na, mai ibi hiyarameteni.
Yeso itari, mai 12 kana mai‑ya haane, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Mai nafi‑ka hidi dai tohabone dai ati niya, mai dai kasoma, mai‑ka yo‑yose dai toha, dai nibisiyahi.” Ati nematane.
Ewe owa‑ya Yeso idimise, ewe‑ya diwane, hika mai da‑daba mai 12 kana mai teberi‑ya wai, mai‑ya hiyaramatase,
“‘Owa ene Yeso ya‑yainebonane.’ Dai atibodi ati na,
ewe dai kasomiya, owa‑ya dai kasomahari, Okobi‑ya dai kasomahari neni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yowaho ati yanane,
“Ayo, tiwa oni‑ya ai owa hirine, madi towe mai‑ya kananihi. Ai‑ya dabare, oda ati barihinene.” Yowaho ati nematane.
Yeso ati yanane,
“Maki‑ya dai ati baririyahi. Owa kiti yananabone ihi owa oni‑ya maki hirinane. Fara haa‑nima maki ati ne, owa‑ya kako kanibote rebonane.
Ai‑ya mai kakora ai‑ya mai kasomabisateni.
Dai bako hoka, faha‑ya dai‑ya mai daana,
‘Yeso Kirisito‑ka mai amani. Mai okasomaboneni.’ Mai atibodi ati na,
mai ihi amosa manakone‑ya Deoso daanebonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.

“Dai one ati ene owati‑ya ewe nofamareya, hini ene towe manakone wadebonane. Hini ene towe awisareya, yati webote‑ya namidi mai yadihineya, faha webote‑ya mai korohifiya, yama sibarabone, komene bi‑bidi nibisebonane. Ene towe tohe, hini ene manakone komene nafibisebonane.

Tiwa yehe one ene yama towe nokotiniya, tiwa yehe one wisitinakosahi, yama towe‑ya nokotinimarabonehe. Tiwa yehe ohari‑ya ti·abiya, tikitamiya, ti·abarabone‑kaya kobotiniya, yama sibabisaraboneni. Tiwa yehe fami‑ya ti·abiya, tikitamiya, wara hirini‑kaya yama hirini fawaterabone‑kaya tikiya, yama towe tohawahaboneni.

Tiwa teme one ene yama towe nokotiniya, tiwa teme one wisitinakosahi, yama towe‑ya nokotinimarabonehe. Tiwa teme ohari‑ya ti·abiya, tikitamiya, ti·abarabone‑kaya kobotiniya, yama sibabisaraboneni. Tiwa teme fami‑ya ti·abiya, tikitamiya, wara hirini‑kaya tikiya, yama towe tohawahaboneni.
Wara hirini‑ya mai naha, mai ime‑ya makatari mai kababoneni. Makatari mai abarihi, yifo hirini fawarihi naboneni.

Tiwa nokobodi one ene yama towe nokotiniya, tiwa noko one sobatinakihi, yama towe‑ya nokotinimarabonehe. Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya tiwa noko ohari‑ya tisawiya, yama sibabisaraboneni. Tiwa noko fami‑ya ti·abiya, tikitamiya, wara hirini‑kaya tikiya, yama towe tohaboneni.
Wara hirini‑ya mai naha, mai ime‑ya makatari mai kababoneni. Makatari mai abarihi, yifo hirini fawarihi naboneni.
Fara yifo hirini‑ya mai‑ya Deoso ketehebonane.
Sao amosa. Faha ihi abiya, sao kabi‑nima kabinamaterani. Sao‑nima dai nahi. Dai ene amosahi. Dai ibi nofahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.

Makobote mai yananamatasa, Yodeya‑ya mai tokoma, Yodaho Faha kowani‑kaya mai towaka, mai one dama kobonamake, Yeso mai‑ya kanawatomarine. Haa‑nima Yeso ene ne, mai dama mai kobona mai‑ya kanawatotene.
Fariseo mai one kamake, mai atibodi yama‑ya dika,
“Yeso ati amosareya, ati oda miteya, oda weenebonane.” Mai atibodi ati namaroni.
“Yeso, maki fadi‑ya nofamare, honita wahawamebona ati ne, sibakare?” Fariseo mai ati na,
“Hini yamata‑nima Mose ati namatati?” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati yananamatase,
“Ai‑ka idi mai habi kita ihi mai honita wahawamabone‑ka yama hani tamine‑ya i‑di Mose kanahanomatane.
Yama yanakani‑ya maki toha, fana toha na‑ya i‑di Deoso wamanematamonane.
‘Maki fana‑ya famebona, badi, madi mai na, mai‑ya dabamaterene.
Maki fadi‑bone‑ya fame, mai aboni ohariteboneni.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati neni.
Mai fama mai aboni ohariwahani.
Deoso ati ene mai aboni ohariwama, Deoso ene dai arabanahi. Mai honita wahawamariyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Makobote yobe doro‑ya mai tokiyoma, Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba fai‑ya mai hiyaramaroni, fai ati‑ya mai mitamatasabonehe.
Yeso ati yanane,
“Maki hini ene honita wahawameya, fana one‑ya famawaheya, ene ati kasiro, hiniya siwanane.
Fana hini ihi honita wahawamiya, makobote maki owa‑ya famawahiya, ihi ati kasira, hiniya siwaneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Madehe tati‑ya Yeso boyonebona madehe‑ya mai kakama, Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai‑ya mai awa, mai‑ya mai ati barinamaroni.
Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai ati‑ya mite, yawe, ati yanane,
“Madehe dai ati baririyahi. Madehe owati‑ya nofa, madehe‑nima mai na Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya mai saweboneni.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. Madehe owati‑ya nofa, fara‑nima mai ni awiriya, Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya mai sawiraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Madehe‑ya Yeso diwakane, mai tati‑ya yehe fori, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Deoso dai‑ya kasomebonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ayo, amosabote amatini. Hini yamata‑nima obati, ai abaterabone‑kaya osawebonehe?” Maki ati nemarine.
“Amosabote owa‑mone tina, ai owa amosabote wadaterene. Deoso‑ta amosabotebisa amane.
Deoso‑ka yama hani ati tiwata, ati timitahi,

‘Ai owa tinahabarihi, mai one‑ka yibote ti·aharihi, yama tibotiriyahi, ai owa ene tamine‑ya keyehe‑ya hiritirihi, yamata‑ka kiro tamine‑ya keyehe‑ya hiritirihi tinahi. Abi, ami mai na, mai tinofabisahi.’ Yama hani ati nineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ayo, Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑nima oteni. Madehe ohi‑ya Deoso ati‑ya okadabateni.” Maki ati nemarine.
Maki‑ya Yeso nofe, ati yanane,

“Tika yama ohare hasinineni. Tiwa yehe honene nafi daatinahi, manakone waratiniya, mai yahi hone wadara mai‑ya daatinahi. Deoso tabaro‑ya tika yama dama tohaboneni. Eya tiwa ene niya, makobote owa‑ya tisawiyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya mite, noko yawe, atibodi a‑arire, tokomemarine. Hika yama dama toha, hika yama‑ya kayawemarine.
Yeso kiinawame, hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya hiyare,
“Mai yahi hone dama toha, Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya mai dami sawiraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita,
“Ka!” Mai atibodi ati namaroni.
Yeso ati yananamatase,
“Oka madehe‑nima dai na, owati dai mitahi. Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya mai dami sawiraboneni.
Akoye hodone‑ya kamero tokiyomaterene. Fara‑nima mai naboneni. Mai yahi hone dama Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona‑ya mai dami sawiraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, mai atibodi yama‑ya kadika,
“Ka! Ebeni‑ke sawibati?” Mai ati namaroni.
Yeso mai‑ya nokotonihi, ati yanane,
“Hini ai ene ai sawiteraboneni. Deoso ene ai one sawibisaboneni. Deoso ene kitabotebisa amane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Bedoro ati yanane,
“Ayo, oda‑ka yama nafi towadakosa, tiwa‑ya oda honita dababisineni.” Bedoro ati nemarine.
Yeso ati yanane,

“Owati amosa dai mitahi. Deoso ati amosabote tamine‑ya mai kaminabone, owati‑ya mai tokadaba na, fara ihi mai‑ka yama nafi‑ya mai tonawadakosa, mai ihi manakone wadaboneni. Mai‑ka yobe, mai‑ka fadara, mai‑ka ayo, mai‑ka asima, mai‑ka abi, mai‑ka ami, mai‑ka madehe, mai na, mai tonokosa, fara ihi mai manakone wadaboneni.
Bofe‑ya hidi webote mai toha Deoso tabaro‑ya mai bi‑bidi na mai tohabisaba awineni. Bofe‑ya mai bi‑bidi na mai toha Deoso tabaro‑ya hidi mai ba‑basi na mai tohawahaba awineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.

Yerosare hawi‑ya mai yakana, Yeso dai tohe, nowati‑ya mai dama mai tokomakemaroni. Yerosare‑ya Yeso tokebona‑ya mai one dama mai awa, mai‑ya yama yofinamaroni. Hika mai da‑daba mai atibodi yama‑ya kadikamaroni. Mai dama ati mai himitarebona hika mai 12 kana mai‑ya haane, mai‑ya hiyare,

“Yerosare‑ya ai tokabone, ai koboniya, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha na, dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke‑ya mai watiya, mai ati hinahabeya, kofeno‑ya mai hiwakamebonane.
Owa‑ya mai hahakana, owa‑ya mai fironaboneni. Owa‑ya mai bisiniya, owa‑ya mai nanahababoneni. Dai amoni 3 kani‑ya dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kitamebonane.” Yeso ati nematane.
Sebedeo bidi i‑di Tiyako, Tiyako sohori i‑di Yowaho‑ya fame, Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Ayo, oda ati timitahi. Yama oda haanabone, oda ati tinofakaribana?” Mai ati nameteni.
“Yama dai nofa tamine omitabone, owa‑ya dai kaminahi.” Yeso ati nematane.

“Oda nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tihawahiya, tika yo‑yose oda fama oda kiti na‑nafi nabone, tiwa yehe kanika‑ya oda owa itari, tiwa yehe sayo‑kaya oda owa itari nebonane. Tiwati ihi haa‑nima oda nahi.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Yama dai haana dai wato awirini. Yama ofe‑bone dai fawa, owa‑ya mai habanirisabone, dai‑ya mai habanirisanibana?” Yeso ati nematane.
“Yama ofe‑bone‑nima dai fawamakeboneni. Owa‑ya mai habanirisi‑nima dai‑ya mai habanirisamakeboneni.
Deoso ati ene owa mano kanika‑kaya ai owa itari, owa mano sayo‑kaya ai owa itari nebona, mai oni hawa tohineni. Fara mai i‑itari‑bone‑ka dai‑ya daa·oteraboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
I‑di Tiyako, i‑di Yowaho mai ati tamine‑ya mai one 10 kana mita, mai yawameteni.
Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya haane, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Bara mai‑ka hidi mai one‑ya mai kasomaterani. Mai ati ihi mai mai hinarifateni.
Mai‑nima dai riyahi. Hidi tihabone tina, dai one tikasomabisahi.
Mai‑ka webote tihabone tina, mai nafi tikasomabisahi.
Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke‑nima dai nahi. Owa dai narifara, dai‑ya onarifabisateni. Mai dama mai ihi manakone‑ya onahababone, o·ababoneni.” Yeso ati nematane.

Sidadi oni Yeriko‑ya mai kobona, Yeriko‑ya mai fiyakanabone, Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai toha, mai one dama mai toha na, Yeriko‑ya mai fiyakani yanatoniya, maki ati yananemarine. Maki noko towe tohe, oni Batimeo tohe, badi oni Timeo toha nemarine. Batimeo hiniya mai‑ka yinero‑ya haane, hawi fowari‑ya itemarine.
Mai one ati yanana,
“Yeso Nasare‑ke ai‑ya fiyakanane.” Mai ati namaroni.
Mai ati‑ya Batimeo mite, ati yanane,
“Yeso, oda‑ka hidi amatini. I‑di Dafi‑ka nodi amatini. Owa tikasomahi.” Batimeo ati ne,
“Tiwati fawanahi.” Mai dama mai ati namaroni.
Batimeo haani kitawahe,
“Oda‑ka hidi amatini. I‑di Dafi‑ka nodi amatini. Owa tikasomahi.” Batimeo ati nemarine.
Yeso maaname, ati yanane,
“Dai haanaho.” Ati ne,
maki‑ya mai haana, mai ati yanana,
“Ya‑yaitinahi. Tiwaamisahi. Yeso tiwa‑ya haane.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yoranimise, hika bora one mese‑ka‑ya sotatonemarine, Yeso‑ya tokomakibonaha.
Maki‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Hini yamata‑ya tiwati koboniti?” Yeso ati ne,
“Ayo, owa noko amosawamabone, onani.” Batimeo ati nemarine.
“Sibarini, tika yobe‑ya tikamahi. Owati tinofa ihi tiwa noko amosawamawahineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Batimeo noko amosawame, yama‑ya awawahe, Yeso‑ya sawiwahemarine.
Yerosare‑ya mai koboni yanatonamaroni. Orifera adami yakari‑ya tabora bi‑bidi na, Betaniya toha, Befaki toha na, yakari‑ya mai kobona, Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai fama mai‑ya yosemarine.
“A‑ahi‑ya mai tabori‑ya dai towakahi. Mai tabori‑ya dai towakiya, boho yetene yaditone dai awiya, dai disawaheya, dai kakamayaho. Hibati‑ya boho mese‑ya mai itariterani.
‘Hini yamata‑bone boho yetene‑ya dai disawahiti?’ Mai ati niya,
‘Ai‑ka hidi haahinene.’ Dai ati niyahi.
Boho‑ya mai daanaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai hiyose mai towaka, tabora‑ya mai kobokana, boho yetene wai‑ya mai awa, hawi fowari‑ya boho yetene wai, yobe‑ka nokobi‑ya yaditone, wai‑ya mai disawahameteni.
Mai‑ya mai awa, mai ati yanana,
“Hini yamata‑bone boho yetene‑ya dai disawaha?” Mai ati nameteni.
Yeso ati‑ya mai kamina, mai ati‑ya mai mita,
“Sibarini. Dai towakamaho.” Mai ati nameteni.
Boho yetene‑ya mai kakama, boho mese‑ya mai‑ka bora‑ya mai sookanire, boho mese‑ya Yeso itariwahemarine.
Yeso toke, Yeso hawine‑ya mai dama mai‑ka bora‑ya mai nawiya, awa afe‑ya mai one nawiya namaroni.
Mai one dai toha, mai one yoto na, eya mai ati na, mai ati kitamaroni.
“Deoso ai kahiyarineni. Deoso tiwa‑ya yose, tiwa‑ya kasomayaho, oda ati nineni.
Dafi ai‑ka idi tohematane.
‘Dafi‑ka nodi kitabote tohawahebona, hidi webote tohebonane.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati na,
fara oda‑ka hidi webote tihabone, oda ya‑yainineni. Deoso neme‑ya wine, Deoso ai kahiyarineni.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yerosare‑ya Yeso kobone, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya toke, tokiyome, yama‑ya kiine, mahi toke ene Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai 12 kana mai eyehe Betaniya‑kaya winitonamatasemarine.
Betaniya‑ya mai amona, mai yananamatasa, Yeso fimimarine.
Aka‑ya fiko‑ya Yeso awe, fiko afe dama, fiko boni‑ya sibanebona fiko‑ya tonake, fiko bonora, abariko owa‑ya fiko bonoteni.
Fiko bonora‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Tiwa bono‑ya mai kabamateraboneni.” Yeso ati ne, ati‑ya hika mai da‑daba mai mitamaroni.

Yerosare‑ya mai kobona, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso toke, yama‑ya mai one daa, mai one yama‑ya kanika na, mai‑ya Yeso kananiwahemarine. Yinero‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka mesa‑ya Yeso fatatokawiti, wayomata mai‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka kadera‑ya Yeso fatatokawiti nemarine.
Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya yama‑ya mai daanabone yama‑ya mai kakamake mai‑ya Yeso awe, mai‑ya ati barinemarine.
Mai‑ya kanawatobona, mai‑ya hiyare,
“‘Oka yobe‑ya mai tabori dami‑ya mai wi‑wina owa‑ya mai hiyaraboneni.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati na,
dai ene yama‑ya mai bo‑boti mai‑ka yobe‑nima yobe nawawahane.” Yeso ati nemarine.

Hidi mai tohara Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, Yeso ati‑ya mai nofi nafemaroni. Yeso ati‑ya mai dama mai nofa, mai ihi mai‑ka hidi Yeso‑ya mai nayofinamaroni. Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, mai na, Yeso‑ya mai nayofina, Yeso‑ya mai nanahababone mai ati namaroni.
Mahi toke‑ya tabora one‑ya mai tokoma, Yerosare‑ya mai amoramaroni.
Yama wahabisari‑ya mai kamaminatasa, fiko nafi wayatona‑ya mai awamaroni.
Fiko‑ya i‑di Bedoro awe, ati yanane,
“Ayo, fiko tiawahi. Weetina, tiwati‑nima wayatoneni.” Bedoro ati nemarine.
“Deoso ati dai nofahi.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. Deoso ati dai nofiya, dai ene kitabote tohawahaboneni.
‘Adami webote tibokahi.’ Dai ati niya,
‘Deoso kiteba awane.’ Dai atibodi ati riyahi,
‘Deoso kitatene.’ Dai atibodi ati nibisiya,
Deoso ene adami webote bokaboneni.
Deoso‑ya dai haaniya,
‘Yama haa·ona‑ya Deoso daanebonane.’ Dai atibodi ati nahi.
Haa‑nima dai atibodi ati niya, hini dai ati‑nima yama naboneni.
Deoso dai hiyariya, dai one‑ya dai ati somawamahi, dai‑ka Abi neme‑ke ati somawamaharibonaha.
Dai ati somawami awiriya, dai‑ka Abi neme‑ke ati somawamaharirebonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.

Yerosare‑ya mai kamatasa, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso tokiyome, yobe doro‑ya Yeso yakaneya, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai toha na, mai kamake, Yeso‑ya mai weenabone,
Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Ebeni‑ke ati ene mai‑ya kanatiniti? Ebeni‑ke ati ene mesa‑ya fatatikawiti tiniti?” Mai ati namaroni.
“Dai ati omiti bahi, owati dai mitaboneni.
Yowaho Batita mai dama mai‑ya habanirise, ebeni‑ke ati ene tohati? Deoso ene tohe awane, ai owa ene toha ne awane, hini yamata‑nima dai ati nihi?” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai ibi hiyara,
“‘Deoso ati ene amane.’ Ai ati niya,
‘Hini yamata ihi Yowaho Batita ati dai nofariti?’ Yeso ati nebonane.
‘Ai owa ati ene amane.’ Ai ati niya,
oda‑ya mai bisinaboneni.” Mai ibi hiyara, mai ati namaroni.
Mai dama mai sawe, Yowaho Batita ati‑ya mai nofa,
“Yowaho Batita Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita mai‑ka owa amane.” Mai dama mai ati namaroni.
Yeso‑ya mai hiyaramatasa,
“Yowaho Batita tamine oda wato awirini.” Mai ati na,
“Dai ati yanara, owati yananahariraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso mai‑ya kanawatobona mai‑ya hiyare,

“Ofa tabori‑bone‑ya hidi hawa tonihi, ofa noki‑ya kamane, yama ba‑barikana‑ya wamane, ofa ta‑tai‑ka hodi‑ya wamane, ofa‑ya mai na‑nawada‑bone mai tabori nemehe‑bone‑ya wamanamaki, yama yaki‑ya tokebona mai‑ya hiyare,
‘Oka awa bono dai nawadahi. Hadiya, one okayafa, one dai kayafa naboneni.’ Ofa hidi ati ne,
‘Hehe, sibarini.’ Mai ati namaroni.
Fa‑fai‑ya yama yaki‑ya hidi tokawahemarine.
Ofa hadiya, ofa hidi‑ya mai na‑narifa mai‑ka owa‑ya yose,
‘Owa tabaro one‑ya tikamahi. Ofa one‑ya tiwa‑ya mai daaniya, ofa tiwakamiyahi.’ Hidi ati nene.
Hika yo‑yose tokome, mai‑ya haane, ofa‑ya mai daara, hiniya mai bisihine, honita kamene.
Hika fai‑ya mai na‑narifa owa‑ya yosemakitase, tokome, ofa‑ya haane, ofa‑ya mai daara, hika yo‑yose mai weehine, tati mai baahirine.

Makobote ofa hidi hika fai‑ya mai na‑narifa owa‑ya yosemakitase, ofa‑ya haane, ofa‑ya mai daara, hiniya mai hinahabawahene. Hidi hika mai dami‑ya yose, hika mai one mai bisi, mai one mai hinahaba hinani.
Ofa hidi hika fai‑ya mai na‑narifa mai one‑ya yosere, bidi‑ya yosebisane. Bidi‑ya nofi nafi,
‘Oka dao ati‑ya mai nofabisaboneni.’ Ofa hidi atibodi ati nene.
‘Bidi ai nanahabaho. Ai nanahabeya, badi abamakiya, mai‑ka yama nafi ai kayafawahaboneni.’ Mai ati nani.
Bidi mai hinahabe, awa widi‑ya abo mai korohiwitine.
Bidi abe tamine‑ya badi miteya, hini yamata‑nima ene nabati? Kamakiya, hika ofa‑ya mai na‑nawada‑maro mai‑ya nanahabeya, mai one‑ya ofa‑ya hidi daanebonane, mai hinawadawahabonehe.
‘Yobe‑ya mai wa‑wama awa mai werehiwite, yobe tati mese ewene tohawahemarine.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Deoso ene ai awemari, ai ya‑yainineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, mai yawa,
“Ofa‑ya mai na‑nawada mai tamine‑ya Yeso hiyare, fara oda tamine amani. Yeso ati kasirone.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yeso‑ya mai watabone mai ati na, Yeso‑ya mai watara, mai dama mai‑ya mai nayofina, hiniya mai tokomamaroni.
Mai toki hawa tohiya, fariseo mai one toha, i‑di Erodi‑ka mai one toha, mai na, mai‑ya mai yosemaroni, Yeso‑ya mai hiyarabonehe.
“Oda ati ene Yeso ati tosawariya, mai dama i‑di Yeso ati‑ya mai nofamaraboneni. Yeso oda weenaboneni.” Mai atibodi ati namaroni.
Fara Yeso‑ya mai tokomake, Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,

“Ayo, keyehe‑ya hirititerani. Mai nafi tinofa, mai one tinofi bi‑bidi tini awirani. Deoso ati tikamini amose, ene tiwati oda mitaboneni. Homano mai‑ka hidi webote i‑di Sesa tohe, fare ai‑ka yinero‑ya haanene.
Ai‑ka yinero‑ya mai haaniya, yinero ai daanibaraniha? Sesa‑ka yinero‑bona ai daaniya, sibakarini?” Mai ati namaroni.
Mai atibodi ati‑ya Yeso wato, ati yanane,
“Owa‑ya dai watabone dai ati amani. Yara‑ka yinero ohari dai kakamahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yinero ohari‑ya mai kakamamaroni.
“Yinero dai awahi. Ebeni‑ke korimari‑ya oni fama?” Yeso ati ne,
“I‑di Sesa korimari, oni ne, yinero‑ya waanane.” Mai ati namaroni.
“Sesa‑ka yama‑ya Sesa‑ya dai daatonama, Deoso‑ka yama‑ya Deoso‑ya dai daatonamahari, dai nahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita,
“Ka! Yeso yama‑ya watone.” Mai atibodi ati namaroni.
Sadoseo mai one kamakemaroni, Yeso ati‑ya mai mitabonehe.
“Ai aba ai kitamaterani.” Sadoseo mai ati teni.
Mai kobona, Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Yeso, tiwati oda mitaboneni. Hibati‑ya i‑di Mose yama hikanahanamete tamine timitahi,
‘Ayo abeya, fadi hasina, bidi, bide, mai na, mai wadara, anidi fadi‑ya famawahiyaho. Bidi wadeya, anidi abemari oni‑ya bidi weyenayaho.’ Mose‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Ai owa sohori mai 6 kana, fane, kahiware, abemarine.
Fadi‑ya sohori famawahe, kahiware, abamakitase, fadi‑ya sohori yoto‑ke famamakitase, kahiware, abamakitasemarine.
Fara hinama mai fana, mai kahiwara, mai nafi aba, mai‑ka yibote abamakemaroni.
Yeso, oda ati timitahi. Mai nafi‑ka yibote tohamaro, mai kitamiya, ebeni‑ke fadi tohawahibati?” Sadoseo mai ati namaroni.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,
“Deoso‑ka yama hani dai watorihi, Deoso ene dai watorihi, dai na, dai tosawarineni.
Mai aba Deoso ati ene mai kitamiya, neme‑ya mai winiya, mai fanamateraboneni. Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai‑nima mai naboneni.
Ai aba, ai kitamaterabone dai ati na, Mose‑ka yama hani dai awaterini? Awa hirini‑ya i‑di Mose‑ya Deoso hiyare,
‘I‑di Abaraho, i‑di Isaki, i‑di Yako mai na, mai‑ka Deoso ama·oni.’ Deoso ati nematamonane.
Hibati‑ya mai abametemoneni. Mai wadamara mai‑ka Deoso tohaterene. Mai korimari hasinibisa, mai‑ka Deoso amane. Yama dai wato awirini.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina owa ohari Yeso ati‑ya mite,
“Yeso yama‑ya watone.” Atibodi ati ne, ati yanane,
“Yeso, ai ene tamine‑ya Mose kanahanomatamonane. Yama hani ati one amosabote owa‑ya tikaminamakihi.” Ati nemarine.
Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑ya i‑di Yeso kamine,
“‘Isara·eo‑ka dai amani, owati dai mitahi. Ai‑ka hidi webote i‑di Deoso tohe, owa wadaterene.
Ai‑ka hidi webote i‑di Deoso dai nofi nafihi. Yama one dai nofi nafiriyahi. Deoso‑ta dai nokotonibisahi.’ Yama hani ati na, ati amosabote amani.
Makobote Deoso‑ka yama hani ati,
‘Hini tiwa tinofi‑nima dai yakari‑ya mai sawe mai tinofiyahi.’ Yama hani ati namatasa,
ati amosabote amani. Deoso‑ka yama hani one ati amosi bi‑bidi nibisateni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina owa ati yananamatase,
“Hehe, tiwati‑nima yama teni. Deoso oharibisane, owa wadaterene.

Deoso ai nofi nafibisahi. Ai‑ya ai nofi‑nima ai yakari‑ya mai sawe mai‑ya ai nofaharihi. Haa‑nima ai niya, Deoso ya‑yaini nafibonane. Yamata, bani ne Deoso‑ya ai daaniya, Deoso ya‑yaini bi‑bidi nebonane.” Maki ati nemarine.
“Maki ati amose, yama‑ya watone.” Yeso atibodi ati nemarine.
Maki‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawaheya tisaweba awineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso yama‑ya wato, Yeso‑ya mai nafi nayofina, mai ati fawanawahamaroni.
Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai‑ya Yeso kanawato,
“Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina haa‑nima mai ati teni.
‘Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika Dafi‑ka nodi amane.’ Mai ati teni.
Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika tamine‑ya i‑di Dafi kanahano, ati dai mitahi.
‘Oka hidi webote‑ya Deoso hiyare, —Owa mano kanika‑ya tiwitarihi. Owati ihi tiwa‑ya mai ka‑kako mai‑ka hidi tihawahaboneni.—’
Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika tamine‑ya Dafi atibodi‑ya Deoso‑ka Doni kamine, yama hani‑ya Dafi kanahanomatamonane.
Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika i‑di Dafi‑ka hidi webote tohemona i‑di Dafi ati nematamonane. Fare Dafi‑ka nodi tohe, i‑di Dafi‑ka hidi webote tohahari ne.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai dama Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, mai ya‑yainamaroni.
Yeso mai‑ya kanawato, mai‑ya hiyaramatase,
“Dai noko wadahi. Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina dai‑ya mai nokotoniteni, mai‑ya dai kahiyarabonehe. Fara yama ai ka‑kanika‑ke yobe‑ya mai naha, bora yaba‑ya mai sakona;
Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya mai sawe, kadera amosa‑ya mai nahore; dai yorotokana, dai tafabone, mai sawe, kadera amosabisa‑ya mai nahore,
Deoso‑ya mai hiyariya, mai hiyari yaboteni, mai dai kahiyarabonehe. Mai fanawi mai‑ka yibote mai aba mai‑ka yama‑ya mai kayafateni. Mai ihi towe manakone nafibisaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Deoso‑ka yobe doro‑ya yinero weyene wai yowi‑ya Yeso itari, mai dama mai‑ya kakatome, Deoso‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya mai daana, mai one yinero webote dame‑ya mai kiha yinero webote‑ya mai daanamaroni.
Fana kamake, maki abemata, honita wahawama, yahi hone wadara, hika yinero bidi fame‑ya daanamaroni. Hika yinero yorotokawame manakone i‑isi nemarine. Yinero daani‑ya Yeso awe,
hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya haane, ati yanane,
“Owati amosa dai mitahi. Fana honita wahawama yama nafi‑ya daaneni. Mai one‑ta yama nafi‑ya mai daani awirani.

Mai‑ka yinero dame, owa‑ya mai daana, mai‑ka yinero dame hasinane. Fana‑ka yama wadatera, hika yinero bidi fame‑ya daana, hika yinero owa hasini awire, tafe manakone‑bone‑ya daanibisineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso yananame, Deoso‑ka yobe fowari‑ya hika mai da‑daba mai‑ka owa ati yanane,
“Ayo, Deoso‑ka yobe amosi nafine. Yati amosa wamani amani.” Ati nematane.
“Owati dai mitahi. Hibayata yobe amose‑ya dai awineni. Yama one‑ya yobe wadamarebona, yati fama demenarimaraboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Orifera adami‑ya mai kobona, mai nahokosameteni. Adami tati one‑ya Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai awameteni. Bedoro, Tiyako, Yowaho, Anidere, mai na, Yeso‑ya mai daba, Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Eme ai amoni niya, yobe ababonati? Yama koboni yanatoniya, hini yamata oda awibati, yama‑ya oda watowahi‑bone‑karo?” Mai ati nameteni.
Mai ati‑ya Yeso mite, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Dai noko wadahi. Dai‑ya mai keyeheriyahi.
‘Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika ama·oni.’ Mai dama mai ati naboneni.
Mai‑ka keyehe‑ya mai dama mai nofawahaboneni.

Wami hidi mai ibi nofaraboneni. Mai‑ka sodado mai‑ya mai yoseya, mai‑ka sodado mai ibi taonabone, mai tamine dai mitiya, dai habo siitoriyahi. Yama faina‑bone koboni awisarini. Yama one‑ya kobonaboneni.

Owati dai mitamatasahi. Wami one‑kaya mai wi‑wina mai‑ka sodado ahini‑kaya mai kakeboneni, mai dami‑ya mai nanahababonehe. Ahini‑kaya mai wi‑wina mai‑ka sodado maa kowani‑kaya mai toka naboneni, mai‑ya mai nanahababonehe. Wami wawawakana, mai dami fimi ihi mai aba naboneni. Haa‑nima yama na dai awiya, yama faina‑bone koboni yanatoneni. Fana dori wadabone dori kome yanani kita, dori wada kanibote na‑nima yama na tiwiya, yama faina‑bone yana kanibote naboneni.

Dai noko wadahi. Mai‑ka hidi bidi mai dama mai‑ya dai‑ya mai daanabone, Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya dai‑ya mai bisinaboneni. Yara mai‑ka kofenado mai toha, mai‑ka hidi webote mai toha na, mai ati ihi dai‑ya mai wataboneni. Mai noki‑kaya dai nahoya, owa tamine‑ya mai‑ya dai hiyaraboneni.
Fara mai tabori nafi‑ya mai wi‑wina Deoso ati amosabote tamine‑ya mai miti dai tohiya, yama faina‑bone yananaboneni.
Dai‑ya mai watiya, dai‑ya mai kahabaniya, dai ati‑ya mai mitabone, dai atibodi yama‑ya kadikariyahi. Deoso‑ka Doni ene yama‑ya dai watowahabone, ati‑nima dai ati yananahi.

Dai‑ka dai‑ya mai kahabanaboneni, dai‑ya mai nanahababonehe. Anidi sohori‑ya kahabana, badi bidi‑ya kahabana, mai‑ka madehe badi, madi mai na, mai‑ya mai kahabana, mai naboneni, mai mai hinahababonehe.
Owa dai nofa dai‑ya mai nafi kakaboneni. Owa oni dai saatonakosi awiriya, dai sibaraboneni.
‘Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya deoso bare‑ka yama waabone, fara ihi Deoso‑ka yobe towe tohawahebonane.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
(Yama towe waa, dai awiya, dai atibodi yama‑ya kadikahi, dai watowahabonehe.)
Deoso‑ka yobe doro‑ya yama towe wai, dai awiya, dai kananiyahi. Yodeya‑ya dai wi‑wina adami webote‑kaya dai tokiyahi.
Yama siri‑kaya dai naha, dai yehe honene yobe doro‑ya towadakosa, dai tonakamariyahi. Hiniya dai kananahi.
Fadara‑ya yama dai anina, dai‑ka bora one yobe‑ya toha, yobe‑ya dai tokomariyahi. Hiniya dai kananahi.
Ka! Mai fanawi naba toha, mai‑ka madehe i‑isi na mai toha na, mai kananiya, yama ati kasiraboneni.
Deoso dai hiyarahi. Yama siri kiti awiri‑ya yama towe yanana, amosabisaboneni.

Yama towe koboniya, dai‑ya mai kako nafe, dai‑ya mai bisi, dai‑ya mai nanahaba naboneni. Hibati‑ka yama‑nima yama nami awiraboneni. Deoso‑ka dai toha, dai‑ya mai kako bi‑bidi namete, dai‑ya mai kako ba‑basi nawahaboneni. Haa‑nima yamana kobonamatasateraboneni.

Haa‑nima yama niya, yama nahoraboneni. Deoso yama‑ya maakanebonane. Deoso yama‑ya maakare‑mana, dai nafi aba neni. Hibati‑ya Deoso hika mai‑bone mai‑ya kayawemata, yama towe‑ya Deoso maakanebonane, hika mai one hasinabonehe.
Dai‑ya mai keyehebone,
‘Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika kobone, ahiyata sawine.’ Mai one ati nihi,
‘Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika tabora one‑ya sawine.’ Mai one ati nihi naboneni.
Haa‑nima mai ati na, mai ati dai nofariyahi.
‘Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika ama·oni.’ Mai one ati naboneni, keyehe‑ya mai hirinaro.
‘Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita ama·oni.’ Mai one ati nihi naboneni.
Mai ihi kitaboneni, Deoso‑ka dai toha mai‑ka keyehe‑ya dai nofabonehe.
Dai noko wadahi. Yama tamine okamina, koboniya, yama‑ya dai watowahaboneni.
Dai‑ya mai bisina mai amoni tosiyoya, mahi wehene fawa, abariko wehene fawa,
amowa mai dama bofe‑ya mai fororo, neme‑kaya yama nafi wawawakana naboneni.
Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke‑ya mai awabone, neme sabi‑ya kisameya, wehene nafibonane. Ene kiti nafibonane.
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai one oyoseboneni, hika mai‑ya mai yababonehe. Wami nafi‑ya mai wi‑wina Deoso‑ka mai‑ya mai yorotokanaboneni.
Owati‑nima yama niya, dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke koboni yanatone, kobo kanibote nebonane.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. Owati‑nima yama yanana‑ya mai awiya, mai one hasinasa niya, dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kobonebonane.
Owati‑nima yama naboneni. Neme, bofe na, ababisabone, owati‑ta abateraboneni.
Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke amoni, hika ora ne dai watorihi, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose neme‑ya mai sawe, mai hiwatorihi, Deoso Bidi hini amoni‑ya watorihi nane. Okobi ohari hiwatobisineni.
Dai noko wadahi. Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kobonebona, hika mahi dai wato awirani.

Mai‑ka hidi kobonamebona‑ya mai nimana mai‑nima dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke‑ya dai nimanahi. Yama yaki‑ya maki tokebona, hika fai‑ya mai na‑narifa mai‑ya yosene. Hika yo‑yose owa nokobi‑ya waibona‑ya yosenane, maki kamataseya, nokobi‑ya seekana kanibote nebonaha.

Nokobi‑ya wa‑waa yama‑ya anine, noko wadi‑nima dai noko wadahi. Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kobonebona hika mahi dai watorihi, hika ora dai watorihi, dai na, mahi toke toha, yama soki bai toha, yama wahi yanatoni toha, yama wahabisari toha na, yama dai wato awirini.
Mai amona mai‑nima dai riyahi. Dai noko wadahi. Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kobo kanibote nebonane.
Dai fa‑famaraba na dai sawe, dai‑ya ohiyara, mai nafi‑ya ohiyarahari neni. Dai noko wadahi!” Yeso ati nematane.

Ai amoni fami‑ya ka‑kariwa kobonabone‑ka semana‑ya baho femeto‑ya ketehera‑ya Yodeo mai kabateni. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, mai na, mai yorotokana, Yeso‑ya mai kaka, mai awiri‑kaya Yeso‑ya mai wataboneni, Yeso‑ya mai nanahababonehe.
Mai ibi hiyara,
“Ai marinasa niya Yeso‑ya ai watiya, mai dama mai yawaba awineni. Ai marini hawa tohiya, Yeso ai wataboneni.” Mai ibi hiyara, mai ati namaroni.

Simaho hibati‑ya mese towe tohemari, kitamemarine. Betaniya‑kaya Simaho‑ka yobe tohe, Simaho‑ka yobe‑ya mai tafiya, yama mahi amosa‑ya fana damakana, kamakemaroni. Yama mahi amosa oni narado toha, manakone nafe, yati amosa wamani‑ya wiye toha, noki tabori bakahinakosa, Yeso tati‑ya sorohikaremaroni.
Fana ihi‑ya mai awa, mai one yawawaha, fana‑ya mai weenabone, mai ibi hiyara,
“Hini yamata‑bone yama mahi amosa‑ya Yeso tati‑ya fana sorokariti? Yama mahi amosa manakone fotateni.” Mai ibi hiyara, mai ati namaroni.

“Yama mahi amosa manakone fota, yama anini mahi 300 kane‑ka manakone‑nima manakone na, yama mahi amosa Yeso tati‑ya sorokarira‑mani, oda‑ya daatibisiya, oda daaniya, manakone oda waratokaniya, yinero‑ya mai kihara mai‑ya yinero oda daaniya, yama sibara neni.” Fana‑ya mai weena, mai ati namaroni.
Yeso mai ati‑ya mite, ati yanane,
“Dai ati fawanahi. Fana ihi amosineni.
Yama mai kihara dai‑ya mai dabateboneni. Mai dai ati kasoma, mai‑ya dai kasomaba awineni. Owa‑ta owa sawi yaboraboneni.
Mai abiya, mai abo‑ya yama mahi amosa‑ya dai sorokariteni. O·ababone, owa‑ya fana sorokari dai toha, ihi amosineni.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. Yama nafi‑kaya Deoso ati amosabote tamine‑ya mai hiyariya, fana ihi amosa tamine‑ya mai hiyarahareboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ka mai 12 kana mai‑ka owa i‑di Yoda Isikari·oti Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai‑ya toke, mai‑ya hiyarematane, Yeso‑ya kahabanebonaha.
Yoda ati‑ya mai mita, mai ya‑yaina,
“Hehe, tika yinero‑ba oda daanaboneni.” Mai ati nameteni.
Yoda toke,
“Mai awiri‑ya Yeso daa·onaboneni.” Atibodi ati nematane.
Ka‑kariwa yananiya, Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai ati yanana,
“Ebeni‑kaya ai marinibati? Ai tefe‑ba oda aninabonehe.” Mai ati namaroni.
Ka‑kariwa yananiya, kaneiro bidi‑ya Yodeo mai tabasiteni.
Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai fama mai‑ya yose,
“Tabora‑ya dai towakahi, dai kobokaniya, maki faha‑ya damakane dai awaboneni. Faha‑ya damakane nowati‑ya dai towakamakiyahi.
Yobe‑ya dai kobokaniya, yobe hidi dai hiyariya,
‘Ebeni‑kaya oka mai da‑daba mai eyehe otafibati? Ai‑ya ka‑kanawato ati nene.’ Dai ati niyahi.
Hika yobe waari nemehe, neme‑ke kote honita tohe‑ya dai‑ya yofikanebonane. Yobe kote‑ya mesa kaware, fara‑ya ai tefe‑ba dai hawa tohiyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Tabora‑ya mai towaka, Yeso ati‑nima yama na‑ya mai awa, ka‑kariwa‑ka yamata‑bone‑ya mai aninamaroni.
Mahi bidi‑ya Yeso hika mai 12 kana mai eyehe kobonamakimarine.
Mesa‑ya mai nahore, mai tafa, mai‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Owati amosa dai mitahi, owa‑ya dai‑ka owa daanebona, ai tafa ai‑ya sawine.” Ati nematane.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, mai atibodi a‑arira,
“Owa tohi awiraba awineni.” Mai nafi ati nameteni.
“Oka dai toha, dai 12 kana dai‑ka owa ohari owa‑ya daanebona, yama wiye ohare‑ya owa eyehe tafane.
Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke abebona, yama hani ati na, fara yama hani ati‑nima abebonane. Owa‑ya kahabane‑ka ene towe manakone nafeboneni. Ka! Wadare‑mana, yama amosabisa neni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai tafa, baho‑ya Yeso damane, Deoso‑ya hiyare, baho‑ya bakanakose, hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya baho‑ya daane, ati yanane,
“Dai kabahi. Owa abano tamine‑bone amani.” Yeso ati nematane.
Keneko‑ya fino‑ya Yeso damakane, Deoso‑ya hiyare, fino‑ya mai‑ya daane, fino mai nafi fawameteni.
Fino‑ya mai fawiya, Yeso ati yanane,
“Owa emene tamine‑bone amani. Owa emene tokabone, o·ababone, mai dama mai ihi manakone onahababoneni.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona, yanani awisareya, awa bono fahi ofimaterabone, yananeya, awa bono fahi wamani yati ofimatasaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Deoso‑ka wayoma ohare‑ya mai hirina, makobote Orifera adami‑kaya mai tokameteni.
“Dai kananabone, owa‑ya dai dabamaraboneni. Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑nima yama nabone,
‘Kaneiro mai‑ya na‑nawada onahabiya, kaneiro mai kananaboneni.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Okitamiya, Karireya‑kaya okabone, owa‑kaya dai tokomakiyahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Ayo, mai kananibisaba awineni. Owa‑ta kana·oraboneni.” Bedoro ati nematane.
‘Yeso owatorini.’ Tinabone,
tiwati yanani 3 kaniya, arakawa haani famebonane.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Ai fama, ai ababa awineni. O·abi‑ya yama sibaraboneni.
‘Yeso owatorini.’ Oteraboneni.” Bedoro ati ne, ati kitematane.
Haa‑nima mai nafi ati nameteni.
Kesemani‑kaya mai toka, Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya hiyare,
“A‑ahi‑ya dai nahohi. Ahiyata‑ya Deoso ohiyaraboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Bedoro, Tiyako, Yowaho mai na, mai‑ya Yeso himane, ahiyata‑ya mai toka, Yeso atibodi a‑arirematane.
Mai 3 toha mai‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Owatibodi yawi kitini. Fara yawa ihi o·abi yanatoneni. A‑ahi‑ya dai naha, dai noko wadahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Ahiyata‑ya Yeso toke, yama kobonabone‑ya nofare, homeya, hini tamine‑ya Deoso‑ya hiyare,
“Abi Deoso, kitabote amatini. Yama kobonabone onofarini. Owati‑nima yama riyahi. Hini tiwati‑nima yama nibisiyahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso waamisame, kame, hika mai amona, Bedoro‑ya hiyare,
“Simaho, amotiriyahi.
‘Dai noko wadahi.’ Ona,
ora ohari awisareya hiniya amotineni.
Dai noko wadahi. Deoso‑ya dai hiyarahi, Satanasi ati‑ya dai tokadabarabonehe. Dai atibodi amosa, dai abano kitarani.” Yeso ati nematane.
Ahiyata‑ya Yeso tokomatase, Deoso‑ya hiyare, hini ati‑nima ati namatasematane.
Yeso kamatase, nokobisa nafe ihi mai amonamatasa, mai‑ya hiyaramatasematane. Mai dodafiya, mai ati yanani awirameteni.
Yeso tokomatase, kamatase, mai amonamatasameteni.
“Dai dodafihi, dai amonaro. Hibayata Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadabara mai‑ya owa‑ya daanebona kamane, ahiyata‑ya. Dai nahomisamahi. Ai tokomahi.” Yeso ati nematane.

Yeso hiyaranasa neya, mai 12 kana mai‑ka owa i‑di Yoda mai dama mai eyehe kamemarine. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai toha, mai na, mai ati ihi Yoda‑ya mai dami sawemaroni. Yima‑ya mai one aka, awa‑ya mai one aka namaroni.
Hibati‑ya Yoda mai‑ya hiyare,
“Yeso‑ya dai‑ya yofi·okanabone, Yeso toma·onabone, fare dai waratoneya, sekorasa mai dai dabiya dai towakamayaho.” Ati nematane.
Yeso‑ya Yoda kame,
“Ayo” ati ne, fai‑ya tomanemarine.
Yeso‑ya mai waratonamaroni, fai‑ya mai towakamabonehe.
Maki yima‑ya nawaane sawi, yima‑ya sobanaki, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote‑ya na‑narifa narabo‑ya tarinabasemarine.
Mai sawe mai‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Yima‑ya dai aka, awa‑ya dai aka nineni, owa‑ya dai watabonehe. Yama‑ya mai bo‑boti mai wati‑nima owa‑ya dai watinineni. Yama bo‑boti ohi awirini.
Hibati‑ya mahi‑nima Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai okanawata, owa‑ya dai wataramaroni. Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑nima yama nawahabone ihi owa‑ya dai watineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai habi siitona, mai kananamaroni.
Maki yetene bora saya‑nima na‑ya weyene, hika bora famaramaroni. Yeso‑ya mai towakama mai nowati‑ya maki tokomakiya, sekorasa mai awa, mai hiwatemarine.
Maki bodi kanani toke, hika bora mai damahinakosamaroni.

Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso‑ya mai towakamameteni. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai toha, mai na, hidi webote tabaro‑ya mai yorotokanameteni.
Yama yaki‑ya Bedoro yotomatane. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote‑ka yobe fowari barikane doro‑ya tokomaki, sekorasa eyehe itabase, yifo‑ya mai hiwanameteni.

Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai one nafi toha na, mai yorotokanameteni, Yeso‑ya mai nanahababonehe. Yeso tamine‑mona‑ya keyehe‑ya mai hirinabone mai‑ya mai sibanameteni. Mai‑ka keyehe fara hinama kafamabone mai‑ya mai wasirameteni.
Yeso tamine‑mona‑ya mai dama keyehe‑ya mai hirina, owa ati bare toha, owa ati bare toha, owa ati bare toha, mai nameteni, keyehe‑ya mai hirinaro.
Mai one‑ya mai keyehebone mai nahomisa, mai ati yanana,
“‘Deoso‑ka yobe maki mai wamahinemata onahabeya, amoni 3 kane‑ya wama·onamatasaboneni. Owati yananiya, yobe hawa tohebonane.’ Yeso ati nene.” Mai one ati nameteni.
Mai ati fara hinama tohi awirameteni.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote waamise, ati yanane,
“Yeso, mai ati timitineni? Hini yamata‑nima tiwati nibati?” Ati nematane.
Yeso ati yanani awire, mai‑ka hidi ati yananamatase,
“Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika amatiraniha? Deoso Bidi amatini?” Ati nematane.
Yeso ati yanane,
“Fara ama·oni. Deoso mano kanika‑ya owitariya, owa‑ya dai awa, neme sabi‑ya okomatasiya, owa‑ya dai awa naboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ati‑ya mai‑ka hidi webote mite, yawe, hika bora namidi‑ya sibikari, ati yanane,
“Ati dai mitaho. Mai one ati tohiya, Yeso hini ati ene abaho.
Deoso Bidi‑mona ati ne, keyehe‑ya hirine, haa‑nima mai ati na, mai‑ya ai nanahabateni. Hini yamata‑nima dai ati niti?” Mai‑ka hidi webote ati nematane.
“Yeso towe amane. Abaho!” Mai nafi ati nameteni.
Yeso‑ya mai firo, Yeso noko mai barihikane, mai one koohinisa hine,
“Ebeni‑ke tiwa‑ya koonisa?” Mai ati nameteni.
Sekorasa Yeso‑ya mai towakama, Yeso noko‑ya mai batanameteni.
Yobe fowari barikani nafi doro‑ya mai dama mai naha, mai‑ya Bedoro wai‑ya Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote‑ya na‑narifa one atona kamakemeteni.
Bedoro yifo‑ya hiwane‑ya atona awa, ati yanana,
“Yeso Nasare‑ke‑ya sa‑sawi amatiraniha?” Atona ati na,
“Maki‑ya osawiterani. Tiwati owatorini.” Bedoro ati ne,
yobe fowari barikane‑ka nokobi‑kaya toke, waimatane.
Mai one sawe, Bedoro tamine‑ya atona hiyara,
“Nokobi‑kaya wai Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai‑ka owa amane.” Atona ati na,
“Yeso‑ya osawiterani.” Bedoro ati namatasematane.
Mai naho bide tohiya, Bedoro‑ya mai one hiyara,
“Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai‑ka owa amatini. Karireya‑ya mai wi‑wina mai‑ka owa amatini.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Keyehe‑ya hiri·oterani. Keyehe‑ya hiri·oniya, Deoso owa‑ya nanahabeba awane. Maki owato awirini.” Bedoro ati nematane.
Bedoro ati fawaneya, arakawa haani yananamatasematane. Arakawa haani‑ya Bedoro mite, Yeso ati‑ya Bedoro atibodi watinawame,
“Arakawa haani yanani fami awisareya,
‘Yeso owatorini.’ Tinaboneni.
Tiwati yanani 3 kana boneni.” Yeso ati ne,
ati‑ya Bedoro atibodi watinawame, ohinawahematane.

Yama wahabisari‑ya Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai one nafi toha, mai na, mai ibi hiyara, mai ati ihi Yeso mano‑ya mai sokikasa, Birato‑ya Yeso‑ya mai towakama, mai daahinemarine.
Yeso‑ya Birato hiyare,
“Yodeo mai‑ka hidi webote amatiraniha?” Birato ati ne,
“Tiwati‑nima, fara ama·oni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi Yeso ene towe damemona tamine‑ya keyehe‑ya mai hirinamaroni.
“Yeso, mai ati dama mai ati timita, tiwati yananahi.” Birato ati ne,
Yeso ati yanaremarine.
“Ka! Hini yamata‑bone Yeso ati yanarihi?” Birato atibodi ati nemarine.
Ka‑kariwa‑ya oda mariniya, ai owa ohari‑ya Birato seekitine, mai yofihikane‑ya Birato seehikatene.
Hibati‑ya kofeno‑ya mai one weenamaroni. Kofeno‑ka owa‑ya mai nanahaba mai‑ya Barabasi dabemari, sodado mai hiwate, kadeya‑ya mai hinawaimarine.
Birato‑ka yobe‑ya mai dama mai yorotokana, mai ati yanana,
“Hibati‑ka tiwa ene‑nima tiwa ene niya, oda owa seetikanahi.” Mai dama mai ati namaroni.
“Ebeni‑ke see·okabati? Yodeo dai‑ka hidi webote‑ya dai ati kobona awineni.” Birato ati nemarine.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai atibodi ati‑ya i‑di Birato wato, Yeso‑ya mai dama mai nofa, mai ihi Yeso‑ya hidi mai kakoteni.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai ati ihi mai dama mai ati yanana,
“Barabasi seetikanahi.” Mai ati namaroni.
“‘Yodeo oda‑ka hidi webote amane.’ Dai ati na,
hini yamata‑nima obati?” Birato ati nemarine.
“Awa‑ya baakanaho.” Mai dama mai ati na, mai ati kitamaroni.
“Hini yamata ihi baa·okabati? Ene towe wadarene.” Birato ati ne,
hiniya mai ati kitawaha,
“Awa‑ya baakanaho. Awa‑ya baakanaho.” Mai ati namaroni.
Mai dama mai ati somawamabone, Birato ati ene Barabasi‑ya mai seekana, Yeso‑ya mai kosina, sodado mai‑ya Birato yosemarine, Yeso‑ya mai baakanabonehe.
Birato‑ka yobe doro‑ya Yeso‑ya sodado mai towakamamaroni. Sodado mai dama mai yorotokanameteni.
Sodado mai ihi hidi‑ka bora a‑asabina‑ya Yeso weyenawahematane. Hidi‑ka sabewa‑nima yama na‑bone mado atona‑ya sodado mai kemona, Yeso tati‑ya mai hiwataremeteni.
Yeso‑ya mai yasina,
“Yodeo mai‑ka hidi webote amatini.” Mai ati nameteni.
Awa bide‑ya Yeso tati‑ya mai kosi, Yeso‑ya mai firona, mai yobati‑kaya mai naha, mai moikanisa, mai nahameteni.
Mai yasini hawa toha, bora a‑asabina‑ya mai taninisama, Yeso hini hika bora‑ya weyenamatase, mai hiwakamematane, mai baahikanebonaha.

Simaho Sireni‑ke kabani‑kaya yanane, kame, mai‑ya kobonemarine. I‑di Aresadiri i‑di Hofo mai fama mai‑ka abi i‑di Simaho amane. Simaho‑ya sodado mai awa, Simaho‑ya mai haanamaroni, Yeso ewene‑bona‑ya diwanebonaha.
Kokota‑ya Yeso‑ya mai towakamamaroni. Ai ati‑ya adami oni, ‘ai tati tone wai’ tohani.
Fino mira‑ya daba mai daahinaya, Yeso fawaremarine.
Yeso‑ya mai baakana, Yeso borone‑ya mai kayafabone, yati bide‑ya mai werena, mai kiihinamaroni.
Mahi itamise, 9 ora tohi yanani‑ya Yeso‑ya mai baakanamaroni.
Yama ihi ababone tamine kawana,
“Yodeo mai‑ka hidi webote amane.” Yama hani kawana ati namaroni.
Yama‑ya mai bo‑boti mai fama mai‑ya mai baakana, Yeso mano kanika‑ya owa mai baahikana, mano sayo‑kaya owa mai baahikana hinemarine.
(Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑nima yamana yananamaroni.
“‘Towe mai‑ka owa amane.’ Mai ati naboneni.” Deoso‑ka yama hani ati na,
ati‑nima towe mai eyehe Yeso abemarine.)
Hawi‑ya mai yakana Yeso baakane awa‑ya waane‑ya mai awa, Yeso‑ya mai weena, mai tati weona, mai ati yanana,
“Ka! Deoso‑ka yobe tinahabiya, mahi 3 kane‑ya wamatinamatasebona tina,
tiwa tikasomiya, awa‑ya tikisamahi.” Mai ati namaroni.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha na, Yeso‑ya mai weena, mai ibi hiyara,
“Mai one‑ya kasomemari, hini kasomi‑ya wato awirane.
Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika‑mona ati ne, ai‑ka wami hidi webote tohemona ati ne, awa‑ya kisame ai aweya, ati ai nofamakibonane.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yeso eyehe awa‑ya mai mai baahikana, mai one ati‑nima mai ati namaroni.
Mahi nokorise‑ya mahi wehene fawane, 3 ora‑ya wehene yananamatasemarine.
Fara 3 ora‑ya Yeso ati yanane, ati kite,
“Ero·i, Ero·i, rama sabakani.” Yeso ati ne,
Ai ati‑ya
“Oka Deoso amatini. Oka Deoso amatini. Hini yamata ihi owa‑ya tikahabaniti?” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai sawe, Yeso ati‑ya mai mita,
“Eriya‑ya haane awane.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yeso ati‑ya maki mite, fino wiye‑kaya kanani tokome, yama kitara‑ya fino kofate‑ya sorokari, awa bide‑ya dasihinakosa, yorihikamisamakemaroni, Yeso hifebonehe. Maki ati yanane,
“Ai nimanaho. Eriya kameba awane, Yeso‑ya idibasebonaha.” Maki ati nemarine.
Yeso eekane, abawahemarine.
Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya bora kita winamaro, Yeso abeya, bora tati‑ya kebi yanana, nafi kebemeteni.
Yeso noko‑ya sodado mai‑ka hidi wai, Yeso abe‑ya awe, ati yanane,
“Deoso Bidi amane. Keyehe tohi awirini.” Ati nemarine.
Ahiyata to‑toha ni‑ya mai fanawi naha, i‑di Mariya Madarena toha, i‑di Yako, i‑di Yose, mai na, mai‑ka ami i‑di Mariya toha, i‑di Sarome toha, mai na, mai fanawi one‑ya mai sawemaroni.
Hibati‑ya Karireya‑ya Yeso yakaneya, mai kasomamaro, Yerosare‑ya Yeso tokeya, mai fanawi one dama tokomakemaroni.

Yose Arimateya‑ke Yodeo mai‑ka hidi bidi owa amane. Yose yama‑ya wato, Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona‑ya nimanemarine. Yose i‑di Birato‑ya nayofine, yama soki bide‑ya habo kitawame, Birato‑ya tokematane. Sabado yananabone ihi Yeso abo‑ya haanematane.
Yose ati‑ya i‑di Birato mite,
“Yeso abi awireba awane.” Atibodi ati ne,
Sodado mai‑ka hidi‑ya Birato haane,
“Yeso abakare?” Birato ati ne,
“Hehe, abene.” Sodado mai‑ka hidi ati nematane.
Birato ati ene Yeso abo‑ya i‑di Yose kayafematane.

Bora boni yaba‑ya Yose kanike, bora‑ya towakame, Yeso abo‑ya idibase, abo bora‑ya kinihikane, ai temene‑ka yati hodi‑bone wamahinamete‑ya abo hinafoye, nokobi‑ya yati webote‑ya horonawame, hodi‑ya barikanematane.
I‑di Mariya Madarena toha, i‑di Yose madi i‑di Mariya toha, mai na, Yeso abo mai hinafoye‑ya mai awameteni.
Sabado nowati‑ya i‑di Mariya Madarena toha, i‑di Yako madi i‑di Mariya toha, i‑di Sarome toha, mai na, yama mahi amosa‑ya mai kanikameteni, Yeso abo‑ya mai ketehebonehe.
Domiko‑ya mai bosakana, yama wahabisari‑ya Yeso temene‑ya mai kobokani awisari‑ya mai ibi hiyara,
“Ebeni‑ke nokobi‑ya seekabati, ai towakiyomi‑bone‑karo?” Mai ati na,
mai kobokana,
mai noki toka, nokobi‑ya mai awa, yati webote‑ya karotowiti hawa tohameteni.
Mai towakiyoma, maki yetene‑ya mai awameteni. Mai‑ka kanika‑ya maki itari, bora sawa‑ya weyene, maki‑ya mai awa, mai sotatonameteni.
“Dai habo siitoriyahi. Yeso Nasare‑ke mai baahikane, abo dai awebona, dai ati na, haa‑ya awimare, kitame, tokane, fori tabaro dai awaho.” Ati nematane.
“Dai towakamahi. Bedoro toha, Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai one toha na, mai‑ya dai hiyariya, eya dai ati nahi.
‘Karireya‑kaya tokebona, dai tokomakihi. Yeso ati‑mari‑nima Karireya‑ya dai awebonane.’ Dai ati niyahi.” Maki ati nematane.
Mai fanawi habi siitona, mai wawawakana, mai kana kana, mai one‑ya mai hiyari awirameteni.
(Hibati‑ya Mariya Madarena‑ya madi towe mai 7 kana mai foyamaro, Yeso ati ene madi towe mai kananamaroni. Domiko, yama wahi yanatoni‑ya Yeso kitame, toke, Mariya Madarena‑ya koboni dai tohematane.
Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai ohinasa niya, Yeso kitame tamine‑ya Mariya kamina,
“Yeso kitameno, oawani.” Mariya Madarena ati na, ati‑ya mai nofarameteni.
Makobote Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai fama, kabani‑ya mai towaka, Yeso‑ya mai kobona, Yeso‑ya mai awa, Yeso noko bare tohematane.
Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai fama mai towakamake, Yeso tamine‑ya mai kamina, mai ati‑ya mai nofarameteni.
Makobote Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai 11 kana mai tafiya Yeso kobone, mai‑ya weene, Yeso kitame tamine‑ya mai one hiyara mai ati‑ya mai nofara, mai habi kita mai‑ya Yeso weenematane.
Mai‑ya weeni hawa tohe, mai‑ya yose,
“Yama nafi‑ya dai yakanawariya, mai nafi‑ya Deoso ati amosabote tamine dai kaminahi.
Deoso ati amosabote ati‑ya mai nofa, mai dai habanirisiya, Deoso tabaro‑ya mai saweboneni. Deoso ati amosabote ati‑ya mai nofara, wara hirini‑ya mai‑ya weenebonane.
Deoso ati amosabote ati‑ya mai nofa owati ihi mai ihi kitaboneni. Mai ihi‑ya mai one awiya,
‘Deoso‑ka mai amani.’ Mai ati naboneni.
Fara mai ati ihi madi towe mai kana, mai one ati‑ya mai hiyara naboneni.
Iha‑ya mai fawiya, mai kiyarihi, maka mai‑ya wainiya, komarihi, mai kiyana mai‑ya mai boyoniya, mai ihi mai kitama, mai naboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Ai‑ka Ayo Yeso hiyari hawa toheya, Deoso ene neme‑ya tokome, Deoso mano kanika‑ya itariwahematane.
Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba yama nafi‑ya mai yakanaware, mai‑ya mai hiyaramaroni. Ai‑ka Ayo mai‑ya kasome, mai ihi kitamaroni, mai ihi‑ya mai awiya, mai ati mai hinofabonehe.)
Ai one sawi‑kaya yama yanana tamine mai dama mai kanahanamaroni.
Yeso ene‑ya mai awamaro Yeso ene‑ya mai nokotonihe, ai‑ya mai kanawatowahamaroni.
Mai ati omita, mai‑ka yama hani okadika, yama owatowahamaroni. Ti·ofiro, tika yama hani‑bone okanahanoneni. Yeso ene tamine okamini amosineni.
Hibati‑ya Yeso tamine timitemari, tosawari awira tiwatowahabone Yeso tamine okamini amosineni.

Yodeya‑ya mai wi‑wina mai‑ka hidi webote i‑di Erodi tohanasa ne‑ka yama tamine okaminineni. I‑di Sakariya i‑di Abiyasi‑ka nodi tohe, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka owa tohematane. Sakariya fadi oni i‑di Isabeo toha, i‑di Araho‑ka nodi tohameteni.
Sakariya fadi‑ya fame mai ihi amosa, Deoso ati‑nima mai ihi nameteni.
Hibati‑ya mai kahiwara, mai‑ka ewe wadare, bote mai tohikimawahameteni.
Sakariya hika mai eyehe yati bide‑ya werene, mai kiihina, Sakariya oni sone‑ya mai awa, Sakariya‑ya mai yosemeteni, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya yama mahi amosa‑ya sarikanebonaha.
Yama mahi amosa sarikanebonaya, Deoso‑ka yobe nokobiri‑kaya mai dama mai nahokosa, Deoso‑ya mai hiyarameteni.
Yama mahi amosa‑ya Sakariya anineya, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose fodoki, waane, yama mahi amosa a‑amimi‑ka yama wiye wai‑kaya waimatane.
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose‑ya Sakariya awe, habo siitone, kakomehematane.
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati yanane,
“Sakariya, tiwa habo siitoriyahi. Deoso tiwati‑ya mitane, tika yibote i‑di Isabeo naba tohawahabone, bidi wadeya, oni Yowaho tohayaho.
