Yowaho wadeya, dai ya‑yainaboneni. Yowaho tamine mai himiteya, mai dama mai ya‑yainahareboneni.
Yowaho Deoso hiyosewahebona, kawi‑ya fawarihi, fino‑ya fawarihi tebonane. Wadi awisareya, Deoso‑ka Doni sawibonane.
Ati ene Isara·eo‑ka nodi Deoso ati‑ya mai nofamatasaboneni.

I‑di Eriya ene‑mata‑nima i‑di Yowaho ene namakitasebonane. Mai atibodi‑ya hawa tonihibonane, Deoso‑ya mai nimanabonehe. Yowaho ati ene mai‑ka madehe‑ya mai nofaboneni. Hibati‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadabaramaro, tika dao ene Deoso ati‑ya mai nofawahaboneni.” Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati nematane.
“Oka yibote oda bote tohikima, hini yamata‑nima tiwa ene nibati, tiwati onofabonehe?” Sakariya ati nematane.
“Kabireo ama·oni. Deoso‑kaya osawiteni. Deoso owa‑ya yosene, ati amosabote tiwa‑ya okaminebonaha.
Owati tinofara, tiwati fawanaboneni. Tika dao wadeya, tiwati yananamatasaboneni. Owati‑nima yama naboneni.” Kabireo ati nematane.
Yobe‑ka nokobi‑ya Sakariya‑ya mai nimana,
“Ka! Hini yamata tohimati, Sakariya kamareri?” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.
Sakariya kame, ati‑ba wadamare, hini yehe‑ya mai‑ya hiyarematane.
“Yobe doro‑ya wada‑nima yama na‑ya Sakariya awane.” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.
Sakariya‑ka yama anini hawa tohiya, hini tabaro‑ya tokomematane.
Sakariya amoni fa‑famaraba neya, fadi i‑di Isabeo naba tohawahameteni. Abariko 5 kane‑ya mai one tabori‑ya tokara, hini tamine‑ya kemameteni.
“Deoso ati ene naba ohawahani. Hibati‑ya naba ohara, owa‑ya mai nofara, Deoso owa‑ya kasome, owa‑ya mai nofawahaboneni.” Isabeo atibodi ati nameteni.
Isabeo naba tohi‑ke abariko 6 kane‑ya, Kabireo i‑di Deoso hiyose, Nasare Karireya‑ya tokawahematane. Kabireo i‑di Deoso‑ka yo‑yose amane.
I‑di Mariya Nasare Karireya‑ya wina, maki mai one‑ya siwakarameteni. Mariya i‑di Yose fadi‑bone fai‑ya fami awisarameteni. Yose i‑di Dafi‑ka nodi tohematane.
I‑di Mariya‑ya Kabireo kobone, fai‑ya hiyare,
“Ya‑yaitinahi. Deoso tiwa‑ya nofe, tiwa‑ya kasomane.” Ati nematane.
Mariya habi siitona, atibodi yama‑ya dika,
“Hini yamata‑nima yama naba? Deoso owa‑ya nofe, owa‑ya kasomemonane.” Atibodi ati nameteni.
“Mariya, tiwa habo siitoriyahi. Deoso tiwa kasomi‑ya nofane.” Kabireo ati nematane.
“Owati timitahi. Naba tihabone, tika dao wadeya, oni haatiyaho. Yeso tebonane.
‘Deoso kitabote Bidi amane.’ Mai ati teboneni.
Dai‑ka idi i‑di Dafi mai‑ka hidi kitemata, fare‑ka nodi i‑di Yeso tohe, Deoso ene ai nafi‑ka hidi tebonane.
Yako‑ka nodi dai toha, dai‑ka hidi oharitebona, kiti fawaterebonane.” Kabireo ati nematane.
“Naba ohabone, hini yamata ihi naba ohibati? Maki owa‑ya ahaterene.” Mariya ati na,
“Deoso‑ka Doni tiwa‑ya sawibona, Deoso ene kitabote ati ene naba tihaboneni. Deoso Bidi wadeya, mai awiya,
‘Deoso Bidi amane.’ Mai ati naboneni.
Tika naki i‑di Isabeo bote toha, naba tohaterabone, mai ati na, abariko 6 kane‑ya naba tohawahineni.
Deoso ene kitabote amane. Yama nafi‑ya watone.” Kabireo ati nematane.
“Deoso‑ya na‑narifa ama·oni. Tiwati‑nima yama nahi.” Mariya ati na,
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose tokomematane.
Makobote Yodeya‑ka adami fota dama‑kaya i‑di Isabeo tabori‑ya Mariya toka kanibote nameteni.
Sakariya‑ka yobe‑ya Mariya tokiyoma, i‑di Isabeo‑ya hiyarameteni.
Mariya ati‑ya i‑di Isabeo mita, fai dori‑ya foye ya‑yaine, tainematane. Deoso‑ka Doni ati ene
i‑di Isabeo ati kita,
“Mariya ya‑yaitinahi. Mai fanawi one‑ya Deoso kasomi bi‑bidi, tiwa‑ya kasomi nafi, tika dao‑ya kasoma nane.
Amosabote ama·ora, oka Hidi webote madi owa tabaro‑ya kobona, ya‑yai·oneni.
Tiwati omita, ewe ya‑yaine, owa nabadi‑ya tainane.
Mariya ya‑yaitinahi. Naba tihi awisari‑ya Deoso ati‑ya tinofamaroni.” Isabeo ati nameteni.
Mariya ati yanana,
“‘Deoso amosabote amane.’ Owatibodi ati nineni.
Deoso owa‑ya kasome ene ya‑yai·oneni.
Deoso‑ya na‑narifa ama·oni. Owa‑ya mai nofara, Deoso owa‑ya nofe, Deoso ati ene owa tamine‑ya mai hiyarabone,
‘Mariya Deoso hinofi nofani.’ Mai ati nabone,
‘Mariya Deoso hinofi nafemeteni.’ Mai‑ka nodi mai ati namakeboneni.
Deoso kitabote owa‑ya kasome, amosabote amane.
Deoso‑ya ai‑ka idi mai nayofina mai‑ya Deoso kasomemata, fare hini ene‑mata‑nima ene nasa ne, Deoso‑ya ai nayofina ai‑ya kasomatene.
Deoso ene kitabote tohe, mai kitamone mai ati na, mai‑ya kananihimatane.
Deoso ati ene hidi webote mai kiti fawana, mai one kitara mai kitawahameteni.
Mai fi‑fimi tohamete Deoso ati ene yamata amosa‑ya mai kaba, mai korimanawaha, mai‑ka yama dama tohamete, Deoso ati ene mai honita tohawama nameteni.
Isara·eo‑ka nodi ai toha, Deoso‑ya ai na‑narifa ai amani. Deoso ai‑ya nofe, ai‑ya kasomatene.
Ai‑ka idi i‑di Abaraho‑ya Deoso hiyare,
‘Tiwa, tika nodi mai na, dai‑ya okasomateboneni.’ Deoso ati nematane.
Fare ati‑mata‑nima ene nane.” Mariya ati nameteni.
Abariko 3 kane‑ya i‑di Isabeo tabori‑ya i‑di Mariya wina, makobote hini tabori‑ya tokomameteni.
I‑di Isabeo dori kome yanana, bidi wadawahematane.
Isabeo‑ya Deoso kasomi nafi tamine‑ya mai mita, i‑di Isabeo‑ka mai toha, i‑di Isabeo yakari‑ya mai wi‑wina mai toha, mai na, mai ya‑yainameteni.
Bidi wade amoni 8 kane‑ya mai tokomakemeteni, sowiri tati ataro mai wisihinakose‑ya mai awabonehe.
“Badi oni‑ya weyenaho.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Badi oni‑ya weyeterebonane, Yowaho tohebonane.” Madi ati nameteni.
“Yowaho oni‑ya tika mai one weyeterani.” Mai ati nameteni.
Badi‑ya mai haana,
“Eme tika dao oni nabati?” Mai yahi ati nameteni.
Hini yehe‑ya bebeo‑nima na‑ya haane, bebeo‑nima na‑ya mai daahine, oni hikanahano,
“I‑di Yowaho tohane.”
“Se! Yowaho oni tohabarama?” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.
Bidi oni‑ya kanahano hawa toheya, ati yananamawahe, Deoso‑ya kahiyarematane.
Tamine mai himite, Sakariya‑ka yobe yakari‑ya mai wi‑wina mai habi siitonameteni. Yodeya‑ka adami webote dami‑kaya mai wi‑wina Yowaho tamine‑ya mai ibi hiyarameteni.
Yowaho‑ya Deoso kasome tamine‑ya mai mita, mai atibodi yama‑ya kadika,
“Hini yamata‑nima ewe tebamanati?” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.
Deoso‑ka Doni ene Yowaho badi i‑di Sakariya ati yanane,
“Deoso ene amosabote amane. Isara·eo‑ka nodi ai toha, Deoso‑ka ai amani. Deoso ai‑ya kasomamatasane.
Fara Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai ati‑mete‑nima yama naboneni.
Ai‑ya mai watikana, ai‑ya mai ka‑kako mai‑ya ati barinebonane.
Ai‑ka idi mai‑ya Deoso nofe, ai‑ya kasomebona ati ne, hini ati‑nima ai‑ya kasomebonane.
Ai‑ka idi i‑di Abaraho‑ya Deoso hiyare,
‘Owati abateraboneni.
Tika nodi mai‑ya okasomabone, mai‑ya mai one bisinamarabone, tika nodi owa‑ya mai narifabone, mai habi siitonamaraboneni.
Mai ihi amosabone, owati‑ya mai tokadababone, yama maakani awiraboneni.’ Deoso ati nemata,
fara yama yananaboneni.” Sakariya ati nematane.
Sakariya hini bidi ene tamine‑bona‑ya hiyare,
“Ewe, ai‑ka hidi webote kamakibona, ai atibodi hawine‑ya hawatiniwahaboneni. Fara ihi
‘Deoso Kitabote ati‑ya mi‑mita amatini.’ Mai ati naboneni.
Deoso‑ka ai toha ai‑ya kasomebona, ai ene towe manakone‑ya Deoso haanamaterebona tamine‑ya tihiyarawahaboneni.
Yama soki‑ya mai naha mai kome fawaterabone‑ka hawi‑ya mai sawi, Deoso Bidi ene Deoso ati somebona‑ka hawi ai watowahaboneni.” Sakariya ati nematane.
Ewe yanawahe, Deoso ati‑ya nofi nafiwahematane. Isara·eo‑ka nodi mai‑ya Yowaho hiyari awisare, tabora awiri‑ya ohari winematane.

Hibati‑ya tabora nafi‑ka ai oni‑ya Sesa Akosito ati ene hika mai kanahano damamaroni. I‑di Yowaho wadi nowati‑ya ai oni‑ya mai kanahano, fara tamine okaminaboneni. I‑di Kirino Siriya‑ya mai wi‑wina mai‑ka kofenado tohe‑ya ai oni‑ya kanahano daidi tamine amane.
Ai‑ka idi mai tabori‑ya oda nafi tokomamaroni, ai oni‑ya sodado mai kanahanaro.
Bere‑ya Mariya dori kome yananameteni.
Mai‑ka oteo‑ya Yose fadi eyehe winebona, oteo kibamone mai ati na, yobe one‑ya Yose fadi eyehe wine, Mariya bidi wade, bora ibe‑ya mai kinihikane, bani mai tafe wiye‑ya forimatane.
Bere yakari‑ya yobe awire‑kaya kaneiro mai‑ya mai na‑nawada mai sawe, yama soki‑ya mai nahokosameteni.
Mai nahokosiya, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai noki‑ya fodoki, Deoso wehene sawi ene mai naho‑kaya yama tehewama, mai habi siitonameteni.
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai‑ya hiyare,
“Dai habo siitoriyahi. Yama amosa tamine okaminabone, owati dai mita, dai ya‑yainaboneni. Bofe‑ya dai wi‑wina dai nafi‑ya Deoso kasomebonane.
Hibayata Dafi tabaro‑mata‑ya ewe wade, dai‑ya Ka‑kasoma‑tebona amane. Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika amane. Ai‑ka Hidi Webote amane.
Owati dai nofabone, dai awebona tamine okaminebonane. Ewe dai wasiya, bora ibe‑ya mai kinihikane, bani mai tafe wiye‑ya forine.” Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati nematane.
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose wai‑ya Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai one dama fodomake, Deoso‑ya mai kahiyara,
“Deoso neme‑ya wine, Deoso amosabote amane. Bofe‑ya dai wi‑wina, Deoso dai‑ya nofe, dai ya‑yainahi.” Mai ati nameteni.
Neme‑ya Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai tokoma, mai nowati‑ya kaneiro mai‑ya mai na‑nawada mai ibi hiyara,
“Hima, Bere‑ya ai tokahi. Deoso ati ene tamine ai mite, ai awaho.” Mai ati nameteni.
Mai toka kanibote na, i‑di Mariya, i‑di Yose, ewe ne‑ya mai awameteni. Bani mai tafe wiye‑ya ewe fori‑ya mai awa,
mai awi hawa hihe, mai wininama, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati‑ya mai kaminameteni, mai dami‑ya.
Kaneiro mai‑ya mai na‑nawada mai ati‑ya mai mita, mai atibodi yama‑ya kadikameteni.
I‑di Mariya atibodi yama‑ya kadiki fawani awirameteni.
Kaneiro mai‑ya mai na‑nawada, mai‑ka kaneiro mai‑ya mai tokomatasa, mai ya‑yaini nafe, yama tamine amosa‑ya mai mita, yama amosa‑ya mai awa na, Deoso‑ya mai kahiyarameteni.
Hibati‑ya Mariya naba tohi awisari‑ya Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati‑ya Mariya mitameteni. Ewe amoni 8 kane‑ya Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati‑nima bidi oni Yeso tohawahe, sowiri tati ataro mai wisihinakosematane.
Deoso‑ka yama hani ati,
“Ewe daidi maki toheya, Deoso‑ya dai daanayaho, Deoso‑ka tohebonaha.” Yama hani ati nineni.
Deoso‑ka yama hani ati one,
“Dai‑ka ewe manakone‑bona okoko mai fama mai dai daanahi, Deoso‑ya. Okoko mai awiriya, wayomata mai fama mai dai daanibisahi.” Yama hani ati nineni.
Fara Mose‑ka Yama hani ati‑nima Deoso‑ka bani bidi mai‑bone mai‑ya mai daanameteni.

Simiyaho tamine timitahi. Yerosare‑ya i‑di Simiyaho sawi, ene amose, Deoso ati‑ya nofematane. Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika Isara·eo‑ka nodi mai‑ya kasomatebona yama hani ati na, fara‑ya Simiyaho nimanematane. Deoso‑ka Doni Simiyaho‑ya sawimatane.
Hibati‑ya Deoso‑ka Doni ati‑ya Simiyaho mite,
“Simiyaho, ti·abi awisa tiriya, Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika tiwebonane.” Deoso‑ka Doni ati nematane.
Deoso‑ka Doni ati ene Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Simiyaho tokiyomematane. Yeso badi, Yeso madi, mai na mai kamakemeteni, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑nima Yeso‑ya mai daanabonehe, Deoso‑ya.
Yeso‑ya i‑di Simiyaho awe, Yeso‑ya waratone, Yeso‑ya diwane, Deoso‑ya kahiyare,
“Deoso, tiwa‑ya na‑narifa ama·oni. Tika Ka‑kadika oawebona tinamaro, tiwati‑nima oawawahane. Hibayata o·abiya, yama sibaraboneni. Ya‑yai·oneni.
Tika Ka‑kadika mai dami‑ya kasomatebona oawane.
Mai nafi hiawawahebonane.
Tika Ka‑kadika yama wahi‑nima ne, tiwa hawine‑ya Bara mai‑ya yofikanebonane. Isara·eo‑ka nodi ai toha tika ai amani. Tika Ka‑kadika ene ai ya‑yainaboneni.” Simiyaho ati nematane.
Yeso tamine‑ya Simiyaho hiyare, ati‑ya Yeso badi, madi, mai na, mai mita, mai atibodi yama‑ya kadikameteni.
I‑di Simiyaho mai‑ya kasomebona mai tamine‑ya Deoso‑ya hiyare,
“Deoso, mai kasomi tinafihi.” Simiyaho ati ne,
Mariya‑ya hiyare,
“Owati timitahi. Deoso‑ka hawi‑ya mai sawira, tika dao ene Deoso hawine‑ya mai sawiwahabone, mai one amosamone tika dao ene mai atibodi towe mai dami watowahaboneni. Tika dao‑ya mai weenaboneni.
Simiyaho hiyari hawa toheya, Ana kamakemeteni. Ase‑ka nodi amani. I‑di Fanoeo bide amani. Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita amani. Bote tohawahameteni. Hibati‑ya fanamete, ano 7 kane‑ya maki abe,
i‑di Ana hasinibisa, hika ano 84 tohameteni. Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya i‑di Ana sawi fawara, yama tehe‑ya Deoso‑ya hiyara, yama soki‑ya Deoso‑ya hiyara, tafi nafira, Deoso‑ya kahiyarameteni.

I‑di Ana kamake, Yeso‑ya awa, ya‑yaina, Deoso‑ya kahiyarameteni. Deoso ati ene Yerosare‑ya Bara mai kayafamarabone, Deoso‑ka yama hani ati na, yama hani ati‑ya mai nimana, fara mai‑ya Yeso tamine‑ya i‑di Ana kaminameteni.
Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑nima mai ihi hawa toha, hini mai tabori‑ya mai tokomawaha, Nasare Karireya‑ya mai tabori tohameteni.
Yeso yane, kitawahe, yama‑ya watowahematane. Yeso‑ya Deoso nofe, Yeso‑ya kasomematane.
I‑di Yeso‑ka ano 12 tohawahiya, ka‑kariwa kobonami yanatoniya, Yerosare‑ya mai tokomatasameteni, mai tafabonehe.
Ka‑kariwa‑ka mahi 7 kane hawa toheya, hini mai tabori‑ya mai tokoma, Yeso‑ta Yerosare‑ya towakose, badi, madi mai na Yeso‑ya mai watomarameteni.
“Ai dama ai one‑ya Yeso sawi awane.” Badi, madi, mai atibodi ati nameteni.
Yama soki‑ya Yeso‑ya mai sibanameteni.
Yeso‑ya mai wasira, Yerosare‑ya mai winitokanamameteni, Yeso‑ya mai sibanabonehe.
Mahi 3 kane‑ya Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai hiwasiwamematane. Deoso ati‑ya mai ka‑kanawato mai‑ya dabe, mai ati‑ya mite, mai‑ya hiyarematane.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita,
“Ka! Yeso yama‑ya watone.” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.
I‑di Yose fadi‑ya fame, Yeso‑ya mai awa, mai atibodi yama‑ya kadikameteni. Yeso‑ya madi hiyara,
“Hini yamata ihi fawatiniti? Tiwa‑ya abi oda sibana, tiwa ene oda‑ka yama yofinani.” Madi ati nameteni.
“Okobi noko·onihe, Okobi‑ka yobe‑ya osawe, hini yamata ihi owa‑ya sibatiniti?” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ati‑ya mai watorameteni.
Nasare‑kaya Yeso badi, madi mai na mai eyehe tokome, mai ati‑ya tokadabematane. Yeso ati‑ya Mariya atibodi kadiki fawani awirameteni.
Yeso yetene tohawahe, yama‑ya watowahematane. I‑di Yeso‑ya Deoso nofi nafi, Yeso ati‑ya mai dama mai nofameteni.

I‑di Yowaho mai dama mai‑ya hiyare, hika ano tamine okaminaboneni. Ai nafi‑ka hidi webote i‑di Tibiro Sesa tohemata, fare hidi tohe‑ka hika faha fowe 15 tohi‑ya Yowaho‑ya Deoso hiyarematane. Abireni‑ka mai‑ka hidi i‑di Risaniya toha, Yodeya‑ka mai‑ka hidi i‑di Bonisiyo Birato toha, Karireya‑ka mai‑ka hidi i‑di Erodi toha, Itoreya, tirakonitisi na‑ke hidi i‑di Erodi sohori i‑di Firibi toha, mai namaroni.

Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote i‑di Anasi i‑di Kaifo mai fama mai namaroni. Tabora dami‑ka mai‑ka hidi mai oni hiri·ona, i‑di Yowaho‑ka ano tamine amani. Sakariya bidi i‑di Yowaho‑ya Deoso hiyarematane, kabani‑kaya.
Deoso ati ene Yodaho Faha‑ya Yowaho tokawahe, mai dama mai‑ya hiyare,
“Dai atibodi yama‑ya kadikiya, eya dai atibodi ati nahi.
‘Deoso, oda ene amosaramaro, oda tikasomahi, oda ene amosawamabonehe.’ Dai ati nahi.
Eya dai atibodi ati niya, Deoso dai ene manakone‑ya haanamarebona, dai‑ya haba·onirisaboneni.” Yowaho Batita ati ne, ati damematane.
Hibati‑ya Yowaho tamine‑bona‑ya Isa·iya kanahanomatamonane.
“Bofe‑ke mai‑ka owa kabani‑kaya ati yananeya,
‘Ai‑ka Hidi webote hawine‑bona dai namosahi.’ Ati nebonane.
Deoso ai‑ya kasomebona, mai nafi awawahaboneni.” Isa·iya‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Yowaho mai‑ya habanirisebona, mai dama mai kamake, mai‑ya Yowaho hiyare,
“Maka ihi‑nima dai ene na, ebeni‑ke ati ene Deoso‑ya dai nayofiniti?
Dai abarabone dai ati niya, dai ene amosawamiyahi.
‘Abaraho‑ka nodi oda amani. Deoso oda‑ya sarikiterebonane.’ Dai ati riyahi.
Owati dai mitahi. Abaraho‑ka nodi mai one‑bone‑ya Deoso ati wamane‑mana, yati‑ya mai‑ya Deoso wamane nane.

Awa bono bonora toha, awa bono kabi amosara toha na, ade ai kaana, ai sarikiteni. Fara‑nima Deoso bari‑ya maakani hawa tohane. Dai ene amosawami awiriya, awa kaana‑nima Deoso dai‑ya niwahebonane. Dai‑ya nanahabeya, dai‑ya sarikanebonane.” Yowaho ati nematane.
“Hini yamata‑nima oda nibati?” Mai dama mai ati nameteni.
“Tika bora fama toha, ai owa bora‑ya kihare, hika bora ohare‑bone daatiyahi. Tiwa tefe toha, kote daatiyahi, mai tafe wadara mai‑ya.” Yowaho ati nematane.
Kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya mai ha‑haa mai kamakemeteni, Yowaho mai‑ya habanirisebonaha.
“Ayo, hini yamata‑nima oda nibati?” Mai ati na,
“Kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya dai ha‑haa yama manakone fiyakana‑ya dai haarihi, yinero kote dai kayafarihi nahi.” Yowaho ati nematane.
“Hini yamata‑nima oda nibati?” Sodado mai ati na,
“Mai‑ka yinero honita dai haariyahi. Mai tamine keyehe‑ya dai hiririyahi. Dai‑ka yama anini manakone nafira, dai yawariyahi, dai ya‑yainibisahi.” Yowaho ati nematane.
Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika‑ya mai nafi nimana,
“Yowaho i‑di Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika tohe awane.” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.

“Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika ohi awirini. Faha‑ya dai‑ya haba·onirisabisateni. Kamaki‑bona kitabotebisa amane. Owa‑ta towebisa ama·oni. Amosabote amane. Ati ene Deoso‑ka Doni dai one‑ya sawiwahebonane. Ai nafi‑ya kadikeya, dai one‑ya sarikanebonane.
Tiriko atori abi hawa toha, atori ai sarikana‑nima mai ihi amosara mai‑ya sarikanebona, yama hirini fawateraboneni. Tiriko noki ai kayafi‑nima mai ihi amosa mai‑ya kayafebonane.” Yowaho ati nematane.
Deoso ati amosabote tamine‑ya mai‑ya hiyare, mai‑ya hiyari damematane.
Karireya‑ka mai‑ka hidi i‑di Erodi tohe, ene towe dame, anidi fadi i‑di Erodiasi‑ya famawahematane. Ene towe dama ihi i‑di Yowaho weehinematane.
Makobote Erodi Yowaho‑ya kadeya‑ya nafoye, ene towe tohamatasematane.
Yowaho mai‑ya habanirise, Yeso‑ya habanirisahari nematane. Deoso‑ya Yeso hiyare, neme‑ya Deoso seekanematane.
Yeso‑ya Deoso‑ka Doni kise, wayomata awi‑nima Deoso‑ka Doni awinematane. Neme‑ya ati kaki,
“Oka Dao amatini. Tiwa onofi nafineni. Tiwa ene amosa ene ya‑yai·oneni.” Ati nematane.
Yeso‑ka ano 30 tohiya, mai dami‑ya hiyarawahematane.
Yeso badi‑mona i‑di Yose tohematane. Yose badi i‑di Eri tohe,
Eri badi i‑di Matate tohe, Matate badi i‑di Refi tohe, Refi badi i‑di Meoki tohe, Meoki badi i‑di Yanai tohe, Yanai badi i‑di Yose tohe,
Yose badi i‑di Matatiya tohe, Matatiya badi i‑di Amosi tohe, Amosi badi i‑di Naho tohe, Naho badi i‑di Esiri tohe, Esiri badi i‑di Nakai tohe,
Nakai badi i‑di Maate tohe, Maate badi i‑di Matatiya tohe, Matatiya badi i‑di Semei tohe, Semei badi i‑di Yoseki tohe, Yoseki badi i‑di Yoda tohe,
Yoda badi i‑di Yohana tohe, Yohana badi i‑di Resa tohe, Resa badi i‑di Sorobabeo tohe, Sorobabeo badi i‑di Saratieo tohe, Saratieo badi i‑di Neri tohe,
Neri badi i‑di Meoki tohe, Meoki badi i‑di Adi tohe, Adi badi i‑di Kosaha tohe, Kosaha badi i‑di Eomadaho tohe, Eomadaho badi i‑di Ere tohe,
Ere badi i‑di Yosowe tohe, Yosowe badi i‑di Eriesa tohe, Eriesa badi i‑di Yorini tohe, Yorini badi i‑di Matate tohe, Matate badi i‑di Refi tohe,
Refi badi i‑di Simiyaho tohe, Simiyaho badi i‑di Yoda tohe, Yoda badi i‑di Yose tohe, Yose badi i‑di Yona tohe, Yona badi i‑di Eriaki tohe,
Eriaki badi i‑di Mereya tohe, Mereya badi i‑di Mena tohe, Mena badi i‑di Matata tohe, Matata badi i‑di Nataha tohe, Nataha badi i‑di Dafi tohe,
Dafi badi i‑di Yese tohe, Yese badi i‑di Obedi tohe, Obedi badi i‑di Bowasi tohe, Bowasi badi i‑di Sera tohe, Sera badi i‑di Nasomi tohe,
Nasomi badi i‑di Aminadabi tohe, Aminadabi badi i‑di Araho tohe, Araho badi i‑di Arani tohe, Arani badi i‑di Esiro tohe, Esiro badi i‑di Feresi tohe, Feresi badi i‑di Yoda tohe,
Yoda badi i‑di Yako tohe, Yako badi i‑di Isaki tohe, Isaki badi i‑di Abaraho tohe, Abaraho badi i‑di Tera tohe, Tera badi i‑di Na·o tohe,
Na·o badi i‑di Seroki tohe, Seroki badi i‑di Haka·o tohe, Haka·o badi i‑di Bereki tohe, Bereki badi i‑di Ebere tohe, Ebere badi i‑di Sera tohe,
Sera badi i‑di Kaina tohe, Kaina badi i‑di Arafasadi tohe, Arafasadi badi i‑di Seme tohe, Seme badi i‑di Nowe tohe, Nowe badi i‑di Rameki tohe,
Rameki badi i‑di Matosare tohe, Matosare badi i‑di Enoki tohe, Enoki badi i‑di Yaradi tohe, Yaradi badi i‑di Marareo tohe, Marareo badi i‑di Kaina tohe,
Kaina badi i‑di Inosi tohe, Inosi badi i‑di Seti tohe, Seti badi i‑di Adaho tohe, Adaho badi i‑di Deoso tohematamonane.
Deoso‑ka Doni ati‑ya Yeso tokadabe, Yodaho Faha‑ya yanane, kabani‑ya tokematane.
Kabani‑ya wai, hawi‑ya Deoso‑ka Doni yofikanematane. Diaboro Yeso‑ya hiyarematane, Deoso ati‑ya tokadabamarebonaha. Yeso tafare, amoni 40 kane fimi watihikanematane.
“Deoso Bidi amatini, tiwati ihi yati baho tohahi, tikababonehe.” Diaboro ati nematane.
“Deoso‑ka yama hani ati timitahi. Ai tefe ai‑ya kasomi nafirani.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yama wai nemehe‑kaya Yeso‑ya Diaboro towake, mai tabori dami‑ya yofikanematane.
“Mai nafi tiwa‑ya daa·onaboneni, mai tiyosewahabonehe. Yama amosa nafi daa·onaboneni. Hibati‑ya bofe‑ya yama nafi okayawa, owati daahina, daa·onaboneni.
Owa hidi tiniya, yama nafi tiwa‑ya daa·onaboneni.” Diaboro ati nematane.
“Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑nima obisaboneni. Yama hani ati timitahi.
‘Deoso dai kahiyarahi. Mai one‑ya dai narifariyahi. Deoso dai narifabisahi.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati nineni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yerosare‑ya Yeso‑ya Diaboro towake, Deoso‑ka yobe tati mese‑ya Yeso‑ya hiyaramatase,
“Deoso Bidi amatini, yoratinisahi. Yama sibaraboneni.
Fara Deoso‑ka yama hani ati timitahi.
‘Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai hiyosebonane, tiwa‑ya mai kasomabonehe.
Tiwa‑ya mai waratonaboneni, yati‑ya tiwa teme taratokarabonehe.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati nineni.” I‑di Satanasi ati nematane.
“‘Deoso hini ati‑nima ene nebona, ati‑ya dai siwakariyahi.’ Yama hani ati neni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Diaboro keyehe‑ya hirini hawa tohe, tokome,
“Yama one‑ya Yeso ohiyaramatasiya, owati‑ya nofeba awane.” Atibodi ati nematane.
Karireya‑ya Yeso winitoname, Deoso‑ka Doni ene Yeso ati kitematane. Karireya‑ka tabaro dami‑kaya Yeso tamine‑ya mai hiyara, Yeso tamine‑ya mai nafi mitawahameteni.
Tabora dami‑ya Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya Yeso mai‑ya kanawatomatane.
“Yeso ati amosane.” Mai nafi ati nameteni.

Nasare‑kaya Yeso ya‑yana toha‑mata‑kaya i‑di Yeso tokome, kobotonamatasematane. Sabado dami‑nima Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya Yeso tokiyome, yama hani‑ya kadike, fara sabado‑ya Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya Yeso waamisamematane, Deoso‑ka yama hani‑ya kadikebonaha.
Isa·iya‑ka yama hani‑ya mai daanameteni, Yeso hikadikabonehe. Yeso warahikana, seehikana, hikadika,

“Deoso‑ka Doni owa‑ya sawi, Deoso owa‑ya kadikemari, owa‑ya yosemarine. Yama‑ya mai kihara mai‑ya Deoso ati amosabote okaminawahaboneni. Hibati‑ya mai‑ya barikanemari, owati ihi mai seekawahaboneni. Hibati‑ya yama‑ya mai awatera, owati ihi yama‑ya mai awawahaboneni. Mai mai bisihinamaro, owati ihi mai mai bisihinami awiraboneni.
Deoso ai‑ya kasomebona tamine ohiyaraboneni.” Isa·iya‑ka yama hani ati neni, Yeso hikadikaro.
Yama hani‑ya kinikaname, hidi‑ka yo‑yose‑ya yama hani‑ya daatoname, itarimatane. Mai nafi hiwakatomematane.
“Deoso ati okadike‑nima yama nawawahineni.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Se! Yeso ati amosane.” Mai nafi ati nameteni.
“I‑di Yose bidi amanaraniha?” Mai one ati nameteni.
Yeso ati yanane,
“‘Mai ihi oda awiya, mai ati oda nofaboneni.’ Dai ati teni.
‘Oda‑ka owa tiha, Kafanaho‑ya tiwa ene‑nima oda tikasomaharihi.’ Dai ati na awineni.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Owati dai mitamakihi. Hini mai tabori‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita mai ati‑ya mai nofaterani.
Hibati‑ya i‑di Eriya hasinasa neya, Deoso ati ene abariko 42 kane‑ya faha kakimara, yamata yanami awirametemoneni. Isara·eo‑kaya ai‑ka fana mai honita wahawama mai dama,
mai‑ya Eriya kasomare, yara fana honita wahawama ohare‑ya Eriya kasomematamonane. Yara‑ka wami oni Sidoho toha, tabori oni‑ta Sareta tohametemoneni.

Hibati‑ya i‑di Eriseo hasinasa neya, Isara·eo‑kaya ai one dama mai mese towe mai‑ya i‑di Eriseo nakitamarematamonane. Siriya mai‑ka owa i‑di Naama mese towe tohe‑ya i‑di Eriseo nakitamabisematamonane.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, mai nafi yawi kita,
mai nahomisa, tabora‑ka adami webote widi‑ya Yeso‑ya mai fatani toka, adami dori‑ya mai hiwakematane, mai korohiwitibonaha.
Hiniya mai teberi‑ya Yeso tokomematane.
Karireya‑ka tabora one Kafanaho‑ya Yeso toke, kobone, sabado‑ya mai‑ya kanawatomatane.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita,
“Se! Yeso yama hani ati‑ya wato nafine, yama hani hidi ati‑nima ati nane.” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.
Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya maki madi towe foye‑ke sawi, Yeso‑ya haane, ati kite,
“Ka! Yeso Nasare‑ke hini yamata‑nima tinaba? Oda‑ya bisitiriyahi. Tiwa owatoni. Deoso‑ka amosabote amatini.” Madi towe ati nematane.
Yeso madi towe‑ya weene,
“Tiwati fawanahi. Maki‑ya tifoyamariyahi.” Ati nematane.
Madi towe ene mai bai‑ya maki sone, maki‑ya bisini awire, hiniya toke, maki amosawamematane.
Yeso ene‑ya mai awa, mai atibodi yama‑ya kadika, mai ibi hiyara,
“Hini yamata ihi tohiti? Hidi ati‑nima Yeso ati ne, ati kite, ati ene madi towe mai kanateni.” Mai ati nameteni.
Tabora dami‑ya Yeso tamine‑ya mai kaminameteni.
Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya Yeso yanane, Simaho‑ka yobe‑ya tokiyomematane. Simaho‑ka koma hiwe nafe, kawinameteni. Yeso kobone, Simaho‑ka koma tamine‑ya mai kaminameteni.
Simaho‑ka koma kawina, fowari‑ya Yeso wai,
“Yama kome tikahi.” Ati nematane.
Hiwe fawana, kitama, waamisa kanibote na, mai tafe‑bone‑ya awawahameteni.
Mahi toke‑ya Yeso‑kaya mai kiyana mai mai hiwakake, mai tati‑ya Yeso yehe fori, mai kitamameteni.
Mai‑ya madi towe mai fo‑foya Yeso ati ene madi towe mai kanana, mai ati kita,
“Deoso Bidi amatini.” Madi towe mai ati na,
“Dai ati fawanahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika oha, owa‑ya mai wata, owa tamine‑ya mai hiyararaboneni.” Yeso atibodi ati nematane.
Yama wahabisari‑ya Yeso kabani‑ya tokematane. Yeso‑ya mai sibana, mai hiwasi,
“Oda tabaro‑ya tiwinahi. Mai tabori‑ya tikariyahi.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Mai tabori dami‑ya Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑bona tamine ohiyaraboneni. Mai dama mai‑ya ohiyarabisabone owa‑ya yosemarine.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yodeya‑ka tabora dama‑ya tokawahe, Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe dami‑ya Deoso ati‑ya hiyarawarimatane.
Kanawa honita fama demena‑ya Yeso awe, kanawa hidi faha widi‑ya hedi‑ya mai namosameteni.
Simaho‑ya Yeso haane, kanawa dori‑ya foye, Simaho‑ya hiyare,
“Ai‑ya kanawa maanakihi.” Ati ne,
itari, mai dama mai‑ya kanawatomatane.
Mai‑ya hiyari hawa tohe, Simaho‑ya hiyare,
“Faha kowe‑ya ai towakahi. Tika hedi dai kerokanaba, aba mai dai watabani.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Ayo, yama soki nafi‑ya hedi oda kerokana, aba mai‑ya hedi wati nofarene. Sibaraba awineni. Tiwati ihi ai kerokanamataseya, ai awebane.” Simaho ati nematane.
Hedi mai kerokana, hedi‑ya aba mai dama mai wasiwaha, hedi madone owa betetonematane.
“Kanawa one dai kakamakihi.” Mai yahi ati nameteni.
Kanawa one‑ya mai kakamake, mai hinakibamake, kanawa fama kibikima, bokikimi yanatonameteni, aba mai dama mai ihi.
Yeso ene‑ya Simaho Bedoro awe, yobati‑ya wai,
“Ayo, owa‑ya tisawimariyahi. Towe ama·oni. Amosabote amatini.” Bedoro ati nematane.
Aba mai dama mai‑ya Bedoro awe, habo siitone, Bedoro‑ya mai daba mai habi siitonaharemeteni.
Kanawa one‑kaya i‑di Sebedeo bidi mai fama, i‑di Tiyako, i‑di Yowaho mai na, mai habi siitonaharemeteni.
“Simaho, tiwa habo siitoriyahi. Hibati‑ya aba mai‑ya tinawasiteni. Hibayata Deoso ati tikaminaboneni, ati mai one hinofawahebonaha.” Yeso ati nematane.
Faha widi‑ya mai kobokanama, mai‑ka yama towadakosa, Yeso‑ya mai dabawahameteni.
Tabora one‑ya Yeso toke, maki mese towe tohe ite‑ya Yeso tofodowiti, Yeso‑ya maki awe, yobati‑kaya itarise, moinisematane.
“Ayo, haa‑nima ai‑na ai kasomi tiwata, owa kasomi tinofakarini?” Ati nematane.
Yeso maki‑ya boyone,
“Onofini. Tiwa mese amosawamahi.” Ati ne, ati ene mese amosawamematane.
“Owa ene tamine mai‑ya tihiyarariyahi. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ya tikahi. Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑nima yama daatiniya, tikitama, tiwa‑ya mai watowahaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ati‑ya mai tokadabara, Yeso tamine‑ya mai kamina, mai ati tamine‑ya aka‑ya mai wi‑wina mai mita, mai dama mai yamanakemeteni, mai one Yeso ati‑ya mita, mai one Yeso hinakitama hinabonehe.
Kabani‑kaya Yeso yobinematane, Deoso‑ya hiyarebonaha.

Mai dama mai yorotokana mai‑ya Yeso kanawatomatane. Fariseo mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, mai na, mai sawi, mai one Karireya‑ka mai kaki, Yodeya‑ka mai one kaki, Yerosare‑ka mai one kaki nameteni. Mai kiyana, Deoso ene mai‑ya Yeso nakitamematane.
Maki ka‑kakone awa‑ya bora dasikana‑ya mai damahikanematane. Yobe doro‑ya Yeso wai‑kaya mai hiwakamakibona mai ati na,
yobe kibe, yobe tati mese‑kaya mai hiwakimise, yobe tati mese kote‑ya mai seekanameteni. Yobe tati mese hodone‑ya mai hikanakise, mai one teberi‑ya Yeso wai‑kaya, kaforirisematane.
Mai ihi‑ya Yeso awe, “Owati‑ya mai nofineni.” Yeso atibodi ati ne, maki ka‑kakone‑ya hiyare,
“Tiwa ene towe manakone wadamarini.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, fariseo mai toha, mai na, Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, mai yawawahameteni.
“Bofe‑ka ai toha ai ati ene ai owa ene manakone fawaterene. Deoso hini ati ene ai ene manakone fawateni. Maki ene towe manakone wadamaremona Yeso ati ne,
‘Deoso‑nima ona ama·oni.’ Yeso ati ne awane,
hini ati ene abaho.” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.
Mai atibodi ati‑ya Yeso wato, ati yanane,
“Hini yamata‑bone owa‑ya dai atibodi weeniti?
Bofe‑ka mai ati ihi ai ene towe manakone fawarihi, bofe‑ka mai ati ihi ai owa kitamarihi tene.
Owati ihi ai owa ene towe manakone wadamare, dai awaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Maki kiyane‑ya hiyare,
“Owati timitahi. Tiwaamisahi. Tika fo‑fori‑ka yama diwatikaniya, tikamahi, tika yobe‑ya.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai noki‑ya waamise, hika fo‑fori‑ka yama‑ya damakane, tabaro‑kaya tokome, yakaneya, Deoso‑ya kahiyarematane.
Kitame‑ya mai awa, mai nafi atibodi yama‑ya kadikameteni. Mai habi siitona,
“Deoso ene amose, hibayata yama bara oda awani.” Mai ati nameteni.
Makobote Yeso toke, kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya ha‑haa‑ya awematane. Kofeno‑ka yobe bidi‑ya Refi itariya, Yeso himane,
“Owa‑ya tisawihi.” Ati nematane.
Refi waamise, hika yama towadakosa, Yeso‑ya sawiwahematane.
I‑di Refi‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso eyehe mai tokameteni, mai marinabonehe. Kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya mai ha‑haa mai dama, mai one dama, mai na, mai nafi marinameteni.
Fariseo mai one Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai‑ya mai weena,
“Hini yamata‑bone towe mai eyehe dai tafiti? Kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya mai ha‑haa mai eyehe oda tafarihi, mai ihi amosara mai eyehe oda tafarihi, oda teni.” Mai ati nameteni.
Mai ati‑ya Yeso mite, ati yanane,
“Mai kiyara mediko mai‑ya kasomaterene. Mai kiyana‑ta mediko mai‑ya kasomatene.
Mai ihi amosamone mai ati na, mai hima·orani. Mai ihi amosara mai hima·obisateni, mai ihi amosawamabonehe. Fara ihi okemaroni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,

“Yowaho‑ya mai da‑daba mahi owa‑ya mai tafa, mahi owa‑ya mai tafarihi na, Deoso‑ya mai hiyarabisateni. Fara mai ihi‑nima fariseo mai‑ya mai da‑daba mai ihi teni. Tiwa‑ta tiwa‑ya mai da‑daba mai tafi fawaterani.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Mai‑ka owa fanebona sawi ene mai ya‑yaina, mai tafi fawaterani.
Mai‑ya kanawatobona, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Ai‑ka bora bote hodeya, bora yati ibe sibinare, bora bote hodi‑ya ai nawaanaterani. Bora bote ihi bora yati ai sibiniya, bora bote amosawamaterani.

Bani ataro wamani yama wiye toha, wamani yati‑ya fino yati ai soronisiya, wiye taokiterani. Yama wiye bote‑ya fino yati ai soronisaterani. Yama wiye bote‑ya fino yati ai soronisiya, taokana, yama wiye aba, fino abateni. Fino yati yama wiye yati‑ya ai soronisateni.
Sabado one‑ya Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai eyehe fadara‑ya mai tokofarama, tiriko tati‑ya mai bakakasa, mai yahi‑ya mai wikohikawaha, mai hikabameteni.
“Hini yamata ihi sabado‑ya tiriko tati‑ya dai bakakasiti? Sabado‑ya yama dai a‑ani amani.” Fariseo mai ati nameteni.
Yeso ati yanane,
“Dafi tamine dai kadikaterini? Dafi, hika mai eyehe toke, mai fimi nafemetemoneni.
Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke sabado hidi amane.” Yeso ati nematane.
Sabado one‑ya Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya Yeso tokiyome, mai‑ya kanawatomatane. Yehe kanike moikaname itarimatane.
Fariseo mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, mai na, Yeso‑ya mai kakatoma,
“Maki‑ya nakitameba awane. Sabado‑ya hinakitameya, ai weenebonane.” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.
Mai atibodi ati‑ya Yeso wato, yehe moikaname‑ya haane,
“Tiwaamisiya, oda teberi‑ya tiwaahi.” Ati nematane.
Waamise, mai noki‑ya waimatane.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,

“Eme Mose‑ka yama hani ati titi? Sabado‑ya ai owa ai nakitama, ai ati kasiramone dai ati na awini. Sabado‑ya ai owa ai nanahababisa, ai sibabisaramone dai ati na awini. Dai ati yananahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai nafi‑ya kakatomi bide tohe, maki‑ya haanamatase,
“Tiwa yehe feotokanahi.” Yeso ati ne,
Yehe feotokaname, yehe amosawamematane.
Ene mai hiawe, mai yawi kita,
“Yeso maanamare, hini yamata‑nima ai nibati?” Mai ibi hiyara mai ati nameteni.
Makobote adami webote‑ya Yeso tokomorosematane, Deoso‑ya hiyarebonaha. Yama soki‑ya hiyaranabematane.
Mahi kaki‑ya hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya haane, mai one 12 kana mai‑ya kadikematane, hika yo‑yose mai bonehe.
Mai‑ya kadike: i‑di Simaho tohe, Yeso ati ene Simaho oni Bedoro tohawahene. Simaho sohori i‑di Anidere‑ya fama, i‑di Tiyako, i‑di Yowaho, i‑di Firibi, i‑di Batoromeho,
i‑di Mateo, i‑di Tome, Aofio bidi i‑di Tiyako, i‑di Simaho Seroti,
Tiyako bidi i‑di Yoda toha, i‑di Yoda Isikari·oti toha, mai na, mai‑ya Yeso kadikematane. Yoda Isikari·oti i‑di Yeso‑ya kahabanematane.

Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai eyehe kamatase, yama amosi‑ya mai nahomiya, Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai one dama naha, mai one kobonamake, Yodeya‑ka mai one toha, Yerosare‑ka mai one toha, faha webote widi‑ka mai one toha, mai nameteni.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mitabone mai toha, Yeso mai hinakitamabone mai toha, mai na, mai sawemeteni. Madi towe mai sawi‑ka mai‑ya Yeso nakitamahari nematane.
Yeso borone‑ya mai nafi boyoni nofa, mai kiyana Yeso‑ya mai boyona, mai kitamameteni.
Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya kiine, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Yama dama dai nokotonira Deoso dai‑ya kasomebona, Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya dai sawiwahaboneni.
Dai fime Deoso dai‑ya kasomebona, dai korimanawahaboneni. Dai ohina Deoso dai‑ya kasomebona, dai ya‑yainawahaboneni.
Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke‑ya dai nofa ihi dai‑ya mai kako, dai‑ya mai kananihe, dai‑ya mai wee na, Deoso dai‑ya kasomebona,
Ka! Dai‑ka yama dama‑ya dai nokotonihe dai‑ka yama hawa toha, neme‑kaya dai‑ka yama wadaraboneni.
Ka! Dai korimana dai toha yamata dai nokotonihe dai fimiwahaboneni. Hibayata dai ya‑yaina dai toha, dai ohinabone, dai ohini nafiteboneni.
Owati dai mitahi. Dai‑ya mai nofara mai dai nofiyahi. Dai‑ya mai ka‑kako mai dai kasomiyahi.
Dai‑ya mai yoko mai‑ya dai kasomiyahi. Dai‑ya mai bisina mai tamine dai hiyarahi, Deoso mai‑ya kasomebonaha.
Dai ebete‑ya batanariya, dai ebete fami‑ya batanariho. Dai‑ka bora neme‑ya mai kayafa, makobote bora one‑ya mai kayafamakiya, dai yawariyahi.
‘Oka yama honita‑ba daatinahi.’ Mai ati na,
mai‑ka yama‑ba dai daaniyahi. Dai‑ka yama mai hibote‑ya dai haatonamakiriyahi.
Hini tiwa‑ya tinofi‑nima mai one tinofahi. Hini tiwati koboni‑ka mai‑ya tikasomiyahi.
Dai‑ya mai no‑nofa mai‑ya dai nofa, mai one‑ya dai nofariya, dai ene amosi awirani. Mai ati kasira hini mai one‑ya mai nofateni.
Dai‑ya mai ka‑kasoma mai‑ya dai kasomiya, mai one‑ya dai kasomi awiriya, dai ene amosarani. Mai ati kasira hini mai one‑ya mai kasomateni.

Dai‑ka yama‑bone mai daanamatasabone mai‑ya yama dai daa, yama mai daanamarabone mai‑ya yama dai daani awiriya, dai ene amosarani. Mai ati kasira hini mai one‑ya yama mai daateni, yama mai daanamakebonehe.

Dai‑ta dai‑ya mai kako‑ya mai dai nofahi. Mai‑ka yama‑bone dai daana, manakone dai haatonamakiriyahi. Makobote Deoso dai‑ka yama manakone‑ya daanibisebonane. Haa‑nima dai niya, Deoso kitabote ene‑nima dai ene naboneni. Deoso ati‑ya mai nofara mai toha, hini mai‑ya mai nokotonihe mai toha, mai na, mai‑ya Deoso kasomatene.
Ai‑ka Abi neme‑ke yawa kanibote re, ai‑ka Abi ene‑nima dai ene nahi.
Mai‑ya dai kakoriyahi. Mai dai nofiya, dai‑ya mai kakoraboneni.
“Towe amatini.” Dai ati riyahi.
“Towe amatini.” Dai ati niya,
“Towebisa dai amani.” Mai ati naba awineni.
Mai‑ya dai ati somawamiya, dai‑ya mai ati somawamaboneni.
“Mai noki wadikimara hawi‑ya mai ibi yofikiterani. Mai noki wadikimara mai fami towaka, mai ibi yofikanabone mai ati na, hodi‑ya mai fami sonirisikimaboneni.
Ai‑ya ka‑kanawato yama‑ya wato ba‑basi ne. Ai‑ya kanawato hawa toheya, ati‑nima ai ati naboneni.

Dai owa ene dai kadiki nafimariyahi. Hini dai ene dai kadiki ba‑basi nibisahi. Awa hibakori dai owa noko‑ya boka, awa ibe dai noko‑ya foyana, awa hibakori‑ya dai bikanamaterani, awa ibe dai noko‑ya foyaro.
‘Soho, awa hibakori tiwa noko‑ya boka, soba·onamaboneni.’ Titerani, tiwa noko‑ya awa ibe foyaro.

Mai ihi towe bide toha mai‑ya tikanawatoriyahi, tiwa ene towe ba‑basi naro. Towe amatini. Tiwa noko‑ka awa ibe sobatinamahi. Tiwa noko amosawamiya, mai‑ka awa hibakori sobatinamaneni. Tiwa ene amosawami bahiya, mai one‑ya tikanawatohi.
Awa bono amosa‑ya awa bono towe yanarihi, awa bono kabara‑ya awa bono amosa yanarihi, teni.
Bisina‑ya fiko yanarihi, atiwa‑ya ofa yanarihi, teni. Fara‑nima, mai ihi dai awiya, mai atibodi dai watoteni.
Mai atibodi towe tohiya, mai ati towe tohaboneni. Mai atibodi amosiya, mai ati amosaboneni. Ai atibodi ati‑nima ai ati yanateni.
‘Ayo, oka hidi amatini.’ Hiniya dai ati niya,
owati‑ya dai tokadabara, owa‑ya dai ayoriyahi.
Owa‑ya mai kama, owati‑ya mai mita, owati‑ya mai tokadaba na, haa‑nima mai teni.
Ai owa hika yobe‑bona‑ya wamanane. Hika yobe ewene hodone kowi‑ya, yati webote mese‑ya yobe ewene waari, yobe hawa toheya, faha fowe nafe‑ya yobe wafi, yobe ewene hodone kowi, yobe wai kitane.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyari hawa toheya, Kafanaho‑ya toke, kobonematane.
Sodado mai‑ka hidi hika yo‑yose owa‑ya nofi nafi, hika yo‑yose kiyani nafi, abi yanatonematane.
Yeso tamine‑ya mite, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai one‑ya yosematane, Yeso‑ya mai kakamabonehe, hika yo‑yose Yeso hinakitamebonaha.
Yeso‑ya mai kobona, Yeso‑ya mai haana,
“Yeso, ai tokomahi, Sodado‑ka hidi tikasomabonehe. Sodado mai‑ka hidi ati some, ene amosane.
Sodado mai‑ka hidi ai nafi‑ya nofe, Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya wamanemarine.” Mai ati nameteni.
Sodado tabaro‑ya mai toka, mai koboni yanatoniya, Sodado mai‑ka hidi‑ka no‑nofa mai one hiyosemakitasameteni, fai ati‑ya mai tokaminamakitasabonehe.
“Yeso, oka hidi webote amatini. Oka yobe‑ya tikariyahi. Towe ama·oni. Amosabotebisa amatini.
Towe ama·oni. Fara ihi tiwa owawitirani. Tiwati yanana, tiwati ihi oka yo‑yose kitamebonane.
Oka hidi ati‑nima oteni. Oka sodado owati‑nima mai teni. Fara‑nima tiwati yananiya, oka yo‑yose kitamebonane.” Sodado mai‑ka hidi ati nematane.
Ati tamine Yeso himite, Yeso ya‑yaine, mai dama mai naha mai‑ya hiyare,
“Owati dai mitahi. Sodado mai‑ka hidi owati‑ya nofi nafine, Yodeo ai toha, owati‑ya dai nofi bi‑bidi neni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Sodado mai‑ka one mai hiyari hawa tohe, mai winitonama, sodado mai‑ka hidi‑ka yo‑yose kitame‑ya mai awameteni.
Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai eyehe Nahi‑kaya toke, mai one dama mai tokomakemeteni.

Sidadi‑ka nokobi yakari‑ya mai kakiya, yetene abo‑ya mai diwakana, mai‑ya Yeso awematane. Hibati‑ya badi abe, madi ohari wama, bidi ohari abamakitasematane. Nahi‑ya mai wi‑wina mai dama fana‑ya mai dabameteni.
Yetene madi ohina‑ya Yeso awe, atibodi komahari, ati yanane,
“Ohitiriyahi.” Ati nematane.
Abo foya‑ka‑ya Yeso boyone ene mai maanake,
“Yetene, tikitamahi.” Ati ne,
Yetene itarimisame, ati yananamematane. Yetene‑ya Yeso daatonamematane, yetene madi‑ya.
Yeso ene‑ya mai awa, mai habi siitona, Deoso‑ya mai kahiyara,
“Deoso ati ene Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita oda‑ya dabawahane, kitabote amane. Deoso‑ka ai amani, ai‑ya kasomane.” Mai ati nameteni.
Yetene‑ya nakitame tamine‑ya mai hiyara, Yodeya‑ka mai tabori dami‑ya mai ati tamine‑ya mai mita, Yodeya yakari‑ka mai ati tamine mai himitaharemeteni.
Yowaho‑ya mai da‑daba Yeso ene tamine‑ya mai kamineni, Yowaho‑ya.
Hika mai da‑daba mai fama mai‑ya yose, Yeso ati‑ya mai mitabone,
“‘Deoso‑ka kakibona mai ati namete fara amatiraniha? Fara tihi awiriya, Deoso‑ka yokana oda nimanaboneni.’ Dai ati niyahi.” Yowaho ati nematane.
Yeso‑ya mai tonaka,
“Yowaho Batita oda‑ya yosene, tiwati oda mitabonehe. Deoso‑ka kakibona mai ati namete fara amatiraniha? Fara tihi awiriya, Deoso‑ka yokana oda nimanaboneni.” Mai ati nameteni.

Mai demena mai noki‑ya Yeso mai dama mai‑ya nakitamematane. Mai kiyana mai toha, mai hi‑hiyana mai toha, madi foyi‑ka mai toha, mai na, Yeso mai‑ya nakitame, yama‑ya mai awaramete Yeso ene yama‑ya mai awawahameteni.
Yowaho‑ya mai da‑daba mai‑ya Yeso hiyare,

“I‑di Yowaho‑ya dai towakamiya, owa ene dai kamina, owati dai kamina, dai nahi. Yama mai awaramaro yama mai awawaha, mai ka‑kakona‑maro mai yakanamawaha, mai mese towe tohamaro mai mese amosawama, mai narabi hawiramaro ai ati‑ya mai mitawaha, mai abamaro mai kitamawaha, yama mai kihara Deoso ati amosabote‑ya mai mitawaha nineni.
Owa tamine‑ya mai miti‑ya mai yawi awiriya, Deoso mai‑ya kasomebonane.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yowaho‑ka yo‑yose mai towakama, mai nowati‑ya i‑di Yowaho tamine‑ya mai dama mai‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Hibati‑ya i‑di Yowaho‑ya dai toka, hini yamata dai awabone dai tokiti? Watikoro henerikane dai awabone dai tokiraniha?
Bora amosabote‑ya sakone dai awabone dai ati na awineni. Yama dama mai kiha bora amosabote mai sakona, kabani‑kaya mai winatera, hidi webote‑ka yobe‑ya mai winateni.
Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita‑ya dai awabone dai ati na, fare Yowaho i‑di Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita amane. Yowaho‑ya Deoso yosemarine.
Fara Deoso‑ka yama hani ati dai mitahi.
‘Owati timitahi. Oka yo‑yose bofe‑ke oyoseboneni, tiwa hawine‑bone‑ya hawa tonihibonaha.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati na,
i‑di Yowaho Batita tamine amane.
Yowaho Batita amosi nafi, hibati‑ka mai nafi amosi bi‑bidi nibisa, Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya mai sawiya, mai nafi amosi ba‑basi naboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya mai ha‑haa mai toha, mai one dama mai toha na, hibati‑ya Yowaho mai‑ya habanirise, Yeso ati‑ya mai mita,
“Deoso ene amosabote amane.” Mai nafi ati nameteni.
Fariseo mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kanawato mai toha, mai na, Yowaho mai‑ya habanirisi awire, Deoso ati‑ya mai nofarameteni.
“Hini yamata‑nima dai niti?
‘Ka! Kaida oda afona, dai wayomi awirani. Mai tabiyo oda ohina, dai ohini awirani.’ Madehe one ati na,
mai one‑ya mai nofara mai‑nima dai nineni.
Yowaho Batita baho‑ya kabare, fino‑ya fawarihi ne,
‘Madi towe i‑di Yowaho‑ya foyane.’ Dai ati teni.
Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke tafi ba‑basi ne, fino‑ya fawane,
‘Yeso towe amane, tafi nafi, fino‑ya fawa, kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya mai ha‑haa mai toha, mai ihi amosara mai toha, mai na, mai‑ya Yeso nofatene.’ Dai ati teni.
Yama‑ya mai wata mai ai awa, mai ai watoteni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Fariseo mai‑ka owa Yeso‑ya himanematane, fai tabaro‑ya tafebonaha. Mai towakama, mai tafameteni.
Fariseo‑ka yobe yakari‑ya fana wina, fana ihi amosara, Yeso tamine‑ya mita, yama mahi amosa‑ya damakana, tokomakemeteni. Yama mahi amosa wiye yati amosa wamani meteni.

Yeso teme‑kaya itarisa, ohina, noki fahi‑ya Yeso teme‑ya nowinihe, tati kone‑ya Yeso teme‑ya tamo, Yeso teme‑ya toma, yama mahi amosa‑ya Yeso teme‑ya sorokaremaki, Yeso teme‑ya tamo, fai teme‑ya toma nameteni.
Fariseo fana ihi‑ya awe, yawe,
“Yeso‑ya fana boyona, fana towe amani. Yeso i‑di Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita tohe‑mana, fana tamine‑ya wato nane.” Atibodi ati nematane.
Fariseo‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Simaho, owati timitahi.” Ati ne,
“Naki, tiwati omitabani.” Ati nematane.
“Ai owa defeni 500 toha, ai owa defeni 50 toha mai nineni.
Makobote yinero mai kihara, yinero mai daatonamara, yinero hidi mai‑ya kasome, yinero‑ya haanamarebona ati nane. Ebeni‑ke yinero hidi‑ya nofi nafibati?” Yeso ati nematane.
“Fara amani. Tiwatoneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Fana‑ya kakatomeya, Simaho‑ya hiyare,
“Fana ihi tiawahi. Tika yobe‑ya okiyoma, owa teme sokoni‑bone‑ka faha‑ya daatira, fana noki fahi‑ya owa teme‑ya nowina, tati kone‑ya owa teme‑ya tamoneni.
Owa noko‑ya tomatini awirani. Fana kobona owa teme‑ya tomanasa nibisani.
Owa tati‑ya oyo‑ya sorotikanari awirani. Owa teme‑ya fana yama mahi amosa‑ya sorokaribisineni.
Hibati‑ya fana ihi towe dama, ihi towe manakone wadamarani. Owa‑ya nofi nafineni. Mai ihi amosamone mai ati na, owa‑ya mai nofi nafirani.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Sima, tiwa ene towe manakone wadamarini.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso eyehe mai tafa Yeso ati‑ya mai mita,
“‘Tiwa ene towe manakone wadamarini.’ Yeso ati ne,
ai ati ene ai owa ene towe manakone fawaterene.” Mai ati nameteni, mai ibi hiyararo.
“Sima, owati tinofa ihi Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohe‑ya tisaweboneni. Tiwa tabaro‑ya tikamahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Makobote Yeso hika mai 12 kana mai eyehe sidadi dami‑ya toke, mai tabori bide‑ya tokahari, Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine‑ya hiyarematane.

Yeso‑ya mai fanawi sawemeteni. Hibati‑ya mai one‑ya Yeso nakitame, mai one‑ya madi towe mai foyamete, Yeso ati ene mai kananameteni. Hibati‑ya madi towe mai 7 kana i‑di Mariya Madarena‑ya mai foyamete, Yeso ati ene mai kananawahameteni.

I‑di Sosana sawi, i‑di Kosa fadi i‑di Yo·ana sawi, mai fanawi one dama Yeso‑ya mai dabameteni. I‑di Kosa Erodi tabaro‑ya yama‑ya aninematane. Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai tafe‑bone‑ya mai fanawi kanikameteni, hini mai‑ka yinero‑ya.
Tabora dami‑ka mai kake, Yeso‑kaya mai yorotokana, Yeso mai‑ya hiyare, hini ati yokana‑ya kemone,
“Ai owa yamata noki‑ya werene, hawi fowari‑ya noki one sona, mai taihinisa, bani bidi mai hikaba hina, yanarani.
Yamata noki one yati iti‑kaya sona, yaniya, fahi wadara, wayatoneni.
Atiwa mete‑ya yamata noki one sona, atiwa ene yamata yani amosarani.
Bodo‑ya yamata noki one sona, yana, bona, ade ohare‑ka boni 100 tohawahani.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Owati dai mita, owati dai tokadabahi.” Ati ne,
yamata noki tamine‑ya Yeso hiyare, haa‑nima ati nematane.
“Tiwati tikahema, tiwati oda watorini.” Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai ati nameteni.
“Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine dai watowahaboneni. Mai one‑ya ohiyara, owati okahemobisateni. Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑maro‑nima mai nawahani.
‘Owa ene‑ya mai awa, owa‑ya mai watorihi, owati‑ya mai mita, owati‑ya mai watorihi nani.’ Yama hani ati neni.
Yamata noki tamine yokana dai mitahi. Yamata noki Deoso ati tamine amane.

Fadara‑ka wami ai atibodi tamine amani. Hawi fowari‑ya yamata noki sona, Deoso ati‑ya mai mita, Diaboro ene Deoso ati‑ya mai ati kadamowama kanibote na, Deoso ati‑ya mai nofara, Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona‑ya mai sawiteraboneni.
Yati iti‑kaya noki one sona, Deoso ati‑ya mai mita, ati mai nofa, mai ya‑yaina, makobote mai mai weehiniya, mai maakana kanibote na, Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadabamarani.
Atiwa mete‑ya yamata noki sona, Deoso ati‑ya mai mita, makobote yinero‑ya mai nokotonihi, yama bara‑ya mai nokotonihi, mai siwa, yamata bonora‑nima mai na, mai ihi amosa‑ba wadarani.
Bodo‑ya yamata noki sona, Deoso ati‑ya mai mita, Deoso ati‑ya mai atibodi nofi kita, mai atibodi amosa, mai maakarani. Mai ihi amosani.
Nabarina ai botokana, nabarina wahi ai barikiterani. Nabarina ai kanawaarikosateni, mai kiiyomama yama‑ya mai awabonehe.
Mai atibodi ati dai watora dai watowahaboneni. Mai ihi‑ya mai kema, mai ihi nafi dai watowahaboneni.

Owati dai mita, owati dai nofahi. Deoso ati‑ya mai mita, ati mai hinofeya, Deoso ati‑ya mai wato ba‑basi naboneni. Deoso ati‑ya mai mita, ati mai hinofareya, yama‑ya mai watoteraboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso madi, Yeso sohori mai na, mai kamakemeteni, Yeso‑ya mai hiyarabonehe. Mai dama mai ihi Yeso‑ya mai tokomakirameteni.
“Yeso, tika ami tika soho mai eyehe kobona, tiwa‑ya mai haana, mai nahani, yobe fowari‑ya.” Mai one ati nameteni.
“Deoso ati‑ya mai mita, ati mai tokadaba, okomi mai toha, oka soho mai toha, mai nineni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mahi owa‑ya kanawa‑ya Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai eyehe foye,
“Hima, wara webote kowani‑kaya ai tokahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai toka,
mai yakakaniya, Yeso amonematane. Faha bai‑ya mai tohiya, boni yanana, faha rike nafe ihi kanawa boki yanatonameteni.
Yeso‑ya mai mowakana,
“Ayo, Ayo, ai abi bonehe.” Mai ati nameteni.
Yeso dodafi, boni‑ya wee, faha rike‑ya wee ne, ati ene boni fawa, faha rike fawa nameteni.
Mai‑ya hiyare,
“Hini yamata ihi dai kakomeheti? Osawe, owa‑ya dai awakarini?” Ati nematane.
Ene mai hiawe, mai habi siitona, mai ibi hiyara,
“Ebeni‑ke tohati? Ai‑nima Yeso ni awire, kitabotebisa amane. Yeso ati‑ya boni mita, fawa, faha rike fai ati‑ya mita, fawa nineni.” Mai ati nameteni.
Kerasa mai‑ka wami‑ya mai kobonameteni. Karireya kowani‑kaya Kerasa mai winateni.
Yeso yoratomaroseya, tabora‑ke mai‑ka owa kobonematane. Madi towe fai‑ya mai foya, mai ihi bora‑ya sakonamarihi, yobe‑ya winamarihi, mai tame‑kaya winematane.
Yeso‑ya awe, kaikane, Yeso noko‑ya home,
“Maki‑ya tisawimariyahi.” Yeso ati ne,
“Yeso, Deoso kitabote Bidi amatini. Owa arabatinahi. Owa bisitiriyahi.” Maki ati ne, ati kitematane.

Hibati‑ya koheti‑ya maki‑ya sodado mai sokini damameteni. Mai hiwakatome, madi towe ene maki kiti nafi, koheti‑ya betekasarimane, kabani‑kaya kanani tokawahematane. Haa‑nima maki ene ne, ene damematane, madi towe ene.
“Tiwa oni eme titi?” Yeso ati ne,
“Ibowa ama·oni.” Maki ati ne, fara madi towe mai dama maki‑ya mai foyameteni.
“Hodi yaba‑ya oda‑ya tiyoseriyahi.” Madi towe mai ati nameteni.
Adami‑kaya boroko mai dama mai tafameteni.
“Boroko mai‑ya oda tiyosebisahi.” Madi towe mai ati na,
“Sibarini, boroko mai‑ya dai foyahi.” Yeso ati ne,
boroko mai‑ya madi towe mai tokiyoma, boroko mai kanani tokofawaha, wami kote wadara‑ya mai nafi toka, mai boka, mai nafi abameteni.
Boroko mai‑ya mai na‑nawada Yeso ene‑ya mai awa, mai kanana, sidadi toha, tabora bide toha na‑ya Yeso ene‑ya mai kaminameteni.
Yeso ene‑ya mai awabone mai kamakemeteni. Hibati‑ya maki madi towe mai foyimaro‑ke maki hibayata bora‑ya weyenawahe, hibati‑ya ka‑kana nemari amosawame, itari‑ya mai awa, Yeso‑ya mai nayofinameteni.
Yeso hinakitame‑ya mai awa Yeso ene tamine‑ya mai kaminameteni.

Kerasa mai‑ka wami‑ya mai wi‑wina mai toha, Kerasa mai‑ka wami yakari‑ya mai wi‑wina mai toha, mai na, yama yofina ihi Yeso‑ya mai toyosemameteni, yama one‑kaya tokebonaha. Yeso hika mai eyehe kanawa‑ya foyame, mai winitokanamameteni.
“Tiwa‑ya osaweboneni.” Madi towe mai foyimaro‑ke ati nematane.
“Owa‑ya tisawiriyahi. Tiwa tabaro‑ya tikamabisahi. Deoso tiwa‑ya nakitame tamine tihiyariyahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Tokome, hika tabora nafi‑kaya Yeso ene tamine‑ya kaminematane.
Kowani‑kaya Yeso‑ya mai one dama nimana, Yeso kobokanamatase‑ya mai awa, mai ya‑yainameteni.
Yairo bide atona ohare kiyani nafe, abi yanatonameteni. Mai dama mai teberi‑ya Yeso tokomakimatane.
Mai dama mai‑ya fana sawe, hika ama fawani watora, faha fowe 12 kana‑ya hika ama fawani awirameteni. Mediko mai ihi hika yinero nafi tosiyo, hika ama fawarameteni.
Yeso bari‑kaya kamake, Yeso‑ka bora ifi‑ya boyona, hika ama fawanawahameteni.
“Ebeni‑ka tohiti, owa‑ya boyonaro?” Yeso ati ne,
“Tiwa oda boyorani.” Mai ati na,
“Ayo, mai dama hiniya tiwa‑ya mai boyona awineni.” Bedoro ati ne,
“Owa‑ya boyonibisani. Owa ene kitabote owatoneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Owa‑ya Yeso watone.” Fana atibodi ati na,
habi siitona, wawawakana, Yeso noko‑ya homa, mai dama mai noki‑ya hiyara,
“Faha fowe 12 kana‑ya oka ama fawani awirani.
‘Yeso‑ka bora ifi boyo·oniya, okitamaboneni.’ Owatibodi ati na,
oka, Yeso‑ka bora ifi boyo·ona, okitamani.” Fana ati nameteni.
“Sima, sibarini.
‘Yeso‑ka bora boyo·oniya, oka ama fawanawahaboneni.’ Tiwatibodi ati na,
fara ihi tiwa onakitamineni. Tikamahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso hiyareya, Yairo tabaro‑ke owa kamaki,
“Yairo, tikoto abani. Yeso hini tohaya.” Ati nematane.
Ati Yeso himite, Yairo‑ya hiyare,
“Tiwa habo siitoriyahi. ‘Deoso kitatene.’ Tiwatibodi ati nibisahi. Owati tinofiya, tikoto kitamaboneni.” Ati nematane.
Yairo tabaro‑ya mai kobona, Yeso ati ene mai one nahokosa, i‑di Bedoro, Yowaho, Tiyako, Yairo, Yairo fadi, mai na, mai tokiyomabisa, mai one nahokosameteni.
Mai dama mai ohina, hini mai baki‑ya mai boonameteni.
“Dai ohiriyahi. Abi awirini. Hiniya amoneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Atona aba‑ya mai watobisa, Yeso‑ya mai hahakanameteni.
Atona aboi yahi‑ya Yeso waratone,
“Tiwaamisamahi.” Ati nematane.
Korimari foyama, kitama, waamisamameteni.
“Tikoto dai natafahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ene‑ya Yairo fadi eyehe awe,
“Ka! Yeso kitatene.” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.
“Tikoto onakitama tamine dai kaminariyahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ati ene hika mai da‑daba mai 12 kana mai yorotokana, ati ene mai ihi kitawaha, mai ihi madi towe mai kana, mai ihi mai kiyana mai kitamawaha nameteni.
Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine‑ya mai hiyarabone, mai kiyana mai‑ya mai nakitamabone, mai‑ya yosematane.
“Dai tokiya, dai‑ka yama‑bone‑ya dai weyeriyahi. Dai dabakiba‑ka awa, yamasi, iyawa, yinero, bora na, dai weyekariyahi.
Mai tabori‑ya dai koboniya, yobe ohari‑ya dai winiyahi. Aka‑ya dai toki awisari‑ya yobe owa‑ya dai winariyahi.
Mai tabori‑ya dai toka, dai ati‑ya mai nofara, dai yananamiya, mai noki‑ya dai teme hibakori dai nanahabiyahi, mai atibodi yama‑ya kadikabonehe.
‘Mai ati oda nofara mai tokineni. Oda ene amani.’ Mai atibodi ati naboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Fa‑fai‑ya mai yanana, mai toka, mai tabori dami‑ya Deoso ati amosabote tamine‑ya mai kamina, mai kiyana mai‑ya mai nakitama nameteni.
Yeso tamine‑ya mai‑ka hidi i‑di Erodi mite, atibodi yama‑ya kadiki kitematane. Yeso tamine‑ya mai hiyara,
“Yowaho Batita abe, kitamemonane.” Mai one ati nihi.
“I‑di Eriya kobonamatase awane.” Mai one ati nihi.
“Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita‑mata abemata, kitame awane.” Mai one ati nihi nameteni.
“Owati ihi Yowaho Batita namidi mai tiihinakosemari, ebeni‑ke tohamata, ene kitemonaha? Yeso oawaboneni.” Erodi atibodi ati nematane.
Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai kobonama, mai ihi tamine‑ya mai kaminameteni, Yeso‑ya. Yeso hika mai eyehe Besaida‑kaya mai tokameteni, mai one awiri‑kaya mai hasinabonehe.
Yeso hika mai eyehe toke tamine‑ya mai one mita, mai tokomakemeteni. Mai‑ya Yeso awe, mai‑ya nofe, Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine‑ya kamine, mai kiyana mai‑ya nakitamematane.
Mahi toke‑ya mai 12 kana Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Yeso, yobe wadare‑ya ai nahoneni. Mai tiyosehi, mai tabori‑ya mai tokiya, mai tafe‑bone‑ya mai kanikabone, mai amoni‑bone‑ka mai‑ka yobe‑ba mai wasebonehe.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Mai dai natafabisahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Oda tefe wadarani. Baho 5 kana, aba mai fama, eya oda tefe nani. Mai tafe‑bone oda kanikaba awineni.” Mai ati nameteni.
Mai dama maki mai 5.000 mai kana mai nahameteni. Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya hiyare,
“Mai nahorisahi. Haa‑ya 50 mai kana mai nahorisa, haa‑ya 50 mai kana mai nahorisa, 50 mai kana mai hinama mai tohahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai 12 kana mai ati ihi mai nafi nahorisameteni.
Baho 5 kana, aba mai fama na, mai‑ya Yeso damakane, neme‑ya tonokomise, Deoso‑ya hiyarematane. Baho‑ya kebi, mai 12 kana mai‑ya daanematane, mai dami‑ya mai daahinabonehe.
Mai nafi tafa, mai korimanama, kote hasina, mai teehina, hisiri 12 kana kibameteni.
Kabani‑kaya Deoso‑ya Yeso hiyarematane, hika mai da‑daba mai eyehe. Hiyari hawa toheya, hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya hiyaramaki,
“Owa tamine‑ya mai hiyara, eme mai ati niti?” Yeso ati ne,
“‘Yowaho Batita amane.’ Mai one ati nihi,
‘I‑di Eriya amane.’ Mai one ati nihi,
‘Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita‑mata abemata, kitame, fare amane.’ Mai one ati nihi teni.” Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai ati nameteni.
Mai‑ya hiyare,
“Dai‑ta eme dai ati niti?” Yeso ati ne,
“Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika amatini.” Bedoro ati ne,
“Hehe, fara ama·oni. Hiniya, owa tamine dai hiyarariyahi.” Yeso ati nematane.

“Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, mai na, dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke ati‑ya mai nofarabone, mai weeni hikitebona, mai hinahabeya, mahi 3 tohe‑ya okitamaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai nafi‑ya hiyare,
“Owa‑ya dai ati daba, dai‑ka yama dai nokotoniriyahi. Owa‑ya dai dabiya, owa‑ya mai nanahababone‑nima dai‑ya mai nanahabahareba awineni.
Yama dama‑ya mai kihamaro mai abiya, mai‑ka yama mai‑ya kasomateraboneni. Owati‑ya mai nofara yama hirini‑kaya mai sawiwahaboneni.

Deoso‑ya mai nofara dai‑ya mai weeni awirabone dai ati na, owa‑ya dai nofarihi, owati‑ya dai nofarihi dai ni‑ya, okomatasiya, dai‑ya onofahariraboneni. Okomatasiya, Owa wehene wadabone, Okobi wehene owa‑ya sawibona, Okobi‑ka yo‑yose amosabote mai wahi owa‑ya sawi naboneni.
Mai amoni 8 kani‑ya Bedoro, Yowaho, Tiyako, mai na, mai‑ya Yeso himanematane. Adami webote‑ya Yeso mai eyehe tokomorosematane, Deoso‑ya hiyarebonaha.
Deoso‑ya Yeso hiyareya, noko bare tohawahe, borone sawa yokana tohawahe, wehene wadawahematane.
I‑di Mose i‑di Eriya mai fama Yeso‑ya mai hiyarameteni.
I‑di Mose i‑di Eriya mai fama mai wahi wadameteni. Yerosare‑ya Yeso abebona tamine‑ya mai hiyarameteni.
Bedoro mai‑ya nokobisa nafe ihi mai amona, mai dodafiya, Yeso wehene‑ya mai awa, Mose‑ya mai awa, Eriya‑ya mai awa nameteni.
I‑di Mose, i‑di Eriya, mai yanakanamiya, Bedoro ati yanane,
“Ayo, tiwa‑ya oda sawe, yama sibarini. Dai‑ka wa‑wasa‑ba oda wamanaboneni. Tika ohari, Mose‑ka ohari, Eriya‑ka ohari nebonane.” Bedoro ati ne,
hiniya ati yananematane, yama‑ya atibodi watoreri.
Bedoro hiyareya, neme sabi mai‑ya barikawama, mai habi siitonameteni.
Neme sabi‑ya ati kaki,
“Oka Dao amane. Oka Ka‑kadika amane. Ati dai tokadabahi.” Ati nematane.
Ati fawaneya, Yeso ohari waimatane. Mai amoni dami‑ya yama mai hiawa tamine‑ya mai one‑ya mai kaminarameteni.
Adami webote‑ya mai amoni ohare, mai tokofawama, bofe‑ya mai dama mai nahameteni.
Maki sawi, Yeso‑ya haane,
“Ayo, oka dao tiawamatahi. Oka dao ohari amane.
Madi towe oka dao‑ya waratorimane ene oka dao e‑erine, hini‑ya were, iridi sabone toka nofene. Madi towe toka kanibote re, tokeya, oka dao‑ya bisitene.
Tiwa‑ya mai da‑daba mai haa·ona, madi towe‑ya mai kananihebone, mai ati‑ya madi towe nofare, tokarene.” Ati nematane.
“Ka! Owati dai nofara, dai narabo hawirani. Owati dai wato kanibote nahi. Dai‑ya owa sawi nafimaraboneni. Tika dao tiwakamahi!” Yeso ati nematane.
Bidi‑ya kakameya, madi towe yetene‑ya fatatowitimatane. Yetene wami‑ya sone, hini‑ya werenematane. Madi towe‑ya Yeso weene, yetene‑ya nakitame, yetene‑ya badi‑ya daatonamematane.
Yeso ene‑ya mai awa, mai atibodi yama‑ya kadika,
“Deoso ene kitabote amane.” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.
Mai dama mai atibodi yama‑ya kadikiya, hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya hiyare,
“Owati dai mitahi. Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke‑ya ai owa daanebonane.” Yeso ati nematane.
Deoso ati ene Yeso ati‑ya mai watora, Yeso‑ya mai nayofina, mai ati yanarameteni.
Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai ibi kadika,
“Ebeni‑ke kiti ba‑basi nabati?” Mai ati na,
mai ati fara hinama tohara, mai ibi ati waranameteni.
Mai atibodi ati‑ya Yeso wato, ewe‑ya nawaawamematane, hini yowi‑ya.
Mai‑ya hiyare,
“‘Owa ene Yeso ya‑yainebonane.’ Dai atibodi ati na,
ewe dai kasomiya, owa‑ya dai kasomahari, Okobi‑ya dai kasomahari neni. Bi‑bidi ne‑mona ati ne, fare ba‑basi nibisane.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Ayo, tiwa oni‑ya ai owa hirine, madi towe mai‑ya kananihi. Ai‑ya dabare, oda ati barihinene.” Yowaho ati ne,
“Maki‑ya dai ati baririyahi. Dai‑ya mai kakora, dai‑ya mai kasomabisateni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Hika mai one‑ya yose, mai dai tohameteni, mai amoni‑bone‑ka mai‑ka yobe‑bona‑ya mai wasebonehe. Samaritano mai tabori one‑kaya hika yo‑yose mai koboniya,
Samariya‑ya mai wi‑wina mai ati a‑arira, Yerosare‑ya mai tokabone mai‑ya mai kasomi nofarameteni.
Mai ati‑ya i‑di Tiyako, i‑di Yowaho mai mita, mai ati yanana,
“Ayo, Deoso oda haaniya, yifo hirini kisaboneni, mai‑ya sarikanabonehe. Tiwati sibakarini?” Mai ati nameteni.
Yeso mai‑ya ati barine, mai‑ya weene,
“Haa‑nima oterani. Owati somabisateni.
Mai‑ya okasomabone okemaro, mai nanahabi onofarani.” Yeso ati nematane.
Tabora one‑kaya mai tokawahameteni.
Mai tokiya, ai owa kamaki,
“Yeso, tikami‑ya tiwa‑ya osaweboneni.” Ati ne,
“Bani mai one tabori hodi‑ya toha, bani mai afe wada mai bori tohateni. Owa‑ta owa tabaro wadarani.” Yeso ati nematane.
Maki bare‑ya hiyaratase,
“Owa‑ya tisawihi.” Yeso ati ne,
“Ayo, okobi abeya, hika yama kote okayafiya, tiwa‑ya osawiwahaboneni.” Ati nematane.

“Abi‑ka yama hini tohiya, abi abeya, owati‑ya mai nofara abi‑ka yama‑ya mai kayafabisiya, yama sibaraboneni. Tiwa‑ta tikamiya, Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine‑ya tihiyarabisiyahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Ayo, tiwa‑ya osaweboneni. Oka mai haa·oniya, okomakeboneni.” Ai owa ati nematane.
Yeso ati yanane,
“Deoso‑ka yama‑ya mai nokotonihebone mai ati na, makobote yama bara‑ya mai nokotonibisa, Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona‑ya mai sawiraboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Makobote mai one 72 mai kana Yeso hini tokomakibona‑kaya mai‑ya yosebona mai‑ya hiyare,
“Mai tabori‑nima dai fa‑famiyahi.
Owati dai mitahi. Dai tokiya, kaneiro bidi mai‑nima dai nahi, dai hamariyahi. Yome hame‑nima mai na, mai‑ya dai oyose, dai noko wadiyahi.
Dai tokiya, yinero dai towakariyahi, yamasi dai weyerihi, sanidariya dai kakibirihi, dai nahi. Dai tokiya, mai‑ya dai koboniya, dai maanamariyahi. Hini dai toka, dai tokiyahi.
Mai‑ka yobe‑ya dai tokiyomiya, dai ati yananiyahi.
‘Ahi‑ya dai wi‑wina Deoso dai‑ya kasomebonane.’ Dai ati niyahi.
Yobe hidi ati someya, yobe‑ya mai sawe mai‑ya Deoso kasomebonane. Yobe hidi ati amosareya, mai sawe mai‑ya Deoso kasomarebonane.

Mai tabori‑ya dai koboniya, Yobe ohari‑ya dai wina, dai dayoriyahi. Dai tefe‑bone‑ya mai daaniya, dai tafiyahi. Hini mai daahini‑ya dai fawiyahi. Mai‑ka yama ai anina, ai‑ka yama manakone‑ya mai daateni.
Mai tabori‑ya dai koboni‑ka dai‑ya mai ati nofa, dai tefe‑ba mai daaniya, dai tafiyahi.
‘Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona dai‑ya sawine.’ Dai ati niyahi.
Mai tabori‑ya dai koboni‑ka dai‑ya mai nofariya, mai‑ka hawi‑ya dai demenariya, mai‑ya dai hiyariyahi.
‘Dai‑ka wami hibakori oda teme kiha oda nanahabineni, dai atibodi yama‑ya kadikabonehe. Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona dai‑ya kobone, dai nofarene.’ Mai‑ya dai hiyara, dai ati niyahi.

Owati dai mitahi. Hibati‑ya Sodoma‑ya mai wi‑wina Deoso mai‑ya nanahabematamonane. Ai nafi ene‑ya Deoso kadikeya, mai‑ya bisinamatasebonane. Owa tamine dai kamina, dai ati‑ya mai nofara mai‑ya Deoso bisini kitabisebonane.

Ka! Korasi‑ya dai wi‑wina, Besaida‑ya dai wi‑wina, dai na, dai ene manakone wadani. Owa ene kitabote‑ya dai awamaro, owati‑ya dai nofaramaroni. Tiro‑ya mai wi‑wina‑mete, Sidoho‑ya mai wi‑wina‑mete, mai na, Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadabara, tabora fami‑ya Deoso nanahabematamonane. Owa ene kitabote‑ya mai awi bahamete‑mani, mai atibodi amosawama nemeteni.
Hibati‑ya Tiro‑ya mai wi‑wina‑mete, Sidoho‑ya mai wi‑wina‑mete, mai na, ai nafi ene‑ya Deoso kadikeya, mai‑ya weenamataseya, Deoso dai‑ya weeni kitabisebonane.
Kafanaho‑ya dai wi‑wina neme‑ya dai winabone dai ati na, yama hirini‑kaya dai sawibisaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya hiyare,
“Dai ati‑ya mai tokadaba owati‑ya mai tokadabahareni. Dai ati‑ya mai nofara owati‑ya mai nofaharirani. Owati‑ya mai nofara owa‑ya yose‑mari ati‑ya mai nofaharirani.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai toka, Yeso ati‑ya mai kaminameteni. Makobote 72 mai kana mai kamatasa, mai ya‑yaini nafi, Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Ayo, tiwa oni oda kamina, madi towe mai kananani.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Satanasi bofe‑ya sone oawene. Bahi yebekane‑nima soninene.
Owati dai mitahi. Dai okasomabone, maka dai tainisa, yomasa dai tainisa niya, dai‑ya yama komaraboneni. Owa ene dai kiti nafe, Satanasi kiti bi‑bidi nibisane. Yama towe dai‑ya komaraboneni.
Dai ati ene madi towe mai kananamone, dai ya‑yaini nafiriyahi. Neme‑ya dai oni‑ya Deoso kanahano ene dai ya‑yaini nafibisahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai‑ya hiyareya, Deoso‑ka Doni ene Yeso ya‑yaine, ati yanane,

“Abi Deoso, bofe‑ka hidi tiha, neme‑ka hidi tiha, tiwa ene ya‑yai·oneni. Yama‑ya mai wa‑wato‑mone mai ati na tiwa ene‑ya mai watorani. Madehe‑nima mai na, yama‑ya mai watoramone mai ati na, tiwa ene‑ya mai watobisineni. Tiwati‑maro‑nima yama nineni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ati yananamatase,

“Okobi ene yama nafi okayafawahineni. Owa‑ya dai wato nafira, owa‑ya Okobi watobisane. Okobi owato oteni. Owati ihi Okobi‑ya dai one watomake, dai‑ya okasomara‑mani, Okobi dai watora neni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya kiinawame, hi‑hiyararamamatane, ati mai one himitarebonaha.
“Dai ya‑yainahi, owa dai awaro.

Owati dai mitahi. Hibati‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai toha, mai‑ka hidi webote‑mete mai toha, mai na, owa‑ya mai awabone mai ati namete, owa‑ya mai awi awirameteni. Owati‑ya mai mitabone mai ati namete, owati‑ya mai miti awirameteni.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Owa ene Yeso ati tosawaribonane.” Atibodi ati ne, Yeso‑ya hiyare,
“Yeso, hini yamata‑nima owa ene nibati, ai abaterabone‑kaya osawebonehe?” Ati nematane.
“Mose‑ka yama hani tikadika, eme ati titi?” Yeso ati nematane.

“‘Ai‑ka hidi webote i‑di Deoso dai nofi nafihi. Yama one dai nofi nafiriyahi. Deoso‑ta dai nokotonibisahi. Hini tiwa‑ya tinofi‑nima dai yakari‑ya mai sawe mai tinofiyahi.’ Deoso ati tene.” Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya ka‑kanawato ati nematane.
“Fara amani. Tiwati‑nima tiniya, ai abaterabone‑kaya tisaweboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai nafi‑ya nofare, ati yananamatase,
“‘Dai yakari‑ya mai sawe mai tinofiyahi.’ Yama hani ati na,
ebeni‑ke tamine amanati?” Ati nematane.
Maki‑ya Yeso kanawatobona hiyare,
“Yerosare‑ya ai owa wine, Yeriko‑ya toke, hawi‑ya yakaneya, yama‑ya mai bo‑boti mai warahine, mai bisihine, borone mai hiwake, tohomakosane, abi yananeri.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya da‑daa hawi‑ya yakane, maki home‑ya awe, dodikose, tokane.
Mai nowati‑ya Samaritano mai‑ka owa kamaki, maki home‑ya awe, fai‑ya nofe,
hemedi‑ya hikatee, bora‑ya sokihikane, bani mese‑ya hiwatari, oteo‑ya hiwakame, hikasomane.
Yama wahabisari‑ya oteo hidi‑ya hiyare,
‘Mai bisihine tikasomaho. Manakone daa·oni bahe. Okomatasiya, manakone kote onahabamakibonane.’ Ati nane.
Mahi fame‑ya yama‑ya ai anina manakone‑nima yinero ne‑ya daanane.
Mai 3 kana maki‑ya mai awani. Tiwati omitahi. Ebeni‑ke yama hani ati‑nima ene nihi?” Yeso ati nematane.
“Maki‑ya kasome, yama hani ati‑ya tokadababisane.” Ati nematane.
“Fare ene‑nima tiwa ene nahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso mai eyehe toke, tabora one‑ya mai kobona, Maata ati ihi hika yobe‑ya mai sawemeteni.
Maata‑ka asima i‑di Mariya Yeso yowi‑ya itaremeteni, Yeso ati‑ya mitabonehe.
I‑di Maata mai tafebone anini‑ya nokotonihe, ati yanana,
“Ayo, owa hare yama‑ya ani·ona, owa tiawahi. Oka asima tiyosehi, owa‑ya kasomabonehe.” Maata ati nameteni.
“Maata, Maata, yama anini dama‑ya nokotini kitineni.
I‑di Mariya owati‑ya mitabone itare, oyoseteraboneni. Owati‑ya no‑nofa amosi nafibisineni. Owa tefe‑bone‑ya wamana amosi bi‑bidi neni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yama one‑ya Deoso‑ya Yeso hiyari hawa tohe, hika mai da‑daba owa ati yanane,
“Ayo, Deoso oda hiyarabone, oda tikanawatohi. I‑di Yowaho Batita hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya kanawatomari‑nima oda‑ya tikanawatohi.” Ati nematane.
“Deoso‑ya dai hiyarabone, eya dai atiyahi.
‘Abi, amosabote amatini. Tiwati ihi oda nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tihawahaboneni.
Mahi‑nima oda tefe‑ba daatiyahi.
Oda ene towe tohamaro, oda ene manakone haatinamariyahi. Mai ihi manakone oda haanamaharirani. Tiwa ene yama amosara oda nokotoniriyahi.’ Dai atiyahi, Deoso‑ya dai hiyararo.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai‑ya hiyaramatase,
“Yama soki bai‑ya tiwa tabaro‑ya tika owa koboneya, tika yama kaba wadara, tika naki‑ka yobe‑ya tikaba awineni, yamata tikanikabonehe.
‘Naki, oka baho‑ba 3 kana daatinahi. Owa tabaro‑ya oka owa kobone, tefe‑ba wadarene.’ Dai ati naba awineni.
Yobe doro‑ya ati yananeba awane,
‘Naki, madehe eyehe owinineni. Yobe barikawame yama daani awirini, hibayata baho owati daa nofarini.’ Tika naki ati neba awane.
Tika naki tiwa‑ya nofi nafire, baho‑ya ati daa nofare, haatini dameya, yama tinofa‑ya tiwa‑ya daanebonane.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Owati dai mitamakihi. Deoso‑ya yama dai haanahi, yama‑ya daanebonane. Deoso dai sibaniya, dai wasibonane. Deoso sawi‑kaya dai ati tokiya, nokobi‑ya dai haaniya, nokobi‑ya seekanebonane.
Yama‑ya mai haana mai‑ka yama‑bone mai‑ya koboteni. Yama‑ya mai sibana, yama‑ya mai wasiteni. Nokobi‑ya mai haana, nokobi‑ya mai seekiteni.
Aba‑ya tika dao haaneya, bataromaka daatiterani.
Arakawa hife‑ya tika dao haaneya, yomasa daatiterani.

Dai ene kote towe toha, dai‑ka ewe‑ka yama amosa‑bone dai daateni. Deoso ene amose hinama tohe, Deoso‑ka Doni dai‑ya sawibona dai ati na, Deoso dai haaniya, yama‑ya daanebonane, ai‑ka Abi neme‑ke toheri.” Yeso ati nematane.
Madi towe ai owa‑ya foye, madi towe ene maki ati wadamarematane. Yeso ati ene madi towe kanane, maki ati yananawahematane. Yeso ene mai dama mai awa, mai ya‑yaina, mai atibodi yama‑ya kadikameteni.
Mai one ya‑yaira,
“Madi towe mai‑ka hidi i‑di Beosibo ati ene mai kananineni.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Yeso, Deoso‑ka tihamone tina, neme‑ya tiwa ene kitabote oda awaboneni.” Mai one ati nameteni, Yeso‑ya mai weenabonehe.
Mai atibodi ati‑ya Yeso wato, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Hidi webote hika mai dama mai ibi bisiniya, kiti fawanebonane. Tabora ohare‑ka mai ibi toka toweya, mai nafi awimaraboneni.
Beosibo ene madi towe kananane dai ati na, i‑di Satanasi‑ka mai ibi toka towe‑mani, Satanasi kiti fawane nane.
Beosibo ene madi towe mai kana·onihemone dai ati na, dai one madi towe mai‑ya mai kanana, ebeni‑ke ene tohati? Satanasi ene amane dai ati niya, dai one dai‑ya mai weenaboneni.
Deoso ati ene madi towe mai kana·onihe, Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona dai‑ya sawine.
Owati dai mitahi. Ai owa kite yima‑ya damane, hini tabaro‑ya wai, yehe honene mai hiyabaterene.
Ai owa kiti ba‑basi ne kamaki, yobe hidi‑ya wateya, hika yima‑ya kayafe, bora kita‑ya tanikanisa ne, fai yehe honene‑ya mai one‑ya daanane.
Owa‑ya mai nofara owa‑ya mai kakoteni. Owa‑ya mai ati sawira,
‘Yeso‑ya dai sawiriyahi.’ Mai ati teni.
Madi towe ai owa‑ya sawimari, tokawahe, tabora one‑ya sibane, tabora one‑ya wasi awire, hini‑ya hiyare,
‘Hibati‑ya osawimaro‑kaya wini·onamaboneni.’ Madi towe ati ne,
fa‑fai‑ya kamatase, hibati‑ya sawimari‑ke doro amosawame‑ya awe,
tokomatase, hika mai one 7 kana mai‑ya himanane, mai towe ba‑basi naro. Hini sa‑sawi‑kaya mai nafi sawiwahaboneni. Ai owa kiyani nafiwahebonane.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso hiyareya, fana one ati yanana,
“Tika ami ya‑yainaba awini.” Ati nameteni.
“Okomi ya‑yaini bi‑bidi nineni. Deoso ati‑ya mai mita, ati mai hikadabe, mai ya‑yaini nafineni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso‑ya mai dama mai naho‑ya mai one kamake, mai dama mai‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Towe dai amani. Deoso ati dai tokadabara, hiniya owa ene kitabote dai awabone dai ati na, dai ati‑nima oteraboneni. Yama dai awabone dai ati na, i‑di Yona ene‑mata‑nima yama na dai awabisaboneni.

Ai nafi ene‑ya Deoso kadikeya, bato‑kaya mai wi‑wina‑mete mai‑ka hidi fana dai‑ya weenaboneni. Hibati‑ya Saromaho hasineya, yama yaki‑ya kakemeteni, Saromaho ati‑ya mitabonehe. Saromaho yama‑ya wato bi‑bidi nematane. Dai‑ya da‑daba yama‑ya watobisane.

Ai nafi ene‑ya Deoso kadikeya, Ninifa‑ya mai wi‑wina‑mete dai‑ya mai weenaboneni, owati‑ya dai nofararo. Fara Ninifa‑ya mai wi‑wina i‑di Yona ati‑ya mai mita, mai ihi‑maro‑nima mai ihi namarameteni. Yona kiti bi‑bidi nemata, dai‑ya da‑daba kiti nafibisane. Owa ene dai nofara, dai ene towe manakone nafeboneni.
Nabarina ai botokana, wahi ai barikiterani. Nabarina ai kanawaarikosateni, mai kiiyomama yama‑ya mai awabonehe.
Yama bara‑ya dai nokotoniriyahi, yama bara‑ya dai nokotonihe, dai noko towe toha‑nima dai nineni. Deoso ati dai watoraboneni.
Yama amosa hinama dai nokotoniya, yama bara dai nokotoni awiriya, yama tehe‑ya dai sawe‑nima dai na, yama dai wataboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso hiyari hawa toheya, fariseo mai‑ka owa Yeso‑ya himanematane, fai tabaro‑ya mai tafabonehe. Yeso tokomaki, itarimatane, tafebonaha.
Yeso yehe‑ya sorokarire, tafebona‑ya fariseo awe, atibodi yama‑ya kadikematane.
Yeso ati yanane,
“Fariseo dai toha, keneko mese dai sorona, mai noki‑ya dai ene amosa, hiniya dai atibodi towebisa amani. Yama dai bote, dai ene towe damateni.
Yama‑ya dai watotera awineni. Deoso ai mese‑ya wamane, ai atibodi‑ya wamanahari nematane.
Dai atibodi amosawamahi. Dai atibodi ati ene mai‑ka yama kaba‑ba dai daaniya, yama sibareni. Dai‑ka yama wiye nafi amosa‑nima dai teboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Ka! Fariseo dai toha, dai ene manakone wadani. Dai‑ka yamata ke‑ketehe‑ya dai kadika, kote Deoso‑ya dai daateni. Deoso ati kote dai tokadabara,
‘Mai ihi‑nima mai manakone daatinahi. Deoso tinofiyahi.’ Deoso ati nematane.
Ati dai tokadabaterene. Dai ene amosa, Deoso dai nofa dai ni‑ya, makobote Deoso‑ka yama‑bone dai daaniya, dai sibarineni.
Ka! Fariseo dai toha, dai ene manakone wadani. Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya dai sawe, kadera amosa‑ya dai nahoteni. Dai‑ya mai kahiyarabone, mai‑ya dai nokotoniteni.
Ka! Mai‑ya dai kanawato amosara, yama‑ya mai watora ihi mai ihi towe tohama, hini dai ene amani. Dai ene manakone wadani.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kanawato mai‑ka owa ati yanane,
“Ayo, haa‑nima tiwati riyahi. Haa‑nima tiwati niya, oda‑ya weetinaharineni.” Ati nematane.

“Ka! Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya dai ka‑kanawato dai toha, dai ene manakone wadaharineni. Yamasi kiba, kanaha‑ya dai daateni, mai weyehinabonehe. Dai‑ta yama‑ya dai weyeterani. Fara‑nima dai ati damiya, mai tokadababone dai ati na, hini dai ati ohare‑ya dai tokadabi awirani.
Ka! Dai ene manakone wadani. Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai tame‑ka yobe dai wamateni. Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑ya dai‑ka idi mai nanahabameteni.
Dai‑ka idi mai ihi‑nima dai ene nineni. Dai‑ka idi mai mai hinahabamete mai tame‑ka yobe‑ya dai wamateni.
Deoso yama‑ya watone. Hibati‑ya dai tamine‑ya hiyare,
‘Owati‑ya mai mi‑mita mai toha, oka yo‑yose mai toha, mai na, mai oyoseboneni. Mai one‑ya mai nanahaba, mai one‑ya mai kananihi naboneni.’ Deoso ati nematane.
Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑ya mai nanahabamete, mai ihi yorotokana manakone‑nima dai ene manakone naboneni.

Abeo‑ya nanahabi bahe, mai one dami‑ya mai nanahabamake, i‑di Sakariya‑ya nanahabamake, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya i‑di Sakariya‑ya mai nanahabamakemeteni. Owati dai mitahi. Mai ihi yorotokana manakone‑nima dai ene manakone naboneni.

Ka! Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya dai ka‑kanawato dai toha, dai ene manakone wadani. Nokobi ai barikana‑nima Deoso ati yokana dai barikana, mai watorabonehe. Deoso‑ka yama dai watora, mai one yama‑ya watabone mai ati na, mai‑ya dai ati barinineni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso hiyari hawa toheya, toke, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, fariseo mai toha, mai na, mai ati yawa, Yeso‑ya mai weenabone, Yeso‑ya mai haanamarimanameteni.
“Yeso ati tosawariya, ati oda mitiya, ati oda kamineya, Yeso oda wataboneni.” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.
Mai dama mai yorotokana, 1.000 dame‑nima mai na, mai dama mai ihi mai ibi tame tainameteni. Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya hiyare,
“Fariseo mai‑ka femeto‑ya dai arabanahi. Fara mai ihi tamine amani. Mai ati amosa, mai ihi ati kasirobisa, mai‑nima dai riyahi.
Yama tamine‑ya mai kema, mai dama mai hiwatowahaboneni.
Mai noki awiri‑ya dai hiyara, dai ati‑ya mai nafi mitawahaboneni. Dai ati bo‑boyinamaro, dai ati‑ya mai nafi mitawahaboneni.
Dai‑ya mai ati naboha mai‑ya dai nayofinariyahi. Dai‑ya mai nanahabiya, dai‑ya mai kobonamateraboneni.
Deoso dai nayofinabisahi. Deoso mai one‑ya nanahabeya, yama hirini‑kaya mai one‑ya korotonamakibonane. Fare dai nayofinabisahi.
Bani bidi mai 5 kana mai da‑daa, yinero bidi fame‑ta mai manakone tohateni. Bani bidi mai‑ya Deoso nofe, bani bidi ohari‑ya Deoso ati kadamowamaterene.
Deoso ai tati kone nafi‑ya wato, ai tati kone nafi‑ya kadikemarine. Dai habo siitoriyahi. Bani bidi mai dama mai manakone bi‑bidi teni. Dai‑ta dai manakone nafibisateni.
Mai‑ya dai hiyariya,
‘Yeso‑ka ama·oni.’ Dai ati niya,
‘Oka mai amani.’ Onahareboneni, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai‑ya.
‘Yeso‑ka ohi awirini.’ Mai ati niya,
‘Oka mai tohi awirini.’ Obisaboneni, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai‑ya.
Owa‑ya mai weena, makobote owa‑ya mai nofawahiya, mai ihi manakone wadamaraboneni. Deoso‑ka Doni‑ya mai weeniya, mai ihi manakone fawateraboneni.

Yama one‑ya dai‑ya mai wataboneni, dai ene‑ya mai kadikabonehe. Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe hidi‑ya dai‑ya mai towakama, dai‑ka hidi owa‑ya dai‑ya mai towakama na, dai ati‑ya mai mitabone, dai atibodi yama‑ya kadikariyahi.
Dai hiyariya, Deoso‑ka Doni dai‑ya kanawatobonane, ati dai kaminebonaha.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai dama mai‑ka owa ati yanane,
“Yeso, okobi abe, tiwati ihi okobi yehe honene one‑ya okoyo owa‑ya daanaho.” Ati nematane.
“Ayo haa·oraboneni. Kofeno‑ka yo‑yose ohi awirini.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai nafi‑ya hiyare,
“Dai noko wadahi. Bofe‑ka yama dai nokotoniriyahi. Mai‑ka yama dama toha, mai‑ka yama dama mai‑ya kasomi nafira, mai one ohi, mai one aba nineni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso mai‑ya kanawatobona mai‑ya hiyare,
“Ai owa‑ka yamata yani amosa, hika yamata dodamineni.
Atibodi yama‑ya kadike,
‘Oka yamata wa‑wada‑ke oka yobe kibane.
Yobe onahabiya, yobe webote‑ta wama·oniya, Yobe nafi‑ya oka yamata wadabisaboneni.

Oka yamata teeni hawa ohiya, owatibodi yama‑ya kadikamatasiya, —Oka yamata dama tosiyo kanibote raboneni. Yama ani·onamarabone, hiniya otafabone, fino‑ya ofebone, ya‑yai·onaboneni.— Haa‑nima onaboneni.’ Atibodi ati nemarine.
‘Yama‑ya tiwato awirini. Hibayata ti·ababone, tika yamata‑ya mai one kayafawahaboneni.’ Deoso ati nemarine.
Yama dama‑ya mai nokotonihe, Deoso‑ya mai nokotonira, mai abiya, mai‑ka yama mai‑ya kasomateraboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya hiyare,
“Yama kaba wadarihi, dai‑ka bora one wadarihi niya, dai habo siitoriyahi.
Mai tafe toha, mai‑ka bora toha na mai‑ya kasomi nafira, mai one ohi, mai one aba nineni.

Bani bidi mai tamine dai mitahi. Bani bidi mai‑ka yamata‑bone‑ya mai kamaterani. Fadara‑ya mai kiharihi, mai tafe‑ka yobe wadarihi, tene. Bani bidi mai tafe‑bone‑ya Deoso daanibisatene. Bani bidi mai‑ya Deoso nofi bi‑bidi ne, ai‑ya nofi nafibisane.
Dai habo siitoniya, dai‑ya dai kasomarani.
Dai hasini‑ya dai watora, hini yamata ihi yama dama‑ya dai nokotonihi?
Awa mowe dai awahi. Awa mowe bora‑ya wamaterani. I‑di Saromaho‑ka bora amosa damamete, awa mowe amosabisa, Saromaho‑ka bora amosi bi‑bidi nametemoneni.

Deoso ati ene awa mowe amosani. Makobote awa mowe aba kanibote na, ai sarikiteni. Awa mowe‑ya Deoso nokotoni nafire, ai‑ya nokotoni nafibisatene. Deoso ati ene ai‑ka bora tohaboneni. Deoso ati dai nofi nafira, ati dai nofi nafihi.
Dai kakomeheriyahi. Deoso ai tefe‑bone‑ya daa, ai‑ka fa‑fawa‑bone‑ya daa nebonane.
Deoso ati‑ya mai watora yama dama‑ya mai nokotonihe, mai‑nima dai riyahi. Ai‑ka Abi dai‑ya watotene.
Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona dai nokotoniya, dai‑ka yama‑bone‑ya Deoso daanebonane.
Oka dai amani. Dai habo siitoriyahi. Ai‑ka Abi dai‑ya nofe, dai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona‑ya dai saweboneni.

Dai yehe honene dai daanahi. Yinero dai waratokaniya, mai‑ka yama wadara mai‑ya yinero dai daanahi. Haa‑nima dai niya, neme‑ya dai manakone wadaboneni. Neme‑ya dai‑ka yama manakone tosiyoteraboneni. Neme‑ya yama‑ya mai botirihi, yama aboni yama‑ya mai kabarihi, teni.
Bofe‑ya dai yehe honene dama wadiya, bofe‑ka yama dai nokotoniheboneni. Neme‑ya dai‑ka yama dama tohabisiya, neme‑ka yama dai nokotonibisaboneni. Ai‑ka yama dama wadi tohi‑kaya yama ai nokotoniteni.
Okomatasabone, dai‑ya dai hawa tohiyahi. Owa dai nimaniyahi.
Hidi‑ka yo‑yose mai‑nima dai nahi. Hidi marina‑ya toke, hika yo‑yose mai nimahine, kobonamataseya, nokobi‑ya mai seekana kanibote nabonehe.
Mai‑ka hidi kamebona‑ya hini mai‑ya mai hawa tonihe, mai ya‑yainaboneni. Hidi kameya, ati ene mai nahaboneni, mai‑ya natafebonaha.
Ai‑ka yama‑ya botibona‑ka ora tamine‑ya ai mita, ai noko wadaboneni, ai‑ka yama‑ya botirebonaha.
Dai noko wadahi. Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kobonebona, dai one nimahinamareya kobonebonane.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Ayo, oda tikanawata, mai nafi tikanawatohareba awineni.” Bedoro ati nematane.
“Owati dai mitahi. Hidi‑ka yo‑yose mai dama, hika yo‑yose ohari yama‑ya watone, hidi ati‑ya tokadabi amose, hidi ati ene mai one‑ka hidi tohawahebonane, mai‑ya natafebonaha.
Hidi koboneya, hidi ati‑nima ene ne, ya‑yainebonane.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. Yama dama‑ya hidi daanebonane, hinawadabonehe.
Hidi‑ya nimani nafiya,
‘Oka hidi kama kanibote re, kama kanibote ni awirebonane.’ Hika yo‑yose atibodi ati neya,
mai makidi, mai fanawi mai na, mai‑ya bisi, kawi‑ya fawa neya,
hidi kama kanibote nebonane. Hika mahi, hika ora ne‑ya hika yo‑yose wato awirebonane. Hidi kobonameya, hika yo‑yose towe‑ya bisini kitebonane. Deoso ati‑ya mai nofara mai sawi‑kaya hinawaibonane.
Dai‑ka hidi ati dai mita, dai‑ka hidi ati‑nima dai ni awiriya, dai‑ka hidi dai‑ya kosini kitebonane.
Bofe‑ya kobo·onamaroni, yama‑ya hiri·onihebonehe. Yanani hawa toha‑mani, ya‑yai·ona neni.
‘I‑di Yeso ati ene mai nafi ati somaboneni.’ Dai ati na awineni.
Owa ene mai ibi weenibisaboneni.
Yobe ohari‑ya mai wina mai 3 kana mai‑ya mai fama mai nofaraboneni. Mai fama mai‑ya mai 3 kana mai nofahariraboneni.
Mai dami‑ya hiyare,
“Mahi to‑toka‑kaya neme sabi dai awa, faha kaki bonehe dai ati na, fara dai ati‑nima faha kakiteni.
