Bato‑kaya yama hakikini kake dai awa,
‘Yama hiwe kobonaboneni.’ Dai ati teni.
Fara dai ati‑nima yama hiwe koboteni.
Towe dai amani. Bofe‑ka yama kiini dai wato, neme‑ka yama kiini dai wato na, Deoso ene‑ya dai awa, yama‑ya dai watorani.
Deoso yama hinofa dai sibara, dai sibanahi.
Kofeno‑ya tiwa ene towe‑ya ai owa kaminebona, dai kobokani awisari‑ya tiwati somawama kanibote nahi. Tiwati somawami awiriya, boriso tiwa‑ya mai waratoniya, kadeya‑ya tiwa‑ya mai nafoyaba awineni.

Yeso hiyari hawa toheya, Karireya‑ya mai wi‑wina mai one tamine‑ya mai kamina, fara Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Deoso‑ka bani‑bona‑ya mai daaniya, Birato ati ene mai‑ya mai nanahaba, mai tamine‑ya mai kaminameteni, Yeso‑ya. Yeso ati yanane,
“‘Hini mai ihi mai abineni. Oda‑ta, oda ene amosabisani.’ Dai ati na awineni.
‘Oda ene‑maro‑nima oda ene namaraboneni.’ Dai atibodi ati ni awiriya,
dai abahareboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Sirowe widi‑ke yobe nemehe kote bakatone, sone, 18 mai kana mai abameteni.
‘Hini mai ihi mai abameteni.’ Dai ati na awineni.
‘Yerosare‑ya mai wi‑wina mai one hasina, mai ihi amosabisameteni.’ Dai ati na awineni.
Owati dai mitahi.
‘Oda ene‑maro‑nima oda ene namaraboneni.’ Dai atibodi ati ni awiriya,
dai abahareboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai‑ya kanawatobona, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Maki‑ka awa‑ya fiko waa, faha fowe‑nima fiko‑ya kiine, fiko boni wadarani.
Hika yo‑yose‑ya hiyare,
‘Faha fowe 3 kani‑ya fiko kii·ona, bonora, kaatinahi, awa bono one kamamakeboneni.’ Hidi ati nane.
‘Hibareya, fiko mate wii·okaniya, wami okateheboneni.
Sabado‑ya Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya Yeso mai‑ya kanawatoya,
fana sawemeteni. Madi towe ene faha fowe 18 kani‑ya wai moinama, wai amosarameteni.
Fana‑ya Yeso awe, fana‑ya haanematane. Fana kake,
“Tikitamani.” Yeso ati nematane.
Fana‑ya Yeso boyone, fana waamisama, wai amosawama, Deoso‑ya kahiyarameteni.
Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe hidi i‑di Yeso ene‑ya awe, yawe, ati yanane,
“Mahi 6 kane‑ya yama ai aniteni. Sabado‑ya yama ai aniterani. Dai kiyana mahi owa‑ya dai kamabisahi, dai‑ya nakitamebonaha. Sabado‑ya dai kamariyahi.” Yobe hidi ati nematane.
Yeso ati yanane,
“Towe dai amani. Sabado‑ya yama dai aninahariteni. Dai‑ka bani mai dai seekana, mai dai towakifawateni, faha‑ya mai fawabonehe.
Abaraho‑ka nodi amani. Faha fowe 18 kani‑ya Satanasi yadihinamete sabado‑ya okasomarabone dai ati na, okasomawahani.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso‑ya mai weena mai ati fawanameteni. Yeso ene‑ya mai dama mai awa, mai ya‑yainameteni.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,
“Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine ohiyaraboneni.
Maki hika fadara‑ya mositada noki‑ya korotona, mositada yana, tonafe, webote tohawaha, bani mai kake, mositada ini‑ya mai bori‑ya mai wamaneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai‑ya hiyaramatase,
“Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona tamine dai mitamatasahi.
Yeso Yerosare‑ya tokebona, tabora dama‑ka mai‑ya kanawatone.
Mai‑ka owa ati yanane,
“Ayo, Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona‑ya mai sawebone mai fa‑famaraba naba awineni.” Ati nematane.
“Nokobi bide dai nokotonibisahi. Nokobi one‑ya mai dama mai tokiyoma, Deoso‑ya mai tokiyomaraboneni.
Yobe hidi nokobi‑ya barikawameya, nokobi‑ya dai one nahomake, mai haanaboneni.
‘Ayo, nokobi seetikanahi.’ Mai ati naboneni.
‘Dai owatora, nokobi see·okaraboneni.’ Yobe hidi ati nebonane.
‘Oda eyehe titafa, oda tabaro‑ya oda‑ya tikanawato tinamaroni.’ Mai ati naboneni.
‘Owati dai mitahi. Dai owato awirini. Dai tokomahi. Dai ene amosarani.’ Hidi ati nebonane.

Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai toha, i‑di Abaraho toha, i‑di Isaki toha, i‑di Yako toha ne, Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya mai sawe, mai dai awiya, dai tokomakira ihi dai ohinabone, dai komene kitaboneni.

Oda‑ya Bara mai sawibisa, mahi ka‑kaki beheri‑ka mai toha, mahi to‑toka beheri‑ka mai toha, mahi ka‑kaki‑ka mai toha, mahi to‑toka‑ka mai toha, mai na, Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya mai one sawe, oda marinaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso hiyari hawa toheya, fariseo mai kamake,
“Yeso, tikamahi. Tiwa‑ya i‑di Erodi ati nanahabene.” Fariseo mai ati nameteni.
“I‑di Erodi ati hini tohaya. I‑di Erodi‑ya dai tokiya, dai hiyarahi.
‘Yeso ati tamine timitahi. Owa amoni famiya, madi towe mai kana·onihebone, mai kiyana mai onakitamaboneni. Owa amoni oharimaki‑ya yama noko·onihe, hawa·oniheboneni. Yeso ati nene.’ Dai ati nahi.
Owa amoni 3 kani‑ya yaka·onabone, makobote Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑nima onaboneni. Yerosare‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai nafi abameteni.” Yeso ati nematane.

“Yerosare, tika mai ihi ohi·oneni. Tiwa‑kaya mai wi‑wina Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita mai‑ya mai nanahabateni. Tika mai okasomabone ona, owati‑ya mai nofarani. Arakawa afe bodi‑ya bidi mai mookana, madi mai hikayawateni. Fara‑nima tika mai okayawabone ona, owa‑ya mai nofarani.
Tika mai fawaniya, tika yobe honita tohawamebonane. Owati timitahi. Eya dai‑ka mai ati naboneni, owa‑ya mai hiyararo.
‘Deoso tiwa‑ya yose, tiwa‑ya kasomayaho, oda ati nineni.’ Mai ati nabone,
mai ati ni awisari‑ya osawimatasaraboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Sabado‑ya fariseo mai‑ka hidi owa tabaro‑ya Yeso tafebona tokiyomeya, mai kakatomameteni.
Yeso noko‑ya maki warane waane,
Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kanawato mai toha, fariseo mai toha, mai na, mai‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Sabado‑ya ai owa ai nakitama, ai sibarineni?” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai ati yanarameteni. Maki yehe‑ya Yeso waratone, fai‑ya nakitame, fai‑ya toyosemematane.
Mai‑ya Yeso hiyaramatase,
“Sabado‑ya dai‑ka bani hodi kowe‑ya soniya, dai idi awirane? Sabado‑ya tika dao hodi kowe‑ya soniya, dai idihari awirane?” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai ati‑bone‑ya mai watora, mai ati yanani awirameteni.
Mai tafabone, Yeso mai‑ya kakatomematane. Kadera amosa‑ya mai nahoremeteni, mai‑ya mai one kahiyarabonehe. Mai ihi‑ya Yeso awe, mai‑ya kanawatobona, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Owati dai mitahi. Marina‑ya dai toka, kadera amosabisa‑ya dai nahoririyahi. Maki amosabise‑ya marina hidi haanahariba awane.
Amosabise koboneya, hidi tiwa‑ya hiyarebona,
‘Soho, amosabise‑ka kadera amani, haro. Kadera one‑ya tiwitaribisahi.’ Hidi ati nebonane.
Mai nafi noki‑ya kadera towe‑ya tiwitareboneni.
Mai tabori‑ya dai tafabone, kadera towe‑ya dai nahorihi. Hidi dai‑ya ati yananebona,
‘Naki, kadera amosabisa‑ya dai nahoribisahi.’ Hidi ati nebonane.
Hidi ati‑ya mai mita, dai‑ya mai nofaboneni.
Hini mai‑ya mai kahiyara, Deoso ene mai mai hinofaraboneni. Ai‑ya ai nokotonira, Deoso ene ai‑ya mai kahiyarawahaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Marina hidi‑ya Yeso hiyare,

“Mai one‑ya tiwati natafiya, tika mai toha, tiwa‑ya mai no‑nofa mai toha, yinero dame‑ya mai kiha mai toha, mai na, mai‑ya haatiriyahi. Mai‑ya haatiniya, tiwa‑ya mai haanahariya, tika yama manakone abi hawa tohaboneni.
Mai‑ya tinatafabone, mai‑ka yama wadara mai toha, mai hi‑hiyana mai toha, mai ka‑kana mai toha, mai noki wadara mai toha, mai na, mai tinatafabisahi.

Haa‑nima tiwa ene niya, ya‑yaitinaboneni. Tiwa‑ya mai haanami awiraboneni. Yama faina‑bone‑ya mai ihi amosa mai kitamiya, mai‑ya tisawebone, tiwa ene manakone‑ya Deoso daanebonane.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mesa‑ya mai nahore, Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, mai‑ka owa hiyare,
“Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona‑ya mai tafiya, mai ya‑yainaboneni.” Ati nematane.
Yeso mai‑ya kanawatobona mai‑ya hiyare,
“Ai owa mai‑ya natafebona mai dami‑ya haanane.
Makobote mai tafe awi hawa tohiya, hika yo‑yose‑ya yosene, mai‑ya dodiwitibonaha. Hika yo‑yose toke,
‘Dai kamaki kanibote nahi. Yama nafi hawa tohani.’ Ati nematane.
Fai ati‑ya mai tokadabarani, mai nafi.
‘Fadara okanika, oawawitebone, dai‑ka marinabone‑ya owati toki nofarini.’ Daidi ati nane.
‘Bowi mai okanika, ai yehe kafama‑nima mai na, yama‑ya mai horona, mai oawabone, mai marinabone mai‑ya owati tokomaki nofarini.’ Owa ati tasane.
‘Hibayata ofana, mai marinabone mai‑ya owati tokomaki nofarini.’ Owa ati tasane.
Hidi‑ka yo‑yose kame, mai ati‑ya kaminamane. Hidi yawe, hika yo‑yose‑ya yosematase,
‘Sidadi nafi‑ya tikamiya, yama‑ya mai kihara mai toha, mai hi‑hiyana mai toha, mai noki wadara mai toha, mai ka‑kakona mai toha, mai na, mai tiwakamiyahi, mai tafabonehe.’ Hidi ati nane.
Fai‑ya toke, mai‑ya kakame, ati yanane,
‘Ayo, tiwati‑nima ona, mai haa·ona, mai owakama, tika yobe kibarane.’ Hidi‑ka yo‑yose ati nane.
Hidi‑ka yo‑yose‑ya yosetase,
‘Hawi‑ya mai one yakana mai toha, mai‑ka yobe oharine‑ka mai toha, mai na, mai‑ya haatiyahi, ai marini‑ya mai kamakebonehe. Oka yobe kibayaho.
Yeso yananeya, mai dama mai tokomakemeteni. Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,

“Oka dai tohabone dai ati na, owa‑ya dai nofi nafibisahi. Tika abi, tika ami, tika yibote, tika madehe, ayo, soho, adi, asima, mai na, mai dai nofi bi‑bidi, owa‑ya dai nofi nafibisahi. Hini dai‑ya dai nofi bi‑bidi, owa‑ya dai nofi nafibisahi. Owa‑ya dai nofi nafibisariya, oka dai tohi awiraboneni.
‘Owa‑ya mai ati nanahaba yama sibarini. Yeso‑ya da‑daba ohabisaboneni.’ Dai ati nahi.
Haa‑nima dai ati ni awiriya, oka dai tohi awiraboneni.
Yobe nemehe ai wamanabone, yobe manakone ai kadiki baha, ai‑ka yinero ai kadikamaki, manakone ai kiha, yama sibarini, manakone kote ai kihara, yobe ai wamaterani.
‘Yobe nemehe‑ya wamanebona ati ne, yinero tosiyo, yobe hawa tohaterebonane.’ Mai ati naboneni, mai hahahikaneya.
Sodado mai‑ka hidi webote, hika sodado mai 10.000 mai kana mai toha, hidi webote owa kamakimona, hika sodado mai damabisa, 20.000 mai kana mai tohanineni. Mai kamaki tamine‑ya hidi webote mite,
‘Mai dama mai kamakemone, ai fa‑famaraba na, ai kitaba awineni.’ Atibodi ati nebonane.
‘Mai dama mai toha oda‑ya mai bisinibisaba awineni.’ Hidi atibodi ati neya,
hidi owa aka‑ya tohasa neya, hika mai one‑ya yosebona,
‘Mai‑ka hidi‑ya dai tokahi. —Hini yamata‑nima manakone nibati, tiwati somawami‑bone‑karo?—’ Dai ati niyahi.” Hidi ati nebonane.
Dai‑ka yama nafi dai saatokasara, oka dai tohi awiraboneni.
Sao ihi ai tefe kabi amosa, faha ihi abiya, amosawamaterani.
Sao ati kasira awa bono mate‑ya ai ketehera, yamata ade‑ya kasomaterani. Hiniya ai weretowititeni. Owati dai mita owati dai tokadabahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya mai ha‑haa mai toha, mai ihi amosara mai toha, mai na, Yeso wai‑kaya mai yorotokanameteni, Yeso ati‑ya mai mitabonehe.
Fariseo mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, mai na, mai yawa,
“Mai ihi amosara mai toha na mai‑ya Yeso sawi, mai eyehe tafane. Yeso towe amane.” Mai ati nameteni.
Mai ati‑ya Yeso mite, mai‑ya kanawatobona mai‑ya hiyare,
“Dai‑ka kaneiro mai 100 kana ohari fawaneya, 99 mai kana mai tonokosa, ohari‑ya dai sibateni. Dai sibanadi, dai wasi awisareya, dai maakarani.
Dai wasiya, dai ya‑yainiya, diwani dai kamatene.
Tabora‑ya dai koboniya, mai‑ya dai haana,
‘Dai ya‑yainahi. Oka kaneiro fawane, owasiwamineni.’ Dai ati teni.

Fara‑nima Deoso ati‑ya mai nofaramaro, Deoso ati‑ya mai nofawamiya, neme‑ya mai wi‑wina mai ya‑yaini nafiteni. 99 mai kana Deoso ati‑ya mai nofa, mai ihi‑maro‑nima mai ihi nasa na, neme‑ya mai wi‑wina mai ya‑yaini bi‑bidi nineni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai‑ya kanawatomatasebona mai‑ya hiyaramatase,

“Fana‑ka yinero ai yehe kafama‑nima ne. Yinero barata wamani toha, yinero ohari fawaneya, nabarina wahi‑ya yinero‑ya sibana, yobe nafi‑ya yowinineni, yinero‑ya wasebonehe. Yinero‑ya wasi awisariya, sibahinane.
Yinero‑ya wase, hika mai‑ya haana,
‘Dai ya‑yainahi. Oka yinero fawane, owasiwamineni.’ Ati nineni.
Owati dai mitahi. Deoso ati‑ya ai owa nofaremari, Deoso ati‑ya nofawaheya, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai sawi‑kaya mai ya‑yaiteni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai‑ya kanawatomatasebona mai‑ya hiyare,
“Ai owa bidi mai fama,
bidi yoto‑ke badi‑ya haane,
‘Abi, hasinasa tiniya, oka yinero‑ba daa kanibote tinahi.’ Ati nane.
Yinero‑ya badi kadike, bidi yoto‑ke‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya daanane.
Amoni fa‑famaraba ne‑ya yehe honene nafi‑ya yorotokanihi, yama yaki‑ka tabora bara‑kaya toke, kawi‑ya nokotonihi, mai fanawi‑ya nokotonihi ne, hika yinero tonasiyone.
Yinero tosiyoya, faha kakimara, tefe tosiyo, fimi‑ya awane.
Yama manakone‑ya waratonebona, maki owa‑ka yama‑ya aninawahane. Maki ati ene boroko mai‑ya natafawahane.
Tefe‑ba mai daahire, boroko mai tafe‑ya ati kabane.
Badi‑ya atibodi watinawamane.
‘Okobi‑ka yama anini‑ya mai anina mai tafi fotateni, owa‑ta fimi ihi owa abi yanatoneni.’ Atibodi ati nane.
‘Okobi‑ya okomiya, Okobi ohiyaraboneni. —Abi, owa ene towe tohamaroni. Deoso ati okadabarihi, tiwati okadabarihi onamaroni.
Abi, owa‑ya ewe tinamariyahi. Tika yo‑yose ohawahabisaboneni.— Onaboneni.’ Atibodi ati nane.
Fai‑ya tokome, badi tabaro yakari‑ya badi hiawe, bidi‑ya nofe, kanani toke, bidi‑ya kobone, bidi‑ya wate, bidi noko‑ya tomanane.
‘Abi, owa ene towe tohamaro, Deoso ati‑ya okadabarihi, tiwati okadabarihi onamaroni. Owa‑ya ewe tinamariyahi.’ Ati nane.
Bidi ati‑ya nofare, hika yo‑yose mai‑ya hiyare,
‘Oka dao‑ka bora amosabote‑ba, hika sanidariya‑ba, hika aneho‑ba yama na dai kakama kanibote nahi, sakohinabonehe.
Bowi bidi ime‑ta dai nanahabahi. Ai marinaboneni.
Oka dao tokemari, abe amanakani, onamaro, kitame‑nima nane. Oka dao fawanemari, kamawahane.’ Ati nane.
Mai ya‑yaina, mai marina, mai wayomineni.
Bidi daidi fadara‑ya anine, kame, yobe yakari‑ya wasime, mai ya‑yaina, mai wayomi‑ya mitane.
Mai‑ka yo‑yose owa‑ya haane,
‘Hini yamata‑bone mai ya‑yaina, mai wayomineniti?’ Ati nane.
‘Tika soho koboname, amose ene abi ya‑yaine, ati ene bowi bidi ime‑ya mai nanahabani.’ Mai‑ka yo‑yose ati nane.
Badi tamine‑ya mite, yawe, ati tokiyomi nofarene. Badi kame, bidi‑ya himane.
‘Owati tokiyomi nofarini. Tiwa tabaro‑ya yama ani·ona, tika yama anini‑ya fawa·oterani. Tiwati‑nima oteni. Oka no‑nofa mai onatafabone, oda wayoma nabone, oda‑ka bodi bidi‑ba daatiterani.
Tika dao‑ya tika yinero daatinamaro, yinero‑ya tonasiyone, mai fanawi towe‑ya nokotonihimari, kame ene bowi bidi ime‑ya tiwati ihi mai nanahabawahineni.’ Ati nane.
‘Owa‑ya tisawiteni. O·abiya, owa yehe honene nafi tikayafawahaboneni.
Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya kanawatobona mai‑ya hiyare,
“Maki yinero dame‑ya kihe, ati ene hika yinero maki owa hinawadane. Makobote mai one kamake, fai‑ya mai hiyara,
‘Tika yinero‑ya na‑nawada tika yinero‑ya nawadi amosarene.’ Mai ati nineni.
Fai‑ka yinero‑ya na‑nawada‑ya haane,
‘Oka yinero nawadi tina amosara, oka yinero tinawadamateraboneni. Yinero hano tiwawamiya, yinero hano owa‑ya daanama kanibote tinahi.’ Ati nane.
Yinero‑ya na‑nawada hini‑ya hiyare,
‘Oka hidi‑ka yinero onawadamarabone ati ne, hini yamata‑nima onaba? Owa yehe kitara, yama anini kita‑ya owati nofarihi, yinero honita haani onofarihi oneni.’ Ati nane.
‘Hehe, yama owatowahani. Mai‑ya okasomabone, hidi‑ka yinero onawadamariya, owa‑ya mai himanaboneni, mai tabori‑ya otafawahabonehe.’ Ati nane.
Hika hidi‑ka yama‑ya mai kanikamaro, yama manakone kote‑ya mai nanahabara mai‑ya haane, daidi‑ya hiyare,
‘Yama tikanikamaro, hini yamata‑nima yama manakone na hasiniti?’ Hidi‑ka yinero‑ya na‑nawada ati nane.
‘Owa defeni, oyo baodi kiba 100 tohani.’ Ati nane.
‘Baodi kiba 50 toha tikanahanobisahi.’ Hidi‑ka yinero‑ya na‑nawada ati nane.
Owa‑ya hiyaramakitase,
‘Eme tika yama manakone na hasiniti?’ Ati nane.
‘Owa defeni, tiriko sako webote kiba 100 tohani.’ Ati nane.
‘Sako 80 kana tikanahanobisahi.’ Ati nane.
Ene towe tamine‑ya hidi mite, ati yanane,
‘Oka yinero‑ya na‑nawada‑mari yama‑ya watone.’ Hidi ati nane.
Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadabara mai‑ka owa atibodi ati‑ya mai watoteni. Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadabamone Deoso atibodi ati‑ya mai wato bi‑bidi nineni.
Ai‑ka yama ohare‑ya mai nawadi amosiya, yama dama‑ya mai nawadi amosahareboneni. Mai‑ka yama damara mai ihi amosariya, mai‑ka yama dodamiya, mai ihi amosi awisaraboneni.
Dai‑ka yinero tohe, dai one mai‑ya dai kasomara, neme‑ka yama‑ya Deoso dai‑ya daaterebonane. Neme‑ka yama manakone nafibisani.
‘Oda‑ka yama dai nawadahi.’ Mai ati na
mai‑ka yama dai nawadi amosariya, dai‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai daateraboneni.

Dai‑ka hidi mai fama, hidi owa ati dai tokadababisa, hidi owa ati dai tokadabaraboneni. Hidi owa dai nokotoniya, hidi owa dai kakaboneni. Deoso ati dai nofabisiya, yinero dai nokotoniraboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Fariseo yinero‑ya mai nokotoniteni. Yeso ati‑ya mai mita,
“Yeso yama‑ya watorane.” Mai ati nameteni.
Mai‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Dai ene amosamone dai ati na, dai ati‑ya mai dami nofa, dai atibodi ati‑ya Deoso watobise, dai atibodi ati‑ya Deoso nofarene.
‘Oda kita, hini oda ene Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona‑ya oda saweboneni.’ Mai ati nani.
Neme ababone, bofe ababone, Mose‑ka yama hani ati kote abateraboneni.

Maki hini ene honita wahawameya, fana one‑ya famawaheya, ene ati kasiro, hiniya siwanane. Fana maki‑ya famamara‑ya maki owa nofe, fana‑ya famawahe, maki owa ene ati kasirohari, hiniya siwanane.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso mai‑ya kanawatobona mai‑ya hiyare,
“Ai owa‑ka yinero dame, bora amosabote‑ya sakone, mahi‑nima marina‑ya hirinematane.
Hika yobe nokobiri‑kaya ai owa kafori, oni Rasaro tohane. Rasaro‑ka yinero wadare, mese nafi towe tohe, ido‑ya siitonimatane.
Rasaro tefe wadare,
‘Bofe‑ya mai tafe kote soniya, owa‑ya mai daanaba awineni.’ Rasaro atibodi ati nane.
Rasaro‑ka ido‑ya yomahi mai heronameteni.
Makobote i‑di Rasaro abe, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai hiwakamane. Abaraho korimari sawi‑kaya Rasaro korimari sawiwahane. Maki yinero dame‑ya kihemata, abamaki, mai hikamane.
Ai korimari weyene‑ya maki sawibisa, yama kome kita, yama‑ya kiine, yama yaki‑ya Abaraho‑ya awane, Abaraho‑ya Rasaro famarine.
Abaraho‑ya haane,
‘Idi, owa tikasomahi. I‑di Rasaro tiyosehi. Rasaro yehe faha‑ya bokeya, owa ebene‑ya boyonebonane, yama kome bi‑bidi nabonehe. Yifo hirini kita, owa‑ya kome kawitineni.’ Ati nane.

‘Ewe, i‑di Rasaro tokaterebonane. Tiwati kadamowamariyahi. Hibati‑ya ti·abi awisa tiriya, tika yama amosa damamaroni. Hibayata tiwa komene kitawahineni. I‑di Rasaro abi awisareya, hika yama wadara, hiniya komene‑ya awemari, hibayata owa‑ya sawi, hika yama amosawahineni.
Oda tabaro, dai tabaro na teberi‑ya hodi nafe waineni. Hawi wadaterani. Oda owa tokarihi, dai owa kakirihi, teboneni.’ Abaraho ati nane.
‘Idi, owati timitahi. Okobi tabaro‑ya Rasaro tiyosebisahi.
Yama kome kita‑kaya osawineni. Oka soho mai 5 kana mai‑ya i‑di Rasaro hiyaraho, owa‑kaya mai kamakirabonehe.’ Ati nane.

‘I‑di Rasaro tokarebonane. Mose‑ka yama hani‑ya mai kiha, Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑ka yama hani‑ya mai kiha na, yama hani ati‑ya mai tokadabiya, tiwa‑kaya mai tokomakiteraboneni.’ Abaraho ati nane.
‘Idi, yama hani ati‑ya oka soho mai tokadabarani. Ai owa abemari, kitameya, mai‑ya hiyareya, Deoso ati‑ya mai nofawahaboneni.’ Ati nane.

‘Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai nofarihi, Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai nofarihi na, ai owa abe, kitameya, ati‑ya mai nofahariraboneni.’ Abaraho ati nane.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya hiyare,
“Mai one ati ihi owati‑ya mai one tokadabaraboneni. Ka! Hini mai ihi tohiya, mai manakone wadaboneni.
Dai noko wadahi. Tika owa tiwa‑ya ene amosare, tihiyaraho, ati amosawamebonaha. Ati amosawameya, tiwati somawamaharihi.
Tika owa tiwa‑ya ene amosare, mahi ohari‑ya ene towe 7 kaneya, makobote tiwa‑ya hiyareya,
‘Owa ene‑nima owa ene namaraboneni.’ Ati neya,
tiwati somawamaharihi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso‑ka yo‑yose Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Oda tikasomahi, Deoso ati oda nofi nafiwahabonehe.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Deoso ati‑ya dai nofi i‑isi niya, dai ene kitaboneni. Awa tiawahi.
‘Awa boretikaniya, faha bai‑ya tikamahi.’ Dai ati niya,
awa‑ya Deoso borekaneya, faha bai‑ya awa‑ya Deoso kamawahebonane.
Dai‑ka yo‑yose fadara‑ya anine, kaneiro mai‑ya nawada ne, kameya,
‘Titafi bahi, owa tafi yotaboneni.’ Dai ati terani.
‘Owa tefe‑ba hawatiniyahi. Owa tefe‑ba daatiniya, korima·oniya, titafamakeboneni.’ Dai ati nibisateni.
Dai ati‑nima dai‑ka yo‑yose ene neya, dai kahiyaraterani.
Dai‑ka yo‑yose ene‑nima dai ene nahi. Makobote haa‑nima dai ati nahi.
‘Deoso, oda‑ka hidi amatini. Oda‑ya tikahiyarariyahi. Hini tiwati‑nima oda ene na. Oda ene amosabote wadaterani.’ Dai ati nahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yerosare‑ya Yeso tokebona, yakanasa neya, Karireya yowi kowani‑kaya Samariya toha, fara yowi‑ya Yeso yakanematane.
Mai tabori bide‑ya kobone, mai mese towe mai 10 kana yama yakari‑ya mai nahameteni.
Yeso‑ya mai haana,
“Ayo Yeso, oda tikasomahi.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Hehe, sibaraboneni. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ya dai tokomiya, dai kitama dai‑ya mai awawahabonehe.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai tokoma, hawi‑ya mai mese amosawamameteni.
Mai mese amosawami‑ya mai awa, ohari‑ta wininame, Deoso‑ya kahiyare, ati kitematane.
Yeso‑ya kobone, Yeso yowi‑ya home, Yeso‑ya kahiyarematane. Yodeo mai‑ka owa tohare, Samaritano mai‑ka owa amane.
“Mai 10 kana mai okasomamaro, mai 9 kana ebeni‑kaya mai tokimati?
Ai‑ka mai kamara, Samariya‑ke kamabisane, Deoso‑ya kahiyarebonaha.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mese towe tohemari‑ya hiyare,
“Sibarini, tiwaamisamahi. Tiwa tabaro‑ya tikamahi. Owati‑ya tinofa ihi tikitamineni.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe kobonebona, hini yamata ai awiboneti, ai watowahebonaha?” Fariseo mai ati nameteni.
“Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona yananeya, neme‑ya yama bara dai awateraboneni.
‘A‑ahi‑ya tohane.’ Mai ati rihi.
‘Aka‑ya tohane.’ Mai ati rihi naboneni.
Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona dai‑ya sawi hawa tohane.” Yeso ati nematane.
Hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya hiyare,
“Yama one‑ya dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke dai‑ya sawimarebona dai ati hifoyebonane.
Keyehe‑ya dai‑ya mai hirinabone,
‘Ahiyata‑ya waine.’ Mai ati nihi,
‘Aka‑kaya waine.’ Mai one ati nihi nabone,
mai ati‑ya dai nofariyahi. Mai ati ihi dai tokariyahi.
Yama yaki‑ya bahi yebekani ai awateni. Fare‑nima dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke bofe‑ka hidi tohawahe‑ya mai nafi awawahaboneni.
Fara‑bone koboni awisariya, owa‑ya mai nofarabone, owa‑ya mai habanaboneni.
Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kiti yananeya, Nowe sawimata‑ka yama‑nima yama namataboneni.

Nowe ati‑ya mai nofara hiniya mai tafa, kawi‑ya mai fawa, mai one fana na, mai habi siitoni awisariya, kanawa dori‑ya Nowe tokiyome, makobote faha fowe kobo kanibote na ihi mai nafi abawahametemoneni.
Hibati‑ya i‑di Ro hasinasa ne‑ka yama‑nima yama namatasaboneni. Hiniya mai tafa, kawiya mai fawa, yama‑ya mai nika, yama‑ya mai daa, yamata‑ya mai kama, yobe‑ya mai wama nametemoneni.
I‑di Ro Sodoma‑ya wi‑wina‑mata, toke‑ka mahi tohasa ne‑ya Deoso ati ene yifo hirini toha, yati hirini toha na neme‑ya sona, mai nafi‑ya nanahabametemoneni.
Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kitawaheya, haa‑nima yama namatasaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
I‑di Ro fadi tamine‑ya dai ati kadamowamariyahi.
Owati dai mitahi. Okomatasiya, mai fama mai amokana, ohari owakameya, owa towinakosebonane.
Okomatasiya, mai fanawi fama kimi‑ya tooniya, ohare owakamiya, one‑ta towitakosaboneni.
Fadara‑ya mai fama mai aniniya, ohari owakamiya, owa towitakosebonane.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Ebeni‑kaya kobotibati?” Hika mai da‑daba mai ati nameteni.
“Bani bate home‑ya boko mai toka, bani bate dai watoteni. Fara‑nima dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kamataseya, dai nafi watowahaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso mai‑ya kanawatomatane, mahi‑nima Deoso‑ya mai hiyarabonehe, mai atibodi kitiya, mai hiyari maakarabonehe.
“Mai tabori‑ya kofeno‑ka yo‑yose wine, mai ihi‑ya ka‑kadika amane. Deoso‑ya nayofini awire, ai one‑ya nayofinahariterene.
Mai tabori‑ya fana winahareni. Fana maki abemata, mai ihi‑ya ka‑kadika‑ya hiyara,
‘Maki owa yehe hone‑ya boti, owa‑ya kako ne, owa tikasomahi.’ Fana ati na, ati yanani damamoneni.
Mai ihi‑ya ka‑kadika fana ati‑ya nofare, makobote fana kaki dama ihi hini‑ya hiyare,
‘Deoso onayofinara, ai owa ati onofaterani.
Haa‑ta fana ati fawakasi watora, ati‑nima onaboneni, owa‑ya maa tonirabonehe.’ Ati nane.
Mai ihi‑ya ka‑kadika ati kasiro, hiniya fana‑ya kasomane.
Deoso hika mai haani hidameya, mai‑ya kasomebonane. Hibareya, Deoso ati ne, ati damarebonane.
Owati dai mitahi. Deoso mai‑ya kasoma kanibote nebonane. Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kamataseya, ati‑ya mai nofasa na mai damaraboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Hini mai‑ya mai kahiyara, mai ihi towe wadaramone mai ati na, mai one‑ya mai nofara, mai‑ya Yeso kanawatobona, mai‑ya hiyarematane.
“Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai fama mai towakamakineni, Deoso‑ya mai hiyarabonehe. Fariseo owa toha, kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya ha‑haa owa toha nane.
Fariseo wai, hini tamine‑ya hiyare,

‘Deoso, owati amosabisa, ya‑yai·onineni. Mai one‑ta yama‑ya mai ka‑kahidina mai toha, mai ihi amosara mai toha, mai one‑ka yibote mai‑ya mai a‑aha mai toha, mai na, mai ihi‑nima owa ene terani. Ahiyata‑ya wai kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya ha‑haa toha, fare ene‑nima owa ene terani.
Semana‑nima mahi fame‑ya otafaterani. Oka yama nafi okadikateni. Oka yama 10 kana okayafa, ohare Deoso‑ya daa·oteni.’ Fariseo ati nane.
Kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya ha‑haa aka‑ya wai, atibodi yawe, tonokomisi awire, hini bako‑ya batanane. Deoso‑ya hiyare,
‘Deoso, owati kasiramaro, owa‑ya tiwati somahi.’ Ati nane.

Ene manakone Deoso haahinamarebonane. Fariseo ene manakone wadanasa nane. Hini mai‑ya mai kahiyara, Deoso ati ene mai mai hinofaraboneni. Hini ai‑ya ai nokotoniriya, Deoso ati ene ai‑ya mai kahiyarawahaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai‑ka madehe damana‑ya mai kakamameteni, madehe tati‑ya Yeso boyonebonaha. Madehe‑ya mai kakama, Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai‑ya mai awa, mai‑ya mai ati barinameteni.
Yeso ati yanane,
“Madehe dai ati baririyahi. Madehe owati‑ya nofa, madehe‑nima mai na Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya mai saweboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. Madehe owati‑ya nofa, fara‑nima mai ni awiriya, Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya mai sawiraboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai‑ka hidi owa kamaki, Yeso‑ya hiyare,
“Ayo, amosabote amatini. Hini yamata‑nima obati, ai abaterabone‑kaya osawebonehe?” Ati nematane.
“Amosabote owa‑mone tina, ai owa amosabote wadaterene. Deoso‑ta amosabotebisa amane.
Deoso‑ka yama hani ati tiwata, fara ati timitahi,
‘Mai one‑ka yibote ti·aharihi. Ai owa tinahabarihi. Yama tibotiriyahi. Ai owa ene tamine‑ya keyehe‑ya hiritirihi. Abi, ami mai na, mai tinofabisahi.’ Yama hani ati nineni.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Madehe ohi‑ya Deoso‑ka yama hani ati tikamina ati‑nima oteni.” Ati nematane.
Ati‑ya Yeso mite, ati yanane,

“Tika yama ohare hasinineni. Tiwa yehe honene nafi daatinahi, manakone waratiniya, mai yahi hone wadara mai‑ya daatinahi. Deoso tabaro‑ya tika yama dama tohaboneni. Eya tiwa ene niya, makobote owa‑ya tisawiyahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ati‑ya mite, atibodi a‑arirematane. Yehe honene dame‑ya kayawematane.
Maki‑ya Yeso kakatome, ati yanane,
“Mai yahi hone dama mai kiha Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona‑ya mai dami sawiraboneni.
Akoye hodone‑ya kamero tokiyomaterene. Fara‑nima mai yahi hone dama mai naboneni. Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya mai dami sawiraboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita,
“Ka! Ebeni‑ke sawibati?” Mai ati nameteni.
“Ai ene kitara, Deoso ene kitabotebisa amane.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Ayo, oda tabaro‑ya oda sawimara, tiwa‑ya oda dababisineni.” Bedoro ati nematane.
Yeso ati yanane,

“Owati amosa dai mitahi. Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona‑ya ai one sawebone ihi mai‑ka yama nafi‑ya mai tonawadakosa, mai ihi amosa manakone wadaboneni. Mai‑ka yobe, mai‑ka yibote, mai‑ka ayo, mai‑ka abi, mai‑ka ami, mai‑ka madehe, mai na, mai tonokosa, mai manakone wadaboneni.
Mai 12 kana mai‑ya Yeso haane, Ahiyata‑ya mai toki bide toha, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Yerosare‑ya ai tokawahaboneni. Yerosare‑ya dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke tamine‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai kanahanamete‑nima yama nawahaboneni.
Kofeno‑ka mai‑ya owa‑ya mai daanabone, owa‑ya mai hahakana, owa‑ya mai fironaboneni.
Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke‑ya mai bisiniya, mai hinahabebonane. Mahi 3 kani‑ya dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kitamebonane.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, yama‑ya mai watorameteni. Ati yokana‑ya kemo‑nima nane.
“Yama bara tamine‑ya Yeso hiyare awane.” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.
Yeriko yakari‑ya mai yakana, hawi fowari‑ya noko wadare itarimatane, hika yama‑bone‑ya haaneri.
Mai dama mai yakana, mai moni‑ya mite, haane,
“Hini yamata tohiti?” Ati ne,
“Yeso Nasare‑ke kamakine.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Yeso, oda‑ka hidi amatini. I‑di Dafi‑ka nodi amatini. Owa tikasomahi.” Ati nematane.
Mai dai toha maki ati‑ya mai mita,
“Tiwati fawanahi.” Mai ati na,
Hiniya Batimeo haani kitawahe,
“Oda‑ka hidi amatini. I‑di Dafi‑ka nodi amatini. Owa tikasomahi.” Batimeo ati nematane.
Ati‑ya Yeso mite, maatowiti,
“Dai kakamakiho.” Ati nematane.
Mai hiwakamaki,
“Hini yamata‑ya tiwati koboniti?” Yeso ati ne,
“Ayo, owa noko amosawamabone, onani.” Ati nematane.
“Tikitamahi. Owati tinofa ihi tiwa noko amosawamawahineni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Batimeo noko amosawame, yama‑ya awawahe, Yeso‑ya sawiwahe, Deoso‑ya kahiyarematane. Yeso ene‑ya mai dami awa, Deoso‑ya mai kahiyaraharemeteni.
Yeriko‑ya Yeso yakane,
tamine‑ya Sakeo mite, Yeso‑ya awebona tokomematane. Sakeo kofeno‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya ha‑haa mai‑ka hidi owa amane. Yinero nafi‑ya kihematane.
Yeso‑ya awebona tokome, wai da‑daone, noko mai dama mai barihikanematane.
Hawi‑ya awa wai‑ya awe, kanani dai towame, awa‑ya tokomisematane, Yeso‑ya awebonaha.
Yeso kamaki, noko tokomise, Sakeo‑ya awe, Sakeo‑ya hiyare,
“Sakeo, tikisamahi. Tika yobe‑ya okaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ati‑ya Sakeo mite, kisama kanibote ne, ya‑yainematane. Hika yobe‑ya Yeso‑ya towakamematane.
Sakeo‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso tokebona‑ya mai awa, Yeso‑ya mai weena,
“Ati kasiro‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso tokiyomebanane.” Mai ati nameteni.
Sakeo waa kanibote ne, Yeso‑ya hiyare,
“Ayo, owati timitahi. Mai‑ka yama wadara mai‑ya oka yama beheri daa·onaboneni. Mai‑ka yama one obotemaro, mai‑ka yama 4 kanabone daa·onamatasaboneni.” Sakeo ati nematane.
Bofe‑ya dai wi‑wina dai‑ya okemaro, Deoso hawine dai watora dai‑ya siba·onaboneni, dai okayafabonehe.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mitiya,
“Yerosare yakari‑ya Yeso kobonane. Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona‑ya yama yana kanibote naba awineni.” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.
Mai atibodi ati‑ya Yeso wato, mai‑ya kanawatobona, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Owati dai mitahi. Ai tabaro yaka‑ya hidi webote wai‑ya mai‑ka hidi bi‑bidi ne tokebona ati nene. Hidi webote hikasomebona, kiti ba‑basi nebona ati nene. Yananebona,
hika mai yo‑yose mai 10 kana mai‑ya haane. Mai‑nima mai‑ka yinero webote oharirine‑ya daane, mai‑ya hiyare,
‘Owa nowati‑ya oka yinero dai tonanafiyahi. Okomatasiya, oka yinero owa‑ya dai daanamaboneni.’ Maki ati nane.
Maki‑ya mai one kaka, mai ati ihi mai‑ka yo‑yose mai tokomake, hidi webote‑ya mai hiyara,
‘Tiwati ihi maki kiti ba‑basi rebonane.’ Mai‑ka yo‑yose mai ati nineni.
Hidi webote ati ene maki kiti ba‑basi ne, maki kameya, hika yo‑yose yinero‑ya mai na‑nawada mai‑ya haane,
‘Dai‑ka yama anini tamine omitaboneni.’ Ati ne,
‘Ayo, yinero ohari owa‑ya daatinamaro, yinero 11 tohawahane.’ Hika yo‑yose owa ati nane.
‘Tiwa ene amosa, hibati‑ya tika yama bide daa·onamaro, owati‑nima tina, owati ihi tika yama damawahaboneni. Mai tabori 10 kana mai‑ka hidi tihawahaboneni.’ Hidi ati nane.
Hika yo‑yose owa kamaki,
‘Yinero ohari owa‑ya daatinemari, yinero 6 tohawahane.’ Hika yo‑yose owa ati ne,
‘Owati ihi mai tabori 5 kana mai‑ka hidi tihawahaboneni.’ Hidi ati nane.
Hika yo‑yose owa kamaki,
‘Hibaha, yinero owa‑ya daatinamaro, tikayahamatasahi. Bora‑ya kini·okane, okahemamaroni.
Tiwati ihi owa habo siitonineni. Tiwa eme kitateni. Mai one ihi tika yinero dodame, yinero nafi tikayahateni. Awa‑ya anitira, yamata marafakaniya, yamata tikayahateni.’ Ati nane.

‘Hini yamata ihi oka yinero bahako‑ya daatini awiriti? Oka yinero bahako‑ya daatina‑mani, okomiya, oka yinero‑ya mai daanamatasa, mai‑ka yinero kote‑ya mai daanahare neni. Owa eme kitatemone tina, mai one ihi oka yinero dodame, yinero nafi okayahatemone tina, awa‑ya ani·ora, yamata marafakaniya, yamata okayahatemone tinani. Tiwati‑nima yama naboneni.’ Hidi ati nane.
Mai yorona mai‑ya hiyare,
‘Yinero ohari dai kayafe, yinero 10 kani‑ya kihe‑ya dai daanahi.’ Hidi ati nane.
‘Hika yinero 10 kane, hini yamata‑nima neba yinero‑ya mai daatonamakibati?’ Mai ati nineni.
‘Hika yama toha, hika yama one daa·onaboneni. Hika yama awira oka yama‑ya damanamaterebonane.
Yeso hiyari hawa toheya, yananamatasematane, Yerosare‑ya tokomorosebonaha.
Orifera adami yakari‑ya tabora bi‑bidi na, Betaniya toha, Befaki toha na, fara yakari‑ya Yeso mai kobona, Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai fama mai‑ya yosematane.
“A‑ahi‑ya mai tabori‑ya dai towakahi. Mai tabori‑ke boho yetene yaditone dai awiya, dai disawaheya, dai kakamayaho. Hibati‑ya boho yetene mese‑ya mai itariterani.
‘Hini yamata‑bone boho yetene‑ya dai disawahiti?’ Mai ati niya,
‘Ai‑ka hidi haahinene.’ Dai ati niyahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai hiyose, mai towaka, tabora‑ya mai kobokana, Yeso ati‑nima yama na‑ya mai awameteni.
Boho yetene‑ya mai disawaha, boho‑ka hidi ati yanane,
“Hini yamata‑bone boho yetene‑ya dai disawaha?” Ati nematane.
“Ai‑ka hidi haahinene.” Mai ati nameteni.
Boho yetene‑ya mai kakama, boho yetene mese‑ya mai‑ka bora‑ya mai sookanire, Yeso‑ya mai nawitariwahameteni.
Mai toka, Yeso hawine‑ya mai‑ka bora‑ya mai nawiyameteni.

Yerosare yakari‑ya mai yakana, Orifera adami‑ya mai tokofawaha, mai dama mai‑ya mai daba mai ati yanana, mai ati kita, mai ya‑yaina, Yeso ene kite‑ya mai awamaro Yeso ene‑mari tamine‑ya mai hiyara, Deoso‑ya mai kahiyarameteni.
“Oda‑ka hidi webote amatini. Deoso tiwa‑ya yose, tiwa‑ya kasomayaho, oda ati nineni. Deoso ati somane, Deoso neme‑ke ai kahiyarineni.” Mai ati nameteni.
Mai ati‑ya fariseo mai mita, Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Yeso, tiwati ihi mai ati fawanahi.” Fariseo mai ati nameteni.
“Owati dai mitahi. Mai ati fawana‑mani, yati ati yanana neni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yerosare yakari‑ya Yeso kobone, mai tabori‑ya awe, ohinawahematane.
“Deoso ati somawama‑bona‑ka yama dai wata‑mani, yama sibara neni. Hibayata dai wato awiraboneni.
Yama kobonabone tamine okaminaboneni. Dai‑ya mai kaka, Yerosare‑ya mai kakidikosabone, awayara mai wamanaboneni, dai fidotorabonehe.
Dai‑ya mai nanahababone, dai‑ka yobe‑ya mai nanahababone, yati fama demenare wadamateraboneni. Hibayata Deoso dai‑ya sawi, dai watore ene dai abawahaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso toke, yama‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ya kananihi,
mai‑ya hiyare,
“‘Oka yobe‑ya owa‑ya mai hiyaraboneni.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati na,
dai ene yama‑ya mai bo‑boti mai‑ka yobe‑nima yobe nawawahane.” Yeso ati nematane.

Mahi‑nima Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso mai‑ya kanawatomatane. Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai toha, mai na, Yeso‑ya mai nanahababone, mai ati nameteni.
Mai dama Yeso ati‑ya mai nofi nafe, mai ihi mai‑ya mai nayofina, Yeso‑ya mai nanahabi awirameteni.

Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso mai‑ya kanawato, Deoso ati amosabote tamine‑ya Yeso hiyareya, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai toha, mai na, mai kamake, Yeso‑ya mai weenabone, Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Ebeni‑ke ati ene mai‑ya kanatiniti? Ebeni‑ke ati ene mesa‑ya fatatikawiti tiniti?” Mai ati nameteni.
“Dai ati omiti bahaboneni.
Yowaho Batita mai dama mai‑ya habanirise, ebeni‑ke ati ene tohati? Deoso ene toha, ai owa ene toha ne awane, hini yamata‑nima dai ati niti?” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai ibi hiyara,
“‘Deoso ati ene amane.’ Ai ati niya,
‘Hini yamata ihi Yowaho Batita ati dai nofariti?’ Yeso ati nebonane.
‘Ai owa ati ene amane.’ Ai ati niya,
yati‑ya ai‑ya mai nanahababa awini. Yowaho Batita Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita mai‑ka owa amane, mai dama mai ati na.” Mai ibi hiyara, mai ati nameteni.
Yeso‑ya mai hiyaramatasa,
“Yowaho Batita tamine oda wato awirini.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Dai ati yanara, owati yananahariraboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso mai‑ya kanawatobona mai‑ya hiyare,
“Ofa‑ya maki kame, yama yaki‑ya tokebona, wininama kanibote ni awirebona atibodi ati ne, mai one‑ya yose,
‘Oka awa bono dai nawadahi. Ofa hadiya, one dai kayafa, one okayaha onaboneni.’ Ofa hidi ati ne,
‘Hehe, sibarini.’ Mai ati namaroni.
Fa‑fai‑ya yama yaki‑ya hidi tokawahemarine.
Ofa hadiya, ofa hidi‑ka yo‑yose owa‑ya yose,
‘Owa tabaro one‑ya tikamahi. Ofa one‑ya tiwa‑ya mai daaniya, ofa tiwakamiyahi.’ Hidi ati nene.
Hika yo‑yose tokome, mai‑ya haane, ofa‑ya mai daara, hiniya mai bisihine, honita kamene.
Hika yo‑yose owa‑ya yosemakitase, ofa‑ya mai daarani. Hika yo‑yose‑ya mai wee, mai bisihine, honita kamatasene.
Makobote hika yo‑yose owa‑ya yosemakine, awa bono‑ya tonakebonaha. Kobone, mai bisihine, awa widi‑ya mai korohiwitine.
‘Hini yamata‑nima obati? Oka dao oyosebisaboneni. Oka dao onofi nafi. Oka dao ati‑ya mai nofabisaba awineni.’ Ofa hidi atibodi ati nene.
Ofa hidi bidi kobone‑ya mai awa, mai ibi hiyara,
‘Bidi ai nanahabaho. Ai nanahabeya, badi abamakiya, mai‑ka yama nafi ai kayafawahaboneni.’ Mai ati nani, mai ibi hiyararo.
Kamakiya, hika ofa‑ya mai na‑nawada‑maro mai‑ya nanahabeya, ai one‑ya awa‑ya hidi daanawahebonane, mai hinawadawahabonehe.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Ka! Haa‑nima yama riyahi.” Mai ati nameteni.
Yeso mai‑ya kakatome,
“Yama‑ya dai watora, Deoso‑ka yama hani ati dai mitahi.
‘Yobe‑ya mai wa‑wama awa mai werehiwite, yobe tati mese ewene tohawahemarine.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, mai na, mai yawa,
“Ofa‑ya mai na‑nawada mai tamine‑ya Yeso hiyare, fara oda tamine amani. Yeso ati kasirone.” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.
Yeso‑ya mai watabone mai ati na, mai dama mai‑ya mai nayofina, mai maanamameteni.
Yeso‑ya mai kakatoma,
“Ai‑ka yo‑yose Yeso‑ya mai hiyariya, ai‑ka yo‑yose mai‑ya Yeso watoreya, mai ati ihi Yeso ati tosawariba awane. Ati towe ai miteya, kofeno‑ya ai daanebonane.” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.
Mai‑ka mai‑ya mai yosemeteni, Yeso‑ya mai hiyarabonehe. Owa kobone, ati yanane,
“Ayo, keyehe‑ya hirititerani. Mai nafi tinofa, mai one tinofi bi‑bidi tini awirani. Deoso ati tikamine amose hinama tohe, fare ene tiwati oda mitaboneni.
Mai atibodi ati‑ya Yeso wato, ati yanane,
“Yara‑ka yinero ohari dai namoho. Ebeni‑ke korimari toha, oni tohanati?” Yeso ati nematane.
“Sesa korimari, Sesa oni ne, yinero bako‑ya waanane.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Sesa‑ka yama‑ya Sesa‑ya dai daatonama, Deoso‑ka yama‑ya Deoso‑ya dai daatonamahari, dai nahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai dama mai noki‑ya Yeso ati tosawariba awane mai ati namaro, Yeso ati‑ya mai mita,
“Ka! Yeso yama‑ya watone.” Mai atibodi ati na, mai ati fawanawahameteni.
Sadoseo mai one kamakitasameteni, Yeso ati‑ya mai mitabonehe.
“Ai aba ai kitamaterani.” Sadoseo mai ati teni.
Fara mai kobona, Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Ayo, tiwati oda mitaboneni. Hibati‑ya i‑di Mose yama hikanahanamete tamine timitahi,
‘Ayo abeya, fadi hasina, bidi, bide, mai na, mai wadara, anidi fadi‑ya famawahiyaho. Bidi wadeya, anidi oni‑ya bidi weyenayaho.’ Mose‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Ai owa‑ka soho mai 6 kana fane, kahiware, abemarine.
Fadi‑ya sohori famawahe, kahiwamakitasare, abamakitasemarine.
Fara hinama mai toha, mai fana, mai kahiwara, mai nafi abamaroni.
Mai nafi aba, mai‑ka yibote abamakemaroni.
Yeso, oda ati timitahi. Mai nafi‑ka yibote tohamaro, mai kitamiya, ebeni‑ke fadi tohawahibati?” Sadoseo mai ati nameteni.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,
“Bofe‑ka mai fanateni.
Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona‑ya mai sawiya, mai fanaterani.
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai‑nima mai nawahabone, mai abamateraboneni. Mai aba, mai kitama, mai abamateraboneni. Deoso bidi mai tohawahaboneni.
Ai aba, ai kitamaterabone dai ati na, Mose‑ka yama hani ati dai mitahi. Awa hirini‑ya i‑di Mose‑ya Deoso hiyare,
‘I‑di Abaraho, i‑di Isaki, i‑di Yako, mai na, mai‑ka Deoso ama·oni.’ Deoso ati nematamonane.
Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina Yeso ati‑ya mai mita,
“Ayo, tiwati amosineni.” Mai ati nameteni.
Yeso yama‑ya wato, Yeso‑ya mai nayofina, mai ati fawanawahameteni.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,
“‘Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika Dafi‑ka nodi amane.’ Mai ati teni.
Hibati‑ya Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika tamine‑ya i‑di Dafi kanahanomatamonane, Deoso‑ka wayoma hani‑ya.
‘Oka hidi webote‑ya Deoso hiyare,
—Owa mano kanika‑ya tiwitarihi.
Owati ihi tiwa‑ya mai ka‑kako mai‑ka hidi tihawahaboneni.—’ Yama hani ati neni.
Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika i‑di Dafi‑ka hidi webote tohemona i‑di Dafi ati nematamonane. Fare i‑di Dafi‑ka nodi tohe, i‑di Dafi‑ka hidi webote tohahari ne.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya hiyare, ati mai dama mai himite,

“Dai noko wadahi. Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina dai‑ya mai nokotoniteni, mai dai kahiyarabonehe. Fara yama ai ka‑kanika‑ke yobe‑ya mai naha, bora yaba‑ya mai sakona; Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya mai sawe, kadera amosa‑ya mai nahore; dai yorotokana, dai tafabone, mai sawe, kadera amosabisa‑ya mai nahore,
Yeso noko toke, yinero dame‑ya mai kiha, Deoso‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya mai daanameteni.
Makobote fana kamake, fana maki abemata, honita wahawama, yahi hone wadara, hika yinero bidi fame‑ya daanameteni. Ihi Yeso hiawa,
“Owati amosa dai mitahi. Fana honita wahawama yama nafi‑ya daaneni. Mai one‑ta yama nafi‑ya mai daani awirani.

Mai‑ka yinero dame, owa‑ya mai daana, mai‑ka yinero dame hasinane. Fana‑ta yahi honene wadara, hika yinero bidi fame‑ya daana, hika yinero owa hasini awire, tafe manakone‑bone‑ya daanibisineni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Deoso‑ka yobe yati amosa‑ya wamanihi, yama amosa one siitonihi na tamine‑ya mai one hiyara, Yeso ati yanane,
“Owati dai mitahi. Hibayata yama amosa‑ya dai awineni. Yama one‑ya yobe wadamarebona, yati fama demenarimaraboneni.” Ati ne,
“Ayo, eme ai amoni niya, yobe ababonati? Yama koboni yanatoniya, hini yamata oda awibati, yama‑ya oda watowahi‑bone‑karo?” Mai ati nameteni.
“Dai noko wadahi. Dai‑ya mai keyeheriyahi.
‘Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika ama·oni. Yama yana kanibote naboneni.’ Mai dama mai ati naboneni.
Mai ati dai tokadabariyahi.
Wami hidi mai ibi nofarabone, mai‑ka sodado mai ibi taonabone, mai tamine dai mitiya, dai habo siitoriyahi. Yama faina‑bone kobonabone, kobo kanibote raboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Makobote Yeso ati yananamatase,
“Wami one‑kaya mai wi‑wina mai‑ka sodado ahini‑kaya mai kamakeboneni, mai dami‑ya mai nanahababonehe. Ahini‑kaya mai wi‑wina mai‑ka sodado maa kowani‑kaya mai tokaboneni, mai‑ya mai nanahababonehe.
Wami wawawakani kita, mai dami fimi ihi mai aba, mai kiyana mai dama mai aba naboneni. Yama towe yanana ihi, ‘Ka!’ Mai ati naboneni. Neme‑ya yama yofina‑ya mai awawahaboneni.

Fara haa‑nima yamana yanani awisari‑ya dai‑ya mai wataboneni, dai‑ya mai bisinabonehe. Owati dai no‑nofa dai‑ya mai nafoyaboneni, kadeya‑ya. Owati dai no‑nofa Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe hidi‑ya dai‑ya mai towakama, mai‑ka hidi webote‑ya dai‑ya mai towakama, mai‑ka kofenado‑ya dai‑ya mai towakama na, dai‑ya mai kako nafeboneni.
Mai‑ka hidi dai ati‑ya mai mitabone owa tamine‑ya dai hiyaraboneni.
Dai ati mai mitabone dai‑ya mai haana, dai atibodi yama‑ya kadikariyahi.
Owa ene yama‑ya dai watowahaboneni. Dai ati yananiya, mai ati fawanaboneni.
Dai‑ya mai kahabanaboneni. Dai‑ka abi, dai‑ka ami, dai‑ka ayo, dai‑ka soho, dai‑ka naki, dai‑ka no‑nofa, mai na, dai‑ya mai kahabanaboneni. Mai‑ka hidi dai one‑ya mai nanahababoneni.
Owa dai nofa dai‑ya mai nafi kakaboneni.
Dai abi ohari awiraboneni.
Yerosare‑ya sodado mai kakidikosa mai dai awa, Yerosare aba kanibote naboneni.
Yodeya‑ya dai wi‑wina adami webote‑kaya dai kananiyahi. Yerosare‑ya dai wi‑wina dai kananaharihi. Sidadi yakari‑ya dai wi‑wina Yerosare‑ya dai tokariyahi.
Mai ihi manakone kobonaboneni, yama hani ati‑nima yama nawahabonehe.
Ka! Mai fanawi naba toha, mai‑ka madehe i‑isi na mai toha na, mai kananiya, yama ati kasiraboneni. Deoso yawe ene Yodeo mai‑ya sodado mai kakaboneni.

Mai dama mai‑ya sodado mai nanahaba, mai one‑ya mai watiya, Bara mai tabori dami‑kaya mai‑ya mai towakama naboneni. Yodeo mai tohara Yerosare‑ya mai kayafaboneni. Yodeo mai tohara mai amoni‑ya Deoso kadikatene, mai‑ka kofeno kiti fawanebonane.
Mahi, abariko, amowa, mai na, mai bara tohaboneni. Bofe‑ya mai wi‑wina mai habi siitonabone, maa rike webote‑ya mai awa, faha moni kita‑ya mai mita, mai na, mai habi siitonaboneni.
Neme‑kaya yama nafi wawawakanaboneni. Yama towe yananabone ihi mai dama habi siitona, mai habi siitona ihi mai abakosaboneni.
‘Yama nafi ababonehe.’ Mai atibodi ati naboneni.
Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke‑ya mai awabone, neme sabi‑ya kisameya, wehene nafibonane. Ene kitebonane.
Haa‑nima yama na dai awiya, dai ya‑yainahi. Deoso dai‑ya kasoma kanibote nebonane.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai‑ya kanawatobona mai‑ya hiyaramatase,
“Fiko ade dai awiyahi. Awa haa‑nima teni.
Fara owati‑nima yama niya, Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona koboni yanatonane.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. Owati‑nima yama yanana‑ya mai awiya, mai one hasinasa niya, dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke kobonebonane.
Owati‑nima yama naboneni. Neme, bofe na, ababisabone, owati‑ta abateraboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Dai noko wadahi. Dai siwariyahi. Kawi dai fawariyahi. Yinero dai nokotoniriyahi. Yama dama dai nokoniya, yama yanani kanibote na ihi yama we‑wee‑kaya dai saweboneni.
Bofe‑ya mai wi‑wina mai nafi‑ya bisi·onaboneni.
Dai noko wadahi. Deoso‑ya dai hiyarahi, yama we‑wee‑ya dai sawirabonehe. Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke‑ya dai sawibisaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yama tehe‑ya Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso mai‑ya kanawatonadi, yama soki‑ya Orifera adami‑kaya a‑amo nematane.
Yama wahabisari‑ya Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai dama mai kamarimanameteni, Yeso ati‑ya mai mitabonehe.
Ka‑kariwa koboni yanatona, fara‑ya baho femeto‑ya ketehera‑ya Yodeo mai kabateni.

Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, mai na, Yeso‑ya mai kako kofina, mai dama mai‑ya mai nayofina, mai dama mai noki beheri‑kaya Yeso‑ya mai nanahababone mai atibodi ati nameteni.
Yeso‑ka mai 12 kana mai‑ka owa i‑di Yoda Isikari·oti atibodi‑ya Satanasi sawiwahene.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ka sekorasa mai‑ka hidi mai toha na, mai‑ya Yoda toke, mai‑ya hiyarematane, Yeso‑ya kahabanebonaha.
Yoda ati‑ya mai mita, mai ya‑yaina,
“Hehe, tika yinero‑ba oda daanaboneni.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Sibarini, daa·onaboneni.” Yoda ati nematane.
Makobote Yoda toke,
“Mai damamari‑ya Yeso daa·onaboneni.” Yoda atibodi ati nematane.
Ka‑kariwa yananiya, kaneiro bidi‑ya Yodeo mai tabasiteni. Ka‑kariwa yanana,
i‑di Bedoro, i‑di Yowaho mai fama mai‑ya Yeso yose,
“Tabora‑ya dai towakiya, ai tefe‑ba dai hawa tohiyahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Ebeni‑kaya ai tefe‑ba oda hawa tohiboneti?” Mai ati nameteni.
“Tabora‑ya dai kobokaniya, maki owa faha‑ya diwakane‑ya dai awaboneni. Faha diwakane nowati‑ya dai towakamakiyahi.
Yobe‑ya dai kobokaniya, yobe hidi dai hiyariya,
‘Ebeni‑kaya oka mai da‑daba mai eyehe otafibati? Ai‑ya ka‑kanawato ati nene.’ Dai ati niyahi.
Hika yobe waari nemehe, neme‑ke kote honita tohe‑ya dai‑ya yofikanebonane. Yobe kote‑ya mesa kaware, fara‑ya ai tefe‑ba dai hawa tohiyahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai towaka, Yeso ati‑nima yama na‑ya mai awa, ka‑kariwa‑ka yamata‑bone‑ya mai aninameteni.
Mai ta‑tafa‑ka ora koboneya, Yeso hika yo‑yose mai eyehe mesa‑ya mai nahoriwahameteni.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,
“Owa‑ya mai nakamaki awisariya, dai eyehe ka‑kariwa‑ya otafa, yama amosineni.
Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona koboni awisareya, Ka‑kariwa one‑ya otafamateraboneni. Ka‑kariwa ai abamarabone tamine amani.” Yeso ati nematane.
Keneko‑ya fino‑ya Yeso damakane, Deoso‑ya hiyare, keneko‑ya mai‑ya daakanematane.
“Dai nafi hifihi.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Owati dai mitahi. Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona yanani awisareya, awa bono fahi ofimateraboneni. Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahe‑ya ofimatasaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Baho‑ya Yeso damane, Deoso‑ya hiyare, baho‑ya bakanakose, hika mai da‑daba mai‑ya baho‑ya daane, ati yanane,
“Dai kabahi, owa abano tamine‑bone amani. O·ababone, dai manakone onahababoneni. Ka‑kariwa‑ka baho‑ya dai kabiya, owa tamine dai kadikiyahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai tafi hawa toha, fino‑ya mai‑ya Yeso daakanamatasane.
“Owa emene tamine‑bone amani. Owa emene tokabone, o·ababone, dai ene manakone onahababoneni.
Owa‑ya dai‑ka owa daanebona, ai tafa ai‑ya dabane.
Hibati‑ya Deoso ati‑mata‑nima dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke abebonane. Owa‑ya kahabane‑ka yama manakone wadaboneni. Ka! Hini ene manakone nafibonane.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Ai owa Yeso‑ya daanebona, ebeni‑ke tohati?” Mai ibi hiyara, mai ati nameteni.
Mai‑ka owa ba‑basi ne tamine‑ya mai hiyara, mai ibi weenameteni.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,
“Bara mai‑ka hidi webote mai‑ya mai yoseteni.
‘Mai dama mai‑ya ka‑kasoma ama·oni.’ Mai ati na hiniya mai dama mai‑ya mai yosebisateni.
Mai‑nima dai riyahi. Mai‑ka hidi dai toha mai‑ya dai yoseriyahi. Mai‑ya dai kasomabisahi.
Dai‑ka hidi mai one‑ya dai kasomateni. Dai‑ka hidi ama·oni. Hiniya dai‑ya okasomabisani. Owa ene‑nima dai ene nahi.
Kabani‑ya owa amoni dama, owa‑ya mai weeni kofina, owa‑ya dai dabanasa na, owati‑ya dai nofasa nineni.
Okobi ati ene dai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote ohawahaboneni. Okobi ene‑nima owa ene nebona, owati ihi
hidi‑ka kadera amosa‑ya dai nahoreboneni. Isara·eo‑ka nodi mai ihi‑ya dai kadikiya, mai ihi‑nima mai ihi manakone na dai daanaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Bedoro‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Simaho, Simaho owati timitahi. Deoso‑ya dai tamine‑ya Satanasi hiyare, dai‑ya keyehebona ati nane. Satanasi‑ya Deoso ati barirene.
Deoso‑ya tiwa tamine ohiyarani, Deoso ati tinofasa tinabonehe. Owati tikadabamatasiya, mai one tikasomiyahi. Owati‑ya mai tokadabawahaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Ayo, ai‑ya mai watikimiya, ai‑ya mai barikaniya, ai‑ya mai nanahabiya, yama sibarini, tiwa‑ya ofamanasa onaboneni.” Bedoro ati nematane.
‘Yeso owatorini.’ Tinaboneni.
Tiwati yanani 3 kana boneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,
“Hibati‑ya dai oyosemaro, yinero dai mookanirihi, yamasi dai weyerihi, sanidariya owa dai weyekarihi, hawi‑ya dai‑ka yama one hasiramete awineni?” Yeso ati nematane.
“Hawi‑ya yama one hasiramaroni.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Hibayata, dai‑ka yinero tohe, dai‑ka yinero dai mookanihi. Dai‑ka yamasi dai weye nahi. Dai‑ka yima wadara, dai‑ka bora one dai daaniya, yima‑ya dai kanikiyahi.
Deoso ati‑mata‑nima yama naboneni.
‘—Towe mai‑ka owa amane.— Mai ati naboneni.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati na,
owa tamine amani. Ati‑nima yananaboneni.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Ayo, oda‑ka yima famani.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Hehe, sibarini.” Yeso ati nematane.
Orifera adami‑ya mai amoteni. Fara‑ya Yeso, hika mai da‑daba mai eyehe tokematane.
Mai kobona, Yeso ati yanane,
“Deoso‑ya dai hiyarahi, Satanasi ati‑ya dai tokadabarabonehe.” Ati nematane.
Ahiyata‑ya toke, yobati‑kaya itarise, Deoso‑ya hiyare,
“Abi, yama towe yananabone, yama kobonabone onofarini. Owati‑nima yama riyahi. Hini tiwati‑nima yama nibisiyahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose neme‑ke fodoki, Yeso‑ya nakitamematane.
Deoso‑ya Yeso hiyare, atibodi komene kitawahe, tanakori ama‑nima na wami‑ya sonameteni.
Deoso‑ya Yeso hiyari hawa tohe, kamatase, mai amonameteni. Mai atibodi yawa, mai‑ka nokobisa nafemeteni.
“Dai amoriyahi. Dai dodafihi. Deoso‑ya dai hiyarahi, Satanasi ati‑ya dai tokadabarabonehe.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso hiyareya, mai dama mai kamakemeteni. Yeso‑ka mai 12 kana mai‑ka owa i‑di Yoda dainimaki, Yeso‑ya kakimatane, Yeso‑ya tomanebonaha.
“Tika Ayo neme‑ke tikahabanabone, owa‑ya tomatineni?” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso‑ya mai watabone mai‑ya mai awa, mai ati yanana,
“Ayo, yima‑ya mai oda kaanaribaraniha?” Mai ati nameteni.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote‑ya na‑narifa sawi, Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai‑ka owa fai narabo kanika‑ya tarinabasematane.
“Mai dai arabanahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso kamaki, maki narabo‑ya boyone, narabo waanamatasematane.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ka sekorasa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai toha, mai na, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Yima‑ya dai aka, awa‑ya dai aka nineni, owa‑ya dai watabonehe. Yama‑ya mai bo‑boti mai wati‑nima owa‑ya dai watinineni. Yama bo‑boti ohi awirini.
Hibati‑ya mahi‑nima Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya osawe, owa‑ya dai wataramaroni. Hibayata Deoso dai‑ya ati barire, yama towe‑ka hidi‑ya Deoso ati baririhi nane.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso‑ya mai wata, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote tabaro‑ya Yeso‑ya mai towakamameteni. Yama yaki‑ya Bedoro yotomatane.
Yobe fowari barikane doro‑ya yifo‑ya mai afokana, yifo‑ya mai hiwana mai naha, mai‑ya Bedoro sawimakimatane.
Yobe hidi‑ya na‑narifa one waare, Bedoro‑ya awa, Bedoro‑ya kiina, ati yanana,
“Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai‑ka owa amane.” Ati nameteni.
“Yeso owatorini.” Bedoro ati nematane.
Makobote Bedoro‑ya mai‑ka owa awe,
“Maki‑ka amatiraniha?” Ati nematane.
“Maki‑ka ohi awirini.” Bedoro ati nematane.
Ora oharimaki‑ya Bedoro tamine‑ya maki owa hiyare,
“Yeso‑ya sa‑sawi amane. Karireya‑ya mai wi‑wina mai‑ka owa amane.” Ati nematane.
“Tiwati owatorini.” Bedoro ati nematane.
Bedoro hiyareya, arakawa haanawahematane.
Yeso kiinawame, Bedoro‑ya kakatome, Yeso ati‑ya Bedoro atibodi watinawame,
“Arakawa haani awisareya,
‘Yeso owatorini.’ Tinaboneni.
Tiwati yanani 3 kana boneni.” Yeso ati ne,
ati‑ya Bedoro atibodi watinawame,
toke, ohini kitawahematane.
Yeso‑ya sekorasa mai bisina, Yeso‑ya mai hahakanameteni.
Yeso noko‑ya mai barikana, noko mai batahiri.
“Yama nafi tiwata, ebeni‑ke tiwa‑ya koonisa?” Mai ati nameteni.
Yeso‑ya mai weeni damamakemeteni.

Yama wahabisari‑ya mai‑ka hidi mai dama mai yorotokana, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai sawi, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai sawi na, mai ati ihi Yeso‑ya mai kakamameteni. Makobote hidi owa ati yanane,
“Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika amatini, tiwati yananahi, oda mitabonehe.” Ati nematane.
“Owati yananiya, owati‑ya dai nofarabone,
dai haa·oniya, dai ati yanaraboneni.
Owati dai mitahi. Deoso mano kanika‑ya dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke itariwahebonane.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Deoso Bidi amatiraniha?” Mai ati na,
“Hehe, tiwati‑nima, fara ama·oni.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Ati ai miti hawa tohe, mai one ati ai mitamakiriyahi.” Mai ati nameteni.
Birato‑ya Yeso‑ya mai towakamameteni, mai nafi.
Yeso tamine‑ya keyehe‑ya mai hirina,
“Yeso ene ai one dama kofeno ati‑ya mai nofamarani.
‘Sesa‑ka yinero‑bona dai daariyahi.’ Yeso ati nihi,
‘Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika ama·oni. Hidi webote ama·oni.’ Yeso ati nihi tene.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Yodeo mai‑ka hidi webote amatiraniha?” Birato ati ne,
“Tiwati‑nima, fara ama·oni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, mai dama mai toha, mai na, mai‑ya Birato hiyare,
“Yeso ene towe tohi awirene.” Ati nematane,
Birato ati‑ya mai mita, mai ati fawara,
“Karireya‑ka mai‑ya hiyaremari, Yodeya‑ka mai‑ya hiyaramakine, ati ene kofeno ati‑ya mai nofamarani.” Mai ati nameteni.
Karireya tamine‑ya Birato mite, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Karireya Yeso tabaro tohe awane.” Birato ati ne,
“Hehe, Karireya‑ya tabaro tohane.” Mai ati nameteni.
Karireya‑ka mai‑ka hidi i‑di Erodi tohematane. Hibayata Yerosare‑ya i‑di Erodi sawi,
“I‑di Erodi‑ya dai towakamaho.” Birato ati nematane.
Yeso‑ya mai towakama, Yeso‑ya i‑di Erodi awe, ya‑yainane. Hibati‑ya Yeso tamine‑ya Erodi mite, atibodi yama‑ya kadike,
“Yeso oawiya, Yeso ene kitemona mai ati na, ene oaweba awane.” Atibodi ati nematane.
Yeso ati‑ya Erodi mitebona, hiyari dame, Yeso ati yanarematane.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, mai na, Yeso ene towemona tamine‑ya Erodi‑ya keyehe‑ya mai hirina, mai ati kitameteni.
I‑di Erodi, hika sodado mai eyehe Yeso‑ya hahakane, hidi webote‑ka bora‑ya Yeso‑ya weyenihematane. Birato‑ya mai hiwakamatasematane.
Hibati‑ya i‑di Birato i‑di Erodi mai ibi ka‑kako, hibayata mai ibi nofawahameteni.
Birato ati ene mai yorotokana, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai toha, hidi mai tohara mai toha, mai na, mai yorotokanameteni.
Birato mai‑ya hiyare,
“Yeso ati ene kofeno ati‑ya mai dami nofamaramone dai ati na, Yeso ati omite, dai ati‑nima ene re, ati sibarene.
Erodi Yeso weehire, hiniya hiyosematasane. Owati dai mitahi. Yeso ene towe wadare, abarayaho.
Owati ihi Yeso‑ya mai bisiniya, mai seekanebonane.” Birato ati nematane.
(Ka‑kariwa‑ya mai marini‑ya mai‑ka owa‑ya Birato seekaritene.)
Birato ati‑ya mai mita,
“Yeso abaho. Barabasi‑ta seetikanahi.” Mai ati nameteni.
Kofeno‑ka yo‑yose mai‑ya Barabasi bisine, maki‑ya nanahaba ne, hini ene mai hiwate, kadeya‑ya mai hinafoyawahematane.
Yeso‑ya Birato seekanebona, mai‑ya hiyaramatasematane.
Birato ati‑ya mai nofara,
“Awa‑ya baakanaho. Awa‑ya baakanaho.” Mai ati na, mai ati kitameteni.
“Hini yamata ihi baa·okabati? Yeso ati omite, Yeso ati sibarene. Yeso ene towe wadare, abarayaho. Owati ihi Yeso‑ya mai bisiniya, mai seekanebonane.” Birato ati nematane.
Mai ati kita,
“Abaho. Awa‑ya baatikanahi.” Mai ati na, mai ati damameteni.
Mai ati fawani watora, Birato atibodi kitamare,
mai ati‑nima sodado mai‑ya Birato yosenematane.

Barabasi kofeno‑ka yo‑yose mai‑ya bisine, maki‑ya nanahaba ne, hini ene mai hiwate, kadeya‑ya foyemari, Birato ati ene mai seehikanematane. Sodado mai‑ya Birato yosematane, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai ati‑nima yama nabonehe.
Yeso‑ya mai towakamameteni, Yeso‑ya mai baakanabonehe. Simaho Sireni‑ke kabani‑kaya kame, mai warahine, Yeso ewene‑bona‑ya diwanematane. Yeso dai tohe, nowati‑ya Simaho Sireni‑ke yotomatane.
Yeso nowati‑ya mai dama mai tokomake, Yeso tabiyo mai fanawi ohina, hini mai‑ya mai batanameteni.
Mai fanawi‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Yerosare‑ya dai wi‑wina owa tabiyo dai ohiriyahi. Dai abano toha, dai‑ka madehe toha na, tabiyo dai ohinibisahi.
Yama towe kobonabone, yama koboniya, dai ati yananabone,
‘Ai‑ka ewe awire‑mana, yama sibara neni. Madehe mai kihara mai sibabisarineni.’ Dai ati naboneni.
Adami webote‑ya mai hiyarabone,
‘Oda‑ya tisohi, oda‑ya baritikanaba.’ Mai ati naboneni.
Mai ihi towe mai fama mai‑ya mai towakamakemeteni, Yeso eyehe mai ababonehe.

Ai tati tone wai‑ka adami‑ya mai kobona, Yeso‑ya mai baakanameteni. Mai ihi towe mai fama Yeso‑ya mai dabameteni. Yeso mano kanika‑ya owa mai baahikana, Yeso mano sayo‑kaya owa mai baahikana hinematane.
“Abi Deoso, yama‑ya mai watorini. Mai‑ya weetiriyahi. Mai‑ya tiwati somahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso borone‑ya sodado mai‑ka owa kayafebona, yati bide‑ya mai werenameteni.
Mai nahokosa Yeso baakane‑ya mai kakatomameteni. Yeso‑ya mai‑ka hidi mai weena,
“Mai one‑ya kasomemari, Kirisito‑mona, Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika‑mona, hini‑ya kasome ai awahi.” Mai ati nameteni.
Yeso‑ya sodado mai weenahare, fino kofate‑ya mai daanameteni, Yeso hifebonehe.
“Yodeo mai‑ka hidi webote tiwa‑mone, tiwa tikasomahi.” Mai ati nameteni.
Yeso tati neme‑kaya yama hani kawana,
“Yodeo mai‑ka hidi webote amane.” Yama hani ati nameteni.
Maki mai baahikane, Yeso‑ya weene,
“Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika tiwa‑mone, ai tikasomahi. Ai kisamaboneni.” Ati nematane.
Mai baahikane owa ati yanane,
“Deoso tinayofina awini? Tiwati arabanahi. Yeso‑ya mai nanahababone‑nima ai‑ya mai nanahabahareboneni.
Ai ene amosara, ai ene manakone ai kayafineni. Yeso ene amose hinama amane.
Yeso, oda nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tihawahiya, owa‑ya tiwatibodi kadikiyahi.” Maki owa ati nematane.
“Owati timitahi. Hibayata tabora amosabote‑ya okomabone, owa‑ya tisawebani.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mahi nokorise‑ya mahi wehene fawane, 3 ora‑ya wehene yananamatasematane.
Deoso‑ka yobe‑ka bora baye winamaro, fara kebemeteni.
Yeso haane,
“Abi, owa korimari tikayahi.” Ati nematane.
Ati hawa tohe, abawahematane.
Mahi wehene fawane‑ya sodado mai‑ka hidi awe, Yeso ati‑ya mite,
“Deoso ene amane.” Atibodi ati ne,
“Yeso ene amosabisane.” Ati nematane.
Yeso‑ya sodado baakane‑ya mai dama mai awamaro, mahi wehene fawane‑ya mai awa, mai ati‑ya mai mita na, mai atibodi a‑arira, mai tokomameteni.
Ahiyata to‑toha ni‑ya Yeso‑ka mai dama mai naha, mai‑ya mai kakatomameteni. Mai fanawi sawe, fara hibati‑ya Karireya‑ya Yeso‑ya mai dabamaro, Yeso tokeya, mai tokomakemeteni.
Yose Yodeo mai‑ka hidi bidi owa tohe, ene amose, Deoso ati‑ya nofematane.

Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona‑ya nimanematane. Hidi mai one Yeso‑ya mai weena, mai ati‑nima Yose ati ni awirematane. Yodeya‑ya tabora one toha, oni Arimateya toha, fara‑ya Yose wiinematane.
I‑di Birato‑ya Yose toke, Yeso abo‑ya haanematane, hikamebonaha.
Yeso abo‑ya i‑di Yose idibase, bora wefe wamani‑ya hikatafematane. Ai temene‑ka yati hodi‑bone mai wamahinamete, fara ai abo nafoyateri‑ka hodi‑ya Yeso abo‑ya nafoyematane.
Deoso‑ka feriado kobonabone, yama‑ya mai a‑animara‑ka koboni yanatonameteni.
Hibati‑ya Karireya‑ya Yeso‑ya mai fanawi dabamaro, Yeso tokeya, mai tokomakemaro, fara mai fanawi Yeso abo‑ya Yose towakame‑ya mai tokomake, yati hodi‑ya Yeso foye‑ya mai awameteni.
Makobote tabora‑ya mai fanawi tokomameteni, yama mahi amosa‑ya mai wamanabonehe. Mose‑ka yama hani ati ihi feriado‑ya yama‑ya mai anini awirameteni.
Domiko yama wahabisari‑ya yati hodi‑ya mai fanawi tokomatasa, yama mahi amosa‑ya mai damakanameteni.
Mai koboniya, yati webote hibati‑ya karotowiti hawa toha,
mai tokiyoma, Yeso abo‑ya mai awarameteni.
Mai atibodi yama‑ya kadikiya, mai yowi‑ya maki mai fama fodoke, mai demena, mai‑ka bora wahi kitameteni.
Mai habi siitoni kita, mai yobati‑kaya mai nahorisa, mai moikanisameteni.
“Hini yamata ihi abo dai siba? Ai owa hasine abo ai sibaterani.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Haa‑ya Yeso awimare, kitamene. Karireya‑ya sawiya, ati dai mitemari, ati dai atibodi watinawamahi.
‘Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke‑ya mai watabone, Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadabara mai‑ya owa‑ya mai daanabone, awa‑ya owa‑ya mai baakanabone, dai amoni 3 tohi‑ya okitamaboneni.’ Yeso ati nemarine.” Mai ati nameteni.
Yeso ati‑ya mai watowamameteni.
Mai winitonama, Yeso‑ka mai 11 kana mai toha, Yeso‑ya mai sa‑sawi mai one toha, mai na, mai‑ya Yeso tamine‑ya mai kaminamameteni.
I‑di Mariya Madarena ati toha, i‑di Yo·ana ati toha, Tiyako madi i‑di Mariya ati toha, mai fanawi one mai‑ya mai daba mai ati toha nameteni.
“Mai fanawi ati tosawarineni.” Mai atibodi ati na,
mai ati‑ya mai nofarameteni.
Bedoro waamise, yati hodi‑ya kanani tokome, moinise, hodi‑ya kiine, bora wefe wamani honita fore‑ya awe,
“Ka! Hini yamata ihi tohiti, Yeso awireri?” Bedoro atibodi ati ne, hini hika yobe‑ya tokomematane.
Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai fama Emaosi‑ya mai towakamameteni. Yerosare toki‑ya ora fame‑ya Emaosi tohameteni.
Mai yakakana, Yeso kitamemona tamine‑ya mai ibi hiyara,
mai ibi hiyariya, Yeso mai‑ya kobone, mai‑ya sawimatane.
Deoso ene Yeso‑ya mai watora, bare tohe awane mai atibodi ati nameteni.
“Hini yamata tamine dai hiyara, dai yakakanaro?” Yeso ati nematane.
Mai maakanama, mai noki yawameteni.
“Tiwa ohari‑ta yama tamine tiwatora awini? Yerosare‑ya ai sawe yama tamine‑ya ai nafi mitani.” Kirobasi ati ne,
“Hini yamata tamine tohiti?” Yeso ati nematane.
“Yeso Nasare‑ke tamine amane. Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita amane. Ene kite, ati Deoso himite, ati oda nafi hinofemarine.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, ai‑ka hidi mai toha, mai na, Yeso‑ya mai daana, mai baahikanebonaha. Awa‑ya mai baahikane, abe, fare tamine‑ya oda hiyarineni.
Yeso ene oda‑ka hidi yara mai tohamarabone oda ati nani. Oda amoni 3 kani neni, Yeso‑ya mai baanikaro.
Mai fanawi ati oda mita, oda atibodi yama‑ya kadikani. Yama wahabisari‑ya yati hodi‑ya mai toka,
abo mai hiawarenone. Mai kama,
‘Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai oda awani. —Yeso kitamene.— Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai ati nani.’ Mai fanawi ati nani.
Yati hodi‑ya oda‑ka mai one toka, mai fanawi ati‑nima yama na‑ya mai awani. Abo mai hiawaremonane.” Kirobasi mai ati nameteni.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,
“Yama‑ya dai watora, Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai ati kote‑ya dai nofa kanibote terani.
Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑nima Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika abe, kitame, amosabote tohawahane.” Yeso ati nematane.
Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya Yeso mai‑ya kanawato, Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai‑ya kanawatomaki, Deoso‑ka yama hani nafi‑ya hini tamine‑ya kanawato nematane.
Emaosi‑ya mai kobona, Yeso fiyatonamebona,
“Mahi toke, amotimatahi.” Mai ati nameteni.
Yeso‑ya mai ati barina, mai eyehe tokiyomematane.
Mai tafabone, mesa‑ya mai nahorisa, baho‑ya Yeso damakane, Deoso‑ya hiyare, baho‑ya ebekane, mai‑ya baho‑ya daanematane.
Deoso ati ene Yeso‑ya mai watowaha, makobote Yeso fawanematane.
Mai ibi hiyara,
“Hawi‑ya oda‑ya hiyare, ati ene oda atibodi ya‑yainani. Yama hani ati‑ya oda‑ya kanawato, oda atibodi ya‑yainani.” Mai ati nameteni.
Mai yoronimisama, Yerosare‑ya mai towakamatasa, Yeso‑ka mai 11 kana mai yorotokana, mai‑ya mai kobotokanama, mai one sawemeteni.
“Ai‑ka hidi i‑di Yeso kitame, i‑di Simaho‑ya kobonene.” Mai yorotokana mai ati nameteni.
Emaosi‑ya mai towaka, hawi‑ya Yeso mai‑ya hiyare tamine mai hikamina,
“Baho‑ya Yeso kebiya, Yeso oda watowamani.” Mai ati nameteni.
Mai ibi hiyariya, mai teberi‑ya Yeso fodoki,
“‘Deoso dai‑ya kasomayaho.’ Oneni.” Ati nemarine.
Mai sotatona,
“Ai korimari amani.” Mai atibodi ati na,
mai habi siitona,
“Hini yamata ihi dai habo siitona? Hini yamata ihi dai atibodi yama‑ya dika?

Fara ama·oni. Owa yehe, owa teme na, dai awahi. Owa yehe dai boyonahi. Ai korimari eme wadarihi, tone wadarihi teni. Owa‑ta owa eme toha, owa tone toha nibisineni. Fara owa abano amani.” Yeso ati nematane.
Hiyari hawa tohe, yehe‑ya yofikana, teme‑ya yofikana nematane.
Mai ya‑yaini nafe ihi mai ati yanara, Yeso‑ta ati yananamatase,
“Dai tefe tohini?” Yeso ati nematane.
Aba tabasine kote‑ya mai daanameteni.
Mai noki‑ya aba‑ya Yeso kabematane.
“Hibati‑ya dai‑ya osawe, dai‑ya ohiyara,
‘Owa tamine‑ya Mose kanahano, owa tamine‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai kanahano, Deoso‑ka wayoma hani‑ya owa tamine‑ya mai one kanahano nameteni. Mai ati‑nima yama naboneni.’ Onamaroni.
Fara yama hani mai hikanahanamete ati‑nima yama nineni.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso ati ene Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai watowahameteni.
“Yama hani ati dai mitahi.
‘Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika‑ya mai nanahababone, dai amoni 3 kani‑ya kitamebonane.

Mai ihi towe‑maro‑ya mai nofamariya, mai ihi manakone wadamaraboneni. Fare Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika ene amane. Fare tamine‑ya mai kaminaboneni, Yerosare‑ya. Makobote mai tabori dami‑ya tamine mai hikaminamakibonane.’ Yama hani ati nineni.
Yama‑ya dai awamaro tamine dai kaminahi.
Betaniya tohi‑kaya mai eyehe tokome, Yeso yehe daatokamise, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Deoso dai‑ya kasomebonane.” Ati nematane.
Mai‑ya hiyareya, neme‑ya tokomematane.
Yeso‑ya mai kahiyara, Yerosare‑ya mai tokomatasameteni, mai ya‑yainaro.
Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Deoso‑ya mai kahiyaranademeteni. Feye amani.
Yama awisariya, Deoso‑ya famematamonane.
Deoso‑ya Yo‑yofikana yama nafi‑ya wamane, yama‑ya mai one wamarametemoneni.
Deoso‑ya Yo‑yofikana ene ai hasina, ene ai one abaraboneni. Deoso‑ya Yo‑yofikana yama wahi‑nima ne ai‑ya yofikanemarine.
Ai watoremari yama wahi‑nima ne ai‑ya yofikane, yama soki‑ka mai toha mai ati maahikanebona mai ati na, mai kitara, mai maahikaremarine.
Ai‑ka owa kobonemarine, Deoso hiyoseri. Oni Yowaho Batita tohemarine.
Yama wahi‑nima ne tamine‑ya Yowaho Batita kaminemarine, yama wahi‑nima ne ene Deoso ati‑ya ai nofawahabonehe.
Yama wahi‑nima ne tamine‑ya Yowaho Batita kamine, hini tamine tohi awirane.
Yama nafi‑ya wamanemata, bofe‑ya sawiwahe, bofe‑ka mai hiwatoremarine.
Hini hika mai‑ya kobone, mai hinofaremarine.
Abano oda nofa, ati oda nofa ne, ati ene Deoso bidi oda tohawahamaroni.
Deoso bidi ai tohabone, fana dori‑ya ai wadamatasi awiramaroni. Ai owa ene tohi awire, Deoso hini ene bidi ai tohawahamaroni.
Deoso‑ya Yo‑yofikana ai owa tohawahane, bofe‑ya ai‑ya sawiwahemarine. Deoso Bidi yokana amane. Hini wehene oda awemarine. Ai nafi‑ya nofe, keyehe‑ya hiriremarine.
Yeso tamine‑ya Yowaho Batita kamine,
“‘Ai owa kitabise kamakibona, owa‑ba awisariya, hibati‑ya tohematamonane.’ Ona, fare dai awaho.” Yowaho Batita ati nemarine.
Yeso ai nafi‑ya nofe, ai‑ya kasomanadimarine.
Ai ene towe manakone‑bone tamine‑ya Mose kanahanomatamonane. Yeso Kirisito ene amose, ai ene towe manakone‑ya nanahabe, Yeso Kirisito ene Deoso ai watowahamaroni.
Deoso ai aware tamine‑ya Bidi kaminemarine. Bidi yokana Badi‑ya famene.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai one toha, Refi‑ka mai one toha, mai na, oda‑ka hidi mai mai hiyose, Yerosare‑ya mai yanana, mai toka, mai kobonamaroni, Yowaho Batita ati‑ya mai mitabonehe.
“Ebeni‑ke amatiniti?” Mai ati na,
Mai ati‑ya mite, keyehe‑ya hirire,
“Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika ohi awirini.” Ati nemarine.
“I‑di Eriya tihibaya?” Mai ati na,
“I‑di Eriya ohi awirini.” Ati nemarine.
“Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita kakibona Deoso ati nemata, fare tihibaya?” Mai ati na,
“Fara ohi awirini.” Ati nemarine.
“Ebeni‑ke amatiniti? Hini yamata‑nima oda ati ni bati, oda‑ya mai yose tiwa tamine‑ya mai mitabonehe?” Mai ati namaroni.
“Isa·iya Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita‑mata owa tamine‑bone‑ya kanahanomatamonane.
‘Bofe‑ka mai‑ka owa kabani‑kaya ati yananeya,
—Ai‑ka Hidi webote hawine‑bona dai namosahi.— Ati nebonane.’ Fara owa tamine amani.” I‑di Yowaho Batita ati nemarine.
Fariseo mai‑ya mai yose Yowaho‑ya mai hiyara,
“Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika tiharihi, Eriya tiharihi, Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita kakibona Deoso ati nemata, fare tiharihi tinamone tina, hini yamata ihi mai‑ya habatinirisiti?” Mai ati namaroni.
“Faha‑ya mai‑ya haba·onirisani. Dai‑ya ai owa sawi, dai watorene.
Kamakibona amosabote amane. Haa owa‑ta towebisa ama·oni.” Yowaho Batita ati nemarine.
Betaniya‑ya Yowaho Batita mai‑ya hiyare, Yodaho Faha kowani‑kaya mai‑ya habanirisemarine.
“Kamaki dai awaho. Deoso‑ka Kaneiro Bidi amane. Deoso hiyose, bofe‑ya ai wi‑wina ai manakone‑ya nanahabebonane.
‘Ai owa kitabise kamakibona, owa‑ba awisariya, hibati‑ya tohematamonane.’ Ona, fare dai awaho, kamakine.
Isara·eo‑ka dai toha faha‑ya dai‑ya haba·onirisamaroni, dai atibodi hawa tohabonehe. Hibati‑ya awi owatoremarine.
Makobote Deoso‑ka Doni kise, wayomata awi‑nima Deoso‑ka Doni awine, Yeso‑ya sawiwahemarine.
Hibati‑ya owa‑ya yose‑mari owa‑ya hiyare,
‘Deoso‑ka Doni kiseya, maki‑ya sawiya, tiaweya, tiwatowahebonane. Fare ati ene Deoso‑ka Doni mai‑ya sawibonane.’ Deoso ati ne, ati ene Yeso owatowahani.
Fare oawe, Deoso Bidi amane. Deoso Bidi tamine‑ya dai‑ya okaminineni.” Yowaho Batita ati nemarine.
Mahi owa‑ya hika mai da‑daba mai fama, mai eyehe waiya,
Yeso yakane‑ya mai awa,
“Deoso‑ka Kaneiro Bidi amane.” Yowaho Batita ati nemarine.
Yowaho ati‑ya mai mita, Yeso nowati‑ya mai towakamakemaroni.
Yeso kiinawame, mai‑ya awemarine.
“Hini yamata‑ya dai ati koboniti?” Yeso ati ne,
“Ayo, ai‑ya ka‑kanawato amatini, ebeni‑kaya tisawiti?” Mai ati namaroni.
“Hima, dai awabani.” Ati nemarine.
Yeso eyehe mai tokoma, 4 ora‑ya Yeso sawi‑kaya mai kobona, mai amoni oharemaroni.
Yowaho Batita ati‑ya mai mita, Yeso‑ya mai towakamake owa oni i‑di Anidere tohemarine. Fare Simaho Bedoro sohori amane.
Makobote i‑di Anidere anidi‑ya toke,
“Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika oda awani.” I‑di Anidere ati nemarine.
(Kereko mai ati‑ya Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika i‑di Kirisito amane.)
Yeso‑ya anidi‑ya towakame, mai kobokana, Simaho‑ya Yeso kakatome, ati yanane,
“Yoaho bidi, i‑di Simaho amatini. Tiwa oni one Sefasi tohaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
(Sefasi Kereko mai ati‑ya i‑di Bedoro amane.)
Mahi owa‑ya Karireya‑ya Yeso tokebona, Firibi‑ya himane,
“Firibi, owa‑ya tisawihi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
I‑di Anidere, i‑di Bedoro, i‑di Firibi mai na Besaida‑ya mai tabori tohamaroni.
I‑di Natanaeo‑ya Firibi toke, fai‑ya hiyare,

“Natanaeo, owati timitahi. Mose‑ka yama hani ati toha, Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑ka yama hani ati toha na, ai owa kobonebona yama hani ati na, fare Yeso Nasare‑ke amane. I‑di Yose bidi amane. Yeso oda kobonawahene.” Firibi ati nemarine.
“Nasare‑ya ai owa ati amosa wadaterene.” Natanaeo ati ne,
“Tiawaboneni. Hima.” Firibi ati nemarine.
Mai towakama, Yeso‑ya mai kobokana, Natanaeo‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Isara·eo‑ka nodi yokana amatini. Tiwa ene amosa hinama tohani.” Yeso ati ne,
“Owa tiawatera, owa‑ya tiwatoneni?” Natanaeo ati ne,
“I‑di Firibi tiwa‑ya himanebona, fiko waa bofe‑ya tiwitare, tiwa oawani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ayo, Deoso Bidi amatini. Isara·eo‑ka nodi oda toha, oda‑ka hidi webote yokana amatini.” Natanaeo ati nemarine.
“‘Fiko waa bofe‑ya tiwitare, tiwa oawani.’ Ona,
owati tinofineni. Owa ene kitabote yokana tiawamakeboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Owati amosabote dai mitahi. Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke ama·oni. Neme seekaniya, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose owa‑ya mai kisiya, mai tokomatasa, mai dai awaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Oda amoni famamakiya, Kana Karireya‑ya oda‑ka owa fanebona, fare marine‑ya Yeso madi sawe,
Marina hidi oda‑ya himane, Yeso eyehe oda sawemaroni.
Fino tosiyoya, Yeso‑ya madi hiyara,
“Mai‑ka fino tosiyoni.” Ati na,
“Ami, hini yamata‑ba owa‑ya haatiniti? Owa ene kitabote mai awa kanibote raboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Fanebona‑ka yo‑yose mai‑ya Mariya hiyara,
“Yeso ati‑ya dai tokadabahi.” Ati na,
Faha wiye webote 6 kana wademaroni. Wiye yati wamani toha, wiye one 80 ritoro toha, wiye one 120 ritoro toha na, fara ai yehe so‑sorokari‑ka faha wiye amani.
“Faha dai kabiniya, yama wiye nafi dai nakibahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Faha‑ya mai kabina, yama wiye‑ya mai nakibi amosamaroni.
“Yama wiye bide‑ya dai kabikaniya, dai towakamahi, fino‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi‑ya.” Yeso ati ne,
Ati‑nima mai namaroni.
Faha fino tohawaha‑ya mai daana, fino‑ya hidi to‑tomine,
“Se! Fino fawi amosini.” Atibodi ati nemarine.
Fanebona‑ya hidi haanemarine. (Yeso ene‑ya hidi watore, faha‑ya mai kabina yama‑ya mai watobisamaroni.)
Fanebona‑ya hidi hiyare,
“Fino fawi amosa ai daani baha, mai towe tohi bide tohiya, fino fawi to‑tobaramana ai daanamakitasateni. Ai owa ene‑nima tiwa ene ra, fino fawi amosa‑ya tinayotoneni.” Ati nemarine.
Kana Karireya‑ya Yeso ene kitabote daidi oda awa, Yeso amosabote oda watowaha, ati oda nofemarine.
Marina hawa tohiya, Yeso, Yeso madi, Yeso sohori mai toha, Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda toha, oda na, kafanaho‑ya oda tokawaha, Kafanaho‑ya oda amoni fa‑famaraba namaroni.
Yodeo oda toha oda yorotokanaboneni, Ka‑kariwa‑ya oda marinabonehe. Fara ihi Yerosare‑ya Yeso oda eyehe tokomakimarine.
Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso toke, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya bowi mai‑ya mai daa, kaneiro mai‑ya mai daa, wayomata mai‑ya mai daa, yinero bare‑ya mai daa, mai na, mai‑ya Yeso awemarine.

Mado‑ya ko‑kosi‑ya wamane, yama‑ya mai da‑daa mai nafi‑ya kananihimarine, bowi mai toha, kaneiro mai toha, mai naro. Yinero‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka yinero‑ya nanahaba, mai‑ka mesa‑ya fatatokawiti nemarine.
Wayomata mai‑ya mai da‑daa, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Wayomata mai dai towakamahi. Okobi‑ka yobe‑ya yama‑ya dai daanamariyahi.” Ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba Deoso‑ka yama hani ati oda watowama,
“Deoso‑ka yobe onofi nafi, yobe noko·oni nafeboneni.” Deoso‑ka yama hani ati neni. Fare Yeso tamine amane.
Yeso ene‑ya mai awa, mai one yawa,
“Hini yamata‑bone mai‑ya kanatinihi? Deoso ene‑mona tina, Deoso ene kitabote oda awahi.” Oda‑ka hidi mai ati namaroni.
“Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya dai nanahabiya, mahi 3 tohe‑ya yobe wama·onamatasaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Tiwa ohare yobe haa‑nima ne wamatiwameya, mahi 3 tohe‑ya hawa tinimakarabana? Faha fowe 46 kani‑ya Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai wamanamaroni.” Oda‑ka hidi mai one ati namaroni.
Hini abano tamine‑bona‑ya hiyaremarine.
Yeso abe, kitame, oda awe, ati oda watowame, ati oda nofawahe, Deoso‑ka yama hani ati oda nofawahamaroni.
Mai atibodi ati‑ya Yeso wato, mai ati‑ya nofaremarine.
Ai nafi atibodi ati‑ya wato, ai atibodi ati ai kaminara‑ya wato nemarine.
I‑di Nikodimo fariseo tohe, oda‑ka hidi tohemarine.
Yama soki‑ya Yeso‑ya toke, Yeso‑ya hiyare,
“Ayo, Deoso tiwa‑ya yose‑mata ati tikamine, tiwa ene kitabote tohani. Deoso‑ka tihara‑mani, haa‑nima tiwa ene ra neni.” Nikodimo ati nemarine.
“Owati amosabote timitahi. Mai wadamatasara Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona‑ya mai sawiraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Bote ai toha ai‑ka ami dori‑ya ai foyamarani. Hini yamata‑nima ai nibati, ai wadamatasabonehe?” Nikodimo ati nemarine.

“Owati amosabote timitahi. Ai‑ka ami‑ya ai wadi dai tohi bahiya, Deoso‑ka Doni ene ai wadamatasiya, Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi kitabote tohawahebona‑ya ai sawiwahaboneni. Ai wadi fami awiriya, ai sawiraboneni.
Ai‑ka ami dori‑ya ai yana, ai‑ka ami bidi ai tohani. Deoso‑ka Doni ene ai wadamatasiya, Deoso bidi ai tohawaha, ai atibodi tamine amani.
Hini yamata ihi tiwatibodi yama‑ya kadika?
‘Tiwadamatasahi.’ Ona,

fara ai wadamatasa ai awaterani. Yama hakikikani kake, moni ai mita, aboni ai awarihi, yama hakikikani tabori ai awarihi teni. Fara‑nima Deoso‑ka Doni ene Deoso bidi ai tohawaha, Deoso‑ka Doni ai aware, ene‑ta ai awabisane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Hini yamata‑nima tiwati niti? Tiwati owato awirini.” Nikodimo ati nemarine.
Yeso ati yananamatase,
“Isara·eo‑ka nodi mai‑ya tikanawatote, owati‑ya tiwatora awineni?
Owati amosabote timitahi. Yama oda watobisa tamine oda hiyara, yama oda awamaro tamine oda kamina, oda ati dai nofarani.
Bofe‑ka yama tamine okamina, owati dai nofara, neme‑ka yama tamine okaminamakiya, owati dai nofatasaraboneni.
Deoso tabaro dai awara, dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke ama·oni. Deoso tabaro‑ya owinamaroni.
Hibati‑ya ai‑ka idi kabani‑ya mai wina, maka‑nima yama na‑ya i‑di Mose wamane, awa‑ya hinawaanametemoneni. Fara‑nima, awa‑ya owa‑ya mai nawaanaboneni,
Bofe‑ka dai nafi‑ya Deoso nofi nafi, Bidi yokana ohari‑ya yose, Bidi ati dai no‑nofa yama kome fawaterabone‑kaya dai sawirabone, dai abaterabone‑kaya dai sawibisaboneni.
Dai ene towe manakone Deoso dai‑ya haani nofaremarine, Bidi‑ya yose, dai ene manakone‑ya nanahababisebonaha.
Bidi ati mai hinofeya, mai ihi towe manakone wadamarani. Deoso Bidi ati‑ya mai nofara mai ihi manakone hasinasa neni. Deoso Bidi yokana oharine.
Yama wahi‑nima ne bofe‑ya kobone, bofe‑ya mai wi‑wina yama towe‑ya mai nokotonihe, yama wahi‑nima ne‑ya mai nofarani. Hini mai ihi mai manakone hasinasa neni.
Yama wahi‑nima ne‑ya mai nofara, yama soki‑ya mai nofabisa, hini mai ihi towe watowami‑ya mai nofarani.
Yama one‑ya Yeso oda da‑daba oda eyehe toke, Yodeya‑ya oda toka, Yeso oda‑ya hiyare, mai one oda habanirisamaroni.
Sarini yakari‑ya Enomi toha, fara‑ya faha ba‑basi na‑ya Yowaho Batita sawi, mahi‑nima mai one kamakina, mai‑ya Yowaho habanirisematane.
Kadeya‑ya Yowaho waanasa re‑ya
Yowaho Batita‑ya mai da‑daba mai‑ya maki hiyare, faha‑ya ai yehe sorona tamine‑ya mai ibi weenameteni.
Yowaho‑ya mai da‑daba Yowaho‑ya mai hiyara,
“Ayo, Yodaho Faha kowani‑kaya tiwa‑ya kobone, tamine tikamine, mai dama mai‑ya habanirisemonane. Fare‑ya mai dama mai tokomake, ai‑ka mai damamarani.” Mai ati nameteni.
Yowaho mai‑ya hiyare,
“Deoso ene Yeso‑ya mai tokomakineni.
Hibati‑ya dai ohiyara,
‘Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika ohi awirini.’ Onaroni.
‘Hawine‑bona hawa·onihibona’ Onaroni.
Owati dai mitaroni.
Ai‑ka no‑nofa fanebona, ya‑yaine, fadi‑bone‑ya famebonaha. Fane‑bona kobone ene ai ya‑yainahariteni. Yeso‑ka no‑nofa ama·oni. Yeso‑ya mai toka, oyawara, ya‑yai·oneni.
Yeso‑ya mai sa‑sawi mai dodamawahabone, owa‑ya mai sa‑sawi mai fa‑famaraba nibisaboneni. Yama sibarini. Ya‑yai·oneni.
Neme‑ke yama nafi‑ya watone. Bofe‑ya ai wi‑wina bofe‑ka yama bide ai wato, Neme‑ke yama nafi‑ya wato, neme‑ka yama‑ya wato, bofe‑ka yama‑ya wato nane.
Yama himitamaro‑ya kamina, yama hiawamaro tamine‑ya kaminane, ati‑ya mai dama mai nofarani.
Neme‑ke ati mai one hinofe,
‘Deoso ati amose, keyehe‑ya hirirene.’ Mai ati neni.
Deoso hiyose, Deoso ati‑ya kaminatene. Deoso ati ene Bidi‑ya hika Doni sawi oharine.
Deoso Bidi‑ya nofi nafi, yama nafi‑ya Bidi‑ya daanane.
Mai dama Yeso‑ya mai daba, Yeso ati ene mai oda habanirisamaroni. Mai fa‑famaraba nibisa mai‑ya i‑di Yowaho Batita habanirise, mai tamine‑ya fariseo mai mitameteni.
Yeso mai‑ya habanirisi awire, Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba mai‑ya oda habanirisabisamaroni.
Fariseo mai ati tamine‑ya Yeso mite, Karireya‑ya oda tokomamaroni.
Oda toka, Yeso ati ene Samaritano mai‑ka hawi‑ya oda tokawahamaroni.
Samaritano mai tabori one oni Sika‑ya oda kobonamaroni. Fara hibati‑ya Yose‑ya i‑di Yako wami‑ya daanematamonane.
Yako faha hodi wiihinamete wai‑ya oda maatowitemaroni, mahi nokorise‑ya. Faha hodi yowi‑ya Yeso itarimarine, maa toheri.
Oda‑ka yamata‑bone oda kanikabone oda tokamaroni, mai tabori‑ya. Oda nowati‑ya Samaritano kakemeteni, faha‑ya kabikanabonehe.
“Oka faha‑ba daatinahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Yodeo amatini. Samaritano ama·oni. Hini yamata‑bone faha‑ya haatina?
‘Samaritano towe mai amani.’ Yodeo mai ati teni.” Fana ati nameteni.
(Samaritano mai‑ya Yodeo mai haaterani.)
“Owa tiwato awirini. Deoso owa‑ya yosemarine. Owa tiwata‑mani, tika faha‑ba haatina neni. Faha haatiniya, faha daa·ona neni. Oka faha‑ya mai fa‑fawa mai baki hokomarani.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Tika yama wiye wadara, hodi koweni. Ebeni‑ya tika faha toha?
