Ai‑ka idi i‑di Yako hodi‑ya wiinematamonane. I‑di Yako toha, Yako bidi mai toha, hika bani mai toha, mai na, hodi‑ka faha‑ya mai fawametemoneni. Yako yama‑ya watomatamonane. Yama wato bi‑bidi tina awineni.” Fana ati nameteni.
“Hodi‑ka faha‑ya mai fa‑fawa mai baki hokomarimateni.
“Oka faha‑ba daatinahi. Owa bako hokomariya, faha kabi·okanamaraboneni.” Fana ati nameteni.
“Tika yibote haatinamiya, dai kakamiyahi.” Yeso ati ne,
“Oka yibote awirane.” Fana ati na,
“Fara amani. Keyehe hiritini awirini.
Tika yibote mai 5 tohamaro, hibayata maki owa tiwa‑ya famawahe, dai nafi yorotokanami awirani. Keyehe hiritini awirini.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Se! Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita amatini. Tiwa owatowahineni. Owati timitahi.

Oda tabaro‑ka adami webote‑ya Deoso oda kahiyarateni, oda‑ka idi mai toha, oda toha, oda naro. Yodeo dai toha, Yerosare‑ya Deoso‑ya dai kahiyarateni. Tabora one‑ya Deoso ai kahiyararabone dai ati teni.” Fana ati nameteni.

“Owati timitahi. Yama one‑ya ai‑ka Abi i‑di Deoso‑ya ai ati kahiyariya, Yerosare‑ya oda tokomarihi, dai tabaro‑ka adami webote‑ya dai tokomorosamarihi, hini ai sawi‑kaya Deoso ai kahiyara, ai nawahaboneni.
Deoso dai kahiyara, yama dai kahiyara dai wato awirini. Yodeo oda toha, Deoso oda kahiyara, Deoso yokana oda watobisineni. Deoso ati somawama‑bona‑ka yama oda watoneni.
Deoso ai nofiya, Deoso‑ya ai atibodi kahiyariya, Deoso ya‑yaitene. Fara dai watowahaboneni.

Deoso abano wadare, ai atibodi‑ya nokotonihi. Deoso‑ya ai kahiyara, ai atibodi ati ene ai ati yanana, Deoso ya‑yaitene. Deoso‑ya ai ati kahiyara, ai atibodi ati yokana tohara, keyehe‑ya ai hirina, Deoso‑ya ai kahiyari awirani.” Yeso ati nematane.
“Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika kakibona, oni owa Kirisito tohe, koboneya, yama nafi tamine‑ya kaminebonane.” Fana ati na,
“Fara owa amani.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda kama, samaritano‑ya Yeso hiyareno, oda wasima,
“Ka! Hini yamata‑ya fana nofiti? Hini yamata ihi fana‑ya Yeso hiyarati?” Oda atibodi ati na, oda ati yanaramaroni.
Hika yama wiye towitakosa, hini mai tabori‑ya tokoma, hika mai‑ya hiyara,
“Owa ene‑maro‑ya maki kamine, Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika tohe awane. Dai kamakihi, dai aweba.” Ati nameteni.
Yeso‑ya mai awabone mai kamameteni.
Fana tokoma nowati‑ya Yeso‑ya oda haana,
“Ayo, titafahi.” Oda ati na,
“Owa tefe‑bone tohani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ai nowati‑ya tefe‑ba mai daahine awane.” Oda ibi hiyara, oda ati namaroni.
“Yama kaba tamine ohiyari awirani. Dai tafa dai ya‑yaiteni. Owa‑ya yose‑mari ati‑nima owa ene niya, ati‑nima yama hawa·oniya, ya‑yai·oteni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Abariko 4 kane‑ya yamata marafakanabone dai ati na, dai awahi. Marafakanani.
Yamata‑ya mai kakama, mai ihi amosa manakone wadateni. Mai ihi ai one abateraboneni. Yamata noki‑ya mai werena, yamata‑ya mai kakama, mai na, mai nafi ya‑yainaboneni.
‘Ai one yamata noki‑ya werena, ai one yamata marafakana‑ya kakamateni.’ Dai ati teni.
Dai ati‑nima yama nineni.
Mai one yama anini‑ya nafe, mai nowati‑ya dai oyose, mai‑ka yama anini dai hawa tonihebonehe.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Sidadi‑ka mai‑ya fana hiyara,
“Owa ene nafi‑ya maki kaminene.” Fana ati nameteni.
Yeso ene tamine‑ya mai mita,
“Kirisito tohe awane.” Mai atibodi ati namaroni.
Yeso‑ya Samaritano mai kobona,
“Oda tabaro‑ya tiwinahi.” Mai ati namaroni.
Mai ati ihi mai tabori‑ya oda amoni famamaroni.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, Yeso ati‑ya mai one dama nofawahamaroni.
Fana‑ya mai hiyara,
“Yeso tamine tikamina, tiwati oda nofaroni. Hibayata‑ka Yeso ati oda mitawaha, Yeso ati oda nofa, ati oda tokadabawahane. Bofe‑ya mai wi‑wina mai nafi‑ya kasomebona oda watowahane.” Mai ati namaroni.
Mai tabori‑ya oda amoni fama, oda yananamatasa, Karireya‑ya oda tokamaroni.
“Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita hini mai tabori‑ya mai ati mai hinofaterani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Hibati‑ya Yerosare‑ya oda mariniya, Karireya‑ka mai sawe, Yeso ene‑ya mai awamaroni. Karireya‑ya oda kobotonamake, Yeso‑ya mai awa, mai ya‑yainamaroni.
Kana Karireya‑ya Yeso ati ene faha fino tohiyi‑maro‑kaya oda tokomatasamaroni. Kafanaho‑ya mai‑ka hidi‑ka yo‑yose winemari, bidi kiyani nafi, abi yanatonematane.
Karireya‑ya Yeso koboni tamine‑ya mai‑ka hidi mite, kaki, Yeso‑ya himanemarine, bidi Yeso hinakitamebona, bidi abarebonaha.
Yeso ati yanane,
“Owa ene kitabote dai awara, owati‑ya dai nofarani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ayo, ai towakamahi. Oka dao abarayaho.” Hidi ati ne,
“Tiwa tabaro‑ya tikamahi. Tika dao kitamane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya nofe, tokomemarine.
Hawi‑ya yakane‑ya hika mai one‑ya kobone,
“Ya‑yaitinahi. Tika dao kitamene.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Ebeni‑ya mahi ite‑ya oka dao kitamati?” Ati ne,
“Amoni ohari, mahi nokorisi fiyakane‑ya, oma ora‑ya tika dao hewene fawanene.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Oma ora‑ya Yeso ati yanane, fare oka dao‑ya kasoma kanibote nane.” Atibodi ati ne,
hini hika mai eyehe Yeso ati‑ya mai nofawahameteni.
Hibati‑ya Yodeya‑ya Yeso tokemari, kamatase, Karireya‑ya ene kitabote famawahemarine.
Yama one‑ya Yeso oda tokomatasamaroni, Yerosare‑ya, Yodeo oda toha oda‑ka marina‑ya.
Yerosare‑ka nokobi one oni kaneiro nokobi tohani. Kaneiro nokobi yakari‑ya wara bide ita, oda ati‑ya wara oni Betesida toha, Betesida widi‑ya yobe bidi 5 kane siinarimarine.
Yobe bidi‑ya mai hi‑hiyana mai dama mai nahoteni. Mai noki wadara mai toha, mai yakara mai toha, mai mani i‑isi na mai toha, mai na, yobe bidi‑ya mai nahamaroni, faha werokanabone‑ya mai nimanaro.
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose kise, ene faha werokiteni. Faha werokanaya, boki dai tohe kitamatene. Mai amoni dami‑ya Deoso‑ka yo‑yose kamatasatene.
Wara widi‑ya ai owa hi‑hiyane kafori, faha fowe 38 toha‑ya yakare,
Yeso kamaki, maki‑ya awe, faha fowe dami‑ya yakare‑ya wato,
“Tiwati yakanamineni?” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ayo, faha‑ya owa‑ya mai nabokabone mai wadara, faha werokanaya, obokabone ona, mai boki dai toharimateni.” Hi‑hiyane ati ne,
“Tiwaamisahi. Tika fo‑fori‑ka yama diwatikaniya, yakatinahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Kitame, waamise, hini fo‑fori‑ka yama‑ya diwanemarine, sabado‑ya.
Maki kitame‑ya oda‑ka hidi mai hiyara,
“Sabado‑ya ai fo‑fori‑ka yama ai diwaterani. Yama diwatiriyahi.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Owa‑ya nakitame ati ene oka fo‑fori‑ka yama diwa·okanineni.” Kitame ati ne,
“Ebeni‑ke ati tohati?” Mai ati nameteni.
Yeso oni‑ya maki watore, maki‑ya Yeso nakitame, toka kanibote ne, mai dama mai ihi Yeso‑ya watomarematane.
Makobote Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya maki sawi‑ya Yeso awe,
“Yakatinamawaha, tiwa ene amosaramaro‑nima tiwa ene namariyahi, tiwa komene ba‑basi ni awirabonehe.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya mite, oda‑ka hidi mai‑ya toke,
“Owa‑ya nakitame oni Yeso amane.” Ati nematane.
Sabado‑ya mai‑ya Yeso nakitame, Yeso‑ya mai weenamaroni.
“Okobi yama‑ya aninadi‑nima onabone, yama ani·onadeboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, mai yawi nafemaroni. Sabado‑ya Yeso yama‑ya anine ene mai yawi baha, makobote Deoso‑ya Yeso Abi ne ene mai yawi kitawaha,
“Yeso i‑di Deoso Bidi yokana tohi awirene.” Mai atibodi ati na, Yeso‑ya mai nanahababone mai ati nameteni.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyare,
“Owati amosabote dai mitahi. Owa ene yama ani·oterani. Okobi ati ene yama ani·obisa, Okobi‑ka yama anini‑nima oka yama aniniteni.
Okobi owa‑ya nofi nafi, yama nafi‑ya owa‑ya yofikane, owa ene kitamaro, Okobi ene owa ene kitawahabone, dai awiya, dai atibodi yama‑ya kadikawahaboneni.
Mai aba mai‑ya Okobi nakitame‑nima onabone, mai‑ya owati nakitama mai onakitamabone, owa ene mai abaraboneni.
Mai ihi‑ya Okobi kadikare, owa‑ya yosemarine, mai ihi okadikabisabonehe.
Owa‑ya yosemari ene Okobi‑ya mai kahiyari‑nima owa‑ya mai kahiyarahareboneni. Owa‑ya mai kahiyari awira, Okobi owa‑ya yose‑mari‑ya mai kahiyaraharirani.

Owati amosabote dai mitahi. Okobi owa‑ya yosemarine. Owati‑ya mai mita, Okobi ati‑ya mai nofa, mai abateraboneni. Mai ihi towe manakone oda haarabone, mai kome fawarabone‑ka mai tohami awirini, mai abarabone‑ka mai tohabisineni.
Owati amosabote dai mitahi. Deoso Bidi ama·oni. Mai aba mai haa·oniya, mai kitamawahaboneni.
Deoso kite, hini ene mai one kitamabone, mai one abarabone, Deoso hini ene Deoso kiti‑nima Deoso Bidi nane.
Deoso ati ene dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke dai ene‑ya kadikebonane. Hini dai ene‑nima dai manakone na daa·onaboneni.
Dai atibodi yama‑ya kadikariyahi. Mai abamaro, hini mai tame‑ya mai sawe owati‑ya mai mitabone,
Hini owati ihi tohara, Deoso ati ene mai ihi okadikabisaboneni. Owa‑ya yose‑mari ati‑nima mai‑ya wee·owahaboneni.
Hini owa hare owa tamine okamina‑mani, owati dai nofariya, sibara neni.
Owa tamine‑ya kaminahari, ati amosemarine.
Yowaho Batita ati dai mitebona dai one‑ya dai yose, owa tamine yokana‑ya Yowaho kaminemarine.
Ai owa ati noko·onira, Yowaho ati dai nokotonibisineni. Yowaho ati tamine okaminineni, ai komene fawaterabone‑kaya dai sawirabonehe.
Nabarina wahi ai hawine‑ya yofikana‑nima Yowaho ne, Deoso hawine‑ya yofikanane. Faha fowe fa‑famaraba niya Yowaho dai‑ya yofikane ene dai ya‑yainamaroni.
Yowaho ati amosi bi‑bidi nane. Okobi ene owa ene kitabote, owa ene dai awiya, Okobi owa‑ya yose‑mari dai watowahaboneni.
Okobi owa‑ya yosemari, owa tamine‑ya hiyaremari, abano dai awarihi, ati dai mitarihi, dai teni.
Owa‑ya yose‑mari ati dai atibodi‑ya foyaterene. Dai atibodi‑ya ati foye‑mana, owati dai nofa neni.
Deoso‑ka yama hani dai kadika,
‘Ai abaterabone tamine oda mitaboneni.’ Dai ati na,
Deoso‑ka yama hani owa tamine‑ya kaminateni.
Owa dai nofarani. Owa dai nofa‑mani, dai abara neni.
Owa‑ya dai kahiyarabone bofe‑ya dai wi‑wina dai‑ya noko·onirani.
Dai atibodi ati owatoni. Deoso dai nofarani.
Okobi owa‑ya yosemari, owati dai nofara, bare hini ati‑ya kaminabiseya, ati dai nofabisebonane.
Hini dai hinama dai ibi kahiyarabisa, Deoso dai‑ya kahiyarebona‑ya dai nokotonirani. Fara ihi owati dai nofarani.
Okobi‑ya dai‑ya okahabanaraboneni. Mose‑ka yama hani dai‑ya kasomabone dai ati na, Mose‑ka yama hani ati dai tokadabara, Mose‑ka yama hani dai‑ya kahabanabisaboneni.
Mose ati‑ya dai nofa‑mani, owati dai nofahare neni. Owa tamine‑ya i‑di Mose kanahanomarine.
Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya dai nofara, owati‑ya dai nofaharirineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yama one‑ya Karireya‑ka Wara Webote‑ya Yeso oda eyehe berekawahemarine. Bara mai ati‑ka wara oni Tiberiyadi amani.
Fara ai one‑ya Yeso nakitame‑ya mai awa, mai dama mai tokobasamakemaroni.
Oda kobokana, adami webote‑ya oda tokomorosa, oda nahamaroni.
Yeso kiinawame, mai dama mai kabasamake mai‑ya awe,
“Firibi, ebeni‑kaya mai tafe‑ba ai kanikibati?” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso mai‑ya natafebona, hini ene‑bona‑ya wato, i‑di Firibi‑ya haanemarine, fai ati‑ya mitebonaha.
Firibi ati yanane,
“Ka! Yinero yama anini mahi 200 kane manakone‑nima ne‑ya mai tafe‑ba oda kanikiya, baho kote bide oda daaniya, mai nafi‑ya koboraba awineni.” Firibi ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda‑ka owa i‑di Simaho Bedoro sohori i‑di Anidere ati yanane,
“Yetene oawe, tefe bidi tohene. Baho 5 kana, aba mai fama nani. Yamata bide mai nafi‑ya koboraboneni.” I‑di Anidere ati nemarine.
“Dai ati ene mai nahorisahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Kabihi mese‑ya mai nahamaroni. Mai dama toha, mai makidi 5.000 tohaba awineni.
Baho‑ya Yeso damakane, Deoso‑ya hiyare, baho‑ya oda‑ya daani bahe, aba mai‑ya daanamakitase, mai nafi‑ya yama oda daanawahamaroni. Hini mai ati‑nima mai tafe‑bone oda nayowamaroni.
Mai nafi korimanama,
“Yamata kote hasina dai teenahi, abarabonehe.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati ene baho 5 kana oda kaba kote hasina oda teena, hisiri 12 kana kibamaroni.
Yeso ene kite‑ya mai awa,
“Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita kakibona yama hani ati na, fare i‑di Yeso tohe awane.” Mai ati namaroni.
“Yeso oda‑ka hidi‑bona oda ati na, oda ati‑ya nofareya, Yeso oda waratoneya, hidi tabaro‑ya oda towakamebonane, oda‑ka hidi webote tohawahebonaha.” Mai one atibodi ati na,
mai atibodi ati‑ya Yeso wato, ohari toke, adami webote‑ya tokomorosemarine.
Yeso kamare, yama soki yanatoni‑ya Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda tokofawama,
kanawa‑ya oda foyamamaroni, Kafanaho‑ya oda beretokawamabonehe. Yama soki nafiwahiya, Yeso kamaki awisareya,
boni yanana, faha rike nafemaroni.
Faha bai‑ya kanawa oda oriniya, Yeso faha baki‑ya kamaki, kanawa yakari‑ya yakane, oda awa, oda habo siitoni kitamaroni.
“Dai kakomeheriyahi. Fara ama·oni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Se! Sibarini, tifoyahi.” Oda ati namaroni.
Kanawa dori‑ya Yeso foyamaki, faha widi‑ya oda koboni hawa tohamaroni.
Yama wahabisari‑ya mai dama mai naha, mai atibodi yama‑ya kadika,
“Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba kanawa ohare‑ya mai towakama, Yeso mai‑ya sawirene.” Mai atibodi ati nameteni.
Tiberiyadi‑ka mai kake, kanawa‑kaya mai yamakanake, mai dama mai‑ya Yeso natafe‑ka fara yama yakari‑ya mai kobonameteni.
Mai dama mai naha Yeso‑ya mai nimana, Yeso kamarihi, fara Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda wadamarihi na, ihi Tiberiyadi‑ka mai‑ka kanawa‑ya mai haana, Kafanaho‑ya mai kamakemeteni, Yeso‑ya mai sibanabonehe.
Kafanaho‑ya mai kobonamake, Yeso‑ya mai wasimake, mai ati yanana,
“Ayo, ebeni mahi ite‑ya kobotiniti?” Mai ati namaroni.
“Owati amosabote dai mitahi. Baho dai kaba ihi owa‑ya dai sibanineni. Deoso ene dai nofabone, owa‑ya dai sibana‑mani, yama sibabisara neni.
“Deoso ati‑nima oda nabone hini yamata‑nima oda ene nibati?” Mai ati namaroni.
“Deoso ati‑nima dai nabone, Deoso hiyosemari ati dai nofahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Tiwati oda nofawahabone, tiwa ene kitabote oda awahi.
‘Neme‑ka baho‑ya mai kabametemoneni.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati nineni.” Mai ati namaroni.
“Owati amosabote dai mitahi. Neme‑ka baho‑ya mai kayafamete, Mose ene tohi awirematamonane. Neme‑ka baho amosabote‑ya Okobi daanibisatene.
“Ayo, Deoso‑ka baho mahi‑nima oda‑ya daatinahi.” Mai ati namaroni.
Hibati‑ya owa ene dai awa, owati‑ya dai nofi awirini.
Dai one‑ya Okobi owa‑ya daane, Okobi mai daahina owa‑ya mai nafi nofabone, owa‑ya mai nofiya,
‘Dai‑ya onofi awirini, dai tokahi.’ Oteraboneni.
Bofe‑ya okemaroni, Okobi ati‑nima onabonehe. Owa‑ya yose‑mari ati‑nima oteni. Hini owati‑nima oterani.
Owa‑ya yose‑mari haa‑nima yama na‑ya nofane, owa‑ya daahina mai one‑ya fawa·onirabone, yama faina‑bone‑ya mai onakitamaboneni.
Haa‑nima yama na‑ya Okobi nofane, Bidi mai hiawa, Bidi ati mai hinofa hine mai abateraboneni. Yama faina‑bone‑ya mai onakitamaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Neme‑ka baho ama·oni.” Yeso ati ne,
ati‑ya mai one nofara, Yeso tamine‑ya mai ibi hiyara,
“Yose bidi i‑di Yeso amane. Neme‑ya kisemona ati ne; neme‑ya kisaremarine. Madi, badi mai na, mai oda watoneni.” Mai ati namaroni.
“Owa tamine‑ya dai ibi hiyara, dai ati yawariyahi.
Okobi owa‑ya yosemari, owa‑ya Okobi mai hiyosera, owati‑ya mai nofaraboneni. Owati‑ya mai no‑nofa yama faina‑bone‑ya mai onakitamaboneni.
‘Deoso mai nafi‑ya kanawatowahebonane.’ Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑ka yama hani ati neni.
Okobi mai‑ya kanawato, ati‑ya mai nofa owati‑ya mai nofawahaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
(Bofe‑ka dai toha Okobi dai awaterani. Owa‑ta Deoso owa‑ya yose‑mari oawabisane.)
“Owati amosabote dai mitahi. Owati dai no‑nofa dai abateraboneni.
Baho amosabote‑nima ona ama·oni. Owa ene mai abaraboneni.
Hibati‑ya ai‑ka idi kabani‑kaya mai yakani‑ya mana‑ya mai kabaware, mai abametemoneni.
Neme‑ya okisamaroni. Baho‑nima ona ama·oni. Oka baho‑ya mai kaba, mai abateraboneni. Bofe‑ya dai wi‑wina dai‑ya okasomabone, oka baho daa·onaboneni. Oka baho owa eme tamine amani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Hini yamata‑nima Yeso eme ai kababoneni?” Mai ibi hiyara mai ati na, mai yawamaroni.
Owa eme yama kaba amosabote amani. Owa emene yama fawa amosabote tohaneni.
Owa eme‑ya mai kaba, owa emene‑ya mai fawa na, oka mai toha, mai‑ya osawiteboneni.
Neme‑ka baho amosabote ama·oni. Mana‑ya ai‑ka idi mai kaba, mai abametemoneni. Oka baho‑ya mai kaba, mai abateraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Fara Kafanaho‑ya Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya mai naha, mai‑ya Yeso kanawatomarine.
Yeso ati oda mita,
“Ati bare, ati oda watorene.” Yeso‑ya oda daba oda one dama ati namaroni.
Mai ati‑ya Yeso wato,
“Owati bara dai mita, owati dai nofamaraba awineni.
Neme‑ya dai‑ka Ayo tokomisame dai awiya, owati dai nofaraba awineni.
Ai atibodi ene ai abarani. Ai abano ababisateni. Dai atibodi tamine‑ya ohiyara, owati dai nofiya, dai abaraboneni.
Owati‑ya dai one nofarani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Oda atibodi ati‑ya Yeso wato, ati mai hinofare mai‑ya wato, fai‑ya kahabanebona‑ya wato nemarine.
“Owati‑ya dai one nofara, hibati‑ya owati yanana,
‘Okobi mai‑ya yosere owati‑ya mai nofaraboneni.’ Onamaroni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ya oda dabamaro Yeso ati‑ya oda one nofara, mai toka, Yeso‑ya mai sawimaramaroni.
Mai dama mai tokoma, oda 12 toha oda‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Dai tokomahareba awini.” Ati nemarine.
“Ayo, oda toki awirini. Ai abaterabone‑ka hawi yofitikana, ai‑ya yo‑yofikana‑ba ai owa wadarane.
Deoso‑ka yokana amatini. Tiwati oda nofini.” Simaho Bedoro ati nemarine.
“Dai 12 toha, dai okadikamaroni, owa‑ya dai dababonehe. Dai okadika Diaboro‑ka yo‑yose dai owa ohari tohabisane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Simaho Isikari·oti bidi i‑di Yoda tamine‑ya hiyare, oda 12 toha oda owa amane, fare Yeso‑ya kahabanewahemarine.
Makobote Karireya‑ya Yeso yakane, Yodeya‑ya tokaremarine. Yodeya‑ya oda‑ka hidi Yeso‑ya mai ati nanahabamaroni.
Oda amoni fa‑famaraba niya, Yodeo oda toha oda‑ka feriado yananaboneni. Feriado oni Wa‑wasa tohamaroni.
Yeso‑ya sohori mai hiyara,
“Ayo, Yodeya‑ya tikahi, tiwati‑ya mai no‑nofa tiwa ene kitabote‑ya mai awabonehe.
Tiwa tamine‑ya mai nafi mitabone tina, tiwa tikahemoriyahi. Tiwa ene kitabote‑mone tina, tiwa ene‑ya mai nafi awiyahi.” Sohori mai ati namaroni.
Fara Yeso ati‑ya sohori mai nofi awiramaroni.
“Hibayata mai dama mai noki‑ya owati toki awisarani. Dai‑ya mai awabisiya, yama sibarini.
Dai‑ya mai kakoterani.
‘Mai ihi amosarani.’ Ona,
owa‑ya mai kakoteni.
Mai marinabone mai‑ya dai tokabisahi. Hibayata oki awiraboneni. Hibayata mai dama mai noki‑ya owati toki nofarini.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Karireya‑ya Yeso oda nahobisamaroni.
Sohori mai toka, mai nowati‑ya Yeso oda tokomakemaroni, mai noki beheri‑ya.
Oda marini‑ya oda‑ka hidi Yeso‑ya mai sibana,
“Fai Yeso‑ya?” Mai ati na, mai ati damamaroni.
Yeso tamine‑ya mai dama mai ibi basana,
“Yeso ati amosane.” Mai one ati na,
“Yeso ati kasiro, ati ene mai dami tosawariteni.” Mai one ati namaroni.
Hini mai ati‑ya mai kemamaroni, oda‑ka hidi mai‑ya mai nayofinaro.
Mai marini beheri hawa tohiya, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso tokiyome, mai‑ya kanawatomarine.
Yeso ati‑ya oda‑ka hidi mai mita,
“Ka! Ebeni‑ke Yeso‑ya kanawato timata? Oda‑ka isikora‑ya sawiterene.” Mai ibi hiyara mai ati namaroni.
Mai ati‑ya Yeso wato, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Hini owati tohi awirini. Owa‑ya yose‑mari ati okaminabisateni.
Deoso ati dai tokadabiya, hini owati ihi owati yanara, Deoso ati ene owati yananibisa dai wataboneni.
Hini mai ati ihi yama‑ya mai kanawata,
‘Amosabote ama·oni. Owa dai nofahi.’ Mai ati teni.
Hidi ati‑ya kamine,
‘Owa‑ya yose dai nofabisahi.’ Ati ne,
keyehe‑ya hirire, ati amose hinama toha tene.
Deoso‑ka yama hani‑ya i‑di Mose kanahanomata ati‑nima dai ene ra, hiniya owa‑ya dai ati nanahabineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Madi towe tiwa‑ya foye, keyehe‑ya hiritineni. Tiwa oda ati nanahabarani.” Mai dama mai ati namaroni.

I‑di Mose ati ene dai‑ka madehe sowiri tati atori dai wisinakosateni. Ai‑ka idi mai ihi dai toha, makobote i‑di Mose ene tohamaki ne, mai ihi‑nima sabado‑ya dai‑ka madehe sowiri tati atori dai wisinakosateni.
Mose‑ka yama hani ati ihi sabado‑ya ai one dai wisina, sabado‑ya ai owa onakitamabisa, owa ene dai yawariyahi.
Owa ene tamine dai kadikariyahi, owatibodi ati dai kadikabisahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, Yerosare‑ya mai wi‑wina mai one ati yanana,
“Se! Maki mai sibahine mai hinahabebona, fare amanaraniha?
Dai awaho, ai dami noko‑ya hiyare, ai‑ka hidi maki‑ya mai weeni awirini.
‘Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika tohe awane.’ Ai‑ka hidi mai atibodi ati nawama awineni.” Mai ati namaroni.
Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso mai‑ya kanawatobona mai‑ya hiyare,
“Hehe fara amani. Owa dai wato, owa tabaro oni dai wato neni. Owa‑ya yose‑mari dai watora, owa‑ya yose‑mari amosabote amane.
Owa‑ya yose‑mari owatobisane.” Ati nemarine.
Ati mai himite mai one yawa, Yeso‑ya mai waratonabone mai atibodi ati na, Yeso abebona‑ka mahi kobore ene Deoso mai‑ya maakane, Yeso‑ya mai waratoni awiramaroni.
Yeso ati‑ya mai dami mita, Yeso ati‑ya mai one dama nofawaha,
“Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika Yeso amane. Yeso ene kitabote tohe, Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika tohare‑mana, kameya, ene kiti ba‑basi re nane.” Mai ati namaroni, mai ibi basanaro.
Mai ati‑ya fariseo mai mita, mai yawa, fariseo mai toha, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, mai na, sekorasa mai‑ya mai yosemaroni, Yeso‑ya mai waratonabonehe.
Yeso ati yanane,
“Dai tabaro‑ya owa amoni damamaraboneni. Owa‑ya yose‑mari‑ya okomaboneni.
Owa dai sibaniya, owa dai awami awiraboneni. Okomi‑kaya dai tokomakiteraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Oda‑ka hidi mai ibi hiyara,
“Ebeni‑kaya tokabamata? Ai tokomakirabone ati neri, oda one Kereko mai tabori‑ya mai wina mai‑ya tokebona, Kereko mai‑ya kanawatoba awane.
‘Owa dai sibaniya, owa dai awami awiraboneni. Okomi‑kaya dai tokomakiteraboneni.’ Ati ne,
ati oda watorene.” Mai ibi hiyara mai ati namaroni.
“Dai bako hokoya, owa‑kaya dai kamahi. Oka faha dai fawahi.
Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑nima owati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai atibodi‑ya faha webote yananiya, faha ihi mai abaraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Faha webote Yeso ati ne, Deoso‑ka Doni tamine amane. Yeso bofe‑ya wineya, Deoso‑ka Doni oda‑ya sawi awisare, neme‑ya Yeso tokeya, Yeso ati oda no‑nofa Deoso‑ka Doni oda atibodi‑ya sawiwahemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita,
“Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita kamebona, fare Yeso amane.” Mai one ati nihi,
“Kirisito amane.” Mai one ati nihi,
“Kirisito Karireya‑ya yanareba awane.
I‑di Dafi tabaro bote, Bere‑kaya Kirisito wadebonane. Dafi‑ka nodi i‑di Kirisito tohebonane. Deoso‑ka yama hani ati teni. Yeso i‑di Kirisito tohi awireba awane.” Mai one ati nihi neni.
Yeso ati‑ya mai one nofa, Yeso ati‑ya mai one nofarihi nani.
Yeso‑ya mai one waratonabone mai ati na, Yeso‑ya mai waratoni awiramaroni.
Deoso‑ka yobe‑ka sekorasa Yeso‑ya mai waratonabone, hiniya mai wininama,
“Hini yamata ihi Yeso dai kakami awiriti?” Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, fariseo mai toha mai na, mai ati namaroni.
“Yeso ati‑nima mai one ati terani.” Sekorasa mai ati namaroni.
Sekorasa mai‑ya fariseo mai weena,
“Yeso keyehe‑ya hirine, ati dai nofa awini.
Mai‑ka hidi oda toha, Yeso ati‑ya oda one nofaterani.
Mai one dama Mose ati‑ya mai watora, Yeso ati‑ya mai nofabisa, hini mai‑ya mai yokaboneni.” Fariseo mai ati namaroni.
Nikodimo fariseo owa tohe. Hibati‑ya Yeso‑ya tokemarine, Yeso ati‑ya mitebonaha. Fariseo mai one ati‑ya Nikodimo mite, mai‑ya hiyare,
“‘Ai owa ati dai miti dai tohi awireya, dai weerayaho.’ Mose‑ka yama hani ati teni.” Nikodimo ati nemarine.
“Towe amatini. Karireya‑ka mai ati‑nima tiwati neni. Deoso‑ka yama hani tikadikiyahi. Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita Karireya‑ya yani tamine sawiterene.” Fariseo mai one ati namaroni.
Mai tabori‑ya mai nafi tokawahamaroni.
Orifera adami‑ya Yeso tokomorosemarine.
Yama wahabisari‑ya Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso kamatasemarine. Yeso wai‑ya mai dama mai kamakemaroni. Yeso itarisemarine, mai dama mai‑ya kanawatobonaha.
Ai owa fadi maki bare‑ya dakora‑ya mai wasemaroni. Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, fariseo mai toha, mai na, fana‑ya mai kakamake, oda noko‑kaya mai hinawaamaroni.
Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Yeso, fana tiawahi, maki bare‑ya fana dakora‑ya oda owa wasinahone.
Fana haa‑nima mai ihi na
‘Mai dai nanahabahi, yati‑ya.’ Mose‑ka yama hani ati teni.
Hini yamata‑nima tiwati niti?” Mai ati na,
“Fara haa‑nima ai ati niya, Yeso ati tosawariya, Yeso ai weenaboneni.” Mai atibodi ati nineni.
Yeso mai‑ya hiyari awire, hini yehe‑ya siki‑ya nahanomarine.
Fariseo mai ati yananamarimana, Yeso waamise,
“Hehe sibarini, dai owa ene amose hinama tohe yati‑ya hikinari dai hiyahi.” Ati nemarine.
Moinisamatase, siki‑ya nahanomatasemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya mai mita mai yamatonama, mai bo‑botena mai toki dai tohama, mai nafi tokomakemaroni. Yeso fana‑ya fame mai yorotonakosamaroni.
Yeso waamisamatase,
“Fai mai‑ya? Tiwa‑ya mai ati nanahabaro, mai nahoneni?” Ati nemarine.
“Ayo, owa‑ya mai ati nanahaba, mai awimarini.” Fana ati namaroni.
“Tiwa‑ya owati nanahabaharirani. Tikamahi, tiwa ene towe tohamariyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Bofe‑ka mai‑ka yama wahi‑nima ona ama·oni. Deoso hawine yofi·okaneni. Owati‑ya dai tokadaba yama soki‑ya mai ya‑yaka mai‑nima dai ni awira, yama wahi ihi dai abaraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Hini tiwa tamine tihiyarineni. Hini mai tamine‑ya mai hiyara, mai ati oda nofaterani.” Fariseo mai ati namaroni.
“Owa tamine ohiyara, sibaraboneni. Keyehe‑ya hiri·oterani. Yana·omaro‑ka yama dai watora, owa‑ta owatobisineni. Oki‑bone‑ka dai watora, owa‑ta owatobisineni.
Mai atibodi ati dai mitara, mai ihi manakone dai haateni. Mai ihi manakone haa·orani.
Mai ihi manakone haa·ona‑mani, owati sibara neni. Owa hari terani. Owa‑ya yose‑mari oda ati fara kafamateni.
Mose‑ka yama hani ati dai nokotonihe, ati dai mitahi,
‘Mai fama, fara mai ati kafamiya, mai ati dai nofahi.’ Mose‑ka yama hani ati neni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Owa tamine okamina, Okobi owa‑ya yose owa tamine‑ya kaminahari ne.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ebeni‑kaya abi sawiti?” Mai ati na,
“Owa‑ya dai watora, Okobi‑ya dai watoharirani. Owa‑ya dai wata‑mani, Okobi dai watohare neni.” Yeso ati nemarine.

Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya yinero weyene wai yowi‑ya Yeso itari, mai‑ya kanawatomarine. Yeso ati‑ya mai mitiya, Yeso‑ya mai waratonabone mai atibodi ati na, Yeso aba‑bona‑ke mahi kobore ene Deoso mai‑ya maakane, Yeso‑ya mai waratoni awiramaroni.
Mai‑ya Yeso hiyaramatase,
“Okaboneni. Owa‑ya dai sibanabone, owa‑ya dai wasi awiraboneni. Dai ene amosara manakone hasini‑ya dai ababoneni. Oki‑kaya dai tokomakiteraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“‘Oki‑kaya dai tokomakiteraboneni.’ Ati ne,
Yeso hini‑ya naboheba awane, yama ai wato awirini.” Oda‑ka hidi mai ati namaroni.
“Bofe‑ya dai yana, bofe‑ka dai amani. Neme‑ya yana·obisa, bofe‑ka ohi awirini.
Dai ene amosara manakone hasini‑ya dai ababone, ona, owa‑ya dai nofariya, dai ene amosara manakone hasini‑ya dai ababisaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ebeni‑ke amatiniti?” Mai ati namaroni.
“Owati‑maro‑nima oneni.
Dai ene towe dama toha, owa‑ya yose‑mari ene amose, keyehe‑ya hiriterene. Owa‑ya yose‑mari ati mai dami‑ya okaminabisani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso hini Badi tamine‑ya hiyare, ati‑ya mai watoramaroni.
“Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke awa‑ya dai nawaaneya, owa‑ya dai watowahaboneni. Hini owati ihi yama ani·oterani. Okobi hikamini baha, okaminamakitasateni.
Owa hari terani. Owa‑ya yose‑mari owa‑ya famatene. Okobi yama hinofa‑nima oteni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso hiyare, ati‑ya mai dami nofawahamaroni.
Yeso ati‑ya oda‑ka hidi mai one nofa mai‑ya hiyare,
“Owati dai tokadaba, oka da‑daba yokana dai amani.
Ati yokana dai watobona, ati yokana dai‑ya seekanebonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai ati yanana,
“Abaraho‑ka nodi oda amani. Oda‑ya mai kanikaterani. Hini yamata‑nima yama na oda‑ya seekibati?” Mai ati namaroni.
“Owati amosabote dai mitahi. Mai ihi amosara yama towe mai‑ya kayafa‑nima mai na, yama towe‑ka ka‑kanika mai tohateni.
Ai owa‑ya hidi kanikeya, abariko dame‑ya daahinamatasatene. Hidi hini bidi‑ya daaterene.
Deoso Bidi dai‑ya seekaneya, yama towe dai‑ya kayafamaraboneni.
Abaraho‑ka nodi dai amani. Owati dai nofara, owa‑ya dai ati nanahabani.
Okobi oda fama, yama owa tamine okaminabisineni. Dai‑ka idi ati‑nima dai teni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Abaraho oda‑ka idi amane.” Mai ati namaroni.
“Abaraho dai‑ka idi tohe‑mana, Abaraho ene‑nima dai ene na neni.
Deoso ati omite, ati okamine, owa‑ya dai nanahababone dai ati na, dai ene‑nima i‑di Abaraho ene rematamonane.
Dai‑ka idi yokana ene‑nima dai ene nibisineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Oda‑ka ami maki mai one‑ya mai siwakiterani. I‑di Abaraho‑ka nodi yokana oda amani. Oda‑ka Abi yokana Deoso amane.” Mai ati namaroni.
“Dai‑ka Abi Deoso tohe‑mana, owa‑ya dai nofa neni. Deoso oda famamaro, dai tabaro‑ya okemaroni. Hiniya oki awira, owa‑ya Deoso yosemarine.
Owati dai mita, hini yamata ihi owati dai watorihi? Owati dai nofara ihi amani.

Dai‑ka abi yokana Diaboro tohe, dai‑ka abi ati‑nima dai nabone dai ati neni. Diaboro ai‑ya nanahaba tene. Satanasi fara yama yokana‑ya kaminatere, keyehe‑ya hirinibisatene. Satanasi hini atibodi ene keyehe‑ya hirini fawaterene. Satanasi ati‑ya mai tokadaba keyehe‑ya mai hiriteni.
Ati yokana okamine, hiniya keyehe‑ya dai nofabisa, owati dai nofarani.
Owa ene towe dai awineni? Owa ene towe dai awaterani. Owa ene amosa hinama toha, keyehe‑ya hiri·ora, owati dai nofahi.
Deoso‑ka mai toha Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadabateni. Deoso‑ka dai tohara, owati dai watorani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Samaritano owa amatini. Madi towe tiwa‑ya sawine.” Oda‑ka hidi mai ati namaroni.
“Madi towe owa‑ya sawi awirane. Okobi okahiyara, owa‑ya dai nofarani.
Hini owa‑ya noko·onirani. Okobi owa‑ya nokotonibisatene, owa‑ya mai kahiyarabonehe. Ai ene‑ya Okobi kadikatene.
Owati amosabote dai mitahi. Owati‑ya mai tokadaba, mai abateraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Madi towe tiwa‑ya sawibisane. Abaraho abe, Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai abamakemetemoneni. Tiwati‑ya mai tokadaba mai abaterabone tineni.
Abaraho amosi bi‑bidi ne‑mona tina, amosabote tiwa‑mone tina awineni. Abaraho abe, Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai abamakemetemoneni. Ebeni‑ke amatiniti?” Mai ati namaroni.
“Owa‑ya okahiyara‑mani, owati‑ya dai nofariya, yama sibara neni. Okobi owa‑ya kahiyarabisatene. Okobi dai‑ka Deoso‑mona dai ati teni.
Okobi dai watore, Okobi owatobisineni. Dai watomona dai ati na, keyehe‑ya dai hirinineni. Okobi owatorini ona‑mani, keyehe‑ya hiri·onahare neni. Okobi owato, ati okadabatene.
Bofe‑ya owinabone, owa tamine‑ya dai‑ka idi i‑di Abaraho mite, ya‑yainemarine. Makobote owa‑ya awe, ya‑yainamatasemarine.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Bote tihara, tika ano 50‑ba wadara, ‘Abaraho oawani.’ Tina, tiwadi awisari‑ya Abaraho abematamonane.” Oda‑ka hidi mai ati namaroni.
“Owati amosabote dai mitahi. I‑di Abaraho‑ba wadare‑ke ama·oni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Ati‑ya mai mita, mai yawa, yati‑ya mai yabamaroni, Yeso‑ya mai baanabonehe. Yeso hini‑ya kemo, tokemarine.
Maki wade‑ya noko amosare, yama‑ya awaremarine. Yeso oda eyehe yakane, maki oda awa, oda ati yanana,
“Ayo, ebeni‑ke ene maki yama‑ya awarati? Badi, madi mai na, mai ihi toha, hini ene toha ne awane. Ebeni‑ke ene tohati?” Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda ati namaroni.
“Mai ihi tohi awirini. Deoso ene dai awebona ene maki yama‑ya awaremarine.
Yama tehe‑ya owa‑ya yose‑mari‑ka yama anini ai aninahi. Yama soki kobonabone, yama soki‑ya yama ai anirani, yama ai awararo.
Bofe‑ya owina, dai nafi‑ka yama wahi‑nima oneni, yama dai watabonehe.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Hiyari hawa tohe, wami ime‑ya firone, atabo‑ya maki noko‑ya ketehe, ati yanane,
“Sirowe faha‑ya tikamiya, tiwa noko sokotiyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Sirowe faha” ai ati‑ka oni “yosene faha” toha, fara‑ya toke, noko‑ya sokone, yama‑ya awawahe, tokomematane.
Maki‑ya hika mai awa,
“Yama‑ya haanemari, fare amanaraniha?” Mai ati nameteni.
“Fare amane.” Mai one ati nihi,
“Bare amane. Yama‑ya aware‑nima nane.” Mai one ati nihi na,
“Fara ama·oni. Yama oawaramaro, oawawahineni.” Maki ati nematane.
“Hini yamata ihi yama tiawawahiti?” Mai ati nameteni.
“Yeso atabo‑ya wamane, owa noko‑ya atabo‑ya hidine, owa‑ya yose, Sirowe faha‑ya owa noko soko·onabone ati ne, Sirowe‑ya owa noko soko oha, yama oawawahani.” Ati nematane.
“Fai‑ra?” Mai ati na,
“Owato awire.” Maki ati nematane.
Maki noko amosawame fariseo mai‑ya mai hiwakamematane.
Sabado‑ya Yeso atabo‑ya wamane, maki‑ya nakitamemarine.
“Hini yamata ihi yama‑ya tiawawahati?” Fariseo mai ati na,
“Maki atabo‑ya owa noko‑ya hidine, owa noko soko oha, yama oawawahani.” Maki ati nematane.
“Maki Deoso‑ka tohare awane, Deoso‑ka mai toha sabado‑ya yama‑ya mai aniterani.” Fariseo mai one ati na,
“Ati kasiro awire awane, ene kite, Deoso hikasomare‑mana, ene kitare nane.” Fariseo mai one ati na, mai ibi weenameteni.
Noko amosawame‑ya mai hiyara,
“Tiwa‑ya nakitame hini yamata‑nima tiwatibodi ati niti?” Mai ati na,
“Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita tohe awane.” Maki ati nematane.
“Yama‑ya awaremona ati ne, keyehe‑ya hirine awane.” Oda‑ka hidi mai atibodi ati na,
Badi, madi, mai na, mai‑ya mai haanameteni, mai ati‑ya mai mitabonehe. Badi, madi mai kobona,
“Tika dao amanaraniha? Wade, yama‑ya awaremata amane? Hini yamata ihi yama‑ya awawahiti?” Oda‑ka hidi mai ati na,
“Hehe, oka dao amane. Wade‑ya yama‑ya awaremarine.
Fai‑ya nakitame oda aware, oda wato awire. Oda‑ka ewe madehe tohamare, dai haanaho. Hini tamine‑ya kaminabisebonane.” Badi, madi mai na mai ati nameteni.
Oda‑ka hidi mai‑ya mai nayofinameteni. Hibati‑ya oda‑ka hidi mai ati yanana,
“Yeso i‑di Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika‑mona mai one ati na, Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya mai tokiyomamaraboneni.” Oda‑ka hidi mai ati nameteni.
Mai ati tamine‑ya badi mai mita, mai kakomehe,
“Oda‑ka ewe madehe tohamare, dai haanaho.” Mai ati nameteni.
Mai haahinamatase, kameya, mai hiyara,
“Maki ati kasiro oda watoneni. Deoso tinofiya, maki tinofaraboneni. Tiwati oda mitaboneni.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Maki ati kasiro awane, yama owato awirini. Hibati‑ya yama oawaramaro; yama oawawaha, fara owatobisineni.” Ati nematane.
“Hini yamata‑nima ene nati, tiwa‑ya nakitameri?” Mai ati nameteni.
“Dai‑ya ohiyara, owati dai nofara, hini yamata‑bone owa‑ya dai haanamatasihi? Maki ati‑ya dai tokadabaharibaraniha?” Ati nematane.
Maki kitame‑ya mai weena,
“Towe amatini. Maki ati tikadaba, i‑di Mose ati oda tokadababisateni.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Mose‑ya Deoso hiyaremata oda watoneni. Ebeni‑kaya maki kakiti? Maki tamine oda wato awirini.” Mai ati nameteni.
“Se! Maki kaki tamine dai watore, owa‑ya nakitame dai aware awane.
Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadabara mai ati‑ya Deoso mitaterene. Deoso ati‑ya mai nofa, ati mai hikadaba hine mai ati‑ya Deoso mitabisatene.
Hibati‑ya maki noko wadaremata‑ya ai owa nakitame tamine wadaterene.
Deoso‑ka tohare‑mana, owa noko‑ya kasomare nane.” Maki kitame ati nematane.
“Tiwadi awisari‑ya tiwa ene amosaramaro, towe amatini. Oda‑ya tikanawatoraboneni. Tikahi. Deoso‑ya oda hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya tikamakiriyahi.” Mai ati nameteni.
Maki kitame mai‑ya sawimarebona mai ati na, mai ati tamine‑ya Yeso mite, tokomaki, hiwasi,
“Dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke ati tinofiraniha?” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ebeni‑ke ai‑ka Ayo tohati, ati onofebonaha?” Kitame ati nemarine.
“Hibayata dai‑ka Ayo tiawane. Fara dai‑ka Ayo ama·oni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ya kahiyare,
“Ayo, tiwa onofa, tiwati onofahari neni.” Ati nemarine.
“Bofe‑ya okemaroni, dai nafi ene okadikabonehe. Yama‑ya mai awaramaro, yama‑ya mai awawahaboneni. Yama‑ya mai ati awamaro, yama‑ya mai awami awiraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Fariseo mai one Yeso ati‑ya mai mita, mai ati yanana,
“Yama oda awaramone tineni?” Mai ati namaroni.
“Yama‑ya dai awara‑mani, dai ene manakone wadara neni. Yama dai awabisamone dai ati na, dai ene manakone wadanasa neni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso mai‑ya kanawatobona mai‑ya hiyare,
“Owati amosabote dai mitahi. Kaneiro mai‑ya mai botebone, awa yara neme‑kaya mai tokiyomateni, kaneiro mai‑ka hidi mai‑ya awarebonaha.
Kaneiro mai‑ka hidi awa yara nokobiri‑kaya tokiyomabisatene.
Kaneiro mai nokobiri‑ya wa‑waa kaneiro mai‑ka hidi‑ya awe, nokobi‑ya seekane, mai‑ka hidi yananeya, kaneiro mai oni‑ya mai‑ka hidi haaneya, hidi‑ya mai tokomakiteni.
Mai nafi fidotona, mai‑ka hidi dai tohe, nowati‑ya mai tokomakiteni, mai‑ka hidi ati‑ya mai wataro.
Bara mai‑ya kaneiro mai tokomakiterani. Bara mai ati‑ya mai watora, mai kananibisateni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Kaneiro mai tamine‑ya Yeso hiyare, ati‑ya mai watoramaroni.
Yama‑ya mai watowahabone, mai‑ya hiyaramatase,
“Owati amosabote dai mitahi. Kaneiro mai‑ka awa yara nokobiri ama·oni.
Hibati‑ya mai kobona yama‑ya mai bo‑boti mai toha, kaneiro mai‑ya mai haana, mai ati‑ya kaneiro mai nofarameteni.
Awa yara nokobiri ama·oni. Owa‑kaya mai tokiyomiya, mai sibaraboneni. Mai yobiniya, mai tafaboneni.
Yama‑ya mai bo‑boti kaneiro mai tabori‑ya mai kakiya,
‘Awa yara bai onahabiya, kaneiro o·idiya, kaneiro onahababoneni.’ Mai atibodi ati teni.
Kaneiro mai abarabone, mai tabori‑ya okemaroni. Mai ya‑yaini nafebone, mai tabori‑ya okemaroni.
Kaneiro mai‑ka hidi amosabote ama·oni. Oka kaneiro mai abarabone, o·ababisiya, yama sibaraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Ai owa‑ka kaneiro mai‑ya ai owa nawade, kaneiro hidi tohare, yomahi yama‑ke kaneiro mai‑ya kakiya, kaneiro mai‑ya nawade kananeya, yomahi yama‑ke kaneiro mai‑ya kananihi, mai fawateni.
Hika yama anini manakone‑ya nokotonibise, kaneiro mai‑ya nofare, bani hame koboneya, kanatene.
Kaneiro mai‑ka hidi amosabote ama·oni. Oka kaneiro mai owato, owa‑ya mai watohari nineni.
Okobi owato, owa‑ya watohari ne. O·ababisaboneni, oka mai hasinabonehe.
Mai tabori one‑ya oka kaneiro mai one toha, mai onakamaboneni. Owati‑ya mai mitaboneni. Oka kaneiro mai one‑ya mai yoro·okanihebone, mai‑ya na‑nawada owa hare boneni.
O·abiya, yama sibarini, okitamatasabone ona, fara ihi Okobi owa‑ya nofi nafine.

Owa‑ya mai ati nanahaba, mai‑ya owati bariraboneni. Mai‑ya owati bariniya, owa‑ya mai nanahabi awiraboneni. Owati aba, o·aba, owati kitama, okitama onaboneni. Okobi ati‑nima owa ene naboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya oda‑ka hidi mai mita, mai ibi weenamatasa,
“Yeso ka‑kana amane. Madi towe foye ene ati amane. Ati dai nofarayaho.” Mai one ati nihi,
“Madi towe sawi‑ke haa‑nima ai ene terani. Madi towe ai owa noko‑ya kasomaterene.” Mai one ati nihi namaroni.
Deoso‑ka yobe awawami hawa tohemata tamine‑ya oda kadikabone, Yerosare‑ya oda marinamaroni.
Sire bofe‑ya oda marinamaroni. Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso yakane, yobe webote fowari‑ya Saromaho‑ka yobe waari, fare‑ya Yeso yakanemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya oda‑ka hidi mai mitabone, mai yorotokana,
“Yeso, tiwati amosahi. Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika amatini, tiwa tamine oda‑ya tikaminahi.” Mai ati namaroni.
“Hibati‑ya owa tamine‑ya dai‑ya okamina, owati dai nofarani. Owa ene kitabote dai awakarini? Okobi ene owa ene kitabote tohani.
Oka kaneiro dai tohara ihi owati dai nofarani.
Oka kaneiro mai owatoni. Owati‑ya mai nofa, owa‑ya mai tokomakiteni.
Okobi oda oharineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya oda‑ka hidi mai mita, yati‑ya mai one yabamaroni, Yeso‑ya mai nanahababonehe.
“Deoso ene owa ene amosa, owa ene kitabote amani. Owa ene dai awamaro, owa‑ya dai ati nanahabi‑ka dai yofikanahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Tiwa ene amosa sibarini. Oda owa amatini. ‘Deoso ama·oni.’ Tina, hini tiwati ihi tiwa oda nanahababoneni, yati‑ya.” Mai ati namaroni.
“‘Deoso dai‑mone oneni.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati na,
Deoso‑ka yama hani keyehe‑ya hiriterani. Bofe‑ka mai‑ya Deoso hiyaremata, deoso dai‑mone Deoso ati nematamonane.
Okobi owa‑ya kayawe, owa‑ya yosemarine, bofe‑ya okebonehe.
‘Deoso Bidi ama·oni.’ Ona.
Owati kasiramone dai ati neni, dai yawaro. Hini yamata ihi dai yawiti?
Deoso ene‑nima owa ene ra‑mani, owati dai nofariya, yama sibara neni.
Deoso ene‑nima owa ene nibisa, owati dai nofara, owa ene dai nofabisahi. Okobi oda famateni. Owa ene dai nofiya, Okobi oda‑ya dai watowahaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ya mai watabone, hiniya Yeso tokemarine.
Yodaho Faha‑ya Yeso berenawahe, hibati‑ya i‑di Yowaho mai‑ya habanirisa‑mari‑kaya toke, winawahemarine.
Yeso‑ya mai dama mai kamake,
“Yowaho Batita ene kitare, Yeso tamine‑ya hiyare, fare ati‑nima Yeso nane.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yeso ati‑ya mai dama mai nofawahamaroni.
Betaniya‑kaya Rasaro hika adi mai fama mai eyehe winemarine. Rasaro‑ka adi oni i‑di Maata toha, one oni i‑di Mariya toha namaroni. Rasaro kiyane, kaforimatane.
Hibati‑ya Rasaro‑ka adi i‑di Mariya Yeso‑ya yama mahi amosa‑ya sorokasa, hini tati kone‑ya Yeso teme‑ya tamonamaroni.
Rasaro‑ka adi mai fama, mai‑ka da‑daba‑ya mai yose,
“Yeso sibatinahi. Tiwasiya, eya tiyahi.
‘Ayo, tinofi nafi kiyanene.’ Tiyahi.” Mai ati nameteni.
Rasaro tamine‑ya Yeso mite,
“Rasaro hasinebonane. Rasaro kiyane ene Deoso ene amose‑ya mai awa, Deoso Bidi ene amose‑ya mai awahari naboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
I‑di Maata, i‑di Mariya, i‑di Rasaro, mai na, Yeso mai‑ya nofi nafimarine.
Rasaro kiyane tamine‑ya Yeso mite, tokomaki kanibote ni awiremarine. Oda wini‑kaya oda amoni famamakemaroni.
Makobote Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda‑ya hiyare,
“Yodeya‑ya ai tokahi.” Ati nemarine.
“Ayo, tiwa amoni fa‑famaraba niya, ai‑ka hidi tiwa‑ya mai ati nanahaba, Yodeya‑ya tikamariyahi.” Oda ati namaroni.
Yama soki‑ya ai yakana, ai sonateni, yama wahi awiraro.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ai‑ka naki, i‑di Rasaro amone, mowa·okanabone okomakeboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ayo, Rasaro amone, kitameba awane.” Oda ati namaroni.
Rasaro abe tamine‑ya Yeso hiyare, ati oda watoramaroni.
Tamine hikamini amosawahe,
“Rasaro abane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Rasaro abe ene owa ene dai awabone, owati dai nofabone, fara ya‑yai·oneni. Hima, ai tokomakihi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Yeso ai dabahi. Yeso abeya, ai abahareboneni.” I‑di Tome ati nemarine.
Tome oni owa i‑di Didimo tohane.
Rasaro wini‑kaya oda tokawaha, yama yakari‑ya tamine Yeso himite,
“Rasaro oda nafoye mahi 4 kanane.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yerosare yakari‑ya Betaniya toha, 3 kirometoro tohani.
Yerosare‑ya mai wi‑wina mai one dama mai tokomakemaroni, i‑di Maata, i‑di Mariya, mai fama, mai‑ya mai kasomabone mai‑ka soho tabiyo mai ohinaro.
Yeso kaki tamine‑ya i‑di Maata mita, tokamaroni. Mariya‑ta yobe‑ya towitakosameteni.
Yeso‑ya Maata hiyara,
“Ayo, oda tabaro‑ya tisawe‑mani, oka soho abare nane.
Deoso haatiniya, tiwati‑nima Deoso nebonane.” Maata ati namaroni.
“Tika soho kitamebonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Hehe, yama faina‑bone‑ya ai kitamiya, oka soho kitamaharibonane.” Maata ati namaroni.
Owati‑ya mai no‑nofa yama kome fawaterabone‑kaya mai sawiteraboneni. Maata, owati tinofiraniha?” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Hehe, Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika amatini. Deoso Bidi bofe‑ya kakibona, yama hani ati na, fara amatini.” Maata ati namaroni.
Hiyari hawa toha, hika yobe‑ya tokiyama, hika asima i‑di Mariya‑ya hiyara,
“Ai‑ya ka‑kanawato‑teno kobone, tiwa‑ya haanene.” I‑di Maata ati nameteni, basanaro.
Hika adi ati‑ya mita, waamisa kanibote na, tokomamaroni, Yeso‑ya.
Mai tabori‑ya Yeso tokomaki awire, hini i‑di Maata kobohine‑ya itarimarine.
Mariya‑kaya mai one nahamaroni, Mariya‑ya mai kasomabonehe. Mariya waamisa kanibote na, tokoma‑ya mai awa, mai tokomake,
“Yati hodi‑ya tokomiya, ohinaboneni.” Mai atibodi ati namaroni.
Yeso itari‑ya Mariya kobona, Yeso yowi‑ya yobati‑kaya itarisa,
“Ayo, ahi‑ya tisawe‑mani, oka soho abare nane.” Mariya ati namaroni.
Mariya ohina‑ya Yeso awe, mai one ohina kamake‑ya awa ne, atibodi a‑arire,
“Ebeni‑kaya Rasaro foyati?” Yeso ati ne,
“Ayo, tikamakihi, tiwa oda yofikanabani.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yeso tokomaki, ohinemarine.
“Rasaro‑ya nofi nafi dai awaho.” Oda‑ka hidi mai one ati nihi.
“Maki noko‑ya kasome, Rasaro‑ya kasome‑mana, Rasaro abare nane.” Mai one ati nihi namaroni.
Rasaro temene‑ya Yeso kobone, atibodi a‑ariremarine. Yati one‑ya hodi‑ya mai barikanamaroni.
“Yati dai karotowitihi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ayo, maho kite awane, mahi 4 kane‑ya abene.” Rasaro‑ka adi i‑di Maata ati namaroni.
“Owati timitara awineni. Owati tinofa, Deoso ene kitabote tiawabone onani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yati‑ya mai karotowite, Yeso tonokomise, ati yanane,
“Abi, owati timita, ya‑yai·oneni.
Owati timitateni. Yama‑ya mai watobone‑ka owati amani. Owa tiyosemaro, owa‑ya mai watowahaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
I‑di Rasaro‑ya haane, ati kite,
“Rasaro tikamahi.” Ati nemarine.
Rasaro kitame, kamemarine. Bora yaba‑ya kinikane, yehe, teme, tati ne, bora‑ya kinikananasa ne, kamemarine.
“Dai kakasawaho, tabaro‑ya tokomebonaha.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mariya‑ya mai kasomabone mai ati na, mai kamake, Yeso ene‑ya mai awa, Yeso ati‑ya mai nofawahamaroni.
Mai one fariseo mai‑ya mai toka, Yeso ene tamine‑ya mai kaminameteni.
Makobote Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, fariseo mai toha, mai na, oda‑ka hidi mai nafi‑ya haane, mai yorotokanameteni, Yeso tamine‑ya mai hiyarabonehe.
“Hini yamata‑nima ai nibati? Yeso ene kitabote‑ya mai dama mai awineni.
Yeso‑ya ai ati barini awiriya, Yeso ati‑ya mai nafi nofawahiya, homano mai‑ka sodado mai kamakiya, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai nanahaba, ai nafi‑ya mai nanahaba naba awineni.” Mai ati nameteni.
Mai‑ka owa Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote i‑di Kaifo ati yanane,
“Yama dai wato awirini.
Ai‑ka mai one dama hidi mai tohara, fara mai nafi abarabone mai‑ka owa ohari abeya, yama sibaraboneni. Ohari abeya, ai dama ai hasinaboneni.” Kaifo ati nemarine.
Hini ati tohi awirene. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote tohe, Deoso ati ene ati yananibisemarine. Yodeo oda toha, oda manakone‑ya Yeso nanahabebona tamine‑ya hiyaremarine.
Yodeo oda manakone‑ya nanahaba, Bara mai manakone‑ya nanahabahari nebonane. Deoso‑ka mai toha, mai nafi‑ya ohariwamebonane.
Oda‑ka hidi Yeso‑ya mai ati nanahabarimanamaroni.
Mai noki‑kaya Yeso tokomare, Eferahi‑ya Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda eyehe winemarine. Kabani yakari‑ya Eferahi tohamaroni.
Ka‑kariwa‑ka mahi koboni yanatoneya, tabora bide dama‑ka Yerosare‑ya mai tokomakemaroni, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑nima yama‑ya mai hawa tonihebonehe.
Yeso‑ya mai sibana, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai naha mai ibi hiyara,
“Ai mariniya, Yeso koboreba awane, hini yamata‑nima dai ati niti?” Mai ati nameteni.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, fariseo mai toha, mai na, Yeso tamine‑ya mai hiyara,
“Yeso dai awiya, tamine dai kaminaho, oda‑ya, oda watebonaha.” Mai ati nameteni.
Oda amoni 6 tohiya Ka‑kariwa‑ya oda marinabone, Betaniya‑ya Yeso oda eyehe tokemarine, Rasaro‑ya nakitame‑kaya.
Yeso kobone ene mai ya‑yaina, mai yorotokanamaroni, mai tafabonehe. Rasaro oda eyehe tafemarine. Oda tefe‑bone‑ya Maata isonamaroni.

Yeso teme‑ya yama mahi amosa‑ya Mariya sorokaremaroni. Yama mahi amosa oni narado toha, manakone fotamaroni. Keneko kari kibe‑nima yama mahi amosa na‑ya Yeso teme‑ya sorokare, tati kone‑ya Yeso teme‑ya tamonamaroni. Yobe nafi‑ya mahi amosa mahi mai hisihinamaroni.
Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda‑ka owa Yeso‑ya daanebona, i‑di Yoda Isikari·oti amane. Fare Mariya ihi‑ya awe, yawemarine.

“Ka! Yama mahi amosa ai daana‑mani, yama sibabisara neni. Mahi amosa ai daana‑mani, yama ai anini mahi 300 kane‑ka manakone‑nima manakone na manakone ai kayafiya, mai‑ka yamata wadara mai‑ya yinero ai daana neni.” Yoda ati nemarine.
Yoda yama‑ya bo‑boti amane. Oda‑ka yinero‑ya Yoda damane, oda‑ka yinero kote‑ya botimarine. Yama mahi amosa‑ya ati daane, hiniya yinero‑ya atibodi kayafabisemarine, mai one‑ya kasomi awirebonane.
“Yoda, tiwati arabanahi. O·ababone, owa‑ya mai nafoyabone, owa‑ya sorokari hawa tohineni.
Yamata mai kihara mai tosiyoteraboneni. Owa sawi yaboraboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Betaniya‑ya Yeso koboni tamine‑ya oda one mai mita, mai dama mai tokomakemaroni, Yeso‑ya mai awa, i‑di Rasaro‑ya mai awahari nabonehe.
“Rasaro abe, Yeso hinakitame ai awamatahi.” Mai atibodi ati namaroni.
Rasaro‑ya mai awa, Yeso ati‑ya mai dama mai nofawahamaroni. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi i‑di Rasaro‑ya mai ati nanahabaharemaroni.
Ka‑kariwa ihi Yerosare‑ya mai dama mai nahamaroni. Mahi owa‑ya Yerosare‑ya Yeso toke, tamine‑ya mai dami mita,
mai tokomake, kosi afe‑ya mai akamaroni.
“Deoso ai kahiyarineni. Deoso tiwa‑ya yose, tiwa‑ya kasomayaho oda ati nineni. Isara·eo oda‑ka hidi webote amatini.” Mai ati na, mai ati kitamaroni.
Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑nima boho yetene‑ya Yeso wasi, boho mese‑ya itarimarine.
“Yerosare‑ya dai wi‑wina dai habo siitoriyahi. Dai‑ka hidi webote‑bona boho yetene mese‑ya itariya, kamakibonane.” Deoso‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Yama hani ati‑ya oda ati kadamowamamaroni. Yama hani ati oda wato kanibote ra, Yeso kitami hawa toheya, yama hani ati oda watowahamaroni.
Rasaro‑ya Yeso nakitame‑ya mai awa, Yeso‑ya mai tokomake, Yeso tamine‑ya mai hiyaranademaroni.
Yeso ene kitabote tamine‑ya mai mita, Yeso‑ya mai tokomakemaroni, Yeso‑ya mai awabonehe.
Mai dami‑ya fariseo mai awa, mai ibi hiyara,
“Ka! Yeso ai ati barinabone ai ati na, ai ati barihini awire, Yeso‑ya mai dami tokomake, mai dai awahi.” Fariseo mai ati namaroni.
Yerosare‑ya Yodeo oda marinabone, Kereko mai one sawemaroni, Deoso‑ya mai kahiyarabonehe.
Firibi‑ya Kereko mai toka,
“Naki, Yeso oda hiyaraboneni.” Mai ati nameteni.
Firibi tabaro Besaida Karireya‑ka tohemarine.
Anidere‑ya Firibi hiyare, Firibi eyehe Anidere toke, Kereko mai tamine‑ya Yeso‑ya mai kaminamaroni.
‘O·abi‑ya yama sibarini.’ Dai ati nibisa,
dai abateraboneni.
Owa‑ya dai narifabone dai ati na, owa ene‑nima dai ene nahi. Owa‑ya dai narifa osawi‑kaya dai sawebone, Okobi dai‑ya kahiyarebonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Owatibodi a‑arira,
‘Abi, owa tikasomahi, o·abaraboneni.’ Oni awirani, hini o·ababone okemaroni.
Abi, tiwa ene amosabote‑ya mai awahi.” Yeso ati ne,
neme‑ya ati kaki,
“Owa ene amosabote‑ya mai awamaro, owa ene amosabote‑ya mai awamatasaboneni.” Neme‑ke ati nemarine.
Mai dama mai naha, neme‑ya ati mai himite,
“Bahi ati amanakani.” Mai one ati nihi,
“Deoso‑ka yo‑yose Yeso‑ya hiyare awane.” Mai one ati nihi namaroni.
“Ati omitebona ati tohi awirane. Ati dai mitebona ati yananibisane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Owa‑ya mai nawaaniya, mai nafi haa·onabone, oka mai tohawahabonehe.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Awa‑ya Yeso abebona hini tamine‑ya kaminane.
Mai dama, mai one ati yanana,
“Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika koboneya, hidi tohatebona Deoso‑ka yama hani ati na, hini yamata‑nima ai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke mai nawaanabone tina, hini yamata‑nima ai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke tohati?” Mai ati namaroni.
Yama wahi tohasa na dai nofahi. Yama wahi dai nofiya, yama wahi‑nima dai naboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Hiyari hawa tohe, tokome, hini‑ya kemomarine.
Yeso ene kitabote‑ya mai awi dama, Yeso ati‑ya mai nofasa ramaroni.
Mai tamine‑ya Isa·iya kanahano,
“Deoso, tiwati okamina, ai ati‑ya mai nofarani. Tiwa ene kitabote mai‑ya yofi·okana, tiwa ene‑ya mai nofi awisarani.” Isa·iya ati nematamonane.
Haa‑nima mai teni.
Deoso ati‑ya mai nofaterabone, mai tamine‑ya Isa·iya kanahanomatamonane.

“Yama‑ya mai awa, Deoso hini ati ene yama‑ya mai watora, tamine mai himite, Deoso hini ati ene tamine mai hiwatorane. Mai ihi‑maro‑nima mai ihi namariya, mai‑ya Deoso kasomane.” Isa·iya ati nematamonane.
Hibati‑ya Yeso amosabote‑ya Isa·iya awe, Yeso tamine‑ya kanahanomatamonane.
Yeso ati‑ya mai dami nofa, Yeso ati‑ya oda‑ka hidi mai dama mai nofahare, hini mai tamine‑ya mai kamini awirani.
“Oda tamine‑ya oda kaminiya, fariseo oda‑ya mai kakoya, Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya oda sawimaraboneni.” Mai atibodi ati namaroni.
Ai one ati‑ya mai nofi ba‑basi na, Deoso ati‑ya mai nofi bi‑bidi neni.
Yeso ati yanane, ati kite,
“Owati‑ya mai no‑nofa owa‑ya yose‑mari ati‑ya mai nofaharineni.
Owa‑ya dai awa, owa‑ya yose‑mari dai awahari neni.
Yama wahi‑nima oneni. Owati‑ya mai no‑nofa yama soki‑ya mai yakanamarabone ihi okemaroni.
Owati‑ya mai mita, owati‑ya mai tokadabara, mai‑ya wee·orani. Mai nafi okasomabone, okemaroni.
Owa‑ya mai nofara, owati‑ya mai nofaharira, mai ihi manakone wada, yama faina‑bone koboniya, hini mai ihi manakone‑ya mai kayafaboneni.
Owati yanana, owa ene owati yanarani. Okobi owa‑ya yose‑mari ati okaminabisineni.
Okobi ati‑ya dai tokadaba dai abateraboneni. Okobi ati okamine, dai abarabonehe.” Yeso ati nemarine.

Yeso bofe‑ya sawimarebona, Badi‑ya tokoma kanibote nebona, hini tamine‑ya watomarine. Bofe‑ya oda wi‑wina Yeso‑ka oda toha, oda‑ya Yeso nofemari, oda‑ya nofi fawaterene. Ka‑kariwa‑ya oda marinabone, oda tafi yanatonamaroni.
Simaho Isikari·oti bidi i‑di Yoda, Diaboro ati ene Yeso‑ya daanebona, atibodi hawa tohe, mesa‑ya oda nahori hawa tohamaroni.
“Okobi ati ene yama nafi‑ka hidi ama·oni. Deoso‑ya yana·onamaro, okoma kanibote onaboneni.” Yeso atibodi ati nemarine.
Oda tafiya, Yeso waamise, bora neme‑ya taninise, towaya‑ya idi, dosi‑ya sokinakimarine.
Faha wiye‑ya faha‑ya soronise, oda teme‑ya sokone, towaya‑ya oda teme‑ya tamonemarine.
Simaho Bedoro teme‑ya sokonebona,
“Ayo, owa teme sokotibana?” Bedoro ati ne,
“Hehe, soko·onaboneni. Owa ene tiwatora, yama one‑ya owa ene tiwatowahaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Owa teme sokotiraboneni.” Bedoro ati ne,
“Tiwa teme soko·oriya, oka tiharaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Se, Ayo, owa teme, owa yehe, owa tati na sokotinahi.” Simaho Bedoro ati nemarine.
“Ai afini hawa toha, ai‑ka yobe‑ya ai kama, ai teme ai sokokawama, ai afinamarani. Dai atibodi amosi hawa toha, dai‑ka owa atibodi amosi awirane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yoda ene‑bona‑ya wato, fare oda owa atibodi amosi awire tamine‑ya kaminemarine.
Oda teme‑ya sokoni hawa tohe, bora neme‑ya weyename, hini fori‑kaya toforime,
“Dai teme soko·ona, owa ene dai watoneni?
Owa‑ya dai ayo nineni. Dai‑ya ka‑kanawato owa‑mone dai ati na, dai ati‑nima oneni.
Dai‑ya okanawata, dai‑ka Ayo ama·oni. Dai teme soko·oni‑nima dai ibi teme sokoniyahi.
Owa ene‑nima dai ene niyahi.
Owati amosabote dai mitahi. Ai‑ka hidi ati kitabise, ai ati kiti bi‑bidi teni. Ai‑ya yose ati kitabise, ai ati kiti bi‑bidi teni.
Owati dai watoya, dai tokadabiya, dai ya‑yainaboneni.
Dai nafi tamine ohiyari awirini. Dai‑ya okayawa, dai owatoni. Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑nima yama naboneni.
‘Owa tefe‑ya ka‑kaba owa‑ya kahabanebonane.’ Yama hani ati nineni.
Owa‑ya daani awisareya, tamine okamine, owa‑ya daaneya, owa‑ya dai watowahaboneni. Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika ama·oni, owati dai nofaboneni.
Owati amosabote dai mitahi. Hiyose ati mai hinofeya, owati‑ya mai nofahariteni. Owati‑ya mai nofiya, owa‑ya yose‑mari ati‑ya mai nofahariteni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Hiyari hawa tohe, atibodi a‑arire, ati yananamatase,
“Owati amosabote dai mitahi. Owa‑ya dai‑ka owa daanebonane.” Ati nemarine.
Yeso ati oda mita, oda ibi noko awa,
“Ka! Ebeni‑ke tohabati? Yeso‑ya daanebonaha.” Oda atibodi ati namaroni.
Yeso‑ka no‑nofa ama·oni. Yeso yowi‑ya oforemaroni.
Owa‑ya Simaho Bedoro yehe haane,
“Yeso haatinahi
‘Ebeni‑ke tiwa‑ya daanabati?’ Tinahi.” Bedoro ati nemarine.
Yeso bako‑kaya oforiwite, Yeso ohiyara,
“Ayo, ebeni‑ke tiwa‑ya daanabati?” Onamaroni.
“Baho kote daba·okaniya, fare‑ya baho daa·onaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Baho kote‑ya dabatokane, Simaho Isikari·oti bidi, i‑di Yoda‑ya baho‑ya daanemarine.
Baho‑ya Yoda waratoneya, atibodi‑ya Satanasi sawiwahemarine.
“Yoda, tiwa ene‑bone toha kanibote nahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Oda sookare Yeso ati oda watoramaroni.
Yoda oda‑ka yinero‑ya da‑dama ene oda one atibodi yama‑ya dika,
“Oda mariniba‑ka yamata‑ya kanikeba awane. Yamata mai kihara mai‑ka yinero‑bona‑ya daaneba awane.” Oda one atibodi ati namaroni.
Baho‑ya Yoda damane, tokemarine, yama soki‑ya.
Yoda nowati‑ya Yeso ati yanane,
“Hibayata dai‑ka Ayo neme‑ke ene amosabote‑ya mai awawahaboneni. Owa ene Deoso‑ya mai kahiyari ba‑basi naboneni.
Owa ene Deoso‑ya mai kahiyari ba‑basi niya, Okobi ene owa‑ya mai kahiyari ba‑basi nahareboneni. Okobi ene toha kanibote nebonane.
Oka dao mai‑nima dai na, dai‑ya owa sawi nafimaraboneni. Owa‑ya dai sibanaboneni. Dai‑ka hidi mai ohiyarimaro‑nima dai ohiyarineni. Okomiya, dai tokomaki awiraboneni.
Owati dai mitahi. Dai ibi nofiyahi. Dai onofi‑nima dai ibi nofiyahi.
Dai ibi nofiya, oka dai toha dai‑ya mai nafi watowahaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ayo, ebeni‑kaya tikiboneti?” Simaho Bedoro ati ne,
“Oki‑kaya tikamaki kanibote tini awiraboneni. Yama one‑ya tikamakiteboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ayo owati tokomaki kanibote nineni. Tiwa‑ya okasoma ihi o·abi‑ya yama sibaraboneni.” Bedoro ati nemarine.
“Dai atibodi yama‑ya dikariyahi. Deoso ati dai nofiyahi. Owati‑ya dai nofahari, dai nahi.
Okobi tabaro‑ya yobe damane. Dai‑ka yobe‑ba hawa·onihebone okomaboneni. Dai‑ka yobe‑ba awire‑mana, hibati‑ya dai ohiyara neni.
Okomiya, dai‑ka yobe‑ba hawa·oniya, okomatasaboneni. Okomatasiya, dai‑ya owakamaboneni, owini‑kaya dai winawahabonehe.
Oki‑bone‑ka hawi dai watoneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ayo tiki‑bone‑ka tabora oda watora, hini yamata ihi hawi oda watorihi?” Tome ati nemarine.
“Deoso tabaro hawine ama·oni. Deoso ati yokana ka‑kamina ama·oni. Ai abarabone‑ka yama da‑daa ama·oni. Owati‑ya mai tokadabara, Okobi‑ya mai koboteraboneni.
Hibati‑ya owa‑ya dai wata‑mani, Okobi dai watohare neni. Hibayata Okobi dai wato, Okobi dai awa, dai neni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ayo, Abi yofitikanahi, oda ya‑yainabani.” Firibi ati nemarine.
“Firibi, dai‑ya osawi yaba, owa dai wato awirini. Owa dai awiya, Okobi dai awaharineni. Abi yofitikanahi tiriyahi.
Okobi oda famateni. Owati yanana, owa hare owati tohi awirini. Okobi oda fama oda ati tohateni. Owa ene dai awa, owa ene tohi awirini. Okobi oda fama oda ene tohateni.
Okobi oda famateni ona, owati dai nofiyahi. Owati dai nofariya, owa ene dai nofabisahi. Okobi ene kitabote‑nima owa ene nineni.
Owati amosabote dai mitahi. Owati mai nofiya, owa ene‑nima mai ihi nawahaboneni. Okobi‑ya okomiya, Okobi ene mai ihi kitawahaboneni. Owa ene kiti bi‑bidi namaro, mai ihi kiti ba‑basi naboneni.
Yama onofa‑nima yama na dai nofa, owa‑ya dai haaniya, dai ati‑nima onaboneni. Owa ene‑ya mai awa, Deoso‑ya mai kahiyaraboneni.
Yama onofa‑nima yama na dai nofa, owa‑ya dai haaniya, dai ati‑nima onaboneni.
Owa‑ya dai nofiya, owati dai tokadababoneni.
Okobi haa·onaboneni. Dai‑ya ka‑kasoma‑bona‑ya Okobi daanebonane, dai‑ya dabatebonaha.

Deoso‑ka Doni Deoso ati yokana‑ya ka‑kamina amane. Bofe‑ka Deoso‑ka Doni‑ya mai awarihi, Deoso‑ka Doni‑ya mai watorihi na, fara ihi mai hinofarebonane. Dai‑ta Deoso‑ka Doni dai‑ya dabe, dai‑ya foyawahebonane.
Dai‑ka abi wadamare‑nima dai ni awirabone, dai‑ya okomatasaboneni.
Ai amoni fa‑famaraba niya owati‑ya mai nofara, owa‑ya mai awamaraboneni. Owa‑ya dai awabisaboneni. Okitama, hasi·oni‑nima dai hasinaboneni.
Okobi oda famini, oka dai toha ai ohariwamabone, fara okitamiya dai wataboneni.
Owati‑ya mai mita, owati‑ya mai tokadaba, owa‑ya mai no‑nofa mai amani. Owa‑ya mai nofa Okobi mai‑ya nofane. Owa‑ya mai nofa, mai onofahari ona, owati ihi owa‑ya mai wataboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ayo, hini yamata‑nima mai ihi na, mai one tiwa‑ya watorabone tina, tiwa‑ta tiwa oda watobisabone tinaro?” Yoda owa ati nemarine.
Yoda Isikari·oti ati tohi awiremarine.
“Owa‑ya mai no‑nofa, owati‑ya mai tokadababoneni. Owati‑ya mai tokadaba mai‑ya Okobi nofebonane. Okobi oda fama mai wini‑kaya oda winaboneni.
Owa‑ya mai nofara owati‑ya mai tokadabaterani. Hini owati tohi awirani, Okobi owa‑ya yose‑mari oda fama oda ati amani.
Dai‑ya osawe, yama tamine okaminineni.
Owati ihi Okobi hika Doni‑ya yosebonane. Dai‑ya kanawatoya, ati ene owati nafi‑ya dai atibodi watinawamaboneni. Deoso‑ka Doni dai‑ya kasomebonane.
Dai habo siitoni awiraboneni. Bofe‑ka dai‑ya mai ati kasomabone mai kitara, mai ati‑nima owati ni awirini, owati ihi dai habo siitoraboneni. Dai atibodi yama‑ya dikariyahi. Dai habo siitoriyahi.
‘Okomabone, wini·onamatasaboneni.’ Ona,
Okobi‑ya okomaboneni. Owa‑ya dai nofa‑mani, dai ya‑yaina neni. Okobi amosabotebisa amane.
Okomi awisa oriya, owa tamine okamina, owa nowati‑ya owati dai nofaboneni.
Okobi onofa, Okobi ati‑nima oteni. Bofe‑ka owa ene‑ya mai awiya, owa‑ya mai watowahaboneni. Hima ai tokomahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ofa ade amosabote‑nima ona, ofa‑ya na‑nawada‑nima Okobi nane.
Ofa mate‑ya mohi yanamake, bonora‑ya Deoso tiinakose, ini yaba kote‑ya Deoso tiinakosaharitene, ofa boni damawahabonehe.
Ofa ini kote‑ya Deoso tiinakose‑nima dai na, owati dai mita, dai ene amosawahineni.
Owa dai nokotoniyahi. Owa dai nokotoniya, dai okasomaboneni. Ofa ini ade‑ya waanamariya, bonoteraboneni. Dai‑ya okasomariya, dai ene amosa wadateraboneni.
Ofa ade‑nima ona, ofa ini‑nima dai na, owa dai nokotoniya, ofa ade‑ya ini waana‑nima dai na, dai‑ya okasomaboneni. Dai‑ya okasomara‑mani, dai ene amosa wadara neni.
Owa‑ya mai nokotonira, ofa ini waanamara‑nima mai teni. Ofa ini wayatoniya, yifo‑ya mai werehiwititeni.
Owa dai nokotonihi, owati dai tokadaba, dai niya, yama dai haana‑ya Deoso daanebonane.
Dai ene amosa, dai bona‑nima dai nineni. Dai bono nafiya, dai ene‑ya mai awiya, oka dai toha dai‑ya mai watowahabone, Deoso ene amose‑ya mai awaboneni.
Okobi owa‑ya nofi‑nima dai‑ya onofineni. Owati dai tokadabahi, dai‑ya owa nofi fawaraboneni.
Okobi ati okadaba, Okobi owa‑ya nofi fawarebonane. Owati dai tokadabiya, Okobi owa‑ya nofi faware‑nima dai‑ya onofi fawa·oraboneni.
Tamine okamine, ya‑yai·oni‑nima dai ya‑yainabone, dai ya‑yaini nafeboneni.
Owati dai mitahi. Dai onofi‑nima dai ibi nofiyahi.
Maki hika no‑nofa mai abarabone ababiseya, hika no‑nofa mai‑ya nofi nafine, mai one mai‑ya mai nofi bi‑bidi nibisineni.
Owati dai tokadaba, oka no‑nofa dai amani.
Hidi‑ka yo‑yose mai‑ya hini tamine‑ya kaminaterene. Oka no‑nofa dai amani. Okobi ati nafi‑ya dai‑ya okaminateni. Oka yo‑yose dai tohamaro, oka no‑nofa dai tohawahineni.
Owa‑ya dai kadikara, dai‑ya okadikabisa, dai‑ya oyosemaroni, dai bonabonehe, dai ene amosa fawarabonehe. Yama onofa‑nima yama na dai nofa, yama dai haana‑ya Okobi daanebonane.
Dai ibi nofiyahi, onani.
Bofe‑ka dai‑ya mai kaka, dai atibodi yama‑ya kadikariyahi. Owa‑ya mai kako dai tohamaroni.
Bofe‑ka dai toha‑mani, dai‑ya mai nofa neni. Hini mai one‑ya mai nofateni. Dai okadikamaro, bofe‑ka dai tohamara, dai‑ya mai kakoteni.
Owati‑maro‑ya dai ati kadamowamariyahi. Owa‑ya mai bisinamaro dai‑ya mai bisinamakeboneni. Owati‑ya mai tokadaba dai ati‑ya mai tokadabahareboneni.
Owa‑ya yose‑mari‑ya mai watora, owa‑ya mai nofi awirani. Fara dai‑ya mai bisinaboneni.
Deoso ati okamini awira‑mani, mai ihi manakone wadara neni. Deoso ati okaminabisamaro ene mai manakone wadineni.
Owa‑ya mai kako, Okobi‑ya mai kakohari nineni.
Owa ene kitabote‑ya mai awara‑mani, mai ihi manakone wadara neni. Owa ene kitabote‑ya mai awa, owa‑ya mai kako, Okobi‑ya mai kakohari nineni.
‘Hiniya owa‑ya mai kakoneni.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati na,
ati‑nima mai ihi nineni.
Deoso‑ka Doni Deoso ati yokana‑ya ka‑kamina amane. Okobi‑ya okomiya, dai‑ya kasomebona oyoseya, dai‑ya koboneya, owa tamine‑ya kaminebonane.
Owa hiyari yanakani‑ya owa dai dabamaro, owa tamine dai kaminahari, dai nahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Yama kobonabone tamine okamina, owa hawine‑ya dai yakaniya, dai maakaraboneni.
Dai‑ya mai ati barinaboneni, Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya dai tokiyomamarabonehe. Dai‑ya mai nanahabiya,
‘Oda ene Deoso ya‑yainane.’ Mai atibodi ati naboneni.
Okobi‑ya mai watora, owa‑ya mai watoharira, oda‑ya mai watora ihi dai‑ya mai kakaboneni.
Hibati‑ya dai‑ya odaba, mai tamine okamina kanibote oramaroni. Hibayata mai tamine okamina, dai‑ya osawimi awiri‑ya owati dai watinawamaboneni.
Owa‑ya yose‑mari‑ya okomatasabone ona,
‘Ebeni‑kaya tikiboneti?’ Dai ati ni awirani.
Okomabone ona, hiniya dai atibodi ohina‑nima nineni.
Owati amosa dai mitahi. Okomariya, dai‑ya ka‑kasoma‑bona kami awirebonane. Okomiya, dai‑ya ka‑kasoma‑bona oyosemaboneni.
Koboneya, bofe‑ka mai ihi tamine‑ya kanawatobonane. Mai ihi amosara toha, mai ihi amosawamabone toha, mai ihi‑ya Deoso kadikebona toha ne, tamine‑ya mai‑ya kanawatowahebonane.
Deoso Bidi ati‑ya mai nofara mai ihi amosara, mai ihi tamine‑ya Deoso‑ka Doni kaminebonane.
Okobi‑kaya okomiya, owa ene mai awamariya, owa ene‑nima mai ihi nabone tamine‑ya Deoso‑ka Doni kaminebonane.
Bofe‑ka mai‑ka hidi Deoso hikadiki hawahinihi, hini ene manakone wade tamine‑ya Deoso‑ka Doni mai‑ya kaminebonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Hibayata yama dama tamine okamini awirabone, yama nafi okaminiya, yama dai watomaraboneni.
Deoso‑ka Doni Deoso ati yokana‑ya ka‑kamina koboneya, Deoso ati nafi‑ya yofikanebonane. Hini ati ene ati yanani awirebona, yama himita‑ya kaminabisebonane. Yama nabone tamine‑ya kaminebonane.
Ati ene owa ene amosa dai watowahaboneni. Oka yama tamine‑ya kaminebonane.
Okobi‑ka yama nafi toha oka tohahari neni. Deoso‑ka Doni oka yama tamine‑ya kaminebona ona, fara oda fama oda tamine amani.
Dai amoni fa‑famaraba namakiya, owa dai awamaraboneni. Dai amoni fa‑famaraba namakitasiya, owa dai awamatasaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Hini yamata‑nima Yeso ati ne, ati amanati? Yama oda watorani.
‘Dai amoni fa‑famaraba namakiya, owa dai awamaraboneni. Dai amoni fa‑famaraba namakitasiya, owa dai awamatasaboneni.’ Ati ne,
Badi‑ya tokebona ati ne, yama oda watorani.
‘Dai amoni fa‑famaraba namakiya’ Ati ne,
hini yamata‑nima neba ati amanati?” Oda ibi hiyara oda ati namaroni.
Oda ati‑ya Yeso wato, oda‑ya hiyare,
“Owati dai watora awineni.
‘Dai amoni fa‑famaraba namakiya, owa dai awamaraboneni. Dai amoni fa‑famaraba namakitasiya, owa‑ya dai awamatasaboneni.’ Ona,
fara tamine‑ya dai ibi hiyara awineni.
Owati amosabote dai mitahi. Dai yawiya, dai ohinaboneni. Dai ohiniya, bofe‑ka mai ya‑yainibisaboneni. Makobote dai ya‑yainawahaboneni.
Mai fanawi dori wadabone, mai dori kome kitateni. Mai dori wadiya, mai dori kome‑ya mai atibodi watomaterani. Ewe wade ene madi mai ya‑yainibisateni.
Mai fanawi dori kome kita mai‑nima dai nawahabone, dai yawabone, makobote owa dai awamatasiya, dai ya‑yainawahaboneni. Dai ya‑yaini fawaraboneni.
Koboniya, owa‑ya dai haanami awiraboneni. Owati amosabote dai mitahi. Onofa‑nima dai nofa, Okobi dai haaniya, yama dai haana‑ya Okobi daanebonane.
Hibati‑ya Deoso dai haanabone, owa oni‑ya dai hiriramaroni. Oka dai toha Deoso‑ya dai haanahi. Yama dai haana‑ya Deoso daanebonane. Dai ya‑yaini nafeboneni.
Okobi tamine ohiyara, yama bara tamine ohiyarabisa, owati dai wato nafira, yama one‑ya Okobi tamine okamini amosaboneni.
Onofa‑nima dai nofa, owa oni dai hiriniya, Deoso‑ya dai abano haanaboneni. Okobi‑ya dai hiyarabone, owa‑ya dai yosemaraboneni.
Owa‑ya dai nofa, Yeso Deoso‑ka amane dai ati na, fara ihi Okobi dai‑ya nofi nafine.
Hibati‑ya Okobi oda famamaro, dai tabaro‑ya okemaro, Okobi‑ya okomatasaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Tiwati tikahemomara, tiwati oda watowahani.
Yama nafi tiwata, oda atibodi ati tiwato, tiwa oda watowahineni. Deoso‑ya tisawemete, tiwa‑ya oda watowahineni.” Oda ati namaroni.
“Hibayata owati dai nofawahamone dai ati na,
yama nahorabone, fara hibayata dai kananaboneni. Owa dai dabami awirabone, dai tabaro‑ya dai tokomaboneni. Owa hari awirabone, Okobi oda famaboneni.
Yama tamine okamina, owati dai nofiya, dai habo siitoraboneni. Bofe‑ka dai‑ya mai bisinaboneni. Dai habo kitahi. Bofe‑ka mai kiti bi‑bidi, owa kiti nafibisineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Oda‑ya hiyari hawa tohe, neme‑ya tonokomise, Deoso‑ya hiyare,
“Abi, tiwati‑maro‑nima yama yananaboneni. Tiwati ihi owa ene amosabote‑ya mai awahi. Owa ene‑ya mai awiya, tiwa ene‑ya mai watowahaboneni.
Abi, tiwa ene mai nafi‑ka hidi ama·oni. Owa‑ya mai daatinamaro owa ene mai abateraboneni.
Deoso yokana amatini. Deoso owa wadaterene. Yeso Kirisito ama·oni. Owa tiyosemaroni. Ai‑ya mai nofiya, mai abateraboneni.
Tiwati‑maro‑nima ona, owa ene‑ya mai awa, tiwa‑ya mai watowahani.
Bofe‑ba awisari‑ya ai fama ai amosabote ai wehene wadamaroni. Tiwa‑ya osawimatasiya, hini owa wehene wadamaro, owa wehene wadamatasahi.
Abi, tika mai one bofe‑ya wi‑wina, owa‑ya mai daatina, mai‑ya tiwa tamine okamina, tiwati‑ya mai tokadabineni.
Oka yama nafi‑bone owa‑ya daatinamaro, tiwa ene‑ya mai watowahineni.
Owa‑ya tikaminamaro, mai‑ya okaminamakineni. Tiwati‑ya mai nofineni. Tika ama·oni. Owa‑ya tiyosemaro, owa‑ya mai watowahineni.
Owati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai tikasomiyahi. Bofe‑ka mai tamine okamini awirani. Owa‑ya mai daatinamaro, tika mai toha, mai tikasomiyahi onani.
Oka yama nafi toha tika tohahari, tika yama nafi toha oka mai tohahari neni. Owa‑ya mai watowahini.
Owa‑ya mai daatinamaro mai‑ya osawe, mai onawada, tika hawi‑ya mai yakana mai maakara, mai abarani. Mai‑ka owa ohari ababisane. Fara, tiwati‑ya mai kanahanamaro mai ati‑maro‑nima yama nawahaboneni.
Tiwa‑ya okomabone, bofe‑ya winasa ona tiwa ohiyara, owati mai mitiya, mai ya‑yaini nafiwahaboneni. Ya‑yai·ona‑nima mai ya‑yainaboneni.
Abi,
‘Hibayata mai tiwakamahi.’ Oni awirini.
Bofe‑ya mai winasa na mai tikasomahi, Satanasi ati‑ya mai nofarabonehe.
Bofe‑ka mai‑ka owa ohara, oka mai toha bofe‑ka mai‑ka one mai tohahari awirini.
Abi, mai tikayawahi, tiwati yokana‑ya mai nofabonehe.
Bofe‑ka mai‑ya owa tiyosemaro‑nima bofe‑ka mai‑ya mai oyosemakineni.
Mai manakone onahababoneni, tika mai tohabonehe.
Owa‑ya mai da‑daba mai tamine ohiyara, makobote mai ati mai one hinofawahabone mai tamine ohiyarahari neni.
Abi, tiwati ihi mai nafi oharihi. Ai‑ka mai toha ai ohari‑nima mai oharihi. Ai nafi oharihi. Mai ihi‑ya mai one awiya, owa tiyosemaro owa‑ya mai watowahaboneni.
Owa‑ya tisawi mai‑ya osawi ona, mai nafi ohariwamabonehe. Mai ihi‑ya mai one awiya, owa‑ya tiyosemaro, owa‑ya mai watowahaboneni. Owa tinofi‑nima oka mai tinofahare, mai‑ya mai watowahaboneni.
Abi, owa‑ya mai daatinamaro, owa‑ya mai sawebone, mai‑ya owatibodi kobonineni. Yama nafi ai wamani awisari‑ya owa‑ya tinofi nafe, owa wehene‑bone daatinamaroni. Owa wehene‑ya mai awiyahi.
Abi, amosabote amatini. Bofe‑ka tiwa‑ya mai watora, tiwa owatobisineni. Owa tiyosemaro, owa‑ya oka mai watowahineni.
Mai‑ya tiwa yofi·okanamaro, tiwa yofi·okateboneni. Tiwa‑ya mai wato, owa tinofi nafe‑nima mai ibi nofabone, mai‑ya osaweboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Hiyari hawa tohe, oda toka, Sedero faha‑ya oda berenawaha, Sedero kowani‑kaya awa bono bodi‑ya Yeso oda tokamaroni.
Oda toki‑bone‑kaya i‑di Yoda Isikari·oti watomarine. Hibati‑ya Yeso oda daba oda yobinamaroni.

Yoda sodado mai eyehe kamakimarine. Fariseo mai‑ka yo‑yose mai toha, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi‑ka sekorasa mai toha, mai na, mai sawinamaroni. Nabarina‑ya mai one aka, farao‑ya mai one aka, awa‑ya mai one aka, yima‑ya mai one aka namaroni.
Yeso mai ihi‑bone‑ya wato, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Ebeni‑ke dai watibati?” Ati nemarine.
“I‑di Yeso Nasare‑ke oda wataboneni.” Mai ati na,
“Fara ama·oni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yoda mai‑ya dabemarine, Yeso‑ya kahabaneri.
“Fara ama·oni.” Yeso ati ne,
ati ene mai bari‑kaya mai sonamaroni.
“Ebeni‑ke dai watibati?” Yeso ati namatase,
“I‑di Yeso Nasare‑ke oda wataboneni.” Mai ati namaroni.
“Fara ama·oni ona, owa dai watiya, oka mai dai arabanahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai hasinabone ati yanane, hibati‑ya ati‑nima yama nabone ihi ati yanane,
“Oka mai‑bone owa‑ya mai daatinamaro, mai hasineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Simaho Bedoro yima‑ya nawaane, yima‑ya sobanaki, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote‑ya na‑narifa narabo kanika‑ya tarinabasemarine. Hidi‑ka yo‑yose oni Maoko tohemarine.
“Bedoro, tika yima foyamahi, hini bori‑ya. Owa‑ya yama kobonabone Okobi ati nemari, ati‑nima onaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Sodado mai toha, mai‑ka hidi mai toha, oda‑ka hidi mai‑ka sekorasa mai toha, mai na, Yeso‑ya mai waratona, Yeso mano‑ya mai sokikasamaroni.
Kaifo‑ka koma i‑di Anasi tohe‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso‑ya mai towakamamaroni. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote i‑di Kaifo tohemarine.
Hibati‑ya i‑di Kaifo oda‑ka hidi mai‑ya hiyare,
“Ai‑ka mai one dama hidi mai tohara, fara mai nafi abarabone mai‑ka owa ohari abeya, yama sibaraboneni.” Kaifo ati nemarine.

I‑di Simaho Bedoro oda fama Yeso nowati‑ya oda towakamakemaroni. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote‑ka yobe fowari barikani nafi doro‑ya oda kobokana, Yeso‑kaya okomake, i‑di Bedoro nokobi‑kaya waabisemarine. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote owatomarine.
Bedoro nokobi‑ya waamaki, nokobi‑ya okomatasa, atona nokobi‑ya se‑seekana ohiyara, owati ihi nokobi‑ya seekana, Bedoro kamakimarine.
Bedoro‑ya atona hiyara,
“Maki‑ya mai da‑daba mai‑ka owa amatiraniha?” Atona nokobi‑ya se‑seekana ati na,
“Ofamaterene.” Bedoro ati nemarine.
Yama sire ihi yifo widi‑ya mai nahobasamaroni. Hidi‑ka yobe‑ya mai na‑nawada mai toha, oda‑ka hidi‑ka sekorasa mai toha, mai na, mai eyehe Bedoro wai, yifo‑ya hiwanemarine.
Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai tamine toha, hini ati tamine toha ne, tamine‑ya mai‑ka hidi webote mitebona, Yeso‑ya hiyaremarine.
“Owati‑ya mai nafi mitani. Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya mai okanawata, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai okanawata, mai yorotokana mai okanawatoteni. Mai noki beheri‑ya owati yanaterani.
Owa haatiriyahi. Owati‑ya mai mita, mai dai haanibisahi, owati‑ya mai kaminabonehe.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya mai‑ka sekorasa owa mite, Yeso noko‑ya batanari,
“Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote ai hiyara, haa‑nima ai hiyariterani.” Ati nemarine.
“Owati kasiramone tina, owa tamine tikaminahi. Keyehe‑ya hiri·oni awirini, owa‑ya batatiriyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso yehe sokikasanasa neya, Anasi ati ene Kaifo‑kaya mai hiwakamemarine. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote i‑di Kaifo tohemarine.
Simaho Bedoro yifo‑ya hiwane wai‑ya owa ati yanane,
“Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba mai‑ka owa amatini.” Ati ne,
“Yeso‑ya ofamaterani.” Bedoro ati nemarine.
Makobote Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote‑ka sekorasa narabo Bedoro tarihibase‑ka naki ati yanane,
“Awa bono bodi‑ya maki‑ya tisawe, tiwa oawani.” Hidi‑ka yo‑yose ati nemarine.
“Owa tohi awirani.” Bedoro ati ne,
ati fawaneya, arakawa haanemarine.
Homano mai‑ka hidi tabaro‑ya Yeso‑ya mai towakama, yama wahabisari‑ya mai kobonamaroni. Ka‑kariwa‑ka mai‑ka marina‑ka semana hawa tohara, mai marinamatasabone,
“Yara mai‑ka yobe‑ya ai tokiyomariyahi. Ai tokiyomiya, ai towe tohariyahi.” Mai atibodi ati na,
Homano mai‑ka yobe‑ya oda‑ka hidi mai tokiyomaramaroni. Yeso‑ya sekorasa mai towakiyomabisamaroni.
Birato‑ka nokobi‑kaya mai naha, mai‑ya Birato tokomaki,
“Hini yamata‑nima maki ene nati?” Birato ati ne,
“Maki ati kasiro awire‑mana, tiwa‑ya oda kakamare nane.” Mai ati namaroni.
“Dai‑ka yama hani ati‑nima dai bisinaho. Owa‑ya dai haariyahi.” Birato ati nemarine.
“Oda ati hinahababise, oda kitara, oda ati ene ai owa‑ya mai nanahabaterani.” Mai ati namaroni.
Birato hika yobe doro‑ya tokiyamatase, ati ene Yeso‑ya mai kakama, ati yanane,
“Yodeo mai‑ka hidi webote amatiraniha?” Birato ati nemarine.
“Ebeni‑ka mai ati tohiti? Mai one ati toha, hini tiwati toha na awineni?” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Yodeo ohara, hini tika mai one, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi tiwa‑ya owa‑ya mai daaneni. Hini yamata‑nima tina, tiwa‑ya mai daaniti?” Birato ati nemarine.
“Neme‑ka hidi webote ama·obisani. Bofe‑ka hidi oha‑mani, oka yo‑yose mai one‑ya mai bisina neni, owa‑ya mai watarabonehe. Bofe‑ka hidi webote oharani.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Hidi webote amatiraniha?” Birato ati ne,
“Hehe, hidi webote ama·oni. Deoso ati yokana okaminabone, bofe‑kaya okemaro, owada onamaroni. Deoso ati yokana‑ya mai no‑nofa owati‑ya mai tokadabateni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Deoso ati yokana owatoterani.” Birato ati ne,
tokome, Yodeo mai‑ya hiyare,
“Yeso ene towe tohi awirene.
Dai‑ka owa barikane Ka‑kariwa‑ya dai ati ene ohari see·okatene. Yodeo dai‑ka hidi webote‑ya dai ati kobona awineni.” Birato ati nemarine.
“Fare‑ya oda ati koboni awirini. Barabasi‑ya oda ati koboneni.” Mai ati namaroni.
Hibati‑ya mai‑ka yama‑ya Barabasi bo‑boti tohematane.
Birato ati ene Yeso‑ya sodado mai kosini kitameteni.
Makobote hidi‑ka sabewa‑nima na‑ya sodado mai kemona mado atona‑ya, Yeso tati‑ya mai nawitare, hidi‑ka bora a‑asabina‑ya Yeso‑ya mai weyenihi nameteni.
Yeso‑ya mai yasina,
“Yodeo mai‑ka hidi webote amatini.” Mai ati na,
mai ati dama, Yeso‑ya mai batanameteni.
Yodeo mai‑ya Birato hiyarebona mai‑ya tokomatase,
“Owati ihi Yeso‑ya mai kakamaboneni. Yeso ene towe tohi awirene, Yeso dai aweya, owati dai nofaba awineni.” Birato ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ya mai kakama, Yeso tati‑ya yama atona wamani itare, bora a‑asabina‑ya weye nemarine.
“Dai awaho.” Birato ati nemarine.
Yeso‑ya mai awa, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, mai‑ka sekorasa mai toha, mai na, mai ati kita,
“Awa‑ya baakanaho. Awa‑ya baakanaho.” Mai ati namaroni.
“Dai towakamabisaho. Awa‑ya dai baakanaho. Yeso ene towe tohi awirane.” Birato ati nemarine.
“Mose‑ka yama hani ati oda tokadabateni. Deoso Bidi‑mona ati ne, keyehe‑ya hirine, fare Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑nima Yeso oda nanahababoneni.” Mai ati namaroni.
Deoso Bidi‑mona tamine‑ya Birato mite, habo siitone,
hika yobe‑ya tokiyame, Yeso‑ya hiyare,
“Ebeni‑ya tiwa tabaro toha titi?” Ati ne,
Yeso ati yanarematane.
“Hini yamata ihi tiwati yanarihi? Okitateni. Tiwa owati seekaniya, tiwa‑ya mai seekana, tiwa owati baakaniya, tiwa‑ya mai baakana naboneni.” Birato ati nemarine.
“Deoso ati ene tohare‑mana, tiwati kitara neni. Tiwa ene towe bi‑bidi neni. Tiwa‑ya owa‑ya mai daana mai ihi towe nafibisineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati‑ya Birato mite, Yeso‑ya seekanebona mai‑ya hiyaramatasemarine. Yodeo mai ati kita,
“Yeso seetikaniya, Sesa‑ka tihamaraboneni. Ai‑ka hidi webote i‑di Yeso‑mona ati ne, ati ene Sesa yawebonane.” Mai ati namaroni.
Mai ati‑ya Birato mite, ati ene Yeso‑ya mai kakama, hidi‑ka kadera‑ya Birato itarimarine. Fara hidi‑ka kadera kawari‑ka oni ‘yati baki’ toha, Yodeo oda toha oda‑ka oni ‘kabata’ tohamaroni.
Ka‑kariwa‑ka yama ai hawa tonihebone‑ka mahi, 6 ora tohamini‑ya Birato mai‑ya hiyare,
“Dai‑ka hidi webote dai awaho.” Ati ne,
“Abaho. Abaho. Tiwati ihi awa‑ya baakanaho.” Mai ati na, mai ati kitamaroni.
“Dai‑ka hidi webote baakanebona dai ati na awineni.” Birato ati nemarine.
“Oda‑ka hidi webote i‑di Sesa tohe, owa wadarane.” Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai ati namaroni.
Mai ati‑ya Birato tokadabe, sodado mai‑ya yosemarine, Yeso‑ya mai baakanabonehe.
Sodado mai ati ihi Yeso hini ewene‑bona‑ya diwane, adami‑ya tokemarine. Adami oni, ‘ai tati tone wai’ toha, oda ati‑ya adami oni “Kokota” tohani.
Adami‑ya Yeso kobone, awa‑ya mai baahikanemarine. Awa one‑kaya mai fama mai‑ya mai baakana, Yeso fowari‑kaya mai demekana, mai bai‑ya Yeso kawemarine.
Birato ati ene yama hani‑ya mai kanahana, Yeso ewene‑ya yama hani‑ya mai kanawaana,
“Yeso Nasare‑ke, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi webote amane.” Yama hani ati namaroni,
Oda ati‑ka yama hani toha, homano mai ati‑ka yama hani toha, Kereko mai ati‑ka yama hani toha neni. Yerosare yakari‑ya Yeso‑ya mai baakana, Yodeo mai dama yama hani‑ya mai kadikamaroni.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi, Yodeo mai toha, yama hani‑ya mai kadika, mai yawa, Birato‑ya mai hiyara,
“‘Yodeo mai‑ka hidi webote amane.’ Yama hani ati na,
sobatikanahi.
‘Yodeo mai‑ka hidi webote‑mona ati ne.’ Fara tikanahanomakibisahi.” Mai ati namaroni.
“Yama hani one okanahanomakiraboneni.” Birato ati nemarine.

Awa‑ya Yeso‑ya mai nawaani hawa tohiya, Yeso‑ka bora mese‑ka‑ya sodado mai 4 kana bora ibe‑ya mai ebekanamaroni. Sodado mai‑nima mai‑ka bora ibe oharirina‑ya mai kayafamaroni. Yeso‑ka bora one yaba dasikara hasinamaroni.
“Bora yaba ai sibiriyahi. Hiniya yati bide ai wereniya, ai owa ohari bora‑ya kayafeya, yama ai wataboneni.” Sodado mai ati namaroni.
Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑nima yama nawahani.
“Oka bora‑ya mai ebekana, yati bide‑ya mai wereneni, oka bora one‑ya mai kayafabonehe.” Deoso‑ka yama hani ati na,
fara ati‑nima sodado mai ihi nawahamaroni.
Yeso madi toha, madise toha, Kobasi fadi i‑di Mariya toha, Mariya Madarena, mai na, Yeso kawe yakari‑ya oda nahamaroni.
Yeso‑ka no‑nofa ama·oni. Yeso madi yowi‑ya owaa, oda‑ya awe, madi‑ya hiyare,
“Ami, tika dao amane, hari.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Owa‑ya hiyare,
“Tika ami amani, haro.” Ati nemarine.
Oka yobe‑ya Yeso madi sawiwahamaroni.
Yama nafi hawa toha, fara Yeso hiwata, ati yanane,
“Owa bako hokoni.” Ati nemarine, Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑nima yama nabonehe.
Fino kofate kahafa‑ya kawita, yama kitara‑ya fino kofate‑ya sorone, isobo ini‑ya dasihinakosa, yorihikamisa, Yeso iridi‑ya hidinemarine.
Fino‑ya to‑tomine,
“Yama nafi hawa tohini.” Ati ne,
tati winarise, abemarine.
Deoso‑ka feriado amosabote yananabone, feriado‑ka yama hawa tohi‑bone‑ka mahi toha,
“Deoso‑ka feriado‑ya awa‑ya mai aboi waanariyahi.” Oda‑ka hidi mai atibodi ati na, Birato‑ya mai tokamaroni.
“Birato, awa‑ya mai waana tiwati ihi mai isi‑ya mai bakatokanihi, mai mai soba kanibote hinabonehe.” Mai ati namaroni.
Birato ati ene Yeso fowari‑kaya mai waanikima, mai isi‑ya sodado mai bakatokanihemaroni.
Yeso abe‑ya mai awa, Yeso iso‑ya mai bakatokanibisaramaroni.
Yeso abo fowari bodi‑ya sodado idemarine, wabise‑ya, ama faha‑ya fama tokafodamaroni.
Yeso tamine‑ya Deoso hiyarematamonane.
“Tone bakatoterebona.” Deoso‑ka yama hani ati na, ati‑nima nawahane.
“Maki‑ya mai idi‑ya mai kiihinebonane.” Deoso‑ka Yama hani one ati na,
fare Yeso fowari bodi‑ya mai idawahineni.

Makobote Yose Arimateya‑ke Birato‑ya tokematane. Yeso ati‑ya nofe, oda‑ka hidi mai‑ya nayofine, hini tamine‑ya kamini awiremarine. Fare Yeso abo‑ya haanemarine, hikamebonaha. Birato ati sibare, Yeso abo‑ya towakamemarine.
Yose Arimateya‑ke Nikodimo‑ya famemarine. Fare hibati‑ya yama soki‑ya Yeso‑ya hiyaremarine. Mira aroe‑ya daba‑ya kakamemarine, Yeso abo‑ya ketehebonaha. Yama ke‑ketehe dama, 33 kiro tohamaroni.
Yeso abo bora wefe wamani‑ya mai kinihikane, bora‑ya yama ke‑ketehe sawemeteni. Ai owa abeya, haa‑nima Yodeo oda ene teni.
