Yeso mai baakani yakari‑ya fadara toha, fara‑ya ai temene‑bone‑ka yati hodi mai wamahinamete, hibati‑ya ai abo foyarameteni.
Deoso‑ka feriado koboni yanatona ihi ahiyata‑ya Yeso abo‑ya mai nafoyameteni.
Domiko yama wahi awisari‑ya Mariya Madarena bosana, yati hodi‑ya toka, yati hodi barikara‑ya awameteni.
Yeso‑ka no‑nofa ama·oni. Simaho Bedoro oda fama, oda‑ya Mariya kanani kama, oda‑ya haana,
“Ai noko beheri‑ya ai‑ka Ayo abo‑ya mai towakamanini.” Mariya Madarena ati namaroni.
Yati hodi‑ya oda towakamamaroni, oda famaro.
Oda kanani towakama, owa kanani kitabisa, owa koboni dai tohamaroni.
Moi·owite, bora wefe wamani oawa, okiyomaramaroni.
Simaho Bedoro yoto, kobonamaki, yati hodi‑ya tokiyome, bora wefe wamani fore‑ya awe,
bora one Yeso tati‑ya mai kinihikana‑ya awa nemarine. Yeso tati‑ya bora mai kinihikana, modokani amosa, ahiyata‑ya foremaroni.
Okiyamake, bora honita owa, Yeso kitame owatomarine.
Yeso kitamebona tamine Deoso‑ka yama hani‑ya sawi, tamine yokana oda watosa rene.
I‑di Bedoro oda fama, oda tabaro‑ya oda winitokanamamaroni.
Yati hodi yowi‑ya Mariya waa, ohina, moinisa, yati hodi‑ya kiina,
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai fama bora sawa‑ya mai weyenikima mai‑ya Mariya awameteni. Yeso abo hibati‑ya fori‑kaya mai demenare, Yeso teme kafori‑kaya owa itari, Yeso tati fori‑kaya owa itari nematane.
I‑di Mariya‑ya mai haana,
“Sima, hini yamata ihi ohitina?” Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai ati na,
“Owa noko beheri‑kaya Okoyo abo‑ya mai towakamanini.” Mariya ati nameteni.
Mariya kiinawama, Yeso kitame‑ya awa,
“Bare amane.” Atibodi ati namaroni.
“Sima, hini yamata ihi ohitina? Ebeni‑ke sibatiniti?” Yeso ati ne,
“Fadara‑ya na‑namosa amane.” Mariya atibodi ati na,
“Ayo, Okoyo tiwakameya, owa‑ya yofitikanahi, owakamebonane.” Mariya ati nameteni.
“Mariya.” Yeso ati ne,
ati ene Mariya kiinimisa, Yeso‑ya watowaha,
“Haboni.” Mariya ati nameteni.
Dai ati‑ya,
“Oda‑ya ka‑kanawato amatini.” Ai ati teni.
“Hibareya owa damatiriyahi. Okobi‑ya okomi awisa orani. Oka soho mai‑ya tikamiya, mai tihiyarahi.
‘Ai‑ka Abi‑ya okomabone, ai‑ka Deoso‑ya okomaboneni. Ati nene.’ Tiyahi.” Yeso ati nematane.
Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda‑ya Mariya Madarena kama,
“Ai‑ka Ayo oawani!” Mariya ati na, makobote Yeso ati‑ya kaminamaroni.
Oda‑ka hidi mai oda nayofina, Domiko yama soki‑ya yobe doro‑ya Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda yorotokana, nokobi oda barikana, Yeso oda teberi‑ya fodoki,
“‘Deoso, dai‑ya kasomayaho.’ Oneni.” Ati nemarine.
Hiyari hawa tohe, yehe‑ya yofikana, fowari bodi‑ya yofikana nemarine. Oda‑ka Ayo oda awa, oda ya‑yaini nafemaroni.
“‘Deoso dai‑ya kasomayaho.’ Oneni.
Okobi owa‑ya yosemari‑nima dai‑ya oyosewahineni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Makobote oda‑ya foowane,
“Deoso‑ka Doni dai‑ya foyawahebonane.
Mai amosara mai‑ya dai ati somawamariya, Deoso mai‑ya ati somawamaharirebonane. Mai‑ya dai ati somawamiya, Deoso mai‑ya ati somawamaharibonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Oda 12 toha oda‑ka owa i‑di Tome tohe, Yeso kobonameya, oda‑ya sawiremarine. I‑di Tome oni owa, i‑di Didimo tohemarine.
“Tome, ai‑ka Ayo oda awani.” Oda ati na,
“Yeso yehe‑ka birako ihi oawiya, owa yehe yori·onisa, fowari bodi‑ka ihi oawiya, owa yehe yori·onisa oniya, dai ati onofaboneni.” Tome ati nemarine.
Mahi 8 kane‑ya i‑di Tome oda‑ya sawi, oda yorotokanamatasa, nokobi oda barikana, Yeso oda teberi‑ya fodomakitase,
“‘Deoso dai‑ya kasomayaho.’ Oneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Tome‑ya Yeso hiyare,
“Owa yehe hodone‑ya tiwa yehe yoritinisa, owa fowari bodi‑ya tiwa yehe yoritinisa tinahi. Okitamaramone tiwatibodi ati namariyahi. Okitama, owa tamine tinofahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Oka Ayo amatini. Oka Deoso amatini.” I‑di Tome ati nemarine.
“Okitama, owa abano tiawa, owa tamine tinofawahineni. Owa kitami‑ya mai awara, hiniya owa tamine‑ya mai nofa, mai‑ya Deoso kasomebonane.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ene kitabote damemari, Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba ene oda awe, ene nafi okanahano awirene.
Yeso ene kote okanahano, Yeso tamine dai nofebonaha. Yeso i‑di Kirisito amane. Deoso Bidi amane. Tamine dai nofeya, Yeso ene dai abaraboneni.
Makobote Tiberiyadi wara webote widi‑ya Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba Yeso oda awamatasamaro tamine okaminaboneni.
Simaho Bedoro toha, Tome Didimo toha, Natanaeo toha, Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba oda one fama, okoyo oda fama, oda na, oda yorotokanamaroni. (Natanaeo tabaro Kana Karireya‑ka amani.)
“Faha koro·omatiya.” Simaho Bedoro ati ne,
“Ai dabahi.” Oda ati namaroni.
Kanawa‑ya oda foya, yama soki‑ya tahafa oda werenaba, oda honita tohamaroni.
Yama wahabisari‑ya faha widi‑ya Yeso wai, oda awa,
“Bare amane.” Oda atibodi ati namaroni.
“Madehe, fai aba mai‑ya?” Yeso ati ne,
“Aba mai awirani.” Oda ati namaroni.
“Dai ka‑kanika‑ya tahafa dai wereniya, aba mai dai waseboneni.” Yeso ati ne,
ati‑nima oda na, aba mai dama mai ihi tahafa kanaha, oda kakidiramaroni.
Simaho Bedoro yama‑ya anine, bora neme‑ya weyeremarine. Yeso‑ka no‑nofa ama·oni. I‑di Bedoro ohiyara,
“Ai‑ka Ayo amane.” Ona,
owati‑ya mite, bora neme‑ya weyename, faha‑ya bokemarine, Yeso‑ya tokebonaha.
Faha widi yakari, metoro 90 toha‑ya oda tohamaroni. Kanawa oda orinibisa, tahafa‑ya aba mai oda horokanamaroni. Yeso wai‑kaya oda towakamaroni.
Faha widi‑ya oda kobokaniya, yifo toha, aba mai tabasini toha, baho toha na, yama nafi hawa toha oda awamaroni.
“Aba mai dai nawase mai one dai kakamakihi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Kanawa‑ya Simaho Bedoro tokomatase, tahafa kiba oda horoni marosamaroni. Aba webote 153 mai toha, tahafa‑ya mai foya, mai kanaha, tahafa abara, sibitoni awira ihi, “Ka!” Owatibodi ati namaroni.
“Ai tafahi.” Yeso ati ne,
Yeso oda nayofina,
“Ebeni‑ke amatiniti?” Oda ati ramaroni.
Oda‑ka Ayo oda wato hawa tohemarine.
Baho‑ya oda‑ya Yeso daane, aba mai‑ya oda‑ya daanamakimarine.
Yeso kitami hawa tohe, oda awi 3 tohemarine.
“Simaho, Yoaho bidi amatini. Owa tinofi nafero, mai one owa‑ya nofi bi‑bidi na awineni?” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Ayo, tiwa onofa, owa tiwatoneni.” Bedoro ati nemarine.
“Oka kaneiro bidi mai tinatafahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
“Simaho, Yoaho bidi amatini. Owa tinofi nafineni?” Yeso ati namatasemarine.
“Ayo, tiwa onofa, tiwatoneni.” Bedoro ati namatasemarine.
“Oka kaneiro mai tikasomahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Bedoro‑ya hiyaramatase,
“Simaho, Yoaho bidi amatini. Owa tinofiraniha?” Ati namatasemarine.
Yeso ati yanani 3 tohe ene Bedoro ati yawe,
“Ayo, yama nafi tiwatoneni. Tiwa onofa, owa tiwatoneni.” Ati nemarine.
“Oka kaneiro mai tinatafahi.

Owati amosabote dai mitahi. Yetene tihiya, tika bora sakotina, tiwati toki‑kaya tikameteni. Makobote bote tihiya, tiwa yehe daatowitikimabone, bora‑ya tiwa‑ya mai sakonihebone, tiwati toki nofariya tiwa‑ya mai towakamaboneni.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Bedoro‑ya mai nanahababone mai tamine‑ya Yeso kaminemarine. Bedoro abe ene Deoso‑ya mai kahiyarabone ati ne, ati amane.
“Bedoro owa‑ya tisawihi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Mai fama mai towaka, okomake, i‑di Bedoro kiinawame, owa‑ya awemarine. Yeso‑ka no‑nofa ama·oni. Hibati‑ya oda tafi‑ya Yeso bako‑kaya oforiwite, Yeso ohiyara,
“Ayo, ebeni‑ke tiwa‑ya daanabati?” Onamaroni.
Bedoro owa‑ya awe, Yeso‑ya hiyare,
“Ayo, hini yamata‑nima neba ababonati, hari?” Bedoro ati nemarine.
“Oka owa tamine‑ya tiwatibodi kadikariyahi. Okomatasiya, owati ihi oka owa abi awisareya, tiyawariyahi. Owa‑ya tisawiyahi.” Yeso ati nemarine.
Yeso ati tamine‑ya oda one mita,
“Abaterebonane.” Mai ati na,
O·abarabone, Yeso ati ni awire,
“Oka owa tamine‑ya tiwatibodi kadikariyahi. Okomatasiya, owati ihi oka owa abi awisareya, tiyawariyahi.” Yeso ati nibisemarine.
Yeso‑ya oda da‑daba owa ama·oni. Yeso tamine ohiyare, tamine okanahano, owati oda wato, ati yokana tohene.
Yeso ene damemari, ene dami oda kanahano‑mana, yama hani dama neni. Feye amani.
Ti·ofiro, hibati‑ya Yeso tamine tika‑bona okanahano, hika yama anini tamine toha, mai‑ya hi‑hiyara tamine toha ne, okanahanamaroni.
Neme‑ya Yeso tokome tamine okanahano, neme‑ya toki awisareya, Deoso‑ka Doni ene hika yo‑yose mai hikadikamaro, mai‑ya hiyaremonane.
Yeso abe, kitame, mai‑ya kamatase, amoni 40 kane mai‑ya hiyaranadi, kitame‑ya mai watowahineni. Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi‑bona tamine‑ya mai‑ya hiyaremonane.
Mai‑ya yorotokanihi, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Yerosare‑ya dai nahohi. Yama‑ya okobi i‑di Deoso dai‑ya daanebona, dai nimanahi. Hibati‑ya dai‑ya daahinabone tamine okaminamaroni.
Faha‑ya Yowaho mai‑ya habanirisemari, hibayata dai amoni fa‑famaraba ne‑ya Deoso‑ka Doni dai atibodi‑ya sawiwahebonane.” Yeso ati nemonane.
Mai naha, Yeso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Hibati‑ya mai dami‑ka hidi Isara·eo‑ka mai tohamete, hibayata tiwa ene mai‑ka hidi ai tohamatasaba awineni.” Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai ati na,
Mai ati‑ya mite,
“Hibayata yama nabone‑ka mahi dai watora, ai‑ka Abi i‑di Deoso yama‑ya watobise, hini ene yama boneni.

Dai‑ya Deoso‑ka Doni sawiya, dai habo kitawaha, Yerosare‑ya mai wi‑wina, Yodeya‑ya mai wi‑wina, Samariya‑ya mai wi‑wina, tabora dami‑ya mai wi‑wina, mai na, mai‑ya owa tamine dai kaminaboneni.” Yeso ati nemonane.
Hiyari hawa tohe, neme‑ya tokome mai hiwakatome, neme sabi ihi Yeso‑ya mai awami awiramoneni.
Neme‑ya Yeso tokomeya, mai kakatoma, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai fama mai kobona, bora sawa‑ya mai weyenikima, Bedoro mai‑ya mai daba,
“Karireya‑ka dai toha, hini yamata ihi neme‑ya dai kakatoma? Neme‑ya Yeso tokome, kamebonane. Tokomi dai awe, kisami mai hiawebonane.” Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai ati namoneni.
Yeso neme‑ya tokome‑ya Orifera adami‑ya mai naha, Yeso toki hawa toheya, Yerosare‑ya Bedoro mai winitonamamoneni. Yerosare yakari‑ya Orifera adami waineni.

Yerosare‑ya mai kobonama, mai one‑ka yobe tati mese‑kaya mai‑ka yobe waari‑ya mai tokomisama, i‑di Bedoro, Yowaho, Tiyako, Anidere, Firibi, Tome, Batoromeho, Mateo, Aofio bidi i‑di Tiyako, Simaho Seroti, Tiyako sori i‑di Yoda mai na, mai tokomisamamoneni.
Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai toha, Yeso madi i‑di Mariya toha, Yeso sori mai toha, mai fanawi one toha na, mai yorotokana, Deoso‑ya mai hiyaranademoneni.
Mahi owa‑ya mai dama mai yorotokana, 120 mai toha, mai bai‑ya i‑di Bedoro waamise, mai‑ya hiyare,

“Soho, owati dai mitahi! Deoso‑ka yama hani ati‑nima yama teni. Hibati‑ya Deoso‑ka Doni ati i‑di Dafi hikanahanomata, ati‑nima yama nawahani. Yara mai‑ya Yeso‑ya i‑di Yoda daanebona tamine‑ya i‑di Dafi kanahanomata, ati‑nima yama nawahani.
Yoda oda‑ya dabe, oda nafi‑ya Yeso yosemarine.” Bedoro ati nemonane.
Yeso‑ya Yoda daane, yinero‑ya kayafe, hini ene amosare, manakone‑ya fadara‑ya kanike, fara‑ya abo sone, nabadi wakakane, yoto siratokanemonane.
Yerosare‑ya mai wi‑wina Yoda tamine‑ya mai mita, ‘fadara ama toha’ oni mai haahina Akedama tohamoneni.
Dafi‑ka yama hani ati one‑ya Bedoro hiyaratase,
“‘Hika yobe abaho, mai winateri‑bone‑karo. Hika yama anini‑ta ai owa anihinamakibisahi.’ Dafi‑ka yama hani ati nineni, wayoma‑kaya.
Hibati‑ya Yeso ai dabiya, ai‑ya dai dabamaro, ohari ai kadikaho, Yoda‑ka yama anini‑ya aninebonaha.
I‑di Yowaho Yeso‑ya habanirisemari‑ya awa, neme‑ya Yeso tokome‑ya awahari ai haanaho, Yeso kitami tamine‑ya hiyarebonaha.” Bedoro ati ne.
Mai ibi hiyara,
“Hibati‑ya i‑di Yose Basaba Yosito ai‑ya sawi, i‑di Matiya ai‑ya sawi nemari, ebeni‑ke ai‑ya dabamabati?” Mai ati na.
Deoso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Abi Deoso, ai atibodi tiwata, ebeni‑ke oda‑ya dabamabati? Ebeni‑ke‑ya tiwati koboniti?
I‑di Yoda oda‑ya dabemari, hini ene oda‑ya dabamaterebona, abe, madi mai tabori‑ya tokawahe, ebeni‑ke oda‑ya dabawahabati? Yeso‑ka yo‑yose tohebonaha.” Mai ati namoneni.
I‑di Yose, i‑di Matiya mai fama, mai oni‑ya yati bide‑ya mai kanahana, yati bide‑ya mai kisakisa kanana, i‑di Matiya oni yati bide‑ke kaso, Yeso‑ka yo‑yose tohawahemonane.
Yeso abe nowati‑ya mai amoni 50 kanamaki‑ya mai marina, mai marini‑ke mahi oni Benekosi tohe‑ya, Yeso‑ka mai nafi yorotokawamamoneni.
Mai yorotokaniya, neme‑ya moni kaki, yama hakikini kita moni‑nima moni nemonane. Yobe nafi‑ya mai nahore, moni kite, moni mai himitemonane.
Yifo hirini‑nima na‑ya mai awa, mai hiwakatoma, mai‑nima ebekana, yifo nakasiri darikana‑nima ne mai nafi‑ya boyonawahemonane.
Deoso‑ka Doni mai atibodi‑ya sawiwahe, hibati‑ya mai one ati‑ya mai watora, Deoso‑ka Doni ene mai one ati‑ya mai hiyarawahamoneni.
Tabora dami‑ya mai wi‑wina Yodeo mai toha, Deoso‑ya mai kahiyara, Yerosare‑ya mai winawahani.

Yerosare‑ya mai wina, yama hakikini kita moni‑nima moni ne‑ya mai mita, Bedoro mai‑ka yobe‑ya moni kaki, fara‑ya mai nafi toka, mai kobona, mai habi siitona, Bedoro mai ati‑ya mai mita, mai ibi hiyara,
“Ka! Oda ati‑ya mai ati tohawahineni.” Mai one ati nihi,
“Ka! Oda ati‑ya mai ati tohaharineni.” Mai one ati nihi na, fara mai nafi ati namoneni.
“Ka! Haa‑nima yama na ai awatera, Karireya‑ka mai hinama tohani.
Ai‑ta ai ati bara dama toha, hini yamata ihi ai dama ai ati yokana‑ya mai ati‑ya ai mitineniti?

Baratiya‑ka mai ati‑nima ai owa ati nihi, Mediya‑ka mai ati‑nima ai owa ati nihi, Eraho‑ka mai ati‑nima ai owa ati nihi, Mesobotamiya‑ka mai ati‑nima ai owa ati nihi, Yodeya‑ka mai ati‑nima ai owa ati nihi, Kabadosiya‑ka mai ati‑nima ai owa ati nihi, Boto‑ka mai ati‑nima ai owa ati nihi, Asiya‑ka mai ati‑nima ai owa ati nihi,

Firikiya‑ka mai ati‑nima ai owa ati nihi, Banafiriya‑ka mai ati‑nima ai owa ati nihi, Eyito‑ka mai ati‑nima ai owa ati nihi, Ribiya tabora kote‑ya Sireni tabora toha, Sireni yakari‑ka mai ati‑nima ai owa ati nihi, Homa‑ka mai ati‑nima ai owa ati nihi,

Kereta‑ka mai ati‑nima ai owa ati nihi, Arabiya‑ka mai ati‑nima ai owa ati nihi nane. Yodeo ai owa tohe, Yodeo mai‑nima Deoso ai nafi nofineni. Hini yamata‑nima mai na, ai ati nafi‑ya mai watowaha? Deoso ene amosabote tamine‑ya mai kamina, mai ati oda mitawahi neni.
Hini yamata ihi haa‑nima mai nafi ati niti? Haa‑nima yama na, ai awaterani.” Mai ibi hiyara, mai ati namoneni.
“Kawi ihi mai towe toha awini.” Mai one ati na,
mai‑ya mai hahakana mai nahamoneni.
Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai nafi naha, Bedoro ati yanane,
“Tabora dami‑ka dai toha, Yodeo dai toha na, Yerosare‑ya dai wina, owati dai mitahi, yama dai watowahaboneni.
Kawi ihi oda towe toha‑mone dai ati na, mahi kaki dai awahi. Mahi kaki‑ya kawi ihi ai towe tohaterani.
Deoso‑ka Doni ene dai ati‑ya dai oda hiyarineni. Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita‑mata i‑di Yoweo Deoso ene haa‑nima ai ene na‑bone tamine‑ya kanahanomatane.

‘Hidi Webote kobonama‑bona‑ka mahi koboni yanatoneya, Deoso‑ka Doni dai atibodi‑ya sawi, Deoso‑ka Doni ene dai‑ka madehe Deoso ati‑ya mai kaminaboneni. Dai‑ka yetene mai toha, bote mai toha na, wada‑ya owati‑ya mai mitaboneni.
Owa‑ya mai narifa, maki mai toha, fana mai toha na, Deoso‑ka Doni mai‑ya sawiwahe, owa tamine‑ya mai hiyaraboneni.
Neme, bofe na‑ya owa ene‑ya mai awaboneni. Ama nafe‑ya mai awa, yama hirini‑ya mai awa, yifo asawi nafe‑ya mai awa naboneni.
Dai‑ka Hidi koboni awisareya, mahi noko soki toha, abariko noko ama tohe‑nima nihi nebonane. Dai‑ka Hidi koboneya, dai one ya‑yaini nafi, dai one ohini nafi naboneni.
Owati‑ya mai nofa, owa‑ya mai haana, owa ene mai abateraboneni.’ Deoso ati ne,
Ati‑ya i‑di Yoweo kanahanomatane.” Bedoro ati nemonane.
Bedoro mai‑ya hiyaramatase,
“Isara·eo‑ka nodi dai toha, owati dai mitahi. Deoso ene Yeso Nasare‑ke ene dai watoneni. Yeso ene kitabote tohe, ene‑ya mai awa,
‘Ka! Haa‑nima ai ene na ai awaterani.’ Mai ati namaroni.
Deoso ati ene Yeso kaki, dai‑ya winemarine. Yeso dai nanahababone dai‑ya Deoso wato, Bidi‑ya yosemari, dai tabaro‑ya Bidi wine, dai ati kasira ene yara awa‑ya mai baahikane, abemarine.
Yeso abano‑ya temene barikiterene. Deoso ene kitame, hini temene‑ke abano wadamare, abe komene wadamare, abamaterebonane.
Hibati‑ya Yeso tamine‑ya i‑di Dafi kanahanomatane.
‘Oka Hidi oka kanika‑ya sawi, owa‑ya kasome, ene owa habo siitoterani.
Owa habo kita, ya‑yai ohaneni. O·abiya, Deoso ati ene okitamabone owatibodi ati nani.
O·abiya, owa‑ya Deoso kasomebonane. Hika Ka‑kadika hini temene‑ya abano bataterebonane.
Deoso tabaro hawine‑ya owa‑ya yofikanemari, tabaro‑ya owiniya, ya‑yai·onaboneni.’ Dafi‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Oka soho dai toha, owati dai mitahi. Dafi hibati‑ya abemata, temene ahiyata‑ya ite, temene‑ya abano itasa nane.
Dafi Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita‑mata, Deoso ati‑nima yama nabone‑ya Dafi wato,
‘Dafi ti·abiya, owa ene tika nodi Isara·eo mai‑ka hidi tohebonane.’ Deoso ati ne,
ati‑ya Dafi nofematane.
Dafi‑ka nodi Kirisito tohebona, tamine‑ya kanahano, abeya, abano batatere, kitamebona ati nane.
Deoso ene Yeso kitame, kitami oda nafi awemari, tamine oda hiyarawahineni.
Deoso neme‑ya hiwakame, Deoso‑ka kanika‑ya itariwahe, Yeso‑ya Deoso‑ka Doni sawimari, Yeso ati ene oda atibodi‑ya sawiwahe, ene dai ati‑ya oda hiyarawahineni.
Neme‑ya Dafi abano toki awirene, Yeso abano‑ta tokabisane. Dafi‑ka yama hani dai awahi.
‘Oka Hidi‑ya Deoso hiyare, —Oka kanika‑ya tiwitarihi.
Oka kanika‑ya tiwitariya, tiwa‑ya mai ka‑kako, owa ene mai mese‑ya tiwa teme kaforiwahaboneni.— Deoso ati nane.’ Dafi‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Isara·eo‑ka nodi dai toha, yama dai watohi! Yeso dai baakanemari, Deoso ene ai nafi‑ka Hidi tohe, Kirisito amane. Dai ati kadamowamariyahi.” Bedoro ati nane.
Bedoro ati‑ya mai mita, mai atibodi komawaha, Bedoro mai‑ya mai hiyara,
“Oda‑ka ayo dai toha, hini yamata‑nima oda nibati?” Mai ati na,
“Deoso‑ya dai‑ya dai kamina, Yeso Kirisito ati dai nofa, dai oda habanirisiya, Deoso dai‑ya ati somawameya, Deoso‑ka Doni dai‑ya sawiwahebonane.

Fare oda‑ya sawi‑nima dai‑ya sawi, dai‑ka madehe‑ya sawi, yama yaki‑ya mai wi‑wina mai‑ya sawi nebonane. Ai‑ka Hidi i‑di Deoso dai‑ya haane, dai‑ya haani‑nima mai‑ya haaneya, Deoso‑ka Doni mai‑ya sawibona ati nane.” Bedoro ati nemonane.
Bedoro mai‑ya hiyari dame,
“Mai dama mai ihi amosara, mai‑nima dai riyahi.” Bedoro ati nemonane.
Bedoro ati‑ya mai nofa, mahi ohari‑ya 3000 mai kana mai habanisa, Bedoro mai‑ya mai dabawahamoneni.
Mahi‑nima mai yorotokana, mai‑ya Bedoro mai kanawata, Deoso‑ya mai hiyara, mai tafateni.
Bedoro mai ihi‑ya mai awa,
“Haa‑nima ai ene na ai awaterani.” Mai ati na, mai habi siitoneni.
Yeso ati‑ya mai nofa, Bedoro mai‑ya mai daba, mai yorotokana, mai tafabone, mai tafe‑ya mai ebekana, mai nafi tafineni.
Fadara‑ya mai kiha, mai‑ka fadara‑ya mai daana, yinero‑ya mai kanika, yinero‑ya mai ebe, yama bara‑ya mai daana, yinero‑ya mai ebe nineni.

Mahi‑nima Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai yorotokana, Deoso‑ya mai hiyara, tabora‑ya mai tokoma, mai tafe‑ya mai ebena, mai nafi ya‑yainawahani. Yama‑ya mai da‑daa mai ya‑yai, yama‑ya mai kayafa, mai ya‑yai namoneni.
Deoso‑ya mai kahiyaranade, mai ihi amosa, mai‑ya mai dami nofa, mai‑nima Yeso ati‑ya mai one nofamake, mai‑ya mai dabamakineni.
Mahi towitawiti‑ya i‑di Bedoro, i‑di Yowaho mai fama, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Deoso‑ya mai hiyarabone, mai towakamineni.

Deoso‑ka yobe nokobiri amose yakari‑ya maki awa‑ya damakani mai hikame, mahi‑nima yobe nokobiri‑ya mai hina·itaritene. Madi dori‑ya hi‑hiyanemata, yakatere. Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai tokiyoma, mai‑ya haatene, yinero‑ya kayafebonaha.
Mai damahikane, Bedoro, Yowaho mai fama, mai‑ya awe, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai tokiyomabone, mai‑ya haane,
“Oka yinero‑ba dai daanahi.” Ati ne,
Bedoro mai maakanama, maki‑ya mai kiina,
“Oda tiwakatomahi.” Bedoro ati ne,
“Yinero‑ya owa‑ya mai daanaba awineni.” Atibodi ati ne,
mai‑ya kakatomane.
“Barata, oro na, oda kihara, oda haatina, yama oda kihabisa tiwa‑ya daa·onaboneni. Yeso Kirisito Nasare‑ke ene tiwaamisama, yakatinahi.” Bedoro ati nemonane.
Bedoro yehe damahine, hinawaamise, teme, temeribo ne kitawahe,
yoranimise, waane, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai tokiyamake, yakane, yorane, ya‑yaine, Deoso‑ya kahiyarane.
Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai yorotokana, yakane‑ya mai awa, Deoso‑ya kahiyare, ati‑ya mai mitineni.
Deoso‑ka yobe nokobiri‑ya i‑itari kitame‑ya mai awa, mai atibodi yama‑ya kadika,
“Ka! Deoso‑ka yobe nokobiri‑ya i‑itari, yinero‑ya ha‑haa, fare tohakare?” Mai ati na,
Mai atibodi yama‑ya dika, yama‑ya mai watorani.
Deoso‑ka yobe kote oni Saromaho tohe‑ya mai naha, Bedoro, Yowaho mai fama, kitame mai mani‑ya damaneya, mai awa, mai kanani kamakineni.
Bedoro mai‑ya kakatome mai‑ya hiyare,
“Isara·eo‑ka nodi dai toha, hini yamata ihi
‘Ka!’ Dai ati na?
Oda‑ya dai kakatoma? Oda ene, maki yakanemona dai ati na awineni. Oda ene tohi awirini. Yeso ene amane.

Deoso‑ya Yeso na‑narifa, yara mai‑ya dai kahabanemarine, mai baahikanebonaha. I‑di Birato seehikanebona, dai ati barihine mai hinahabemari, ai‑ka idi i‑di Abaraho, i‑di Isaki, i‑di Yako mai na, mai‑ka Deoso hinakitamemarine.
‘Yeso amosabote amane.’ Deoso ati ne,
‘Yeso seetikariyahi, oda nofi awire. Ai‑ya nanahabamari seetikabisahi.’ Dai ati namaroni.
Yeso ai‑ya wamanemata, dai ati ene mai hinahabe, Deoso hinakitame, kitami oda awemarine.
Yeso ati oda nofa, Yeso ene ka‑kakone‑mata kitamawahe. Hibati‑ya ka‑kakone dai wato, Yeso ene kitame wai, dai awaho.
Soho, yama dai watorihi, dai‑ka hidi mai hiwatorihi hina. Yeso Deoso Bidi toharemona dai atibodi ati na, dai nanahabemarine.
Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete Deoso ati‑ya mai kanahana,
‘Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika‑ya mai nakomaboneni.’ Mai ati namete.
Deoso ati‑nima yama nawahani.
Deoso‑ya dai‑ya dai kaminawaha, Deoso dai‑ya ati somawame, dai ene‑ya kadikamaterebonane.
Hibayata dai‑ya kasome, makobote Hika Ka‑kadika i‑di Yeso Kirisito hiyosematasebonane.
Hibayata neme‑ya Yeso wine, hibati‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete Deoso ati‑ya mai kanahano,
‘Yama yanakani‑ya yama nafi amosamete‑nima Deoso ene yama namatasaboneni.’ Mai ati na,
Fara‑nima yama yanatonabone, Yeso kamatasebonane. Deoso ati‑nima yama naboneni.
Hibati‑ya Deoso ati‑ya Mose mitemata, ati yanane,
‘Deoso ati omiti‑nima Deoso ene dai owa ati himitamaki, ati dai mitayaho.
Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita ati mai hinofi awireya, mai ababoneni.’ Mose‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Mose ati‑nima Samo·eo ati ne, ati‑nima Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai nafi ati toha, hibayata‑ke tamine‑ya mai kanahano nameteni.
Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑ka nodi dai toha, dai tamine‑ya Deoso i‑di Abaraho‑ya hiyare,
‘Abaraho, tabora nafi‑ya mai wi‑wina tika nodi mai‑ya kasomebonane.’ Deoso ati nematane.
Deoso Bidi‑ya nakitami hawa tohe, dai‑ya hiyosemi dai hihemarine. Dai‑ya kasomebona, dai ene towe tohamarabonehe.” Bedoro ati nemonane.
Mai‑ya i‑di Bedoro, i‑di Yowaho mai hiyariya, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya na‑nawada‑ka hidi, sadoseo mai toha na, Bedoro mai‑ya mai kamakineni.
Yeso abe, kitame‑nima ai kitamaharebone tamine‑ya Bedoro mai hiyara, mai ati‑ya mai mita, mai yawamoneni.
Yama soki yanatoni‑ya Bedoro, Yowaho mai fama, mai‑ya mai waratona, kadeya‑ya mai mai hibe, kadeya dori‑ya mai amonamoneni.
Bedoro mai ati‑ya mai one mita, Yeso ati‑ya mai nofawaha, maki mai dama 5000 mai kana Yeso ati‑ya mai nofawahamoneni.
Yama wahi one‑ya mai‑ka hidi mai toha, bote mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, mai na, Yerosare‑ya mai yorotokana,
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi i‑di Anasi toha, i‑di Kaifo, i‑di Yowaho, i‑di Aresadiri, i‑di Anasi‑ka mai one toha na, mai eyehe mai yorotokana,
Mai ati ihi i‑di Bedoro i‑di Yowaho mai‑ya mai kakama,
“Oda bai‑ya dai yoronahi. Dai ati oda mitaboneni. Ebeni‑ke ati kite oni dai hirine, maki‑ya dai nakitamiti?” Mai ati na,
Deoso‑ka Doni ene i‑di Bedoro habo kite, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Oda‑ka hidi dai toha, bote dai toha, dai na, owati dai mitahi.
Oda ene amosa, ka‑kakone‑mata oda kasome, kitame tamine‑ya dai haana,
‘Ebeni‑ke ene maki kitamati?’ Dai ati na awineni.
Owati dai mita, Isara·eo‑ka nodi mai nafi owati‑ya mai mitahari na, yama dai watowahaboneni. Yeso Kirisito Nasare‑ke dai ene baakane, Deoso hinakitamemari, fare oni ene maki kitamawahene.
Neme‑ya mai wi‑wina, bofe‑ya mai wi‑wina na, mai ihi tohara, Yeso ohari‑ta ati ai nofa, Deoso‑ka ai tohateni.” Bedoro ati nemarine.
Bedoro, Yowaho mai fama mai habi siitora, mai‑ya mai awa, Bedoro ati‑ya mai mita, mai ibi hiyara,
“Ka! Ai‑ka esikora‑ya mai sawiramaro, hini yamata ihi yama‑ya mai watowaha? Yeso‑ya mai da‑daba tohamaro, yama‑ya mai watowahani.” Mai ati na.
Ka‑kakone‑mata kitame, mai yowi‑ya wai‑ya mai awa, mai‑ya mai hiyarami awiramoneni.
“Dai tokahi.” Mai ati na,
Bedoro ahiyata‑ya mai toka, mai nowati‑ya mai ibi hiyara,
“Ka‑kakone‑mata kitame‑ya Yerosare‑ya mai wi‑wina mai dami awa, Bedoro mai ihi‑nima ai ene ra, mai tamine‑ya keyehe‑ya ai hiriniya, ai ati‑ya mai nofaraboneni. Hini yamata‑nima ai nibati?
Yeso tamine‑ya mai one mitarabone, Bedoro mai ai weeniya, mai kakomeheya, Yeso tamine‑ya mai hiyaramaraboneni.” Mai ati namoneni.
I‑di Bedoro mai mai haahina, mai kakama,
“Yeso tamine‑ya dai hiyaramarihi! Mai dai kanawatomarihi nahi!” Mai ati na,
Mai ati‑ya Bedoro i‑di Yowaho mai mita, mai ati yanana,
“Deoso ati‑nima dai ati ni awirani. Deoso ati oda tokadabarabone dai ati na, dai ati‑ta oda tokadababisabone dai ati na awineni.
Yama oda awa, ati oda mita ne, tamine oda hiyarabisaboneni.” Bedoro, Yowaho mai fama mai ati na.
Mai ati‑ya mai mita, mai atibodi yama‑ya dika,
“Bedoro mai ati ihi ka‑kakone‑mata kitame‑ya mai dami awa, Deoso‑ya mai kahiyarineni. I‑di Bedoro mai ai kosiniya, ai‑ya mai dami weenaba awineni.” Mai atibodi ati na,
I‑di Bedoro, i‑di Yowaho mai‑ya mai hiyara,
“Yeso tamine dai hiyaramatasiya, dai oda bisinaboneni.” Mai ati na,
mai mai seehikana, hini mai tabori‑ya mai towakamineni.
Hibati‑ya ka‑kakone‑mata yakatere, bote tohe, hika faha fowe 40 kana fiyakana, Deoso ene yakanawahemonane.
Mai mai seehikana mai‑ka no‑nofa mai‑ya mai towakama, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi, mai‑ka bote mai toha na, mai ati‑ya Bedoro mai kaminamaroni.
Mai ati‑ya mai mita, Deoso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Abi Deoso, hini tiwa ene neme‑ya wama, wami‑ya wama, faha‑ya wama, faha abe‑ya wama tinameteni.
Hibati‑ya ai‑ka idi i‑di Dafi Tiwa‑ya na‑narifa‑ya Tika Doni hiyare, Tiwati‑ya kaminematane,
‘Hini yamata‑bone Bara mai ati hama? Deoso‑ya mai ati bisina, mai ati honita tohabisineni.
Bofe‑ya mai wi‑wina mai‑ka hidi mai yorotokana, Deoso, Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika ne‑ya mai ati nabohani.’ Deoso‑ka Doni ati ne, ati‑ya Dafi kanahanomatane.
Abi Deoso, Dafi ati‑nima ahi‑ya sidadi‑ya ai wi‑wina i‑di Erodi, i‑di Bonisiyo Birato, Bara mai toha, Yodeo mai toha na, Tiwa‑ya na‑narifa i‑di Yeso tikadikemata‑ya mai kaka, mai yorotokana,
Tiwatomata‑nima mai ihi nawahani. Tika Dao‑ya mai weenabone tinamete, Tika Dao‑ya mai weenawahani.
Abi Deoso, mai ati timitahi. Tiwa‑ya oda na‑narifa, oda‑ya mai bisinabone mai ati na, tiwati oda kamina, oda tikasomahi, oda habo kitabonehe.
Tiwa yehe daatite, mai‑ya tinakitamabonehe. Tiwa ene kita‑ya mai awa, tiwa‑ya na‑narifa amosabote i‑di Yeso tamine oda kamina, yama‑ya mai awaramaro, yama‑ya mai awiyahi.” Mai ati namoneni.
Deoso‑ya mai hiyari hawa toha, mai yorotokani‑ke yobe henene, Deoso‑ka Doni mai nafi‑ya sawi ene Deoso ati‑ya mai kamina, mai habi siitonami awiramoneni.
Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai atibodi fara hinama toha,
“Owa hare oka yama tohi awirini. Ai nafi‑ka yama amani.” Mai nafi ati teni.
Ai‑ka Ayo i‑di Yeso kitami tamine‑ya Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai hiyara, mai ihi kita dama, mai dami‑ya Deoso kasomane.

Mai‑ka yama kaba tosiyora, yobe‑ya mai kiha, yobe‑ya mai daana, yinero‑ya mai kanika, yinero‑ya mai kakama, i‑di Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai‑ya yinero‑ya mai daana, yama‑ya mai kihara, mai‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai kanikateni. Fadara‑ya mai kiha, fadara‑ya mai daana, yinero‑ya mai kanika, Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai‑ya yinero‑ya mai daanamoneni.

I‑di Yose hika fadara‑ya daane, yinero‑ya kanike, Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai‑ya yinero‑ya daanemarine. Refi mai‑ka owa i‑di Yose tohe, tabaro oni Sibe tohe, yara mai‑ka ha‑haa Yose toha, Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai‑ka ha‑haa Banabe toha, ai ati‑ya ‘Ai‑ya ka‑kasoma’ tohene.
Makobote i‑di Ananiya, fadi i‑di Safira‑ya fame, mai‑ka fadara‑ya mai daanamake, yinero‑ya mai kanika,
yinero owa‑ya fadi eyehe kemo, i‑di Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai‑ya yinero owa‑ya i‑di Ananiya daatoname,
“Oda‑ka fadara oda daana, yinero nafi dai kayafahi.” Ananiya ati nane, keyehe‑ya hirineri.
Ananiya‑ya Bedoro hiyare,
“Ananiya, hini yamata ihi keyehe‑ya hiritina? Satanasi ene Deoso‑ka Doni‑ya keyehe‑ya hiritikana, tika fadara manakone kote tikayaha, keyehe‑ya hiritineni.

Fadara tiwatibodi daahiniya, daatina, sibarihi, tiwatibodi daahira, daatira, sibarihi nani. Daatiniya, yinero tikayaha, tika yinero tohatene. Yinero tiwatibodi daahineya, daatine, sibarihi, tiwatibodi daahire, daatire, sibarihi nane. Hini yamata ihi keyehe‑ya hiritina? Owa‑ya keyehe‑ya hiritikani awirineni. Deoso‑ya keyehe‑ya hiritineni.” Bedoro ati nemonane.
Bedoro ati‑ya i‑di Ananiya mite, abo sone, tamine‑ya mai mita, mai kakomehemoneni.
Yetene mai nahomisa, bora‑ya i‑di Ananiya abo‑ya mai katafa, mai hiwakame, mai hikamane.
Mahi toki yanatone‑ya Ananiya abe, tamine‑ya fadi mitara, mai wini‑kaya tokiyamake.
I‑di Safira‑ya i‑di Bedoro hiyare,
“Tiwati omitaboneni. Fadara i‑di Ananiya daahina, fara manakone nafi amaniraniha?” I‑di Bedoro ati ne.
“Fara manakone nafi amani.” Safira ati na,
“Ka! Hini yamata ihi ai‑ka Hidi‑ka Doni‑ya keyehe‑ya dai hirikana? Tika yibote‑ya mai kama, hibayata nokobi‑kaya mai kobonama, tiwa‑ya mai kamamakeboneni.” Bedoro ati nemonane.
Bedoro ati‑ya mita, aba, aboi sona, Safira maki‑ya mai kama, mai kiiyomama, Safira abamake‑ya mai awa, mai hiwakamineni, maki temene fowari‑kaya mai hikamamakebonehe.
Ananiya abe tamine‑ya Yeso‑ka mai mita, mai habi siitona, Ananiya abe tamine‑ya mai one mita, mai habi siitonahari nineni.
Mai kiyana, mai dami‑ya Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai nakitama, mai ihi‑ya mai one awa, mai habi siitona,
“Haa‑nima ai ene na, ai awaterani.” Mai ati namoneni.
Deoso‑ka yobe kote oni Saromaho tohe‑ya Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai yorotokateni.
Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai tamine‑ya mai one hiyara, mai ihi amosa tamine‑ya mai hiyara, mai‑ya mai ati dabi nofarani, mai habi siitonaro.
Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai dodamawaha, mai makidi toha, mai fanawi toha nineni.
Bedoro mai ihi tamine‑ya mai mita, mai kiyana, mai‑ya mai kakama, hawi fowari‑ya mai‑ya mai nawiyineni, Bedoro mai‑ya fiyakaneya, korimari mai‑ya boyonebonaha.
Yerosare yakari‑ya mai wi‑wina, mai kiyana mai toha, madi towe mai‑ya mai foya mai toha na, mai‑ya mai kakama, Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai ihi madi towe mai kanana, mai kiyana mai nafi kitamamoneni.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi toha, sadoseo mai toha na, Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai ihi tamine‑ya mai mita, mai yawa,
Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai‑ya mai waratona, kadeya‑ya mai‑ya mai nafoya,
Yama soki‑ya Deoso‑ka yo‑yose tokomaki, kadeya nokobiri‑ya seekane, Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai fidotona,
“Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai naha, mai dai hiyarabone, dai tokomahi. Yeso ati‑ya mai nofiya, mai manakone ababone, Deoso mai‑ya ati somawamebona tamine dai kaminiyahi.” Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati nemonane.

Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati‑ya mai mita, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai tokoma, yama wahabisari‑ya mai tokiyoma, mai‑ya mai kanawatoneni. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi toha, hidi‑ka mai one toha na, mai yorotokana, Isara·eo‑ka nodi mai‑ka webote mai dami‑ya mai haana, sodado mai‑ya mai yose,
“Kadeya‑ya Bedoro mai foya, mai dai towamakihi.” Mai ati namoneni.
Kadeya‑ya sodado mai towakama, Bedoro mai awira, mai winikanama,
Mai‑ka hidi mai‑ya mai hiyara,
“Bedoro mai awirani. Oda tokoma, kadeya barikani kita, nokobi‑ka sodado mai one naha, oda tokiyamake, kadeya dori honita tohani.” Mai ati na.
Sodado mai ati‑ya mai mita, sodado mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha na, mai ibi hiyara,
“Ka! Ebeni‑kaya mai tokiti? Hini yamata‑nima yama nibati?” Mai ati na.
Mai hiyariya, bare kamaki, ati yanane,
“Kadeya‑ya mai dai nafoya, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai‑ya mai kanawata, mai nahani.” Ati ne.
Ati‑ya sodado mai‑ka hidi mite, hika sodado mai eyehe mai‑ya towamaki,
“Ai ati yawiya, mai dama yati‑ya ai‑ya mai nanahababa awineni.” Sodado mai atibodi ati namoneni.
Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai‑ya sodado mai kakama, mai‑ka hidi mai yorotokana, mai bai‑ya Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai naha, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai‑ya weenawahe,

“Dai hiyari fawanahi. Yeso tamine dai hiyaramarabone oda ati namaro, dai ati fawarani. Yeso oda nanahabamone dai ati na, dai ati‑ya Yerosare‑ya mai wi‑wina mai nafi mitani.” Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi ati nemonane.
Mai ati‑ya Bedoro mai mita, mai ati yanana,
“Dai ati ene oda hiyari maakaraboneni. Deoso ati‑nima oda nibisaboneni.
Awa‑ya Yeso dai baakane, abe, ai‑ka idi mai‑ka Deoso hinakitamemarine.
Deoso ene Deoso‑ka kanika‑ya hina·itari, itarine, ai nafi‑ka hidi toha, ai manakone‑ya nanahaba toha nane. Isara·eo‑ka hini mai tamine‑ya mai kamina, mai‑ya Deoso ati somawamebonane.
Tamine oda hiyare, Deoso‑ka Doni tamine hikaminaharitene. Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadaba, Deoso‑ka Doni mai‑ya sawitene.” Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai ati namoneni.
Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai ati‑ya mai‑ka hidi mai mita, mai yawi kita,
“Mai ai nanahabahi.” Mai ati namoneni.
Mai‑ka hidi owa, i‑di Kamari·eo waamisane, mai‑ya hiyarebonaha. I‑di Kamari·eo fariseo tohe, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya ka‑kanawato tohahari, ati‑ya mai dami nofateni.
“Ahi‑kaya mai tokahi, oda ati‑ya mai mitarabonehe. Mai naho bide tohiya, mai kamaboneni.
Isara·eo‑ka nodi dai toha, dai noko wadahi. Mai‑ya dai ene toha, dai manakone tohahareba awineni.
I‑di Ti·oda tamine dai mitatekarini.
‘Dai‑ka hidi amosabote ama·oni.’ Ati ne,
ati ene 400 mai kana Ti·oda‑ya mai dabamakitasamone, Ti·oda abe, hika mai hinama tohawama, hini mai tabori‑ya mai yama tonamameteni.
Makobote ai dama, ai oni‑ya sodado mai kanahanoya, Karireya‑ke owa i‑di Yoda kaki,
‘Dai‑ka hidi‑bone ama·oni. Owa‑ya dai dabahi.’ Ati ne,
mai hidabawahe, i‑di Yoda abe, mai hinama tohawamatasameteni.
Owati dai mitahi. Hibayata mai dai arabanahi. Ai one ene tohiya, mai ati fawanaboneni.
Deoso‑ta ene toheya, mai ati fawaraboneni. Deoso‑ya dai weeniya, dai ati kasiraboneni.” Kamari·eo ati ne,
ati‑ya mai nofineni.
Kamari·eo ati‑ya mai mita, Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai‑ya mai haana, mai kama, mai‑ya mai bisina, mai‑ya mai saatokasa,
“Yeso tamine‑ya dai hiyaramariyahi. Dai tokahi.” Mai ati namoneni.
Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai toka, mai ya‑yaina,
“Yeso‑nima oda nawaha, oda‑ya mai bisinamakineni.” Mai atibodi ati na.
Mai ya‑yainamoneni.
Mai ati fawara, mahi‑nima Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso tamine‑ya mai one‑ya mai kanawato, yobe owa‑ya mai toka, Yeso Kirisito tamine‑ya mai kamina namoneni.
Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai dodamawaha, mai fanawi bote honita toha, mai tafe‑bone‑ya mai daateni. Kereko mai ati yawawaha,
“Oda‑ka fana bote mai honita waha‑ka yamata‑bone dai daana bi‑bidi, Yodeo dai‑ka fana bote mai honita waha‑ka yamata‑bone dai daana ba‑basi teni.” Mai ati namoneni.
Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai 12 kana, Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai dami‑ya mai yorotokanihe, mai‑ya mai hiyara,
“Deoso ati kamini oda maakaniya, yamata oda daaniya, yama ati kasirani.
Oda‑ka soho dai toha, maki mai 7 kana mai dai kadikahi. Yama‑ya mai wa‑wato mai toha, Deoso‑ka Doni mai‑ya sawi mai toha na, mai dai kadikiya, oda ati ene yamata‑ya mai daanaboneni.
Deoso‑ya oda hiyara, Yeso tamine oda kamina, oda naboneni.” Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai ati namoneni.

Mai ati‑ya mai mita, mai ya‑yaina, mai 7 kana mai‑ya mai kadika, i‑di Tefaho‑ya mai kadiki dai toha, Tefaho Yeso ati‑ya nofi nafi, Deoso‑ka Doni ati‑nima ene ne, Firibi, Bokoro, Nikano, Timaho, Bamena, Nikorao mai na, mai‑ya mai kadikamoneni. Nikorao Bare tohe, tabaro oni Atioki tohemata, Yodeo mai‑ya sawimari, sawine.
Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai‑kaya mai mai hiwakama, Yeso‑ka yo‑yose Deoso‑ya mai hiyara, mai‑ya mai yahi foremoneni.
Mai ihi Yeso tamine‑ya mai dami mita, Yerosare‑ya Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai dodamamaki, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa Yeso ati‑ya mai dami nofa, ati‑ya mai tokadabamoneni.
Yeso ati‑ya i‑di Tefaho nofi nafi, ene kite, ati ene Deoso ene kitabote‑ya mai awa, ati ene mai one kitama, mai teni.

Sireni‑ka mai toha, Aresadiriya‑ka mai toha, Sirisiya‑ka mai toha, Asiya‑ka mai toha, mai na, hibati‑ya mai yaditonamaro mai seekawaha, Yerosare‑ya mai winawaha, Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya mai yorotokana, Tefaho ati‑ya mai mita, mai ati yawa, Tefaho‑ya mai weenawahani.
Tefaho‑ya mai weena, Tefaho‑ya Deoso‑ka Doni sawi ene yama ba‑basi na‑ya wato, ati ene mai ati fawanani.
Mai ati fawana, mai one‑ya mai toka, mai ati ihi Tefaho tamine‑ya keyehe‑ya mai hirina,
“Tefaho ati oda mite, ati amosarene. Mose‑ka yama hani tamine‑ya Tefaho keyehe‑ya hiri, Deoso tamine‑ya keyehe‑ya hiri ne, ati kasiro nafine.” Mai ati namoneni.

Tefaho tamine‑ya mai ati dama, mai ati ihi bote mai toha, Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai toha, mai one toha na, mai ati yawawaha, i‑di Tefaho‑ya mai tonaka, Tefaho‑ya mai waratona, mai‑ka hidi tabaro‑ya mai hiwakamane.
Mai‑ka hidi tabaro‑ya mai kobona, mai ati ihi i‑di Tefaho tamine‑mona‑ya keyehe‑ya mai one hirina,
“I‑di Mose‑ka yama hani‑ya Tefaho keyehe‑ya hiri, Deoso‑ka yobe tamine‑ya keyehe‑ya hiri ne, ati dame, ati oda mitene.” Mai ati namoneni.
“Yeso Nasare‑kaya kakimari tamine‑ya Tefaho hiyare, ati oda mite, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso nanahabebona, ati ene Mose ati bare tohawahebona ati nene.” Mai ati namoneni.
Mai‑ka hidi Tefaho‑ya mai kiina, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose noko‑nima Tefaho noko ne‑ya mai nafi awamoneni.
“Tefaho, mai ati‑nima tiwati nineni?” Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi ati ne,
Tefaho mai‑ya hiyare,
“Okoyo dai toha, okobi dai toha na, owati dai mitahi. Hibati‑ya ai nafi‑ka idi i‑di Abaraho Mesobotamiya‑ya wine, Hara‑ya toki awisareya, Deoso amosabote ati‑ya mitematane.
‘Abaraho, tiwa tabaro tiwini‑kaya tiwinamariyahi. Tika mai‑ta mai winahi, tiwa tabaro yati‑bone‑ya tiwa yofi·okanaboneni.’ Deoso ati nematane.
Kaodeya‑ya wine, yanane, Hara‑ya toke, wine‑ya badi abe, yananamatase, Deoso ene ai wini‑kaya winawahane.
Hibati‑ya ai tabaro‑bone‑ya Abaraho kobone, mai one tabori tohameteni. Abaraho‑ka tabora toharihi, bidi wadarihi neya, Deoso ati‑ya mite,
‘Abaraho, mai tabori nafi tikayahaboneni. Ti·abiya, tika dao mai hikayahamakeboneni.
Tika nodi mai one tabori‑ya mai tokaboneni. Mai one‑ya mai narifi‑ya yama manakone‑ya mai kayafaraboneni. Hiniya mai mai kosihina, faha fowe 400 kana‑ya mai‑ya mai narifaboneni.
Mai‑ya mai na‑narifa, makobote mai ihi okadikiya, mai manakone daa·onaboneni. Owa ene mai‑ya mai narifamarabone, ahi‑kaya mai kama, owa‑ya mai kahiyarawahaboneni.
Abaraho, tika mai sowiri tati atori wisitinakosa, madehe wada amoni 8 kaniya, mai sowiri tati atori wisitinakosa tinahi.’ Deoso ati nematane.

Makobote i‑di Abaraho bidi i‑di Isaki wade, amoni 8 kane, sowiri tati ataro wisihinakose, i‑di Isaki bidi i‑di Yako wadamaki, I‑di Yako bidi mai 12 kana ai‑ka idi mai‑bone mai wadamaki na, mai sowiri tati atori‑ya mai wisinameteni.
I‑di Yako bidi mai‑ka soho i‑di Yose‑ya mai kaka, yara mai‑ya sori‑ya mai daana, Eyito‑kaya i‑di Yose‑ya yara mai towakama, Deoso i‑di Yose‑ya kasomabisematane.

Eyito‑ya kobone, makobote kadeya‑ya foye, Deoso hikasome, yama‑ya Yose wato ene Eyito mai‑ka hidi webote i‑di Yose‑ya nofe, ati ene Eyito mai‑ka hidi bidi i‑di Yose tohawahe, hidi webote‑ka yama‑ya nawadematane.
Eyito, Kanaha na‑ya faha kakira, ai‑ka idi mai tabori‑kaya yamata yanara, ai‑ka idi mai fimemeteni.
Eyito‑ya yamata toha, tamine‑ya i‑di Yako mite, ai‑ka idi mai‑ya yosene, mai tafe‑bone‑ya mai kanikabonehe.
Mai tafe tosiyotasa, Eyito‑ya mai tokomatasa, Eyito mai‑ka hidi bi‑bidi ne mai‑ka soho i‑di Yose tohe‑ya mai watowahineni. Eyito mai‑ka hidi webote‑ya i‑di Yose anidi mai‑ya yofikanematane.
I‑di Yose badi kamebona tamine‑ya anidi‑ya hiyare,
‘Okobi eyehe dai kamahi. Okobi‑ka mai toha na, dai kamiyahi.’ Yose ati ne,
ati ene 75 mai kana Eyito‑ya mai tokameteni.
Eyito‑ya i‑di Yako toke, Eyito‑ya abe, makobote Eyito‑ya ai‑ka idi mai abamaki nameteni.
Mai aba, Sikemi‑ya mai‑ya mai towakama, Abaraho temene‑ya mai‑ya mai kamamaki, Hamo bidi mai tabori i‑di Abaraho hikanikamete, fara‑ya ai‑ka idi mai kamameteni.
‘Tabora bara‑ya mai wini nafiya, mai owakamatasaboneni.’ Abaraho‑ya Deoso hiyare ati nemata.
Eyito‑ya mai amoni tosiyo yanana, mai dodamawaha,
Eyito‑ke mai‑ka hidi webote abe, hidi bare tohawahe, Yose tamine‑ya watore,
Ai‑ka idi mai‑ya nofare, mai‑ya kosine, mai‑ka madehe wada yati‑ya hidi ati ene mai tonahomakosameteni, mai ababonehe.
Fara‑ya i‑di Mose wade, Deoso noko‑ke amosi ba‑basi ne, abariko fama abariko owa ohari ne‑ya badi tabaro‑ya forine, mai hikahemori, Mose ati wadawahe, ke‑kemoma daani awire,
Mose madi hiwake, homeya, Fara·o bide wase, hikayahamatane, hinayanebonaha.
Yama‑ya Eyito‑ka mai wata, Mose‑ya mai kanawata, mai ati‑ya wato ba‑basi, ene kiti ba‑basi nematane.
Mose‑ka faha fowe 40 kaniya, hika mai one Isara·eo‑ka nodi mai toha, mai‑ya awebona atibodi ati ne.
I‑di Mose toke, Isara·eo‑ke owa‑ya Eyito‑ke owa kosine‑ya awe, Isara·eo‑ke owa‑ya kasomebona, Eyito‑ke owa manakone‑ya daane, hinahabane.
‘Deoso ene mai nafi okasomiya, mai owakamabone, yama‑ya oka mai wata awini.’ I‑di Mose atibodi ati ne,
mai‑ya towakamebona‑ya mai wato awirameteni.
Mahi owa‑ya i‑di Mose tokomatase, Isara·eo‑ka mai fama, mai ibi weena, mai‑ya i‑di Mose awe,
‘Isara·eo‑ka dai fama, hini yamata ihi dai ibi wee?’ I‑di Mose ati ne,
hini owa‑ya weene, i‑di Mose‑ya fatatowiti, ati yanane,
‘Oda‑ka hidi tiwa‑mone tina awineni? Oda‑ka hidi amatira amatini. Oda ene tikadikariyahi.
Mahi owa‑ya Eyito‑ke owa tinahaba, owa tinahabamakebone tina awineni.’ Isara·eo‑ke owa ati nematane, i‑di Mose‑ya weeneri.
Ati ene Mose habo siitone, kanane, Midiya‑ka mai tabori‑ya tokawahe, mai tabori‑ya wineya, bidi mai fama mai wada,
makobote ano 40 tohamakiya, Sinai adami yakari‑ya Mose toke, tabora awiri‑kaya awa bide hirina‑ya Deoso‑ka yo‑yose‑ya awematane.
Yama‑ya awe, awatokane, ahiyata‑ya yama‑ya awebona, Deoso ati‑ya mitawahe,
‘Tika idi i‑di Abaraho, i‑di Isaki, i‑di Yako, mai na, mai‑ka Deoso ama·oni.’ Ati ne.
Ati‑ya Mose mite, habo siitone, wawawakane, awa hirina‑kaya kiinawamarematane.
‘Mose, oka wami‑ya tiwaa, tika sabata tanitikanisahi. Oka wami amani.
‘Eyito‑ya oka mai wina, mai mai kosihina mai oawa, mai baki moni omita, mai see·okanabone, bofe‑ya okisama, Eyito‑ya tiwa oyoseboneni.’ Deoso ati nematane.
Hibati‑ya Mose‑ya Isara·eo‑ka nodi mai nofara,
‘Oda‑ka hidi tihara, oda ene tikadikariyahi!’ Mai ati namete.
Fare Deoso ati ene mai‑ka hidi tohawahebonane. Deoso‑ka yo‑yose awa hirini‑kaya i‑di Mose awe, ati ene Isara·eo‑ka nodi mai‑ya i‑di Mose kasomebona mai‑ya seekanebonane.

Eyito‑ya mai wi‑wina i‑di Mose ene‑ya mai awa, Mose‑ka mai‑ya Eyito‑ka mai saatokasa, Mose mai‑ya towakame, faha Mawa‑ya i‑di Mose ene kite‑ya mai awa, faha fowe 40 kana‑ya mai yakana, ene kite mai hiawa hinematane.
Isara·eo‑ka nodi mai‑ya i‑di Mose hiyare,
‘Deoso ene dai‑ka soho owa Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita‑bona, owa‑nima nebonane.’ Mose ati nematane.

Tabora awiri‑ya i‑di Mose mai yorotokana, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati‑ya mai mitameteni. Sinai adami‑ya i‑di Mose tokomorose, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati himitemata, ati ai nofa, ai abarabone, ati hikanahanomata, ati ai fawaniterebonaha.
Mose ati‑ya ai‑ka idi mai tokadabara, Eyito‑ya mai atibodi winitonamameteni.
I‑di Mose Anidi i‑di Araho‑ya mai toka,
‘Araho, ai‑ka deoso‑ba wamatinahi, ai‑ya yofikanebonaha. I‑di Mose ai‑ka hawi‑ya yo‑yofikana fawane, abe awane.’ Mai ati na.
Oro wamani bowi bidi‑nima na‑ya mai wamanineni, mai‑ka deoso bonaha. Hini mai ihi mai ya‑yaina,
‘Bowi bidi amosabote amane.’ Mai ati na,
Bani nawade‑ya mai nanahabineni, mai‑ka deoso oro wamani‑ka bani bonaha.
Amowa mai‑ya mai kahiyara na, hini mai ihi Deoso mai‑ya kahabanematane. Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita‑mata mai tamine‑ya kanahano,
‘Ano 40 kana‑ya tabora awiri‑kaya Isara·eo‑ka nodi mai yakana, bani mai dai nanahaba, Deoso‑ka bani‑ba dai daanini? Deoso‑ka bani‑ba dai daani awirameteni.

Dai‑ka deoso bare mai dai wamana, owa oni Moroki toha, owa Hefa amowa‑nima ne toha ne, fara mai‑ya dai kahiyarabisateni. Dai ene amosara dai‑ya mai towakamaboneni, Babironi‑kaya mai‑ka yama anini dai aninabonehe.’ Deoso ati ne, Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita mai kanahanameteni.
Tabora awiri‑ya ai‑ka idi mai yakana, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai towakameteni. Yobe‑bona‑ya Deoso yofikane,
‘Haa‑nima oka yobe neba wamatinahi.’ Deoso ati ne,
ati‑nima i‑di Mose ne yobe‑ya wamanematane.

Ai‑ka idi mai‑ya i‑di Yosowe dabe, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai kakama, Deoso ati ene Bara mai‑ya mai bisina, mai‑ka tabora‑ya mai kayafawaha, mai amoni dami‑ya Dafi mai‑ka hidi tohawaheya, Deoso‑ka yobe bote tohasa nematane.
I‑di Dafi‑ya Deoso nofi nafi, Deoso‑ya Dafi haane,
‘Yako‑ka Deoso amatini. Tika yobe yati‑bona wamani onofineni.’ Dafi ati nematane.
Dafi bidi i‑di Saromaho‑ta Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya wamanibisematane.
Yobe ai wamane‑ya Deoso kitabote winaterene. Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita‑mata ati ne,
‘Neme‑ya oka i‑itari toha, bofe‑ya owa teme kawateni. Hini yamata‑bone oka yobe‑bona‑ya dai wamani boneti, hasi·obonekaro?
Yama nafi wama·onamaroni.’ Deoso ati nematane.
Dai eme kita, dai atibodi kita na, Deoso‑ka Doni ati dai nofateraba awineni. Dai‑ka idi mai‑nima dai nineni, dai narabo hawiraro.
Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita mai nafi‑ya dai‑ka idi mai bisinamete,
‘Deoso‑ka owa amosabote kamebonane.’ Mai ati na,
mai‑ya dai‑ka idi mai nanahabameteni. Fare kame, dai kahabane, dai ati ene mai hinahabene.
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose Deoso ati‑ya mai kaminamete, Deoso ati‑ya dai tokadabarineni.” Tefaho ati nematane.
Tefaho ati‑ya mai mita, mai yawi kita, mai nafi ini kawakosa,
Tefaho Deoso‑ka Doni fai‑ya kibe, neme‑ya tonokomise, Deoso wehene‑ya awe, Deoso‑ka kanika‑ya Yeso waari‑ya awe,
“Dai awahi. Neme hawi tohawaha, Deoso‑ka kanika‑ya okoyo i‑di Yeso waari‑ya oawawahineni.” Tefaho ati nemonane.
Mai narabi‑ya mai barikaneni, Tefaho ati‑ya mai mitarabonehe. Mai yawa, mai ati kita, Tefaho‑ya mai wata kanibote na,
tabora awiri‑kaya Tefaho‑ya mai horoni towaka, yati‑ya Tefaho‑ya mai baana, mai hinahabe, yati‑ya mai werenisa, i‑di Saoro yetene teme‑kaya mai‑ka bora‑ya mai nawiyineni.
Tefaho yati‑ya mai hibaane, hiyare,
“Ayo Yeso, tiwa tabaro‑ya owa korimari tiwakamahi.” Ati nane.
Yobati‑kaya ite,
“Ayo, owa‑ya mai nanahaba, mai‑ya tiwati somawamahi.” Ati ne, ati kite,
Ati fawane, abawahematane.

Tefaho abe‑ya i‑di Saoro awe, ya‑yaine. Yerosare‑ya mai wi‑wina Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai‑ya mai bisinawaha, mai ihi tabora bide‑kaya mai tokawaha, Yodeya‑kaya mai one toka, Samariya‑kaya mai one toka na, Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai‑ta mai kanani awirani.
Deoso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa Tefaho abo‑ya mai kama, mai ohinadineni.
I‑di Saoro yawe, Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai‑ya kako, mai nafi‑ka yobe‑ya toke, mai makidi, mai fanawi na‑ya waratone, mai horokani tokomane, kadeya‑ya mai mookanabonehe.
Tabora bide‑ya mai toka, Yeso ati‑ya mai kaminamoneni.
Samariya‑kaya i‑di Firibi toke, Kirisito tamine‑ya mai‑ya hiyarane.
Firibi ati‑ya mai dama mai mita, ene kite mai hiawa, ati mai atibodi hikadika hine,
Madi towe mai‑ya mai foya, Firibi ati ene mai eekana mai toka, mai one kiyana, mai kitama, mai one ka‑kakona‑maro, Firibi ati ene mai yakanawaha nani.
Firibi ene mai ya‑yaini nafineni, Samariya‑karo.
Simaho Samariya‑kaya wi‑wina,
“Inawa oha, oka yama kitateni.” Ati ne.
Ati‑ya mai mita, ene kite mai hiawa hine, mai awatokana,
Yinero‑ya mai kihara mai toha, yinero nafi‑ya mai kiha mai toha na, Simaho ati‑ya mai nafi nofa, ene mai hiawa hine,
“Deoso kitabote ene‑nima ene nane.” Mai ati nineni.
Mai amoni damiya, Simaho‑ka yama ihi‑mone‑ya mai awa, ati mai hikadabatene.
Yeso tamine Deoso ai nafi‑ka hidi‑bona tamine ne‑ya Firibi kamine, ati‑ya mai mita, mai makidi mai fanawi na, Yeso ati‑ya mai nofawaha, Firibi mai‑ya habanirisawahane.
Makobote i‑di Simaho, Yeso ati‑ya nofawahe, i‑di Firibi habahinirise, i‑di Firibi‑ya sawiwahe, i‑di Firibi ene‑ya awe,
“Ka!” Ati ne,
awatokawahemonane.
Yerosare‑kaya Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai wina, Samariya‑kaya mai wi‑wina Deoso ati‑ya mai nofawahamone, mai tamine‑ya Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai mita, Bedoro, Yowaho mai fama, mai‑ya mai yose,
“Samariya‑ya mai wi‑wina mai dai tonakahi!” Mai ati na,
Samariya‑ya mai kobokana, Deoso‑ya mai hiyara,
“Abi Deoso, Tika Doni mai‑ya sawiyaho.” Mai ati namoneni.
Yeso ati‑ya mai nofa, Yeso‑ka mai toha, mai‑ya Firibi habanirise, Deoso‑ka Doni mai‑ya sawi awisare, Deoso‑ya mai tamine‑ya Bedoro mai hiyaramoneni.
Mai‑ya mai yahi fore, Deoso‑ka Doni mai‑ya sawiwahemonane.
Mai‑ya Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai yahi fore, mai ihi Deoso‑ka Doni mai‑ya sawiwahe‑ya Simaho awe, yinero‑ya mai‑ya daanebona ati ne,
“Bedoro, Yowaho dai ene‑nima owa ene nabone, owa dai kanawatoya, dai‑ka yinero‑ba daa·onabani. Mai‑ya owa yehe foriya, Deoso‑ka Doni mai‑ya sawibonane.” Simaho ati ne.
Ati‑ya Bedoro mite, ati yanane,
“Yama Deoso‑ka da‑daa tikanikabone tina, tiwati ihi ti·aba, tika yinero aba nebonane. Deoso‑ka yama daahinaya, yinero‑ya ai kanikaterani.
Haa‑nima tiwa ene teraboneni. Deoso‑ya tiwatibodi amosi awisarani.
Deoso‑ya tiwatibodi ati amosara tamine tikamini bahiya, tiwa‑ya ati somawameba awane.
Tiwatibodi bida toha, tiwa ene amosara tiwa‑ya yaditoneni.” Bedoro ati ne.
“Ai‑ka Ayo‑ya owa tamine dai hiyarahi, dai ati‑nima yama na owa‑ya koborabonehe.” Simaho ati nemonane.

I‑di Bedoro i‑di Yowaho mai fama, Deoso Ati Amosabote‑ya mai kamini hawa toha, Yerosare‑kaya mai towakamatasa, hawi‑ya mai yakakana, Samaritano mai tabori‑ya mai kobokana, Yeso tamine‑ya mai kaminineni.
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose i‑di Firibi‑ya hiyare,
“Bato‑kaya tikamakihi. Yerosare‑ka hawi‑ya Kasa‑ka hawi waana‑ya tikamakiyahi.” Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati ne.
Kasa‑ka hawi‑ya mai winaterani.

Firibi toke, Kasa‑ka hawi‑ya yakaneya, Eti·obi‑ke hidi‑ka yinero‑ya na‑nawada kakamaki‑ya awane. Eti·obi‑ke hidi fana Kadasi toha, Kadasi‑ka yinero‑ya maki na‑nawade‑bona ene dene noko mai hinahabemata. Deoso ati‑ya nofe, hibati‑ya Yerosare‑ya toke, Deoso‑ya hiyare, hiyari hawa tohe, tabora‑ya winitoname, tokomane.
Kafaro ho‑horokana‑ya itari, Isa·iya‑ka yama hani‑ya kadike,
“Firibi, kafaro ho‑horokana yakari‑ya yakatinahi.” Deoso‑ka Doni ati ne,
Firibi kanani tokomaki, Isa·iya‑ka yama hani‑ya maki kadike, ati‑ya mite,
“Yama hani tikadika tiwatoneni?” Firibi ati ne.
“Yama hani owato awirini. Owa‑ya mai kanawatora, yama owatoterani. Owa tikanawataba, tikamisahi. Owa yowi‑ya tiwitarihi.” Yinero‑ya na‑nawada ati ne.
Deoso‑ka yama hani ati hikadika eya ati na,
‘Kaneiro mai mai hinahababone, mai‑ya mai towakama, mai‑nima mai hiwakamane. Kaneiro bidi mai kone mai seohina, mai ati yanara, mai‑nima mai hinahabe, ati yanarene.
Ene amose, noko mai firohine, hidi hikasomare, bidi wadare tamine ai hiyarariyahi. Mai hinahabane.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Firibi‑ya hiyare,
“Ebeni‑ke tamine‑ya yama hani hiyara? Isa·iya hini tamine‑ya kanahano, bare tamine toha nabaya? Yama owato awirini.” Yinero‑ya na‑nawada ati ne.
“Yeso tamine‑ya Isa·iya kanahanomatane.” Firibi ati ne,
Yeso Ati Amosabote nafi‑ya kaminamakine.
Kafaro mai‑ya horokane, mai ibi hi‑hiyara tosina, wara widi‑ya mai kobokana,
“A‑ahi‑ya faha ita‑ya owa habatinirisakaribana?” Yinero‑ya na‑nawada ati ne.
“Yeso ati nafi tinofiya, tiwa haba·onirisabani.” Firibi ati ne.
“Deoso Bidi i‑di Yeso Kirisito ati onofawahani.” Ati ne.
Ati ene kafaro maatowiti, mai towakifawaha, Firibi habahinirisemonane.
Mai kakamorosama, Deoso‑ka Doni i‑di Firibi‑ya towakame, Firibi‑ya awamare, kafaro ho‑horokana‑ya foyame, ya‑yaine. Hini tabaro‑ya tokomematane.
Deoso‑ka Doni ene Asoto‑ya Firibi kobone, yananamatase, hini tabaro Sesareya‑ya tokome, Sesareya‑ka hawi‑ya mai kobohine, Yeso Ati Amosabote‑ya mai‑ya hiyare, tokome, hini tabaro‑ya kobotonamemonane.
I‑di Saoro, Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa, mai‑ya ati nanahabe, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi‑ya toke,
“Damaso‑ya Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe hidi mai‑ka yama hani‑ba owa‑ya daatinahi.
‘Yeso hawine‑ya mai ya‑yaka mai dai daanahi i‑di Saoro‑ya.’ Tika yama hani ati nahi.
Damaso‑ya owakamiya, mai hikadikiya, Yeso hawine‑ya mai ya‑yaka mai makidi mai fanawi toha na, mai wara·oniya, mai soki·oniya, Yerosare‑kaya mai owakamabani.” Saoro ati nemonane.
Yama hani‑ya waratone, Damaso‑ya toke, Damaso‑ka hawi bai‑ya yakane, neme‑ya yama wahi kita, fai‑ya kobona,
Yama wahi kita ihi sone, yama wahi‑ya ati kaki,
“Saoro, Saoro hini yamata‑ba owa‑ya bisitiniti?” Ati ne,
“Ayo, eme tiwa oni niti?” Saoro ati ne,
“Yeso ama·oni, owa bisitinaro.” Ati ne.
Saoro wawawakane,
“Hini yamata‑nima ona‑ba ama·oniti?” Saoro ati ne,
“Tiwaamisamiya, Damaso‑kaya tikahi. Tiwa‑ya mai hiyariya, yama tiwatowahaboneni.” Yeso ati nemonane.
Saoro‑ya mai sawe, ati mai himite, abano mai hiaware, mai ati yanaramoneni.
I‑di Saoro waamisame, noko weetokane, yama‑ya awami awire, yehe mai damahine, mai hiwakamane Damaso‑kaya.
Damaso‑kaya amoni 3 tohe, yama‑ya awi awisare, tafarihi, faha‑ya fawarihi nemonane.
Damaso‑ya Ananiya wine, Deoso ati‑ya nofe, wada‑nima yama na‑ya Yeso ati‑ya mite,
“Ananiya.” Yeso ati ne,
“Ayo, fara ama·oni.” Ananiya ati ne,
“Hawi oni Hetekana toha‑ya Yoda‑ka yobe waari‑ya i‑di Saoro Taso‑ke wine, haatiyahi. Hibayata Deoso‑ya Saoro hiyarane.
I‑di Saoro wada‑nima yama na‑ya awe, maki oni Ananiya tohe, koboneya awane. Wada‑ya Saoro tati‑ya yehe fori, yama‑ya awawahebonaha.” Yeso ati nane.
“Ayo Yeso, Saoro tamine omitani. Yerosare‑ya tika mai dami‑ya i‑di Saoro ene amosarene.
Damaso‑ya kamaki, tika yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi‑ka yama hani ihi, tiwati‑ya oda no‑nofa oda‑ya wateya, Yerosare‑kaya oda‑ya towakamebonane.” Ananiya ati ne.
“Tikamakihi. Saoro okadike, oka yama‑ya a‑ani tohawahebonane. Bara mai toha, Bara mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Isara·eo‑ka nodi mai toha na, mai‑ya owa tamine‑ya hiyarebonane.
Owa tamine hiyari ene, mai bisihineya, yama bisini kome‑ya watowahebonane.” Yeso ati nane.
Ananiya toke, Yoda‑ka yobe‑ya tokiyome, Saoro‑ya yehe fori,
“Soho Saoro, Yeso owa‑ya yosene, hawi‑ya yakatina, tiawemona, fare owa‑ya yose, yama‑ya tiawamatasabone, Deoso‑ka Doni tiwa‑ya sawiwahebonane.” Ananiya ati nemonane.
Saoro‑ya Ananiya yehe fori, aba ataro‑nima yama na, fai noko‑ka sona, ihi noko amosawame, Saoro waamise, i‑di Ananiya habahinirisawahane.
I‑di Saoro tafawahe, kitamatase, amoni fa‑famaraba ne‑ya, Damaso‑ya Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai‑ya sawiwahe.
Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya i‑di Saoro Yeso tamine‑ya hiyare,
“I‑di Yeso, Deoso Bidi amane.” Ati ne.
Saoro ati‑ya mai mita, mai ibi hiyara,

“Ka! Yerosare‑ya Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai‑ya Saoro nanahabe, ahi‑ya kamaki, mai‑ya wateya, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai‑ya mai‑ya towakamebona ati ne, fare amanaraniha?” Mai ati na,
mahi‑nima Saoro kiti tonafi mai‑ya hiyare,
“Owati dai mita, Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika i‑di Yeso tohe, dai watowahebonane.” Ati ne,
Ati‑ya Yodeo mai mita, mai ati fawanamoneni.
Makobote Yodeo mai yorotokana mai ibi hiyara,
“Saoro ai nanahabahi.” Mai ati namoneni.
Damaso‑ka tabora barikana‑ka nokobi‑kaya i‑di Saoro‑ya mai nimanineni, mai hinahabebonaha. Mai tamine Saoro mite,
I‑di Saoro‑ya mai daba, yama soki‑ya Saoro‑ya mai towaka, Damaso‑ka awayara nemehe hodi‑ya hisiri‑ya mai hikanakise, tabora one‑kaya tokawahemonane.
Makobote Yerosare‑ya toke, Yeso‑ka mai‑ya sibanane, mai‑ya dabawahebonaha. Saoro tamine‑ya mai mita, mai kakomehe.
“Yeso ati‑ya nofe‑mona keyehe‑ya hirine awane.” Mai atibodi ati namoneni.
Saoro‑ya i‑di Banabe towakamane, Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai‑ya yofikanebonaha.
“Hibati‑ya Damaso hawi‑ya, ai‑ka Ayo‑ya Saoro awe, ati himita hine, Damaso‑ya Yeso tamine‑ya mai‑ya hiyarane.” Banabe ati nemonane.
Banabe ati ene, mai‑ya sawiwahe, Yerosare‑ya Yeso tamine‑ya kamine habo siitoremonane.
Yodeo mai one, Kereko mai ati‑nima mai ati na, mai‑ya Yeso tamine‑ya hiyare ene mai ati yawa, fai‑ya mai ati nanahabamoneni.
Mai tamine‑ya Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai mita, Sesareya‑kaya mai hiwakame, hini tabaro‑ya tokomebona mai hiyose,
“Taso‑ya tikamahi.” Mai ati namoneni.
Yodeya, Karireya, Samariya na‑ya, mai wi‑wina mai‑ya mai bisinami awira. Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai dodamawahani. Deoso‑ka Doni mai‑ya kasome, Deoso ati‑ya mai tokadabamoneni.
Mai tabori dami‑ya Bedoro toke, sidadi oni Rida toha‑ya kobone, Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai‑ya hiyarane.
Rida‑ya ka‑kakone wine, oni i‑di Ene·asi tohe, faha fowe 8 kana‑ya yakare‑ya, i‑di Bedoro awe,
“Ene·asi, Yeso Kirisito tiwa‑ya nakitamane, tiwaamisamiya, tika fo‑fori tinamosahi.” Bedoro ati ne,
Ene·asi waamisame,
Rida‑ya mai wi‑wina, Sarona‑ya mai wi‑wina, mai na, Ene·asi kitame‑ya mai awa, Yeso ati‑ya mai nofawahamoneni.
Yabe‑ya Tabita wina, oni one i‑di Doka toha, Yeso ati‑ya nofa, yama‑ya mai kihara, mai dami‑ya kasomateni.
I‑di Tabita kiyana, abamakineni. Aboi mai sokohina, yobe nemehe‑ya mai hinaforineni.
Rida‑ya Bedoro wine, tamine‑ya mai mita, mai fama mai‑ya mai yose,
“Yama yakari‑ya Bedoro wine, dai towamaki, dai dabama kanibote nayaho.” Mai ati namoneni.
Bedoro eyehe mai kama, yobe nemehe‑ya mai tokomisama, mai fanawi honita toha, hibati‑ya mai‑ka yobote mai abamaro, mai‑ya Tabita ka‑kasoma, abawaha, tabiyo mai ohina, mai naha,
“Bedoro, oda‑ka bora i‑di Doka wamahinamaro, tiawahi.” Mai ati na.
Bedoro mai‑ya yose,
“Dai tokomahi.” Ati ne.
Mai toka, mai nowati‑ya Bedoro yobati‑kaya itarise, Deoso‑ya hiyare, hiyari hawa tohe, Tabita‑ya haane,
“Tabita, tiwaamisamahi!” Ati ne,
Tabita noki weetokana, Bedoro‑ya awa, itarimisamamoneni.
Bedoro Tabita yahi‑ya waratone, Tabita‑ya nawaamisame, mai fanawi honita‑ya haa, Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai‑ya haa ne, mai kamake,
“Tabita kitama, dai awahi.” Ati nemonane.
Yabe‑ya mai wi‑wina, Tabita kitama tamine‑ya mai mita, Yeso ati‑ya mai dami nofawahineni.
Yabe‑ya Bedoro wine, amoni dame‑ya bani ataro‑ya wa‑wama‑ka yobe‑ya winane. Bani ataro‑ya wa‑wama oni i‑di Simaho tohane.
Sesareya‑ya i‑di Koneriyo winane, Itari·ano mai‑ka sodado mai‑ka hidi toheri,
Deoso ati‑ya i‑di Koneriyo hika mai eyehe nofe, Deoso‑ya hiyaratene. Yama‑ya mai kihara mai‑ka yama‑bone‑ya daatene.
Mahi towitawiti‑ya wada‑nima yama na‑ya Deoso‑ka yo‑yose‑ya Koneriyo awe,
“Koneriyo,” Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati ne,
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose‑ya awe, habo siitone,
“Ayo, hini yamata‑ya tiwati koboniti?” Koneriyo ati ne.
“Deoso tiwati‑ya mite, tiwa yehe honene mai‑ya daatina, tiwa‑ya awatene, tiwa‑ya nofe, ati somane.
Yabe‑ka mai tabori‑ya tika mai tiyosehi, i‑di Simaho Bedoro‑ya mai kakamabonehe.
Maa widi‑ya bani ataro‑ya wa‑wama, i‑di Simaho wine, Simaho‑ka yobe‑ya Simaho Bedoro wine, mai hiwakameya, ati dai mitebonane.” Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati nemonane.
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose tokomeya, Koneriyo hika yo‑yose mai fama mai‑ya haa, sodado ohari‑ya haa ne, mai kakiya, mai‑ya yosebonane. Deoso ati‑ya sodado nofe, Koneriyo‑ka yama‑ya anitene.
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati‑ya mai‑ya kaminane. Yabe‑ya mai‑ya yosene, Bedoro‑ya mai tonakabonehe.
Mahi owa nokorise‑ya Yabe yakari‑ya mai yakaniya, Simaho‑ka yobe tati mese‑ya i‑di Bedoro tokomisane, Deoso‑ya hiyarebonaha.
Bedoro fimi, tafebona, tefe‑bona mai hawahiniya, wada‑nima yama na‑ya awane.
Neme seekana‑ya yama kisa‑ya awemonane. Neme‑ya, bora ibe webote‑nima yama na kisa‑ya awe, bora ibe fowari‑ya ai 4 kana damana‑nima yama na, kisa, bofe‑ya kawitamoneni.
Bora dori‑ya yama‑ka bani mai dama mai toha, bani mai afe wada mai toha, maka mai toha namoneni.
Neme‑ya ati kaki, ati i‑di Bedoro himite,
“Bedoro, tiwaamisiya, bani tinahabiya, bani tikabahi.” Ati ne,
“Ayo, bani haa‑nima mai na, mai okobaterani. Bani towe mai kabaterani.” Bedoro ati ne.
Neme‑ya ati kakitase,
“Yama kababone Deoso hina, kabi towe amani dai ati riyahi,” Ati nemonane.
Hibati‑ya yama hiawa‑ya awamatase, hika yama awi 3 tohiya, bora ibe‑nima yama na, neme‑ya tokomisamawahani.
Bedoro hini‑ya hiyare,
“Hini yamata‑nima yama na‑ba amaniti?” Bedoro atibodi ati ne.
Atibodi yama‑ya dikeya, Koneriyo‑ka mai kobona, Simaho‑ka yobe‑ya mai sibana, yobe nokobiri‑ya mai naha,
Nokobi‑ya mai haana,
“Simaho Bedoro wine awane?” Mai ati na.
Bedoro atibodi yama‑ya dikeya, Deoso‑ka Doni ati yanane,
“Owati timitahi. Maki mai fama owa oharine tiwa‑ya mai sibanani.
Tikisamiya, mai‑ya tisawiyahi. Tiwa eme kitahi. Owati ihi mai kakineni.” Deoso‑ka Doni ati ne.
Bedoro kisame,
“Fara owa dai sibana, fara ama·oni. Hini yamata‑ya dai ati koboniti?” Bedoro ati ne.

“Sodado mai‑ka hidi i‑di Koneriyo oda‑ya yosene. I‑di Koneriyo amosabote amane. Deoso ati‑ya nofe, Yodeo mai nafi hinofatene. Mahi owa‑ya Deoso‑ka yo‑yose‑ya awe, tiwa‑ya haanebona, tiwati‑ya mitebona Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati nemonane.” Mai ati na.
“Sibarini, ahi‑ya dai amoniya, ai bosatonamabani.” Bedoro ati ne.
Mai amona, Bedoro mai‑ya tosawime, Yabe‑ka mai one Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa, Bedoro‑ya mai one daba,
mai amoni oharimaki‑ya Sesareya‑ya mai kobona, Koneriyo hika mai eyehe mai‑ya nimanemonane.
Bedoro‑ya Koneriyo awe, yobati‑kaya ite, moinise, Bedoro‑ya kahiyarane.
Koneriyo mano‑ya Bedoro waratone,
“Tiwaamisamahi. Fara tiwa‑nima ona, ama·oni.” Bedoro ati ne.
Mai yakana, mai ibi hi‑hiyara tosina, mai tokiyoma, mai dami yorotokana, mai‑ya Bedoro awe,
“Yama‑ya dai wata awineni. Bara mai tabori‑ya Yodeo oda toha, oda tokaterani. Bara mai tabori‑ya oda toka,
‘Towe dai amani.’ Mai ati teni.
Deoso owa‑ya kanawatowahe, mai nafi sibarani. Mai‑ya oda daba, oda sibarineni, oda towe toharani.
Hini yamata‑ba owa‑ya dai haaniti? Owa‑ya mai idikebone mai kama, mai‑ya wee·ora, Deoso ati ene mai‑ya sawi kanibote onani.” Bedoro ati ne.
Ati‑ya mite, Koneriyo hiyare,
“Hibati‑ya owa amoni 4 toha, oka yobe doro‑ya Deoso‑ya ohiyarani. Mahi towitawiti‑ya, ai owa bora sawa‑ya weyene wai, wehene kite, owa‑ya hiyare,
‘Koneriyo, tiwati‑ya Deoso mite, tiwa yehe honene daatina‑ya awane.
Yabe‑ya maa widi‑ya bani ataro‑ya wa‑wama, i‑di Simaho wine, Simaho‑ka yobe‑ya Simaho Bedoro wine, tinakamakiho.’ Bora sawa‑ya weyene ati ne.
Fare ati ene tiwa haa·onani. Tiwa ene sibarini. Oda yorotokana, tiwati oda mitaboneni. Hini yamata‑nima Deoso ati nati?” Koneriyo ati nane.
Bedoro mai‑ya hiyarawahe,
“Ka! Deoso noko‑ka fara ai nafi hinama toha owatowahani.
Tabora dami‑kaya Deoso ati‑ya mai nofa, Deoso ati‑nima mai na, mai‑ya Deoso ati somawamatene.

Hibati‑ya Deoso Bidi‑ya yosene, Isara·eo‑ka nodi mai‑ya Ati Amosabote hikaminebonaha. Yeso Kirisito ati‑ya mai nofa, Deoso mai‑ya ati somawamebonane. Fare‑nima Yeso Kirisito ati dai nofa, Deoso dai‑ya ati somawamaharibonane.
Yodeya‑ka yama tamine dai mitatekarini? Hibati‑ya i‑di Yowaho Batita mai‑ya habanirise, makobote Karireya‑kaya yama yanana, tamine dai mitahare awineni.
Yeso Nasare‑ke tamine dai mite awane. Deoso ene Deoso‑ka Doni Yeso‑ya sawi, mai tabori dami‑ya toke, ene amose, kite, madi mai‑ya mai foya, Yeso ene madi mai kanana, mai kiyanamaro, mai kitamawahani.
Yerosare, Yodeya na‑ya Yeso ene oda awa, awa‑ya mai baahikane, abe, oda awa nemarine.
Amoni fama, amoni owa ohari ne‑ya Deoso hinakitame. Kitami oda awemarine.
Mai nafi hiawi awire, oda‑ya Deoso kadikemata tamine oda kaminebona, oda‑ta oda awemarine. Hibati‑ya oda‑ka da‑daba, kitami oda awemarine. Oda eyehe tafe, faha‑ya fawa nemarine.
Oda‑ya hiyare,
‘Owa tamine mai‑ya dai hiyarahi. Owati‑ya mai nofiya, sibaraboneni. Mai hasina mai toha, mai abamete mai toha, mai na, Deoso ene mai ihi okadikaboneni.’ Ati nemarine.
Hibati‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete Yeso tamine‑ya mai kanahanameteni. Ati mai hinofeya, Deoso mai‑ya ati somawamebona mai ati nameteni.” Bedoro ati nemonane.
Bedoro mai‑ya hiyare, ati‑ya mai mita, Deoso‑ka Doni mai‑ya sawiwahane.
Bedoro‑ya mai sawe, mai ibi hiyara,
“Ka! Deoso‑ka Doni Bara mai‑ya sawine. Bara mai‑ya Deoso‑ka Doni sawiterebona oda atibodi ati nani.” Mai ati namoneni.
Homano mai toha, mai ati one‑ya Deoso‑ya mai kahiyara, mai ati‑ya Yodeo mai mita, Bedoro ati yanane,
“Deoso‑ka Doni ai‑ya sawi, mai‑ya sawine. Mai ai habanirisahi.
‘Ai‑ya Yodeo mai ati bari awiraboneni.’ Owatibodi ati nineni.” Bedoro ati nemonane.
Bedoro ati ene Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai‑ya mai habanirisawahani. Bedoro‑ya Koneriyo mai haana,
“Oda tabaro‑ya tiwa amoni fa‑famaraba nahi.” Mai ati namoneni.
Yodeya‑ya Yeso ati‑ya mai nofa mai toha, Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai toha na, Yeso ati‑ya Bara mai nofawaha tamine‑ya mai mitineni.
Yerosare‑ya Bedoro koboneya,
“Mai sowiri tati ataro‑ya mai wisinakosi awiriya Deoso‑ka mai tohaterani.” Mai ati toha, Bedoro‑ya mai weenamoneni.
“Bedoro, mai sowiri tati ataro‑ya mai wisinakosi awiriya mai tabori‑ya ai tafaterani. Tiwa‑ta mai tabori‑ya titafani. Tiwa ene towe tohani.” Mai ati namoneni.
Bedoro mai‑ya hiyare,
“Bara mai tabori‑ya oki‑ka, owa tamine dai mitahi.
Yabe‑ya owina, Deoso‑ya ohiyara, Deoso ene wada‑nima yama na oawa, neme‑ya bora ibe webote‑nima yama na kisa, bora ibe fowari‑ya mai 4 kana mai damana kisa‑nima yama na owa yakari‑ya maanisa,
Owakatoma, bani tabora‑ka mai toha, bani yama‑ka mai toha, bani mai afe wada mai toha, maka mai toha na, mai oawani.
Neme‑ya ati kaki, ati omite,
‘Bedoro, tiwaamisiya, mai tinahabiya, mai tikabiyahi.’ Ati ne.
‘Ayo, haa‑nima yama na okobaraboneni. Bani towe yama bisa toha‑nima mai na okobaterani.’ Ona.
Neme‑ya ati kakitase,
‘Yama Deoso hinamosi hawa hiha, —Bisa tohani.— Tiriyahi.’ Ati ne.
Neme‑ya bani mai oawi 3 toha, neme‑ya bora ibe tokomisama, oawami awirani.
Neme‑ya yama tokomisami hawa tohiya, Koneriyo tabaro Sesareya‑ka mai 3 toha, mai kobona, I‑di Simaho tabaro‑ya osawe, owa‑ya mai sibanani.
Deoso‑ka Doni owa‑ya yose,
‘Mai‑ya tisawimahi. Mai oyoseni.’ Deoso‑ka Doni ati ne.
Ati ene mai‑ya osawima, ai‑ka mai 6 toha, owa‑ya mai sawe, Koneriyo‑ka yobe‑ya oda tokiyomaroni.
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose‑ya i‑di Koneriyo awe, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati‑ya mite,
‘Yabe‑ya tika yo‑yose mai tiyosehi, Simaho Bedoro‑ya mai kakamaba.
Bedoro ati dai nofiyahi. Tiwa, tika mai toha na, dai‑ya Deoso ati somawamebonane.’ Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati nemona, Koneriyo ati ne.
Mai ohiyara, mai‑ya Deoso‑ka Doni kobone, mai‑ya sawi, hibati‑ya ai‑ya kobone, ai‑ya sawi‑nima i‑di Koneriyo mai‑ya sawiwahene.
Ai‑ka Ayo ati‑ya owati kadamowama,
‘Faha‑ya Yowaho mai‑ya habanirisemari. Makobote Deoso‑ka Doni dai‑ya sawiwahebonane.’ Ai‑ka Ayo ati ne.
Ai‑ka Ayo Yeso Kirisito ati ai nofawahamaro, Deoso‑ka Doni ai‑ya sawi, fare mai‑ya sawiwahene. Deoso mai‑ya ati sawine, hini yama‑nima obati?” Bedoro ati ne.
Bedoro ati‑ya mai mita, fai‑ya mai weenami awirani.
“Deoso amosabote amane, ai‑nima mai nawaha, Deoso‑ya mai tamine‑ya Bara mai kamina, mai‑ya Deoso ati somawamebonane. Mai abateraboneni.” Mai ati namoneni.

Hibati‑ya Tefaho‑ya mai nanahabiya, Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa tabora dami‑ya mai toka, Fenisiya‑ya mai one toka, Sibe‑ya mai one toka, Atioki‑ya mai one toka na, Yodeo mai‑ya Yeso tamine‑ya mai hiyara, Bara mai‑ya mai hiyari awira,
Sibe‑ka mai toha, Sireni‑ka mai toha na, Atioki‑ya mai toka, Bara mai‑ya ai‑ka Ayo Yeso tamine‑ya mai hiyarawaha,
Bara mai‑ya Yeso tamine‑ya mai hiyara, ai‑ka Ayo mai‑ya kasome, Yeso ati‑ya mai dami nofawaha,
Yerosare‑ka mai toha Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa Bara mai tamine‑ya mai mita, i‑di Banabe‑ya mai yosemoneni, Atioki‑ya tokebonaha.
Atioki‑ya kobone, mai‑ya awe, ya‑yaine,
“Deoso mai‑ya kasomane.” Atibodi ati ne.
“Ai‑ka Ayo i‑di Yeso ati‑nima dai nahi, dai nafi.” Ati nemonane.
Banabe ene amose, Deoso‑ka Doni fai‑ya sawi, Deoso ati‑ya nofi nafi, ati ene Yeso ati‑ya mai dami nofawahamoneni.
Makobote Taso‑ya tokane, i‑di Saoro‑ya dodimakibonaha.
Saoro‑ya wasi, Atioki‑ya Saoro‑ya kakame, Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa faha fowe ohare‑ya mai‑ya mai daba, mai‑ya mai kanawata, Kirisito‑ka mai amani, mai ati nawawahamoneni, Atioki‑ya.
Yerosare‑ka mai one Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita, Atioki‑ya mai tokawaha,
Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita mai‑ka owa oni i‑di Akabo tohe, waamise, Deoso‑ka Doni ene mai‑ya hiyare,
“Ai amoni damariya, bofe nafi‑ya faha kakiriya, yamata yanariya, mai dami fimeboneni.” Akabo ati nemonane.
Makobote mai‑ka hidi i‑di Karaodio toheya, i‑di Akabo ati‑nima yama nawaha,
Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai ibi hiyara,
“Yodeya‑ya mai wi‑wina mai tafe wadara. Mai‑ka yinero‑ba ai daanahi. Mai tafe‑ba‑ya mai kanikibakaro.” Mai ati namoneni.
Mai‑ka yinero‑ya mai yorotokani wama, i‑di Banabe, i‑di Saoro mai fama, yinero‑ya mai towakama, Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai‑ka bote mai‑ya yinero‑ya mai daanamoneni.
Fara‑ya mai‑ka hidi i‑di Erodi ati ene Yeso‑ka mai one‑ya sodado mai waratoneni, mai‑ya mai nanahababonehe,
Yowaho anidi i‑di Tiyako namidi‑ya mai tiinakosineni.
Mai marina, baho femeto kihara‑ya mai kaba, Tiyako abi tamine‑ya Yodeo mai mita, mai ya‑yaina, mai ya‑yaini‑ya Erodi awe, Bedoro‑ya waratonane.
Kadeya‑ya hinafoye, ati ene sodado mai 16 kana Bedoro‑ya mai nawadaboneni. Marina hawa tohiya, Yodeo mai‑ya daahinebonaha.
Kadeya‑ya i‑di Bedoro waiya sodado mai dabineni, tokarebonaha. Yeso‑ka mai Bedoro tamine‑ya mai hiyari nafineni, Deoso‑ya.
“Yodeo mai‑ya Bedoro daa·onaminaboneni.” Erodi atibodi ati ne.
Koheti fama‑ya mai yadihine, yama soki‑ya sodado mai fama mai bai‑ya Bedoro amone, nokobi kowani‑kaya sodado mai one yoronineni.
Kadeya dori‑ya i‑di Bedoro amoneya, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose kobone ene kadeya dori‑ya yama wahi kita, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose Bedoro fowari‑ya wai, fai‑ya mowakanebona, fai‑ya boyone,
“Bedoro, waamisa kanibote tinahi.” Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati ne.
Bedoro waamise, koheti hini‑ya kasoneni.
“Tika bora bodi‑ka sakotinama, tika sanidariya tikawatama, tika bora mese‑ka weyetinama tiniya, owa‑ya tisawiyahi.” Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati ne.
Ati‑nima Bedoro nane.
Deoso‑ka yo‑yose‑ya i‑di Bedoro tosawime,
“Wada amanikani.” Atibodi ati nemonane.

Nokobi‑ya Sodado wai‑ya mai fiyakana, nokobi one‑ya sodado owa wai‑ya mai fiyakana na, nokobi feho wamani‑ya mai kobokana, nokobi feho hini‑ya seekana, mai towakama, hawi ohare‑ya mai fiyakaniya, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose toke, Bedoro ohari waane.
Bedoro yama‑ya watowame, hini‑ya hiyare,

“Se! Yodeo mai‑ya Erodi owa‑ya daanaminebona ati ne, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose owa‑ya seekane, Yodeo owa‑ya mai ihi tohabone mai ati na, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose owa‑ya kasomene, owa‑ya mai watarabonehe.” Bedoro atibodi ati nemonane.
Yama‑ya Bedoro atibodi watowame, Yowaho Maroko madi i‑di Mariya‑ka yobe‑ya tokome, Mariya‑ka yobe‑ya Yeso‑ka mai yorotokana, Deoso‑ya Bedoro tamine‑ya mai hiyara,
Bedoro nokobi‑ya baane, moni‑ya mai mita, Mariya‑ka yo‑yose i‑di Hode nokobi‑ya seekanabone tokoma,
Bedoro ati‑ya Hode mita, ya‑yaina, nokobi‑ya seekara, hiniya kanani winitonama, mai‑ya haana,
“Nokobi‑ya Bedoro ati waine.” Ati na.
“Ka‑kana tineni.” Mai ati na.
“Ka‑kana oni awirini. Bedoro nokobi‑ya ati waine.” Hode ati na.
“Se! Bedoro korimari tohe awane.” Mai ati na.
Mai hiyariya, nokobi‑ya Bedoro baanamatase, nokobi‑ya mai seekana, Bedoro‑ya mai awa, mai habi siitona,

Bedoro yehe‑ya mai‑ya ati barine, mai‑ya hiyarawahe, kadeya‑ya wai Deoso hikasome, hini tamine‑ya kamine, i‑di Tiyako toha, Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai one‑ya mai hikaminamakebone ati ne, tabora bara‑kaya tokane.
Yama wahabisari‑ya Bedoro amone tabaro‑ya sodado mai awa, mai habi siitona,
“Ka! Hini yamata‑nima yama naba? Bedoro ebeni‑kaya tokati?” Mai ibi hiyara mai ati namoneni.

Bedoro‑ya sodado mai kakamabone Erodi ati ne, Bedoro fawane tamine‑ya Erodi mite, yawe, mai tabori dami‑ya Bedoro‑ya sibane, Bedoro‑ya wasire, sodado Bedoro‑ya mai nawada mai‑ya nanahabane. Makobote Sesareya‑ya Erodi toke, winawahemonane.

Tiro‑ya mai wi‑wina Sidoho‑ya mai wi‑wina mai na, i‑di Erodi mai‑ya ati yawe, Erodi ati tamine‑ya mai mita, Sesareya‑ya mai tokineni, Erodi‑ya mai hiyarabonehe. Erodi‑ka yo‑yose i‑di Rasito mai‑ya nofe‑ya mai hiyara,
“Rasito, tiwati ihi oda‑ya i‑di Erodi ati somawamaho. Oda‑ya ati somawami awireya, oda‑ka yamata‑ba‑ya daareba awane.” Mai ati namoneni.
Mahi owa‑ya Erodi mai‑ya hiyarebona, bora amosabote‑ya weyene, kadera amosa‑ya itari, mai‑ya hiyaremonane.
Erodi ati‑ya mai mita,
“Maki ati tohi awire, deoso ati amane.” Mai ati na, mai ati kitamoneni.
“Hehe, deoso‑nima ona ama·oni.” Erodi atibodi ati ne.
Deoso yokana‑ya Erodi kahiyari awire, hini‑ya kahiyarabise, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ene toha kanibote ne, Erodi‑ya yo‑yori mai kaba, abawahane.
Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai tabori dami‑ya mai toka, Deoso ati‑ya mai kamina, mai ati ihi Yeso ati‑ya mai dami nofawahamoneni.
Yerosare‑ya mai‑ka yama anini hawa tohiya, Banabe, Saoro mai fama Atioki‑ya mai towakama, mai‑ya Yowaho Maroko dabemonane.

Atioki‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita mai toha, Yeso ati‑ya mai ka‑kanawato mai toha na, mai wina, i‑di Banabe toha, Simiyaho so‑sokine toha, Rosiyo Sireni‑ke toha, Manaeni Erodi mai yanikimamete mai toha, Saoro toha nane.
Deoso‑ya mai kahiyara mahi ohari‑ya mai tafarani, Deoso‑ya mai hiyari oharebonehe. Deoso‑ya mai hiyariya, Deoso‑ka Doni mai‑ya hiyarawahe,
“I‑di Banabe i‑di Saoro mai fama mai yoronahi. Oka mai toha, mai oyoseboneni, oka yama ani‑ya mai aninabonehe.” Ati nemonane.
Deoso‑ka Doni ati ene mahi owa‑ya mai tafara, i‑di Banabe i‑di Saoro mai‑ya mai yahi fore, mai‑ya mai yosemoneni.
Deoso‑ka Doni ati ene Serosiya‑ya mai toka, Serosiya‑ya maboro‑ya mai foya, faha teberi‑ya mai towaka, faha teberi oni Sibe tohateni.
Sibe‑ka sidadi one Saramina toha‑ya mai kobona, Yodeo mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya mai tokiyoma, Deoso ati‑ya mai hiyarineni. Yowaho Maroko mai‑ya dabane, mai‑ya kasomebonaha.

Sibe‑ka tabora dama‑ya mai yakana, sidadi one oni Bafo‑ya mai kobona, Bafo‑ya i‑di Bayeso‑ya mai awa, Bayeso Yodeo mai‑ka inawa tohe, Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita‑mona ati ne, keyehe‑ya hi‑hiri amane. Bayeso oni fame, oni owa Erima tohane.
Mai‑ka hidi i‑di Seoso Baoro‑ya i‑di Erima sawitene. Seoso Baoro yama‑ya wato ba‑basi nemona, Banabe, Saoro mai fama mai‑ya Seoso Baoro haanemonane, Deoso tamine‑ya mitebonaha.
Banabe mai ati‑ya Inawa i‑di Erima nofare,
“Seoso Baoro, mai ati tinofariyahi.” Erima ati nemonane.
I‑di Saoro oni owa Baoro tohe, Deoso‑ka Doni fai‑ya sawi ene, i‑di Erima‑ya kakatome ati yanane,
“Satanasi bidi amatini. Yama amosa‑ya tinofara. Yama towe‑ya tinofa, towe amatini, keyehe‑ya hiritinaro. Deoso hawine amose tohe, hawi bara‑ya mai tiyoseriyahi.
Oda‑ka Hidi yehe kite ene mahi wehene tiawamaraboneni. Tiwa amoni dami‑ya tiwa noko amosawamaboneni.” Baoro ati ne.
Ati fawaneya, Erima yama‑ya awamare, yama soki‑nima noko ne, mai‑ya haane,
“Owa yehe dai damaniya, hawi‑ya owa dai yofikanahi.” Ati nemonane.
Baoro ene‑ya mai‑ka hidi i‑di Seoso Baoro awe, Yeso ati‑ya nofawahe,
“Deoso ene sibabisarane.” Ati nemonane.
Bafo‑ya maboro‑ya Baoro mai foya, Banafiriya sidadi oni Beki toha‑ya, Yowaho Maroko maaname, Yerosare‑kaya winitonamemonane.
Beki‑ya mai fiyakana, Bisidiya‑ka Atioki‑ya mai kobokana, Sabado‑ya Yodeo mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya mai towakiyoma, mai demenarineni.
Mose‑ka yama hani‑ya yobe hidi kadike, Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai‑ka yama hani‑ya kadikamaki ne, yama hani kadiki‑ya hawa tohe, Baoro mai‑ya haane,
“Ayo, mai dai ati hiyariya, mai dai hiyarahi. Dai ati ene mai ya‑yainaboneni.” Yobe hidi ati ne.
Baoro waamise, yehe mai‑ya ati barine,
“Yodeo dai toha, Deoso ati dai nofa, dai na, owati dai mitahi.

Hibati‑ya Isara·eo‑ka nodi mai‑ya Deoso kayafe, mai tabori yokana awisara, Eyito‑ya mai wina, mai‑ya kayafane. Eyito‑ya Deoso ene mai dodama, Eyito mai‑ka hidi mai‑ya seekani nofare, Eyito‑ka mai‑ya Deoso ene kite tohe, nowati‑ya mai‑ya seekane,
tabora awiri‑kaya faha fowe 40 kana‑ya mai yakana, Deoso mai‑ya sawi, ati‑ya mai tokadabara, mai‑ya kasomanasa ne,
Kanaha‑ya mai wi‑wina tohamete, mai‑ka hidi mai 7 kana toha, Deoso ene mai mai hinahaba, mai tabori‑ya ai‑ka idi mai kayafamete, fara mai tabori ai kayafawahameteni.
Faha fowe 450 tohiya, mai one‑ya Deoso kadike, mai ihi‑ya kadikebonaha. Makobote Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita‑mata i‑di Samo·eo mai ihi‑ya kadike.

I‑di Samo·eo bote toheya, mai‑ka hidi webote‑bona‑ya mai haaneni. Mai ati‑ya Deoso mite, Besami‑ka nodi i‑di Kisi bidi i‑di Saoro‑ya Deoso kadike, mai‑ka hidi webote tohawahe, faha fowe 40 kana mai‑ka hidi webote tohematane.
I‑di Saoro‑ya Deoso nofamare, i‑di Dafi mai‑ka hidi webote tohawahebonane.
‘Dafi onofabisa, i‑di Yese bidi ene ya‑yai·ona, hini owati‑nima nebonane.’ Deoso ati nematane.
Dafi‑ka nodi i‑di Yeso tohe, Deoso ati ene ai nafi manakone‑ya Yeso nanahabane. Hibati‑ya Deoso ati yananemata ati‑nima yama nawahani.
Yeso kamaki awisareya, Isara·eo‑ka nodi mai dami‑ya Yowaho Batita hiyare,
‘Deoso ati dai nofaramaro, Deoso‑ya dai‑ya dai kaminiya, dai haba·onirisaboneni.’ Ati nemonane.
Yowaho ati fawani yanatoneya, mai‑ya hiyare,

‘Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika oha‑mone dai ati na awineni. Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika ohi awirini. Owa nowati‑kaya ai owa kamaki, amosabotebisa amane. Hika sanidariya madone‑ya kakasawa amosi ba‑basi ne, owa‑ta owa amosi bi‑bidi nibisa ama·oni.’ Yowaho ati nemonane.
Soho, Abaraho‑ka nodi dai toha, Deoso ati dai no‑nofa, dai na, ai manakone‑ya Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika nanahabebona tamine‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai kanahanameteni.

Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita yama hani mai hikanahanamete‑ya Sabado‑ya mai kadikateni. Yerosare‑ya mai wi‑wina mai‑ka hidi mai toha na, yama‑ya mai kadika, yama hani ati‑ya mai watoramaro, yama hani ati‑nima Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika‑ya mai nanahaba,
Yeso towe tohi awire, amosabise, hiniya Birato hinahabebonaya, mai kahabana,
yama hani ati‑mete‑nima mai na, hawa tohe, awa‑ya waane‑ya mai idibasa, yati hodi‑ya mai hinafoye,
abe Deoso hinakitamemonane.
Yeso kitame‑ya mai awarima na, hika da‑daba mai hiawa, Karireya‑ya mai sawemaro mai hiawa, Yerosare‑ya mai eyehe kameya, mai awa na, mai dami‑ya tamine mai hiyarawahane.
Ai‑ka idi mai‑ya Deoso Ati Amosabote‑ya hiyaremata, fare Ati Amosabote dai‑ya oda kaminineni.
Ai‑ka idi mai‑ya hiyare, ati‑mata‑nima yama na, ai awawaha, Yeso‑ya Deoso nakitamebona ati nemata, fare hinakitamawahene. Yeso tamine‑ya Deoso kamine, ati‑ya Dafi kanahanomata,
‘Oka dao amatini. Hibayata tiwa oka dao oneni.’ Deoso ati nematane.
Fare hinakitame, abamaterebona, bataterebona,
‘Dafi okasomamaro, tiwa okasomahareboneni.’ Deoso ati ne.
Dafi‑ka yama hani one ati,
‘Oka Ka‑kadika bataterebonane.’ Deoso ati ne.
Owati dai mitamakihi. Hibati‑ya Deoso ati‑ya Dafi nofe, bote toheya, abo batematane.
Yeso‑ta Deoso hinakitame, bataterene.
Soho, yama dai watomakihi. Yeso ene Deoso ai‑ya ati somawamatene.
Yeso ati ai nofa, ai‑ya Deoso ati somawamatene. Mose‑ka yama hani ati ihi ai‑ya Deoso ati somawamare, Yeso ati ai nofa‑ta Deoso ai‑ya ati somawamatene.
Dai noko wadahi. Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai ati‑ya mai tokadabara mai‑ya yama towe kobonameteni. Fara mai ati dai nofara yama towe dai‑ya kobonahareboneni.
Dai habo kita, Deoso ati dai mitahi.
‘Owati‑ya mai mita owa ene‑ya mai awa, tiwa‑ya mai kamina, mai ati dai nofaraboneni. Mai ati dai nofara, dai habo siitona, dai abawahaboneni.’ Deoso ati nematane.” Baoro ati nemonane.
Mai tokabone, Baoro‑ya mai hiyara,
“Sabado one‑ya tiwati oda mitamatasaboneni.” Mai ati namoneni.
Mai toka, mai nowati‑ya Baoro mai‑ya mai one dabamake, Yodeo mai one toha, Bara mai one toha na, Baoro mai‑ya mai dabamake, mai‑ya Baoro mai hiyara,
“Deoso ati‑ya dai ati kadamowamariyahi. Deoso ati amose dai nofahi.” Baoro, Banabe mai ati namoneni.
Sabado one‑ya mai dama mai yorotokanineni, Deoso ati tamine‑ya mai mitabonehe.
Mai dama, mai‑ya Yodeo mai awa, mai ati yawawaha,
“Baoro keyehe‑ya hirine. Deoso ati‑ya kamini awire, Satanasi ati‑ya kaminabisane.” Mai ati namoneni, mai yawaro.
Baoro, Banabe, mai fama mai ati fawani awira,

“Yodeo dai toha, Deoso ati ene dai oda hiyari baha, dai ati a‑arira, Deoso ati dai nofara, Deoso tabaro‑ya dai wini awirabone, dai abi ohareboneni. Dai ati ene Bara mai‑ya oda tokiya, mai oda hiyarawahaboneni.
Deoso oda‑ya hiyare, ati oda mite,

‘Bara mai‑ya dai toka, mai‑ka yama wahi‑nima dai naboneni. Mai manakone‑ya Yeso nanahabe tamine mai watowahabone, mai tabori dami‑ya dai ati‑ya mai nofiya, owa tabaro‑ya mai winamakeboneni.’ Deoso ati nemarine.” Baoro ati nemonane.
Baoro ati‑ya Bara mai mita, mai ya‑yaina, Deoso ati‑ya mai kahiyara, Deoso mai‑ya kadikemata, Yeso ati‑ya mai nofawahani.
Tabora dami‑ka Yeso tamine‑ya mai nafi mitawaha,
Yodeo mai ati ihi sidadi‑ka hidi fana mai toha, hidi makidi mai toha na, mai ati yawa, mai ihi mai nafi ati yawa, mai ihi tabora bara‑kaya Baoro, Banabe mai towakawahani.
Baoro mai tame mekori‑ya mai nanahaba,
“Oda teme mekori oda nanahabi‑nima dai abawahaboneni, Deoso ati dai nofararo.” Mai ati na.
Ikoniyo‑ya mai towakawahamoneni.
Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa, Deoso‑ka Doni mai‑ya sawi ene mai ya‑yainamoneni.
Ikoniyo‑ya Baoro mai kobokana, Yodeo mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya mai towakiyoma, mai‑ya mai hiyara, mai ati ihi Yeso ati‑ya mai dama mai nofawahamoneni. Yodeo mai toha, Bara mai toha, mai naro.
Yodeo mai one Yeso ati‑ya mai nofara, iha‑nima mai ati toha, Baoro mai tamine‑ya keyehe‑ya mai hirina, mai ati ihi Baoro mai ati‑ya Bara mai nofaramoneni.
Ikoniyo‑ya mai wina mai amoni dami‑ya, Yeso tamine‑ya mai hiyara, Deoso mai‑ya kasome, Baoro mai ihi kita‑ya mai awa, mai‑ya mai nakitamineni. Deoso ene tohe‑ya mai watowahamoneni.
Mai dama, mai one Baoro mai ati‑ya mai nofa, mai one Yodeo mai ati‑ya mai nofa, mai nineni.
Bara mai one toha, Yodeo mai one toha, mai‑ka hidi mai one toha na, i‑di Baoro, i‑di Banabe, mai‑ya mai ati bisina, mai‑ya mai ati nanahababoneni, yati‑ya.
