Mai tamine‑ya i‑di Baoro mai mita, tabora webote oni Rika·oni‑kaya mai kanani towaka, Rika·oni‑ka tabora bi‑bidi na oni Derebi toha, Risita toha na‑ya mai towakani.
Fara‑ya Yeso Ati Amosabote‑ya mai kamineni.
Maki wade‑ya ka‑kakone‑mata, yakatere, bote tohe, Risita‑ya wine, itarine.
Ka‑kakone Baoro ati‑ya mite, Baoro‑ya kakatome,
“Deoso ati‑ya nofe awane, Deoso hinakitamebonane.” Baoro atibodi ati nane, hiwakatomeri.
Baoro ati mai himitebona ati yanane ati kite,
“Tiwaamisiya, tiwa teme‑kaya tiwaawahi.” Baoro ati ne.
Ka‑kakone yoranimise, waane, yakatere yakanawahemonane.
Baoro ene‑ya mai awa, hini mai ati‑ya mai ibi haana,
“Deoso mai amani, ai tabora‑ya deoso mai kobokana, ai awi‑nima mai awinineni.” Mai ati namoneni.
I‑di Banabe‑ya mai awa,
“Ai‑ka deoso owa i‑di Yobita tohe awane.” Mai ati na.
Baoro tamine‑ya mai ibi hiyara,
“Ai‑ka deoso owa i‑di Mekoriyo tohe awane.” Mai ati na.
Baoro mai‑ya hiyari ba‑basi ne ene i‑di Mekoriyo tohemona mai ati namoneni.

Yama yakari‑ya, i‑di Yobita‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe waane, Yobita‑ka mai kamineni. Bowi‑ya mai kakama, bowi‑ya mai nabohaboneni, Banabe‑ka bani‑bonaha. Banabe‑ka awa mowe‑bone toha na‑ya mai weyekana, mai kamineni.
“Ai‑ka deoso amane.” Mai ati namoneni.
Mai ihi‑ya i‑di Banabe i‑di Baoro mai awa, mai ati yawa, mai‑ka bora‑ya mai sibina, mai yorotokana, mai‑ya mai kanani towaka.

“Haa‑nima dai riyahi, deoso oda tohi awirini. Dai one oda amani. Deoso yokana Ati Amosabote oda kaminabone oda kakamani. Dai‑ka deoso bara hini mai tohiya, dai‑ya mai kasomara, mai‑ya dai kahiyarariyahi. Deoso yokana‑ta dai nofabisahi. Deoso yokana neme‑ya wama, bofe‑ya wama, faha webote‑ya wama, faha abe na, yama nafi‑ya Deoso yokana wama nibisane.
Hibati‑ya mai tabori dami‑ya mai wi‑wina Deoso yokana mai atibodi‑ya barikare, hini mai atibodi ati‑nima mai nineni.
Deoso yokana ene dai awateni. Deoso ene faha kaki, awa bono hada na‑ya dai kaba dai ya‑yainineni.” Baoro mai ati namoneni.
Baoro mai ati fawana, Banabe mai‑ka bowi‑bona mai ati nanahabanasa na,
“Deoso mai toha awineni.” Mai ati na.
I‑di Baoro mai‑ya ati barinane.
Atioki‑ka mai toha, Ikoniyo‑ka mai toha na, mai kamake, mai‑ya mai hiyara,
“Baoro mai ati kasira, mai ati dai mitariyahi.” Mai ati na,
mai ati‑ya mai mita, yati‑ya i‑di Baoro‑ya mai baana, mai hinahabe,
“Abe amanakani.” Mai ati na,
tabora awiri‑kaya Baoro horoniya mai tokamoneni.
Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa Baoro home‑ya mai kakatoma, mai yorona, Baoro kitame waamisame, mai tabori‑kaya mai‑ya tosawime, mahi owa‑ya Banabe eyehe Derebi‑kaya mai towakamamoneni.
Derebi‑kaya Yeso Ati Amosabote‑ya mai kamina, mai ati ihi, Yeso ati‑ya mai dami nofawaha, makobote Risita‑ya mai tokomatasa, Ikoniyo‑ya mai tokomatasa, Atioki‑ya mai tokomatasa, mai namoneni.
Baoro mai ati ihi Yeso ati‑ya mai nofa mai atibodi kitamamoneni. Mai‑ya hiyare,
“Dai‑ya mai bisina, Yeso ati‑ya dai nofasa nahi, Deoso hawine‑ya ai sawe, ai‑ya mai bisina, ai habo siitoriyahi.” Mai ati namoneni.

Sidadi‑nima Kirisito‑ka mai toha, mai‑ka webote mai‑bone mai‑ya Baoro mai kadika, mai eyehe Deoso‑ya mai hiyara, mahi owa‑ya Baoro mai tokabone, mai tafarani, Deoso‑ya mai kahiyarabonehe. Mai‑ya Baoro mai hiyara,
“Yeso ati dai no‑nofa Deoso dai‑ya kasomayaho.” Mai ati namoneni.
Mai towaka, tabora webote oni Bisidiya‑ya mai fiyakana, tabora webote one Banafiriya‑ya mai kobokana,
Banafiriya‑ka tabora bide oni Beki toha‑ya, Yeso tamine‑ya mai hiyara, mai hiyari hawa toha, mai towakamatasa, tabora bide one oni Atariya toha‑kaya mai towakama,

Atariya‑ya maboro‑ya mai foya, tabora webote Siriya‑ka tabora bide oni Atioki‑ya mai towakamaboneni. Hibati‑ya Atioki‑ya mai mai hiyose, Deoso tamine‑ya mai hiyarabone mai towakamete mai hiyari hawa toha, mai winitokanamamoneni.
Mai kobokanama, mai ati ihi Kirisito‑ka mai‑ya mai yorotokana, Deoso mai‑ya kasome tamine‑ya mai kamina,
“Yeso ati‑ya Bara mai nofawahineni, Deoso ene.” Mai ati namoneni.
Abariko dameya, Kirisito‑ka mai eyehe mai winamoneni.
Yodeya‑ya mai wi‑wina Atioki‑ya mai toka, Kirisito‑ka mai‑ya mai kanawata,
“Mose ati‑nima dai sowiri tati ataro abahi. Dai sowiri tati ataro abi awiriya, Deoso dai‑ya ati somawamaterebonane.” Mai ati namoneni.
I‑di Baoro, i‑di Banabe mai fama mai‑ya mai weena,
“Yama dai watora, dai ati fawanahi. Yodeo mai toha, mai sowiri tati atori aba sibarihi, Bara mai sowiri tati atori abara sibarihi nineni.” Baoro mai ati na.
“Yama dai watora, Mose ati‑ya mai tokadabara, mai sowiri tati atori‑ya mai nanahabi awiriya, Deoso mai‑ya ati somawami awirebonane.” Yodeya‑ya mai kama, mai ati na,
mai ibi weenademoneni. Mai ibi weena mai ihi Baoro mai‑ya Kirisito‑ka mai yose,

“Baoro, Banabe, Yerosare‑ya dai tokahi. Oda‑ka mai one dai‑ya mai dababone, Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai toha, Kirisito‑ka bote mai toha na, mai ati dai mitahi. Fai‑ya tamine dai mita, yama ai watowahaboneni.” Kirisito‑ka mai ati namoneni.
Mai mai hiyose, Fenisiya‑ya mai fiyakana, Samariya‑ya mai fiyakana, mai na, hini mai yakaniya, Bara mai tamine‑ya mai hiyara,
“Yeso ati‑ya Bara mai nofawahineni.” Mai ati na,
Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa Baoro mai ati‑ya mai mita, mai ya‑yainamoneni.
Yerosare‑ya mai kobona, Kirisito‑ka mai‑ya mai hiyara, Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai toha, bote mai toha na, mai‑ya mai hiyara,
“Deoso oda‑ya kasome, oda ati ene Yeso ati‑ya Bara mai nofawahineni.” Mai ati na.
Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa, fariseo mai toha, mai one waamisa,
“Bara Yeso ati‑ya mai nofabone, Mose ati‑nima mai nahi. Mai sowiri tati atori abahi.” Mai ati namoneni.
Yeso‑ka yo‑yose, bote mai‑ya mai yorotokanineni, Mose ati tamine‑ya mai hiyarabonehe.
Mai dami hiyari hawa tohiya, Bedoro waamise,
“Soho, owati dai mitahi. Hibati‑ya Deoso owa‑ya yosemarine, Bara mai‑ya Yeso Ati Amosabote ohiyarabonehe. Bara owati‑ya mai mita, Yeso ati‑ya mai nofawaha, mai dai watoneni.
Ai atibodi‑ya Deoso wato, Yeso ati‑ya mai nofawaha, Deoso‑ka Doni mai‑ya sawi, oda‑ya sawi‑nima mai‑ya sawiwahane.
Deoso noko‑ka oda‑nima mai na, Yeso ati‑ya mai nofa, mai‑ya ati somawamane.
I‑di Mose ati‑ya ai‑ka idi mai tokadabara, ati ai tokadabaharire. Hini yamata ihi Bara mai‑ya dai ati bari, Mose ati‑ya mai tokadabara, Deoso‑ka mai toharabone dai ati na, Deoso yawebonane.
Mose ai manakone‑ya nanahabarihi, manakone ai nanahabarihi ne, ai‑ka Ayo Yeso Kirisito ati‑ya ai nofa, ai manakone aba, Yeso ati‑ya mai nofa, mai manakone abahari teni.” Bedoro ati nemonane.
Mai ati fawana, Baoro, Banabe mai fama, mai‑ya mai hiyara, Bara mai‑ya mai sawe, Deoso ene kite‑ya mai awa, tamine‑ya mai kaminamoneni.
Mai ati fawaniya, Tiyako waamise, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Okoyo dai toha, oka soho dai toha na, owati dai mitahi.
Simaho Bedoro ati dai mita,
‘Hibati‑ya Bara mai‑ya Deoso haane, mai‑ya kayafebonaha.’ Ati ne.
Fara‑nima yama na‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai kanahano,
‘Okomatasiya, Dafi‑ka yobe abe, wama·onamatasaboneni. Yobe abe sone, onawaamisamaboneni.
Hibati‑ya dai‑ka mai toha, Bara mai toha na, dai okadikamaro, owa ene‑ya dai awa, owa‑ya dai sibanabone, dai nafi‑ka Hidi ohawahaboneni.’ Deoso ati ne.
Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai hikanahanameteni.
Owatibodi ati dai mitahi. Yeso ati‑ya Bara mai nofa, Deoso hawine‑ya mai yaka na, mai‑ya ai ati maakariyahi.
Mai‑ka yama hani‑ba ai kanahanohi.
‘Mai‑ka deoso bare‑ka bani‑bona mai daahine‑ya dai kabarihi, mai fanawi one‑ya dai aharihi, bani emene abare eme dai kabarihi nahi.’ Ai‑ka yama hani ati naboneni.
Deoso ati i‑di Mose hikanahanomata, sabado hinama‑ya Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya mai hikadike, ati‑ya mai dami mitateni.” Tiyako ati nemonane.
Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai toha, Yeso‑ka bote mai toha, Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai toha, mai na, mai ibi hiyara,
“Ai‑ka mai one ai yosehi, Baoro, Banabe mai fama, mai‑ya mai dabiya, Atioki‑ya mai tokabonehe. Ai‑ka webote mai fama, i‑di Yoda Basaba, i‑di Sira ne, mai ai yosehi.” Mai ati na.
Atioki‑ya mai wi‑wina mai‑ka yama hani‑bone‑ya mai kanahano,

“Atioki‑ya dai wi‑wina, Siriya‑ya dai wi‑wina, Sirisiya‑ya dai wi‑wina, dai na, dai‑ka yama hani‑bone‑ya. Yeso‑ka yo‑yose oda toha, oda‑ka bote mai toha na, dai‑ka yama hani‑bone oda kanahanoneni. Hibati‑ya Bara‑ta dai tohamaro, hibayata oda‑ka soho dai tohawahineni.
Oda tabaro‑ya mai sa‑sawi dai tabaro‑ya mai toka, keyehe‑ya mai hirina, mai ati ihi dai atibodi komamoneni. Mai oda yose awiraroni.
Fara ihi oda‑ka yokana mai oda kadikani, dai tabaro‑ya mai tokabonehe. Oda‑ka soho i‑di Baoro, i‑di Banabe, mai fama, mai‑ya mai saweboneni.
Hini mai‑ya mai nofara, ai‑ka Hidi i‑di Yeso Kirisito ati‑ya mai nofabisa, ati mai hiwakamebonane. Mai abi yanatonamaro, mai oda nofi nafine.
Oda ati ene i‑di Yoda i‑di Sira mai fama, dai tabaro‑ya mai towakaboneni, oda‑ka yama hani ati‑nima dai‑ya mai hiyaraboneni.
Haa‑nima dai niya, sibaraboneni. Deoso‑ka Doni ati toha, oda ati toha nineni.

Mai‑ka deoso bare‑ka bani‑ya dai kabarihi, ama dai kabarihi, bani emene abare eme dai kabarihi, mai fanawi one dai aharihi nahi. Oda ati‑nima dai niya, dai sibaraboneni. Feye amani.” Yama hani ati nineni.
Yama hani‑ya mai damakana, mai towakama, Atioki‑ya mai kobokana, Kirisito‑ka mai nafi yorotokana, mai‑ya yama hani‑ya mai daanineni.
Yama hani‑ya mai kadika, mai ya‑yaina,
“Yama hani ati sibarini. Oda ya‑yainineni.” Mai ati namoneni.
Yoda, Sira mai fama Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita mai toha, Kirisito‑ka mai‑ya mai hiyara, mai ati ihi mai ya‑yaina, mai habi kitawahamoneni.
Mai amoni damara, Yerosare‑ya mai wininamabone,
“Dai‑ya mai yoseni dai tokomahi. Oda ya‑yainawahani.” Kirisito‑ka mai ati namoneni.
Sira‑ta towitakose,
Atioki‑ya Baoro, Banabe mai wina, mai dami eyehe, ai‑ka Ayo ati‑ya mai kamina, mai‑ya mai kanawatamoneni.
Makobote Banabe‑ya Baoro hiyare,
“Hima, hibati‑ya ai towakimaro‑ka tabora‑ya ai towakamatasahi. Mai ai hiyaramaro ai‑ka soho mai tohawaha, mai ati ai mitabani.” Baoro ati ne.
“Hehe, ai towaka, ai‑ya Yowaho Maroko dabaho.” Banabe ati ne.
“Yowaho Maroko ai‑ya dabarebonane. Hibati‑ya ai‑ya sawi, Banafiriya‑ya wininame, ai‑ya kasomaremarine.” Baoro ati ne.
Yowaho Maroko ene mai ibi weena, mai famamara, i‑di Banabe i‑di Maroko‑ya fame, Sibe‑ya mai towakamoneni.
Baoro i‑di Sira‑ya haanane, mai towakamabonehe.
“Deoso dai‑ya sawine.” Kirisito‑ka mai ati namoneni.
Siriya‑ya mai towaka, Sirisiya‑kaya mai towakawaha, Kirisito‑ka mai‑ya mai hiyara, mai habi kitawahani.
Derebi‑ya Baoro mai towaka, Risita‑ya mai towakawaha, Risita‑ya Timoti wine. Timoti madi Yeso ati‑ya no‑nofa, Yodeo toha, badi‑ta Kereko toha nemonane.
“Timoti ene amosatene.” Yeso‑ka mai ati na.
Risita‑ka mai, Ikoniyo‑ka mai na, Timoti‑ya mai nofamoneni.
I‑di Baoro mai‑ya i‑di Timoti sawibona, sowiri tati ataro i‑di Baoro wisinakosane. Timoti badi Kereko tohe‑ya Yodeo mai nafi wata, fara Timoti sowiri tati ataro‑ya wisinakosane, mai yawarabonehe.
Mai tabori dami‑ya mai toka, mai tabori‑ya mai kobona, Yeso‑ka yo‑yose mai toha, Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai‑ka bote mai toha na, mai‑ka yama hani Yerosare‑ya mai hikanahanamete, ati‑ya mai kamina,
“Mai‑ka yama hani ati‑nima dai niyahi.” Mai ati namoneni.
Baoro mai ati ihi Yeso‑ka mai habi kitawaha, mai dodamawahamoneni.
Tabora webote oni Firikiya‑ya, mai fiyakana, tabora webote one Karatiya‑ya mai fiyakana, tabora webote one Asiya‑ya Yeso ati‑ya mai kaminabone mai atibodi ati na, Deoso‑ka Doni mai‑ya ati barine.
Tabora webote Misiya‑ya mai kobona, tabora webote Bitiniya‑ya mai ati toka, Yeso‑ka Doni mai‑ya ati baritase,
Tabora webote Misiya‑ya mai fiyakana, Torowadi‑ya mai kobona,
Torowadi‑ya Baoro wada‑ya awe, Masedoni‑ke ai owa ati wadarine‑ya mitane,
“Masedoni‑kaya dai kakihi, oda dai kasomabonehe.” Ati wadari ati ne.
“Deoso ene amane. Masedoni‑kaya Yeso Ati Amosabote‑ya mai‑ya ai kaminaboneni.” Oda ati namaroni.
Maboro‑ya oda foya, faha teberi oni Samotasi‑ya oda towaka, mahi owa‑ya faha widi Ni·abori‑ya oda kobokana,
Ni·abori‑ya oda fidotona, tabora webote oni Masedoni‑ka tabora ba‑basi na oni Firibo toha‑ya oda tokawaha, Firibo‑ya homano mai dama mai wina, mai tabori‑ya oda winawahani.
Firibo‑ya Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe wadare ene Sabado‑ya mai fanawi yorotokana, faha widi‑ya Deoso‑ya mai hiyarateni. Mai‑ya oda tokomake, mai oda hiyarawahamaroni.

Fana ohare oni Ridiya toha, tabori bote oni Tiyatira tohateni. I‑di Ridiya bora amosa‑ya da‑daa, yinero‑ya kanikateni. Deoso‑ya nofa, Yeso tamine‑ta wato awisara. Baoro Yeso tamine‑ya kamine, ati‑ya Ridiya mita, Yeso ati‑ya nofawaha,
Ridiya hika mai eyehe habanisa, oda‑ya hiyara,
“Yeso ati onofamone dai ati na, oka yobe‑ya dai winawahi.” Ati na.
Hika yobe‑ya oda winawahamaroni.
Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ya oda tokatasa, fana mai hikanikamete oda‑ya kobona, madi towe fana‑ya foyane. Madi towe ene yama nabone‑ya fana kamina ihi hika hidi yinero nafi‑ya mai kayafateni.
Oda nowati‑kaya fana kamake, mai‑ya haana,
“Deoso kitabote yokana‑ka yo‑yose mai toha, mai ati dai tokadaba, dai abiya, Deoso tabaro‑ya dai winaboneni.” Ati namaroni.
Mahi‑nima fana ati yanani dama ihi Baoro ati yawe, kiinawame, madi towe‑ya hiyare,
“Yeso ati ene tikahi. Fana atibodi‑ya tifoyamariyahi.” Ati ne,
ati ene madi towe toke, ene fana yama nabone‑ya watomara, hikaminamaramaroni.
Fana‑ka hidi mai ati yawawaha,
“Fana‑ya madi foyamare ene yinero oda kayafamara oda naboneni.” Fana‑ka hidi mai ati namaroni.
Baoro, Sira, mai fama mai‑ya fana‑ka hidi mai waratona, mai‑ya mai horoni towakamamaroni kofeno‑ka mai‑ya.
Kofeno‑ka mai‑ya mai hiyara,
“Yodeo mai toha, mai ihi towe toha, oda tabaro‑ya mai towe tonihi teni.
Ai‑ka hidi ati‑nima mai ihi ni awira. Homano ai toha, mai ati‑nima ai terani.” Kofeno‑ka mai‑ya fana‑ka hidi mai ati namaroni.
Mai naha, Baoro mai‑ya mai weena, kofeno‑ka mai ati ihi Baoro, Sira mai‑ka bora‑ya mai tanina, mai‑ya mai kosinamaroni.
Mai kosini‑ya mai hawa toha, kadeya‑ya mai‑ya mai nafoyabone, kadeya hidi‑ya mai hiyara,
“Mai tiwakatomahi. Mai towakariyahi. Mai towakiya, tiwa‑ta tiwa oda nanahababoneni.” Kofeno‑ka mai ati na.
Mai ati‑ya kadeya hidi mite, Baoro mai‑ya towakame, kadeya dori‑ya mai‑ya nafoye, mai tameribi‑ya awa webote‑ya barikanemarine.
Yama soki bai‑ya Baoro, Sira mai fama, mai wayoma, Deoso‑ya mai hiyara na, kadeya‑ya mai fo‑foya mai one wayomi‑ya mai mitamoneni.
Wami wawawakawaha, wawakani ihi kadeya abi yanatona, kadeya nokobiri seekana, kadeya dori‑ka mai nafi seekana namoneni.
Kadeya hidi amone, wami wawawakana ihi dodafi, kadeya nokobiri seekana‑ya awe, Yima‑ya hini‑ya nanahabebona,
“Kadeya‑ya mai foya mai toka awineni.” Atibodi ati nemonane.
Hini‑ya watikane‑ya Baoro haane,
“Tiwa arabatinahi, oda nafi nahoneni. Oda toki awirini.” Baoro ati ne.
Kadeya hidi hika yama wahi‑bone‑ya haane, mai‑ya tokomaki, yobati‑kaya itane, wawawakaneri.
Mai‑ya himane, mai‑ya towakamane.
“Hini yamata‑nima obati, Deoso tabaro‑ya owinabonehe?” Kadeya hidi ati ne.
“Ai‑ka Hidi Yeso Kirisito ati tinofiya, tiwa manakone aba, tika mai manakone aba, Deoso tabaro‑ya dai winaboneni.” Mai ati nineni.
Kadeya hidi hika mai eyehe‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mai kamineni.
Mai hiyari hawa toha, mai mai kosihina, mai‑ka ko‑kosi ihi‑ya kadeya hidi sokonawahane. Yeso ati‑ya kadeya hidi nofawahe, hika mai eyehe habanisawahane.
I‑di Baoro, i‑di Sira mai fama mai‑ya towakame, hika yobe‑ya mai‑ya natafane. Kadeya hidi, hika mai eyehe Deoso ati‑ya mai nofa, mai ya‑yainineni.
Yama wahabisari‑ya kofeno‑ka mai ati ihi sodado mai toka, kadeya hidi‑ya mai yose,
“Mai seetikanahi.” Mai ati na.
“Sira dai see·okanabone mai ati na, dai see·okana, dai towakamahi. Dai‑ya mai weenamaraboneni.” Baoro‑ya kadeya hidi ati ne.
Ati‑ya Baoro mite, ati yanane,

“Homano oda toha, mai dama mai noki‑ya oda‑ya mai bisina, homano mai ai bisiterani. Oda ene amosa, hiniya oda‑ya mai bisina, kadeya‑ya oda‑ya mai yaditona, hibayata hiniya oda‑ya mai yose, oda tokomabone mai ati na. Hiniya oda toki awiraboneni. Ahi‑ya mai kamiya, mai aboni oda‑ya mai seekanahi.” Baoro ati nane.
Kofeno‑ka mai‑ya sodado mai tokoma, Baoro ati‑ya mai kamineni. Sodado ati‑ya mai mita, kofeno‑ka mai atibodi mai dika,
“Homano mai toha, mai oda bisina, hini oda ene oda‑ka hidi oda‑ya mai bisinawahaba awineni.” Mai atibodi ati na.
Mai habi siitoneni.
Kadeya‑ya mai toka, Baoro mai‑ya mai hiyara,
“Towe oda amani, dai‑ya oda bisinaro. Dai towakamahi. Oda‑ya dai ati somawamahi. Dai oda bisinamaterabani. Tabora one‑ya dai towakamahi.” Mai ati na.
Ridiya‑ka yobe‑ya i‑di Baoro mai towakama, Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai yorotokana, mai‑ya i‑di Baoro hiyare, mai ya‑yaina, hiyari hawa tohe, i‑di Sira mai fama mai towakamamaroni.
Afibori‑ka mai tabori‑ya Baoro mai fiyakana, Aboroniya‑ka mai tabori‑ya mai fiyakana na, mai toka, Tesaronika‑ka mai tabori‑ya mai kobona, Tesaronika‑ya Yodeo mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe owa tohane.
Fare yobe‑ya Baoro tokane, mai‑ya hiyarebonaha. Sabado‑ya Yodeo mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya Baoro tokatene. Sabado fama Sabado one ohari na‑ya mai‑ya hiyare, Deoso‑ka yama hani tamine‑ya hiyarane.
“‘Kirisito mai bisihineya, mai hinahabeya, kitamebonane.’ Deoso‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Yeso ai‑ka Kirisito tohe, Yeso tamine‑ya dai‑ya ohiyarateni.” Ati ne.
Baoro ati‑ya Yodeo mai one nofa, Baoro‑ya mai sawimake, Kereko mai dama Baoro ati‑ya mai nofa, mai fanawi hidi toha, Baoro ati‑ya mai nofa na, Baoro, Sira mai fama mai‑ya mai sawimakemoneni.

Yodeo mai one Baoro ati‑ya mai mita, mai yawa, mai ihi amosara mai tabori‑ya mai toka, mai‑ya mai himana, mai dami yorotokana, Yasoho‑ka yobe‑ya mai toka, mai yakana, mai ati kitineni, Baoro mai‑ya mai watabonehe. Yasoho‑ka yobe‑ya mai kobona, mai tokiyomani, Baoro, Sira mai fama mai‑ya mai watiya, mai‑ya mai daahinabonehe.
Baoro mai‑ya mai wasira, Yasoho toha, Yeso‑ka mai one toha na, mai‑ya mai waratona, sidadi hidi mai‑ya mai daaneni. Mai ati kita,
“Baoro, Sira mai fama ai tabaro dami‑ya mai toka, mai ihi amosara hinama toha, hibayata ai tabaro‑ya mai koboneni.
Yasoho‑ka yobe‑ya mai winawaha, ai‑ka hidi webote i‑di Sesa ati‑ya mai nofara, mai‑ka hidi webote oni Yeso tohemona Baoro mai ati teni.” Mai ati namoneni.
Mai ati‑ya mai nafi mita, mai yawa, mai‑ka hidi mai toha na, mai nafi ati kitawahamoneni.
Yasoho mai‑ka yinero‑ya sidadi‑ka hidi kayafe, yinero‑ya mai manakone‑ya mai nanahaba, hini mai tabori‑ya mai tokomamoneni.
Yama soki‑ya Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa Baoro, Sira mai fama mai‑ya mai yose,
“Bereya‑ya dai towakahi.” Mai ati na.
Mai ati ihi Bereya‑ya mai towaka, mai kobokana, Yodeo mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya mai towakiyomineni, mai‑ya mai hiyarabonehe.

Tesaronika‑ka mai narabi hawi bi‑bidi na, Bereya‑ka mai narabi hawi ba‑basi na, Baoro ati‑ya mai mita, mahi‑nima Deoso ati‑ya mai kadika, Deoso ati‑nima Baoro ati amane, mai awa, ati mai nofawahamoneni.
Yodeo mai dama mai toha, Kereko mai‑ka hidi fana mai toha, makidi mai toha na, Yeso ati‑ya mai nofawahamoneni.
Bereya‑ya Deoso tamine‑ya Baoro kamine, tamine‑ya Tesaronika‑ka Yodeo mai mita, mai yawamatasa, Bereya‑ya mai toka, Baoro tamine‑ya keyehe‑ya mai hirina, mai nafi yorotokana, mai ati kitawahamoneni.
Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa Baoro‑ya mai yose,
“Faha webote widi‑ya toka kanibote tinahi.” Mai ati na.
Bereya‑ya i‑di Sira, i‑di Timoti mai fama mai demetonakosa, faha webote widi‑ya Baoro tokabisemonane.
Bereya‑ka mai one Baoro‑ya sawe, Atena‑kaya mai towaka, Atena‑ya mai kobona, Baoro‑ta towitakose, mai winikanamabone, mai‑ya Baoro hiyare,
“Dai kobotokanamiya, i‑di Sira, Timoti mai fama, mai dai yosemiya, mai kakama kanibote niyahi.” Baoro ati nemonane.
Atena‑ya Baoro wine, Sira, Timoti mai‑ya nimane. Atena‑ka mai‑ka deoso bara mai dama, mai‑ya i‑di Baoro awe, yawemonane. Mai‑ka deoso yokana tohi awire, deoso yati wamani hinama tohani.

Mahi‑nima Deoso yokana tamine‑ya mai‑ya hiyaranadi, mai‑ka tabora bai‑ya mai yorotokana, mai‑ya hiyare, Sabado‑ya Yodeo mai toha, Deoso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai toha na, Deoso‑ya Yodeo mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya mai yorotokana, mai‑ya hiyaremonane.
Ebekoriyo mai toha, Esitoiko mai toha na, Baoro‑ya mai hiyara, Deoso tamine‑ya mai ibi hiyara,
“Baoro yama‑ya watore, hini yamata‑nima ati nati?” Mai one ati na.
“Mai one‑ka deoso tamine‑ya hiyare awane.” Mai one ati na.
Yeso abe, kitame ene ai kitamaharebone tamine‑ya Baoro hiyarane. Ai kitamabone tamine‑ya mai mita, yama‑ya mai watorani.
“Are·obako‑ya ai tokomahi. Tiwati oda mitaboneni.” Mai ati na.
Baoro‑ya mai towakama,
“Tiwati oda mitatera, oda mitawahaboneni.
Haa‑nima mai ati na, oda mitatera, tiwati oda mita, oda mitamatasiya, oda watowahaba awineni.” Mai ati na.
Atena‑ka mai toha, Atena‑ya mai one wi‑wina yama anini‑ya mai nofara,
“Hiniya mai ati ai mitiya, yama ai watowahaboneni.” Mai ati na.
Yama bara tamine‑ya mai hiyaranaditeni.
Are·obako‑ya mai naha, mai noki‑ya Baoro waamise, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Owati dai mitahi, deoso mai dama mai dai nofa,
Dai tabaro‑ya yaka·ona, dai‑ka deoso yati wamani‑ya kii·ona, yati wamani one‑ya oawani. Yati wamani one‑ya yama hani okadika,
‘Deoso owa oni oda watorani.’ Yama hani ati nani.
Fara amani. Deoso oni dai watore, tamine ohiyarawahineni. Hibati‑ya hika yama‑bone dai daana, tamine‑ya dai watowahaboneni.
Hibati‑ya yama nafi‑ya Deoso wama, wami‑ya wama, neme‑ya wama nematane. Yama nafi‑ka hidi tohe, yobe‑ya ai wamana‑ya winaterene.
Ai‑ka yama‑ya kayafaterene. Yama nafi Deoso‑ka toha, Deoso ai‑ya wamane ene ai nafi hasi, Deoso ene yama nafi tohani.
Ai ohari‑ya wamanemata, makobote hika nodi ai toha ai dodamawaha, bofe nafi‑nima ai nawaawaha, ai wini‑bone‑ya wato, ai tabaro‑bone‑ya hawa tonihi nematane. Dai tamine Deoso hiyare,
‘Owa‑ya mai sibana, owa‑ya mai wasiya, owati‑ya mai nofiya, owa‑ya mai watowahaboneni.’ Ati ne, ai yakari‑ya tohane.
Deoso ene ai hasina, ai toka, ai winateni. Deoso awire‑mana, ai hasira neni, ai aba neni.
‘Deoso bidi ai amani.’ Dai owa ati ne.
Fara amani. Deoso bidi ai amani.
Deoso bidi ai toha, ai‑ka Abi oro wamani toharihi, barata wamani toharihi, yati wamani toharihi tene. Ai‑ka Abi ai wamaterene.
Hibati‑ya Deoso yokana ai watore, ai‑ya weeni awire, hibayata ai watowahe,
‘Hibati‑ya dai ene towe tohamaro, dai‑ya dai kaminahi.’ Deoso ati nane.
Yeso ai ene‑ya kadikebona‑ke mahi‑ya Deoso wato, hibati‑ya Yeso‑ya kadikemata, Deoso ati‑mata‑nima yama nabone ai wato, Yeso‑ya nakitamebona ati nemata, Yeso‑ya nakitamane.” Baoro ati nemonane.
Yeso abe kitame, tamine‑ya mai mita, Baoro‑ya mai one hahakana,
“Mahi owa‑ya tiwati oda mitamatasaboneni.” Mai one ati na.
Mai ati ihi Baoro tokome,
Baoro ati‑ya mai nofa, Baoro‑ya mai sawi, Are·obako‑ka mai‑ka owa i‑di Dionisiyo toha, fana i‑di Damari toha, mai one fa‑famaraba na toha, Baoro‑ya mai sawi, Yeso ati‑ya mai nofawahani.
Makobote i‑di Baoro toke, Korito‑ka mai tabori‑ya kobone,
Korito‑ya i‑di Akira wine‑ka yobe‑ya Baoro kobone. Hibati‑ya Boto‑kaya Akira wine, makobote Homa‑ya toke, yara mai‑ka hidi i‑di Karaodio mai‑ya yose,
“Yodeo dai toha, dai nafi tokahi, ahi‑ya dai winamaraboneni.” I‑di Karaodio ati ne.
Ati ene Korito‑ya Akira fadi i‑di Birisira eyehe tokawahe, mai tabori‑ya Baoro kobonane.
Mai tabori‑ya Baoro winawahane. Bora kita‑ya yobe‑ya mai wa‑wama, mai‑nima i‑di Baoro ne, yama‑ya anitene.
Sabado‑ya Deoso‑ya Yodeo mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya tokatene. Yodeo mai toha, Kereko mai toha na, mai‑ya hiyaratene, yama‑ya mai watowahabonehe.
Makobote i‑di Sira, i‑di Timoti mai kobokana, Baoro yama‑ya aninami awire, hiniya hiyarane. Yodeo mai‑ya hiyare,
“Hibati‑ya Yeso Deoso hikadikemata Kirisito tohane.” Baoro ati nemonane.
Yodeo mai ati yawa, Baoro tamine‑mona‑ya keyehe‑ya mai hirina, Baoro‑ya mai weena, mai ati ihi, Baoro ati yawe, hika bora hibakori‑ya nanahabene, hibakori aba‑nima mai ababone mai awabonehe.
“Hini dai ene dai ababoneni. Owa ene toharaboneni. Bara mai‑ya ohiyarawahaboneni.” Baoro ati nemonane.
Bara mai‑ya Baoro toke, Deoso‑ya Yodeo mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe fowari‑ya Titiyo Yosito‑ka yobe waari‑ya tokane. Titiyo Yosito Deoso‑ya kahiyaratene.
Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe hidi i‑di Kirisibo, hika mai nafi eyehe Yeso ati‑ya mai nofawaha, Korito‑ka mai dama Baoro ati‑ya mai mita, Yeso ati‑ya mai nofa, mai mai habahinirisawahani.
Makobote yama soki‑ya Baoro Deoso ati wadarine‑ya mite,
“Baoro, tiwa habo kitahi. Owa tamine hibati‑ya tikaminamaro, tikaminamatasahi. Tiwati fawariyahi.
Tiwa‑ya osawebone, tiwa‑ya mai bisini awiraboneni. Mai ihi tiwa habo siitoriyahi. Oka mai dama ahi‑ya mai winateni.” Deoso ati wadarine ati nemonane.
Korito‑ya Baoro wine, hika abariko 18 tohe‑ya Deoso ati tamine‑ya hiyarane, mai‑ya kanawatori.
Makobote i‑di Kariyo, Akaiya‑ya mai wi‑wina mai‑ka hidi toheya, Yodeo mai yawawaha, Baoro‑ya mai waratona, i‑di Kariyo‑ya mai hiwakamane.
Kariyo‑ya mai hiyara,
“Kariyo, Baoro kositinahi. Mose ati‑nima ai rabone ati ne, Yeso ati‑nima Deoso ai hiyarabisabone Baoro ati nene.” Mai ati nani.
Mai ati‑ya Baoro mite, ati yananebona, ati‑ya i‑di Kariyo kahidi, ati yanane,
“Owati dai mitahi. Baoro mai‑ya bisi, mai‑ya nanahaba ne‑mana, tamine omite nane.
Hiniya bara mai tamine‑ya Baoro hiyaremona dai ati na, Mose ati tamine tohe, Mose ati owatoterani. Ati dai watobise, dai tokomahi. Dai ati omitamaraboneni.
Oka yobe‑ya dai nahoriyahi.” Kariyo ati nane, mai‑ya weeneri.

Korito‑ya Baoro wine, amoni ba‑basi namakiya, Senekereya‑ya tokawahane. Senekereya‑ya wine‑ya tati kone nafi‑ya nanahabe, Deoso hikasome ene Baoro ya‑yai, tati kone‑ya nanahabane, Deoso‑ya kahiyarebonaha. Hawa toheya, i‑di Baoro, i‑di Birisira, i‑di Akira mai na, maboro‑ya mai foya, Siriya‑ya mai tokaboneni.
Efesiyo‑ya mai kobona, Deoso‑ya Yodeo mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya Baoro tokiyome, mai‑ya kanawatone. I‑di Birisira, i‑di Akira mai winabisaboneni. Baoro‑ta tokebona ati ne.
“Baoro, oda tabaro‑ya tiwinahi.” Mai ati na.
“Hibayata dai tabaro‑ya owini awirabone,
Deoso ati sibareya, okomatasabani.” Baoro ati nane.
Maboro‑ya foyamatasane.
Sesareya‑ya fiyakane, Yerosare‑ya toke, Yeso‑ka mai‑ya hiyare, makobote Atioki‑ya tokome,
Atioki‑ya wine, makobote Karatiya mai tabori dami‑kaya tokomatasa, Firikiya mai tabori dami‑kaya tokomatasa ne. Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa Baoro ati ene mai habi kitawahamoneni.
I‑di Aboro, Yodeo tohe, Aresadiriya‑ya wademata, Efesiyo‑ya kame, Deoso ati‑ya wato ba‑basi ne.

Hibati‑ya i‑di Yeso Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika kobone tamine i‑di Yowaho Batita mai‑ya hiyare, mai‑ya habanirisane. Tamine‑ya Aboro wato, tamine mai one‑ya kanawatomakine. Yeso abe, kitame, ai manakone‑ya nanahabe tamine‑ya Aboro wato awisare, fara tamine mai‑ya kanawatorene.

Deoso‑ya Yodeo mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika tamine‑ya i‑di Aboro hiyare, habo siitore, ati‑ya i‑di Birisira i‑di Akira mai mita, mai tabori‑kaya mai hiwakame, Deoso hawine‑ya mai hikaminawahane.
Makobote Akaiya‑ya Aboro tokebona ati ne, ati‑ya mai mita, Aboro‑ya mai kasoma, Akaiya‑ya mai wi‑wina Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai‑ka yama hani‑bone‑ya mai kanahana, Aboro‑ya mai daaneni.
“Aboro ati sibare, ati dai mitahi. Dai‑ka one oda amani. Yeso ati oda no‑nofa oda amani.” Efesiyo‑ya mai wi‑wina mai‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Akaiya‑ya Aboro kobone, Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai‑ya kasomemonane.
Yodeo mai yorotokana mai‑ya hiyare,
“Deoso ati dai mitahi, Yeso ai‑ka Hidi Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika amane.” Aboro ati neya,
mai weena, Deoso‑ka yama hani‑ya Aboro yofikane, mai ati fawanamoneni.
Korito‑ya Aboro wineya, Efesiyo‑ya Baoro toke, kobone, Yeso‑ka mai one‑ya hiyare,
“Hibati‑ya Yeso ati‑ya dai nofa yati toha, Deoso‑ka Doni dai‑ya sawiraniha?” Baoro ati ne.
“Deoso‑ka Doni tamine oda mitaterani.” Mai ati na.
“Hini yamata‑nima mai na, dai‑ya mai habanirisimeteti?” Ati ne.
“Yowaho Batita ati ene oda‑ya mai habanirisamaroni.” Mai ati na.
Yowaho tamine Baoro mai‑ya hiyare,
“‘Deoso‑ya dai‑ya dai kaminahi. Owa nowati‑ya ai owa kamakibona, ati dai nofaho.’ Yowaho ati ne.
Fare Yeso tamine amane.” Baoro ati nane.
Baoro ati‑ya mai mita,
“Yeso ai‑ka Hidi tohane.” Mai ati na.
Mai mai habahinirisamatasineni.
Mai habanisi hawa toha, mai‑ya Baoro yehe fori, Deoso‑ka Doni mai‑ya sawiwahe, mai one ati‑ya Deoso tamine‑ya mai hiyarawahani.
Maki ai yehe kafama mai one famamaki na, Deoso tamine‑ya mai hiyarani.
Deoso‑ya Yodeo mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya Baoro tokiyome, mai‑ya hiyare, abariko fama abariko owa oharimaki ne‑ya mai‑ya hiyaranadi,
“Owati dai mitahi. Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika kobone, ai‑ka Hidi amane.” Baoro ati nane, habo kiteri.

Mai one Yeso ati‑ya mai nofara, mai ime kita, Yeso‑ka hawi‑ya mai sa‑sawi mai‑ya mai kaka, mai ati dama, mai‑ya Baoro dabamare, Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa Baoro eyehe mai toka, Tirano‑ka tabaro‑ya mai toka, mahi‑nima Baoro mai‑ya hiyarane.
Faha fowe fama‑ya Baoro mai‑ya hiyaranadi, mai‑ya hiyaranadine. Asiya‑ya mai wi‑wina mai nafi Yeso tamine‑ya mita, Yodeo mai toha, Bara mai toha na, Yeso tamine‑ya mai nafi mitamoneni.
Deoso ene Baoro ene kite, mai‑ya nakitamane.
Baoro‑ka reso, bora na‑ya mai towakama, mai kiyana, mai mese‑ya mai hinafore, Deoso ene mai kitama, mai‑ya madi mai foya, mai mese‑ya mai hinafore, Deoso ene madi mai kanana mai kitamateni.
Madi towe mai‑ya mai foya, mai‑ya Yodeo mai one kananihebone mai ati na,
“Yeso oni‑ya Baoro hirineya, madi towe mai kanateni.” Mai atibodi ati na.
Ai owa madi towe foye, madi towe‑ya mai hiyara,
“Yeso oni‑ya Baoro hiri ene oda ati‑ya dai mita, dai kananahi.” Mai ati na.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya Yodeo mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote owa i‑di Sefa tohe, bidi mai 7 kana, madi towe mai‑ya mai kananihebone,
I‑di Sefa bidi mai ati‑ya madi towe mite, mai‑ya hiyare,
“I‑di Yeso owato, i‑di Baoro owato, dai‑ta dai owato awirani.” Madi towe ati ne.
Madi towe kanare, hiniya i‑di Sefa bidi mai‑ya waratone, mai‑ya bisine, mai‑ka bora‑ya sibine, madi towe kite ene mai bodi kanani tokamoneni.
Yodeo mai toha, Kereko mai toha, Efesiyo‑ya mai wina, Sefa bidi mai tamine‑ya mai mita, mai habi siitona, Yeso‑ya mai ati nakitawahamoneni.
Yeso ati‑ya mai nofawaha, mai kama, mai hiyara,
“Towe oda amani. Hibati‑ya madi mai‑ya oda hiyaramaroni.” Mai ati na.

Hibati‑ya inawa mai toha, madi towe mai‑ka yama hani‑ya mai kadikamaro, mai‑ka yama hani‑ya mai kakama, mai dama mai naha, mai bai‑ya yama hani‑ya mai sarikaneni. Hibati‑ya yama hani mai hikanika manakone yinero barata wamani 50.000 manakone tohamaro‑ya mai sarikaneni.
Deoso ati‑ya mai dama mai mita, Deoso‑ya mai nofawahineni.
Baoro atibodi yama‑ya kadike,

“Yerosare‑ya okaboneni. Yerosare‑ya okomabone, Masedoni‑ka mai ohiyara, Akaiya‑ka mai‑ya ohiyara oniya, Yerosare‑ya okomaboneni. Yerosare kobo·oniya, makobote Homa‑ya okomabone owatibodi ati nineni.” Atibodi ati ne.
Asiya‑ya Baoro wine, Timoti i‑di Erasito mai fama mai‑ya yosene, Masedoni‑ya mai towaki dai tohabonehe.
I‑di Baoro Efesiyo‑ya winasa neya, Yeso hawine tamine‑ya yara mai dama mai ibi weenamoneni.
“Ai‑ka deoso i‑di Diyana‑ka yobe amane.” Ati ne.
Demetiro‑nima barata‑ya mai wa‑wama, mai‑ka yinero damane.
Barata‑ya mai wa‑wama mai dama, mai yorotokana, mai‑ya Demetiro haane,
“Owati dai mitahi. Yobe bidi‑ya ai wa‑wama yobe bidi ene ai‑ka yinero damane.
Baoro ati dai mita, ene dai awane awane.
‘Yama wamani toha‑ya deoso tohaterene.’ Ati tene.
Ati mai dama mai himite, ahi‑ya ati mai himita hine, Asiya nafi‑ya ati mai himite, ati mai hinofawahene.

Baoro ati‑ya mai tokadabiya, ai‑ka yobe bidi‑ya mai kanikami awiraboneni. Ai‑ka deosa i‑di Diyana‑ka yobe bidi‑ya mai nofamariya, hika yobe webote‑ya mai kamaterabone, ati mai nofamarihi hiteboneni. Bofe‑ya ai wina i‑di Diyana ai nafi nofa, Baoro ati‑ya mai nofa‑mani, Diyana ati‑ya mai nofamara neni.” Demetiro ati nemonane.
Demetiro ati‑ya mai dama mai mita, mai ati yawi kita, mai haana,
“Diyana amosabote amani. Efesiyo‑ka mai‑ka deosa kitabote amani.” Mai nafi ati nineni.

Efesiyo‑ya mai wi‑wina mai nafi yawa, Baoro‑ya mai da‑daba mai fama, mai‑ya mai waratona, yara mai yo‑yorotokana‑ke, mai‑ka yobe‑ya mai hiwakamineni. Baoro‑ka da‑daba i‑di Kayo, i‑di Aritako mai fama hibati‑ya mai wi‑wina tohi‑maro‑ka Masedoni‑kaya Baoro‑ya mai dabamaro, mai‑ya mai towakamineni.
Mai‑ya Baoro tokomakibona ati ne, Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai ati barihine.
Yara mai‑ka hidi mai one Baoro ati‑ya mai no‑nofa Baoro‑ka yama hani‑bone‑ya mai daana,
“Baoro, tikamakiriyahi.” Yama hani ati na.
Yara mai yo‑yorotokana‑ke, mai‑ka yobe‑ya mai ati kita, yama‑ya mai watora mai yorotokana, yama ohare‑ya mai one haa, yama bara‑ya mai one haa na, yama‑ya mai watora hiniya yama‑ya mai haanineni.
I‑di Aresadiri‑ya Yodeo mai waratona mai naha, mai bai‑ya mai hiwakamane, mai‑ya hiyarebonaha.
“Dai ati fawanahi.” Aresadiri yehe ati ne.
Oda‑ya dai ati weeriyahi ati nebona, mai ati fawara, hiyari awirane.
Aresadiri Yodeo toheya, mai awa,
mai ati fawara, mai ati kita, mai ibi haana,
“Diyana amosabote amani. Efesiyo‑ka deosa kitabote amani.” Mai ati na,
Ora fame‑ya mai ati fawani awirani.
Mai‑ka yara owa waamise ene mai ati fawanawahani.
“Owati dai mitahi. Efesiyo‑ya dai wi‑wina, dai tamine mai nafi watoneni. Hibati‑ya neme‑ya i‑di Diyana‑ka yati sona, Diyana ka‑kahiyara‑ka yobe webote, yati na, dai na‑nawada mai watoharineni.
Mai nafi hiwatoni, keyehe hiri·oni awirini. Dai ati fawanahi. Dai yawariyahi.
Diyana‑ka yama‑ya mai botirihi, Diyana tamine‑ya keyehe‑ya mai hiririhi na, hini yamata‑ba mai dai kakamineniti?
Demetiro hika mai eyehe mai‑ya weeneba, mai‑ya mai towakamahi, mai‑ya mai bi‑bisi‑kaya. Mahi owa‑kaya mai yorotokaniya, mai tamine‑ya mai mitiya, mai‑ya mai bisinaba awineni.
Yama bara‑ya dai ati kobona, ai nafi yorotokaniya, dai ati oda mitabani.
Dai yawa, dai ati kita, ai‑ka hidi ai‑ya mai weenaba awineni. Ai‑ya mai haaniya, yama oda watoraba awineni, hiniya dai yawa, dai ati kitaro.
Dai tabaro‑ya dai tokomahi.” Mai‑ka yara owa ati nane.
Mai ibi weeni hawa toha, Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa Baoro ati ene mai yorotokana, mai‑ya hiyarane. Baoro ati ene mai ya‑yaina, hiyari hawa tohe,
“Okomini.” Ati ne.
Masedoni‑kaya tokomane.
Masedoni‑kaya kobone, yakane, mai nafi‑ya hiyare, ati ene mai ya‑yaina, makobote Kereko mai tabori‑ya tokawahane.

Abariko fama, abariko oharimaki ne‑ya Kereko mai tabori‑ya Baoro wine, makobote Siriya‑ya tokebona, maboro‑ya foyebona, Yodeo mai tamine‑ya mitane. Baoro‑ya mai nabohabone mai ati na, maboro‑ya foyare, Masedoni‑kaya winitoname, hawi‑ya tokomane.

I‑di Baoro tokeya, mai sawe, i‑di Biro bidi Sobado Bereya‑ke sawi, Tesaronika‑ke i‑di Aritako, i‑di Sekodo mai fama, Derebi‑ke i‑di Kayo ohari, Asiya‑ke i‑di Timoti, i‑di Tikiko, i‑di Tirofimo mai na, mai sawi neni.

Firibo‑ya oda marina, baho kita kabi oda hawa toha, maboro‑ya oda foya, oda towaka, oda amoni ai yehe kahare‑nima na‑ya, Torowadi‑ya oda kobokana, oda fidotona, mai tabori‑ya oda kobona, Torowadi‑ya oda amona, oda amoni 7 toha.

Domiko yama soki bide‑ya oda tafabone, oda yorotokana, oda tafi hawa toha, oda‑ya Baoro hiyarane. Mahi owa‑ya oda tokabone, oda‑ya hiyarama, oda‑ya hiyarama, yama soki bai‑ya oda‑ya hiyaramatasa nane.
Yobe nemehe‑ya oda yorotokana, nabarina dama‑ya mai botonabineni.
Yobe fowari‑ka hodi waanaya, yetene i‑di Eotiko itarine. Baoro ati faware ene i‑di Eotiko amone, neme‑ya itari sone, abe, abo mai hidi abo forine.
Baoro kisamaki, yetene abe, abo‑ya Baoro wate,
“Sibarebane, hasinane.” Ati nemarine.
Yetene kitamane.
Baoro tokomisamatase, oda eyehe tafamatase, oda‑ya hiyaramatase, yama wahi‑ya ati fawane tokawahane.
I‑di Eotiko kitame, hini tabaro‑ya mai‑ya towakame, mai nafi ya‑yainamoneni.
Oda dai toha, maboro‑ya oda foyama, Asoso‑ya oda towakabone, Baoro oda‑ya yose, hawi‑ya tokomakine, Asoso‑ya oda‑ya kobonebonaha.
Asoso‑ya oda‑ya Baoro kobone, maboro‑ya foyame Mitireni‑kaya oda towakawaha,
Mitireni‑ya oda kobona, oda towakatasa, mahi owa‑ya Kio‑ya oda fiyakana, Samoso‑ya oda kobokana, oda towakatasa, mahi owa‑ya Mireto‑ya oda kobokatasa,
Efesiyo‑ya Baoro ati tokare,
“Asiya‑ya ai nahoriyahi. Yerosare‑kaya ai towakahi. Benekosi‑ka marina koboniya, Yerosare‑ya ai nahaba awineni.” Ati nane.
Mireto‑ya oda wina, Efesiyo‑ka mai‑ka yama hani‑bone‑ya Baoro kanahano,
“Yeso‑ka bote dai toha, Mireto‑ya dai kamakiyahi.” Baoro‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Mai kobona, mai‑ya Baoro hiyare,
“Hibati‑ya dai tabaro‑ya kobo·ona, owina, owa ene dai awamaroni.
Deoso ati dai‑ya okamina, owa‑ya okahiyaraterani. Mai atibodi koma, mai eyehe ohi·ona, Yodeo owa‑ya mai kaka, owa‑ya mai nakomamaroni.
Deoso ati‑ya dai ohiyara, dai okanawata, dai okasoma, onamaroni. Dai yo‑yorotokana‑kaya dai ohiyara, dai tabaro‑ya ohiyara onamaroni.
Yodeo dai one toha, Kereko dai one toha na, dai nafi ohiyara,
‘Ai‑ka Ayo Yeso ati dai nofabone, Deoso‑ya dai‑ya dai kaminahi.’ Oteni.
Yerosare‑ya okabone, owatibodi ati ene tohi awirini. Deoso‑ka Doni ati ene Yerosare‑ya okaboneni. Kobo·oniya, owa‑ya mai ni‑bone‑ka yama owato awirini.
Ai tabaro dami‑ya Deoso‑ka Doni ati ene‑mona owa‑ya mai hiyarateni.
‘Yerosare‑ya tikiya, kadeya‑ya tiwa‑ya mai nafoyiya, tiwa‑ya mai bisinaboneni.’ Mai ati teni.
O·abiya, sibaraboneni. Ai‑ka Ayo Yeso owa‑ya yose‑mari ati‑nima owa ene na ya‑yai·onaboneni. Deoso ene ai manakone aba tamine okaminabone ati nemarine.
Hibati‑ya Deoso ai nafi‑ka Hidi‑bona dai nafi‑ya ohiyaramaro, okomiya, owa dai awamateraboneni.
Owati dai mitahi. Deoso ati dai nofara‑mani, owa ene tohi awira neni.
Deoso tamine nafi‑ya dai‑ya ohiyara, owati fawaterani.

Dai narabo hawihi. Yeso‑ka mai dai nawadahi. Deoso‑ka Doni ati ene mai‑ka hidi‑nima dai na, mai dai nawadabonehe. Hibati‑ya Yeso abe, mai manakone hinahabamaro, dai atibodi yama‑ya watoyahi. Hika mai toha mai dai nawadabone ati nane.
Owa nowati‑kaya mai one mai kamake, dai‑ya keyehe‑ya mai hirikanaboneni. Yomahi yama‑ke ene‑nima mai ihi naboneni. Yeso‑ka mai‑ya mai nokotonihebone, Satanasi ati‑ya mai tokadababonehe.
Makobote dai owa hini‑ya kahiyarebona, Deoso‑ka‑mona hini‑ya ati tonihi, Yeso‑ka mai hikahiyarebonaha.
Dai noko wadahi. Dai atibodi yama‑ya watoyahi. Dai ati kadamowamariyahi. Faha fowe fama, faha fowe oharimaki niya, dai ohiyaramaroni. Yama tehe‑ya dai‑ya ohiyara, yama soki‑ya dai‑ya ohiyara oteni.
‘Dai noko wadahi.’ Ona, dai tabiyo ohi·onamaroni.
Deoso dai‑ya nawada, dai‑ya kasoma nebona owatibodi ati nineni. Deoso‑ka yama hani dai kadikiya, dai habo kitawahaboneni. Deoso tabaro‑ya, dai kobona, dai nafi‑ya Deoso hika yama‑ya daanebonane.
Dai‑ya osawe, dai‑ka yinero, dai‑ka barata, dai‑ka oro, dai‑ka bora na‑ya okayaterani.
Owa yehe‑ya yama wama·obisa, oda‑ka yinero‑bona okanika, oda‑ka yama‑bone okanika, manakone onahabamaro, oka manakone dai nanahabatera dai watoneni.
Dai yofi·okana, yama‑ya ani·ona, dai kiyana, dai okasoma, onamaro, owa‑nima dai niyahi. Dai yofi·okanani. Yeso ati‑ya dai ati kadamowamariyahi.
‘Yama‑ya dai‑ya mai daana, Deoso dai‑ya kasomi bi‑bidi, yama‑ya dai daana, Deoso dai‑ya kasomi ba‑basi nibisane.’ Yeso ati nemona,” Baoro ati nemarine.
Baoro ati fawaneya, mai nafi yobati‑kaya naha, Deoso‑ya mai hiyarineni.
Deoso‑ya mai hiyari hawa toha, Baoro tokebona ati ne, ene mai ohinawahani. Baoro‑ya mai nofa, Baoro tokebonaya, mai nafi watawahineni.
“Owa‑ya dai awamateraboneni.” Baoro ati ne,
ati ene mai atibodi koma, maboro‑ya foyebona, tokeya, mai tokomakineni, fai foyi‑ya mai awabonehe.
Mai‑ya oda haana,
“Oda tokini, oda tokini.” Oda ati na.
Maboro‑ya oda foya, Kosi‑ya oda towaka, Kosi oda fiyakana, mahi owa‑ya Hode‑ya oda kobokana, oda towakatasa, Batara‑ya oda kobokana,
Batara‑ya maboro owa‑ya oda foya, Fenisiya‑ya maboro tokebona, oda foyawaha, oda towaka,

Sibe yakari‑ya oda kobokana, oda‑ka sayo‑kaya Sibe itaya, oda fiyakana, Siriya‑ya oda towakabone, Siriya‑ka tabora oni Tiro toha, Tiro‑ya oda kobokana, maboro‑ka yama‑ya mai daanabone, yama‑ya mai yama tokamorosa oda tokomorosamake,
Tiro‑ya Yeso‑ka mai one wina, mai tabori‑ya oda amoni 7 toha, Baoro‑ya mai hiyara,
“Baoro, Yerosare‑ya tikarabone Deoso‑ka Doni ati nene.” Mai ati namaroni.
Oda yananama, faha widi‑ya oda tokoma, oda‑ya mai sawineni. Mai makidi, mai fanawi, madehe na, faha widi‑ya oda kobona, Deoso oda hiyarabone, oda yobati‑kaya oda naha, Deoso oda hiyaramatasineni.
“Oda tokini. Oda tokini.” Oda ati na,
Maboro‑ya oda foya, mai tabori‑ya mai tokomabisani.
Maboro‑ya oda towaka, Toremaida‑ya oda kobokana, Yeso‑ka mai one‑ya oda hiyara, mai tabori‑ya oda amoni ohareni.
Mahi owa‑ya oda towakatasa, Sesareya‑ya oda kobokana, Firibi‑ka yobe‑ya oda wina, hibati‑ya mai 7 tohabone mai i‑di Bedoro mai hikadikamaro, fare i‑di Firibi ohari Yeso tamine‑ya hiyaratene.
Firibi‑ka fana atona mai 4 kana mai fani awira, Deoso tamine‑ya mai hiyarateni.
Firibi‑ka yobe‑ya oda wina, oda amoni dami‑ya Yodeya‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita i‑di Akabo kame,
I‑di Baoro‑ka sitaraho‑ya waratone, hini teme‑ya soki, mano‑ya soki ne, ati yanane,
“Deoso‑ka Doni ati dai mitahi.
‘Haa‑nima sitaraho hidi‑ya mai sokini naboneni. Yerosare‑ya tokeya, mai sokihineya, Bara mai‑ya mai daahinebonane.’ Ati ne.” Akabo ati nemarine.
Akabo ati oda mita, Baoro‑ya oda ati barina,
“Yerosare‑ya tikariyahi.” Oda ati namaroni.
“Hini yamata ihi dai ohina? Dai ati ene owatibodi koma, Yerosare‑ya owa‑ya mai sokiniya, sibaraboneni. Yeso tamine ene owa‑ya mai nanahabiya, o·abiya, sibaraboneni.” Baoro ati nemarine.
Oda ati‑ya Baoro nofare,
“Sibarini. Yeso ati‑nima tinahi.” Oda ati na.
Oda ati fawanamaroni.
Makobote oda‑ka yama oda teena, Yerosare‑kaya oda tokatema,

Sesareya‑ka mai one oda‑ya daba, Yerosare‑ya oda toka, i‑di Manaso‑ka yobe‑ya oda‑ya mai towakamamaroni, oda winabonehe. Hibati‑ya Sibe‑ya i‑di Manaso winemari, Yerosare‑ya winawahe, hika yobe‑ya oda winawahamaroni. Yeso ati‑ya i‑di Manaso nofane.
Yerosare‑ya oda kobona, Yeso‑ka mai ya‑yainineni.
Mahi owa‑ya Baoro oda toka, i‑di Tiyako oda hiyarabone, I‑di Tiyako oda hiyara, Yeso‑ka bote mai toha na,
Mai nafi‑ya Baoro hiyare,
“Bara mai‑ya oka, Deoso tamine okamine, mai‑ya ohiyara, Deoso ene kite damemarine.” Ati ne.
Deoso ene kite dame tamine‑ya Baoro kadikemarine.
Baoro ati‑ya mai mita, Deoso‑ya mai kahiyara, Baoro‑ya mai hiyara,
“Soho, oda ati timitahi. Yodeo mai dama Yeso ati‑ya mai nofawaha, Mose ati‑ya mai nofahari na, Mose ati‑nima mai teni.
Tiwa tamine‑mone‑ya mai mita, Bara mai tabori‑ya tisawiya, Yodeo mai one‑ya tihiyaramone,
‘Dai‑ka madehe sowiri tati atori dai wisinakosariyahi. Mose ati‑nima dai riyahi.’ Titemone mai ati teni.
Tikama, tiwa tamine‑ya mai mitibaka amani. Hini yamata‑nima ai nibati?
Baoro, oda ati‑nima tiyahi. Ai‑ka mai 4 toha, Deoso ati ene hini mai‑ya mai ati barinineni.
Mose ati‑mata‑nima mai afinaboneni. Mai tati kone nafi ababone, mai‑nima tiyahi. Tiwa tati kone aba, mai tati kone aba na, manakone tinahaba tiyahi. Tiwa ene‑ya mai awiya,
‘Mose ati‑nima i‑di Baoro ene nane.’ Mai ati naboneni.
Tiwa ene‑ya mai awiya, yama‑ya mai watowahaboneni.

Mose ati‑ya Bara mai tokadabara, mai sibarineni. Hibati‑ya mai tamine oda kanahanamaroni. Mai‑ka deoso bare tefe‑ya mai kabarihi, ama‑ya mai kabarihi, bani emene abi awire‑ya mai kabarihi, mai fanawi one‑ya mai aharihi, haa‑nima mai niya, mai sibaraboneni. Yodeo mai‑ta Mose ati‑nima mai teboneni.” Tiyako ati nemarine.
Mahi owa‑ya Baoro mai eyehe afine, mai afini hawa toha, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai toka, mai tamine‑ya Baoro hiyare,
“Makobote oda afinamatasiya, oda kamabani. Oda kamatasiya, Deoso‑ka yama‑ba oda daanaboneni.” Ati nemarine.
Oda amoni 7 tohi yananiya, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Baoro waiya, Asiya‑ka Yodeo mai one kamake, mai ati yawa, mai ihi mai one nafi ati yawawaha, Baoro‑ya mai waratoneni.
Mai ibi haana,
“Isara·eo‑ka nodi dai toha, oda dai kasomahi. Hai, mai tabori dami‑ya toke, mai‑ya hiyare,
‘Mose ati‑nima dai rihi, Yodeo mai‑nima dai rihi, Deoso tabaro‑ya dai tokarihi dai nahi.’ Ati tene.
Fare ahi‑ya Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya Kereko mai‑ya kakame ene Deoso ati yawawahane.” Mai ati namaroni.
Hibati‑ya Yerosare bai‑ya Efesiyo‑ka owa i‑di Tirofimo, Baoro‑ya fame‑ya mai awa, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya i‑di Tirofimo‑ya kakame awane, mai atibodi ati namoneni.
Mai ati ihi mai nafi yorotokana, mai yawa, Baoro‑ya mai waratona, Deoso‑ka yobe yowi‑ya Baoro horoniya mai tokoma, Deoso‑ka yobe nokobiri‑ya mai barikaneni.
Baoro‑ya mai nabohabone, mai tamine‑ya sodado mai‑ka hidi mite,
“Yerosare‑ka mai nafi yorotokana, mai yawi kitamoneni.” Mai ati namoneni.
Hika sodado mai eyehe kanani tokomaki, sodado mai‑ya mai awa, Baoro‑ya mai bisinami awirani.
Sodado mai‑ka hidi Baoro‑ya damane, sodado mai‑ya haane,
“Koheti fame‑ya dai sokinaho.” Ati nane.
Mai yorotokana mai‑ya haane,
“Oni emenati?
Hini yamata ihi dai waratonati?” Ati nemarine.
Hini ene tohene, mai one ati nihi, yama bara ihi amani, mai one ati nihi na, yama‑ya mai watora. Mai ati dama mai ati ihi sodado mai‑ka hidi mai ati‑ya mitare, sodado mai‑ya yose,
“Hini dai wi‑wina‑kaya dai towakamaho.” Ati nemarine.
Sodado hini mai‑ka yobe‑ya Baoro‑ya mai towakamaboneni. Mai dama mai yawa, mai ihi Baoro‑ya sodado mai diwanineni.
Baoro‑ya Sodado mai towakama, mai nowati‑ya mai dama mai tokomake,
“Abaho, abaho.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yobe‑ya mai hiwakamebona, sodado mai‑ka hidi‑ya hiyare,
“Owati timitahi.” Ati ne.
“Kereko mai ati tiwatoneni?
Eyito‑ka mai‑ka owa amatini? Hibati‑ya 4000 mai kana mai one‑ya mai nanahaba, kabani‑kaya mai tokoma, fara mai‑ka hidi amatiraniha?” Sodado mai‑ka hidi ati nemarine.
“Yodeo ama·oni. Tabora webote Sirisiya‑ka tabora ba‑basi na oni Taso‑ya owadamaroni. Tiwati sibariya, mai ohiyaraboneni.” Baoro ati nemarine.
“Sibarini. Mai tihiyarahi.” Sodado mai‑ka hidi ati nemarine.
Yobe nokobiri‑ya Baoro wai,
“Dai ati fawanahi.” Baoro yehe ati ne.
Mai ati fawana, mai‑ya hiyaremarine. Ebereo mai ati‑ya mai‑ya hiyaremarine.
“Oka soho dai toha, okobese dai toha na, dai‑ya owa tamine okaminaboneni.” Baoro ati nane.
“Se! Ai ati‑nima ati nane.” Mai ati na.
Mai ati fawanineni, fai ati‑ya mai mitabonehe.

“Yodeo ama·oni. Sirisiya‑ya tabora Taso toha‑ya owa‑ya mai nayanamaroni. Yerosare‑ya i‑di Kamari·eo owa‑ya kanawato, Mose‑ka yama hani nafi‑ya owa‑ya kanawatomarine. Fara dai‑nima ona, Deoso ati onofawahamaroni.
Yeso‑ka hawi‑ya mai sa‑sawi mai‑ya onahaba, mai makidi, mai fanawi na, mai soki·ona, kadeya‑ya mai onafoya onamaroni.

Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, ai‑ka hidi mai toha na, mai nafi owa‑ya watoneni. Hibati‑ya yama hani‑ya owa‑ya mai daana, Damaso‑ya yama hani owakama, Damaso‑ya mai wi‑wina, Yeso hawine‑ya mai sa‑sawi Yerosare‑kaya mai owakamiya, Yerosare‑ya mai mai kosihinabone onamaroni.
Damaso‑ya oka, owa koboni yanatoniya, mahi nokorise‑ya neme‑ya yama wahi kita owa‑ya kobonamaroni.
Yama wahi ihi osa, ati omite,
‘Saoro, Saoro, hini yamata ihi owa‑ya bisitiniti?’ Ati nemarine.
‘Ayo, eme tiwa oni niti?’ Ona,
‘Yeso Nasare‑ke ama·oni. Owa‑ya bisitineni.’ Ati nemarine.
Owa‑ya mai sa‑sawi, yama wahi kita‑ya mai awa, mai habi siitonani. Owa‑ya hiyare, ati mai himite ati mai hiwatoremarine.
‘Ayo, hini yamata‑nima obati?’ Ona,
‘Tiwaamisamiya, Damaso‑ya tikahi. Damaso‑ka tiwa‑ya mai hiyaraboneni. Deoso‑ka yama anitinabone tamine timitaboneni.’ Ati nemarine.
Yama wahi kita ihi yama oawamara, owa yehe‑ya mai damana, Damaso‑kaya owa‑ya mai towakamaroni.
Damaso‑ya Ananiya wine, amose, Mose ati‑nima ne, Yodeo mai nafi hinofatene.
Owa‑kaya kame, wai, owa‑ya hiyare,
‘Soho Saoro, yama tiawahi.’ Ati ne.
Ati ene, owa noko amosawama, Ananiya oawawahamaroni.
Owa‑ya hiyaramaki,
‘Deoso ai‑ka idi mai‑ya no‑nofa‑mata tiwa‑ya kadike, Deoso‑ka Ka‑kadika amosabote‑ya tiawawaha, ati timitawahene.
Yama tiawa tamine tihiyara, ati timite ati tamine tihiyarawahebonane mai dami‑ya.
Hibayata tiwa‑ya mai habanirisahi. Tiwa ene‑maro‑nima tiwa ene namarabone, ai‑ka Ayo haatiniya, Deoso tiwa‑ya ati somawamebonane.’ Ananiya ati nemarine.
Makobote Yerosare‑ya okomatasa, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya owitare, Deoso‑ya ohiyara, wada‑nima yama na oawawahamaroni.
Neme‑ya ai‑ka ayo oawe, owa‑ya hiyare,
‘Tokoma kanibote tinahi. Yerosare‑ya tiwinariyahi. Ahi‑ya mai wi‑wina mai‑ya owa tamine tihiyariya, tiwati‑ya mai nofateraboneni.’ Ati nemarine.
‘Ayo, tika mai bisi·onamaroni. Tiwa‑ya ai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe‑ya mai toka, tiwa‑ya mai hiyarabone, mai kosi, mai onafoya, onamaro, yama‑ya mai watoneni.
Tika soho i‑di Tefaho yati‑ya mai nanahaba, mai‑ya osawe ihi ya‑yai·ona, mai‑ka bora mai tanihina onawadamaroni.’ Ona,
Owa‑ya hiyare,
‘Tokoma kanibote tinahi. Yama yaki‑ya tiwa oyoseboneni, Bara mai‑ya.’ Ati ne.” Baoro ati nemarine.
Bara mai tamine‑ya mai mita, mai ati yawa, sodado mai‑ya mai haana,
“Abaho, abaho dai towakamaho.” Mai ati namaroni.
Mai haani kita, mai‑ka bora‑ya mai tanina, wami hibakori‑ya mai weretomisa namaroni, mai yawaro.
Sodado mai‑ka hidi ati ene sodado mai hiwakamane, hini mai‑ka yobe doro‑ya mai bisihinebonaha.
“Hini yamata ihi mai ati yawiti? Bisi·oneya, owatowaheba awane.” Sodado mai‑ka hidi atibodi ati nemonane.
Baoro‑ya mai sokina, mai yadihine, mai kosihinebona, sodado mai‑ka hidi owa‑ya Baoro hiyare,
“Homano ama·oni. Owa tamine mai kadiki awisariya, owa kositiniya, tiwa‑ya homano mai ati yawaboneni.” Baoro ati nemarine.
Baoro ati‑ya sodado mai‑ka hidi owa mite, mai‑ka hidi owa ba‑basi ne‑ya tokome, hidi‑ya hiyare,
“Tiwa noko wadahi. Homano owa i‑di Baoro amane.” Ati nemonane.
Mai‑ka hidi owa ba‑basi ne i‑di Baoro‑ya kamaki,
“Homano owa amatini?” Mai‑ka hidi ati ne.
“Hehe, homano ama·oni.” Baoro ati ne.
“Yinero nafi daa·ona, yinero ene homano ama·oni.” Mai‑ka hidi ba‑basi ne ati ne.
“Okobi homano tohemata, homano ama·oni.” Baoro ati nemarine.
Baoro‑ya mai bisinabone mai habi siitona, mai tokoma kanibote na, homano sokikane ene mai‑ka hidi habo siitonahari ne,
“Owa‑ya mai bisinaba awineni.” Hidi atibodi ati nemonane.
“Hini yamata ihi Baoro‑ya mai bisinaba amaniti?” Ati ne.
Yama wahi one‑ya Baoro‑ya kakasawame, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha na, mai‑ya haane, mai kama, mai noki‑ya Baoro‑ya nawaane.
Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai‑ya Baoro kakatome, ati yanane,
“Ayo, Soho, owati dai mitahi. Owa‑ya Deoso kakoterebonane, owa ene amosateni.” Baoro ati nemarine.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi Ananiya ati ene Baoro bono‑ya mai batanarineni.
Baoro ati yanane,

“Deoso tiwa‑ya batanaharibona, tiwati‑nima tiwa ene toharani. Mose ati‑nima tiwa ene nabone tina, Mose ati‑nima tiwa ene toharani. Mai ati sibara toha, mai batatiriyahi, Mose ati ne. Owati sibara toha, tiwa ene owa‑ya mai batana, tiwa ene towe tohani.” Ati nane.
Ahiyata‑ya mai naha, Baoro‑ya mai hiyara,
“Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi weetiriyahi.” Mai ati na.
“Se! Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi webote‑no owatore‑ya wee·onani. Deoso‑ka yama hani ati ihi ai‑ka hidi ai weeterani.” Baoro ati nemarine.
Baoro mai‑ya kiine, mai one fariseo toha, mai one sadoseo toha na, mai‑ya Baoro haane,
“Ayo, soho, owati dai mitahi. Fariseo ama·oni. Okobi fariseo tohemarine.
‘Ai owa abe, kitamane.’ Ona,
fara owati ihi owa‑ya mai bisinaboneni.” Baoro ati nemarine.
Baoro ati‑ya mai mita, mai ibi weena, fariseo mai‑ya sadoseo mai wee, sadoseo mai‑ya fariseo mai weenahari namoneni.
Sadoseo mai ati,
“Ai aba, ai kitamaterani. Ai abi ohariteni. Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai awirihi, madi mai awirihi teni.” Mai ati teni.
Fariseo‑ta mai ati,
“Ai aba, ai kitamateni. Deoso‑ka yo‑yose mai toha, madi mai toha, mai teni.” Fariseo mai ati teni.
Mai ibi hiyara,
“Ati sibare, Deoso‑ka yo‑yose ati‑ya mitate awane. Ai weerayaho. Deoso ai‑ya bisirayaho.” Fariseo mai one Mose‑ka yama hani ati‑ya mai ka‑kamina mai ati namaroni.
Mai ibi weeni fawara,
“I‑di Baoro‑ya mai nabohibaka amani.” Sodado mai‑ka hidi atibodi ati ne.
Sodado mai‑ya yose,
“I‑di Baoro dai dodimakiya, dai kakamaho. Ai‑ka yobe‑ya mai hinaboharayaho.” Ati nemarine.
Yama soki‑ya Yeso kaki, Baoro fowari‑kaya wai, Baoro‑ya hiyare,
“Baoro, tiwa habo kitahi. Yerosare‑ya owa tamine tihiyaramaro, makobote Homa‑kaya owa tamine tihiyaramakeboneni.” Yeso ati nemonane.
Yama wahabisari‑ya Yodeo mai yorotokana, mai ibi hiyara,
“Baoro ai nanahabahi. Baoro ai nanahabi awiriya, ai tafamarihi, faha ai fawamarihi, ai naboneni. Baoro ai nanahabi hawa tohiya, ai tafama, faha ai fawama, ai naboneni.” Mai ati namoneni.
Haa‑nima 40 mai fiyakana, mai ati nineni.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai toha na, mai‑ya mai toka, mai‑ya mai hiyara,
“Hini oda‑ya oda ati barina, Baoro oda nananahabi awiriya, oda tafamaraboneni.
Sodado mai‑ka hidi dai haaniya,
‘Baoro tiwakamahi, ati oda mitamatasebonaha.’
Dai ati niya, Baoro‑ya kakameya, hawi‑ya oda kemoya, kameya, oda nanahabebane.” Mai ati namoneni.
Mai‑ya mai kemabone mai tamine‑ya Baoro‑ka bidimi mite, kadeya‑ya tokomaki, Baoro narabo‑ya hika bidimi kaminane.
Sodado mai‑ka hidi owa‑ya i‑di Baoro haane,
“Tika hidi‑ya oka bidimi tiwakamahi, hiyarebonaha.” Baoro ati nane.
Baoro‑ka bidimi‑ya sodado towake, hidi‑ya hiyare,
“Baoro sokine ati ene hika bidimi owakamani, ati timitebonaha.” Ati nane.
Baoro‑ka bidimi yehe‑ya sodado mai‑ka hidi damane, mai awiri‑kaya fai‑ya towakame,
“Tiwati omitahi.” Ati ne.
“Yodeo tiwa‑ya mai haanaboneni.
‘Mahi owa‑ya Baoro tiwakamahi, tamine oda miti ba‑basi nebonaha.’ Mai ati naboneni.

Mai ati tinofariyahi. Hawi‑ya 40 mai fiyakana mai kemabone, mai ibi hiyara mai ati nani. Mai tafamarihi, faha‑ya mai fawamarihi ni‑ya, Baoro‑ya mai nabohiya, mai tafama, faha‑ya mai fawama naboneni. Hawi‑ya tiwa‑ya mai kema, tiwa‑ya mai nimanineni.” Baoro‑ka bidimi ati nemonane.
Ati‑ya mite,
“Sibarabani. Tiwa tabaro‑ya tikamahi. Owa narabo tikamina, mai one‑ya tihiyarariyahi.” Sodado mai‑ka hidi ati nemonane.
Sodado mai‑ka hidi mai bi‑bidi na mai fama mai‑ya haane,

“Dai‑ka sodado mai 200 kana mai dai haaniya, yama‑ya mai nimaniyahi. Sesareya‑ya mai tokabone, Sodado mai 70 kana kafaro‑ya itari‑ya mai dabiyahi. Sodado mai one 200 kana wabise‑ya mai aka, mai‑ya mai daba nahi. Yama soki 9 ora‑ya dai tokaboneni.
Kafaro owa dai nasawi, mese‑ya i‑di Baoro itari‑ya. Ai‑ka kofenado i‑di Feri‑ya i‑di Baoro dai towakamahi, Baoro‑ya mai nanahabariyahi.” Sodado mai‑ka hidi ati ne.
Feri‑ka yama hani‑bone‑ya kanahano,
“Ayo Feri, tika soho i‑di Karaodio Risiyasi ama·oni. Oka yama hani tikadikiyahi.
Hibati‑ya Baoro‑ya Yodeo mai wata, mai hinahabebona, Baoro homano‑mona tamine omite, oka sodado mai hiwakamane, mai hinahabarebonaha.
Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai one‑ya Baoro owakama, mai‑ya ohiyara,
‘Hini yamata ihi Baoro‑ya dai watiti?’ Ona.
‘Mose ati‑ya Baoro nofarene.’ Mai ati na,
‘Haa‑nima ne, towe tohi awire, sibarane. Haa‑nima ne, ai sokirihi, ai nanahabarihi tene.’ Owatibodi ati nani.

Yodeo hawi‑ya hini mai‑ya mai tamine kemani, Baoro‑ya mai nanahababonehe. Hawi‑ya mai nahamone, mai tamine omita, tiwa‑ya Baoro oyoseni. Makobote fai‑ya mai ka‑kako tiwa‑ya mai oyosebani, mai ati timitabonehe. Feye amani.” Sodado mai‑ka hidi‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
Sodado mai‑ka hidi ati ene Baoro‑ya sodado mai towakamineni. Yama soki‑ya mai hiwakame, Atibatide‑ya mai kobonineni.
Yama wahabisari‑ya Atibatide‑ya sodado mai one wininama, kafaro mai toha, kafaro mese‑ya Baoro itarine mai tokomineni.
Sesareya‑ya mai kobona, kofenado‑ya yama hani‑ya mai daa, Baoro‑ya mai daa, mai nineni.
Yama hani‑ya kofenado kadike,
“Ebeni‑ya tiwa tabaro toha titi?” Kofenado ati ne.
“Sirisiya‑ya owa tabaro tohani.” Baoro ati ne.
“Tiwa‑ya mai ka‑kako mai kamakiya, tiwati omita, mai ati omita onaboneni.” Kofenado ati ne.
Erodi‑ka yobe‑ya Baoro‑ya mai nafoyawahineni.

Amoni 5 toheya, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi i‑di Ananiya, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai one toha, i‑di Tetoro ne, mai kamakeni, i‑di Feri‑ya i‑di Baoro tamine mai hiyarabonehe. I‑di Tetoro ati yanani amosi ba‑basi tene.
Baoro‑ya mai haana, Baoro tamine‑ya Tetoro hiyare,
“Feri, owati timitahi. Amosabote amatini. Tika yama wato ihi oda‑ya mai nofawaha, tiwa ene oda tabaro nafi amosi ba‑basi nineni.
Tiwa ene amosa, tiwa oda nofi nafineni.
Owati damaraboneni. Owati fa‑famaraba naboneni.
Baoro ati kasiro, ati ene Yodeo mai dama mai yorotokana, mai yawi kitineni. Nasare‑ka mai‑ka hidi Baoro amane.
Baoro ene Deoso‑ka yobe towe tohebona, oda waratonane. Mose ati‑nima oda nabone,
I‑di Risiyasi‑ta oda‑ya bisine, Baoro‑ya towakamene.
Risiyasi oda‑ya yosene, tiwa‑ya. Oda ati timitiya, Baoro towe‑ya tiwatowahaboneni.” Tetoro ati nemonane.
“Hehe, Tetoro ati‑nima yama tohani.” Yodeo mai nafi ati nineni.
Baoro ati‑ya Kofenado mitebona, yehe‑ya Baoro‑ya haane, Feri‑ya Baoro hiyarawahe,
“Wana mai ati dami‑ya oda dami‑ka yama‑ya tikadikateni. Owati timitiya, yama tiwatowahaboneni.
Ai amoni 12 kana‑ya Yerosare‑ya okaroni, Deoso‑ya okahiyarabonehe.
Owa‑ya mai we‑wee owa‑ya mai awiya, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya mai wee·orihi, Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe bi‑bidi ne‑ya mai wee·orihi, sidadi‑ya mai wee·orihi, owati ihi mai ibi weerihi teni onaroni.
Owa ene‑mone mai ati na, owa ene tohi awirani. Keyehe‑ya mai hirinineni.

Nasare‑ka ama·oni mai ati na, fara ama·oni. Deoso‑ka hawi‑ya Nasare‑ka mai sa‑sawi‑nima osawi, Deoso‑ya mai kahiyara‑nima okahiyara, Deoso ati‑ya i‑di Mose kanahanomata, ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai kanahano na, ati onofa oteni.
Mai ihi amosamaro, mai ihi amosaramaro mai na, mai aba, mai kitamabone Deoso ati nemata, ati‑nima yama nabone‑ya mai nimana, fara nima·onahari teni.
Deoso ati nima·ona ene owa noko wadateni, owa ene amosabonehe. Deoso ohiyariya, owatibodi owa‑ya weerihi, ai one‑ya ohiyariya, owatibodi owa‑ya weerihi teni.
Wana mai ati dami‑ya yama yaki‑ya owinamaro, hibayata okoma, oka mai dami‑ka yinero‑bona owakama, Deoso‑ka yama‑bone daa·onabone onani.
Deoso‑ka yama‑bone daa·ona, Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya owitare, Yodeo mai one Asiya‑ka kamake, owa‑ya mai awa, owa hare owa‑ya mai nahori awira. Mai wee·oni awirani.
Owa ene towe‑mani, tiwa‑ya mai kama, owa tamine tiwa‑ya mai kamina neni.
Oda‑ka hidi mai noki‑ya owaa, owati‑ya mai mita, owa ene amosarihi na‑mone mai ati na, owa ene‑ya mai kaminahi.
Owati ohare‑ta towe toha awineni. Mai bai‑ya owaa, mai‑ya ohiyarineni.
‘Ai aba, ai kitamabone tamine okamina ihi owa‑ya mai watani.’ Ona.
Owati yanara‑mani, sibara neni.” Baoro ati nemonane.
Baoro ati fawaneya, Deoso hawine tamine‑ya Feri watowahe, mai‑ya hiyarawahe,
“Hibareya, sodado mai‑ka hidi webote i‑di Risiyasi kame, ati omitamataseya, owatowahebonane.” Feri ati nane.
Sodado mai‑ka hidi‑ya hiyare,
“Baoro‑ya tika sodado sawiho. Honita tohe sibare, hiniya kanarayaho. Hika mai ati yobiniya, Baoro‑ya mai kasoma, mai yobiniyahi.” Feri ati nemonane.
Makobote Feri fadi‑ya fame Baoro ati‑ya mai mitabone, mai kakamineni. Feri Yodeo one‑ya idimari, fadi oni Dosira toha,
“Yeso Kirisito ati tinofe tamine omitebonane.” Feri ati nane.
“Yeso ati ai nofiya, ai ene amosa, Yeso ati‑nima ai naboneni. Makobote ai ene‑ya Deoso kadikebonane.” Baoro ati ne.
Ati ene Feri habo siitone,
“Tikamahi. Tiwati omitamatasaba awineni.” Feri ati nane.
“Baoro ati omitanadiya, yinero‑ya owa‑ya daaneba awane, see·okanebonaha.” Feri atibodi ati ne.
Baoro hiyare, ati‑ya kamitanadine.
Wana mai ati famamakiya, i‑di Bosiyo Fesito kofenado tohawahe, Feri kofenado tohami awire, hiniya tokomane. Yodeo mai‑ya ya‑yainihibona, Baoro seekani awire, yaditone waasa nane.
I‑di Fesito kofenado tohawahe, Sesareya‑ya winawahe, amoni fama, amoni oharimaki ne‑ya Yerosare‑ya tokatemakine.
Yerosare‑ya Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, Yodeo mai‑ka hidi mai toha na, Fesito‑ya mai hiyara,
“Baoro ati kasirone.
Yerosare‑kaya mai hiwakamaho.” Mai ati na.
“Mai hiwakameya, ai kemoya, ai nanahabebane.” Mai atibodi ati na.
Mai ati‑ya Fesito mite,
“Baoro Sesareya‑ya winebonane. Owa amoni fa‑famaraba niya, okomakeboneni.
Owa‑ya dai‑ka hidi mai sawihi. Baoro ati kasiromona dai ati na, aka‑ya mai ati omitabani.” Fesito ati nemonane.
Yerosare‑ya ai yehe kafama‑nima amoni ne, Sesareya‑ya tokomaki, amoni oharimaki‑ya sodado‑ya yosene, Baoro‑ya Sodado kakamebonaha.
Baoro kobone, Yodeo Yerosare‑ya mai kama, mai yorotokana, Baoro tamine‑ya mai hiyara,
“Baoro ati kasiro, ene amosare, Mose ati tamine‑ya mai‑ya keyehe‑ya hiri kitine.” Mai ati na.
“Mai ati‑nima Baoro ene tohare awane, yama owato awirini.” Fesito atibodi ati ne.
Baoro ati yanane,
“Owa ene amosa, Mose ati‑nima oteni. Deoso‑ka yobe bisa·oniterani. Ai nafi‑ka hidi i‑di Sesa tamine‑ya keyehe‑ya hiri·oterani. Owa ene amosabisineni.” Baoro ati nane.
Yodeo mai‑ya Fesito ya‑yainihibona, Baoro‑ya hiyare,
“Yerosare‑ya ai towakamabone ona, tiwati sibakarini? Yerosare‑ya tiwati omitamatasiya, yama owatowahaba awineni.” Ati nane.
Baoro ati yanane,
“Homano ama·oni. Homano ai toha, ai ene‑ya Sesa‑ka mai kadikateni. Sesa‑ka amatini. Yodeo mai‑ya owa ene towe tohara tiwatoneni.

Owa ene towe toha‑mone tina, owa ene owa tinahababone tina, owa tinahabahi. Sibaraboneni. Mai ati‑nima owa ene tohara, fara mai‑ya owa daatiteraboneni. I‑di Sesa‑ya owati tokabisineni.” Baoro ati nane.
I‑di Fesito hika mai‑ya hiyare,
“Hini yamata‑nima obati?” Ati ne.
Baoro‑ya hiyare,
“Sesa‑ya tiwati toka, tiwa oyosebani.” Fesito ati nane.
Makobote Sesareya‑ya mai‑ka hidi i‑di Akiriba, hika asima i‑di Berenisi eyehe kobonane, Fesito‑ya hiyarebonaha.
Sesareya‑ya mai amoni dami‑ya mai‑ka hidi i‑di Akiriba‑ya Baoro tamine‑ya Fesito hiyarawahe,
“Hibati‑ya i‑di Feri wineya, ai sokine wai, Feri seehikani awire, hini ati ene sokikane waasa nane.
Yerosare‑ya oka, Yodeo owa‑ya mai haanani, Baoro onahababonehe. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai toha, mai‑ka bote mai toha, mai na, owa‑ya mai haanani.

Hiniya ai one‑ya ai nanahabaterani. Mai ibi kako kofina, mai ibi hiyara, mai ati‑ya ai mita teni. Mai ati ai mitiya, yama nafi ai watoteni. Homano ai ati teni. Yama nafi‑ya ai wata, mai ihi towe toha, mai aba, mai ihi towe tohara mai abarihi teni.
Owa‑ya mai sa‑sawi ahi‑ya oda kobona, oda amoni ohari‑ya Baoro‑ya haa·onani, ati omitebonaha.
Baoro‑ya mai kako kofina, mai ati omita, Baoro ene towe‑mona mai ati na, ene bare‑ta tamine‑ya mai kaminabisa, ene towe yokana tamine mai kamini awirani.
Hiniya ai owa abe tamine‑ya mai hiyara, mai ibi weenineni. Yeso abe, kitamemona Baoro ati ne, ati ene Baoro‑ya mai kako kofinineni.
Mai ati owatora, i‑di Baoro‑ya ohiyara,
‘Yerosare‑ya ai tokahi. Tiwa tamine‑ya mai kaminiya, tiwa tamine owatowahaboneni.’ Onani.
Yerosare‑ya Baoro ati toki nofare, Sesa Akosito‑kaya tokabisebona ati ne. Ati ene Sesa‑kaya oyosebona, sokikane waasa nane.” Fesito ati ne.
“Fesito, maki ati miti onofini.” Akiriba ati ne.
“Yama wahabisari‑ya ati timitaminebane.” Fesito ati nane.

Yama wahabisari‑ya Akiriba Berenisi‑ya fame mai‑ka bora amosabote‑ya mai sakona, yobe webote‑ya mai demenarineni. Sodado mai‑ka hidi, yara bote mai toha na, mai eyehe mai nahoneni. Fesito ati ene i‑di Baoro‑ya mai kakamakineni.
Akiriba mai‑ya i‑di Fesito hiyare,

“Hidi Akiriba, dai nafi na, owati dai mitahi. Baoro dai awahi. Yodeo mai dama owa‑ya mai weena, Baoro‑ya onahababone mai ati nani. Yerosare‑ya mai wi‑wina mai ati toha, ahi‑kaya mai kama, mai ati toha, mai na, Baoro onahababone mai ati nani.
Ene sibarene, haa‑nima ai ene na, i‑di Sesa nanahabaterene. Sesa Akosito‑ya tokebona ati ne, Homa‑ya oyosebonane.

Sokikane Sesa‑ya tokebona, mai ihi towe tamine ai kanahanoteni. Baoro sokikane Sesa‑ya tokebona, hini yamata ihi tamine ai kanahanobati? Tamine owato awire, dai nafi‑ya owakamane, ati dai mitebonaha. Hidi Akiriba, ati timiteya, yama ai kanahano‑ya owataba awineni.
Sokikane ai yose, mai ihi tamine ai kanahano awiriya, yama ati kasiraboneni.” Fesito ati nemonane.
“Baoro, tiwati omitaboneni.” Akiriba ati ne.
Baoro yehe daatone, ati yanane,
“Hidi Akiriba, owati timitabone, ya‑yai·oneni. Towe oha‑mone Yodeo mai ati na tiwatowahaboneni.
Yodeo mai ihi tiwatoteni. Mai ibi weena, mai tiwato tina, owati timita, tiyawariyahi.
Hibati‑ya yetene ohiya, Yerosare‑ya mai‑ya odaba, owa ene‑ya Yodeo mai watoneni.
Fariseo mai one ihi‑nima owa ene namaro‑ya mai watoneni. Owa ene‑ya mai awamaro, owa ene tamine‑ya mai hiyari awirani.
Hibati‑ya oda‑ka idi mai‑ya i‑di Deoso hiyaremata, Deoso ati onofe ene owa‑ya mai ati nanahabi kofinineni.

Isara·eo‑ka nodi mai‑ya Deoso hiyaremata, mai‑ya kasomebona ati ne. Oda‑ya kasomebona oda nafi nimanineni. Oda‑ya kasomebona ati nemata‑nima owa‑ya kasomebona ona, owa‑ya mai kaka, owa‑ya mai ati nanahabateni.
Ai owa abe Deoso hinakitame, hini yamata ihi dai kasawariti?
Hibati‑ya Yeso Nasare‑ke okako, Yeso‑ya mai no‑nofa mai okakoharemaroni.

Yerosare‑ya Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai bisi·onamaroni. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai ati ihi Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa kadeya‑ya mai onafoya, makobote mai‑ya mai nanahaba, mai ihi ya‑yai·onamaroni.
Deoso‑ya mai hi‑hiyara‑ke yobe dami‑ya oka, mai bisi·onani, Yeso oni‑ya mai towe tonihebonehe. Owa yawi kita, wami bara‑ya mai siba·onabone, okamaroni.
Fara mai‑ya owatabone, Damaso‑ya okomakineni. Deoso‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai da‑daa mai‑ka hidi mai‑ka yama hani dama·okanani, mai‑ya owatabonehe.
Hidi Akiriba, Damaso hawi‑ya yaka·ona, mahi nokorise‑ya neme‑ya yama wahi kake, oawa, owa‑ya mai sa‑sawi mai toha na, oda‑ya yama wahi kobona, mahi wehene‑ya fiyakanamaroni.
Yama wahi ihi oda nafi sona, ati omite, ebereo oda ati‑nima ati ne, owa‑ya hiyare,
‘Saoro, Saoro, hini yamata‑bone owa‑ya bisitiniti? Tiwa‑ta tiwa komene kitaboneni.’ Ati nemarine.
‘Ayo, eme tiwa oni niti?’ Ona.
‘Yeso ama·oni. Owa‑ya bisitinani.
Tiwaamisamahi. Tiwa oyosewahaboneni. Hibayata yama tiawa tamine tihiyaraboneni. Makobote yama one yofi·okanamakiya, tamine tihiyaraboneni.
Tiwa‑ya mai watiya, tiwa okasoma, Yodeo tiwa‑ya mai watiya, tiwa okasoma, Bara mai‑ya tiwa oyose, tiwa okasoma onaboneni.

Owa tamine Bara mai‑ya tihiyariya, mai noki weetokana‑nima mai nabone, hibayata yama soki‑nima na‑ya mai wina, tiwati‑ya mai mitiya, yama tehe‑nima na‑ya mai winawahaboneni. Satanasi‑ka mai tohamarabone, Deoso‑ka mai tohaboneni. Mai‑ya owati somawamabone, owati‑ya mai one nofa‑nima yama amosa‑ya mai kayafaboneni.’ Yeso ati nemarine.
Hidi Akiriba, neme‑ya ati omite, ati‑nima oteni.
Damaso‑ya Deoso tamine ohiyara, Yerosare‑ya, Yodeya‑ya Deoso tamine ohiyara, Bara mai‑ya Deoso tamine ohiyaramaki, oneni, Yeso ati‑ya mai nofabonehe.
‘Deoso‑ya dai‑ya dai kamina, dai ati‑nima dai ene nawawahi.’ Onani.
Owati ihi Deoso‑ka yobe‑ya owa‑ya Yodeo mai waratonani, owa‑ya mai nanahababonehe.

Deoso owa‑ya kasomanadi ene hasi·ona, hidi mai toha, mai ati kita mai‑ya ohiyara, hidi mai tohara, mai ati kitara mai‑ya ohiyara ona, i‑di Mose ati‑mata‑nima yama nawaha, Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai ati‑nima yama nawaha, tamine okamina oteni.

‘Kirisito komene kitebona, mai hinahabebona, abeya, kitamebonane. Kirisito kitami bahe, ai‑ya nakitamaharibonane. Kitame ene yama wahi‑nima Yodeo mai awa, Bara mai awa nabone, Deoso hawine‑ya mai watowahaboneni.’ Mose ati tohe, Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai ati toha neni.” Baoro ati nemonane.
Ati‑ya Fesito mite, Baoro‑ya haane,
“Baoro, ka‑kana amatini. Yama hani nafi tikadika, tiwa tati tohiya awineni.” Fesito ati nane.
Ati‑ya Baoro mite, ati yanane,
“Kofenado Fesito, ka‑kana oni awirini. Owati‑nima yama neni. Owati amosani.
Yama tamine okamina‑ya hidi Akiriba watone, owa habo siitora, yama‑ya Akiriba awemarine. Owatibodi ati nineni. Haa‑nima yama na kemoterani.
Hidi Akiriba, Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete mai ati tinofiraniha? Mai ati tinofamone owatibodi ati neni.” Baoro ati nane.
Akiriba ati yanane,
“Baoro, tiwati fa‑famaraba niya, Yeso ati onofabone tina awineni.” Ati nemonane.
Ati‑ya Baoro mite, ati yanane,

“Owati fa‑famaraba na toha, owati dama toha na, Deoso ati tinofabone owati nofani. Owati dai nafi mita, owa‑nima dai na‑mani, yama amosa neni. Koheti‑ya soki·okana‑nima dai‑ya owati sokini nofarani.” Ati nemonane.
Baoro ati fawane, Hidi Akiriba, kofenado Fesito, Berenisi, mai one naho na, mai nahomisa, mai tokomineni, mai nafi.
Yobe kote‑kaya mai toka, mai ibi hiyara,
“Ati sibarane. Haa‑nima ai ati na, ai nanahabarihi, ai sokikarihi ai teni.” Mai ati na.
“Sesa‑ya ati koboni awire‑mana, ai seekane nane.” Fesito‑ya i‑di Akiriba ati nemonane.
Itariya‑ya oda tokabone, i‑di Yoriyo‑ya Baoro‑ya mai daana, mai one sokina‑ya mai daanineni, i‑di Yoriyo mai hiwakamabonehe Itariya‑kaya. Sesa Akosito‑ka sodado hidi i‑di Yoriyo tohane.
Adaramitio‑ke maboro Asiya‑ka faha kabane‑ya tokebona‑ya oda foyineni. I‑di Aritako oda‑ya sawi, hika tabora bide oni Tesaronika toha, hika tabora webote oni Masedoni toha nineni.
Mahi owa‑ya Sidoho‑ya oda kobona, Sidoho‑ya Yoriyo ati ene i‑di Baoro hini hika mai‑ya tokane, Baoro‑ya mai kasomabonehe. Yoriyo Baoro‑ya nofane, Baoro‑ya kasome ene Baoro ya‑yainebonane.
Maboro‑ya oda foyama, oda towaka, Sibe yakari‑ya oda towaka, yama hakikini ihi oda towaki amosarani.
Sirisiya‑ya oda fiyakana, Banafiriya‑ya oda fiyakanamake, Risiya‑ka tabora bide Mira‑ya oda kobokanineni.
Mira‑ya maboro owa Aresadiriya‑ke tohe, Itariya‑ya tokebona, Sodado hidi ati ene oda foyawaha,
Oda amoni dama, oda towaka, yama hakikini ihi oda to‑towakarabana, Sinido oda fiyakana, yama hakikini ihi Kereta‑kaya oda towaka, Kereta yakari‑ya oda towaka, Saromona oda fiyakanamakineni.
Yama hakikini fawara, oda towakarabana, Boho Boto‑ya oda kobokawaha, Raseya yakari‑ya Boho Boto tohineni.
Yama hakikini ihi Boho Boto‑ya oda kobokana, yama siriri koboni yanatoneni. Yama siriri‑kaya maboro tokaterene, mai bokarabonehe. Oda tafari‑ke mahi hibati‑ya fiyakaneya, mai‑ya Baoro hiyare,
“Owati dai mitahi. Ai towakariyahi, ai tokiya, maboro aba, yamata aba, ai aba naba awineni.” Baoro ati ne.
Sodado hidi Baoro ati‑ya nofare, maboro hidi ati‑ya nofabisane.
Mai dama mai hiyara,

“Yama siri yanatona, abariko 4 tohamakiya, siriri fawanaboneni. Boho Boto‑ka faha kabane amosara‑ya ai winaraboneni. Kereta‑ka faha kabane one oni Fenisi toha, Fara‑ya ai tokabisiya, Fenisi‑ka faha kabane‑ya ai winiya, amosaboneni. Fenisi‑ka faha kabane‑ka adami dori kowe ihi wini amosateni.” Mai ati namaroni.
Mahi toki beheri‑kaya yama hakikini bide kake,
“Yama sibarineni.” Mai ati na,
Maboro ma‑maakana‑ka yama‑ya mai idimisa, maboro‑ya mai yananima, Kereta yakari‑ya oda towakabasa,
Yama yakari‑ya oda wasike kabani‑kaya boni kita kake,
Maboro‑ya boni kobona, boni hakikini ihi faha beheri‑kaya maboro oda‑ya towakawahene.
Faha teberi oni Kaoda toha‑ya oda fiyakani yanatoniya, oda dama, oda‑ka yama anini kita, maboro webote bari‑ya maboro bidi‑ya oda ide, maboro bidi‑ya oda tonaforimisineni, maboro bidi bokarebonaha.
Maboro abarebona, bai oda sokikana, faha kowira, siki‑ya oda koborabone, bora ibe waana‑ya mai nakisamineni. Yama hakikini kita ihi oda towakineni.
Mahi owa‑ya yama hakikini kita ihi oda kabokarabone, maboro doro‑ka yama‑ya mai weretofineni.
Mahi owa‑ya yama hakikikani fawara, maboro‑ka yama one mai weretofimakineni.
Oda amoni dama mahi oda awarihi, amowa mai oda awarihi na, yama hakikini oda‑ya towaka,
“Ai abawahibaka amani.” Oda nafi ati namaroni.
Oda amoni dama, yama yofina ihi oda tafara, mai bai‑ya Baoro waamise, mai‑ya hiyare,
“‘Kereta‑ya ai winahi.’ Ona.
Owati‑ya dai nofarani. Kereta‑ya ai wina‑mani, maboro‑ka yama abara neni.
Dai ya‑yainahi. Ai abi awiraboneni. Maboro‑ta abebonane.
Yama soki‑ya Deoso‑ka yo‑yose owa fowari‑kaya waane, fare Deoso‑ka ama·oni. Deoso okahiyarateni.
Owa‑ya hiyare,
‘Baoro, tiwa habo si‑siiririyahi. Sesa‑ya tikaboneni. Tiwa‑ya mai sa‑sawi Deoso ene mai nafi hasinaboneni. Mai abi awiraboneni.’ Ati nemarine.
Fara dai habo kitaharihi. Deoso ati onofa, Deoso ati‑nima yama naboneni.
Faha teberi‑ya ai koboni hawa tohiya, maboro abebonane.” Baoro ati nemarine.
Oda amoni 14 kana yama hakikini ihi oda towakanasa namaroni. Adiri·atiko faha‑ya oda toha, yama soki bai‑ya wami yakari‑ya oda kobona, yama‑ya mai watowahani.
Maboro yati‑ya koborebona, faha‑ya mai midikana, 36 metoro toha, hasini bide tohiya, mai midihikanamatasa, 27 metoro tohawahani.
“Yati‑ya ai koboriyahi.” Mai ati na.
Maboro ma‑maakana‑ka yama 4 toha‑ya maboro yodi‑kaya mai weretofemaroni. Deoso‑ya mai hiyara, yama wahi‑ya mai nimanamaroni.
Maboro‑ka mai one maboro bidi‑ya mai tokabone,
“Maboro ma‑maakana‑ka yama one oda weretofiba.” Mai ati nani, mai kananabonehe.
Maboro bidi‑ya mai nakisamineni.
Baoro mai‑ya awe, sodado mai‑ka hidi, hika sodado mai na‑ya hiyare,
“Mai tokariyahi. Mai tokiya, dai nafi ababoneni.” Baoro ati nemarine.
Baoro ati ene sodado maboro bidi‑ka mado‑ya mai tiikasa, maboro bidi bokane.
Yama wahabisari‑ya Baoro mai‑ya hiyare,
“Dai tafahi. Ai amoni 14 toha, dai tafarani.
Dai tafawahahi, dai kitibakaro. Dai tati kone ohare abi awiraboneni. Dai abaraboneni.” Baoro ati nemarine.
Ati fawane, baho‑ya damakane, Deoso‑ya hiyare,
“Abi Deoso, tika yamata oda kayafawahini.” Ati ne.
Mai nafi hiwakatome, baho‑ya bakanakose, baho‑ya kabawahemarine.
Mai ya‑yainawaha, yamata‑ya mai nafi kabawahani.
Maboro‑ka oda dama, 276 oda tohamaroni.
Mai tafi hawa toha, mai korimanama, yamata one‑ya mai weretofineni, mai‑ka maboro bokarebonaha.
Yama wahabisari‑ya yama‑ya mai kiinamina, faha teberi bara toha, teberi‑ya mai watora. Faha bide batori‑ya mai awa,
“Faha bide‑ya ai towakamahi. Maboro tokeba awane.” Mai ati namaroni.
Maboro ma‑maakana‑ka mado‑ya mai wisihina, faha‑ya towitakosa, teme mai hinakisama, hika bora ohare mai yadihinama namaroni, faha widi‑ya mai tokabonehe.
Faha bide batori‑ya oda tokabone, maboro bono siki‑ya towe ene maakanemarine. Faha rike kita ihi yodi bakatonemarine.
“Mai yaditona mai one faha‑ya diboni tokarabone, mai nafi ai nanahabahi.” Sodado mai ati na.
Sodado mai‑ka hidi Baoro‑ya nofe, sodado mai‑ya ati barine,
“Mai dai nanahabariyahi. Faha diboni‑ya dai wata, dai diboni dai toha, faha widi‑ya dai kobonahi.
Faha diboni‑ya dai watora, awa ibe‑ya dai one towaka, maboro ebe‑ya dai one towaka nahi, dai nafi.” Sodado mai‑ka hidi ati nemarine.
Fara faha widi‑ya mai koboneni, mai nafi.
Faha widi‑ya oda kobona, tabora oni oda mitawaha, oni Maota tohamaroni.
Maota‑ya mai wi‑wina mai ati soma, oda‑ya mai kasoma, faha bofe‑ya yifo‑ya mai afokanamaroni, yifo oda hiwanabonehe. Yama siri kitamaroni.
Oda‑ka yifo‑bone‑ya Baoro sibane, yifo‑ya wasi, yifo‑ya kakame, yifo‑ya wisamaki, yifo hodi‑ya maka foya, Baoro yehe‑ya wainamaroni.
Baoro yehe‑ya maka waina, fai yehe‑ya wina‑ya Maota‑ka mai awa, mai ibi hiyara,
“Ai owa mai‑ya nanahabano tohe awane, faha‑ya abare, hasirebona, maka ihi aba kanibote nebonane.” Mai ati namaroni.
Yifo hirini‑ya maka‑ya Baoro korotonamaki, maka komi awiramoneni.
“Yehe waraneba awane. Hiniya abeba awane.” Mai atibodi ati na,
Mai hiwakatome, mai nimahikani yabo, Baoro‑ka yama komi awira‑ya mai awa,
“Mai‑ka deoso tohe awane.” Mai ati nawahani.
Ahiyata‑ya mai‑ka hidi i‑di Bobiro tabaro tohe, Bobiro oda‑ya kasome, oda‑ya himane, tabaro‑ya oda winawaha, fara‑ya oda amoni fama, oda amoni oharimaki namaroni.
I‑di Bobiro badi kiyane, kawine, yama kome ihi kawine, kowayaka hikanarime, kawine‑ya Baoro tokomaki, Bobiro badi‑ya yehe foriya, Deoso‑ya hiyare, ati ene Deoso hinakitamawahemarine.
Bobiro badi kitami tamine‑ya mai mita, mai kiyana Baoro‑ya mai kama, mai nafi kitamamaroni.
Oda‑ya mai kasomi dama, makobote maboro owa‑ya oda foyamabone, oda‑ka yama‑bone‑ya mai daanamakemaroni.

Maota‑ya oda wina abariko 3 tohe, makobote maboro owa‑ya oda foyawaha, Aresadiriya‑ka maboro owa Maota‑ya ite, yama siriri fawanabone‑ya mai nimana, maboro oni ‘deoso wadi famane’, deoso oni Kasito owa toha, Borosi owa toha nane.
Sirakosa‑ya oda kobokana, Sirakosa‑ya oda amoni fama one oharimaki namaroni.
Oda towakatasa, Hekiyo‑ya oda kobokana, yama hakikini amosa ihi oda amoni ohare, Boteori‑ya oda kobokanamaroni.
Boteori‑ya Yeso ati‑ya mai no‑nofa mai one wina, oda‑ya mai himanani, mai tabori‑ya oda winabonehe. Mai tabori‑ya oda amoni 7 kana, makobote Homa‑ya oda tokawahamaroni.
Homa‑ya Yeso‑ka mai wi‑wina oda tamine‑ya mai mita, Abio Foro‑ya mai one kama, Tafena 3 kana toha‑ya mai one kama, oda‑ya mai kobona, mai‑ya Baoro awe, Deoso‑ya kahiyare, atibodi kitawahemarine.
Homa‑ya oda kobona, sodado eyehe yobe‑ya Baoro wine, kadeya‑ya foyi awiremarine.
Homa‑ya amoni fama, amoni oharimaki ne‑ya Yodeo mai‑ka hidi‑ya Baoro haane, mai kamake, mai‑ya hiyare,
“Owati dai mitahi. Dai owa ama·oni. Ai‑ka idi mai ati‑ya onofa, ai‑ka mai one okakoterani, mai‑ya wee·orihi oteni. Hiniya owa‑ya mai kako kofina, Yerosare‑ya owa‑ya mai daanineni, homano mai‑ya.
Owati‑ya homano mai mita, owa ene sibara, owa‑ya mai nanahabarabone, owa‑ya mai seekanabone mai ati na.
Owa‑ya mai seekanabone, Yodeo owa‑ya mai ati barina, mai ati ihi i‑di Sesa‑ya haa·ona, ai‑ka mai okakora, owa‑ya mai kako kofineni.
Fara dai haa·ona, dai oawaboneni, owati dai mitabonehe. Isara·eo‑ka nodi ai nimane, tamine ohiyare ene koheti‑ya owa‑ya mai yaditoneni.” Baoro ati ne.
Ati‑ya Yodeo‑ka hidi mai mita, mai ati yanana,
“Tiwa tamine‑ya mai kanahanoterani. Yodeya‑ya ai‑ka mai kamake, tiwa tamine towe‑ya mai hiyaraterani.
Tiwati oda mitawahaboneni. Yeso ati‑ya dai no‑nofa, towe dai‑mone mai ati teni. Oda dami tiwati‑ya oda mitawahaboneni, yama oda watowahabonehe.” Mai ati namaroni.

Mai kamatasi‑bone‑ka mahi tamine‑ya Baoro‑ya mai kamineni. Mai ati kami‑ke mahi kobone, mai one mai‑ya sawe, Baoro wini‑kaya mai kobona, yama wahabisari‑ya Baoro mai‑ya hiyari yanakane, Deoso tabaro tamine‑ya hiyare, Yeso tamine i‑di Mose hikanahanomata‑ya mai‑ya yofikana, Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete Yeso tamine mai hikanahanomata‑ya mai‑ya yofikana nane. Mahi toke‑ya ati fawanemarine.
Mai one Baoro ati‑ya nofa, mai one Baoro ati‑ya nofarihi namaroni.
Baoro hiyari hawa tohi yanatoneya, mai ibi weena, mai‑ya hiyaramatase,
“Hibati‑ya Deoso‑ka Doni dai‑ka idi mai tamine‑ya kamine, ati‑ya Deoso ati‑ya mi‑mita‑mata i‑di Isa·iya kanahanomatane. Fare ati‑nima yama na,
‘Mai‑ya tikama, mai tihiyariyahi. —Yama tamine‑ya dai mita, dai wato awiraboneni, dai kakatomiya, dai watorihi dai naboneni.—

Mai habi si‑siirina, yama‑ya mai wato awiraboneni. Mai narabi hawi awira, yama tamine‑ya mai miti awira. Mai noki‑ya mai barina, yama‑ya mai awi awirabonehe. Owa‑ya mai haaniya, mai‑ya okasomabone ona, mai atibodi kita, owa‑ya mai haani awirani.’ Deoso ati nene.” Isa·iya‑ka yama hani ati nineni.
“Owati dai mitahi. Bara mai‑ya Deoso ati tokawahebona, Deoso ati‑ya mai nofabisaboneni, Deoso mai‑ya kasomebonane.” Baoro ati nemarine.
Baoro ati fawaneya, Yodeo mai tokoma, mai ibi weenamoneni.
Faha fowe fami‑ya Homa mai‑ka yobe‑ya Baoro wine, yobe hidi‑ya manakone‑ya daanemarine. Mai kamake, mai‑ya hiyare,
Deoso tabaro tamine‑ya hiyara, Yeso Kirisito ai‑ka hidi tamine‑ya hiyara nemarine. Baoro habo kite, mai ati barihiterene.
Yeso Kirisito‑ka yo‑yose i‑di Baoro ama·oni. Deoso owa‑ya kadike, owa‑ya yosemarine, Deoso Ati Amosabote okaminabonehe.
Hibati‑ya Yeso kaki awisareya, Deoso ati‑ya mai mi‑mita‑mete Deoso Ati Amosabote‑ya mai mita, Deoso‑ka yama hani‑ya ati mai hikanahanomatane.
Deoso Ati Amosabote i‑di Yeso Kirisito ai‑ka Hidi tamine amane. Fare tamine okaminebonane. Neme‑ya Badi eyehe winemata, makobote bofe‑ya wade, ai‑ka Hidi i‑di Dafi‑ka nodi tohane.
Hibati‑ya bofe‑ya kobone, mai hinahabe, Deoso hinakitame,
“Yeso Kirisito i‑di Deoso Bidi kitabote tohane.” Deoso‑ka Doni amosabote ati nematane.

Kirisito ene Deoso owa‑ya kadikemarine, Yeso‑ka yo‑yose ohawahabonehe. Deoso owa‑ya kasomemarine, Bara mai‑ya Deoso Ati Amosabote okaminabonehe. Yeso ati‑ya mai nofiya, ati mai hikadabeya, Yeso Kirisito‑ya mai kahiyaraboneni.
Homa‑ya dai wi‑wina dai‑ya Deoso kadikaharimata, Yeso Kirisito ati‑ya dai no‑nofa Yeso‑ka dai amani.

Homa‑ya dai wi‑wina Deoso dai‑ya nofe, dai‑ya kadikematane, Deoso‑ka dai tohabonehe. Dai‑ka yama hani‑bone okanahanoneni. Ai‑ka Abi i‑di Deoso, ai‑ka Ayo i‑di Yeso Kirisito mai fama, dai‑ya mai kasoma, dai atibodi ati dai‑ya soma teni.
Yeso ati dai nofa, dai tamine omita, ya‑yai·oneni. Mai tabori dami‑ya dai tamine‑ya mai hiyaramoneni.
“Homa‑ya mai wi‑wina Deoso ati‑ya mai nofi nafemoneni.” Mai ati na,
mai ati omita, mai ati ihi ya‑yai·ona, Yeso Kirisito ene Deoso okahiyarateni.
Deoso ati onofi nafe, Yeso Ati Amosabote okamina, dai tamine ohiyara oteni, Deoso‑ya. Dai tamine ohiyaranade‑ya Deoso watone.
Dai tabaro‑ya okabone ona,
“Abi Deoso, Homa‑ya mai wi‑wina mai tabori‑ya okabone ona, tiwati amosiya, mai tabori‑ya okaboneni.” Oteni.
Dai‑ya owati awi nofineni, dai okasomabonehe. Owa ene Yeso ati dai nofi ba‑basi niya, dai atibodi kitawahabone owatibodi ati nineni.
Dai tabaro‑ya kobo·oniya, dai okasoma, fara owa dai kasomahari nabone onani. Ai ibi kasoma, ai atibodi kiti ba‑basi teni.

Dai tabaro‑ya okabone onamaro, mai tabori‑ya yama aninasa ona, dai tabaro‑ya okara. Bara mai dama mai‑ya ohiyarineni, Yeso ati‑ya mai nofabonehe. Makobote dai‑ya ohiyaramakebone onani, Yeso ati‑ya dai one nofamakebonehe.

Mai dami‑ya Yeso ati okaminabone Deoso ati nemarine. Kereko mai toha, Bara mai one toha, yama yaki‑ya mai wi‑wina mai toha, yama‑ya mai wa‑wato mai toha, yama‑ya mai watora mai toha, mai na, mai nafi‑ya Yeso Ati Amosabote okaminabone owatibodi ati teni.
